text: The book of the generation of Jesus Christ , the son of David , the son of Abraham .
text2: Jesukrístu Weatrí ju ainiawai . Tura Ashí nankaamas ti uunt weat Tawitcha Apraámsha ainiawai .

text: Abraham begat Isaac ; and Isaac begat Jacob ; and Jacob begat Judas and his brethren ;
text2: Apraáma Uchirí Isak . Tura Isaka Uchirí Jakup . Jakupa Uchirísha Jutá ni yachijiai .

text: And Judas begat Phares and Zara of Thamar ; and Phares begat Esrom ; and Esrom begat Aram ;
text2: Tura Jutá uchirin Páresan tura Sarancha Tamar jurermiayi . Páresa Uchirísha Esrum , nuna Uchirísha Aram .

text: And Aram begat Aminadab ; and Aminadab begat Naasson ; and Naasson begat Salmon ;
text2: Nuna Uchirísha Aminiatáp . Nuna Uchirísha Nasun . Nuna Uchirísha Sarmun .

text: And Salmon begat Booz of Rachab ; and Booz begat Obed of Ruth ; and Obed begat Jesse ;
text2: Sarmunka Uchiríncha Púusan Raap jurermiayi . Puusa Uchirín Uwitian Ruut jurermiayi . Uwitia Uchirísha Isaí .

text: And Jesse begat David the king ; and David the king begat Solomon of her that had been the wife of Urias ;
text2: Nuna Uchirísha uunt akupin Tawit . Uunt akupin Tawitia Uchiríncha Sarumúnkan Patsepa jurermiayi . Patsepasha emka Uríasa nuweeyayi .

text: And Solomon begat Roboam ; and Roboam begat Abia ; and Abia begat Asa ;
text2: Sarumúnka Uchirí Rupuam . Nuna Uchirísha Apías . Nuna Uchirísha Asa .

text: And Asa begat Josaphat ; and Josaphat begat Joram ; and Joram begat Ozias ;
text2: Asa Uchirísha Jusapát . Nuna Uchirísha Juram . Nuna Uchirí Usías .

text: And Ozias begat Joatham ; and Joatham begat Achaz ; and Achaz begat Ezekias ;
text2: Usíasa Uchirí Jutam . Nuna Uchirí Akas . Nuna Uchirí Esekías .

text: And Ezekias begat Manasses ; and Manasses begat Amon ; and Amon begat Josias ;
text2: Esekíasa Uchirí Manasés . Nuna Uchirí Amun . Nuna Uchirí Jusías .

text: And Josias begat Jechonias and his brethren , about the time they were carried away to Babylon :
text2: Jusíasa Uchirí Jekunías ni yachi armia nujai . Nui Papirúnianmaya shuar Israer shuaran mesetjai nupetkar Papirúnia nunkanam achirar Júkiarmiayi .

text: And after they were brought to Babylon , Jechonias begat Salathiel ; and Salathiel begat Zorobabel ;
text2: Nu ukunmanka Jekuníasa Uchirí Saratiár akiiniamiayi . Tura nuna Uchirí Surupapír .

text: And Zorobabel begat Abiud ; and Abiud begat Eliakim ; and Eliakim begat Azor ;
text2: Surupapíra Uchirí Awiut . Nuna Uchirí Iriakím . Nuna Uchirí Asur .

text: And Azor begat Sadoc ; and Sadoc begat Achim ; and Achim begat Eliud ;
text2: Asura Uchirí Satuk . Nuna Uchirí Akim . Nuna Uchirí Eriut .

text: And Eliud begat Eleazar ; and Eleazar begat Matthan ; and Matthan begat Jacob ;
text2: Eriuta Uchirí Ereasár . Nuna Uchirí Matan . Nuna Uchirí Jakup .

text: And Jacob begat Joseph the husband of Mary , of whom was born Jesus , who is called Christ .
text2: Jakupa Uchirí Jusé Marí aishriya nu . Marisha Jesusan jurermiayi . Nu Jesuska Shuáran uwemtikiartin asa Kristu tu anaikiamuiti .

text: So all the generations from Abraham to David are fourteen generations ; and from David until the carrying away into Babylon are fourteen generations ; and from the carrying away into Babylon unto Christ are fourteen generations .
text2: Tuma asamtai Apraámnumia Tawitnium Jesusa Weatrí katurse ( 14 ) ainiawai . Tawitniumiasha Papirúnianam jukimiunma nuisha katurse weat ainiawai . Papirúnianam jukimiunmayasha Krístunam ataksha katurse ainiawai .

text: Now the birth of Jesus Christ was on this wise : When as his mother Mary was espoused to Joseph , before they came together , she was found with child of the Holy Ghost .
text2: Jesukrístu akiiniamu Júnis ámiayi . Ni Nukurí Marí Jusejai anajmanairuyayi . Tura Tsaníatsain Yusa Wakaní ajaprumtikiamiayi .

text: Then Joseph her husband , being a just man , and not willing to make her a publick example , was minded to put her away privily .
text2: Ajaprukmataisha Jusé Marin iniatsaatsuk niin ajapatniun Enentáimpramiayi . Tura ti pénker asa aya iniaisatniun wakerimiayi aents nékainiatsain .

text: But while he thought on these things , behold , the angel of the Lord appeared unto him in a dream , saying , Joseph , thou son of David , fear not to take unto thee Mary thy wife : for that which is conceived in her is of the Holy Ghost .
text2: Nuna tu Enentáimia Pujái , mesekranam Yusa suntari Tarí chicharuk Tímiayi " Juséá , ame weatrum Tawitchakait . Tuma asam Marijiai nuatnaikiatin ashamkaip . Uchin jurertatna nuka Yusa Wakaníniuiti .

text: And she shall bring forth a son , and thou shalt call his name JESUS : for he shall save his people from their sins .
text2: Uchin aishmankan takustatui tura nuna naari JESUS anaikiattame . Ashí ni Shuárin ni tunaariya uwemtikkiartin asa Jesus anaikiatniuiti " Tímiayi .

text: Now all this was done , that it might be fulfilled which was spoken of the Lord by the prophet , saying ,
text2: Yus ni etserniurijiai yaunchu timia nu uminkiati tusa nu Túrunamiayi . Juna aamtikramiayi :

text: Behold , a virgin shall be with child , and shall bring forth a son , and they shall call his name Emmanuel , which being interpreted is , God with us .
text2: " Nuwa natsa ajapruktatui tura uchin takustatui . Nuna Náarisha Emanuér anainiaktatui . " Tu aarmaiti . Emanuérsha nu chichamnum " Yus iijiai pujuwiti " tawai .

text: Then Joseph being raised from sleep did as the angel of the Lord had bidden him , and took unto him his wife :
text2: Jusesha mesekranmaya shintiar Yusa suntari timia Núnisan Marin nuatkamiayi .

text: And knew her not till she had brought forth her firstborn son : and he called his name JESUS .
text2: Tura uchin Júreatsain tsaninchamiayi . Tura jurermatai uchin Jesus anaikiamiayi .

text: Now when Jesus was born in Bethlehem of Judaea in the days of Herod the king , behold , there came wise men from the east to Jerusalem ,
text2: Jutía nunkanam Pirin pépru ana nui Jesus akiiniamiayi . Nuisha Nú nunka akupniuri Irutisauyayi . Akiiniamtai ti neka apach nantu Tátainmaaniya Jerusarén péprunam Táarmiayi .

text: Saying , Where is he that is born King of the Jews ? for we have seen his star in the east , and are come to worship him .
text2: Taar inintruiniak " ṡIsraer shuara uunt akupniuri tui akiiniait ? tiarmiayi . Nantu Tátainmaani pujaati ni yaari Wáinkiamji . Tura tikishmatratai tusar winiaji " tiarmiayi .

text: When Herod the king had heard these things , he was troubled , and all Jerusalem with him .
text2: Irutis nuna antuk Nusháa Enentáimpramiayi . Tuma asamtai Ashí Jerusarénnumia shuarsha antukar Nusháa Enentáimprarmiayi .

text: And when he had gathered all the chief priests and scribes of the people together , he demanded of them where Christ should be born .
text2: Irutis nuikia Ashí Israer - patri uuntrincha tura yaunchu akupkamun jintinniuncha untsukarmiayi . Tura Kristu akiiniatniurin inintrusmiayi .

text: And they said unto him , In Bethlehem of Judaea : for thus it is written by the prophet ,
text2: Tutai chichainiak " Jutía nunkanam Pirin pepru ana nui akiiniatniuiti , tiarmiayi . Yaunchu Yúsnan etserin tu aaruiti :

text: And thou Bethlehem , in the land of Juda , art not the least among the princes of Juda : for out of thee shall come a Governor , that shall rule my people Israel .
text2: " Jutía nunkanam , Pirin pepru , Ishitiápchich ana Nuyá nekas uunt akupin winittiawai . Nii Ashí Israer shuaran , Wíi shuar ásarmatai , pénker Wáinkiattawai , " tawai Yus . " Tu tiarmiayi .

text: Then Herod , when he had privily called the wise men , inquired of them diligently what time the star appeared .
text2: Nuna Tuíniakui Irutis ti neka apachin úusan , Urutía yaa emka Wáinkiamarum tusa aniasarmiayi .

text: And he sent them to Bethlehem , and said , Go and search diligently for the young child ; and when ye have found him , bring me word again , that I may come and worship him also .
text2: Nuyá Pirinnum akupeak " Nui werum uchi pénker inintrusrum Wáinkiatarum . Tura Wáinkiarum ujatkatarum . Wisha werin Tikishmátuutaj " Tímiayi .

text: When they saw the star , they rejoiced with exceeding great joy .
text2: Tutai ti neka apach wearmiayi . Tura yaa , yajaya Wáinkiarmiania nu , tuke eem wémiayi . Tura yaan Wáinkiar ti wararsarmiayi . Tura Nú yaa uchi pujumia nui ejeniarmiayi .

text: And when they were come into the house , they saw the young child with Mary his mother , and fell down , and worshipped him : and when they had opened their treasures , they presented unto him gifts ; gold , and frankincense , and myrrh .
text2: Jeá wayawar uchincha ni Nukurí Marijiai Wáinkiarmiayi . Tura uchin tikishmatrarmiayi . Nuyá ni Kajuntríyan kurincha , Mirá kunkuinniasha , Chíkich kunkuinniasha Súsarmiayi .

text: And being warned of God in a dream that they should not return to Herod , they departed into their own country another way .
text2: Nuyá mesekranam Yus " Irutisaini weerap " tutai Chíkich jintianam waketkiarmiayi .

text: And when they were departed , behold , the angel of the Lord appeareth to Joseph in a dream , saying , Arise , and take the young child and his mother , and flee into Egypt , and be thou there until I bring thee word : for Herod will seek the young child to destroy him .
text2: Ti neka apach waketramtai Yusa suntari mesekranam Jusen ujakmiayi . " Nantakim uchi ni Nukuríjiai Ejiptu nunkanam jukim nui Pujustá . Irutis uchin Máataj tusa eaktatui . Tura ukunam ankant ajasmatai ujaktajme " Tímiayi .

text: When he arose , he took the young child and his mother by night , and departed into Egypt :
text2: Tutai Jusé kurat shintiar Nú Káshik uchincha Nukuríjiai Ejiptunam jukimiayi .

text: And was there until the death of Herod : that it might be fulfilled which was spoken of the Lord by the prophet , saying , Out of Egypt have I called my son .
text2: Irutis Jáatsain nui pujusarmiayi . Ejiptunam pujusmatai Yus yaunchu timia nu uminkiamiayi . Iis , Yúsnan etserin aak Tímiayi : " Ejiptunmayan winia Uchirun untsukmajai . " Tu aarmiayi .

text: Then Herod , when he saw that he was mocked of the wise men , was exceeding wroth , and sent forth , and slew all the children that were in Bethlehem , and in all the coasts thereof , from two years old and under , according to the time which he had diligently inquired of the wise men .
text2: Irutissha ti neka apach niin ananka Yajá waketran Nekáa ti kajekmiayi . Ti kajek Ashí aishmanchin Pirinnumsha tura yantamach pujuarmia nunasha maawaarat tusa akupkamiayi . Ti neka apach ujakmia nuna Enentáimias Ashí Jimiará uwin takakun tura Nú uchichin Máawarat tusa akupkamiayi .

text: Then was fulfilled that which was spoken by Jeremy the prophet , saying ,
text2: Nuka Yusnan etserin Jeremías aarmia nu uminkiamiayi . Juna aarmiayi :

text: In Rama was there a voice heard , lamentation , and weeping , and great mourning , Rachel weeping for her children , and would not be comforted , because they are not .
text2: " Ramá nunkanam ti uutainiak uur ajainiawai . Raker ti uutu asa atsankrachminiaiti ni Uchirí Jákarmatai . " Tu aarmiayi .

text: But when Herod was dead , behold , an angel of the Lord appeareth in a dream to Joseph in Egypt ,
text2: Tura Irutis jakamtai Yusa suntari mesekranam Jusen ujakmiayi .

text: Saying , Arise , and take the young child and his mother , and go into the land of Israel : for they are dead which sought the young child ' s life .
text2: " Uchin Máataj tiarmia nuka Jákarai . Yamaikia ataksha uchi ni Nukuríjiai jukim Israer nunkanam waketkitia " Tímiayi .

text: And he arose , and took the young child and his mother , and came into the land of Israel .
text2: Tutai Jusé nantaki uchincha Nukuríjiai jukin Ejiptunmaya Israer nunkanam waketkimiayi .

text: But when he heard that Archelaus did reign in Judaea in the room of his father Herod , he was afraid to go thither : notwithstanding , being warned of God in a dream , he turned aside into the parts of Galilee :
text2: Túrasha Irutisa Uchirí Arkiráu Jutía nunkanam uunt akupin ajasun Nekáa nui wétinian Aránkámiayi . Mesekranmasha ujakma asa nui pujutsuk Kariréa nunkanam wémiayi .

text: And he came and dwelt in a city called Nazareth : that it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophets , He shall be called a Nazarene .
text2: Nui Jeá Nasarét péprunam pujusmiayi . " Nasarétnumia átatui " Yusnan etserin yaunchu tu etserkamu nujai uminkiamiayi .

text: In those days came John the Baptist , preaching in the wilderness of Judaea ,
text2: Nuyá imiakratin Juan Jutía nunkanam aents atsamunam etserki Támiayi .

text: And saying , Repent ye : for the kingdom of heaven is at hand .
text2: " Enentáim Yapajiátarum . Tsawant ishichik ajasai Yus jui akupin ajastin . " Tu etserkamiayi .

text: For this is he that was spoken of by the prophet Esaias , saying , The voice of one crying in the wilderness , Prepare ye the way of the Lord , make his paths straight .
text2: Nú Juankan yaunchu Yúsnan etserin Isayas juna aarmiayi : " Shuar atsamunam aents untsumui . Untsumuk " Atumí Enentái Uunta jinti iwiarturtarum tura naka awajsatarum " tawai . " Tu aarmiayi .

text: And the same John had his raiment of camel ' s hair , and a leathern girdle about his loins ; and his meat was locusts and wild honey .
text2: Nu Juansha kamiyu ure najantramun entsauyayi . Emenmamkesha nuapeyayi . Tura yutai - Títikriátsnasha chinijiai Yúuyayi .

text: Then went out to him Jerusalem , and all Judaea , and all the region round about Jordan ,
text2: Tura Jerusarén péprunmaya shuarsha tura Ashí Jutía nunkanmaya shuarsha Jurtan entsanam matsamiarmia Nú shuarsha mash Juánkan tariarmiayi ni chichamen anturkatai tusar .

text: And were baptized of him in Jordan , confessing their sins .
text2: Tura ni tunaarin paant etserkarmatai Juan Jurtan entsanam imiainiarmiayi .

text: But when he saw many of the Pharisees and Sadducees come to his baptism , he said unto them , O generation of vipers , who hath warned you to flee from the wrath to come ?
text2: Juansha Pariséuncha Satuséuncha imiatti tusa wininian Wáiniak Tímiayi " Napia aaniutirmincha , ṡya atumniasha ti Asutniátniunmaya uwempratniuncha ujatmakmarum ? Tímiayi . Asutiátin tsawant ishichik ajasai .

text: Bring forth therefore fruits meet for repentance :
text2: Tuma asamtai Enentáim Yapajiámuitkiuinkia pénker wekaamurmijiai paant iniakmastarum .

text: And think not to say within yourselves , We have Abraham to our father : for I say unto you , that God is able of these stones to raise up children unto Abraham .
text2: Atumsha " Iikia Apraám weeaitji " tu Enentáimtumasairap . Nujai uwemprashtatrume . Yus wakerakka ju kayan Apraáman tiranki najankainti , Tímiayi .

text: And now also the axe is laid unto the root of the trees : therefore every tree which bringeth not forth good fruit is hewn down , and cast into the fire .
text2: Numi ajaktinia aintsan Kampuwárin jacha atuttsamuiti . Tura numi pénker nereatsna nuka tsupikia jinium apeamu ártatui .

text: I indeed baptize you with water unto repentance : but he that cometh after me is mightier than I , whose shoes I am not worthy to bear : he shall baptize you with the Holy Ghost , and with fire :
text2: Wikia aya entsajain imiajrume atumi Enentái Yapajiáwakrumin . Antsu winia ukurui winiana nuka pénker awajtamsataj tusa imiantinia aanis tura Jía aanis Yusa Wakanin enketramprattarme . Wijiai nankaamantu asamtai wikia tsuntsumpruan ni Sapatrínkisha atitrachminiaitjai .

text: Whose fan is in his hand , and he will throughly purge his floor , and gather his wheat into the garner ; but he will burn up the chaff with unquenchable fire .
text2: Aruusa nerejai Túruinia aintsan átatui . Awajtiutairin achikiuiti tura nujai saepen awajtittiawai . Tura neren pénker ikiustatui , antsu saepenka jinium apeattawai . Nu jisha tuke kajinchaiti . " Tu Tímiayi Juan .

text: Then cometh Jesus from Galilee to Jordan unto John , to be baptized of him .
text2: Nuyá Jesus Kariréa nunkanmaya winis Jurtan entsanam Támiayi Juan imiatti tusa .

text: But John forbad him , saying , I have need to be baptized of thee , and comest thou to me ?
text2: Juansha emka nakitiak Jesusan Tímiayi " Ame winia imiatminiaitme . Túrutamniaitiatmesha ṡurukamtai winia tarutnium ? " Tímiayi .

text: And Jesus answering said unto him , Suffer it to be so now : for thus it becometh us to fulfil all righteousness . Then he suffered him .
text2: Tura Jesus Tímiayi " Antsan asati yamaikia . Núnisrik Ashí Yus akupkamu umirkatniuitji . " Tutai Juan iniaisamiayi .

text: And Jesus , when he was baptized , went up straightway out of the water : and , lo , the heavens were opened unto him , and he saw the Spirit of God descending like a dove , and lighting upon him :
text2: Tura Jesus imiani entsaya Jíinkímtai nayaimp ~ i uranmiayi . Tura Yusa Wakaní Yámpitsa aintsan Jesusan tarimiayi . Niisha Wáinkiámiayi .

text: And lo a voice from heaven , saying , This is my beloved Son , in whom I am well pleased .
text2: Túramtai nayaimpinmaya Yus chichaak " Juka winia Uchiruiti . Ti aneamuiti . Ti shiir Enentáimtajai " Tímiayi .

text: Then was Jesus led up of the Spirit into the wilderness to be tempted of the devil .
text2: Nu Túrunamtai Yusa Wakaní Jesusan iwianchjai nekapmamtiksattsa aents atsamunam jukimiayi .

text: And when he had fasted forty days and forty nights , he was afterward an hungred .
text2: Nui kuarenta ( 40 ) tsawant , Káshisha tsawaisha yurumtsuk pujak tsukarmiayi .

text: And when the tempter came to him , he said , If thou be the Son of God , command that these stones be made bread .
text2: Nui uunt iwianch Jesusan nekapsataj tusa Tarí Tímiayi " Nekas Yusa Uchirinkiumka ju kaya apatuk najanata . "

text: But he answered and said , It is written , Man shall not live by bread alone , but by every word that proceedeth out of the mouth of God .
text2: Tutai Jesus Tímiayi " Yus - Papinium aarmaiti : " Aents aya apatkujain iwiaaku pujuschamniaiti . Antsu Yus Táman Enentáimtuiniak nekas iwiaaku pujusartatui " tawai " Tímiayi .

text: Then the devil taketh him up into the holy city , and setteth him on a pinnacle of the temple ,
text2: Tutai uunt iwianch Jerusarén péprunam Jukí Yusa Uunt Jee Cháikin iwiak

text: And saith unto him , If thou be the Son of God , cast thyself down : for it is written , He shall give his angels charge concerning thee : and in their hands they shall bear thee up , lest at any time thou dash thy foot against a stone .
text2: Tímiayi " Nekas Yusa Uchirínkiumka juya akaikim iniaata . Kame Yus - Papinium aarmaiti : " Yus ni suntarin akatar Akúptúrmaktatui . Nawemin kayanam ajiintsumnin wenkurmaktatui " tawai " Tímiayi .

text: Jesus said unto him , It is written again , Thou shalt not tempt the Lord thy God .
text2: Tutai Jesus Tímiayi " Núnisan Yus - Papinium aarmaiti : " Ame uuntrum Yus " Nekapsataj " tiip " tawai " Tímiayi .

text: Again , the devil taketh him up into an exceeding high mountain , and sheweth him all the kingdoms of the world , and the glory of them ;
text2: Ataksha uunt iwianch naint Yakí Wájakmanum iwiakmiayi tura Nuyá Ashí nunkanmaya péprun shiira nuna iniaktusmiayi .

text: And saith unto him , All these things will I give thee , if thou wilt fall down and worship me .
text2: Tura Tímiayi " Winia tikishmatrurakminkia juna mash amastatjai . "

text: Then saith Jesus unto him , Get thee hence , Satan : for it is written , Thou shalt worship the Lord thy God , and him only shalt thou serve .
text2: Tutai Jesus Tímiayi " Werumta , uunt iwianchi . Yus - Papinium aarma awai : " Ame uuntrum Yúsak tikishmatrata tura Ninki shiir awajsata " tawai " Tímiayi .

text: Then the devil leaveth him , and , behold , angels came and ministered unto him .
text2: Tutai uunt iwianch Jesusan ikiuak wémiayi . Túramtai Yusa suntari tariar atsumamurin Súsarmiayi .

text: Now when Jesus had heard that John was cast into prison , he departed into Galilee ;
text2: Juan sepunam enketui taman antuk Jesus Kariréa nunkanam wémiayi .

text: And leaving Nazareth , he came and dwelt in Capernaum , which is upon the sea coast , in the borders of Zabulon and Nephthalim :
text2: Tura Nasarét péprunam pujutsuk Kapernáum péprunam we pujusmiayi . Kapernáumsha Kariréa antumianka Kánmatkariin pujumiayi . Ti yaunchusha Jakupu uchiri Sapurúnsha tura Niptarísha nu nunkanak nui pujustaitsar achikiaruyayi .

text: That it might be fulfilled which was spoken by Esaias the prophet , saying ,
text2: Jesus nuna Túramtai yaunchu Yúsnan etserin Isayas aarmia nu uminkiamiayi . Juna aarmiayi :

text: The land of Zabulon , and the land of Nephthalim , by the way of the sea , beyond Jordan , Galilee of the Gentiles ;
text2: " Sapurúnsha Niptarísha nayaantsanam Tíjiuch Jurtan entsa amainini nunkan achikiarmiayi . Nuka Kariréaiti Israer - shuarcha matsatainia nui .

text: The people which sat in darkness saw great light ; and to them which sat in the region and shadow of death light is sprung up .
text2: Nu aents kiritniunam pujuiniayatan ti Tsáapninian Wáinkiarmiayi . Jákatniunam pujuiniai Tsáapin Tsáapnirmiayi . " Tu aarmaiti .

text: From that time Jesus began to preach , and to say , Repent : for the kingdom of heaven is at hand .
text2: Nuyá Jesus étseruk Tímiayi " Tunaarum Enentáimturum Enentáim Yapajiátarum . Ju nunkanam Yus akupkatin tsawant ishichik ajasai . "

text: And Jesus , walking by the sea of Galilee , saw two brethren , Simon called Peter , and Andrew his brother , casting a net into the sea : for they were fishers .
text2: Jesus Kariréa antumianka Kánmatkarin wesa Jimiará aentsun Nuámtak Yáchinniun Wáinkiámiayi . Chikichik Antresauyayi , chikichcha Semunkauyayi . Nu Semun Núnisan Pitru Náartiniuyayi . Namakan achin ásar namakan nekajai Nankíak yujaarmiayi .

text: And he saith unto them , Follow me , and I will make you fishers of men .
text2: Nuna Jesus Wáinkiar tiarmiayi " Nemartustarum . Túrakrumin shuarsha Yusna arti tusan Yamái namak Achíarmena Núnisan shuaran - eau awajsatjarme . "

text: And they straightway left their nets , and followed him .
text2: Tutai ni nekarin ikiukiar Niin nemariarmiayi .

text: And going on from thence , he saw other two brethren , James the son of Zebedee , and John his brother , in a ship with Zebedee their father , mending their nets ; and he called them .
text2: Nuyá ishichik wésan ataksha Nuámtak yachinniun Wáinkiámiayi . Jakupu Juanjai mai Sepetéu Uchirí ármiayi . Niisha kanunam enkemsar ni nekarin ni Aparíjiai iwiarainiak pujuriarmiayi . Tura Jesus " Nemartusta " tutai

text: And they immediately left the ship and their father , and followed him .
text2: nu chichamaik kanuncha tura Aparíncha ikiukiar Jesusan nemariarmiayi .

text: And Jesus went about all Galilee , teaching in their synagogues , and preaching the gospel of the kingdom , and healing all manner of sickness and all manner of disease among the people .
text2: Ashí Kariréa nunkanam Jesus Israer - shuar iruntainiam etserki wémiayi . Yus ju nunkanam akupkatin chichaman etserkamiayi . Tura Untsurí sunkurjai Jáinian Ashí Tsuármiayi .

text: And his fame went throughout all Syria : and they brought unto him all sick people that were taken with divers diseases and torments , and those which were possessed with devils , and those which were lunatick , and those that had the palsy ; and he healed them .
text2: Ashí Siria nunkanam Jesus Tsuákratman nekaawar Ashí Nánkamas sunkurjai Wáitin armia nuna Jesusan tsuarti tusa itiariarmiayi . Ashí jaancha , najaimiancha , yajauch wakantrukuncha , Wáuruncha , tampemaruncha Jesus Tsuármiayi .

text: And there followed him great multitudes of people from Galilee , and from Decapolis , and from Jerusalem , and from Judaea , and from beyond Jordan .
text2: Tura Untsurí shuar Jesusan nemariarmiayi . Kariréa nunkanmayasha , Tekapurisnumiasha , Jerusarén péprunmayasha , Jutía nunkanmayasha , Jurtan entsa amainiyasha Jesusan nemariarmiayi .

text: And seeing the multitudes , he went up into a mountain : and when he was set , his disciples came unto him :
text2: Jesus Untsurí shuar Káunkarun Wáiniak Náinnium waka nui pujusmiayi . Tura ni unuiniamurisha taar pujusarmiayi .

text: And he opened his mouth , and taught them , saying ,
text2: Nuyá Jesus Júnis unuiniamiayi .

text: Blessed are the poor in spirit : for theirs is the kingdom of heaven .
text2: ` Ame wakanim atsumamu nekamarum kakaram ajasrum warastarum . Tuma asarum Yus akupeamunam pachiinniuitrume .

text: Blessed are they that mourn : for they shall be comforted .
text2: Kúntuts pujarum nu warastarum . Yus atsantamprattarme .

text: Blessed are the meek : for they shall inherit the earth .
text2: Péejchach Enentáimtumarmena nu warastarum . Yus Ashí nunkan amastatrume .

text: Blessed are they which do hunger and thirst after righteousness : for they shall be filled .
text2: Eseer wekasataj tusa aya kitiamarum nu warastarum . Yus imiktamprattarme .

text: Blessed are the merciful : for they shall obtain mercy .
text2: Waitnenkratniutiram warastarum . Yus waitnentramprattarme .

text: Blessed are the pure in heart : for they shall see God .
text2: Pénker Enentáimniutiram warastarum . Yus Wáinkiáttarme .

text: Blessed are the peacemakers : for they shall be called the children of God .
text2: Chicham iwiarin árum nu warastarum . Yusa uchiri turamartatui .

text: Blessed are they which are persecuted for righteousness ' sake : for theirs is the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Pénker Túrakrumin yajauch awajtamainiakui warastarum . Yus akupeamunam pachiiniuitrume .

text: Blessed are ye , when men shall revile you , and persecute you , and shall say all manner of evil against you falsely , for my sake .
text2: Wíi shuar asakrumin katsekramainiakuisha , itit awajtamainiakuisha , tura Ashí tsanumprutmainiakuisha warastarum .

text: Rejoice , and be exceeding glad : for great is your reward in heaven : for so persecuted they the prophets which were before you .
text2: Núnisan yaunchu Yúsnan etserin armia nunasha Túrawarmiayi . Túramtai shiir Enentáimkiuram warastarum . Nayaimpiniam ti pénker akinkiattarme ' Tímiayi .

text: Ye are the salt of the earth : but if the salt have lost his savour , wherewith shall it be salted ? it is thenceforth good for nothing , but to be cast out , and to be trodden under foot of men .
text2: ` átumka ju nunkanam wee ana aintsanketrume . Tura wéeaitiat jeakchaitkiunka Míchuiti . ṡNusha itiur Yuámniak ati ? Antsu ántraiti . Tuma asamtai aa najatai tepet tusar ajapashtinkiait ' Tímiayi .

text: Ye are the light of the world . A city that is set on an hill cannot be hid .
text2: ` átumka ju nunkanam shiripkia aintsanketrume . Náinniumka pepru úumkachminiaiti .

text: Neither do men light a candle , and put it under a bushel , but on a candlestick ; and it giveth light unto all that are in the house .
text2: Núnisan shiripik ekeemakam kajunnum enkeatsme . Antsu Yakí Sukúatsmek Ashí jeanam ana nu paant Atí tusam .

text: Let your light so shine before men , that they may see your good works , and glorify your Father which is in heaven .
text2: Núnisan atumsha Yusjai pénker Túramu paant Atí . Tura Ashí aents nuna iisar niisha Yus Apan shiir awajsartatui ' Tímiayi .

text: Think not that I am come to destroy the law , or the prophets : I am not come to destroy , but to fulfil .
text2: ` Muisais akupkamuncha tura yaunchu Yúsnan etserin etserkarmia nuna ántar awajsattawai " turutiirap . Antsu nuna Wikia umiktaj tusan Táwitjai .

text: For verily I say unto you , Till heaven and earth pass , one jot or one tittle shall in no wise pass from the law , till all be fulfilled .
text2: Nekasan Tájarme . Ashí Túrunatniua nu Amúatsain nu akupkamu ishichkisha Yapajniáshtatui . Nayaimpisha tura nunkasha tuke Amúatsain nu akupkamusha amuukashtatui .

text: Whosoever therefore shall break one of these least commandments , and shall teach men so , he shall be called the least in the kingdom of heaven : but whosoever shall do and teach them , the same shall be called great in the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Nu asamtai shuar chikichik akupkamun , Yúpichuch ana nunaksha , umirchakka tura Chíkich shuaran umirkashtinian unuiniakka Yus nekas akupin paant ajastatna nui Nú shuar uunt áchattawai . Antsu Ashí shuar akupkamun Umíana nu tura Chíkich shuaran umirkatniun unuiniana nusha Yus nekas akupin paant ajastatna nui , nu shuarka uunt átatui .

text: For I say unto you , That except your righteousness shall exceed the righteousness of the scribes and Pharisees , ye shall in no case enter into the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Tuma asamtai Yus akupeamunam pachiinkiataj Tákumka Pariséujai nankaamas tura akupkamu jintinniujai nankaamas eseera wekasatniuitrume ' Tímiayi .

text: Ye have heard that it was said by them of old time , Thou shalt not kill ; and whosoever shall kill shall be in danger of the judgment :
text2: ` Yaunchu tiniu armia nu ántichukaitrum : " Mankartuawairap . Mankartana nuka Asutniátniuiti " tiniu ármiayi .

text: But I say unto you , That whosoever is angry with his brother without a cause shall be in danger of the judgment : and whosoever shall say to his brother , Raca , shall be in danger of the council : but whosoever shall say , Thou fool , shall be in danger of hell fire .
text2: Tura Wisha Tájarme : Shuar ni yachin aya kajerakka nusha Asutniátniuiti . Ni yachin Kátsekea nuka akupniunam junaktiniaiti . Tura ni yachin " netsé " Tákunka jinium akupnakminiaiti . '

text: Therefore if thou bring thy gift to the altar , and there rememberest that thy brother hath ought against thee ;
text2: ` Tuma asamtai Yus susataj tusam wakerakum tura ame yatsum ámin itit Enentáimturman Enentáimpramka ,

text: Leave there thy gift before the altar , and go thy way ; first be reconciled to thy brother , and then come and offer thy gift .
text2: suamu nui ikiuakum emka ame yatsum werim niijiai iwiarata . Turam waketkim Yus suam nu susata . '

text: Agree with thine adversary quickly , whiles thou art in the way with him ; lest at any time the adversary deliver thee to the judge , and the judge deliver thee to the officer , and thou be cast into prison .
text2: ` Shuar uuntnum Júramkuinkia jintian wesam niijiai iwiarata uuntnum ejetamtsain . Túrachakminkia uuntnum surutmaktatui tura niisha suntarnum surutmaktatui tura sepunam enketmattawai .

text: Verily I say unto thee , Thou shalt by no means come out thence , till thou hast paid the uttermost farthing .
text2: Tura nekas tajai , nui enkemamka Ashí rearchisha akikmachkumka Jíinkishtatme ' Tímiayi .

text: Ye have heard that it was said by them of old time , Thou shalt not commit adultery :
text2: ` Yaunchu tiniu armia nu ántichukaitrum : " Tsanirmawaip . "

text: But I say unto you , That whosoever looketh on a woman to lust after her hath committed adultery with her already in his heart .
text2: Tura Wisha Tájarme : Shuar nuwan tsanirmataj tu iiska nuikia ni Enentáin tsanirmayi . '

text: And if thy right eye offend thee , pluck it out , and cast it from thee : for it is profitable for thee that one of thy members should perish , and not that thy whole body should be cast into hell .
text2: ` Tuma asamtai ame jiimi tunaanum yajauch awajtamkuinkia ukuinkiam Yajá ajapata . Ashí ame ayashim jinium esaatsain aya chikichik ayashmi muchitmari emesratin pénkeraiti .

text: And if thy right hand offend thee , cut if off , and cast it from thee : for it is profitable for thee that one of thy members should perish , and not that thy whole body should be cast into hell .
text2: Ame ewejmesha untsuurmetiat tunaanum ajunmakuinkia tsupikiam Yajá ajapata . Ashí ame ayashim jinium esaatsain aya chikichik ayashmi muchitmari emesratin pénkeraiti . '

text: It hath been said , Whosoever shall put away his wife , let him give her a writing of divorcement :
text2: ` Núnisan yaunchu tiniu ármiayi : " Shuar ni nuarin ajapatniun wakera nuka Papí najana susati . "

text: But I say unto you , That whosoever shall put away his wife , saving for the cause of fornication , causeth her to commit adultery : and whosoever shall marry her that is divorced committeth adultery .
text2: Tura Wisha Tájarme : Shuar ni nuarin tsanirmachun ájapeakka nuwan tsanirmamtikiaiti . Tura ajapamujai nuatnaiyakka nuka tsanirmaiti . '

text: Again , ye have heard that it hath been said by them of old time , Thou shalt not forswear thyself , but shalt perform unto the Lord thine oaths :
text2: ` Núnisan yaunchu tiniu ármiayi : " Yusa naari pachisan turattajai " Tákumka nekas takamtsuk umiktiniaitme . "

text: But let your communication be , Yea , yea ; Nay , nay : for whatsoever is more than these cometh of evil .
text2: Tura Wisha Tájarme : Ayatik " Ee " Tákumka tura " Atsá " Tákumka Wáitrutsuk nuke Titiá . Támena nu nekas umiktaj takum ame Nú arant pachistiniaitkiumka nuka yajauchiiti , iwianchnumiaiti . Ti nekas tajai tusam nayaim pachischatniuitme . Nuka Uunt Yus pujutainti . Nunkasha pachischatniuiti Yusa tarimtairi asamtai . Jerusaren péprusha pachischatniuiti Uunt Akupin pujutai nui asamtai . Múukmesha pachischatniuitme . Chikichik intiashkesha Pújusha mukusasha awajsachminiaitme . Ayatik nekasa nu Páchitsuk Titiá . '

text: Ye have heard that it hath been said , An eye for an eye , and a tooth for a tooth :
text2: ` Yaunchu tiniu armia nu ántichukaitrum : " Shuar Máanikiar jii apujtukka niisha apujtuktiniaiti . Tura nai akarkasha ni naisha akarkatniuiti . "

text: But I say unto you , That ye resist not evil : but whosoever shall smite thee on thy right cheek , turn to him the other also .
text2: Tura Wisha Tájarme : Yajauch shuar taritrairap . Antsu ame yapimin ijiutmamtai Aatú yapimsha tsankatkata .

text: And if any man will sue thee at the law , and take away thy coat , let him have thy cloke also .
text2: Tura pushirmin jurutramkitiaj Tákuisha sakurmesha susata .

text: And whosoever shall compel thee to go a mile , go with him twain .
text2: Tura Káarkancha chikichik kirumitruk jurutkitia Túramkui ámeka Jimiará kirumitru ejeeta .

text: Give to him that asketh thee , and from him that would borrow of thee turn not thou away .
text2: Seatmana nu susata . Ikiatmakuisha Páchitsuk ikiasta . '

text: Ye have heard that it hath been said , Thou shalt love thy neighbour , and hate thine enemy .
text2: ` Núnisan tiniu armia nu ántichukaitrum : " Ame shuarum aneeta tura nemasrumka kajerkata . "

text: But I say unto you , Love your enemies , bless them that curse you , do good to them that hate you , and pray for them which despitefully use you , and persecute you ;
text2: Tura Wisha Tájarme : Nemasrum aneetarum . Yajauch chichartamna nusha shiir awajsata . Nakitramana nusha nawamkata . Tura katsekramainiana nu tura yajauch awajtamainiana nusha Yus áujtusarta .

text: That ye may be the children of your Father which is in heaven : for he maketh his sun to rise on the evil and on the good , and sendeth rain on the just and on the unjust .
text2: Atumsha nu Túrakrum Atumí Apari nayaimpiniam pujana nu Túrana aitkiasrumek Túrarme . Iista , Yus yajauch shuarnumsha pénker shuarnumsha Tsáapin awajmatkiatsuk . Núnisan yumincha yajauch shuar pujuiniamunmasha pénker shuar pujuiniamunmasha Yútumtiktsuk .

text: For if ye love them which love you , what reward have ye ? do not even the publicans the same ?
text2: Aya atumin anenmainia nuke aneakmesha ṡyaki akirmakat ? Yajauch shuarsha nuna Túrin ainiawai .

text: And if ye salute your brethren only , what do ye more than others ? do not even the publicans so ?
text2: Aya ame yatsumek shiir chichaakmeka ṡWarí pénkerak Túram ? Yus - shuarchasha nuna Túrin ainiawai .

text: Be ye therefore perfect , even as your Father which is in heaven is perfect .
text2: Nu asamtai Atumí Aparí Yus nayaimpiniam pujana nujai métek ti pénker átiniaitrume . '

text: Take heed that ye do not your alms before men , to be seen of them : otherwise ye have no reward of your Father which is in heaven .
text2: ` Ashí iimiainiain aya shuar iirsarti tusarum Yusna nu takasairap . Tu takaakrumninkia Yus Apa nayaimpiniam pujana nu penké akirmakchattarme .

text: Therefore when thou doest thine alms , do not sound a trumpet before thee , as the hypocrites do in the synagogues and in the streets , that they may have glory of men . Verily I say unto you , They have their reward .
text2: Nu asamtai shuar atsuma nu yaiyakmeka Ashí shuar ujakairap . Anankartin ainia nuka iruntainmasha tura pepru Jintí wekasasha Ashí iimiainiain shiir Túrajai tusar nuna Túrin ainiawai . Junasha " pénker Túrawai " tu Enentáimturarti tiniu ásar Yus Akíatsain aya tu Enentáimturmajain akinkiaruiti , nekas tajai .

text: But when thou doest alms , let not thy left hand know what thy right hand doeth :
text2: Antsu átumka atsumainia nu yaiyakmeka penké úukam Túrata . Chikichkisha nu Yáinman nekaashti .

text: That thine alms may be in secret : and thy Father which seeth in secret himself shall reward thee openly .
text2: Uukam Túrakminkia ame Apa Yus uukman wainia nu , nuna akirmaktatui . '

text: And when thou prayest , thou shalt not be as the hypocrites are : for they love to pray standing in the synagogues and in the corners of the streets , that they may be seen of men . Verily I say unto you , They have their reward .
text2: ` Atumsha Yus áujeakrumsha ántar chichamtin ainia Núnis áujsairap . Nu shuarka iruntainmasha tura pepru Jintísha shuar iirsarti tusa wajakiar Yúsan áujin ainiawai . Nekasan Tájarme , Yus Akíatsain aya nu iismajain akinkiaruiti .

text: But thou , when thou prayest , enter into thy closet , and when thou hast shut thy door , pray to thy Father which is in secret ; and thy Father which seeth in secret shall reward thee openly .
text2: Tura ame Yus áujeakmeka ame Kuárturmin wayam waiti epenim nui amek ame Apa Yus áujsata . Nuna ame Apa Yus uuka Túramu waitma asa akirmaktatui . '

text: But when ye pray , use not vain repetitions , as the heathen do : for they think that they shall be heard for their much speaking .
text2: ` Yus áujeakmesha ántram esaram áujsaip . Yúsan nékainiatsna nuka " Esaram áujeakuinkia Yus anturtuktatui " tu Enentáimainiawai .

text: Be not ye therefore like unto them : for your Father knoweth what things ye have need of , before ye ask him .
text2: Niijiai métek ajasairap . Atumka seatsrumnin Yus Apa átum atsumamun nékawai .

text: After this manner therefore pray ye : Our Father which art in heaven , Hallowed be thy name .
text2: Nu asamtai Yus áujkuram Júnis Títiniaitrume : ` Aparu Yus , nayaimpiniam pujamna nu , ii Aparínme . Ame Náarmincha shuar ántar pachischarti .

text: Thy kingdom come . Thy will be done in earth , as it is in heaven .
text2: Ashí aentsnum ame akupkatin tsawantrum wari jeati . Ame wakeramuram nayaimpiniam umikma ana Núnisan ju nunkanmasha Uminkiatí .

text: Give us this day our daily bread .
text2: Aparu , ii yurumkari Ashí tsawant amasta .

text: And forgive us our debts , as we forgive our debtors .
text2: Tura winia nemasrun tsankurajna Núnismek , Aparu , winia tunaaru tumashrisha tsankurturta .

text: And lead us not into temptation , but deliver us from evil : For thine is the kingdom , and the power , and the glory , for ever . Amen .
text2: Tunáa wakeruktin tsankatrukaip . Antsu Ashí tunaanumia uwemtikrurta . Tuke Ashí aents akupkamniaitme . Núnisam Amesha tuke ti kakarmaitme . Tura ti Shíiraitme . Tuma asakmin seajme . Nuke Atí . '

text: For if ye forgive men their trespasses , your heavenly Father will also forgive you :
text2: ` Amesha Chíkich shuar yajauch awajtamka nu tsankureakminkia Yus Apa nayaimpiniam pujana nu amincha tsankurtamprattawai .

text: But if ye forgive not men their trespasses , neither will your Father forgive your trespasses .
text2: Tura Chíkich tsankureachkumninkia Yus Apasha ame tunaarmincha tsankurtamprashtatui . '

text: Moreover when ye fast , be not , as the hypocrites , of a sad countenance : for they disfigure their faces , that they may appear unto men to fast . Verily I say unto you , They have their reward .
text2: ` Ijiarmarum Yus áujkurmesha wake mesekrum susuntrairap . Anankartin shuar Chíkich shuar " ijiarmaiti " tu Enentáimtursarti tusa tuma ainiawai . Nekasan Tájame , Yúska Akíatsain aya nujai akikma ainiawai .

text: But thou , when thou fastest , anoint thine head , and wash thy face ;
text2: Antsu ámeka ijiarmamsha pénker temashmaram pénker jaupmitia .

text: That thou appear not unto men to fast , but unto thy Father which is in secret : and thy Father , which seeth in secret , shall reward thee openly .
text2: Shuar ijiarmaiti tu Enentáimturmasarain . Aya Yus Apak nekaattawai . Tura asa akirmaktatui . '

text: But lay up for yourselves treasures in heaven , where neither moth nor rust doth corrupt , and where thieves do not break through nor steal :
text2: ` Ju nunkanmaya kuit ikiaunkatniujai nankaamas nayaimpiniam kuit ikiaunkata . Juinkia kayaa Yúchakait tura mash meseatsuk . Tura kasasha Wayá kasamtsuk . Antsu nayaimpinmanka kayaasha yuatsui tura mash meseatsui tura kasasha Wayá kasamtsui .

text: For where your treasure is , there will your heart be also .
text2: Kuítrum ana nui Enentáimtustatme . Tuma asam nayaimpiniam ikiaunkata . '

text: The light of the body is the eye : if therefore thine eye be single , thy whole body shall be full of light .
text2: ` Ame Jímijiai Tsáapin amiin wayamniaiti . Tuma asamtai ame jiimi pénkeraitkiuinkia amiin Tsáapin Wayá tuke Tsáapniiti .

text: But if thine eye be evil , thy whole body shall be full of darkness . If therefore the light that is in thee be darkness , how great is that darkness !
text2: Antsu ame jiimi yajauchitkiuinkia Tsáapin amiin wayachmin asamtai tuke kiritin átatui . Núnisan yajauchia nu wakerakmeka pénkera nu ame Enentáimiin wayachmin asamtai tuke kirit ajastatui . Nu kiritcha Imiá yajauchiti . '

text: No man can serve two masters : for either he will hate the one , and love the other ; or else he will hold to the one , and despise the other . Ye cannot serve God and mammon .
text2: ` Shuar Jimiará uuntrin umirkatniun tujintiawai . Chikichan wakerak chikichnaka nakitrattawai . Chikichan umiruk chikichnaka umirkashtatui . Núnisan átumka Yussha kuitcha Máimtek Enentáimtustin tujinkiattarme . '

text: Therefore I say unto you , Take no thought for your life , what ye shall eat , or what ye shall drink ; nor yet for your body , what ye shall put on . Is not the life more than meat , and the body than raiment ?
text2: ` Tuma asamtai Tájarme : Wariniak yuataj wariniak umartaj tura wariniak entsartaj tusarum nuke Enentáimsairap . Yus iwiaaku átinian amasu asa yurumkancha amaschamniakait . Tura ju ayashniasha najana asa entsataincha amaschamniakait .

text: Behold the fowls of the air : for they sow not , neither do they reap , nor gather into barns ; yet your heavenly Father feedeth them . Are ye not much better than they ?
text2: Chinkisha Enentáimpratarum . Yakí nanamainiak yurumkan arakmainiatsui . Tura juuk yurumkan ikiuiniatsui . Tuma ain Yus Apa nayaimpiniam pujana Nú Yusak áyureatsuk . Atumsha chinkia Nú nankaamaschakaitrum .

text: Which of you by taking thought can add one cubit unto his stature ?
text2: Nu arantcha ti Enentáimkiumsha ṡnujai tsakartatmek ? '

text: And why take ye thought for raiment ? Consider the lilies of the field , how they grow ; they toil not , neither do they spin :
text2: ` Nuikia ṡurukamtai entsartincha Timiá Enentáimprum ? Iistá , kukujsha takachuitiat tura najanchaitiat

text: And yet I say unto you , That even Solomon in all his glory was not arrayed like one of these .
text2: ti Shíirmach ainiawai . Yaunchu uunt akupin Sarumún ti shiir iwiarmamniuitiat kukujia Tímianchauyayi .

text: Wherefore , if God so clothe the grass of the field , which to day is , and to morrow is cast into the oven , shall he not much more clothe you , O ye of little faith ?
text2: Iis , nupa Yamái tsakaawai tura kashin aents tsupikiar jinium epeenawai . Tuma ain Yus ti shiir aentseatsuk . Nuna tura asa atumniasha Nú pénker waitmakchattawak . ṡUrukamtai Yus nekas Enentáimtatsrum ?

text: ( For after all these things do the Gentiles seek : ) for your heavenly Father knoweth that ye have need of all these things .
text2: Ju nunkanam ana nu pachikiairap . Chíkich shuar , Yúsan nékainiatsna nu , warin yuattaj ~ i warin umartataj ~ i warin entsartataj ~ i nuna ti pachiiniawai . Tura atumsha tu Enentáimsarum weerap . Ame Apa nayaimpiniam pujana nu ame atsumamurmin nékawai .

text: But seek ye first the kingdom of God , and his righteousness ; and all these things shall be added unto you .
text2: Tuma asamtai Yusjai shiir wekasatin tura Yus akupkamu ana nu umiktin emka Enentáimsatarum . Túrakrumninkia atsumamurmin Yus suramsattawai .

text: Take therefore no thought for the morrow : for the morrow shall take thought for the things of itself . Sufficient unto the day is the evil thereof .
text2: Kashin átatna nujai itiurchat Enentáimsairap . Kashinkia Nusháa itiurchatrijiai tsawarchattawak . Yamái tsawanta jujai Máakchakait . '

text: Judge not , that ye be not judged .
text2: ` Chikicha tunaari ti Enentáimtusairap . Núnisan Yus Atumí tunaari iirtamsashtatui .

text: For with what judgment ye judge , ye shall be judged : and with what measure ye mete , it shall be measured to you again .
text2: Chíkich Wárik sumamtikiatin Enentáimkiumninkia Yus Núnisan sumamtikramattawai . Tura ame chikicha Túramuri nekapmarmena Nú nekapkajain amincha nekapmarmattawai .

text: And why beholdest thou the mote that is in thy brother ' s eye , but considerest not the beam that is in thine own eye ?
text2: Tuma asamtai ṡitiurtsuk atumi jiin numi enketna auk iitskesha atumi Yachí jiin tsuat enketusha iyarum ?

text: Or how wilt thou say to thy brother , Let me pull out the mote out of thine eye ; and , behold , a beam is in thine own eye ?
text2: Ame jiimiin numi tuke enketaisha ṡitiurtsuk ame yatsumi jiiya Tsuátan jurustajme tame ?

text: Thou hypocrite , first cast out the beam out of thine own eye ; and then shalt thou see clearly to cast out the mote out of thy brother ' s eye .
text2: Antar Shuará , ame Yáintaj Tákumka emka ame jiimiin numi enketna nu jusata . Nuyá paant iistatme yatsumi jiin tsuat enketna nu jurustin . '

text: Give not that which is holy unto the dogs , neither cast ye your pearls before swine , lest they trample them under their feet , and turn again and rend you .
text2: ` Ti shiira nuka Yawá Súsashtiniaiti . Nuna nakitrar amincha esatmichartimpiash . Kuítrumsha kuchi Súsashtiniaiti . Aya najatrachartatuak . '

text: Ask , and it shall be given you ; seek , and ye shall find ; knock , and it shall be opened unto you :
text2: ` Yus seakrumin suramsattawai . Eakrumka wainkiattarme . " Winiajai " Tákurmin awaintiamattarme .

text: For every one that asketh receiveth ; and he that seeketh findeth ; and to him that knocketh it shall be opened .
text2: Seana Núnaka Suíniawai . Eana nuka Wáiniui . " Winiajai " tuinia Núnaka awainiawai . '

text: Or what man is there of you , whom if his son ask bread , will he give him a stone ?
text2: ` Ame uchiram apatkun seatmakui ṡkayaash Súsaintiam ?

text: Or if he ask a fish , will he give him a serpent ?
text2: Tura namakan seatmakui ṡNapíash Súsaintiam ?

text: If ye then , being evil , know how to give good gifts unto your children , how much more shall your Father which is in heaven give good things to them that ask him ?
text2: Nuikia átum yajauchitirmesha atumi Uchirí pénker ana nu tuke Súuchakaitrum . Nuna nankaamas nuikia seakrumninkia atumi Aparí nayaimpiniam pujana nu pénker ana nuna suramsashtatuak . '

text: Therefore all things whatsoever ye would that men should do to you , do ye even so to them : for this is the law and the prophets .
text2: ` Júnaka Muisaissha Yúsnan etserniusha akupenawai : " Chíkich ámin Túrutatí tusa wakerakmeka amesha Núnismek Túratá . " Tu akupenawai . '

text: Because strait is the gate , and narrow is the way , which leadeth unto life , and few there be that find it .
text2: ` Wankaram jintia awai . Wayatniusha Yúpichuchiiti . Nuisha Untsurí Wáiniawai . Tura nusha menkakatniunam jeawai . Túrasha Chíkich jintia awai . Nusha yupikiach asa itiurchataiti . Wayatniurisha yupikchiiti . Nui ishichik Wáiniawai . Tura nusha iwiaaku pujustinnium jeawai . Tuma asamtai tuke iwiaaku pujustaj Tákurmeka yupipitin jintia achiktarum . '

text: Beware of false prophets , which come to you in sheep ' s clothing , but inwardly they are ravening wolves .
text2: ` Aneartarum . Wáitruiniak " Wi Yúsnan étserjai " tuinia nu írunui . Pátatek murikiua ainis Yúpichuch ainiawai tura ni Enentáin nekas uunt - yawa ainis ainiawai . Pátatek shiir chichainiawai tura ni Enentáin yajauch piakuiti .

text: Ye shall know them by their fruits . Do men gather grapes of thorns , or figs of thistles ?
text2: Atumsha Túramujai niin nekaatniuitrume . Naranmaya shuiya Júukchamniaiti . ṡTsachiksha kushinkiapen nerektatuak ?

text: Even so every good tree bringeth forth good fruit ; but a corrupt tree bringeth forth evil fruit .
text2: Núnisan pénker numia nu tuke pénkeran nereatsuk . Tura yajauch numia nu yajauchin nereatsuk .

text: A good tree cannot bring forth evil fruit , neither can a corrupt tree bring forth good fruit .
text2: Pénker numi yajauchin nereatsui . Núnisan yajauch numi pénkeran nereatsui .

text: Every tree that bringeth not forth good fruit is hewn down , and cast into the fire .
text2: Yajauch numi ajakar tsupirar jinium apeashtinkiait .

text: Wherefore by their fruits ye shall know them .
text2: Tuma asamtai Wáitrin ainia nuka Túramujai nekanattawai . '

text: Not every one that saith unto me , Lord , Lord , shall enter into the kingdom of heaven ; but he that doeth the will of my Father which is in heaven .
text2: ` Aya winia Apar nayaimpiniam pujana nuna wakeramurin umirin ainia nuke Yus akupeamunam pachiinkiartatui . Chíkichka " Uuntá , Uuntá " turutainiayat nayaimpiniam jeachartatui .

text: Many will say to me in that day , Lord , Lord , have we not prophesied in thy name ? and in thy name have cast out devils ? and in thy name done many wonderful works ?
text2: Amuukatin tsawant jeamtai Untsurí turutiartatui " Maaj , Uuntá , ame Náaram pachisar Ashí nunkanam etserkachmakaj ~ i . Ame Náarmesha pachisar yajauch wakancha jiiki akupkamji . Tura ame Náaram pachisar aentsti tujintiamu Túramji " turutiartatui .

text: And then will I profess unto them , I never knew you : depart from me , ye that work iniquity .
text2: Nui chichainiakui " Werumtarum . Penke nékachuitjiarme . Aya yajauchitrume " Títiatjai . '

text: Therefore whosoever heareth these sayings of mine , and doeth them , I will liken him unto a wise man , which built his house upon a rock :
text2: ` Shuar winia chichamprun antuk umirkanka nu shuar ti pénker Enentáimniuiti . Niisha ju shuarjai métekete . Jea jeamuk kayanam ukurmai .

text: And the rain descended , and the floods came , and the winds blew , and beat upon that house ; and it fell not : for it was founded upon a rock .
text2: Tura yumi ti yutuk entsa nujankruamai tura nase ti kakaram umpuimiai . Túmain pukukachmai ni ukurmari kayanam ukuamu asamtai .

text: And every one that heareth these sayings of mine , and doeth them not , shall be likened unto a foolish man , which built his house upon the sand :
text2: Tura shuar winia chichamprun antuk umirtukchanka ju shuara Núnisan Enentáimchaiti . Jea jeamuk Náikminiam ukurmai .

text: And the rain descended , and the floods came , and the winds blew , and beat upon that house ; and it fell : and great was the fall of it .
text2: Tura yumi yutuk entsa nujankruamai tura nase ti kakaram umpuimiai . Túmakui jea mash saanaki iniaamai " Tímiayi Jesus .

text: And it came to pass , when Jesus had ended these sayings , the people were astonished at his doctrine :
text2: Jesus nuna tinia amukmatai Ashí shuar ti Enentáimprarmiayi .

text: For he taught them as one having authority , and not as the scribes .
text2: " Yusa kakarmarijiai unuitiamtsujik . Israer - shuara jintinniurinkia Núnis unuiniainiatsui " tiarmiayi .

text: When he was come down from the mountain , great multitudes followed him .
text2: Jesus muraya Támatai Untsurí shuar Niin nemariarmiayi .

text: And , behold , there came a leper and worshipped him , saying , Lord , if thou wilt , thou canst make me clean .
text2: Nui shuar tunamaru Jesusan jearin tikishmatramiayi . Tura Tímiayi " Uuntá , wakerakmeka Tsuáramniaitme . "

text: And Jesus put forth his hand , and touched him , saying , I will ; be thou clean . And immediately his leprosy was cleansed .
text2: Tutai Jesus uwejéjai antin " Wakerajai . Pénker ajasta " Tímiayi . Tutai tunamaru ni tunamarmari pénker ajasmiayi .

text: And Jesus saith unto him , See thou tell no man ; but go thy way , shew thyself to the priest , and offer the gift that Moses commanded , for a testimony unto them .
text2: Tura Jesus Tímiayi " Pai , penké etserkaip . Ayatik Israer - patri iniakmamsam Muisais timia nu susata Ashí shuar nekaawarti tusam . "

text: And when Jesus was entered into Capernaum , there came unto him a centurion , beseeching him ,
text2: Jesus Kapernáum péprunam wayamtai apachi suntara Kapitiántri Niin tarimiayi .

text: And saying , Lord , my servant lieth at home sick of the palsy , grievously tormented .
text2: " Uuntá , Tímiayi . Winia uchir tampemaru Jeá tepes ti wait Ajáa tepawai " Tímiayi .

text: And Jesus saith unto him , I will come and heal him .
text2: Jesussha " Ayu , winin tsuartajai " Tímiayi .

text: The centurion answered and said , Lord , I am not worthy that thou shouldest come under my roof : but speak the word only , and my servant shall be healed .
text2: Tutai Kapitián Tímiayi " Uuntá , Ame ti nankaamaku asam winia Jearuí wayachminiaitme . Ayatik " Pénker Ajástí " Tákumin winia uchir pénker ajatrustatui .

text: For I am a man under authority , having soldiers under me : and I say to this man , Go , and he goeth ; and to another , Come , and he cometh ; and to my servant , Do this , and he doeth it .
text2: Iista , winiasha akuptuiniatsuk tura wisha suntaran akupenatsjak . Juna " Wetá " takui wéawai . Tura chikichnasha " Winitiá " tutai winiawai . Tura takartinian " Ju Túratá " tutai Umíawai . "

text: When Jesus heard it , he marvelled , and said to them that followed , Verily I say unto you , I have not found so great faith , no , not in Israel .
text2: Kapitián nuna tutai Jesus ti Enentáimiuk Niin nemarainian Tímiayi " Nekasan Tájarme , Israer - shuar Yúsan Tímiatrus Enentáimtin atsawai .

text: And I say unto you , That many shall come from the east and west , and shall sit down with Abraham , and Isaac , and Jacob , in the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Maa , yajaya Untsurí shuar Yus akupeana nui jeawar Apraámjaisha Isakjaisha Jakupjaisha iruntrar Yurumáwartatui .

text: But the children of the kingdom shall be cast out into outer darkness : there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Tura Israer - shuar Yúsnum jeamnia ainiayat aa kiritniunam ajapnawartatui . Nui ti uutin tura ti Wáitsatin átatui . "

text: And Jesus said unto the centurion , Go thy way ; and as thou hast believed , so be it done unto thee . And his servant was healed in the selfsame hour .
text2: Nuyá Jesus Kapitiánin chicharuk " Jeemiin waketkitia . Nekas Enentáimtusu asakmin uchiram pénker ajatramsattawai " Tímiayi . Túramtai ni Uchirí nu chichamtaik pénker ajatsamiayi .

text: And when Jesus was come into Peter ' s house , he saw his wife ' s mother laid , and sick of a fever .
text2: Jesus Pitru jeen we Pitru tsatsarin tsuemujai jaa tepan Wáinkiamiayi .

text: And he touched her hand , and the fever left her : and she arose , and ministered unto them .
text2: Tura ni uwején antinmatai tsuemun michatramiayi . Tura nuwa nantakin Ashí ajamsarmiayi .

text: When the even was come , they brought unto him many that were possessed with devils : and he cast out the spirits with his word , and healed all that were sick :
text2: Kashi ajasmatai yajauch wakantrukarun Jesusan itiariarmiayi . Tura nu yajauch wakanin Chikichík chichamjai chicharas jiiki akupiarmiayi . Ashí Jáiniancha Tsuárarmiayi .

text: That it might be fulfilled which was spoken by Esaias the prophet , saying , Himself took our infirmities , and bare our sicknesses .
text2: Yúsnan etserin Isayas " Ii pimpirmarincha ii sunkurincha jurutramkimiaji " yaunchu timia nu uminkiati tusa nu Túrunamiayi .

text: Now when Jesus saw great multitudes about him , he gave commandment to depart unto the other side .
text2: Shuar Untsurí Jesusan Káutkarmatai " Entsa amain katintai " Tímiayi .

text: And a certain scribe came , and said unto him , Master , I will follow thee whithersoever thou goest .
text2: Nui Israer - shuara jintinniuri Jesusan Tarí Tímiayi " Uuntá , Amin Páchitsuk nemarsatniun wakerajme . "

text: And Jesus saith unto him , The foxes have holes , and the birds of the air have nests ; but the Son of man hath not where to lay his head .
text2: Tutai Jesus Tímiayi " Kujanchmasha ni waarin takaktsuk . Chinkisha pasunken takaktsuk . Tura Wi Yúsnumiaitiatan tepestiniur atsawai . "

text: And another of his disciples said unto him , Lord , suffer me first to go and bury my father .
text2: Niin nemarniusha Tímiayi " Uunta , emka winia aparun iwiarsan ikiuuttajai . "

text: But Jesus said unto him , Follow me ; and let the dead bury their dead .
text2: Tura Jesus " Nemartusta , Tímiayi . Wakannium jaka ainia nu jakan iwiarsarti " Tímiayi .

text: And when he was entered into a ship , his disciples followed him .
text2: Nuyá Jesus ni unuiniamurijiai uunt kanunam Enkemámiayi .

text: And , behold , there arose a great tempest in the sea , insomuch that the ship was covered with the waves : but he was asleep .
text2: Nui nase ti kakaram umpuimtai antumian ti tamparintin ajasmiayi . Tura entsa kanunam Yaráná Piákmiayi . Tuma ain Jesus kanunam kanar tepemiayi .

text: And his disciples came to him , and awoke him , saying , Lord , save us : we perish .
text2: Nuyá ni unuiniamuri kurashim Jesusan ishintiarar tiarmiayi " Uuntá , wayaji . Kakaram ajachkumninkia jakattaji . "

text: And he saith unto them , Why are ye fearful , O ye of little faith ? Then he arose , and rebuked the winds and the sea ; and there was a great calm .
text2: Jesus Tímiayi " ṡUrukamtai Timiá ashamarum , Yus Enentáimtutskesha ? " Nuyá wajaki nasencha entsancha chicharkamiayi . Tutai mash miaaku ajasmiayi .

text: But the men marvelled , saying , What manner of man is this , that even the winds and the sea obey him !
text2: Nuna iisar ni unuiniamuri ti Enentáimsarmiayi . Tura tiarmiayi " Jusha ṡWarí aentsuit ? Nasesha entsasha Niin umirainiatsuk " tiarmiayi .

text: And when he was come to the other side into the country of the Gergesenes , there met him two possessed with devils , coming out of the tombs , exceeding fierce , so that no man might pass by that way .
text2: Nuyá Jesus Entsá amaini katin Jatara nunkanam jeamiayi . Nui Jimiará shuar yajauch wakantruku tuke iwiartainium Pujú Jesusan tariarmiayi . Mai yajauch wakantruku ásar ti kajen ármiayi . Tuma asamtai shuar nu jintianam nankaamachu ármiayi .

text: And , behold , they cried out , saying , What have we to do with thee , Jesus , thou Son of God ? art thou come hither to torment us before the time ?
text2: Niisha Jesusan Wáinkiar kakantar tiarmiayi " ṡWarí pujuram iijiai , Jesusá , Yusa Uchiría . Tsawant jeatsain iin amukratkataj tusamek taum ? " tiarmiayi .

text: And there was a good way off from them an herd of many swine feeding .
text2: Nui arant kuchi Untsurí shushunmak yujaarmiayi .

text: So the devils besought him , saying , If thou cast us out , suffer us to go away into the herd of swine .
text2: Yajauch wakancha Jesusan seainiak " Jiiki akupkartakmeka Kuchíniam wayatin tsankatkartukta " tiarmiayi .

text: And he said unto them , Go . And when they were come out , they went into the herd of swine : and , behold , the whole herd of swine ran violently down a steep place into the sea , and perished in the waters .
text2: Tutai Jesus " Pai , wetarum " Tímiayi . Yajauch wakancha shuara Enentáiya Jíinkiar kuchiniam Enkemáwarmiayi . Túramtai kuchi Wáurkiar arau utsanamiayi . Nuyá Entsá iniankar jakerarmiayi .

text: And they that kept them fled , and went their ways into the city , and told every thing , and what was befallen to the possessed of the devils .
text2: Kuchí Wáinniusha nuna ashamkar péprunam tseke wéarmiayi . Nui jeawar Ashí Túrunamun etserkarmiayi . Yajauch wakantrukun pénker ajasmancha etserkarmiayi .

text: And , behold , the whole city came out to meet Jesus : and when they saw him , they besought him that he would depart out of their coasts .
text2: Nuyá Ashí Nú peprunmaya shuar Jesusan inkiuntai tusar ashinkiarmiayi . Tura inkiunkar ni nunkeya waketkiti tusar seawarmiayi .

text: And he entered into a ship , and passed over , and came into his own city .
text2: Nuyá Jesus kanunam enkemar antumian amaini katinmiayi . Tura nui ni péprurin Kapernáumnum jeamiayi .

text: And , behold , they brought to him a man sick of the palsy , lying on a bed : and Jesus seeing their faith said unto the sick of the palsy ; Son , be of good cheer ; thy sins be forgiven thee .
text2: Nui jeamtai shuar emearu jaan patak yanakin ejeetiarmiayi . " Tsuártatui " nekas tu Enentáimtuinia ásarmatai Jesus jaan Tímiayi " Uchirú , kakaram ajasta . Ashí ame tunaarum tsankuramuiti . "

text: And , behold , certain of the scribes said within themselves , This man blasphemeth .
text2: Takui Israer - shuara jintinniuri yajauch Enentáimprar " Juka Yúsan ti yajauch chicharui " tiarmiayi .

text: And Jesus knowing their thoughts said , Wherefore think ye evil in your hearts ?
text2: Tu Enentáimainian Jesus Nekáa tiarmiayi " ṡUrukamtai Imiá yajauch Enentáimprum .

text: For whether is easier , to say , Thy sins be forgiven thee ; or to say , Arise , and walk ?
text2: Tua Imiá Yúpichuchit . Shuara tunaarin tsankuratin Yúpichuchikiait . Tura emearun " Nantakim wekasata " Títin Yúpichuchikiait ?

text: But that ye may know that the Son of man hath power on earth to forgive sins , ( then saith he to the sick of the palsy , ) Arise , take up thy bed , and go unto thine house .
text2: Wi Aents Ajasua Núchakaitiaj . Ju nunkanam Wi tunaan Asakátratniuitjai . Wátsek , nu nekaatarum tusan juna iniakmastatjai . " Nuna tinia emearun " Wajaktia , tepetairam jukim jeemiin Wetá " Tímiayi .

text: And he arose , and departed to his house .
text2: Tutai emearu Tsuámar nantaki ni jeen wémiayi .

text: But when the multitudes saw it , they marvelled , and glorified God , which had given such power unto men .
text2: Tura nuna Ashí aents Wáinkiar Yus kakarman Shuáran susa asamtai ashamkar Yúsan shiir Enentáimtusarmiayi .

text: And as Jesus passed forth from thence , he saw a man , named Matthew , sitting at the receipt of custom : and he saith unto him , Follow me . And he arose , and followed him .
text2: Nuyá Jesus wémiayi . Nui wesa Mateun kuit Júutainium pujan Wáiniak " Nemartusta " Tímiayi . Tutai Mateu nuna ikiuak Jesusan nemarmiayi .

text: And it came to pass , as Jesus sat at meat in the house , behold , many publicans and sinners came and sat down with him and his disciples .
text2: Nú ukunmasha Mateu jeen yurumuk pujai yajauch armia nu Israer - shuar Untsurí Káunkar Jesusa unuiniamurijiai irunar yurumiarmiayi .

text: And when the Pharisees saw it , they said unto his disciples , Why eateth your Master with publicans and sinners ?
text2: Pariséusha nuna iisar Jesusa unuiniamurin aniasarmiayi " ṡUrukamtia Atumí Uuntri kuitia achinjaisha tunaarinniujaisha irunar yuruma ? "

text: But when Jesus heard that , he said unto them , They that be whole need not a physician , but they that are sick .
text2: Tura Jesus nuna antuk Tímiayi " Pénker ainia nuka Tsuákratniun atsumainiatsui . Antsu jainia nu Tsuákratniun atsumainiawai .

text: But go ye and learn what that meaneth , I will have mercy , and not sacrifice : for I am not come to call the righteous , but sinners to repentance .
text2: Werum ju aarma unuimiutarum : " Murik maam Winia surusum nujai " Máakete " Tátsujai . Antsu waitnenkartutain wakerajai , " Yus - Papinium tu aarmaiti . Wikia " pénkeraitjai " Tuínian untsuktaj tusan Táchaitjai . Antsu Tunáa shuar ni Enentáin Yapajiáwarat tusan Táwitjai " Tímiayi .

text: Then came to him the disciples of John , saying , Why do we and the Pharisees fast oft , but thy disciples fast not ?
text2: Nuyá imiakratin Juanka unuiniamuri Jesusan tariar aniasarmiayi . " ṡUrukamtai iikia tura Pariséusha ijiarmaj ~ i tura ame unuiniamurmeka ijiarmainiatsu ? " tiarmiayi .

text: And Jesus said unto them , Can the children of the bridechamber mourn , as long as the bridegroom is with them ? but the days will come , when the bridegroom shall be taken from them , and then shall they fast .
text2: Jesus ayak Tímiayi " Nuatma nampernum ipiaamu ainia nu ṡajakra uutu wayamniakait ? Yamái - nuatu pujakui uutchamin ainiawai . Núnisan Wi pujakui ijiarmashtin ainiawai . Tura tsawant jeattawai nuatua aintsan Wi junaktatjai . Antsu nuikia ijiarmawartatui ' Tímiayi .

text: No man putteth a piece of new cloth unto an old garment , for that which is put in to fill it up taketh from the garment , and the rent is made worse .
text2: ` Mamuru Pushí jaanakmatai yamaram tarach anujtukchatniuiti . Túramka nijiam yamaram tarach sumpeak mamushan Chinkiá nuna nankaamas jaaktatui .

text: Neither do men put new wine into old bottles : else the bottles break , and the wine runneth out , and the bottles perish : but they put new wine into new bottles , and both are preserved .
text2: Nijiamanch Yamái nawar nuap najanamu arutnum yaraachminiaiti . Túramka Karíak nuap najanamun ijiakratniuiti , nijiamchisha ukaratniuiti , tura nuap najanamusha yajauch ajastiniaiti . Antsu yamaram nijiamanch yamaram nuap najanamunam yaraatniuiti . Nu Túramka nijiamchisha nuap najanamusha mai pénker ártatui . "

text: While he spake these things unto them , behold , there came a certain ruler , and worshipped him , saying , My daughter is even now dead : but come and lay thy hand upon her , and she shall live .
text2: Jesus nuna tai Israer - shuara uuntri Jesusan Tarí tikishmatar Tímiayi " Winia nawantur jarutkayi , tura Ame winim ewejmijiai antintrukakminkia ataksha nantaktiatui . "

text: And Jesus arose , and followed him , and so did his disciples .
text2: Tutai Jesus ni unuiniamurijiai wajakiar niijiai wearmiayi .

text: And , behold , a woman , which was diseased with an issue of blood twelve years , came behind him , and touched the hem of his garment :
text2: Tura Jintiá weenai nuwa tuse ( 12 ) uwitin Numpá ájapeak Wáitias Pujú asa Jesusa ukurini amainian ni pushirin antinmiayi .

text: For she said within herself , If I may but touch his garment , I shall be whole .
text2: " Ayatik ni pushirin antinnaka pénker ajastatjai " tu enentaimpramiayi .

text: But Jesus turned him about , and when he saw her , he said , Daughter , be of good comfort ; thy faith hath made thee whole . And the woman was made whole from that hour .
text2: Nuna Nekáa Jesus ayantar nuwan Tímiayi " Shiir Enentáimprata , nawantru . Yus shiir Enentáimtusu asam pénker ajasume . " Nu chichamtaik ni Jáamuri pénker ajasmiayi .

text: And when Jesus came into the ruler ' s house , and saw the minstrels and the people making a noise ,
text2: Nuyá Jesus uunta jeen jeamiayi . Tura nui charaatum ajainiancha tura jakan iwiarsatai tusar péeman umpuiniancha Wáiniak

text: He said unto them , Give place : for the maid is not dead , but sleepeth . And they laughed him to scorn .
text2: Tímiayi " Aa Jíintratarum . Nuwachikia Jákachai antsu aya kanarai . " Penké jakan nékayat Túratta nuna neka asa " aya kanarai " Tímiayi . Takui aents Niin wishikrarmiayi .

text: But when the people were put forth , he went in , and took her by the hand , and the maid arose .
text2: Tura nuna Ashí jiir Jesus Jeá Wayá nuwachin uwejnum achik iniantkimiayi . Túram nantakmiayi .

text: And the fame hereof went abroad into all that land .
text2: Nu Túramu Ashí nu nunkanam etsernarmiayi .

text: And when Jesus departed thence , two blind men followed him , crying , and saying , Thou Son of David , have mercy on us .
text2: Nuyá Jesus wéakui Jimiará shuar jii kusuru untsumki weriarmiayi . " Uuntá , ii Uuntri Tawit ame weatrum asamtai iin waitnenkarturta " tiarmiayi .

text: And when he was come into the house , the blind men came to him : and Jesus saith unto them , Believe ye that I am able to do this ? They said unto him , Yea , Lord .
text2: Jesus Jeá wayamtai jii kusuru tariarmiayi . Tura Jesus aniasar " ṡJuna Túramniaiti Túrutrumek ? " Tímiayi . Niisha " Ee , Uunta " tiarmiayi .

text: Then touched he their eyes , saying , According to your faith be it unto you .
text2: Tuíniakui Jesus ni jiin antinkiar Tímiayi " Atum nekas Enentáimtarmena Núnisan Túrunati . "

text: And their eyes were opened ; and Jesus straitly charged them , saying , See that no man know it .
text2: Nujai jii pénker ajasarmiayi . Nuyá Jesus " Etserkairap . Shuar penké Nekáwarain " Tímiayi .

text: But they , when they were departed , spread abroad his fame in all that country .
text2: Támaitiat Jíinkiar Jesus Túramun Ashí nu nunkanam etserkarmiayi .

text: As they went out , behold , they brought to him a dumb man possessed with a devil .
text2: Nuyá wenai shuar yajauch wakantruku chichachun Jesusan itiariarmiayi .

text: And when the devil was cast out , the dumb spake : and the multitudes marvelled , saying , It was never so seen in Israel .
text2: Tura Jesus yajauch wakanin jiiki awemamtai nu chichachu chichakmiayi . Ashí nuna iisar ti Enentáimprarmiayi . Tura tiarmiayi " Yáunchusha Israer nunkanam jujai métek Túramu penké atsuwiti . "

text: But the Pharisees said , He casteth out devils through the prince of the devils .
text2: Antsu Pariséuka yajauch Enentáimtuiniak tiarmiayi " Nu shuar iwianchi uuntri kakarmarijiai yajauch wakanin jiiki akupeawai . "

text: And Jesus went about all the cities and villages , teaching in their synagogues , and preaching the gospel of the kingdom , and healing every sickness and every disease among the people .
text2: Jesus Ashí péprunam we ni iruntairin Wayá " Yus akupeana nui Enkemátarum " tu etsermiayi . Tura Ashí Nánkamas sunkurjai Jáiniancha Tsuármiayi .

text: But when he saw the multitudes , he was moved with compassion on them , because they fainted , and were scattered abroad , as sheep having no shepherd .
text2: Shuaran iisar murik Wáinchatia Núnis pimpikiar tura Kúntuts pujuinia asamtai waitnentrarmiayi .

text: Pray ye therefore the Lord of the harvest , that he will send forth labourers into his harvest .
text2: Nuyá ni unuiniamurin Tímiayi " Ju aents Yus - Chicham ujaktiniaitji Yus - shuar ajasarat tusar . Nu takat ti Núkap awai tura takarin ishichik ainiawai . Nu takatka Júuktinia aintsankete . Júuktin tsawant jeamtai takau Táasmatai takamtikin ujaktin átsuk takaun akupkat tusa . Atumsha Núnisrumek Yus seatarum ni shuarin akupak aentsun Júukarat tusarum . "

text: And when he had called unto him his twelve disciples , he gave them power against unclean spirits , to cast them out , and to heal all manner of sickness and all manner of disease .
text2: Nuyá Jesus tuse ( 12 ) unuiniamurin achik Yusa kakarmarin Súsarmiayi yajauch wakanin shuara Enentáiya jiiki akupkatniun . Núnisan Ashí sunkurjai Jáinian Tsuárartinian susamiayi .

text: Now the names of the twelve apostles are these ; The first , Simon , who is called Peter , and Andrew his brother ; James the son of Zebedee , and John his brother ;
text2: Ju ainiawai Jesus tuse ( 12 ) unuiniamurin achikiarmia nu : Emka Semun Núnisan Pitru Náartiniuyayi . Nuyá ni yachi Antres . Nuyá Nuámtak Yáchintin Jakupusha Juansha , Sepetéu Uchirí armia nu .

text: Philip , and Bartholomew ; Thomas , and Matthew the publican ; James the son of Alphaeus , and Lebbaeus , whose surname was Thaddaeus ;
text2: Nuyá Jiripi , Parturumí , Tumas , Mateu . Mateusha Kuítian achiniuyayi . Arpeu Uchirí Jakupusha . Ripíu Núnisan Tateu Náartiniuyayi .

text: Simon the Canaanite , and Judas Iscariot , who also betrayed him .
text2: Asump ~ i Semunsha Nuyá Jútas Iskariúti Jesusan ukunam surukmia nu . Nu tuse ( 12 ) achikma ármiayi .

text: These twelve Jesus sent forth , and commanded them , saying , Go not into the way of the Gentiles , and into any city of the Samaritans enter ye not :
text2: Nu tuse ( 12 ) unuiniamurin Jesus Júnis chicharak akupkarmiayi . " Israer - shuarcha matsatmanum weerap . Samaria nunkanam péprunam weerap .

text: But go rather to the lost sheep of the house of Israel .
text2: Antsu Israer - shuar murikiua ainis Yusaiya Wáakaru ainia nu weritiarum .

text: And as ye go , preach , saying , The kingdom of heaven is at hand .
text2: " Tsawant ishichik ajasai Yus Jú nunkanam akupin ajastin " tu etserki wetarum .

text: Heal the sick , cleanse the lepers , raise the dead , cast out devils : freely ye have received , freely give .
text2: Tunamarusha Chíkich sunkurjai jainia nusha tsuartarum . Jakasha iniantkitiarum . Yajauch wakancha shuara Enentáiya jiiki awematarum . Nu Túratin Kuítchajai kakaram susamuitrume , tuma asamtai atumsha Ashí ántrarmek Túratarum . '

text: Provide neither gold , nor silver , nor brass in your purses ,
text2: ` Kurisha Ashí kuitcha jukiirap .

text: Nor scrip for your journey , neither two coats , neither shoes , nor yet staves : for the workman is worthy of his meat .
text2: Uyuncha jukiirap . Sapatcha tura ushukrustincha jukiirap . Antsu chikichik Pushí jukitiarum . Takau asakrumin yurumkan ajampramsartin ainiawai . '

text: And into whatsoever city or town ye shall enter , inquire who in it is worthy ; and there abide till ye go thence .
text2: ` Péprunam jearmesha pénker shuar Wáinkiarum nui wayarum tuke nuin pujustarum .

text: And when ye come into an house , salute it .
text2: Nu jeanam wayamsha " Ju jea shiir Atí " Titiá .

text: And if the house be worthy , let your peace come upon it : but if it be not worthy , let your peace return to you .
text2: Nekas pénker shuaraitkiunka shiir ajasarti . Antsu nu shuar pénker itiarmachkunka shiir ajascharti .

text: And whosoever shall not receive you , nor hear your words , when ye depart out of that house or city , shake off the dust of your feet .
text2: Tura Nánkamsan atumin awaintiamainiachkuinkia anturtamainiachkuinkia Nuyá Jíinkitiarum . Nu shuar yajauch ásarmatai Jíinkirum Atumí naweya nunka japimiarum ikiuktiarum . Ni tunaari aents nekaawarat tusarum Túratarum .

text: Verily I say unto you , It shall be more tolerable for the land of Sodom and Gomorrha in the day of judgment , than for that city .
text2: Nu shuaran nekapsatin tsawant jeamtai Yus Asutiáshtatuak . Sutum péprunmaya shuara nankaamas Kumura péprunmaya shuarnasha nankaamas Yus Asutiáttawai nu shuaran ' Tímiayi .

text: Behold , I send you forth as sheep in the midst of wolves : be ye therefore wise as serpents , and harmless as doves .
text2: ` Aneartarum . Wisha murik yawanum akupkatniua aintsanak akupeajrume . Tuma asamtai shiir nawamkartin áyatrum aneartarum .

text: But beware of men : for they will deliver you up to the councils , and they will scourge you in their synagogues ;
text2: Yajauch shuarjai aneartarum . Akupniunam juramkiartatui . Israer - shuar iruntainiam asutiamawartatui .

text: And ye shall be brought before governors and kings for my sake , for a testimony against them and the Gentiles .
text2: Wíi shuar asakrumin uuntnumsha tura Nuyá akupniunmasha juramkiartatui . Núnisrum akupniuncha tura Israer - shuarchancha winia chichamur ujaktatrume .

text: But when they deliver you up , take no thought how or what ye shall speak : for it shall be given you in that same hour what ye shall speak .
text2: Tura akupniunam surutmakakrumnisha wariniak Títiaj tu Enentáimprairap . Nui uuntjai chichaakrumin Yus Títinian jintintramattarme .

text: For it is not ye that speak , but the Spirit of your Father which speaketh in you .
text2: Nuinkia átum Enentáimmiajai chichaschattarme antsu Atumí Apari Yusa Wakaní atumin chichamtikramsattarme . '

text: And the brother shall deliver up the brother to death , and the father the child : and the children shall rise up against their parents , and cause them to be put to death .
text2: ` Shuar ni yachincha Máawarti tusa suruktatui . Apasha ni Uchirín surukartatui . Uchisha ni Aparín Máawarti tusa surukartatui .

text: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name ' s sake : but he that endureth to the end shall be saved .
text2: Tura Wíi shuar asakrumin mash Muíjramkartatui . Tura tuke katsuntea nu uwemprattawai .

text: But when they persecute you in this city , flee ye into another : for verily I say unto you , Ye shall not have gone over the cities of Israel , till the Son of man be come .
text2: Chikichik péprunam yajauch awajtamainiakui Chíkich péprunam pisartarum . Wi Aents Ajasuitjai . Tuma asan nekasan Tájarme , átum Israer - shuar mashi ujatsrumnin wantinkiattajai . '

text: The disciple is not above his master , nor the servant above his lord .
text2: ` Unuiniamuka niin unuiniana nuna nankaamaschaiti . Takarniusha ni uuntri nankaamaschaiti .

text: It is enough for the disciple that he be as his master , and the servant as his lord . If they have called the master of the house Beelzebub , how much more shall they call them of his household ?
text2: Unuiniamuka niin unuinia nujai métek ajaska maak . Takarniusha ni uuntrijiai métek ajaska maak . Wátsek , Winia Atumí uuntrin " Iwianchi uuntri " Túrutainiakui atumniasha nuna nankaamas yajauch turamtatui . '

text: Fear them not therefore : for there is nothing covered , that shall not be revealed ; and hid , that shall not be known .
text2: ` Tuma asamtai aentska ashamkairap . Ashí uukma nu paant nekanattawai .

text: What I tell you in darkness , that speak ye in light : and what ye hear in the ear , that preach ye upon the housetops .
text2: Ishishmasan kiritniunam ujaajrumna nu , Tsawái kakantrarum etserkatarum .

text: And fear not them which kill the body , but are not able to kill the soul : but rather fear him which is able to destroy both soul and body in hell .
text2: Aya ayashin main ainia nu ashamkairap . Wakanin Máachmin ainiawai . Antsu wakanniasha ayashniasha mai jinium emesramnia asamtai Yus ashamkatarum . '

text: Are not two sparrows sold for a farthing ? and one of them shall not fall on the ground without your Father .
text2: ` Jimiará chinki penké ishichik kuitjai surukmin ainiawai . Túmaitiat Yus tsankateachkuinkia Nunká jaka iniainiatsui .

text: But the very hairs of your head are all numbered .
text2: Ame intiashmisha mash nekapmarmaiti .

text: Fear ye not therefore , ye are of more value than many sparrows .
text2: Nu asamtai Jákatin ashamkairap . Yusjai átumka ti Untsurí chinkijiai nankaamas pénkerchakaitrum . '

text: Whosoever therefore shall confess me before men , him will I confess also before my Father which is in heaven .
text2: ` Ashí shuar Ashí iimiainiain Winia natsantruiniatsna Núnaka Winia Apar Yakí nayaimpiniam pujana nui natsantrashtatjai .

text: But whosoever shall deny me before men , him will I also deny before my Father which is in heaven .
text2: Antsu shuar iimiainiain Winia natsantra Núnaka Wisha Yakí nayaimpiniam winia Apar pujana nui natsantrattajai . '

text: Think not that I am come to send peace on earth : I came not to send peace , but a sword .
text2: ` Ashí shuar nawamnaikiar shiir pujusarat tusan ju nunkanam Táchaitjai . Nuna Túrat tusarum Enentáimturairap . Antsu wi tamaajai shuar pénker ajasarmatai yajauch shuar niin nakitrartatui .

text: For I am come to set a man at variance against his father , and the daughter against her mother , and the daughter in law against her mother in law .
text2: Shuar ni Aparín nakitrattawai . Nuwasha Nukurín nakitrattawai . Najatísha Tsatsarín nakitrattawai .

text: And a man ' s foes shall be they of his own household .
text2: Tuma asa shuar ni shuarijiai nemasrintin ártatui . '

text: He that loveth father or mother more than me is not worthy of me : and he that loveth son or daughter more than me is not worthy of me .
