text2: ` Shuar ni Aparíncha Nukuríncha Wijiai nankaamas aneakka Wíi shuar áchamniaiti . Núnisan ni Uchiríncha nawantrincha nankaamas aneakka Wíi shuar áchamniaiti .

text: And he that taketh not his cross , and followeth after me , is not worthy of me .
text2: Tura Ashí Wáitsatniun surimiatsuk ni Krúsrin yanaki Jukí nemartachkunka Wíi shuar áchamniaiti .

text: He that findeth his life shall lose it : and he that loseth his life for my sake shall find it .
text2: Aya Jú nunkanam pénker pujustaj tana nu ni iwiaakmarin emesrattawai . Tura Winia anentu asa ju nunkanam pénker pujustinian Páchiatsna nu tuke shiir pujustatui . '

text: He that receiveth you receiveth me , and he that receiveth me receiveth him that sent me .
text2: ` Atumin itiaarma nuka Winia itiaarui . Tura itiaarea nuka Winia akuptukmia nunasha itiaawai .

text: He that receiveth a prophet in the name of a prophet shall receive a prophet ' s reward ; and he that receiveth a righteous man in the name of a righteous man shall receive a righteous man ' s reward .
text2: Yúsnan etserniuncha Yúsnumia Winiá asamtai itiaakka etserin Akínkiáttana nujai métek Akínkiáttawai . Pénker Shuárnasha pénker asamtai itiaakka pénker shuar Akínkiáttana nujai métek Akínkiáttawai niisha .

text: And whosoever shall give to drink unto one of these little ones a cup of cold water only in the name of a disciple , verily I say unto you , he shall in no wise lose his reward .
text2: Uchincha Wíi shuar asamtai Entsá michan shikirak Súsanka Imiá nekas nusha Akínkiáttawai . " Tu Tímiayi Jesus .

text: And it came to pass , when Jesus had made an end of commanding his twelve disciples , he departed thence to teach and to preach in their cities .
text2: Tura tuse ( 12 ) unuiniamurin Jesus tinia akupkar Niisha Nú nunka péprunam we Yus - Chichaman Jintíak etserkamiayi .

text: Now when John had heard in the prison the works of Christ , he sent two of his disciples ,
text2: Tura Juan sepunam enkemas Kristu Túramun antukmiayi . Antuk ni unuiniamurin Jímiaran Jesusai akupkamiayi .

text: And said unto him , Art thou he that should come , or do we look for another ?
text2: Tura Jesusan aniasarmiayi " ṡNekas ame Kristu Yus akupkamu Tátinia nukaitiam . Kame chikichak Nákastataj ~ i ? "

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Go and shew John again those things which ye do hear and see :
text2: Tutai Jesus Tímiayi " Waketkirum Ashí ántarmena nusha Wáintrumna nusha Juan ujaktarum .

text: The blind receive their sight , and the lame walk , the lepers are cleansed , and the deaf hear , the dead are raised up , and the poor have the gospel preached to them .
text2: Kusurusha Wáinmainiawai . Shutuapsha wekainiawai . Tunamarusha pénker ajainiawai . Empekarusha ántuiniawai . Jákarusha nantainiawai . Tura Kuítrinchanmasha uwempratin chicham ujakmaiti . Nu ujaktarum .

text: And blessed is he , whosoever shall not be offended in me .
text2: Túrasha yawetsuk Winia tuke shiir Enentáimturna Nú shuar shiir átatui . " Jesus nuna tutai waketkiarmiayi .

text: And as they departed , Jesus began to say unto the multitudes concerning John , What went ye out into the wilderness to see ? A reed shaken with the wind ?
text2: Waketkiarmatai shuar Káunkarun Jesus Juánkan pachis áujmatmiayi . " Shuar atsamunmasha ṡWarí werimiarum ? Pintiu nase Umpúam Atúu we Juní we ajana nuka ṡiistai tusarumek wémarum ? Kame Juankka Nú shuarchaiti .

text: But what went ye out for to see ? A man clothed in soft raiment ? behold , they that wear soft clothing are in kings ' houses .
text2: Nuikia ṡWarí werimiarum . Shuar pénker iwiarmampra iistai tusarmek wémarum ? Warí , pénker iwiarmampraka uunta jeen pujuiniatsuk .

text: But what went ye out for to see ? A prophet ? yea , I say unto you , and more than a prophet .
text2: Nuikia ṡWarí werimiarum . Yúsnan etserniuk werimiarum ? Maa , Túrachmashiuram . Túrasha Juankka yaunchu etserniu nankaamas Enentáimtustiniaiti .

text: For this is he , of whom it is written , Behold , I send my messenger before thy face , which shall prepare thy way before thee .
text2: Yaunchu Yus - Papinium aarmaiti : " Winia akatramurun amiini emka akupeajai ame jintimin iwiarat tusa . " Juan nu akatramuiti .

text: Verily I say unto you , Among them that are born of women there hath not risen a greater than John the Baptist : notwithstanding he that is least in the kingdom of heaven is greater than he .
text2: Nekasan Tájarme , shuar imiakratin Juanjai nankaamas uunt atsuwiti . Tuma ain Yus akupeamunam pachiinia nu shuarnaka , nekasmianchancha , Juanjai nankaamas shiir Enentáimtustiniaiti . Tuma asamtai nui pachiinkiatin Enentáimpratarum . '

text: And from the days of John the Baptist until now the kingdom of heaven suffereth violence , and the violent take it by force .
text2: ` Kakaram shuarka imiakratin Juan Támia Nú tsawantnumia Yus akupeamunam ti pachiinkiatniun wakeruiniak kakarmajai pachiinkiatniun Enentáimiainiawai .

text: For all the prophets and the law prophesied until John .
text2: Juan pujumia Nú yaunchu Ashí Yúsnan etserin armia nusha tura Muisais akupkamusha Yus akupin ajastinian etserkarmiayi .

text: And if ye will receive it , this is Elias , which was for to come .
text2: Yaunchu Yúsnan etserin " Kristu Táatsain Erías Tátiniaiti " Tímiayi . Tura nekaatin wakerakrumka Juan nu Eríasaiti .

text: He that hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Antuktin jeakrumka nekaatarum . '

text: But whereunto shall I liken this generation ? It is like unto children sitting in the markets , and calling unto their fellows ,
text2: ` Ju aentsnasha ṡwarijiai métek nakumkataj ? Uchijiai métek ainiawai . Ni aijiai iruntrar nakurustaj Táyatan Tuíniawai

text: And saying , We have piped unto you , and ye have not danced ; we have mourned unto you , and ye have not lamented .
text2: " Námpera ainis nakurustaitsar peem umpuarji Túrasha Jantsemáchurme . Nuyá iwiarsatniua ainis nakurustaitsar íwiareakur kantamtai Kantamáji Túrasha átum uutcharme . "

text: For John came neither eating nor drinking , and they say , He hath a devil .
text2: Atumsha Núnisaitrume . Kame Juan Núkap yurumtsuk nijiamchincha úmutsuk wekaimiayi . Túmakui átumka " Yajauch wakantrukuiti " Tímiarme .

text: The Son of man came eating and drinking , and they say , Behold a man gluttonous , and a winebibber , a friend of publicans and sinners . But wisdom is justified of her children .
text2: Nuyá Wisha Aents Ajasu Támajai . Tura yurumeakui tura úmakui " Ti yurumin ti nampenaiti . Ashí yajauch shuaran amikrinti " Túrutrume . Wátsek , wi Túramujai Yus nekas nékamu nekanattawai . "

text: Then began he to upbraid the cities wherein most of his mighty works were done , because they repented not :
text2: Nuyá tujintiamun Túramiania Nú peprunmaya shuaran pachis Jesus chicharkamiayi . Tuma ain Nuyá shuar ni Enentáin Yapajiácharu asamtai juna chicharkamiayi .

text: Woe unto thee , Chorazin ! woe unto thee , Bethsaida ! for if the mighty works , which were done in you , had been done in Tyre and Sidon , they would have repented long ago in sackcloth and ashes .
text2: " Wáinkiatá , Kurasín péprunmayatiram , Petsaitia péprunmayatirmesha . Nui aents tujintiamun ti Túraitjai . Tiru péprunmasha Setun péprunmasha nu tujintiamu Túramuitkiuinkia yaunchu ni Enentáin Yapajiáwaraayi . Túrawar Kúntuts pujutai Pushín entsarar yunkunim ajakiaraayi .

text: But I say unto you , It shall be more tolerable for Tyre and Sidon at the day of judgment , than for you .
text2: Tura Wisha Tájarme , nekapsatin tsawant jeamtai Yus atumin Tí asuttiamattarme . Tirunmaya shuaran nankaamas tura Setunnumia shuaran nankaamas asuttiamattarme . '

text: And thou , Capernaum , which art exalted unto heaven , shalt be brought down to hell : for if the mighty works , which have been done in thee , had been done in Sodom , it would have remained until this day .
text2: ` Tura atumsha Kapernáum péprunmayatirmesha , Ashí nankaamas nankaamantu ajastin Enentáimtumarme . Antsu Ashí emestamprartatui . Atumiin aents tujintiamun ti Túraitjai . Sutuma péprunam nu tujintiamu Túramuitkiuinkia nu pepru yamaisha tuke aayi .

text: But I say unto you , That it shall be more tolerable for the land of Sodom in the day of judgment , than for thee .
text2: Tura Wisha Tájarme , nekapsatin tsawant jeamtai Yus Sutumanmaya shuar nankaamas atumin asuttiamattarme . "

text: At that time Jesus answered and said , I thank thee , O Father , Lord of heaven and earth , because thou hast hid these things from the wise and prudent , and hast revealed them unto babes .
text2: Nuyá Jesus Tímiayi " Shiir Enentáimtajme , Aparu , Ashí nayaimpisha nunkasha uuntrinme . Tuma asam Ame Túram nu ti unuimiaru Enentáimtumainia Nuyá úukuitme antsu uchichia ainis nankaamantu Enentáimtumainiatsna Nú shuar paant awajtusuitme .

text: Even so , Father : for so it seemed good in thy sight .
text2: Ame , Aparu , Núnis wakera asam Túraitme . '

text: All things are delivered unto me of my Father : and no man knoweth the Son , but the Father ; neither knoweth any man the Father , save the Son , and he to whomsoever the Son will reveal him .
text2: ` Winia Apar Ashí surusuiti . Wisha ni Uchirí asamtai Winia nékarui . Tura Chíkich Winia nekas nekarainiatsui . Yus Apancha Wiki nékajai . Tura Wi wakeraj Nú shuaran winia Aparun paant awajtajai . Nu shuarsha winia Aparun nékainiawai .

text: Come unto me , all ye that labour and are heavy laden , and I will give you rest .
text2: Ashí pimpikniutirmesha itiurchat pujarmena nusha Winí winitiarum . Túrakrumninkia ayamtikrattajrume .

text: Take my yoke upon you , and learn of me ; for I am meek and lowly in heart : and ye shall find rest unto your souls .
text2: Wi kajechu asan tura péejchach Enentáimin asamtai Winí winirum unuimiartarum . Winia chichamur ántakrum Umíakrumninka Atumí Wakaní ayamprattawai .

text: For my yoke is easy , and my burden is light .
text2: Atumin akuptaj Nú Túratin Yúpichuchiiti . Káarkasha Wi Súajrumna nu wampuchiiti " Tímiayi Jesus .

text: At that time Jesus went on the sabbath day through the corn ; and his disciples were an hungred , and began to pluck the ears of corn , and to eat .
text2: Nuyá Jesus ayampratin tsawantai ajanman ajapenin nankaamamiayi . Ni unuiniamurisha tsukarar trikiu neren majusar Yukí wekasarmiayi .

text: But when the Pharisees saw it , they said unto him , Behold , thy disciples do that which is not lawful to do upon the sabbath day .
text2: Pariséu shuarsha nuna Wáinkiar Jesusan aniasarmiayi " Iista , ame unuiniamuram ayampratin tsawantai Túratin surimkiamua nuna Túruiniawai . "

text: But he said unto them , Have ye not read what David did , when he was an hungred , and they that were with him ;
text2: Tutai Jesus Tímiayi " Yaunchu uunt akupin Tawitcha tura nemarniusha tsukamainiak Túrawarmia nu ántichukaitrum .

text: How he entered into the house of God , and did eat the shewbread , which was not lawful for him to eat , neither for them which were with him , but only for the priests ?
text2: Yusa Uunt Jeen Wayá Yus iniaktusma tantan Yuámiayi . Nu tantasha aya Israer - patrik Yúatin asamtai Tawitniasha tura ni nemarin ana nunasha suritkiamuyayi . Túmain Yúawarmiayi .

text: Or have ye not read in the law , how that on the sabbath days the priests in the temple profane the sabbath , and are blameless ?
text2: Muisais akupkamunam aarma nu áujsachukaitrum . Israer - patrikia ayampratin tsawantai takainiayatan nusha tunaachuiti .

text: But I say unto you , That in this place is one greater than the temple .
text2: Nekas Tájarme , Yamái Yusa Jeen Enentáimtustinia nuna nankaamas Wíniaka Aents Ajasuitjiana nu , nekas Enentáimtursatniuitrume .

text: But if ye had known what this meaneth , I will have mercy , and not sacrifice , ye would not have condemned the guiltless .
text2: Yus - Papinium tawai : " Murik maam Winia surusum nujai " maakete " Tátsujai . Antsu waitnenkartutain wakerajai . " Nu chicham nekas nékaitkiurmeka Yamái Túrarmena Núnisrum Tunáa Túrachu ántrarum Súmamtikiachaintrume .

text: For the Son of man is Lord even of the sabbath day .
text2: Wi Aents Ajasu asan ayampratin tsawantan uuntrintjai . "

text: And when he was departed thence , he went into their synagogue :
text2: Jesus Nuyá wé Israer - shuar iruntainiam wayamiayi .

text: And , behold , there was a man which had his hand withered . And they asked him , saying , Is it lawful to heal on the sabbath days ? that they might accuse him .
text2: Nui shuar ámiayi ni uwejé jaka . Tura Jesusan ántar nekapsatai tusa wakeruinia ásar aniiniak " ṡAyampratin tsawantai jaa shuar tsuarminkiait ? " tiarmiayi .

text: And he said unto them , What man shall there be among you , that shall have one sheep , and if it fall into a pit on the sabbath day , will he not lay hold on it , and lift it out ?
text2: Tutai Jesus Tímiayi " Atumsha Atumí Murikrí ayampratin tsawantai waanam akaiki iniamtai jusatai tusarum wéchaintrupash .

text: How much then is a man better than a sheep ? Wherefore it is lawful to do well on the sabbath days .
text2: Antsu shuarka murikjai nankaamaschakait . Tuma asamtai ayampratin tsawantaisha pénker ana nu Túramniaiti . "

text: Then saith he to the man , Stretch forth thine hand . And he stretched it forth ; and it was restored whole , like as the other .
text2: Tinia iniais aishmankan uwejé jakan Tímiayi " Uwejém takuitia . " Tutai uwejé Takuí Chíkich uwejéjai métek pénker ajasmiayi .

text: Then the Pharisees went out , and held a council against him , how they might destroy him .
text2: Nuna Túramtai Pariséu shuarsha aa Jíinkiar Jesus itiurak Máawaintiaj ~ i tusar chichaman najatiarmiayi .

text: But when Jesus knew it , he withdrew himself from thence : and great multitudes followed him , and he healed them all ;
text2: Jesus niin Máatniun nekaama Nuyá Jíinkimiayi tura wéakui Untsurí shuar nemariarmiayi . Untsurí Jáiniancha Tsuámiayi .

text: And charged them that they should not make him known :
text2: Tsuar " etserkairap " tinia akupiarmiayi .

text: That it might be fulfilled which was spoken by Esaias the prophet , saying ,
text2: Yaunchu Yúsnan etserin Isayas Tímia nu uminkiati tusa Túrunamiayi . Niisha juna aarmiayi :

text: Behold my servant , whom I have chosen ; my beloved , in whom my soul is well pleased : I will put my spirit upon him , and he shall shew judgment to the Gentiles .
text2: " Júiti Wi achikmaj nu . Niisha Wi Tájana nuna umin asamtai ti aneakun Niijiai waraajai . Winia Wakantru kakarmarin takamtsuk susattajai . Túramtai winia uwempratin chichamprun Ashí Israercha nunkanmasha etserkattawai .

text: He shall not strive , nor cry ; neither shall any man hear his voice in the streets .
text2: Jiakchattawai tura kakaram chichaschattawai . Winia anturtukarat tusa péprunam weak untsukchartatui .

text: A bruised reed shall he not break , and smoking flax shall he not quench , till he send forth judgment unto victory .
text2: Akupin ajatsuk shuar pintiu punua Núnis pimpiru ainia nuna Kúpitsuk Yáintatui . Núnisan shuar ji yama Ikiapámu ainis kakarmachu ainia nuna ikiajniatsuk Ikiakártatui . Tura Ashí nupetak ti pénker kakaram akupin ajastatui .

text: And in his name shall the Gentiles trust .
text2: Tura Israer - shuarchasha Niin nekas Enentáimtusartatui . "

text: Then was brought unto him one possessed with a devil , blind , and dumb : and he healed him , insomuch that the blind and dumb both spake and saw .
text2: Nuyá Jesusan shuar yajauch wakantrukun itiariarmiayi . Nu shuar jii kusurusha chichachusha ámiayi . Tura Jesus Tsuármatai paant iimsamiayi tura chichakmiayi .

text: And all the people were amazed , and said , Is not this the son of David ?
text2: Nuna Wáinkiar shuar shiir Enentáimprar tiarmiayi " ṡTawitia Uchirí pampanku iniannamu uwemtikkiartin Tátinia Nuáshit ? "

text: But when the Pharisees heard it , they said , This fellow doth not cast out devils , but by Beelzebub the prince of the devils .
text2: Tura Pariséu shuarsha nuna antukar yajauch Enentáimtuiniak tiarmiayi " Juka iwianchi Kapitiántrin Pirsepún umirniuiti . Tuma asa nuna kakarmarijiai yajauch wakanin jiiki akupeawai . "

text: And Jesus knew their thoughts , and said unto them , Every kingdom divided against itself is brought to desolation ; and every city or house divided against itself shall not stand :
text2: Jesus tu Enentáimainian neka asa Tímiayi " Nú nunkanmaya shuar nuamtak kajernaiyakuinkia Nú nunka wari meserchattawak . Núnisan nuamtak shuar Ní shuarjai Mánainiakka amunaikchartatuak .

text: And if Satan cast out Satan , he is divided against himself ; how shall then his kingdom stand ?
text2: Núnisan íwianch nuamtak jiiki akupnainiakka Máanaikiar Wárik amuukashtatuak .

text: And if I by Beelzebub cast out devils , by whom do your children cast them out ? therefore they shall be your judges .
text2: Kame Wi Pirsepú iwianchi kakarmarijiai iwianchin jiiki akupeakuinkia Atumí Uchirísha ṡyana kakarmarijiain jiiki akupena ? Ni Túramurijiai átum awajirma nekamatarum .

text: But if I cast out devils by the Spirit of God , then the kingdom of God is come unto you .
text2: Wi Yusa Wakaní kakarmarijiai yajauch wakanin jiiki akupea asamtai atumsha Yusa akupeamuri atumiin jeartamarmena nu nekaatniuitrume . "

text: Or else how can one enter into a strong man ' s house , and spoil his goods , except he first bind the strong man ? and then he will spoil his house .
text2: ` Iista . Shuar kakaram shuara Kuítrin kasarkatin wakerakka emka kakarman Jinkiá aya Túran ni jeen Wayá kasarkamniaiti . Wi iwianchin Jíikmiajai uunt iwianch nupetkamua nu nekaamniaiti . '

text: He that is not with me is against me ; and he that gathereth not with me scattereth abroad .
text2: ` Wijiai tsanin pujatsna nuka winia nemasruiti . Núnisan Winia Yáintsuna nu aya itiurchat Nájateawai . '

text: Wherefore I say unto you , All manner of sin and blasphemy shall be forgiven unto men : but the blasphemy against the Holy Ghost shall not be forgiven unto men .
text2: ` Tuma asamtai Tájarme , Ashí shuar Tunáa Túruinia nusha yajauch chichainia nusha tsankuratin awai . Antsu Yusa Wakanin yajauch chicharin ainia nuka tsankurashtiniaiti .

text: And whosoever speaketh a word against the Son of man , it shall be forgiven him : but whosoever speaketh against the Holy Ghost , it shall not be forgiven him , neither in this world , neither in the world to come .
text2: Winiasha Aents Ajasuitjiana nuna yajauch chichartuinia Nú shuarsha tsankuramniaiti . Tura Yusa Wakanin yajauch áujmatainia nuka penké tsankurachminiaiti . Ju nunkanmasha tura ukunmasha tsankurnarchattawai ' Tímiayi .

text: Either make the tree good , and his fruit good ; or else make the tree corrupt , and his fruit corrupt : for the tree is known by his fruit .
text2: ` Yutai numi pénkeran nereawai . Tseas numisha yajauchin nereawai . Ni nerejai numi nekaamniaiti . Núniskete atumjai .

text: O generation of vipers , how can ye , being evil , speak good things ? for out of the abundance of the heart the mouth speaketh .
text2: Tseas wenunniutirmesha , ṡatumsha itiurak Imiá yajauchitirmesha pénker chichamsha chichastarum ? Shuar ni Enentáin Enentáimna nuna chichaawiti .

text: A good man out of the good treasure of the heart bringeth forth good things : and an evil man out of the evil treasure bringeth forth evil things .
text2: Pénker shuar pénker Enentáimiu asa shiir chichaawiti . Tura yajauch shuar yajauch Enentáimiu asa yajauch chichaawiti .

text: But I say unto you , That every idle word that men shall speak , they shall give account thereof in the day of judgment .
text2: Tura Wisha Tájarme , nekapsatin tsawant jeamtai Ashí Enentáimtsuk chichakma nuna Yúsan paant ujakartatui .

text: For by thy words thou shalt be justified , and by thy words thou shalt be condemned .
text2: Iis , ame chichammijiai nekanattarme . Pénker chichakuitkiumka sumamashtatme . Tura pénker chichakchaitkiumka sumamattame . "

text: Then certain of the scribes and of the Pharisees answered , saying , Master , we would see a sign from thee .
text2: Pariséu shuarsha Israer - shuara jintinniurisha Jesusan chicharuk " Uuntá , ame Yúsaiyaitjai tusam nayaimpinmaya kakarmajai iniakmamu Túrata , iisha Wáinkiatai " tiarmiayi .

text: But he answered and said unto them , An evil and adulterous generation seeketh after a sign ; and there shall no sign be given to it , but the sign of the prophet Jonas :
text2: Tutai Jesus Tímiayi " Shuar yajauch tura Yúsan Enentáimtachu ásar nayaimpinmaya iniakmamun seainiawai . Tuma asamtai , áyatik yaunchu Junas Túrunamu iniakmastiniaiti .

text: For as Jonas was three days and three nights in the whale ' s belly ; so shall the Son of man be three days and three nights in the heart of the earth .
text2: Junas menaintiu kashi menaintiu tsawantcha namaka ampujen enkemsamiayi . Núnisnak Wi , Aents Ajasu asan , menaintiu kashi menaintiu tsawantcha Nunká jakan tepestatjai .

text: The men of Nineveh shall rise in judgment with this generation , and shall condemn it : because they repented at the preaching of Jonas ; and , behold , a greater than Jonas is here .
text2: Junás Níniwi péprunmaya shuaran Yus - Chichaman etserkamtai nu shuar ni tunaarin Enentáimtusar ni Enentáin Yapajiáwarmiayi . Tura jui Yamái Junasa nankaamas etserin Pujawai . wiitjai nusha , tura anturkachuitrume . Tuma asamtai nekapsatin tsawant jeamtai Níniwinmaya shuar Juyá shuaran Súmamtikiawartatui . '

text: The queen of the south shall rise up in the judgment with this generation , and shall condemn it : for she came from the uttermost parts of the earth to hear the wisdom of Solomon ; and , behold , a greater than Solomon is here .
text2: ` Yaunchu nuwa yajaya shuaran uunt akupniuriyayi . Nu nuwa Sarumún ti neka asamtai niin anturkataj tusa tarimiayi . Tura jui Yamái Sarumúnjai nankaamas anturkamnia pujawai . Nusha Wiitjai . Tuma asamtai nekapsatin tsawant jeamtai nu nuwa Juyá shuaran Súmamtikiawartatui ' Tímiayi .

text: When the unclean spirit is gone out of a man , he walketh through dry places , seeking rest , and findeth none .
text2: ` Shuara Enentáiya yajauch wakan Jíinkin yumi penké Yútatsna nui wéawai . Tura nui pénker pujustinian Wáinkiach ataksha waketkitniun Enentáimiui .

text: Then he saith , I will return into my house from whence I came out ; and when he is come , he findeth it empty , swept , and garnished .
text2: " Wi Jíinkimiaj nui waketkittiajai " tawai . Tura waketki shuara Enentáin pénker iwiaramu tura ankantan Wáiniak

text: Then goeth he , and taketh with himself seven other spirits more wicked than himself , and they enter in and dwell there : and the last state of that man is worse than the first . Even so shall it be also unto this wicked generation .
text2: ni ain siati ( 7 ) iwianchin niijiai nankaamas yajauchin Itiá shuara Enentáin Enkemáwartatui . Túrunamtai nu shuar nuiki Núna nankaamas yajauch ajastatui . Núnisan Juyá shuar Túrunawartatui " Tímiayi Jesus .

text: While he yet talked to the people , behold , his mother and his brethren stood without , desiring to speak with him .
text2: Jesus nu shuarjai tuke chichaak pujai ni Nukurísha ni Yachísha tariarmiayi . Tura aa wajasar Niijiai chichastaj tiarmiayi .

text: Then one said unto him , Behold , thy mother and thy brethren stand without , desiring to speak with thee .
text2: Túramtai Jesusan ujakar " Ame nukusha yatsumsha aa wajasar chichastaj turamainiawai " tiarmiayi .

text: But he answered and said unto him that told him , Who is my mother ? and who are my brethren ?
text2: Chichaman ujakmia nuna Jesus Tímiayi " ṡYa ainia winia nukursha winia yatsursha ? "

text: And he stretched forth his hand toward his disciples , and said , Behold my mother and my brethren !
text2: Nuyá ni unuiniamurin iniakmas Tímiayi " Ju ainiawai winia nukur tura winia yatsursha .

text: For whosoever shall do the will of my Father which is in heaven , the same is my brother , and sister , and mother .
text2: Ashí shuar winia Apar nayaimpiniam pujana nu wakeramun umiiniana nu winia yatsur winia umar winia nukur ainiawai " Tímiayi .

text: The same day went Jesus out of the house , and sat by the sea side .
text2: Nu tsawantai Jesus ni jeeya Jíinkin antumianka Kánmatkarin pujusmiayi .

text: And great multitudes were gathered together unto him , so that he went into a ship , and sat ; and the whole multitude stood on the shore .
text2: Tura ti Untsurí shuar Káunkarmatai kanunam enkemar nui pujusmiayi . Shuarsha antumianka Kánmatkarin pujusarmiayi .

text: And he spake many things unto them in parables , saying , Behold , a sower went forth to sow ;
text2: Túrunawarmatai Untsurí métek - taku chichamjai unuiniamiayi . " Atsaamin atsaamprataj tusa Jíinkimiai , Tímiayi .

text: And when he sowed , some seeds fell by the way side , and the fowls came and devoured them up :
text2: Atsaamki wesa arakri jintia Písunmasha iniaarmai . Tura chinki tariar yuawarmai .

text: Some fell upon stony places , where they had not much earth : and forthwith they sprung up , because they had no deepness of earth :
text2: Chikichcha kaya írunmanum iniaarmai . Nunka ishichik asamtai Wárik tsapainiarmai .

text: And when the sun was up , they were scorched ; and because they had no root , they withered away .
text2: Tura nantu etsantramtai pénker Kankáprúrcharu asa sukuam Káararmai .

text: And some fell among thorns ; and the thorns sprung up , and choked them :
text2: Chikichcha Jankí nupanam iniaarmai . Tura janki Wárik tsakar nupetak ajakramai .

text: But other fell into good ground , and brought forth fruit , some an hundredfold , some sixtyfold , some thirtyfold .
text2: Chikichcha pénker nunkanam iniaarmai . Nusha pénker nerekar Chíkich siansha ( 100 ) nerekarmai . Tura chikichcha sesenta ( 60 ) nerekarmai . Tura chikichcha trainta ( 30 ) nerekarmai .

text: Who hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Kuishim ákuinkia antuktarum " Tímiayi .

text: And the disciples came , and said unto him , Why speakest thou unto them in parables ?
text2: Nuyá ni unuiniamurin Jesusan taruntar aniiniak " ṡUrukamtai aya métek - taku chichamjai ju shuar unuiniam ? " tiarmiayi .

text: He answered and said unto them , Because it is given unto you to know the mysteries of the kingdom of heaven , but to them it is not given .
text2: Tutai Jesus Tímiayi " Urukuk ju nunkanam Yus akupin ati , nuka yaunchu nekanachmiayi . Tura yamaikia Yus Ashí nuna atumin paant iniakturmawai . Antsu Chíkich nuna nekaachmin ainiawai .

text: For whosoever hath , to him shall be given , and he shall have more abundance : but whosoever hath not , from him shall be taken away even that he hath .
text2: Kame Núkap takakna nu shuar Nú nukap patatnaktatui tura ti Núkap takustatui . Antsu ishichik takakna nuka ishichik takakuk juruktiniaiti . Núnisan Yusna ti nekarum Nú Núkapka Yúpichuch nekaattarme . Tura ishichik nékarum Wárik kajinmatkittiarme .

text: Therefore speak I to them in parables : because they seeing see not ; and hearing they hear not , neither do they understand .
text2: Tuma asamtai aya métek - taku chichamjai unuiniajai . Nú shuarka iiniayatan Wáiniáiniatsui . Antuiniayatan ántachua Núnis nékainiatsui . Túmainiak Winia nekarainiatsui .

text: And in them is fulfilled the prophecy of Esaias , which saith , By hearing ye shall hear , and shall not understand ; and seeing ye shall see , and shall not perceive :
text2: Nujai yaunchu Yúsnan etserin Isayas timia nu uminkiaiti . Juna Tímiayi : " Ti ántayatrum anturkashtatrume . Wáiniatrumsha nekaashtatrume .

text: For this people ' s heart is waxed gross , and their ears are dull of hearing , and their eyes they have closed ; lest at any time they should see with their eyes , and hear with their ears , and should understand with their heart , and should be converted , and I should heal them .
text2: Ju shuara Enentái Kátsuram ásar pénkera nuna nakitiainiawai . Nu asamtai pénker ántuiniatsui , jiisha Pusá ainis ainiawai . Túrachkunka paant nekaawarainti , tura nekas antukarainti , tura Enentáijiai Enentáimias Winia tsuarat tusa tarutiarainti . "

text: But blessed are your eyes , for they see : and your ears , for they hear .
text2: Tura átumka paant wainkia asarum pénker anta asarum Shíiraitrume .

text: For verily I say unto you , That many prophets and righteous men have desired to see those things which ye see , and have not seen them ; and to hear those things which ye hear , and have not heard them .
text2: Nekasan Tájarme , Untsurí Yúsnan etserniusha tura pénker shuarsha átum Yamái Wáintrum nuna Wáinkiatniun wakeruiniayatan Wáinkiacharmiayi . Tura átum Yamái ántarme nuna antuktinian wakeruiniayatan antukcharmiayi ' Tímiayi .

text: Hear ye therefore the parable of the sower .
text2: ` Ayu , antuktarum . Atsaampramu chichaman paant jintintiatjarme .

text: When any one heareth the word of the kingdom , and understandeth it not , then cometh the wicked one , and catcheth away that which was sown in his heart . This is he which received seed by the way side .
text2: Arak jintia Písunam iniaararma nuka shuar Yus - Chichaman ántayatan ni Enentáin ikiuiniatsna Núiti . Tura íwianch nu Yus - Chicham ni Enentáin atsaampramu ainis antukman kajinmatkiawai .

text: But he that received the seed into stony places , the same is he that heareth the word , and anon with joy receiveth it ;
text2: Arak kaya írunmanum iniaarma nuka shuar Yus - Chichaman antuk waras umirainia Núiti .

text: Yet hath he not root in himself , but dureth for a while : for when tribulation or persecution ariseth because of the word , by and by he is offended .
text2: Tura Núkap kankaprurcharu ásar katsuiniatsui . Antsu itiurchatan ínkiuiniak tura Yus - Chichaman wakeruinia ásarmatai Chíkich yajauch áujmatam Wárik iniaisar ikiuiniawai .

text: He also that received seed among the thorns is he that heareth the word ; and the care of this world , and the deceitfulness of riches , choke the word , and he becometh unfruitful .
text2: Arak Jankí nupanam iniaarma nuka shuar Yus - Chichaman antuk emka umirniua Núiti . Tura ju nunkanam írunna nuna tuke Páchiniak ni Kuítrincha ti Enentáimtuinia ásarmatai Ashí Yus - Chichaman Enentáimtamun Núpeteawai . Tuma asamtai nu aentsnum Yus - Chicham atsaampramu nereatsui . Yus - Chicham ni Enentáin takasma atsawai .

text: But he that received seed into the good ground is he that heareth the word , and understandeth it ; which also beareth fruit , and bringeth forth , some an hundredfold , some sixty , some thirty .
text2: Tura árak pénker nunkanam iniaarma nuka shuar Yus - Chichaman antuk pénker umirainia Núiti . Tura pénker nerenawai . Chíkich sian ( 100 ) nerekarma Núnis chikichcha sesenta ( 60 ) nerekarma Núnis chikichcha trainta ( 30 ) nerekarma Núnis ainiawai " Tímiayi Jesus .

text: Another parable put he forth unto them , saying , The kingdom of heaven is likened unto a man which sowed good seed in his field :
text2: Jesus ataksha ju métek - taku chichaman áujmatsamiayi . " Shuar Yus akupeamunam pachiinkiartin Júnisaiti . Shuar pénker arakan , Tríkiun ni nunken araamai .

text: But while men slept , his enemy came and sowed tares among the wheat , and went his way .
text2: Tura Ashí kanararmatai nemasri kashi taa trikiu arakmanum yajauch nupan aratak ikiukmiai .

text: But when the blade was sprung up , and brought forth fruit , then appeared the tares also .
text2: Trikiu tsapakar nereakui Nuyá yajauch nupasha Nusháa nereku asa ti paant ajasmai .

text: So the servants of the householder came and said unto him , Sir , didst not thou sow good seed in thy field ? from whence then hath it tares ?
text2: Nuna iisar takainia nu ni uuntrin Werí tiarmai " Uunta , ṡpénker arak araachmakam . Itiura jusha yajauch nupasha tsapakuit ? " '

text: He said unto them , An enemy hath done this . The servants said unto him , Wilt thou then that we go and gather them up ?
text2: ` Tutai nérentin timiai " Winia nemasur arakuiti . " ' ` Takui ni takarniuri tiarmai " ṡYajauch nupan uwerat tusam wakeramek ? " '

text: But he said , Nay ; lest while ye gather up the tares , ye root up also the wheat with them .
text2: ` Tutai timiai " Atsá , uwerairap . Yajauch nupa uweaj tukamarum trikiu uweniirum .

text: Let both grow together until the harvest : and in the time of harvest I will say to the reapers , Gather ye together first the tares , and bind them in bundles to burn them : but gather the wheat into my barn .
text2: Iniaisatarum . Antsu métek tsakakti . Júuktin tsawant jeamtai winia takartinian emka yajauch nupan uwer irumar jinkiawarat tusan akupkartatjai . Tura aesawartatui . Tura trikiu neren Júukar pénker ikiusarat tusan akupkartatjai " timiai " Tímiayi Jesus .

text: Another parable put he forth unto them , saying , The kingdom of heaven is like to a grain of mustard seed , which a man took , and sowed in his field :
text2: Jesus ataksha métek - taku chichaman áujmatsamiayi . " Shuar Yus akupeamunam pachiinkiartin mustasa jinkiaiya aintsankete . Shuar pénker nunken araamai .

text: Which indeed is the least of all seeds : but when it is grown , it is the greatest among herbs , and becometh a tree , so that the birds of the air come and lodge in the branches thereof .
text2: Mustasa Jinkiáikia Imiá uchichiitiat Tsapái tsakaakka Ashí numichijiai nankaamas uunt ajawai . Ti uunt asamtai chinki ni kanawen pasunmainiawai " Tímiayi Jesus .

text: Another parable spake he unto them ; The kingdom of heaven is like unto leaven , which a woman took , and hid in three measures of meal , till the whole was leavened .
text2: Núnisan Chíkich métek - taku chichaman áujmatsamiayi . " Shuar Yus akupeamunam pachiinkiartin karinia aintsankete . Nuwa nijiamchiniam karinia enkea mashi Páchimiawai . Tura nu mash karimtikiawai " Tímiayi .

text: That it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophet , saying , I will open my mouth in parables ; I will utter things which have been kept secret from the foundation of the world .
text2: Ashí nuna Jesus métek - taku chichamjai áujmatsamiayi . Yaunchu Yúsnan etserin timia nu uminkiati tusa Túramiayi . Etserin juna aarmiayi : " Métek - taku chichamjai áujmattiatjai . Yámankamtaiknumia nékashtain etserkattajai " tu aarmiayi . Nu asamtai aya métek - taku chichamjain áujmatmiayi Jesus .

text: Then Jesus sent the multitude away , and went into the house : and his disciples came unto him , saying , Declare unto us the parable of the tares of the field .
text2: Nuyá shuaran ikiukin Jesus Jeá Támiayi . Túramtai ni unuiniamuri tariar " Yajauch nupa áujmatmena nu paant awajsata " tiarmiayi .

text: He answered and said unto them , He that soweth the good seed is the Son of man ;
text2: Tutai Jesus Tímiayi " Wi Aents Ajasuitjai . Wi pénker arakan atsaamkaitjai .

text: The field is the world ; the good seed are the children of the kingdom ; but the tares are the children of the wicked one ;
text2: Ashí nunka aja aintsaiti . Pénker Jinkiái Yus - shuaran Yus akupea nuna nakumeawai . Yajauch nupa iwianchna ainia nuna nakumeawai .

text: The enemy that sowed them is the devil ; the harvest is the end of the world ; and the reapers are the angels .
text2: Tura íwianch ii nemasri asa yajauch nupan arakuiti . Tura nunka Amúamunam Yusa suntari arakan Júuktinia aintsan shuaran yaruaktatui .

text: As therefore the tares are gathered and burned in the fire ; so shall it be in the end of this world .
text2: Yajauch nupa irur jinium aesatniua aanis nunka Amúamunam Túrunattawai .

text: And shall cast them into a furnace of fire : there shall be wailing and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Nui Wi Aents Ajasu asan winia suntarun akupkattajai . Tura Ashí tunaan Túruinia nunasha tura chikichan tunaanum útsuinia nunasha mash irurar jinium apeawartatui . Nuisha ti uutin ti Wáitsatniusha átatui .

text: Then shall the righteous shine forth as the sun in the kingdom of their Father . Who hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Antsu pénker Túruinia nuka ti shiir wincha ajasar ni Aparí akupeana nui etsa Núnis Tsáapnin ajasartatui . Wats , kuishim átsuk . Antukta . '

text: Again , the kingdom of heaven is like unto treasure hid in a field ; the which when a man hath found , he hideth , and for joy thereof goeth and selleth all that he hath , and buyeth that field .
text2: ` Shuar Yus akupeamunam pachiinkiatin kuit Nunká uukma aintsankete . Shuar nu Kuítian Wáiniak nuin ataksha uukmai . Tura ti waras waketki nu kuit niiniu Atí tusa Ashí ni takakman suruk nu nunkan sumakmai . '

text: Again , the kingdom of heaven is like unto a merchant man , seeking goodly pearls :
text2: ` Shuar Yus akupeamunam pachiinkiatin Júnisaiti . Shuar kayachin ti Shíirman eak wekaana aintsankete .

text: Who , when he had found one pearl of great price , went and sold all that he had , and bought it .
text2: Tura kayan Ashí nankaamas kuit jeean Wáiniak waketki Ashí takakna nuna suruk nu kayan niiniu Atí tusa Súmawai . '

text: Again , the kingdom of heaven is like unto a net , that was cast into the sea , and gathered of every kind :
text2: ` Shuar Yus akupeamunam pachiinkiartin Júnisaiti . Shuar nekajai namakan Achía aintsankete . Nekan nayaantsanam ajuntak Niisháa namakaim Achíawai .

text: Which , when it was full , they drew to shore , and sat down , and gathered the good into vessels , but cast the bad away .
text2: Tura nekanam nemarmatai kukar jiiki , nui pénker namaknasha chankinnium chumpiniawai . Tura yajauch namaknaka ajapenawai .

text: So shall it be at the end of the world : the angels shall come forth , and sever the wicked from among the just ,
text2: Núnisan átatui nunka Amúamunam . Yusa suntari taar Yus - shuaran tura íwianch shuaran akantrattawai .

text: And shall cast them into the furnace of fire : there shall be wailing and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Tura íwianch shuarnaka uunt jinium apeattawai . Nuisha ti uutin ti Wáitsatin átatui . " Nuna Ashí ni unuiniamurijiai áujmatsamiayi Jesus .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Have ye understood all these things ? They say unto him , Yea , Lord .
text2: Jesus nuna tinia amuk " ṡJu mash antukurmek ? ' Tímiayi . Tutai ni unuiniamuri " Ee , Uunta , Ashí antukji " tiarmiayi .

text: Then said he unto them , Therefore every scribe which is instructed unto the kingdom of heaven is like unto a man that is an householder , which bringeth forth out of his treasure things new and old .
text2: Tuiniakui Jesus Tímiayi " Shuar Ashí Yúsnan pénker unuimiaruka aents Kuítriniua aintsankete . Ni ikiutairiya yamarmancha yaunchu sumakmancha jusamniaiti . Núnisan nu shuar Yamái nékamujaisha tura yaunchu nékamujaisha Yus - shuaran Yáintiniaiti . "

text: And it came to pass , that when Jesus had finished these parables , he departed thence .
text2: Jesus nu métek - taku chichaman áujmatas amuk Nuyá wémiayi .

text: And when he was come into his own country , he taught them in their synagogue , insomuch that they were astonished , and said , Whence hath this man this wisdom , and these mighty works ?
text2: Tura ni péprurin Nasarétnum Jeá Israer - shuar iruntainiam Wayá unuiniamiayi . Tura Nuyá shuar antukar Tí enentaimprarmiayi . Tura " ṡJusha tui Imiá unuimiaruit , tiarmiayi . Itiurak aents tujintiamun Túramniait ?

text: Is not this the carpenter ' s son ? is not his mother called Mary ? and his brethren , James , and Joses , and Simon , and Judas ?
text2: Juka Karpintíru uchirinchukait . Nukurísha Marichukait . Tura ni yachisha Jakupu , Jusé , Semun , Jútas ainiatsuk .

text: And his sisters , are they not all with us ? Whence then hath this man all these things ?
text2: Tura ni umaisha iijiai írutra pujuiniatsuk . ṡNuikia itiura mash neka ? " tiarmiayi .

text: And they were offended in him . But Jesus said unto them , A prophet is not without honour , save in his own country , and in his own house .
text2: Túrawar Jesusan itiurchat Enentáimturarmiayi . Túramtai Jesus chicharuk " Yúsnan etserniun Ashí shuar pénker anturainiawai , antsu aya nuna nunkeyanka ni shuarinkia niin anturainiatsui " Tímiayi .

text: And he did not many mighty works there because of their unbelief .
text2: Tura Nú shuar Jesusan Enentáimtuiniachu asamtai aentsti tujintiamun aya ishichik Túramiayi .

text: At that time Herod the tetrarch heard of the fame of Jesus ,
text2: Kariréa nunkanam Erutis akupniuyayi . Tura Jesus Túramuncha antukmiayi .

text: And said unto his servants , This is John the Baptist ; he is risen from the dead ; and therefore mighty works do shew forth themselves in him .
text2: Tura ni írutramurin Tímiayi " Nuka imiakratin Juan jakamunmaya nantaki Túrawai auka . Tuma asa aents tujintiamun Túrawai " Tímiayi . Kame Erutis Juankan maa asa Tímiayi .

text: For John said unto him , It is not lawful for thee to have her .
text2: Akupin Erutis ni Yachí Jiripi nuwen Jirutíasan akintrukmatai Juan Erutisan " Ame yatsumi nuwé akintrukchatniuitme " Tímiayi . Tutai Erutis Juankan achik jirujai Jinkiá sepunam enkeatarum tusa akupkamiayi .

text: And when he would have put him to death , he feared the multitude , because they counted him as a prophet .
text2: Niisha Juankan Máataj Tukamá aentsun ashamiarmiayi . Ashí aents " Juan Yúsnan etserniuiti " Enentáimtuiniakui ashammiayi .

text: But when Herod ' s birthday was kept , the daughter of Herodias danced before them , and pleased Herod .
text2: Tura akupin Erutis akiiniamu tsawantri jeamtai Nú Námpertin Jirutíasa nawantri Ashí ipiaamu pujuiniamunam jantsemamiayi . Túramtai Erutis shiir Enentáimtak

text: Whereupon he promised with an oath to give her whatsoever she would ask .
text2: " Ame Ashí wakeram nu seattia , Tímiayi . Nekasan amastatjai , Yussha iirui " Tímiayi .

text: And she , being before instructed of her mother , said , Give me here John Baptist ' s head in a charger .
text2: Tutai nu nuwach emka ni nukuri akatramu asa Erutisan chicharuk " Imiakratin Juanka muuké tsupikiam amamkunam enkeram Surústá " Tímiayi .

text: And the king was sorry : nevertheless for the oath ' s sake , and them which sat with him at meat , he commanded it to be given her .
text2: Tutai Erutis wake mesekmiayi . Túrasha " nekas Yus iirui " tiniu asa tura ni amikrisha antukaru asamtai umikmiayi .

text: And he sent , and beheaded John in the prison .
text2: Ni suntarin sepunmayan Juanka muuken tsupik itiarti tusa akupkamiayi .

text: And his head was brought in a charger , and given to the damsel : and she brought it to her mother .
text2: Tura amamkunam itiar nuwachin Súsarmiayi . Tura niisha ni Nukurí susamiayi .

text: And his disciples came , and took up the body , and buried it , and went and told Jesus .
text2: Nuyá Juanka írutramuri tariar Ayashí jukiar iwiarsarmiayi . Túrawar Jesusan ujauwearmiayi .

text: When Jesus heard of it , he departed thence by ship into a desert place apart : and when the people had heard thereof , they followed him on foot out of the cities .
text2: Jesus nuna antuk Ninki ni unuiniamurijiain kanunam enkemar arant aents atsamunam wémiayi . Túrasha nuna aents nekaawar kukarak weriarmiayi Jesusan .

text: And Jesus went forth , and saw a great multitude , and was moved with compassion toward them , and he healed their sick .
text2: Kanunmaya Jíiniaj Tukamá Untsurí aentsun Wáinkiamiayi . Tura Wáiniak waitnentrarmiayi . Tura Jáiniancha Tsuárarmiayi .

text: And when it was evening , his disciples came to him , saying , This is a desert place , and the time is now past ; send the multitude away , that they may go into the villages , and buy themselves victuals .
text2: Kíakui ni unuiniamuri Niin tariar tiarmiayi " Kíawai , Uunta . Tura shuar Tíjiuch pujaaka atsawai . Ju aents akupkarta . Péprunam wear sumak yuuwearti " tiarmiayi .

text: But Jesus said unto them , They need not depart ; give ye them to eat .
text2: Tutai Jesus Tímiayi " ṡUrukamtaik wearat ? Antsu atumek ayuratarum . "

text: And they say unto him , We have here but five loaves , and two fishes .
text2: Tutai tiarmiayi " Iikia takaktsuji . Aya senku ( 5 ) tantachik jimiarchik namakchijiain takakji . "

text: He said , Bring them hither to me .
text2: Tuíniakui Jesus " Wats , nu itiartitiarum " Tímiayi .

text: And he commanded the multitude to sit down on the grass , and took the five loaves , and the two fishes , and looking up to heaven , he blessed , and brake , and gave the loaves to his disciples , and the disciples to the multitude .
text2: Tinia aents Chírichriniam pujusarti tusa akupkamiayi . Nuyá senku ( 5 ) tantancha Jímiar namaknasha achik nayaimpiniam iimias Yúsan yuminsamiayi . Tura puur ni unuiniamurin aents ayuratarum tusa Súsarmiayi .

text: And they did all eat , and were filled : and they took up of the fragments that remained twelve baskets full .
text2: Ashí Yurumáwar jémararmiayi . Tura nuyasha puunaruka tuse ( 12 ) chankin Tiármiayi .

text: And they that had eaten were about five thousand men , beside women and children .
text2: Nui Yurumáwarmia nusha nuwasha uchisha nekapmatsuk senku mir ( 5000 ) aya aishman ármiayi .

text: And straightway Jesus constrained his disciples to get into a ship , and to go before him unto the other side , while he sent the multitudes away .
text2: Nuyá Jesus ni unuiniamurin kanunam enkemprarum amain émaa ajatarum tusa akupkarmiayi . Niisha aentsun akupkarmiayi .

text: And when he had sent the multitudes away , he went up into a mountain apart to pray : and when the evening was come , he was there alone .
text2: Akupkarsha naint waka Yúsan áujumiayi . Káshisha nui Ninki tuke pujumiayi .

text: But the ship was now in the midst of the sea , tossed with waves : for the wind was contrary .
text2: Tura antumian Tí wankaram asamtai kanu ajapén ajasmatai nase tukumma entsa tamparukmiayi .

text: And in the fourth watch of the night Jesus went unto them , walking on the sea .
text2: Tsawaana ai nii tuke wenai Jesus Entsá Pátatek wekas pujuiniamunam jeamiayi .

text: And when the disciples saw him walking on the sea , they were troubled , saying , It is a spirit ; and they cried out for fear .
text2: Tura ni unuiniamuri Entsá Pátatek wekaan Wáinkiar ti sapijmiakarmiayi . Tura ashamainiak " wakanchashit " tiarmiayi .

text: But straightway Jesus spake unto them , saying , Be of good cheer ; it is I ; be not afraid .
text2: Tuíniakui Jesus tiarmiayi " Kakaram ajastarum . Wiitjai . Ashamprukairap . "

text: And Peter answered him and said , Lord , if it be thou , bid me come unto thee on the water .
text2: Takui Pítiur chicharuk Tímiayi " Uunta , Ametkumka nui wekasa jeatin untsurkata . "

text: And he said , Come . And when Peter was come down out of the ship , he walked on the water , to go to Jesus .
text2: Takui Jesus Tímiayi " Wats , Winitiá . " Tutai Pítiur kanunmaya akaikin Jesus wajana nui jeataj tusa Entsá Pátatek wekasamiayi .

text: But when he saw the wind boisterous , he was afraid ; and beginning to sink , he cried , saying , Lord , save me .
text2: Tura ti nasen Násentun Nekáa ashamkamiayi . Ashama asa Entsá wayamiayi . Tura " Uuntá , achirkata " tu untsummiayi .

text: And immediately Jesus stretched forth his hand , and caught him , and said unto him , O thou of little faith , wherefore didst thou doubt ?
text2: Nu chichamtaik Jesus uwejnum achik Júak " Maa , Yus Imiá ishichik Enentáimtuschamek " Tímiayi .

text: And when they were come into the ship , the wind ceased .
text2: Tura kanunam Enkemáwarmatai nasesha menkakamiayi .

text: Then they that were in the ship came and worshipped him , saying , Of a truth thou art the Son of God .
text2: Túramtai kanunam enkemarmia nusha Jesusan tikishmatar chicharuk " Nekas ame Yusa Uchirínme " tiarmiayi .

text: And when they were gone over , they came into the land of Gennesaret .
text2: Tura amaini katinkiar Jinisarít nunkanam jearmiayi .

text: And when the men of that place had knowledge of him , they sent out into all that country round about , and brought unto him all that were diseased ;
text2: Tura Nuyá aents Jesusan nekaawar nu nunkanam Ashí ujanairarmiayi . Túrawar jaancha ni pujamunam itiariarmiayi .

text: And besought him that they might only touch the hem of his garment : and as many as touched were made perfectly whole .
text2: Ni pushirinkisha antintai tusar seawarmiayi . Tura antinkiarmia nuka pénker ajarmiayi .

text: Then came to Jesus scribes and Pharisees , which were of Jerusalem , saying ,
text2: Nuyá Jerusarén péprunmaya Pariséusha yaunchu akupkamu jintinniurisha Jesusan tariar aniasarmiayi

text: Why do thy disciples transgress the tradition of the elders ? for they wash not their hands when they eat bread .
text2: " ṡUrukamtai ame unuiniamuram ii uuntri yaunchu jintintrarmia nuna uminiatsu ? Iis , ikijmiatskesha Yurumáiniawai " tiarmiayi .

text: But he answered and said unto them , Why do ye also transgress the commandment of God by your tradition ?
text2: Tuíniakui Jesus aniasarmiayi " ṡUrukamtai atumsha Yus akupkamu umirtsuk aya aents akupkamu umiirum ?

text: For God commanded , saying , Honour thy father and mother : and , He that curseth father or mother , let him die the death .
text2: Iis , Yus Tíchamkia : " Ame apa , nukusha shiir Enentáimtustarum . " Tura " Shuarsha ni Aparíncha Nukuríncha katsekka nu shuar jakati " Tíchamkia .

text: And honour not his father or his mother , he shall be free . Thus have ye made the commandment of God of none effect by your tradition .
text2: Antsu átumka Tárume " Shuar Ashí niiniu írunna nuna mash " Yúsnaiti " takui nuikia nujai ni Aparíncha Nukuríncha Yáinchamniaiti , Tárume . Niin Yáintinian nakitiak ayatik " Ashí winia ainiana nu Yusna asamtai Yáinchamniaitjame " Títiniaiti " Tárume . Núnisrum Tákuram Yus akupkamu iniaisarum aya aents akupkamu umiirume , Tímiayi .

text: Ye hypocrites , well did Esaias prophesy of you , saying ,
text2: Antra chichamtiniaitrume . Yúsnan etserin Isayas yaunchu nekas atumin aartampramiayi juna :

text: This people draweth nigh unto me with their mouth , and honoureth me with their lips ; but their heart is far from me .
text2: " Ju aents ni wenejai shiir awajtuiniawai , tura ni Enentái jeachat pujuiniawai .

text: But in vain they do worship me , teaching for doctrines the commandments of men .
text2: Tura tukeneasan shiir awajtuiniawai . Aentsu chichamen jintintiainiayat " Yusa chichamente " tuiniawai . " Tu aarmiayi " Tímiayi Jesus .

text: And he called the multitude , and said unto them , Hear , and understand :
text2: Tinia shuaran untsuk tiarmiayi " Ju antukrum pénker nekaatarum .

text: Not that which goeth into the mouth defileth a man ; but that which cometh out of the mouth , this defileth a man .
text2: Aents Yúana nuka Shuáran yajauch awajsashtatui . Antsu wenunmaya jiinia nuka Shuáran yajauch awajeawai " Tímiayi .

text: Then came his disciples , and said unto him , Knowest thou that the Pharisees were offended , after they heard this saying ?
text2: Nuyá ni unuiniamuri Jesusan tariar " Maa , Pariséu ame chichammin antukar ti itiurchat Enentáimprarai " tiarmiayi .

text: Let them alone : they be blind leaders of the blind . And if the blind lead the blind , both shall fall into the ditch .
text2: Tuíniakui Jesus Tímiayi " Ikiuktiarum . Kusuru aintsan ainiawai . Tura kusuruncha jintintiainiawai . Mai kusuru ásar mai Wáanam akaiki iniaawartatui . Wats , ajanam Nupá aintsan ainiawai . Tura Ashí winia Apar nayaimpiniam pujana nu araachmaka takamtsuk uwé ajapamu átatui " Tímiayi Jesus .

text: Then answered Peter and said unto him , Declare unto us this parable .
text2: Takui Pítiur Jesusan Tímiayi " Nu métek - taku chicham paant awajsata . "

text: And Jesus said , Are ye also yet without understanding ?
text2: Tutai Jesus Tímiayi " ṡAtumsha nekaachurmek .

text: Do not ye yet understand , that whatsoever entereth in at the mouth goeth into the belly , and is cast out into the draught ?
text2: Enentáimprachurmek ? Ashí wenunam wayaana nu wakenam wéatsuk . Tura Nuyá iniankastiniaiti .

text: But those things which proceed out of the mouth come forth from the heart ; and they defile the man .
text2: Antsu wenunmaya jiinia nu Enentáinmaya jiiniu asa aentsun yajauch awajeawai .

text: For out of the heart proceed evil thoughts , murders , adulteries , fornications , thefts , false witness , blasphemies :
text2: Enentáinmaya Ashí yajauch Enentáimsatin Jíiniainiawai . Mankartuatniusha , chikicha nuwé kasamkatniusha , tsanirmatniusha , kasamkatniusha , Wáitruatniusha , yajauch áujmatsatniusha

text: These are the things which defile a man : but to eat with unwashen hands defileth not a man .
text2: Ashí nu ainiawai nekaska Shuáran yajauch awajeana nu . Tura ikijmiatsuk Yurumátniuka Shuáran ni Enentáin yajauch awajeatsui " Tímiayi .

text: Then Jesus went thence , and departed into the coasts of Tyre and Sidon .
text2: Jesus Nuyá jiinki Tiru péprunmasha Sitiun péprunmasha wémiayi .

text: And , behold , a woman of Canaan came out of the same coasts , and cried unto him , saying , Have mercy on me , O Lord , thou Son of David ; my daughter is grievously vexed with a devil .
text2: Tura nu nunkanmaya nuwa Jesusan Tarí Tímiayi " Uunta , uunt akupin Tawit ame weatrum asamtai winia waitnentrurta . Nawantur yajauch wakantruku asa ti Wáitrutawai " Tímiayi .

text: But he answered her not a word . And his disciples came and besought him , saying , Send her away ; for she crieth after us .
text2: Tura Jesus áikchamiayi . Tura ni unuiniamuri tariar " Awemata , tiarmiayi . Tuke untsumki apapétmaji " tiarmiayi .

text: But he answered and said , I am not sent but unto the lost sheep of the house of Israel .
text2: Nuyá Jesus Tímiayi " Aya Israer - shuarnum menkakaru ainia nuna eaktinian Yus akuptukuiti . "

text: Then came she and worshipped him , saying , Lord , help me .
text2: Túrasha nuwa tikishmatar Tímiayi " Uunta , waitnentrurta . "

text: But he answered and said , It is not meet to take the children ' s bread , and to cast it to dogs .
text2: Tutai Jesus Tímiayi " ṡUchí apatkuri jurukir Yawá susamniakait ? " Tímiayi .

text: And she said , Truth , Lord : yet the dogs eat of the crumbs which fall from their masters ' table .
text2: Tutai nuwa Tímiayi " Nekas , Uunta , tame . Tura yawasha ni aentsri yurumainiakui Nunká iniaarun Yuíniatsuk . "

text: Then Jesus answered and said unto her , O woman , great is thy faith : be it unto thee even as thou wilt . And her daughter was made whole from that very hour .
text2: Takui Jesus Tímiayi " Maku , nekas Winia Enentáimtursaitme . Ame wakeram Núnisan Atí " Tímiayi . Tura nu chichamaik ni nawantri pénker ajasmiayi .

text: And Jesus departed from thence , and came nigh unto the sea of Galilee ; and went up into a mountain , and sat down there .
text2: Jesus Nuyá jiinki Kariréa antumianka Káanmatkarin waketkimiayi . Tura naint waka nui pujusmiayi .

text: And great multitudes came unto him , having with them those that were lame , blind , dumb , maimed , and many others , and cast them down at Jesus ' feet ; and he healed them :
text2: Nui Untsurí aents Niin tariar shutuapnasha kusuruncha chichachuncha tsupirkamuncha Chíkich Jáiniancha itiariarmiayi . Túrawar nawenam aeprusarmiayi . Túram tsuararmiayi .

text: Insomuch that the multitude wondered , when they saw the dumb to speak , the maimed to be whole , the lame to walk , and the blind to see : and they glorified the God of Israel .
text2: Nuna iisar chichachusha chichainiakui , tsupirkamusha pénker ajainiakui , shutuapsha pénker wekainiakui , kusurusha Wáinmainiakui , ti shiir Enentáimprarmiayi . Yus ni aentsrin Israeran Yáinmatai shiir yuminsarmiayi .

text: Then Jesus called his disciples unto him , and said , I have compassion on the multitude , because they continue with me now three days , and have nothing to eat : and I will not send them away fasting , lest they faint in the way .
text2: Nuyá Jesus ni unuiniamurin untsukar tiarmiayi " Ju aentsun waitnentainiajai . Warí , menaintiu tsawant Wijiai yurumtsuk yujainiatsuk . Ayurtsuk ni jeen akupkachminiaitjai . Jintiá pimpiki Wáitsartatui . "

text: And his disciples say unto him , Whence should we have so much bread in the wilderness , as to fill so great a multitude ?
text2: Ni unuiniamuri tiarmiayi " Túrasha , Uunta , ṡshuar atsaasha tuyan yurumak Imiá sumaktaj ~ i ju aents ayurawartincha ? "

text: And Jesus saith unto them , How many loaves have ye ? And they said , Seven , and a few little fishes .
text2: Jesus aniasarmiayi " ṡUrutma tanta takakrum ? " Tutai niisha " Siati ( 7 ) tanta Nuyá ishichik namak takakji " tiarmiayi .

text: And he commanded the multitude to sit down on the ground .
text2: Nuyá aents Nunká pujusarti tusa akupkamiayi .

text: And he took the seven loaves and the fishes , and gave thanks , and brake them , and gave to his disciples , and the disciples to the multitude .
text2: Tura siati tantan achik namaknasha achik Nuyá Yúsan yuminsamiayi . Tura puur aents ayuratarum tusa ni unuiniamurin susamiayi .

text: And they did all eat , and were filled : and they took up of the broken meat that was left seven baskets full .
text2: Ashí Yurumáwar jémararmiayi . Tura puunaru siati chankin Tiármiayi .

text: And they that did eat were four thousand men , beside women and children .
text2: Tura nui Yurumáwaruka nuwasha uchisha nekapmatsuk aya aishmankak kuatru mir ( 4000 ) ármiayi .

text: And he sent away the multitude , and took ship , and came into the coasts of Magdala ,
text2: Nuyá Jesus aentsun akupak kanunam enkemar Maktara nunkanam wémiayi .

text: The Pharisees also with the Sadducees came , and tempting desired him that he would shew them a sign from heaven .
text2: Pariséusha tura Satuséusha Jesusan nekapsatai tusar tariarmiayi . Túrawar " Ame Yúsaiyaitkiumka kakarmarmijiai nayaimpinnmaya iniakmasta , iisha Wáinkiatai , " tiarmiayi .

text: He answered and said unto them , When it is evening , ye say , It will be fair weather : for the sky is red .
text2: Tutai Jesus Tímiayi " Atumka " Kapaaku péetar Kíntiamkui kashin esatrurtatui " Tíniuitrume .

text: And in the morning , It will be foul weather to day : for the sky is red and lowring . O ye hypocrites , ye can discern the face of the sky ; but can ye not discern the signs of the times ?
text2: Túrasha " Te ajas kapaaku péetar tsawaakui yumi yajauch átatui " Tíniuitrume . Tura nekasaiti . Maa , átumka nayaim iisrum ju nunkanam Túrunattana nu nékarme . Antsu Yus Yamái Jú nunkanam tura nuka nékatsrume . Antraitrume .

text: A wicked and adulterous generation seeketh after a sign ; and there shall no sign be given unto it , but the sign of the prophet Jonas . And he left them , and departed .
text2: Aents yajauch ásar tura Yusan Enentáimtachu ásar kakarmajai iniakmamun wakeruiniawai . Túrasha áyatik Junas Túrunamia nuke iniakmastiniaiti " Tímiayi . Tinia ikiuak wémiayi .

text: And when his disciples were come to the other side , they had forgotten to take bread .
text2: Tura Entsá amaini katinkiar ni unuiniamuri tantan Júkitniun kajinmatkiarmiayi .

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Take heed and beware of the leaven of the Pharisees and of the Sadducees .
text2: Nuyá Jesus Tímiayi " Wáinkiatarum , Pariséusha Satuséusha wakaprutai takakainia Nújaisha aneartarum . "

text: And they reasoned among themselves , saying , It is because we have taken no bread .
text2: Tutai ni unuiniamuri tiarmiayi " Ii tanta itiachakrin Tátsuk . "

text: Which when Jesus perceived , he said unto them , O ye of little faith , why reason ye among yourselves , because ye have brought no bread ?
text2: Jesus nuna antuk Tímiayi " ṡUrukamtai tanta itiachji tunaiyarum . Yusa kakarmari kajinmatkintrumek .

text: Do ye not yet understand , neither remember the five loaves of the five thousand , and how many baskets ye took up ?
text2: Senku tantajai Túramiaj nu kajinmatkintrumek . Senku mir ( 5000 ) aishmankan ayuramtai Untsurí chankin Tiármia nu Enentáimtsurmek .

text: Neither the seven loaves of the four thousand , and how many baskets ye took up ?
text2: Tura siati tantajai kuatru mir ( 4000 ) aishmankan ayuramtai nuna ishichik chankin Tiármia nu kajinmatkintrumek .

text: How is it that ye do not understand that I spake it not to you concerning bread , that ye should beware of the leaven of the Pharisees and of the Sadducees ?
text2: Itiurak Imiá nékatsrum ? Wi Pariséu wakaprutairisha Satuséu wakaprutairisha aneartarum Tákun penké tantan Tátsujai " Tímiayi .

text: Then understood they how that he bade them not beware of the leaven of bread , but of the doctrine of the Pharisees and of the Sadducees .
text2: Nuna Jesus takui ni unuiniamurisha nekaawarmiayi . Penké tantaa wakaprutairin Tíchamiayi antsu Pariséusha Satuséusha unuiniatairin Tímiayi .

text: When Jesus came into the coasts of Caesarea Philippi , he asked his disciples , saying , Whom do men say that I the Son of man am ?
text2: Tura Sesaria - jiripiunam jeawar Jesus ni unuiniamurin aniasarmiayi " Aents Ajasuitjiana juna ṡyaiti turutainiawa Winia ? "

text: And they said , Some say that thou art John the Baptist : some , Elias ; and others , Jeremias , or one of the prophets .
text2: Niisha ayak tiarmiayi " Chíkich , imiakratin Juánkaiti turamainiawai . Chíkichka , Eríasaiti turamainiawai . Chikichcha Jeremíasaiti , chikichcha Chíkich aents Yúsnan etserniuiti turamainiawai " tiarmiayi .

text: He saith unto them , But whom say ye that I am ?
text2: Tutai nincha aniiniak " ṡAtumsha yaiti Túrutrum ? " Tímiayi .

text: And Simon Peter answered and said , Thou art the Christ , the Son of the living God .
text2: Semun Pítrusha " Ametme Kristu , Yus Anaikiamu . Nekas iwiaaku Yusa Uchirínme " Tímiayi .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto him , Blessed art thou , Simon Barjona : for flesh and blood hath not revealed it unto thee , but my Father which is in heaven .
text2: Tutai Jesus Tímiayi " Shiiraitme Junasa Uchirí Semunka . Núnaka aents ujatmakchaiti antsu winia Apar nayaimpiniam pujana nu ujatmakmatai nekaam tame .

text: And I say also unto thee , That thou art Peter , and upon this rock I will build my church ; and the gates of hell shall not prevail against it .
text2: Tura Wisha Tájame , ame Pítruitme , kayach Tútaim . Nu kayanam jea jeamtinia aintsan Yus - shuaran ekenin tsakatmartatjai . Túramtai Jákatniusha tura Yusa nemasrisha nu jeamman pukukchattawai .

text: And I will give unto thee the keys of the kingdom of heaven : and whatsoever thou shalt bind on earth shall be bound in heaven : and whatsoever thou shalt loose on earth shall be loosed in heaven .
text2: Yus akupeamu yawincha amastatjai . Ju nunkanam jinkiatniusha Atíatniusha amasmaiti . Tuma asamtai ame ju nunkanam suritiam nu nayaimpinmasha suritniaktatui . Tura ju nunkanam tsankateam nu nayaimpinmasha tsankatnaktatui " Tímiayi .

text: Then charged he his disciples that they should tell no man that he was Jesus the Christ .
text2: Nuna tinia Jesus ni unuiniamurin Krístuitiaj nu etserkairap tinia akupkarmiayi .

text: From that time forth began Jesus to shew unto his disciples , how that he must go unto Jerusalem , and suffer many things of the elders and chief priests and scribes , and be killed , and be raised again the third day .
text2: Nuyá Jesus juna unuiniatan nankammiayi . " Wi Jerusarénnum wétiniaitjai . Nui Israer - shuara uuntrisha , Israer - patri uuntrisha , Israer - shuara jintinniurisha ti Wáitkiarsartatui . Nuyá mantuawartatui Túrasha Menaintiú tsawantai nantaktiatjai . "

text: Then Peter took him , and began to rebuke him , saying , Be it far from thee , Lord : this shall not be unto thee .
text2: Takui Pítiur arantach Jukí chicharuk Tímiayi " Uunta , nuka penké áchatniuiti . Aminkia Túrutmacharminiaiti . "

text: But he turned , and said unto Peter , Get thee behind me , Satan : thou art an offence unto me : for thou savourest not the things that be of God , but those that be of men .
text2: Jesus ayanmatar Pítrun Tímiayi " Werumta , Satanása . Yajauch awajtame . Ameka Yus wakeramu Enentáimtsume . Antsu Jú nunkanam Enentáimainia ainis Enentáimme . "

text: Then said Jesus unto his disciples , If any man will come after me , let him deny himself , and take up his cross , and follow me .
text2: Nuyá Jesus Ashí ni unuiniamurin Tímiayi " Shuar Winia nemartustaj tusa wakerakka ni wakeramurin iniais ni krusi yanaki Winia nemartusti .

text: For whosoever will save his life shall lose it : and whosoever will lose his life for my sake shall find it .
text2: Shuar áyatik pénker pujustaj Tákunka nu shuar uwemtsuk jakattawai . Antsu Jákatniuitkuisha pénker pujustinian Enentáimtsuna Nú shuar nekas iwiaakman wainkiattawai .

text: For what is a man profited , if he shall gain the whole world , and lose his own soul ? or what shall a man give in exchange for his soul ?
text2: Wats , shuar Ashí Jú nunkanam írunna nuna sumakka tura nujai ni wakani émeseak ṡitiurak pénker pujustin ? Shuara Wakaní emesramu ṡAshí Jú nunkanam írunna nujai iwiaramniakait ?

text: For the Son of man shall come in the glory of his Father with his angels ; and then he shall reward every man according to his works .
text2: Wi Aents Ajasu asan , winia Aparu kakarmarijiai tura ni suntarijiai tana Ashí Shuáran ni takasmajai métek akiktatjai .

text: Verily I say unto you , There be some standing here , which shall not taste of death , till they see the Son of man coming in his kingdom .
text2: Paant Tájarme , shuar jui wajainia ju Játsuk Wi akupin ajasmatai Wáitkiartatui " Tímiayi .

text: And after six days Jesus taketh Peter , James , and John his brother , and bringeth them up into an high mountain apart ,
text2: Nuyá sais ( 6 ) tsawant nankaamasar Pítruncha , Jakupuncha , tura ni yachi Juannasha Níniak Júkiar Jesus Náinnium Yakí wakamiayi .

text: And was transfigured before them : and his face did shine as the sun , and his raiment was white as the light .
text2: Nui Jesus Nusháa iira ajattsarmiayi . Ni yapisha etsaya ainis wincha ajasmiayi . Ni pushirisha ti puju jiitsumir ajasmiayi .

text: And , behold , there appeared unto them Moses and Elias talking with him .
text2: Nuisha Muisaisnasha Eríasnasha Jesusjai chichainian Wáinkiarmiayi .

text: Then answered Peter , and said unto Jesus , Lord , it is good for us to be here : if thou wilt , let us make here three tabernacles ; one for thee , and one for Moses , and one for Elias .
text2: Nuyá Pítiur Jesusan Tímiayi " Uunta , ti shiir pujaji jui . Wakerakminkia menaint aakmaktai , Aminiu chikichik tura Chíkich Muisaisnasha , tura chikichcha Eríasna . "

text: While he yet spake , behold , a bright cloud overshadowed them : and behold a voice out of the cloud , which said , This is my beloved Son , in whom I am well pleased ; hear ye him .
text2: Tura Pítiur tu auju Wajái yurankim ti puju amuamiayi . Tura nu yuranminmaya chichaman antukarmiayi . " Juka winia aneamu Uchiruiti , Tímiayi . Niin ti shiir Enentáimtajai . Nii pénker anturkatarum " Tímiayi . Tu chichasmiayi Yus .

text: And when the disciples heard it , they fell on their face , and were sore afraid .
text2: Nuna ni unuiniamuri antukar ti ashamkar Pákea ajakiarmiayi .

text: And Jesus came and touched them , and said , Arise , and be not afraid .
text2: Túrunawarmatai Jesus Táriar antin " Ashamkairap , nantaktiarum " tiarmiayi .

text: And when they had lifted up their eyes , they saw no man , save Jesus only .
text2: Tura pankainiar iimiaj Tukamá aya Jesusan Wáinkiarmiayi .

text: And as they came down from the mountain , Jesus charged them , saying , Tell the vision to no man , until the Son of man be risen again from the dead .
text2: Nuyá Náinniumia akainiak Jesus tiarmiayi " Atum iisurmena nu penké etserkairap . Wi Aents Ajasu asan jakamunmaya nantaatsain etserkairap ' Tímiayi .

text: And his disciples asked him , saying , Why then say the scribes that Elias must first come ?
text2: Nuyá ni unuiniamuri Jesusan aniiniak " ṡUrukamtai iin jintintramin " Kristu Táatsain Erías emka Tátiniaiti " tuinia ? " tiarmiayi .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , Elias truly shall first come , and restore all things .
text2: Tuíniakui Jesus aikmiayi " Nekas Erías Tátiniaiti . Tura nii mash iwiarattawai .

text: But I say unto you , That Elias is come already , and they knew him not , but have done unto him whatsoever they listed . Likewise shall also the Son of man suffer of them .
text2: Kame nekas Erías Táwiti tura niin nekaacharmai . Antsu aents wakeriarmia nuna Túrawar yajauch awajsarmiayi . Núnisan Winiasha , Aents Ajasu ain , Wáitkiarsartatui . "

text: Then the disciples understood that he spake unto them of John the Baptist .
text2: Nuna takui ni unuiniamuri imiakratin Juánkan áujmatui , tu Enentáimprarmiayi .

text: And when they were come to the multitude , there came to him a certain man , kneeling down to him , and saying ,
text2: Ataksha aents matsatmanum jeawarmatai shuar Jesusan Tarí tikishmatramiayi .

text: Lord , have mercy on my son : for he is lunatick , and sore vexed : for ofttimes he falleth into the fire , and oft into the water .
text2: Tura Tímiayi " Uuntá , winia uchir waitnentrutrata . Wainchi tukum ti Wáitniuiti . Jiniumsha patamniuiti . Entsasha iniainaiti .

text: And I brought him to thy disciples , and they could not cure him .
text2: Ame unuiniamurmincha itiarjiai Túrasha tujinkiarai . "

text: Then Jesus answered and said , O faithless and perverse generation , how long shall I be with you ? how long shall I suffer you ? bring him hither to me .
text2: Takui Jesus Ashí Tímiayi " Maa , Yus penké Enentáimtichuitrume . Imiá úmichuitrume . ṡWi atumin katsuntu ajatniukaitjiarum ? Wats , uchi itiartitiarum " Tímiayi .

text: And Jesus rebuked the devil ; and he departed out of him : and the child was cured from that very hour .
text2: Itiarim Jesus yajauch wakanin jiiki akupkamiayi Uchí Ayashínia . Túramtai nu chichamaik pénker ajasmiayi .

text: Then came the disciples to Jesus apart , and said , Why could not we cast him out ?
text2: Nuyá urum ni unuiniamuri Jesusjai ninki pujusar áujmatainiak " ṡUrukamtai yajauch wakan Jíiktin iikia tujinkiamaj ~ i ? " tiarmiayi .

text: And Jesus said unto them , Because of your unbelief : for verily I say unto you , If ye have faith as a grain of mustard seed , ye shall say unto this mountain , Remove hence to yonder place ; and it shall remove ; and nothing shall be impossible unto you .
text2: Tuíniakui Jesus tiarmiayi " Yus nekas Enentáimtachu asarum tujinkiarme . Túmaitiat nekasaiti mustasa Jinkiái Timiá uchichitiat ti uunt tsakaatsuk . Núnisan Yus ishichkisha Enentáimtakrumka nu naint ékemkata tutai nu naint Túrunattawai . Penké tujinkiashtatrume Yus nekas Enentáimtakrumka .

text: Howbeit this kind goeth not out but by prayer and fasting .
text2: Kame nu yajauch wakan jiiki akupkatniuka ijiarmam Yus áujsatniuiti . "

text: And while they abode in Galilee , Jesus said unto them , The Son of man shall be betrayed into the hands of men :
text2: Jesus ni unuiniamurijiai Kariréa nunkanam wekas juna ujakarmiayi . " Wi Aents Ajasu asan , aentsnum surunkattajai tura mantamnattajai .

text: And they shall kill him , and the third day he shall be raised again . And they were exceeding sorry .
text2: Túrutawarmatai Menaintiú tsawantai nantaktiatjai . " Tura ni unuiniamuri nuna antukar ti Kúntuts Enentáimprarmiayi .

text: And when they were come to Capernaum , they that received tribute money came to Peter , and said , Doth not your master pay tribute ?
text2: Jesus ni unuiniamurijiai Kapernáum péprunam jeawarmiayi . Tura Kuítian achin Pítrun tariar aniasarmiayi " ṡAtumi uuntri Israer - patrin akiktinia nuna Akínkiait ? "

text: He saith , Yes . And when he was come into the house , Jesus prevented him , saying , What thinkest thou , Simon ? of whom do the kings of the earth take custom or tribute ? of their own children , or of strangers ?
text2: Tutai Pítiur " Ee " Tímiayi . Tura Pítiur Jeá Wayá chichaatsain Jesus emka Tímiayi " Chíkich nunkanmaya akupin ṡyana Kuítrijiain takainia . Ni Shuáriniunkek atantainia . Antsu yajaya Shuárnan atantainiatsuk . Nekaschak , Semunká ? "

text: Peter saith unto him , Of strangers . Jesus saith unto him , Then are the children free .
text2: Tutai Pítiur " Nekas yajaya Shuárnan atantainiawai " Tímiayi . Jesus Tímiayi " Nuikia ni shuari ankant ainiawai . Iisha Núnisrik nu akiktin ankantaitji .

text: Notwithstanding , lest we should offend them , go thou to the sea , and cast an hook , and take up the fish that first cometh up ; and when thou hast opened his mouth , thou shalt find a piece of money : that take , and give unto them for me and thee .
text2: Túrasha itiurchat Enentáimprarain tusar akiktai . Ame tsau jukim Entsá Wetá . Túram emka namak japikim iwiankam nui kuit Wáinkiattame . Nu jukim Wíniasha áminiusha akikmakta . "

text: At the same time came the disciples unto Jesus , saying , Who is the greatest in the kingdom of heaven ?
text2: Nu tsawantai ni unuiniamuri tariar Jesusan aniasarmiayi " Yus akupeamunam pachiinia nu ṡya Imiá nankaamantu áminiait ? "

text: And Jesus called a little child unto him , and set him in the midst of them ,
text2: Nuna Tuíniakui Jesus uchin untsuk ajapen awajtusar

text: And said , Verily I say unto you , Except ye be converted , and become as little children , ye shall not enter into the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Tímiayi " Tí nekasan Tájarme , Atumí Enentáimtairi yapajiarum uchia ainis ajachkurmeka Yus akupeamunam pachiinkiachminiaitrume .

text: Whosoever therefore shall humble himself as this little child , the same is greatest in the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Nu asamtai ju uchia ainis péejchach Enentáimtumana nuka Yus akupeana nui nekas nankaamantu ajasminiaiti .

text: And whoso shall receive one such little child in my name receiveth me .
text2: Nú arantcha Winia anentuk uchin itiaana Nú shuar Winiasha itiaareawai ' Tímiayi .

text: But whoso shall offend one of these little ones which believe in me , it were better for him that a millstone were hanged about his neck , and that he were drowned in the depth of the sea .
text2: ` Shuar ju uchin Winia umirtana nuna tunaanum ajuarmatainkia nuna Túratsain niisha kuntujén kayajai jinkiar nayaantsanam ajapen kunanam ajunmaitkiunka maak ainti , Tímiayi .

text: Woe unto the world because of offences ! for it must needs be that offences come ; but woe to that man by whom the offence cometh !
text2: Ju nunkanam Tunáa iniaatai írunuk tuke itiurchataiti . Antsu shuar chikichan tunaanum ajuarka ti itiurchatan inkiuntatui ' Tímiayi .

text: Wherefore if thy hand or thy foot offend thee , cut them off , and cast them from thee : it is better for thee to enter into life halt or maimed , rather than having two hands or two feet to be cast into everlasting fire .
text2: ` Nu asamtai ame uwejem tura nawem tunaanum ajunmatniuitkiuinkia tsupikiam ajapata . Kame muntuch pujustin tura ukunam nayaimpiniam wétin pénkeraiti . Antsu kajinkiashtin jinium takamtsuk jeatniuka Imiá yajauchiiti .

text: And if thine eye offend thee , pluck it out , and cast it from thee : it is better for thee to enter into life with one eye , rather than having two eyes to be cast into hell fire .
text2: Núnisan ame jiimi tunaanum ajunmatniuitkiuinkia ukuinkiam ajapata . Kame chikichik jiijiai pujusam nayaimpiniam wétin pénkeraiti . Antsu jinium mai Jíintiuk wétin Imiá yajauchiiti ' Tímiayi .

text: Take heed that ye despise not one of these little ones ; for I say unto you , That in heaven their angels do always behold the face of my Father which is in heaven .
text2: ` Uchi ainia nu nakitrairap . Yusa suntari niin Wáinkiatniua nu winia Aparui Tíjiuch pujuiniawai .

text: For the Son of man is come to save that which was lost .
text2: Kame wi Aents Ajasu asan , menkaakarun eaktajtsan Táwitjai . '

text: How think ye ? if a man have an hundred sheep , and one of them be gone astray , doth he not leave the ninety and nine , and goeth into the mountains , and seeketh that which is gone astray ?
text2: ` Enentáimpratarum . Shuar sian ( 100 ) murikiun takakuitiat chikichik menkakamtai Untsurí menkakacharun Náinnium matsaak ~ u menkakan eaushtatuak .

text: And if so be that he find it , verily I say unto you , he rejoiceth more of that sheep , than of the ninety and nine which went not astray .
text2: Wáinkiasha Untsurí menkakacharua nujai nankaamas waraschattawak .

text: Even so it is not the will of your Father which is in heaven , that one of these little ones should perish .
text2: Núnisan atumi Aparí nayaimpiniam pujana nu , nu uchi chikichkisha menkakacharti tawai ' Tímiayi .

text: Moreover if thy brother shall trespass against thee , go and tell him his fault between thee and him alone : if he shall hear thee , thou hast gained thy brother .
text2: ` Chikich Yus - shuar ámin yajauch Túrutmakuinkia nii werim áujsata . Tura ámechik werim ame yatsumjai chichasta . Anturtamkuinkia ame Yátsum Yáinkiume .

text: But if he will not hear thee , then take with thee one or two more , that in the mouth of two or three witnesses every word may be established .
text2: Tura anturtamchakuinkia Nuyá chikichik shuar Jimiará shuarsha jukim ataksha weritia . Túram ataksha áujnaisatarum , niisha paant nekaawarat tusam .

text: And if he shall neglect to hear them , tell it unto the church : but if he neglect to hear the church , let him be unto thee as an heathen man and a publican .
text2: Túrasha yatsum tuke ántachkuinkia Yus - shuar iruntainiam iwiainiakta . Túrasha yatsum tuke ántachkuinkia Yus - shuarcha Núnisan Enentáimtusta nu shuar . '

text: Verily I say unto you , Whatsoever ye shall bind on earth shall be bound in heaven : and whatsoever ye shall loose on earth shall be loosed in heaven .
text2: ` Nekasan Tájarme , ju nunkanam suritiam nu nayaimpinmasha suritniaktatui . Tura ju nunkanam tsankateam nu nayaimpinmasha tsankatnaktatui . '

text: Again I say unto you , That if two of you shall agree on earth as touching any thing that they shall ask , it shall be done for them of my Father which is in heaven .
text2: ` Núnisnak Tájarme , ju nunkanam pujusrum Jimiará Yus - shuartiram métek Enentáimprarum winia Apar nayaimpiniam pujana nu seakrumninkia wakerarmena nuna suramsattarme .

text: For where two or three are gathered together in my name , there am I in the midst of them .
text2: Jímiar menaintiusha Yus - shuar Winia Enentáimturuk iruntrarmatai Wisha nui niijiai pujajai " Tímiayi Jesus .

text: Then came Peter to him , and said , Lord , how oft shall my brother sin against me , and I forgive him ? till seven times ?
text2: Takui Pítiur Werí Jesusan aniasmiayi " Uuntá , winia yatsur yajauch awajtakui ṡurutma tsankuratniuitiaj . Siátikik tsankuratniuitiaj ? "

text: Jesus saith unto him , I say not unto thee , Until seven times : but , Until seventy times seven .
text2: Jesus aiyak " Siátik Tátsujme , antsu iniannatsuk tsankuratniuitme " Tímiayi .

text: Therefore is the kingdom of heaven likened unto a certain king , which would take account of his servants .
text2: Tuma asa Jesus Yus akupeamunam pachiinkiaru tsankurnairartiniaiti tusa ju métek - taku chichaman áujmatuk Tímiayi , " Uunt akupin takarin tumashin akirkarat tusa untsukarmai .

text: And when he had begun to reckon , one was brought unto him , which owed him ten thousand talents .
text2: Yama Nánkamuk Tí nukap tumashmakua nuna untsukmai . Akikmakchamnia ti tumashmakuyi .

text: But forasmuch as he had not to pay , his lord commanded him to be sold , and his wife , and children , and all that he had , and payment to be made .
text2: Tura nu takakmau kuitri atsakui uunt akupin " Yajasma aitkiasrum nuartiuk uchirtiuk Ashí waririntiuk suruktarum , timiai . Nu kuitjai akirkati " timiai .

text: The servant therefore fell down , and worshipped him , saying , Lord , have patience with me , and I will pay thee all .
text2: Tutai nu takakmau uunt akupniun tikishmatar seak timiai " Uunta , waitneasam Nákarsatá . Auka , mash akiktatjame . "

text: Then the lord of that servant was moved with compassion , and loosed him , and forgave him the debt .
text2: Uunt akupin waitnentar mash tsankur ankant akupkamai .
