text: But the same servant went out , and found one of his fellowservants , which owed him an hundred pence : and he laid hands on him , and took him by the throat , saying , Pay me that thou owest .
text2: Tura Nú chichamaik Nú takakmau jiinki ni ain inkiunmai . Nú aisha niin ishichik tumashiiyi . Tura tsékenki suwenam achik chicharuk timiai " Wari akirkata tumashitmena nu . "

text: And his fellowservant fell down at his feet , and besought him , saying , Have patience with me , and I will pay thee all .
text2: Tura ni ai niin tikishmatar timiai " Waitneasam Nákarsatá . Auka , mash akiktatjame " timiai .

text: And he would not : but went and cast him into prison , till he should pay the debt .
text2: Túrasha nakitramai . Antsu tsankurtsuk sepunam enkeamai Ashí Akírkatí tusa .

text: So when his fellowservants saw what was done , they were very sorry , and came and told unto their lord all that was done .
text2: Chíkich takakmau nuna Wáinkiar ti Kúntuts Enentáimtuiniak uunt akupniun Ashí etsertukarmai .

text: Then his lord , after that he had called him , said unto him , O thou wicked servant , I forgave thee all that debt , because thou desiredst me :
text2: Nuna antuk uunt akupin untsuk Itiá timiai " Yajauchiitme . ṡWinia " waitnentrurta " Túrutkumin tsankurachmakjam ?

text: Shouldest not thou also have had compassion on thy fellowservant , even as I had pity on thee ?
text2: Amesha Núnismek ame aim tsankuratniuitme " timiai .

text: And his lord was wroth , and delivered him to the tormentors , till he should pay all that was due unto him .
text2: Tinia uunt akupin kajekmai . Tura Ashí tumashin akikmatsuk asutniati tusa suntarnum surukmai . "

text: So likewise shall my heavenly Father do also unto you , if ye from your hearts forgive not every one his brother their trespasses .
text2: Jesus nuna áujmatas Amúak Tímiayi " Núnisan winia Apar nayaimpiniam pujana nu atumin Túrutmattarme atumi yachi nekas Enentáijiai tsankureachkurminkia . "

text: And it came to pass , that when Jesus had finished these sayings , he departed from Galilee , and came into the coasts of Judaea beyond Jordan ;
text2: Jesus nuna tinia ikiuak Kariréa nunkanmaya wémiayi . Tura Jurtan entsa amain Jutía nunkanam jeamiayi .

text: And great multitudes followed him ; and he healed them there .
text2: Untsurí aents nemariarmiayi tura Jáiniancha pénker awajsamiayi .

text: The Pharisees also came unto him , tempting him , and saying unto him , Is it lawful for a man to put away his wife for every cause ?
text2: Nui Pariséu Jesusan nekapsataj tusar aniasarmiayi " ṡShuar ni nuwen itiurchat akui ajapamniakait ? "

text: And he answered and said unto them , Have ye not read , that he which made them at the beginning made them male and female ,
text2: Tutai Jesus Tímiayi " ṡAtumka Yus - Papí áujsachukaitrum ? Yámankamtaik Yuska Shuáran aishmankan nuwancha najanamiayi tawai .

text: And said , For this cause shall a man leave father and mother , and shall cleave to his wife : and they twain shall be one flesh ?
text2: Tuma asamtai aishman ni Aparín ni Nukurín ikiuki ni nuwejai tsanin chikichik ayashtinia ainis ajasartatui , tu aarmaiti , Tímiayi .

text: Wherefore they are no more twain , but one flesh . What therefore God hath joined together , let not man put asunder .
text2: Tuma asa Jímiarcha antsu chikichik ayash ainiawai . Tuma asamtai shuar Yus apatkamia nuna , aents akankashtiniaiti ' Tímiayi .

text: They say unto him , Why did Moses then command to give a writing of divorcement , and to put her away ?
text2: Takui tiarmiayi " Nuikia ṡurukamtai Papí aarar nuwa ajapatniun Muisais tsankatkamia ? "

text: He saith unto them , Moses because of the hardness of your hearts suffered you to put away your wives : but from the beginning it was not so .
text2: Tutai Jesus tiarmiayi " Timiá ántichu asakrumin nuwa ajapatniun tsankatkamiayi . Túrasha émkaka Núnischauyayi .

text: And I say unto you , Whosoever shall put away his wife , except it be for fornication , and shall marry another , committeth adultery : and whoso marrieth her which is put away doth commit adultery .
text2: Wi Tájarme , shuar ni nuwen Chíkichjai pujuschan ajapeakka tura chikichan nuatkunka tsanirmayi . Chíkich aishmansha nuwa ajapamun Nuátkanka nusha tsanirmayi " Tímiayi .

text: His disciples say unto him , If the case of the man be so with his wife , it is not good to marry .
text2: Takui ni unuiniamuri tiarmiayi " Nuikia aishman ni nuwé penké ikiukchamniaitkiuinkia Nuátkachminiaiti . "

text: But he said unto them , All men cannot receive this saying , save they to whom it is given .
text2: Jesus tiarmiayi " Nu chichamnaka mash antukchamin ainiawai . Antsu Yus nuna umiktin susamua nuke antukmin ainiawai .

text: For there are some eunuchs , which were so born from their mother ' s womb : and there are some eunuchs , which were made eunuchs of men : and there be eunuchs , which have made themselves eunuchs for the kingdom of heaven ' s sake . He that is able to receive it , let him receive it .
text2: Chíkich Chíkich nuatkachmin ainiawai . Chíkich Nuátkachmin akiiniawaru ainiawai . Chikichcha aentsjai Nuátkachmin najanaru ainiawai . Chikichcha Nuátainiatsui Yus akupeamu takatan takastinian . Juna antuktinian Jeáka antukti . "

text: Then were there brought unto him little children , that he should put his hands on them , and pray : and the disciples rebuked them .
text2: Nuyá Jesusan uchin itiariarmiayi . Niin antin Yúsan áujtusarat tusar wakeriarmiayi . Túruiniakui ni unuiniamuri chicharkarmiayi .

text: But Jesus said , Suffer little children , and forbid them not , to come unto me : for of such is the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Túruiniakui Jesus Tímiayi " Uchi Winí winitin tsankatkatarum . Suritkiairap . Kame ju uchia aintsan péejchach ainian nunak Yus akupkamniaiti . "

text: And he laid his hands on them , and departed thence .
text2: Tinia uchin miniakas Nuyá wémiayi .

text: And , behold , one came and said unto him , Good Master , what good thing shall I do , that I may have eternal life ?
text2: Shuar natsa Jesusan tarin aniasmiayi " Uuntá , pénkeraitme . Tuma asam turuttia ṡwarinia Túrakna tuke iwiaaku átataj ? ' Tímiayi .

text: And he said unto him , Why callest thou me good ? there is none good but one , that is , God : but if thou wilt enter into life , keep the commandments .
text2: Tutai Jesus niin Enentáimtikrataj tusa Tímiayi " ṡUrukamtai pénkeraitme Túrutam . Shuar pénkerka atsatsuk . Aya Yúskechukait ? Wats , tuke iwiaaku pujustaj Tákumka akupkamu Umírkartá . "

text: He saith unto him , Which ? Jesus said , Thou shalt do no murder , Thou shalt not commit adultery , Thou shalt not steal , Thou shalt not bear false witness ,
text2: Tutai shuar " ṡTuna nekas umirkatniuitiaj ? " Tímiayi . Takui Jesus Tímiayi " Mankartuawaip , tsanirmawaip , Kasámkáip , Chíkich shuar tsanumpruraip ,

text: Honour thy father and thy mother : and , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: ame apa nukusha Umírkatá , ame Shuárum ame ayashim aneamna Nútiksamek aneeta . "

text: The young man saith unto him , All these things have I kept from my youth up : what lack I yet ?
text2: Tutai natsa Tímiayi " Núnaka úchichik mash umiki tsakaruitjai . Nuyasha ṡWarí Táatrusa ? " Tímiayi .

text: Jesus said unto him , If thou wilt be perfect , go and sell that thou hast , and give to the poor , and thou shalt have treasure in heaven : and come and follow me .
text2: Takui Jesus Tímiayi " Nekas pénker átaj Tákumka , weme ame Kuítrum Kuítrincha ainia nu Súsartá . Tura nayaimpiniam Kuítrintin ajastatme . Nuyá Winia Nemártústá " Tímiayi Jesus .

text: But when the young man heard that saying , he went away sorrowful : for he had great possessions .
text2: Tura natsa nuna antuk Kúntuts wémiayi ti Kuítrintin asa .

text: Then said Jesus unto his disciples , Verily I say unto you , That a rich man shall hardly enter into the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Nuyá Jesus ni unuiniamurin tiarmiayi " Nekasan Tájarme , Kuítrintin Yus akupeamunam pachiinkiatin ti itiurchataiti .

text: And again I say unto you , It is easier for a camel to go through the eye of a needle , than for a rich man to enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: Ataksha Tájarme , kamiriuka Kawái nankaamas uunt asa auja jiin wayachminiaiti . Núnisan Kuítrintin Yus akupeamunam pachiinkiatin ti itiurchataiti . "

text: When his disciples heard it , they were exceedingly amazed , saying , Who then can be saved ?
text2: Ni unuiniamuri nuna antukar Antúu ajarmiayi . Túrawar aniniainiarmiayi " ṡNuikia yaki uwempramniait ? "

text: But Jesus beheld them , and said unto them , With men this is impossible ; but with God all things are possible .
text2: Tuíniakui Jesus Ashí iisar Tímiayi " Aents uwempratniun nekas tujintiainiawai antsu Yuska Ashí tujintiatsui . "

text: Then answered Peter and said unto him , Behold , we have forsaken all , and followed thee ; what shall we have therefore ?
text2: Nuyá Pítiur Tímiayi " Uuntá , iikia Ashí ikiukchajik Amin nemarsatai tusar . ṡWarin Wáinkiattaj ~ i iisha ? "

text: And Jesus said unto them , Verily I say unto you , That ye which have followed me , in the regeneration when the Son of man shall sit in the throne of his glory , ye also shall sit upon twelve thrones , judging the twelve tribes of Israel .
text2: Jesus Tímiayi " Nekasan Tájame , ukunmanka ju nunka yamaram ajastatui . Aents Ajasu asan , Wisha nui , uunt akupin ajastatjai tura atumsha winia nemartusutirmeka Wijiai métek akupin ajastatrume Ashí Israer - shuar akupkatin .

text: And every one that hath forsaken houses , or brethren , or sisters , or father , or mother , or wife , or children , or lands , for my name ' s sake , shall receive an hundredfold , and shall inherit everlasting life .
text2: Tura shuar ni jeencha , yachincha , umaincha , Aparíncha , Nukuríncha , Nuaríncha , Uchiríncha , tura nunkencha Winia anentu asa ikiukin wekaakka , nu shuar nii ikiukmia Núnisan yamaisha ti Untsurí Wáinkiattawai tura ukunmasha tuke shiir pujustatui Yusjai .

text: But many that are first shall be last ; and the last shall be first .
text2: Untsurí Yamái penkeri ainiana nu ukunam ukunmaani pujusartatui , tura Yapajiáwar Yamái ukunmaya ainiana nu ukunam emka pujusartatui ' Tímiayi Jesus .

text: For the kingdom of heaven is like unto a man that is an householder , which went out early in the morning to hire labourers into his vineyard .
text2: ` Yus akupeamunam pachiinkiatin Júnisaiti . Nunka nérentin ni araamurin Júuktaj tusa Káshik iniartaj tusa Jíinkimiayi .

text: And when he had agreed with the labourers for a penny a day , he sent them into his vineyard .
text2: Chikichík tenariu kuit jean tsawant takamtsuk akiktajrume tusa chichas ni araamun Júuktinian akupkarmiayi .

text: And he went out about the third hour , and saw others standing idle in the marketplace ,
text2: Nantu takuntaisha ataksha jiinki shuar yujan Wáiniak

text: And said unto them ; Go ye also into the vineyard , and whatsoever is right I will give you . And they went their way .
text2: timiai " Atumsha winia arakur Júuktin Yáintkiatarum . Shiir akiktajrume . " Tutai wearmai .

text: Again he went out about the sixth and ninth hour , and did likewise .
text2: Ataksha tutupin ai Nuyá Aankúsha jiinki , Núnisan tinia akupkarmai .

text: And about the eleventh hour he went out , and found others standing idle , and saith unto them , Why stand ye here all the day idle ?
text2: Ataksha nantu patamsai Jíinkimiai . Tura shuaran yujan Wáiniak " ṡUrukamtai takakmatskesha aani pujarum ? " timiai . '

text: They say unto him , Because no man hath hired us . He saith unto them , Go ye also into the vineyard ; and whatsoever is right , that shall ye receive .
text2: " Warí , iincha iniatmainiatsji " tiarmai . ' ` Tuíniakui timiai " Atumsha winia nunkarui takautarum . Pénker akiktajrume . "

text: So when even was come , the lord of the vineyard saith unto his steward , Call the labourers , and give them their hire , beginning from the last unto the first .
text2: ` Kirit Ajátekiái takatrin Wáinniun timiai " Takatan takasaru untsukam akikiarta . Kíarai nankamawaru emka akikiarta . Túram Káshik nankamawarujai Amuktá " timiai .

text: And when they came that were hired about the eleventh hour , they received every man a penny .
text2: Takui nantu patamsa ai nankamawaru wayawarmatai Chikichík tenariu kuit jean Ashí akikiarmai .

text: But when the first came , they supposed that they should have received more ; and they likewise received every man a penny .
text2: Mash umintramtai Nuyá emka nankamawaru wayawar " nuna nankaamas achikchatjiash " tu Enentáimsarmai . Tura Chikichík tenariu kuit jean achikiarmai .

text: And when they had received it , they murmured against the goodman of the house ,
text2: Achikiar nérenniun itiurchat Enentáimturarmai .

text: Saying , These last have wrought but one hour , and thou hast made them equal unto us , which have borne the burden and heat of the day .
text2: Tura tiarmai " Iikia Ashí tsawant nantujai Wáitsachjik . Ju shuarsha nantu patamsa ai nankamawaruka penké ishichik takasarai . Túrasha iijiai métek akikiarume " tiarmai .

text: But he answered one of them , and said , Friend , I do thee no wrong : didst not thou agree with me for a penny ?
text2: Tutai nérentin chikichkiniak iniakmas timiai " Umpá , penké kasartsujme . Káshik Chikichík tenariu kuit Jeá chichasar iijiai iwiarachjik , timiai .

text: Take that thine is , and go thy way : I will give unto this last , even as unto thee .
text2: Pai , ame Kuítrum achikiume . Nantu patamsai takasuncha amijiai métek akiktinian wakerajai .

text: Is it not lawful for me to do what I will with mine own ? Is thine eye evil , because I am good ?
text2: Warí , winia Kuítrujai wi wakeramun Túrachminkaitiaj . Antsu wi tsanka asamtai ṡyajauch Enentáimturmek ? " timiai . '

text: So the last shall be first , and the first last : for many be called , but few chosen .
text2: ` Núnisaiti Yus - shuarnum . émkaru ainia nu uku ártatui . Tura ukuya ainiana nu , emka ártatui . Untsurí ipiaamu ainiawai tura ishichik achikma ainiawai . " Tu áujmatsamiayi Jesus .

text: And Jesus going up to Jerusalem took the twelve disciples apart in the way , and said unto them ,
text2: Jesus Jerusarénnum Jintiá wesa ni unuiniamurin akankin tiarmiayi

text: Behold , we go up to Jerusalem ; and the Son of man shall be betrayed unto the chief priests and unto the scribes , and they shall condemn him to death ,
text2: " Iistarum , Jerusarénnum wéaji . Nuisha Israer - patri uuntrin tura ni jintinniurincha Winia surutkartatui . Nuisha , wi Aents Ajasu ain , " mantamnati " Túrutiartatui .

text: And shall deliver him to the Gentiles to mock , and to scourge , and to crucify him : and the third day he shall rise again .
text2: Tura apachnium surutkartatui . Nui katsekrukar , awattiar Krúsnum Máawarti tusar Túrutawartatui . Túrasha jakayatan Menaintiú tsawantai nantaktiatjai " Tímiayi .

text: Then came to him the mother of Zebedee ' s children with her sons , worshipping him , and desiring a certain thing of him .
text2: Nuyá Jakupusha Juansha , mai Sepetéu Uchirí , Nukuríjiai tariar Jesusan tikishmatrarmiayi . Tura Nukurí Jesusan waitnentrutrarat tusa seamiayi .

text: And he said unto her , What wilt thou ? She saith unto him , Grant that these my two sons may sit , the one on thy right hand , and the other on the left , in thy kingdom .
text2: " ṡWarí wakeram ? " Tímiayi Jesus . Tutai nuwa Tímiayi " Ame uunt akupin ajastatmena nui winia uchir chikichik untsuurnumaani chikichcha menaanmaani akupkarti tusam apujsarta . "

text: But Jesus answered and said , Ye know not what ye ask . Are ye able to drink of the cup that I shall drink of , and to be baptized with the baptism that I am baptized with ? They say unto him , We are able .
text2: Takui Jesus tiarmiayi " Atum seatrumna nu nékatsrume . ṡWi Wáitsattajna nujai métek Túramniakaitrum ? Wi Wáitsatniun Yapá umartinia ainis umartiniaitjai . Núnisan Wáitsatniujai imiaitniua aintsan imiantiniaitjai . ṡNú pininnumia umarminkiaitrum . Núnisan imianminkiaitrum ? " Tutai " Páchitskea " tiarmiayi .

text: And he saith unto them , Ye shall drink indeed of my cup , and be baptized with the baptism that I am baptized with : but to sit on my right hand , and on my left , is not mine to give , but it shall be given to them for whom it is prepared of my Father .
text2: Tuíniakui Jesus Tímiayi " Ayu . Winia pininkruiya umartatrume . Wi imiantiatjana nujai imiantiatrume . Antsu Wijiai tsaninkia pujustinniaka Wikia iischatniuitjai , antsu winia Apar iwiarturu ainia nuna nui apujsattawai " Tímiayi .

text: And when the ten heard it , they were moved with indignation against the two brethren .
text2: Chíkich tias ( 10 ) unuiniamuri nuna antukar nu Jímiaran kajerkarmiayi .

text: But Jesus called them unto him , and said , Ye know that the princes of the Gentiles exercise dominion over them , and they that are great exercise authority upon them .
text2: Túmainiakui Jesus untsukar tiarmiayi " Ju nékarme , apachniumka Kapitián ajasar ni shuarin nérenniua ainis ti akupenawai . Ni uuntrisha waantu Enentáimsar " Wíitjai akupniun " tu Enentáimtikiainiawai .

text: But it shall not be so among you : but whosoever will be great among you , let him be your minister ;
text2: Antsu atumjainkia Núnis áchatniuiti . Nankaamaku ajastaj Tákunka chikicha yaintri átiniaiti .

text: And whosoever will be chief among you , let him be your servant :
text2: Ame Kapitiántrum ajastaj Tákunka Ashí shuara yaintri Ajástí .

text: Even as the Son of man came not to be ministered unto , but to minister , and to give his life a ransom for many .
text2: Wisha Aents Ajasuitiatan , Winia Yáintkiarat tusan Táchaitjai antsu Shuáran Yáintaj tusan Táwitjai . Untsurí shuaran Tunáa tumashrin akikmatkataj tusan Jákatniuitjai . Nuna tarimjai " Tímiayi Jesus .

text: And as they departed from Jericho , a great multitude followed him .
text2: Jirikiú péprunmaya wénakui Untsurí aents Niin nemariarmiayi .

text: And , behold , two blind men sitting by the way side , when they heard that Jesus passed by , cried out , saying , Have mercy on us , O Lord , thou Son of David .
text2: Nui Jintiá yantam Jímiar jii kusuru pujuarmiayi . Jesus wéawai taman antukar kakantar untsukarmiayi . " Uuntá , uunt akupin Tawitia Uchirínchukaitiam . Waitnentrurta " tiarmiayi .

text: And the multitude rebuked them , because they should hold their peace : but they cried the more , saying , Have mercy on us , O Lord , thou Son of David .
text2: Tuíniakui " Takamatsatarum " tiarmiayi . Tútaisha Nú nankaamas untsumkarmiayi . " Uuntá , Tawitia Uchiriá , waitnentrurta " tiarmiayi .

text: And Jesus stood still , and called them , and said , What will ye that I shall do unto you ?
text2: Tuíniakui Jesus wajas jii kusurun untsukar aniasarmiayi " ṡWarí itiurtukat tusarum wakerutarum ? "

text: They say unto him , Lord , that our eyes may be opened .
text2: " Uuntá , iimtiai tusar wakeraji " tiarmiayi .

text: So Jesus had compassion on them , and touched their eyes : and immediately their eyes received sight , and they followed him .
text2: Tuíniakui Jesus niin waitnentrar ni jiin antinkiarmiayi . Nu chichamaik iimiar niisha Jesusan nemariarmiayi .

text: And when they drew nigh unto Jerusalem , and were come to Bethphage , unto the mount of Olives , then sent Jesus two disciples ,
text2: Jerusarénnum nuntumsar Petpajái péprunam jeawarmiayi . Nusha Uriwiu Náinnium ayamchiiyayi . Nui jeawar Jesus ni unuiniamurin Jímiaran akupeak Tímiayi

text: Saying unto them , Go into the village over against you , and straightway ye shall find an ass tied , and a colt with her : loose them , and bring them unto me .
text2: " Tíjiuch péprunam wérum umpuuru umpuuruchijiai jinkiamu Wáinkiattarme . Nu atiarum itartitiarum .

text: And if any man say ought unto you , ye shall say , The Lord hath need of them ; and straightway he will send them .
text2: Tura aents " Urukamtai aitkiarum " Túramkurminkia " Uunt wakerawai , tura Wárik awainkittiawai " titiarum " Tímiayi .

text: All this was done , that it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophet , saying ,
text2: Tura nusha yaunchu Yúsnan etserin aarmia nu Umínkiatí tusa Tímiayi . Júnis aarmiayi :

text: Tell ye the daughter of Sion , Behold , thy King cometh unto thee , meek , and sitting upon an ass , and a colt the foal of an ass .
text2: " Ashí Israer - shuarnum ju etserkatarum : " Iistarum , atumi Akupniuri , péejchach ajas umpuuruchiniam ekeemak winitramprume . Péejchach asa Káarak aintstai umpuuru uchirin ekeemak Winitrámtatrume , " titiarum . " Tu aarmaiti .

text: And the disciples went , and did as Jesus commanded them ,
text2: Tutai nu Jímiar unuiniamuri wear Jesus timia Núnisan Túrawarmiayi .

text: And brought the ass , and the colt , and put on them their clothes , and they set him thereon .
text2: Umpuuruchin nukurtiuk itiarmiayi . Tura ni pushirin aitkiaram Jesus entsamkamiayi .

text: And a very great multitude spread their garments in the way ; others cut down branches from the trees , and strawed them in the way .
text2: Shuar Untsurí ásar ni wéamunam pushirin aitkiarmiayi . Chikichcha Nuká jurukar ni wéamunam aeprurarmiayi .

text: And the multitudes that went before , and that followed , cried , saying , Hosanna to the Son of David : Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord ; Hosanna in the highest .
text2: Shuar Untsurí eem wearmia nusha tura uku winiarmia nusha kakantar untsumiarmiayi . " Juna weatri uunt akupin Tawit asamtai nankaamakuiti . Yusa Náariin winiana ju ii Uuntrinti . Shiir Atí . Nayaimpinmasha Yus shiir awajsatai . " Tu untsumiarmiayi .

text: And when he was come into Jerusalem , all the city was moved , saying , Who is this ?
text2: Jesus Jerusarénnum wayamtai Ashí shuar ti Enentáimainiak " ṡJusha yait ? " tiarmiayi .

text: And the multitude said , This is Jesus the prophet of Nazareth of Galilee .
text2: Chikichcha " Yúsnan etserin Jesusaiti , tiarmiayi . Nasarét pepru Kariréa nunkanmayaiti " tiarmiayi .

text: And Jesus went into the temple of God , and cast out all them that sold and bought in the temple , and overthrew the tables of the moneychangers , and the seats of them that sold doves ,
text2: Nuyá Jesus Yusa Uunt Jeen Wayá Kuítian Súruiniak tura Súmainiak pujan Akúprámiayi . Kuítian yapajinia misarincha ayanturmiayi tura yampitsa Súruinia kutankrincha Núnisan ayanturmiayi .

text: And said unto them , It is written , My house shall be called the house of prayer ; but ye have made it a den of thieves .
text2: Nuyá Tímiayi " Yus - Papinium aarchamukait , " Yusa Jeenka Yus aujtai jéaiti . " Antsu átumka kasa matsamtaiya Nútikiarme " Tímiayi .

text: And the blind and the lame came to him in the temple ; and he healed them .
text2: Nui Yusa Jeen jii kusurarusha shutuapsha Jesusan tariarmiayi . Túramtai Tsuárarmiayi .

text: And when the chief priests and scribes saw the wonderful things that he did , and the children crying in the temple , and saying , Hosanna to the Son of David ; they were sore displeased ,
text2: Tura Israer - shuar Pátrisha tura Israer - shuara jintinniurisha aents tujintiamun Jesus Túrakui iisar kajerkarmiayi . Nu arantcha uchi Yusa Jeen " Juna weatri uunt akupin Tawit asamtai nankaamakuiti " untsumainiakui Jesusan ti kajerkarmiayi .

text: And said unto him , Hearest thou what these say ? And Jesus saith unto them , Yea ; have ye never read , Out of the mouth of babes and sucklings thou hast perfected praise ?
text2: Tura tiarmiayi " ṡJu uchi tuinia nu ántamek ? " Tutai Jesus " Ee , ántajai , Tímiayi . Atumka Yus - Papí juna tana juka áujsachukaitrum . Júnis tawai , " Uchisha Kuírchisha Yusa Náarin Imiá shiir awajtusarat tusa Yus tsankatkaiti . " Tu aarmaiti .

text: And he left them , and went out of the city into Bethany ; and he lodged there .
text2: Nuna tinia ikiuiniak Jerusarénnumia jiinki Petania péprunam we nui kanarmiayi .

text: Now in the morning as he returned into the city , he hungered .
text2: Kashin tsawaar Jerusarénnum waketas Jesus tsukaarmiayi .

text: And when he saw a fig tree in the way , he came to it , and found nothing thereon , but leaves only , and said unto it , Let no fruit grow on thee henceforward for ever . And presently the fig tree withered away .
text2: Iikiu numi Jintiá yantam wajan Wáiniak akaktajtsa werimiayi . Tura Werí aya Núminiak Wáinkiamiayi . Túra numin Tímiayi " Atakka nerekchattame . " Takui nu chichamaik Káarmiayi .

text: And when the disciples saw it , they marvelled , saying , How soon is the fig tree withered away !
text2: Nuna Wáiniak ni unuiniamuri ti Enentáimprar aniasarmiayi " ṡUrukaku Imiá Wárik jaka ? "

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Verily I say unto you , If ye have faith , and doubt not , ye shall not only do this which is done to the fig tree , but also if ye shall say unto this mountain , Be thou removed , and be thou cast into the sea ; it shall be done .
text2: Tuíniakui Jesus tiarmiayi " Nekasan Tájarme , Yus nekas Enentáimtakrumka , " nekaspash Túrat " Táchakrum iikiun Túrajna nusha Túramniaitrume . Tura nu arantcha nu naint " ékemtam nayaantsanam inianta " tutai Túrunattawai .

text: And all things , whatsoever ye shall ask in prayer , believing , ye shall receive .
text2: Ashí Yus áujeakum seamna nu , Yus nekas Enentáimtakum seakmeka , Wáinkiáttame " Tímiayi .

text: And when he was come into the temple , the chief priests and the elders of the people came unto him as he was teaching , and said , By what authority doest thou these things ? and who gave thee this authority ?
text2: Yusa Uunt Jeen Jesus Wayá unuiniamiayi . Turai Israer - patri uuntri tura Israer - shuara uuntrisha Jesusan tariar aniasarmiayi " ṡYana chichamejai ju Túram . Ya ju Túratniuncha akuptamkait ? " tiarmiayi .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , I also will ask you one thing , which if ye tell me , I in like wise will tell you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Tutai Jesus tiarmiayi " Wisha aniastaj tusan wakerajrume . Ju airkakrumninkia Wisha yana chichamejai Túraj nuna ujaktatjarme .

text: The baptism of John , whence was it ? from heaven , or of men ? And they reasoned with themselves , saying , If we shall say , From heaven ; he will say unto us , Why did ye not then believe him ?
text2: Wats , ṡya imiakratin Juankan akupkamia . Yusak , aentsuk , ya akupkamia ? " Tutai Nuámtak tunainiarmiayi . " Yus akupkamiayi " Tákurninkia " ṡurukamtai Enentáimtichuitrum ? " Túramtatji .

text: But if we shall say , Of men ; we fear the people ; for all hold John as a prophet .
text2: Kame " shuar akupkaiti " Tákurnisha Ashí aents mantamattaji . Warí , Ashí niisha Juan Yúsnan etserniuyi Tuíniatsuk " tiarmiayi .

text: And they answered Jesus , and said , We cannot tell . And he said unto them , Neither tell I you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Nuyá Jesusan " Nékatsji " tiarmiayi . Tutai Jesussha Aíiniak " Wátsek , Wisha Núnisnak akuptukua nuna ujakchattajrume " Tímiayi .

text: But what think ye ? A certain man had two sons ; and he came to the first , and said , Son , go work to day in my vineyard .
text2: Jesus unuiniak tiarmiayi " Enentáimpratarum . Shuar uchin Jímiaran takakuuyi . Nuna chikichkin chicharuk timiai " Uchirú , arakur Júuktin Yamái Wetá . "

text: He answered and said , I will not : but afterward he repented , and went .
text2: ` Tutai uchi " Atsá , nakitiajai " timiai . Tayat urum Enentáimiar takaumai . '

text: And he came to the second , and said likewise . And he answered and said , I go , sir : and went not .
text2: ` Nuyá Aparí chikichnasha Werí Núnisan timiai . ' ` Tutai uchi " Apawa , Páchitsuk wetajai " timiai , Túrasha wéchamai . '

text: Whether of them twain did the will of his father ? They say unto him , The first . Jesus saith unto them , Verily I say unto you , That the publicans and the harlots go into the kingdom of God before you .
text2: ` ṡTúa ni Aparí wakeramun umirkama ? " Tímiayi Jesus . Tutai " Emkaa nu " tiarmiayi . Tuíniakui Jesus Tímiayi " Nekasan Tájarme , yajauch shuar ainia nu tura tsanirma ainia nusha átumka pachiintsrumnin nii emka Yus akupeamunam pachiinkiartatui .

text: For John came unto you in the way of righteousness , and ye believed him not : but the publicans and the harlots believed him : and ye , when ye had seen it , repented not afterward , that ye might believe him .
text2: Iis , imiakratin Juan pénker wekasatniun etserkamiayi , Túrasha antukchamarme . Antsu yajauch shuar ainia nu tura tsanirma ainia nu umirkarmiayi . Nusha Wáinkiaitiatrum atumi tunaari Enentáimturchamarme ' Tímiayi .

text: Hear another parable : There was a certain householder , which planted a vineyard , and hedged it round about , and digged a winepress in it , and built a tower , and let it out to husbandmen , and went into a far country :
text2: ` Ju Chíkich áujmatmasha antuktarum . Nunká nérentin uwa ajan ajammai . Tura wenuimiai . Uwa neketaincha najanamai . Kumpin jeancha najanamai . Tura mash pénker iwiar shuar Wáitrukarti tusa apujkimiai . Tura ninkia Yajá nunkanam wemai .

text: And when the time of the fruit drew near , he sent his servants to the husbandmen , that they might receive the fruits of it .
text2: Tura Júuktin tsawant jeamtai juuk nakak Akúptúrkartí tusa Chíkich takarniuri akupkamai .

text: And the husbandmen took his servants , and beat one , and killed another , and stoned another .
text2: Tura nui pujuinia nu , akupkamun achikiar chikichnaka katsumkar , chikichnasha Máawar , chikichnasha kayajai tukurar Máawarmai .

text: Again , he sent other servants more than the first : and they did unto them likewise .
text2: Túrawarmatai nérentin takarniun nuna nankaamas akupramai . Ataksha nui pujuarmia nu Núnisan Túrawarmai .

text: But last of all he sent unto them his son , saying , They will reverence my son .
text2: Amúamunam ni Uchirín akupeak " Winia uchir asamtai umirkachartimpiash " timiai .

text: But when the husbandmen saw the son , they said among themselves , This is the heir ; come , let us kill him , and let us seize on his inheritance .
text2: Túrasha nu takau nérenniu Uchirín Wáinkiar " Nuna Aparí jakamtai juna mashi Júkishtatuak , tiarmai . Maatai , Túrar ii nérentin ajastai " tiarmai .

text: And they caught him , and cast him out of the vineyard , and slew him .
text2: Tiar achikiar arant Júkiar nui Máawarmai . "

text: When the lord therefore of the vineyard cometh , what will he do unto those husbandmen ?
text2: Tinia Jesus aniasarmiayi " Nunká nérenniuri taa nu takaun ṡitiurkatin ? " Tímiayi .

text: They say unto him , He will miserably destroy those wicked men , and will let out his vineyard unto other husbandmen , which shall render him the fruits in their seasons .
text2: Tutai tiarmiayi " Nu shuar ti yajauch ásarmatai waitnentsuk Máawartatui . Tura nu ajan Chíkich takaun neren akanak niin susamnia nuna apujsattawai " tiarmiayi .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Did ye never read in the scriptures , The stone which the builders rejected , the same is become the head of the corner : this is the Lord ' s doing , and it is marvellous in our eyes ?
text2: Tuíniakui Jesus Tímiayi " Atumka Yus - Papikia ṡpenkek áujchaitrum ? Júnis aarmaiti : " Jea jeamin utsankarmia Nú kaya Ashí kayajai nankaamas apujsamuiti . Núnaka ii Uuntri Yus Túraiti . Iisha iisar ti Enentáimtaji . " Tu aarmaiti .

text: Therefore say I unto you , The kingdom of God shall be taken from you , and given to a nation bringing forth the fruits thereof .
text2: Tuma asamtai Tájarme , Yusna írunna nu Wáinkiatárum tusa suramsamuitiat Atumíya junas Chíkich aents Súnastatui . Niisha awantukiartatui .

text: And whosoever shall fall on this stone shall be broken : but on whomsoever it shall fall , it will grind him to powder .
text2: Tura shuar nu kayan tukumainia nuka kupintrartatui . Tura nu kaya shuarnum iniarka tsai tsai awajsattawai auka " Tímiayi Jesus .

text: And when the chief priests and Pharisees had heard his parables , they perceived that he spake of them .
text2: Israer - patri uuntrisha Pariséusha Jesus áujmatman antukar " iin Túramji " tusar achiktaj tiarmiayi .

text: But when they sought to lay hands on him , they feared the multitude , because they took him for a prophet .
text2: Tura Ashí aents " Jesus Yúsnan étserui " tuinia ásarmatai niin ashamkarmiayi .

text: And Jesus answered and spake unto them again by parables , and said ,
text2: Jesus ataksha áujmatuk juna Tímiayi :

text: The kingdom of heaven is like unto a certain king , which made a marriage for his son ,
text2: " Yus akupeamunam pachiinkiartin Júnis Enentáimpramniaiti . Uunt akupin ni Uchirí Nuáteakui nampermamai .

text: And sent forth his servants to call them that were bidden to the wedding : and they would not come .
text2: Túrak ni takarniurin ipiaamautarum tusa akupkarmai . Tura ipiaamusha nakitrarmai .

text: Again , he sent forth other servants , saying , Tell them which are bidden , Behold , I have prepared my dinner : my oxen and my fatlings are killed , and all things are ready : come unto the marriage .
text2: Ataksha Chíkich takarniuncha ipiaamakrum ju titiarum tusa akupkarmai . " " Mash yurumkan iwiarajai , tawai , titiarum , timiai . " Waakasha Máatarum tusan akupkarjai , tawai . Ajaermancha Máatarum tusan akupkajai , tawai . Ashí nuatnaiyamunam winiarti , " tawai " titiarum " timiai .

text: But they made light of it , and went their ways , one to his farm , another to his merchandise :
text2: Támaitiat Nú ipiaamusha nakitrarmai . Chikichik ni nunken wemai . Chikichcha Kuítian suruktinian wemai .

text: And the remnant took his servants , and entreated them spitefully , and slew them .
text2: Chikichcha ipiaakratniun achikiar yajauch awajsarmai , tura chikichnaka Máawarmai .

text: But when the king heard thereof , he was wroth : and he sent forth his armies , and destroyed those murderers , and burned up their city .
text2: Túramtai uunt akupin ti kajek , ni suntari mash Máatarum Túrarum ni jee mash Ekeemáktárum tusa akupkarmai .

text: Then saith he to his servants , The wedding is ready , but they which were bidden were not worthy .
text2: Nuyá ataksha ni takarniurin akupkamai . " Nuatnaikiatin Jísat mash iwiaramuiti , timiai . Tura nu ipiaamu winichmin armai .

text: Go ye therefore into the highways , and as many as ye shall find , bid to the marriage .
text2: Tuma asamtai pepru Jintí werum Ashí shuar Nánkamas Wáintrum nu ipiaatarum " timiai .

text: So those servants went out into the highways , and gathered together all as many as they found , both bad and good : and the wedding was furnished with guests .
text2: Takui takarniuri Jíinkiar pepru jintin wajainian , yajauch shuarnasha pénker shuarnasha , Ashí ipiaawarmai . Túramtai jea Piákmai . '

text: And when the king came in to see the guests , he saw there a man which had not on a wedding garment :
text2: ` Nuyá uunt akupin ipiaamun iisartaj tusa wayamai . Nui shuaran pénker iwiarmamprachun Wáinkiamai .

text: And he saith unto him , Friend , how camest thou in hither not having a wedding garment ? And he was speechless .
text2: Tura timiai " Umpá , ṡurukamtai nuatnaiyamunam entsatai Pushí entsatsuk wayam ? " Tutai nu aishman Tákamtak pujusmiayi .

text: Then said the king to the servants , Bind him hand and foot , and take him away , and cast him into outer darkness ; there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Nuyá uunt akupin yurumka ajaaman timiai " Achikrum nawenmasha uwejnumsha jinkiarum aa Jíikrum kiritniunam ajapatarum . Nuisha ti uutin ti Wáitsatin átatui " timiai .

text: For many are called , but few are chosen .
text2: Kame Untsurí ipiaamu ainiawai antsu ishichik achikma ainiawai . "

text: Then went the Pharisees , and took counsel how they might entangle him in his talk .
text2: Nuyá Pariséu chichaman najatawar uyumtikiatai tusar tiarmiayi .

text: And they sent out unto him their disciples with the Herodians , saying , Master , we know that thou art true , and teachest the way of God in truth , neither carest thou for any man : for thou regardest not the person of men .
text2: Túrawar ni shuarincha tura akupin Erutisa nemarniurisha Jesusan akuptukarmiayi . Kame akupin Erutis uunt akupin Sésara kuitri Wáinin asamtai nu apachniasha akupkarmiayi . Niisha jeariar Jesusan tiarmiayi " Uuntá , amesha nekas chicham chichaame . Nu nékaji . Chíkich shuar tuinia nu ántutsuk nekasam Yus - Chicham Jintíame . Shuar shiir Enentáimturarat tusam Jintíatsme , tiarmiayi .

text: Tell us therefore , What thinkest thou ? Is it lawful to give tribute unto Caesar , or not ?
text2: Tuma asamtai ju nekaatai tusar wakeraji . ṡUunt akupin Sésar akikminkiait ? " tiarmiayi .

text: But Jesus perceived their wickedness , and said , Why tempt ye me , ye hypocrites ?
text2: Jesus ni yajauch Enentáijiai Aníam Nekáa tiarmiayi " Aya shiir chichamtiniaitrume . ṡUrukamtai uyumatkiarkatin wakerutarum ? Tímiayi .

text: Shew me the tribute money . And they brought unto him a penny .
text2: Wats , Sésar akiktinia Nú kuit itiartitiarum . " Takui chikichik Kuítian itiariarmiayi .

text: And he saith unto them , Whose is this image and superscription ?
text2: Nuna iis Jesus aniasarmiayi " ṡJui yana yapimpiait tura yana naari aarmait ? "

text: They say unto him , Caesar ' s . Then saith he unto them , Render therefore unto Caesar the things which are Caesar ' s ; and unto God the things that are God ' s .
text2: Tutai " Uunt Sésarna " tiarmiayi . Tuiniakui Jesus chicharuk tiarmiayi " Nuikia uunt Sésarna nu , Sésar susatarum . Tura Yusna nusha Yus susatarum " Tímiayi .

text: When they had heard these words , they marvelled , and left him , and went their way .
text2: Tura nuna antukar ti Enentáimprarmiayi . Tura ikiuiniak wearmiayi .

text: The same day came to him the Sadducees , which say that there is no resurrection , and asked him ,
text2: Nu tsawantaik Satuséusha Jesusan tariarmiayi . Satuséuka jakamunmaya nantakchatniuiti Tuíniawai . Nuna tiniu ásar juna Jesusjai áujmatsarmiayi .

text: Saying , Master , Moses said , If a man die , having no children , his brother shall marry his wife , and raise up seed unto his brother .
text2: " Uuntá , Muisais juna aartampramiaji , " áishman uchin yajutmatsuk jakamtainkia ni yachi nu nuwan nuatak ni yachin Yajútmátrati , " tu aarmiayi , tiarmiayi .

text: Now there were with us seven brethren : and the first , when he had married a wife , deceased , and , having no issue , left his wife unto his brother :
text2: Ayu , íi shuarnum siati ( 7 ) Yáchintin ármiayi . Iwiairi nuatak uchin yajutmatsuk jakamiayi . Tura wajen ni yachin ikiurkimiayi .

text: Likewise the second also , and the third , unto the seventh .
text2: Tura niisha nuatak uchin yajutmatsuk jakamiayi . Tura chikichcha Núnisan jakamiayi . Tura chikichcha siati armia nu Ashí nuatkar Jákarmiayi .

text: And last of all the woman died also .
text2: Nuyá nuwasha jakamiayi .

text: Therefore in the resurrection whose wife shall she be of the seven ? for they all had her .
text2: Jakamunmaya nantakiar ṡyaki nekas ni aishri ati ? Ashí niin nuatkacharmakia " tiarmiayi .

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Ye do err , not knowing the scriptures , nor the power of God .
text2: Tuíniakui Jesus Tímiayi " Yus - Chichamsha nékachkuram tura Yusa kakarmarisha nékachkuram nantaktin atsawai Tákuram ti awajiarme .

text: For in the resurrection they neither marry , nor are given in marriage , but are as the angels of God in heaven .
text2: Nekaatarum . Jakamunmaya nantakiaruka nuatkachartatui . Antsu Yusa suntari nayaimpiniam pujuinia Núnisar nuartichu pujusartatui .

text: But as touching the resurrection of the dead , have ye not read that which was spoken unto you by God , saying ,
text2: Túrasha jakamunmaya nantakiartatna nu nekaatajtsa wakerakrumka ju Enentáimsatarum . Muisais aarma nu áujsachukaitrum . Júnisan aarmiayi :

text: I am the God of Abraham , and the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob ? God is not the God of the dead , but of the living .
text2: " Wiitjai Apraáma Yúsrintjai , Isaka Yúsrintjai , Jakupu Yúsrintjai . " Tu aarmiayi . Watsek , Yuska Jaká Yúsrinchuiti . Antsu iwiaaku ana nuna Yúsrinti , Tímiayi . Iis , nu shuar Imiá yaunchu Jákaruitiat Yusjai iwiaaku pujuiniak nantakmin ainiawai " Tímiayi .

text: And when the multitude heard this , they were astonished at his doctrine .
text2: Ashí aents nuna antukar nu jintintiam ti Enentáimprarmiayi .

text: But when the Pharisees had heard that he had put the Sadducees to silence , they were gathered together .
text2: Satuséu Jesusan aiktinian tujinkiarmatai Pariséu nuna antukar iruntrarmiayi .

text: Then one of them , which was a lawyer , asked him a question , tempting him , and saying ,
text2: Tura chikichik Pariséu jintintin asa Jesusan uyumtikiataj tusa aniasmiayi

text: Master , which is the great commandment in the law ?
text2: " Uuntá , ṡTúa Yus akupkamu Imiá nankaamas Enentáimtustiniait ? "

text: Jesus said unto him , Thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart , and with all thy soul , and with all thy mind .
text2: Tutai Jesus Tímiayi " Júiti : " Ame Yúsrum Ashí Enentáimjai aneeta . Ashí ame wakanmijiaisha tura tuke Enentáimtusam aneeta . " Tu aarmaiti , Tímiayi .

text: This is the first and great commandment .
text2: Núiti emka Ashí akupkamu nankaamas Enentáimtustinia nu .

text: And the second is like unto it , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: Chikichcha jujai métek - taku awai . Nusha tawai : " Ame írutramuram ame ayashim aneamna Nútiksamek aneata . "

text: On these two commandments hang all the law and the prophets .
text2: Nu Jímiar akupkamu umirkam Ashí Muisais akupkamia nusha tura Ashí Yúsnan etserin unuiniararmia nusha umirkattame " Tímiayi .

text: While the Pharisees were gathered together , Jesus asked them ,
text2: Tura Pariséu tuke irunar pujuiniakui

text: Saying , What think ye of Christ ? whose son is he ? They say unto him , The Son of David .
text2: Jesussha aniasarmiayi " Kristu tutai ṡya Weeá átiniait . Warí Enentáimtarum atumsha ? " Takui " Tawit Weeá átiniaiti " tiarmiayi .

text: He saith unto them , How then doth David in spirit call him Lord , saying ,
text2: Tuíniakui Jesus tiarmiayi " Nuikia ṡurukamtai Tawit , Yusa Wakaní " titia " tutai , Krístun " winia uuntur " Tímia ? Iis , Tawit juna Tímiayi :

text: The LORD said unto my Lord , Sit thou on my right hand , till I make thine enemies thy footstool ?
text2: " Uunt Yus winia uuntrun juna Tímiayi : " Akupin pujutainium , winia untsuuruini , pujusam Nákarsata . Ashí ame nemasrumin nupetkan Amin umirtamkarti tusan amastatjai " Tímiayi Yus . " Tu Tímiayi Tawit .

text: If David then call him Lord , how is he his son ?
text2: Watsek , Tawit Krístun " winia uuntur " taisha ṡitiurak ni pampanmari áti ? " Tímiayi Jesus .

text: And no man was able to answer him a word , neither durst any man from that day forth ask him any more questions .
text2: Nuna takui penkesha aikcharmiayi . Túrawar atakka uyumamtikiatai tusar aniascharmiayi Jesusan .

text: Then spake Jesus to the multitude , and to his disciples ,
text2: Jesus ni unuiniamurincha tura Ashí Shuárnasha tiarmiayi

text: Saying , The scribes and the Pharisees sit in Moses ' seat :
text2: " Israer - shuara jintinniurisha tura Pariséusha Muisais akupkamun paant ujatmainiawai .

text: All therefore whatsoever they bid you observe , that observe and do ; but do not ye after their works : for they say , and do not .
text2: Tuma asamtai tuinia nu umirkatarum . Túrasha ni Túruinia nu jumamkiirap . Nu shuar shiir chichainiayat Nusháa Túrin ainiawai .

text: For they bind heavy burdens and grievous to be borne , and lay them on men ' s shoulders ; but they themselves will not move them with one of their fingers .
text2: Ti itiurchat ana nuna akupeenak ti emeram entsaktinia aintsan aentsun apujtuiniawai . Túrasha chikichik uwejéjaisha ishichkisha takuitniun nakitiainiawai .

text: But all their works they do for to be seen of men : they make broad their phylacteries , and enlarge the borders of their garments ,
text2: Aya shuar iirsarti tusar Ashí Túruiniawai . Ashí shuar pénker Enentáimturarti tusar Yus - Papin nijiaincha tura kunturincha ti wankaram awajsar anujak yujainiawai . Tura nu arantcha pushiri sasariarman Ashí shuarjai nankaamas esaram awajas wekainiawai .

text: And love the uppermost rooms at feasts , and the chief seats in the synagogues ,
text2: Nampernumsha pénker iwiaramunam pujustinian wakeruiniawai . Iruntainmasha nankaamantu ajasa pujustinian wakeruiniawai .

text: And greetings in the markets , and to be called of men , Rabbi , Rabbi .
text2: Jintiá wekainiaksha Ashí aents áujtuiniak " Jintínkiartiniá " turutiarti tusa wakeruiniawai ' Tímiayi .

text: But be not ye called Rabbi : for one is your Master , even Christ ; and all ye are brethren .
text2: ` Túrasha átumka Ashí shuar " Jintínkiartiniá " turutiarti tusa Enentáimsashtiniaitrume . Atumka Nuámtak Yáchintrume . Atumka chikichik jintinkiartin ni naari Kristu takakrume . Nu asamtai " Jintínkiartiniá " Túramcharmin ainiawai .

text: And call no man your father upon the earth : for one is your Father , which is in heaven .
text2: Ju nunkanmasha shuar " Aparú " tiirap . Chikichik nayaimpiniam pujana nu Atumí Aparínti .

text: Neither be ye called masters : for one is your Master , even Christ .
text2: Atumi uuntri aya Krístuk asamtai " Uuntrú " Túramcharmin ainiawai .

text: But he that is greatest among you shall be your servant .
text2: Antsu átum írutkamunmaya uunta nuka peejchach átiniaiti .

text: And whosoever shall exalt himself shall be abased ; and he that shall humble himself shall be exalted .
text2: Shuar nankaamantu ajastaj Tákuinkia Yus niin péejchach awajsattawai . Antsu péejchach ana nuna Yus niin nankaamaku awajsattawai ' Tímiayi .

text: But woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye shut up the kingdom of heaven against men : for ye neither go in yourselves , neither suffer ye them that are entering to go in .
text2: ` Maa Wáinkiatárum jintinniutirmesha , Pariséutirmesha . Antrarum shiir chichamtiniaitrume . Yus akupeamunam wayatin waiti epenniuitrume . Atumsha wayatsuk chikichcha wayataj tuinia nusha suritniuitrume . '

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye devour widows ' houses , and for a pretence make long prayer : therefore ye shall receive the greater damnation .
text2: ` Maa Wáinkiatárum jintinniutirmesha , Pariséutirmesha . Antrarum shiir chichamtiniaitrume . Wajé jee atankiirum aents Enentáimturarain tusarum ti esaram Yus áujtiniaitrume . Túrin asarum átum ti Asutniátniuitrume . '

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye compass sea and land to make one proselyte , and when he is made , ye make him twofold more the child of hell than yourselves .
text2: ` Maa Wáinkiatárum jintinniutirmesha , Pariséutirmesha . Antrarum shiir chichamtiniaitrume . Nunkanmasha nayaantsanmasha Yajá wekainiuitrume Chikichík shuar Winí nemartusat tusarum . Tura atumi nemari ajasmatai atumjai nankaamas Tunáa sumamamnia awajearme . '

text: Woe unto you , ye blind guides , which say , Whosoever shall swear by the temple , it is nothing ; but whosoever shall swear by the gold of the temple , he is a debtor !
text2: ` Wáinkiatárum átumka . Jintinkiartiniaitiatrum nékachu asarum kusurua ainiuitrume . Ju Jintíarme : " Shuar nekasan tajai tusa Yusa Jeen Páchiakka nii tana nuna umitsuk ikiukminiaiti . Antsu nekasan tajai tusa Yusa Jeen kuri ana nuna Páchiakka ti nekas umiktiniaiti " Tíniuitrume .

text: Ye fools and blind : for whether is greater , the gold , or the temple that sanctifieth the gold ?
text2: Nétsetrume . Yúsjainkia Ashí kuri ántrachukait . Antsu Yusa Jeen írunna nuka aya nuin ikiusma asa Yusna ajasuiti . Tuma asamtai kurijiai nankaamas Yusa Jee Enentáimtustiniaiti . Enentáimcha asarum kusurua ainin Wáakuitrume .

text: And , Whosoever shall swear by the altar , it is nothing ; but whosoever sweareth by the gift that is upon it , he is guilty .
text2: Nu arantcha Tíniuitrume : " Shuar nekasan tajai tusa naman - maar - Yus - Sútain Páchiakka nii tana nuna umitsuk ikiukminiaiti . Antsu Yús - sutainiam naman patasman Páchiakka ti nekas umiktiniaiti " Tíniuitrume .

text: Ye fools and blind : for whether is greater , the gift , or the altar that sanctifieth the gift ?
text2: Nétsetrume . Penké naman Yusjai ántrachukait . Aya Yús - sutainiam patasma asa nu naman Enentáimtuschatniukait . Enentáimcha asarum kusurua ainin Wáakuitrume .

text: Whoso therefore shall swear by the altar , sweareth by it , and by all things thereon .
text2: Enentáimpratarum . Shuar nekasan tajai tusa Yús - sutain Páchiakka aya Sútainiak Páchiatsui antsu sutaincha tura nui patasmancha Mái - metek Páchiawai .

text: And whoso shall swear by the temple , sweareth by it , and by him that dwelleth therein .
text2: Núnisan shuar Yusa Jeen Páchiakka aya nunak Páchiatsui antsu Yus nu jeanam Pujú asamtai nunasha Páchiawai .

text: And he that shall swear by heaven , sweareth by the throne of God , and by him that sitteth thereon .
text2: Núnisan shuar nayaimpin Páchiakka Yus pujutaincha tura Yus nui pujana nunasha Páchiawai . '

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye pay tithe of mint and anise and cummin , and have omitted the weightier matters of the law , judgment , mercy , and faith : these ought ye to have done , and not to leave the other undone .
text2: ` Maa Wáinkiatarum jintinniutirmesha , Pariséutirmesha . Antrarum shiir chichamtiniaitrume . Kumintsu nukesha , anisa nukesha , menta nukesha tias ( 10 ) akantram chikichik akankamu Yus Súwitrume . Nuka pénkeraiti , ikiukchatniuiti . Túramaitiat nekas pénker Túratniua nu Túrutsuk ikiuwitrume . Yus nekas Enentáimtustincha , Waitnentáimturtincha tura tuke pénker Túratniusha Enentáimtsuk ikiuwitrume .

text: Ye blind guides , which strain at a gnat , and swallow a camel .
text2: Atumka jintinkiartiniaitiatrum nékachu asarum kusuru ainiuitrume . Kutanam yajasmach enketu Wáinkiurmeka Júwitrume . Túrayatrum kamiriu Wáinkiurmeka kawai nankaamas uunt ain takamtsuk Kújawitrume . '

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye make clean the outside of the cup and of the platter , but within they are full of extortion and excess .
text2: ` Maa Wáinkiatarum jintinniutirmesha , Pariséutirmesha . Antrarum shiir chichamtiniaitrume . Atumka tsapasha pininsha initiaani nijiatsuk aya Pátatek nijiawitrume . Núnisrum Pátatek shiir awajmamniuitrume tura Enentáiminkia kasamkatniusha tura Chíkichna wakeruktincha nujai Piákuitrume .

text: Thou blind Pharisee , cleanse first that which is within the cup and platter , that the outside of them may be clean also .
text2: Kusuru ainiuitrume , Pariséutirmeá . Antsu emka initiaani tsapasha pininsha nijiaktarum . Túrakrumninkia Pátatkesha mai pénker átatui . Núnisrum atumsha atumi Enentáin ana nu shiir awajsarum Pátatkesha shiir átatrume . '

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye are like unto whited sepulchres , which indeed appear beautiful outward , but are within full of dead men ' s bones , and of all uncleanness .
text2: ` Maa Wáinkiatarum jintinniutirmesha , Pariséutirmesha . Antrarum shiir chichamtiniaitrume . Iwiarsamu Pújujai yakarar shiir awajsamua ainiuitrume . Aani shiir ainiawai . Tura initkia Jaká ukunchijiai Piákuiti .

text: Even so ye also outwardly appear righteous unto men , but within ye are full of hypocrisy and iniquity .
text2: Núnisaitrume atumsha . Chíkich shuar iismaka ti shiira ainiuitrume . Túrasha atumi Enentáinkia Ashí muijmiai Piákuiti . '

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! because ye build the tombs of the prophets , and garnish the sepulchres of the righteous ,
text2: ` Maa Wáinkiatarum jintinniutirmesha , Pariséutirmesha . Antrarum shiir chichamtiniaitrume . Yaunchu Yúsnan etserin iwiarsamunam átumka shiir Enentáimtakrum jea jeamkaitrume . Tura pénker shuar yaunchu Jákarusha shiir Enentáimturtaj tusarum ni iwiarsamu shiir awajearme .

text: And say , If we had been in the days of our fathers , we would not have been partakers with them in the blood of the prophets .
text2: Túrakrum ju Tíniuitrume : " Iikia yaunchu ii weatrijiai pujaitkiurkia Yúsnan etserin Máatin Yáimkiachaaji . "

text: Wherefore ye be witnesses unto yourselves , that ye are the children of them which killed the prophets .
text2: Nujai ti paant chichaarme atumsha . " Ii weatri Yúsnan etserniun Máawar Tunáa Túrin ármiayi " Tárume . Tura " Yáimkiachaaji " Táyatrum , atumsha métek Túrin asarum " Niijiai méteketji " Tárume .

text: Fill ye up then the measure of your fathers .
text2: Wats , atumi weatri nankamawarmia nu átum amuktatrume ' Tímiayi Jesus .

text: Ye serpents , ye generation of vipers , how can ye escape the damnation of hell ?
text2: ` Napia ainiuitrume . Shuar aya yajauch awajniuitrume . Túmatirmesha Yus Tunáa shuaran jinium akupkartatna nuya ṡitiurak uwempratarum ?

text: Wherefore , behold , I send unto you prophets , and wise men , and scribes : and some of them ye shall kill and crucify ; and some of them shall ye scourge in your synagogues , and persecute them from city to city :
text2: Untsurí shuaran akuptuktatjarme . Yúsnan etserniuncha , ti nekancha , jintinkiartinniasha akuptuktatjarme . Tura atumsha Chíkich Máattarme , chikichcha Krúsnum ajintruarum Máattarme , chikichcha iruntai jeanam Asutiáttarme , tura chikichcha Ashí nunkanam aintrattarme .

text: That upon you may come all the righteous blood shed upon the earth , from the blood of righteous Abel unto the blood of Zacharias son of Barachias , whom ye slew between the temple and the altar .
text2: Nu tura asarum pénker shuara numpé puarma nujai átum sumamattarme . Yámankamtaik Apir ti penker Shuáraitiat Máamuyayi . Tura ukunam Perekíasa Uchirí Sakarías atumi uuntri Yusa Jee ámanum naman - maar - Yús - sutai ajapén aténkamunam Máawarmiayi . Wats , Apir Máamunmaya Sakarías Máamunam Ashí pénker shuar ti Untsurí Máamujai sumamattarme .

text: Verily I say unto you , All these things shall come upon this generation .
text2: Nekasan Tájarme , Yamái pujuinia Nú shuar Ashí nujai sumamawartatui ' Tímiayi Jesus .

text: O Jerusalem , Jerusalem , thou that killest the prophets , and stonest them which are sent unto thee , how often would I have gathered thy children together , even as a hen gathereth her chickens under her wings , and ye would not !
text2: ` Jerusarénnumiatirmeá , Yúsnan etserin Máiniaitrume . Yus akatar akupturmakmasha kayajai tukuram Máiniaitrume . Túrin árumnin waitnentajrume . Atash ni uchirin weaana aitkiasnak weartinian wakerimjarme , tura nakitramarme .

text: Behold , your house is left unto you desolate .
text2: Iistarum . Ame pépruram ajapamuiti .

text: For I say unto you , Ye shall not see me henceforth , till ye shall say , Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord .
text2: Tura " Yusa Náariin winiana nu , shiir Atí " Títiatrumna nu tsawant jeatsain penké Wáitkiashtatrume . Nuna Tájarme " Tímiayi Jesus .

text: And Jesus went out , and departed from the temple : and his disciples came to him for to shew him the buildings of the temple .
text2: Jesus Yusa Uunt Jeenia jiinki weai ni unuiniamuri niin tariar Jean iniaktusar áujmatsarmiayi .

text: And Jesus said unto them , See ye not all these things ? verily I say unto you , There shall not be left here one stone upon another , that shall not be thrown down .
text2: Tura Jesus tiarmiayi " Nu mash Yamái Wáintrume . Tura nekasan Tájarme ukunmanka mash saanaktiatui . Chikichík kayaksha ekentramuri atsuttawai " Tímiayi .

text: And as he sat upon the mount of Olives , the disciples came unto him privately , saying , Tell us , when shall these things be ? and what shall be the sign of thy coming , and of the end of the world ?
text2: Nuyá Uriwiu Náinnium wear ninki nui pujusar ni unuiniamuri Jesusan aniasarmiayi " ṡNusha urutaik Túrunat ~ i . Tura ame Tátincha tura nunka amuukatin tsawant jeakuisha warijiain nekaattaj ~ i ? Nu ujatkata " tiarmiayi .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , Take heed that no man deceive you .
text2: Tuíniakui Jesus Tímiayi " Aneartarum , anankramawairap .

text: For many shall come in my name , saying , I am Christ ; and shall deceive many .
text2: Untsurí shuar winia Náarun pachisar " wi Krístuitjai " tiar Untsurí shuaran anankawartatui .

text: And ye shall hear of wars and rumours of wars : see that ye be not troubled : for all these things must come to pass , but the end is not yet .
text2: Ti Untsurí meset chicham antuktatrume Túrasha sapijmiakairap . Núnisan átiniaiti nunka Amúatsain .

text: For nation shall rise against nation , and kingdom against kingdom : and there shall be famines , and pestilences , and earthquakes , in divers places .
text2: Apachcha Chíkich nunkanmaya apachjai Máaniawartatui . Tura ti tsukasha átatui . Sunkursha ti pampartatui . Uusha ti uurkartatui . Nuka Untsurí nunkanam Ashí Túrunawartatui .

text: All these are the beginning of sorrows .
text2: Nujai ti Wáitsatin aya yama nankamui ' Tímiayi .

text: Then shall they deliver you up to be afflicted , and shall kill you : and ye shall be hated of all nations for my name ' s sake .
text2: ` Nuyá atumniasha yajauch awajsarti tusa surutmakartatui . Tura mantamawartatui . Tura winia naar pachia asakrumin Ashí shuar Muíjramkartatui .

text: And then shall many be offended , and shall betray one another , and shall hate one another .
text2: Nu tsawantai Untsurí shuar Yúsan iniaisartatui . Túrawar nuamtak Muíjniainiak surunairartatui .

text: And many false prophets shall rise , and shall deceive many .
text2: Untsurí shuar Wáitruiniak " wi Yúsnan etserniuitjai " tiartatui . Túrawar Untsurí Shuáran Nusháa Enentáimtikrartatui .

text: And because iniquity shall abound , the love of many shall wax cold .
text2: Tura Tunáa ti ákui nuamtak anenaichartatui .

text: But he that shall endure unto the end , the same shall be saved .
text2: Tura shuar Ashí nuna tuke katsuntra nu uwemprattawai .

text: And this gospel of the kingdom shall be preached in all the world for a witness unto all nations ; and then shall the end come .
text2: Ashí aents nekaawarat tusa Yus - Chicham Ashí nunkanam etsernaktatui . Túramtai amuukatin tsawant jeattawai " Tímiayi .

text: When ye therefore shall see the abomination of desolation , spoken of by Daniel the prophet , stand in the holy place , ( whoso readeth , let him understand : )
text2: Shuar juna áujea nu Enentáimprati . Kame Jesus Tímiayi " Yúsnan etserin Taniar muijmiamtik tuke emesratin ana nuna yaunchu aar etserkamiayi . Nuka Yusa Jeen wantinkiamtai

text: Then let them which be in Judaea flee into the mountains :
text2: Ashí shuar Jutía nunkanam írunna nu , muranam pisararti .

text: Neither let him which is in the field return back to take his clothes .
text2: Ti Wárik pisartin asamtai shuar jea Yakí pujaksha tura shuar ajanam wekaakusha Jeá waketki wariri jukitiaj Tíchati . Antsu nuyan Wárik pisarti .

text: And woe unto them that are with child , and to them that give suck in those days !
text2: Nu tsawantai nuwa ajamtincha tura Kuírchin takaku ainia nusha ti Wáitsartatui .

text: But pray ye that your flight be not in the winter , neither on the sabbath day :
text2: Ayampratin tsawantaisha tura Michá Nántutincha nu pisartin tsawant áchati tusarum Yus seatarum .

text: For then shall be great tribulation , such as was not since the beginning of the world to this time , no , nor ever shall be .
text2: Maa , nu tsawantai ti Wáitsatin átatui . Ti Yáunchusha Núnisan Wáitsatin atsuuyayi . Ukunmasha atsuttawai .

text: And except those days should be shortened , there should no flesh be saved : but for the elect ' s sake those days shall be shortened .
text2: Nu Wáitsatin ti esarmaitkiuinkia Chikichkísha uwemprachainti . Tura Yus nu Wáitsatniun Wárik amumtikiattawai . Shuar Niiniu ajasarat tusa achikma ainia nu uwemprarat tusa Wárik amumtikiattawai ' Tímiayi .

text: Then if any man shall say unto you , Lo , here is Christ , or there ; believe it not .
text2: ` Tura atumin " Júiti Kristu , " Tuíniakuisha tura " Nui pujawai " Tuíniakuisha anturkairap .

text: For there shall arise false Christs , and false prophets , and shall shew great signs and wonders ; insomuch that , if it were possible , they shall deceive the very elect .
text2: Untsurí shuar Krístuitjai tusar wantinkiartatui . Untsurísha " Yúsnan etserniuitjai " tiartatui . Tura Shuáran anankataj tusar aents tujintiamun iniakmasartatui . Tura ti kakarman Túruiniak Yús - shuarnasha anankamin ainiakuinkia anankawarainti .

text: Behold , I have told you before .
text2: Túrunatsain nuna emka ujaajrume .

text: Wherefore if they shall say unto you , Behold , he is in the desert ; go not forth : behold , he is in the secret chambers ; believe it not .
text2: Tuma asamtai " Iis , Kristu nui aents atsamunam pujawai " Túramainiakuisha nui wéerap . " Jui úumak pujawai " Tuíniakuisha anturkairap .

text: For as the lightning cometh out of the east , and shineth even unto the west ; so shall also the coming of the Son of man be .
text2: Núnisan úumkan Táchattajai . Peem péetuk ti Wárik Ashí nunkanam Wáinkiachminkiait . Núnisnak wi Aents Ajasuka winiakun paant wantinkiattajai .

text: For wheresoever the carcase is , there will the eagles be gathered together .
text2: Wats , jaka tepaana nui chuan Káutkachartatuak ' Tímiayi .

text: Immediately after the tribulation of those days shall the sun be darkened , and the moon shall not give her light , and the stars shall fall from heaven , and the powers of the heavens shall be shaken :
text2: ` Ti Wáitsatin nankaamasmatai ti Wárik Tsawái nantu kajinkiattawai . Tura Kashí nantusha etsantrashtatui . Yaasha Ashí muchitrattawai . Nayaimpiniam kakaram ainia nusha peantrartatui .

text: And then shall appear the sign of the Son of man in heaven : and then shall all the tribes of the earth mourn , and they shall see the Son of man coming in the clouds of heaven with power and great glory .
text2: Nuikia Wi Aents Ajasuka , Tátiniur paant átatui . Tura Ashí nunkanmaya aents Wi Winiái Wáitkiar asuttiamattaji tusar uutiartatui . Wisha ti kakaram tura Yusa wincharijiai yuranminiam Winiái Wáitkiartatui .

text: And he shall send his angels with a great sound of a trumpet , and they shall gather together his elect from the four winds , from one end of heaven to the other .
text2: Yusa suntarin kachu kakaram umpuartarum tinia akupkamtai nu suntar Ashí nunkanmaya Ashí Yús - shuaran , Yus achikma ásarmatai , irurartatui ' Tímiayi .

text: Now learn a parable of the fig tree ; When his branch is yet tender , and putteth forth leaves , ye know that summer is nigh :
text2: ` Iikiu numiri nakumea nu nekaatarum . Ni nuken eteakui " esat nantu jeatemayi " Tátsurmek .

text: So likewise ye , when ye shall see all these things , know that it is near , even at the doors .
text2: Núnisan Ashí ju Wáinkiurmeka " amuukatin tsawant nekas jeatemayi " Títiniaitrume .

text: Verily I say unto you , This generation shall not pass , till all these things be fulfilled .
text2: Nekasan Tájarme , Yamái aents pujuinia nu Amúatsain Ashí Túrunattawai .

text: Heaven and earth shall pass away , but my words shall not pass away .
text2: Nunkasha nayaimpisha amuukartatui antsu winia chichamur amuukashtatui ' Tímiayi .

text: But of that day and hour knoweth no man , no , not the angels of heaven , but my Father only .
text2: ` Tura nu Túrunatin tsawant nekanachminiaiti . Yusa suntarisha nékainiatsui . Wisha Yusa Uchiríntiatnak nékatsjai . Antsu aya winia Aparuk nékawai ' Tímiayi .

text: But as the days of Noe were , so shall also the coming of the Son of man be .
text2: ` Wi Tátiniur jeamtai yaunchu Nuai pujumia Nú tsawantin Túrunamia Núnisan átatui .

text: For as in the days that were before the flood they were eating and drinking , marrying and giving in marriage , until the day that Noe entered into the ark ,
text2: Nu tsawantin , tuke amaartsain , aya Júnisan aa asamtai yurumuk umarar pujuarmiayi . Nuatnainiarmiayi . Ni nawantrincha nuatmamtikiarmiayi . Tura Tumá pujuiniai Nuai uunt kanunam enkemamtai

text: And knew not until the flood came , and took them all away ; so shall also the coming of the Son of man be .
text2: nu aents tuke nékainiatsain ama amaarak mash amuukarmiayi . Núnisan átatui Wi Tátin jeamtai .

text: Then shall two be in the field ; the one shall be taken , and the other left .
text2: Nu tswantaik Jimiará shuar ajanam pujuttawai . Chikichik junaktiatui tura Chíkichkia ikiunkittiawai .

text: Two women shall be grinding at the mill ; the one shall be taken , and the other left .
text2: Núnisan Jimiará nuwa shana nekeak pujuttawai . Chikichik junaktiatui chikichcha ikiunkittiawai ' Tímiayi .

text: Watch therefore : for ye know not what hour your Lord doth come .
text2: ` Nu asamtai atumsha iwiarnarum pujustarum . Nekaachminiaiti uruk aintsuk taritjiarum .

text: Therefore be ye also ready : for in such an hour as ye think not the Son of man cometh .
text2: Tuma asamtai aneara pujustarum . Wi nekaachmanum Tátin Júnisan Enentáimpramniaiti . Shuar ju kashi kasa Tátinian nekaanka Kánutsuk kasa Táawai tusa iwiarnar Nákasainti . Núnisrum aneara pujutarum . '

text: Who then is a faithful and wise servant , whom his lord hath made ruler over his household , to give them meat in due season ?
text2: ` Shuar pénker uminian tura pénker Enentáimniun áujmatsattajai . Nuna uuntri Yajá irauweak " Yurumátin jeamtai winia takartin ayuratarum " Tíchanpiash .

text: Blessed is that servant , whom his lord when he cometh shall find so doing .
text2: Nu takamtikniuncha ni uuntri taa takatrin Tímiatrusan Túran tarinkia shiir Enentáimtusainti .

text: Verily I say unto you , That he shall make him ruler over all his goods .
text2: Nekasan Tájame , umin asamtai ni uuntri Ashí ni waririn Wáitrúkat tusa takatan susattawai .

text: And shall begin to smite his fellowservants , and to eat and drink with the drunken ;
text2: Antsu uuntur wau Táchattawai tusa takamtikin ni uuntri Yáintrin yajauch awajeak tura takatsuk aya Yurumátniun tura nampektinian wararkunka nu takamtikin yajauchiiti .

text: The lord of that servant shall come in a day when he looketh not for him , and in an hour that he is not aware of ,
text2: Turai ni uuntri aya aneachma taa nu takamtikniun , yajauch asamtai ,

text: And shall cut him asunder , and appoint him his portion with the hypocrites : there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
text2: ti kakaram asutiattawai . Yajauch shuar pujuinia nui akupkattawai . Nuisha ti Wáitiak ti uuttiatui ' Tímiayi Jesus .

text: Then shall the kingdom of heaven be likened unto ten virgins , which took their lamps , and went forth to meet the bridegroom .
text2: ` Yus akupeamunam pachiinkiatin Júnis átatui . Nuatnaikiatin Jísat akui tias nuwa natsa kantiran akaawar Nuátkattana nu aishmankan inkiun Jeá itiatai tusar wearmai .

text: And five of them were wise , and five were foolish .
text2: Senku nuwa Enentáimcha armai . Tura Chíkich senku nuwa Enentáimin armai .

text: They that were foolish took their lamps , and took no oil with them :
text2: Enentáimcha arma Nú nuwa aya akaamunak Juíniak amuukamtai yaraatniun asuitin Júkicharmai .

text: But the wise took oil in their vessels with their lamps .
text2: Antsu Chíkich senku Núwaka akaamuncha Juíniak tura ataksha amuukamtai yaraatniun asuitin Júkiarmai .

text: While the bridegroom tarried , they all slumbered and slept .
text2: Tura Jíinkiarmatai nuatkatin aishman wari taachkui kari pujakui kanararmai .

text: And at midnight there was a cry made , Behold , the bridegroom cometh ; go ye out to meet him .
text2: Nuyá kashi ajapén shuar untsumuk " Pai nuatkatin winiawai . Werirum inkiuntarum " timiai .

text: Then all those virgins arose , and trimmed their lamps .
text2: Tu untsumun antukar nantakiar kantiran akaatai tusar pujursarmai .

text: And the foolish said unto the wise , Give us of your oil ; for our lamps are gone out .
text2: Nuyá senku nuwa Enentáimcha arma nu , Chíkich nuwa Enentáimniun tiarmai " Incha atumi asuitiri ishichik ajamprusaitia . Ii kantirisha kajiniawai . "

text: But the wise answered , saying , Not so ; lest there be not enough for us and you : but go ye rather to them that sell , and buy for yourselves .
text2: ` Tutai Chíkich senku nuwa tiarmai " Atsá , Warí íncha jeartamchattaji . Tura atumnia penké jeashtatui . Nekaska surutainium werum sumaka utumtarum " tiarmai . '

text: And while they went to buy , the bridegroom came ; and they that were ready went in with him to the marriage : and the door was shut .
text2: ` Tura Nuyá senku nuwa Enentáimcha arma nu , asuitian sumak utitiai tusar wéarai ukunam nuatkatin aishman tamai . Túramtai Enentáimin nuwa arma nuka nuatnaikiatin Námpernam nuatkatniujai wayawarmai . Túramtai Wáitin epeniarmai .

text: Afterward came also the other virgins , saying , Lord , Lord , open to us .
text2: Tura epeniarai Enentáimcha nu Táarmai . Tura tiarmai " Uuntá , waiti uratritia . "

text: But he answered and said , Verily I say unto you , I know you not .
text2: ` Tu untsumainiakui nu uunt kajerak chichak " Cha , ṡYátsukaitrum ? Penké nékatsjarme " tiarmai . "

text: Watch therefore , for ye know neither the day nor the hour wherein the Son of man cometh .
text2: Jesus nuna áujmatas umik Tímiayi " Aents Ajasuitjai tura Tátin tsawantrusha tura uruk ain Tátaj nusha nékatsrume . Tuma asarum tuke iwiarnarum pujustarum ' Tímiayi .

text: For the kingdom of heaven is as a man travelling into a far country , who called his own servants , and delivered unto them his goods .
text2: ` Núnisan Wi Tátin Júnisaiti . Shuar Chíkich nunkanam wéak ~ u ni takarniurin untsukar ni Kuítrin akanak Súsarmai .

text: And unto one he gave five talents , to another two , and to another one ; to every man according to his several ability ; and straightway took his journey .
text2: Chikichkiniak senku mir ( 5 . 000 ) Kuítian susamai . Chikichnasha Jimiará mir ( 2 . 000 ) Kuítian susamai . Tura chikichnasha chikichik mir ( 1 . 000 ) Kuítian susamai . Nii takastin jearma nujai métek Súsarmai . Tura ikiuak Yajá wemai .

text: Then he that had received the five talents went and traded with the same , and made them other five talents .
text2: Takarin senku mir Kuítian achikmia nujai takakmas ataksha senku mir Kuítian patakmai .

text: And likewise he that had received two , he also gained other two .
text2: Chikichcha Núnisan Jimiará Míran achikmia nujai takakmas ataksha Jimiará Míran patakmai .

text: But he that had received one went and digged in the earth , and hid his lord ' s money .
text2: Tura Chíkich shuar ni Uuntrí Kuítrin chikichik Míran achikmia nuna waa taur úukmai . '

text: After a long time the lord of those servants cometh , and reckoneth with them .
text2: ` Nuyá ukunam nu shuara uuntri Támai . Tura Kuítian Súkiarma nujai itiurkarmakit tusa untsukarmai .

text: And so he that had received five talents came and brought other five talents , saying , Lord , thou deliveredst unto me five talents : behold , I have gained beside them five talents more .
text2: Emka senku mir Kuítian achikmia nu tamai . Nuyá ni uuntrin Chíkich senku mir patakman suak timiai " Uuntá , senku mir kuit surusmame . Pai , atak senku Míran patasmajai . "

text: His lord said unto him , Well done , thou good and faithful servant : thou hast been faithful over a few things , I will make thee ruler over many things : enter thou into the joy of thy lord .
text2: ` Takui ni uuntri timiai " Ti pénker takakmauwitme . Nekas uminiaitme . Ishichkijiaisha ti pénker takakma asakmin ti Núkap yamaikia amastatjai . Winí wayam wijiai ti shiir warasta " timiai . '

text: He also that had received two talents came and said , Lord , thou deliveredst unto me two talents : behold , I have gained two other talents beside them .
text2: ` Nuyá Chíkich shuar Jimiará Míran achikmia nu Tarí timiai " Uuntá , Jimiará mir surusmame . Pai , ataksha Jimiará Míran patasmajai . "

text: His lord said unto him , Well done , good and faithful servant ; thou hast been faithful over a few things , I will make thee ruler over many things : enter thou into the joy of thy lord .
text2: ` Takui ni uuntri timiai " Ti penker takakmauwitme . Nekas uminiaitme . Ishichkijiaisha ti pénker takakma asakmin ti Núkap yamaikia amastatjai . Winí wayam wijiai ti shiir warasta " timiai . '

text: Then he which had received the one talent came and said , Lord , I knew thee that thou art an hard man , reaping where thou hast not sown , and gathering where thou hast not strawed :
text2: ` Nuyá Chíkich shuar chikichik Míran achikmia nu Tarí timiai " Uuntá , ti kajen asakmin tura araachiatam tura atsaamprachiatam Júurtuktarum tiniu asakmin

text: And I was afraid , and went and hid thy talent in the earth : lo , there thou hast that is thine .
text2: sapijmiakun ame Kuítrumniaka Nunká Táutran úukmajai . Pai , Juíiti ame surukmiam nu " timiai . '

text: His lord answered and said unto him , Thou wicked and slothful servant , thou knewest that I reap where I sowed not , and gather where I have not strawed :
text2: ` Takui ni uuntri timiai " Ameka yajauchiitme . Aya Nákiitme . Wi araachiatan tura atsaamprachiatan Júurtuktarum Tíniuitme Túrutsumek .

text: Thou oughtest therefore to have put my money to the exchangers , and then at my coming I should have received mine own with usury .
text2: Tu Enentáimkiumka ṡurukamtai kuit - iruntainiam ikiurtuschamam ? Nuikia wi Táakun patasan Achikiáajai " timiai .

text: Take therefore the talent from him , and give it unto him which hath ten talents .
text2: Nuna tinia nui wajainian tiarmai " Ju shuar Chikichík mir kuit atankirum tias mir Kuítian takaka nu susatarum .

text: For unto every one that hath shall be given , and he shall have abundance : but from him that hath not shall be taken away even that which he hath .
text2: Kame Núkap takakna Nú shuar ataksha patatnastatui tura ampiniartatui . Antsu ishichik takakna nusha ishichik takakuitiat jurunkittiawai .

text: And cast ye the unprofitable servant into outer darkness : there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Ju umichu shuarsha aa kiritniunam ajapatarum . Nui ti Wáitiak ti uuttiatui " timiai " . Tu áujmatsamiayi Jesus .

text: When the Son of man shall come in his glory , and all the holy angels with him , then shall he sit upon the throne of his glory :
text2: Jesus áujmatuk Tímiayi ` Aents Ajasuitjiana nu Ashí akupin ajasan Yusa suntari énkekma winittiajai . Tura Uunt Akupin asan shiir pujutairui pujustatjai .

text: And before him shall be gathered all nations : and he shall separate them one from another , as a shepherd divideth his sheep from the goats :
text2: Túramtai Ashí nunkanmaya aents Winia irunturartatui . Túrunawarmatai akantrartatjai . Murikiu Wáinin kachurtinian tura kachurtichujai akanea Nútisanak Shuáran akantrattajai .

text: And he shall set the sheep on his right hand , but the goats on the left .
text2: Tura kachurtichunka , pénkera nuna , untsuuruini awajsartatjai . Tura kachurtinniaka , yajauchia nuna , menaaruini awajsartatjai .

text: Then shall the King say unto them on his right hand , Come , ye blessed of my Father , inherit the kingdom prepared for you from the foundation of the world :
text2: Túran nekas Uunt Akupin asan untsuuruini wajainian Títiatjai " Atumniaka winia Apar shiir awajtamsaitrume . Wi akupeajna nui winitiarum . Yus nunkan najanamia Tímianaik átum nui warastinian tsankatramkamiarme .

text: For I was an hungred , and ye gave me meat : I was thirsty , and ye gave me drink : I was a stranger , and ye took me in :
text2: Kame Wi Tsukamá wekai ayurtuamiarme . Kitiama wekaisha umartin surusmiarme . Wait Ajá wekaisha itiaararum ajamprusmiarme .

text: Naked , and ye clothed me : I was sick , and ye visited me : I was in prison , and ye came unto me .
text2: Pushir atsaisha átumka surusmiarme . Jaa tepaisha Iiráimiarme . Sepunam enketaisha tarum Iiráimiarme " Títiatjai .

text: Then shall the righteous answer him , saying , Lord , when saw we thee an hungred , and fed thee ? or thirsty , and gave thee drink ?
text2: Tutai untsuuruini wajainia turutiartatui " Uuntá , ṡurutia Tsukamá wekaamnisha ayuramaj ~ i . Urutiá iisha kitiama Wekáa wainkiarsha umartincha amasmaj ~ i .

text: When saw we thee a stranger , and took thee in ? or naked , and clothed thee ?
text2: Tura urutia wait Ajá wekaamnisha tura pushiram mamurmataisha iisha amasmaj ~ i .

text: Or when saw we thee sick , or in prison , and came unto thee ?
text2: Urutia iisha jaa tepamin tura sepunam enketmin wainkiarsha winitir iimiaj ~ i ? " turutiartatui . '

text: And the King shall answer and say unto them , Verily I say unto you , Inasmuch as ye have done it unto one of the least of these my brethren , ye have done it unto me .
text2: ` Turutainiakui Wi Uunt Akupin asan tiartatjai " Nekasan Tájarme , Ashí ju Wíi shuar péejchachisha waitnentramarum nu Winia anentakum Túraitrume " tiartatjai ' Tímiayi .

text: Then shall he say also unto them on the left hand , Depart from me , ye cursed , into everlasting fire , prepared for the devil and his angels :
text2: ` Wi Uunt Akupin asan menaaruini wajainian tiartatjai " Atumsha Yajá wetarum . Yajauchijiai yuminkramuitrume . Yus uunt iwianchi ni suntarijiai tuke kajinkiashtin jinium apeatniua nui wétatrume atumsha .

text: For I was an hungred , and ye gave me no meat : I was thirsty , and ye gave me no drink :
text2: Atumka Wi tsukamai ayurtuachmarme . Kitiamaisha umartin suruschamarme .

text: I was a stranger , and ye took me not in : naked , and ye clothed me not : sick , and in prison , and ye visited me not .
text2: Wait Ajá wekaisha ikiatrachmarme . Pushirun imiampraisha entsartin suruschamarme . Jaa tepaisha tura sepunam enketaisha iiraichmarme " tiartatjai . '

text: Then shall they also answer him , saying , Lord , when saw we thee an hungred , or athirst , or a stranger , or naked , or sick , or in prison , and did not minister unto thee ?
text2: ` Tutai niisha turutiartatui " ṡUrutia , Uuntá , tsukamakmesha , kitiamakmesha , wait Ajaknísha , pushiram imiampramsha , Jáakmesha , tura sepunam wait Ajá pujamnisha iisha winitir Yáinchamaj ~ i ? " turutiartatui . '

text: Then shall he answer them , saying , Verily I say unto you , Inasmuch as ye did it not to one of the least of these , ye did it not to me .
text2: ` Wi Uunt Akupin asan tiartatjai " Nekasan Tájarme , Ashí Wíi shuar , péejchachisha waitnentrachmarum nui Winiasha Túrutachuitrume " tiartatjai .

text: And these shall go away into everlasting punishment : but the righteous into life eternal .
text2: Nu shuarka tuke Wáitsatniunam weartatui . Tura Yus achikma ainia nusha tuke iwiaaku Yusjai pujustinnium weartatui " Tímiayi Jesus .

text: And it came to pass , when Jesus had finished all these sayings , he said unto his disciples ,
text2: Jesus Ashí nuna tinia umik ni unuiniamurin tiarmiayi

text: Ye know that after two days is the feast of the passover , and the Son of man is betrayed to be crucified .
text2: " Atumsha nékarme , Paskua jisat jeatin jimiarchik tsawant ajasai . Nui Wi Aents Ajasu asamtai Krúsnum Máawarti tusar surutkartatui " Tímiayi .

text: Then assembled together the chief priests , and the scribes , and the elders of the people , unto the palace of the high priest , who was called Caiaphas ,
text2: Nuyá Israer - patri uuntrisha Israer - shuara jintinniurisha Israer - shuara uuntrisha Kaipiasa jeen áarin iruntrarmiayi . Kaipiassha Israer - patri uuntriyayi .

text: And consulted that they might take Jesus by subtilty , and kill him .
text2: Nui anankatin chichamjai Jesus achikiar maatai tusar chichaman jurusarmiayi .

text: But they said , Not on the feast day , lest there be an uproar among the people .
text2: Tura tiarmiayi " Jístatin Túrachminiaiti aents téetet ajarain tusar . "

text: Now when Jesus was in Bethany , in the house of Simon the leper ,
