text2: Jesus Petania péprunam pujus tunamaru Semunka jeen pujumiayi .

text: There came unto him a woman having an alabaster box of very precious ointment , and poured it on his head , as he sat at meat .
text2: Nui pujai nuwa ti kuit Jeá kunkuinian Arapástru tutai kaya najanamunam piakun itiamiayi . Tura Jesus misanam Yurumátaj tusa pujan Tarí nu kunkuinian ukatramiayi .

text: But when his disciples saw it , they had indignation , saying , To what purpose is this waste ?
text2: Túramtai ni unuiniamuri nuna iisar kajerkar tiarmiayi " ṡUrukamtai au kunkuin Imiá Kuítniasha aantrasha wasurea ?

text: For this ointment might have been sold for much , and given to the poor .
text2: Antsu ti kuitjai suruk shuar Kuítrincha ainia nuna Yáitskesha " tiarmiayi .

text: When Jesus understood it , he said unto them , Why trouble ye the woman ? for she hath wrought a good work upon me .
text2: Jesus tuinian anturak tiarmiayi " ṡUrukamtai ju nuwa yajauch Enentáimtarum ? Túrutana ju ti pénkeran Túrayi .

text: For ye have the poor always with you ; but me ye have not always .
text2: Kuítrincha tuke atumjai pujushtatuak . Antsu Wikia atumjai tuke pujushtatjai .

text: For in that she hath poured this ointment on my body , she did it for my burial .
text2: Ju nuwa kunkuinjai ukatrurai juka , Wi iwiarnastin asamtai aitkiarayi .

text: Verily I say unto you , Wheresoever this gospel shall be preached in the whole world , there shall also this , that this woman hath done , be told for a memorial of her .
text2: Nekasan Tájarme , Ashí nunkanam uwempratin chicham etsernakui tuke ju nuwa pachinias etsernaktatui . Túramtai ni Túramuri kajinmankishtatui " Tímiayi .

text: Then one of the twelve , called Judas Iscariot , went unto the chief priests ,
text2: Nuyá Jesus tuse ( 12 ) unuiniamunmaya chikichik ni naari Jútas Iskariúti Jesusan suruktaj tusa Israer - patri uuntriin wémiayi .

text: And said unto them , What will ye give me , and I will deliver him unto you ? And they covenanted with him for thirty pieces of silver .
text2: Tura jeari Tímiayi " Jesusan achikia amakui ṡUrutmá akirkaintrum ? " Takui trainta ( 30 ) Kuítian akikiarmiayi .

text: And from that time he sought opportunity to betray him .
text2: Nu akikiam Jútas itiurak Jesusan Súsaraintiaj tu Enentáimias wekaimiayi .

text: Now the first day of the feast of unleavened bread the disciples came to Jesus , saying unto him , Where wilt thou that we prepare for thee to eat the passover ?
text2: Wakapruachu tantan Yurumáinia Nú Námper yama nankamkui Jesusa unuiniamuri tariar aniasarmiayi " ṡTui paskua Námper iwiaarakrin Yurumáttam ? " tiarmiayi .

text: And he said , Go into the city to such a man , and say unto him , The Master saith , My time is at hand ; I will keep the passover at thy house with my disciples .
text2: Tuíniakui Jesus Tímiayi " Péprunam wetarum . Nui Chikichík shuara jeen jearum titiarum " Uunta chichaak " Winia tsawantur ishichik ajasai . Tuma asan paskua namperan winia unuiniamurjai ame jeemiin Yurumátjai " tawai " titiarum " Tímiayi .

text: And the disciples did as Jesus had appointed them ; and they made ready the passover .
text2: Tutai ni unuiniamuri wear Jesus timia nuna umikiar paskua nampertin Yurumátniun iwiararmiayi .

text: Now when the even was come , he sat down with the twelve .
text2: Tura kashi Ajasái Jesus ni tuse ( 12 ) unuiniamurijiai misanam yurumuk pujumiayi .

text: And as they did eat , he said , Verily I say unto you , that one of you shall betray me .
text2: Nui Yurumáiniai Jesus tiarmiayi " Nekasan Tájarme , átum pujarmena Juyá chikichik Winia surutkattawai . "

text: And they were exceeding sorrowful , and began every one of them to say unto him , Lord , is it I ?
text2: Nuna takui ti Kúntuts Enentáimprar mai Aní awajiarmiayi " Uuntá , ṡWiáshitiaj ? "

text: And he answered and said , He that dippeth his hand with me in the dish , the same shall betray me .
text2: Mai tu awajenam Jesus tiarmiayi " Wi Nú pininnuman jimiartukan yuajna ju Winia surutkattawai .

text: The Son of man goeth as it is written of him : but woe unto that man by whom the Son of man is betrayed ! it had been good for that man if he had not been born .
text2: Wi Aents Ajasu asan Yus Chicham tana nujai métek Túrunattajai . Túrasha shuar Winia surutkattana nuka ti Asutniátin asa akiinmainchu ajakuiti " Tímiayi .

text: Then Judas , which betrayed him , answered and said , Master , is it I ? He said unto him , Thou hast said .
text2: Nuyá Jútas suruktaj tana nu Niin Tímiayi " Uuntá nuikia ṡWiáshitiaj ? " Takui Jesus Tímiayi " Ee , nekas ámetme . "

text: And as they were eating , Jesus took bread , and blessed it , and brake it , and gave it to the disciples , and said , Take , eat ; this is my body .
text2: Tura yurumuk pujuiniai Jesus yurumkan achik Yúsan yuminsamiayi . Tura puur ni unuiniamurin suiniak Tímiayi " Ju yuatarum . Juka winia ayashruiti . "

text: And he took the cup , and gave thanks , and gave it to them , saying , Drink ye all of it ;
text2: Nuyá pininkian achik Yúsan yuminsamiayi . Tura suiniak tiarmiayi " Jusha Ashí umartarum .

text: For this is my blood of the new testament , which is shed for many for the remission of sins .
text2: Juka winia numparuiti . Tura winia numpar Puármatai , yamaram chicham nekas uminkiattawai tawai . Tura Puármatai Untsurí shuara tunaarin tsankurattawai .

text: But I say unto you , I will not drink henceforth of this fruit of the vine , until that day when I drink it new with you in my Father ' s kingdom .
text2: Tura ataksha átum Yus akupea nui jeatsrumnin ju uwa yumirin umarchattajai . Tura tsawant jeamtai atumjai Yus akupeana nui yamarman umartatjai " Tímiayi Jesus .

text: And when they had sung an hymn , they went out into the mount of Olives .
text2: Yús - kantan Kantamáwar umikiar Uriwiu Náinnium wearmiayi .

text: Then saith Jesus unto them , All ye shall be offended because of me this night : for it is written , I will smite the shepherd , and the sheep of the flock shall be scattered abroad .
text2: Nui Jesus Tímiayi " Ju kashi átum Winia Ashí natsantrurtatrume . Kame Yus - Papinium aarmaiti " Murikiu Wáinniun mantuattajai Túram murik pisarartatui . " Tu aarmaiti .

text: But after I am risen again , I will go before you into Galilee .
text2: Tura nantakin Kariréa nunkanam Wi émkattajai átum wéatsrumin . "

text: Peter answered and said unto him , Though all men shall be offended because of thee , yet will I never be offended .
text2: Takui Pítiur Tímiayi " Chíkich natsantramainakuisha wikia Túrashtatjai . "

text: Jesus said unto him , Verily I say unto thee , That this night , before the cock crow , thou shalt deny me thrice .
text2: Tutai Jesus Tímiayi " Nekasan Tájame , ju kashi atash shiniatsain Menaintiú natsantrurtatme . "

text: Peter said unto him , Though I should die with thee , yet will I not deny thee . Likewise also said all the disciples .
text2: Pítiur Tímiayi " Maa , Amijiai métek Mántuiniakuisha penkesha natsantrashtatjame . " Ashí ni unuiniamuri Núnisan tiarmiayi .

text: Then cometh Jesus with them unto a place called Gethsemane , and saith unto the disciples , Sit ye here , while I go and pray yonder .
text2: Nuyá Jesus ni unuiniamurijiai Jitsemaní Náartin ajanam Jeá Tímiayi " Juí pujusrum Nákarsatarum . Aranta ai wena Yúsan áujsatjai . "

text: And he took with him Peter and the two sons of Zebedee , and began to be sorrowful and very heavy .
text2: Tinia Pítruncha tura mai Sepetéu Uchirí Jukí wémiayi . Nuisha ti Kúntuts Enentáimiuk wake mesekmiayi .

text: Then saith he unto them , My soul is exceeding sorrowful , even unto death : tarry ye here , and watch with me .
text2: Nuyá Jesus Tímiayi " Ti Kúntuts jakamnia Enentáimjai . Atumsha jui pujusrum Wijiai métek Iwiáa pujutarum . "

text: And he went a little further , and fell on his face , and prayed , saying , O my Father , if it be possible , let this cup pass from me : nevertheless not as I will , but as thou wilt .
text2: Tinia Jesus arantach we nui tikishmar tsuntsuma Yúsan áujeak Tímiayi " Winia Aparú , Wi Túrunatniua nu Nusháa iwiaramniaitkiuinkia ju Wáitsatniua nu tsankatrukaip . Tura Wi wakeraj Núniska áchati antsu Ame wakeram Núnis Atí " áujuk Tímiayi .

text: And he cometh unto the disciples , and findeth them asleep , and saith unto Peter , What , could ye not watch with me one hour ?
text2: Nuyá ni menaintiu unuiniamuri pujuiniamunam waketki Kanúu pujuinian jeariar Pítrun Tímiayi " Atumka chikichik úraksha Wijiai Iwiáa pujutin ṡtujinkiarmek ?

text: Watch and pray , that ye enter not into temptation : the spirit indeed is willing , but the flesh is weak .
text2: Iwiáa pujusrum Yus áujsatarum . Tunáa nupettamkairap . Enentáimin ti wakeriniaitrume Túrasha ayashim pimpiruiti . "

text: He went away again the second time , and prayed , saying , O my Father , if this cup may not pass away from me , except I drink it , thy will be done .
text2: Tinia ataksha we Yúsan áujeak Tímiayi " Winia Aparú , Wi Imiá nekasan Wáitsatniuitkiuinkia nuikia Ame wakeramna nu Atí . " Tu áujsamiayi .

text: And he came and found them asleep again : for their eyes were heavy .
text2: Nuyá ataksha taa ni menaintiu unuiniamuri tarimiayi . Tura kari ti nupeteam ataksha Kanúu pujuarmiayi .

text: And he left them , and went away again , and prayed the third time , saying the same words .
text2: Túmainiakui niin ikiukin ataksha áujmia Núnisan Yúsan áujsataj tusa waketkimiayi .

text: Then cometh he to his disciples , and saith unto them , Sleep on now , and take your rest : behold , the hour is at hand , and the Son of man is betrayed into the hands of sinners .
text2: Aujas umik ni unuiniamuri pujamunman wémiayi . Tura tiarmiayi " Antsu yamaikia kanarum ayampratarum . Ura jeayi . Wi Aents Ajasu ain , tunaarintin shuarnum surunkatin jeayi .

text: Rise , let us be going : behold , he is at hand that doth betray me .
text2: Wari nantaktiarum . Wéartai . Súrutna nu winiawai " Tímiayi .

text: And while he yet spake , lo , Judas , one of the twelve , came , and with him a great multitude with swords and staves , from the chief priests and elders of the people .
text2: Jesus tu chichai Jútas Támiayi . Nusha ni unuiniamuriyayi . Nujaisha Untsurí shuar puniajaisha tura numijiaisha winiarmiayi . Nu shuaran Israer - patri uuntrisha Israer - shuara uuntrisha akupka ármiayi .

text: Now he that betrayed him gave them a sign , saying , Whomsoever I shall kiss , that same is he : hold him fast .
text2: Jútas , Jesusan sura , tuke Jesusai jeatsuk nu shuaran tiarmiayi " Wi miniakkan mukunattajna Núiti . Nu achiktarum . "

text: And forthwith he came to Jesus , and said , Hail , master ; and kissed him .
text2: Nu asamtai Jesusan Tarí " Winiajai Uuntá " tinia mukunamiayi .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Friend , wherefore art thou come ? Then came they , and laid hands on Jesus , and took him .
text2: Takui Jesus Tímiayi " Amikrú , ṡWarí winitiam ? " Nuyá achikiar Jesusan Júkiarmiayi .

text: And , behold , one of them which were with Jesus stretched out his hand , and drew his sword , and struck a servant of the high priest ' s , and smote off his ear .
text2: Nui chikichik Jesusa Tsaníakmari ni puniarin ukuiniak shuara kuishin tsupirkamiayi . Nu shuarsha Israer - patri uuntri takarniuriyayi .

text: Then said Jesus unto him , Put up again thy sword into his place : for all they that take the sword shall perish with the sword .
text2: Túramtai Jesus Tímiayi " Puniarum enkeata . Ashí puniajai Máanainia nusha puniajai mantamnashtatuak .

text: Thinkest thou that I cannot now pray to my Father , and he shall presently give me more than twelve legions of angels ?
text2: Wi wakeraknaka winia Aparun Timiá Untsurí suntarin seakui Páchitsuk akupturkainti . ṡNu nékatsmek ?

text: But how then shall the scriptures be fulfilled , that thus it must be ?
text2: Tura nuna Túramtainkia Yus - Chichamnum tana nu uminkiachainti " Tímiayi .

text: In that same hour said Jesus to the multitudes , Are ye come out as against a thief with swords and staves for to take me ? I sat daily with you teaching in the temple , and ye laid no hold on me .
text2: Nuna tinia Jesus nu shuaran tiarmiayi " Atum Kasá achiktaj tawa Nútiksarum puniajaisha numijiaisha tarutniurme . Kame Ashí tsawantai Yusa Jeen atumjai pujusan Yus - Chichaman etsermiajai . Nuisha achirkachmarme .

text: But all this was done , that the scriptures of the prophets might be fulfilled . Then all the disciples forsook him , and fled .
text2: Antsu yamaikia yaunchu Yúsnan etserin aararmia nu Umínkiatí tusarum Jútikrarme . " Tu Tímiayi Jesus . Nuyá ni unuiniamuri Jesusan Níniak ikiuiniak pisararmiayi .

text: And they that had laid hold on Jesus led him away to Caiaphas the high priest , where the scribes and the elders were assembled .
text2: Shuar Jesusan achikiarmia nusha Kaipiasai Júkiarmiayi . Nusha Israer - patri Uuntríyayi . Nuisha Israer - shuara jintinniurisha Israer - shuara uuntri armia nusha irunar matsamarmiayi .

text: But Peter followed him afar off unto the high priest ' s palace , and went in , and sat with the servants , to see the end .
text2: Tura Pítiur árantak Jesusan nemarkin uuntri jeen aari jeamiayi . Tura suntarjai tsanin pujusmiayi Jesusan itiurkartin tusa .

text: Now the chief priests , and elders , and all the council , sought false witness against Jesus , to put him to death ;
text2: Tura Israer - patri uuntrisha Israer - shuara uuntrisha tura Ashí naamka uunt armia nusha Jesusan wait - chichamjai Súmamtikiatai tusar áujmatiarmiayi .

text: But found none : yea , though many false witnesses came , yet found they none . At the last came two false witnesses ,
text2: Untsurí shuar ántar tsanumpruiniakuisha Máatin chichaman nekaracharmiayi . Nuyá Jimiará shuar tsanumpruiniak

text: And said , This fellow said , I am able to destroy the temple of God , and to build it in three days .
text2: tiarmiayi " Ju aishman chichaak " Yusa Uunt Jeen yumpuaran ataksha Menaintiú tsawantin jeamminiaitjai , " tu chichamai " tiarmiayi .

text: And the high priest arose , and said unto him , Answerest thou nothing ? what is it which these witness against thee ?
text2: Nuyá Israer - patri uuntri wajaki Jesusan Tímiayi " ṡAimtsumek . Turamainia nusha anturmammek ? "

text: But Jesus held his peace . And the high priest answered and said unto him , I adjure thee by the living God , that thou tell us whether thou be the Christ , the Son of God .
text2: Túrasha Jesus tuke aimchamiayi . Túmakui Israer - patri uuntri chicharuk " Nekas iwiaaku Yusa Náariin Tájame nekasa nu Táchakminkia Yus iirmastatui . ṡAme Krístukaitiam . Yusa Uchirínkaitiam ? Paant Etsérkatá " Tímiayi .

text: Jesus saith unto him , Thou hast said : nevertheless I say unto you , Hereafter shall ye see the Son of man sitting on the right hand of power , and coming in the clouds of heaven .
text2: Tutai Jesus Tímiayi " Ee , ame Támena Núitjai . Tura ataksha atumin Tájarme , wi Aents Ajasu asan ti kakaram Yusa untsuurini pujai Wáitkiáttarme . Tura yuranminiam winiaisha Wáitkiáttarme " Tímiayi .

text: Then the high priest rent his clothes , saying , He hath spoken blasphemy ; what further need have we of witnesses ? behold , now ye have heard his blasphemy .
text2: Nuyá Patri uuntri nuna antuk ti kajek ni pushiri jaak Tímiayi " Ju aishman ni chichamejai Yúsan nekas yajauch chicharniuiti . Nuyásha ṡWarí atsumaj ~ i ? Atumsha Yúsan yajauch chicharu antukcharumek .

text: What think ye ? They answered and said , He is guilty of death .
text2: ṡWaritia Enentáimprum ? " Tutai " Sumamayi . Mantamnati " tiarmiayi .

text: Then did they spit in his face , and buffeted him ; and others smote him with the palms of their hands ,
text2: Tiar usukiawarmiayi yapiniam . Tura awattiarmiayi . Chikichcha yapiniam awati wishikiainiak tiarmiayi

text: Saying , Prophesy unto us , thou Christ , Who is he that smote thee ?
text2: " Ame Krístuchukaitiam . ṡYa awattama ? iitsuk nekaata . " Tu chichariarmiayi .

text: Now Peter sat without in the palace : and a damsel came unto him , saying , Thou also wast with Jesus of Galilee .
text2: Nu Túmain Pítiur aa pujai nuwa chikichik jeari Tímiayi " Amesha ju Kariréanmaya Jesus tutaijiai wekaichamkam . "

text: But he denied before them all , saying , I know not what thou sayest .
text2: Tutai Pítiur Ashí ántuiniamunam Tímiayi " Nékatsjai . ṡWarittsuk chichaam ? "

text: And when he was gone out into the porch , another maid saw him , and said unto them that were there , This fellow was also with Jesus of Nazareth .
text2: Nuna tinia Jíinkitiaj tusa wéai Chíkich shuar Wáiniak nui pujuinian tiarmiayi " Au aishmansha Nasarétnumia Jesusjai wekainiuiti . "

text: And again he denied with an oath , I do not know the man .
text2: Tutai Pítiur ataksha Tímiayi " Nekasan Tájarme , ju aishmankan penké nékatsjai . "

text: And after a while came unto him they that stood by , and said to Peter , Surely thou also art one of them ; for thy speech bewrayeth thee .
text2: Arusan nui pujuarmia nu Pítrun tariar tiarmiayi " Nekas amesha aujai wekaimiame . Warí , chichammijiai Páantaiti . "

text: Then began he to curse and to swear , saying , I know not the man . And immediately the cock crew .
text2: Tutai Pítiur " nekas Yus iirui " taku Tímiayi " Nu aishmankan penké nékatsjai . " Nuna tai atash shiniukmiayi .

text: And Peter remembered the word of Jesus , which said unto him , Before the cock crow , thou shalt deny me thrice . And he went out , and wept bitterly .
text2: Túramtai Pítiur Jesus nuik Tímia nuna Enentáimpramiayi . " Atash shiniatsain Menaintiú natsantrurtatme " Tímiayi Jesus . Pítiur nuna Enentáimiar jiinki we ti uutmiayi .

text: When the morning was come , all the chief priests and elders of the people took counsel against Jesus to put him to death :
text2: Kashin tsawarmatai Israer - patri uuntrisha Israer - shuara uuntrisha Jesus maatai tiarmiayi .

text: And when they had bound him , they led him away , and delivered him to Pontius Pilate the governor .
text2: Tiar Jesusan jinkiawar apachi uuntrin Punsiu Piratui Júkiarmiayi .

text: Then Judas , which had betrayed him , when he saw that he was condemned , repented himself , and brought again the thirty pieces of silver to the chief priests and elders ,
text2: Jútas Jesusan suruk tura Máatai Tuínian antuk Enentáimiar trainta Kuítian Israer - patri uuntrincha Israer - shuara uuntrincha awantukiarmiayi .

text: Saying , I have sinned in that I have betrayed the innocent blood . And they said , What is that to us ? see thou to that .
text2: Tura Tímiayi " Nu aishman tunaarinchan Máatarum tusan surukan wi sumamajai . " Takui tiarmiayi " Nusha iijiaisha Warí urukatin . Nuka amek iischatniukaitiam . "

text: And he cast down the pieces of silver in the temple , and departed , and went and hanged himself .
text2: Tinia Jútas nui Yusa Uunt Jee Kuítian utsan ikiuak Nuyá we kajempramiayi .

text: And the chief priests took the silver pieces , and said , It is not lawful for to put them into the treasury , because it is the price of blood .
text2: Nuyá Israer - patri uuntri nu Kuítian Júukar tiarmiayi " Ju kuit shuar sumakma asamtai Yusa Kuítrijiai irurchamniaiti . "

text: And they took counsel , and bought with them the potter ' s field , to bury strangers in .
text2: Tura nuamtak áujmatsar " nunka sumaktai " tiar Nuwe Najantai nunkan sumakarmiayi yajaya shuar nui iwiarsatniun .

text: Wherefore that field was called , The field of blood , unto this day .
text2: Shuar sumakma kuitjai sumakma asamtai yamaisha Numpá Nunka tuke Tuíniawai .

text: And gave them for the potter ' s field , as the Lord appointed me .
text2: Nujai yaunchu Yúsnan etserin Jeremías timia nu uminkiamiayi : " Uunt Yus turutmia Núnisan Túrawarmiayi . Israer - shuar trainta Kuítian seawarmatai nuna akantrar nujai Nuwe Najantai nunkan sumakarmiayi . " Tu aarmiayi .

text: And Jesus stood before the governor : and the governor asked him , saying , Art thou the King of the Jews ? And Jesus said unto him , Thou sayest .
text2: Jesusan apachi uuntriin ejeniarmatai nii aniasmiayi " ṡNekasmek Israer - shuara uunt Akupniuríntiam ? " Tutai Jesus " Ame Támena Núitjai ' Tímiayi .

text: And when he was accused of the chief priests and elders , he answered nothing .
text2: Nuyá Israer - patri uuntrisha Israer - shuara uuntrisha Súmamtikia Jesus pachischamiayi .

text: Then said Pilate unto him , Hearest thou not how many things they witness against thee ?
text2: Nuyá Piratu Tímiayi " Ashí yajauch chichartamainia nu ṡanturmammek ? "

text: And he answered him to never a word ; insomuch that the governor marvelled greatly .
text2: Tútaisha Jesus penké aimkiachmiayi . Túmakui akupin ti Enentáimiar Títinian nekaachmiayi .

text: Now at that feast the governor was wont to release unto the people a prisoner , whom they would .
text2: Jísat tsawantin apachi uuntri Israer - shuar shiir Enentáimprarat tusa sepunam enketun shuar wakeramun jiiki ankant akupniuyayi .

text: And they had then a notable prisoner , called Barabbas .
text2: Nui sepunam Tunáa shuar Parapás Náartin pujumiayi . Ashí shuar nékarmiayi .

text: Therefore when they were gathered together , Pilate said unto them , Whom will ye that I release unto you ? Barabbas , or Jesus which is called Christ ?
text2: Tuma asamtai Piratu Israer - shuar iruntrarun aniasmiayi " ṡYana ankant akupkat tusarum wakerarum . Parapásnak akupkattaj ; Kristu tutai Jesusnak akupkattaj ? " Tímiayi .

text: For he knew that for envy they had delivered him .
text2: Kame Israer - shuar ántar kajerainiak ni itiarmian nekaamiayi .

text: When he was set down on the judgment seat , his wife sent unto him , saying , Have thou nothing to do with that just man : for I have suffered many things this day in a dream because of him .
text2: Tura Piratu nuna inintrak pujai ni Nuarí chichaman akuptukmiayi . " Ju pénker aishman Súmamtikiatniujai pachiinkiaip . Mesekranam nii aitkiatniun nekaan Wáitsan tsawarjai " Tímiayi .

text: But the chief priests and elders persuaded the multitude that they should ask Barabbas , and destroy Jesus .
text2: Túrasha Israer - patri uuntrisha Israer - shuara uuntrisha " Parapás ankant Wetí , tura Jesus mantamnati " titiarum tusar Shuáran akatrarmiayi .

text: The governor answered and said unto them , Whether of the twain will ye that I release unto you ? They said , Barabbas .
text2: Apachi akupniuri ataksha aniasarmiayi " Ju Jimiará aentsun ṡyana ankant akupkat tusarum wakerarum ? " Tutai " Parapás " tiarmiayi .

text: Pilate saith unto them , What shall I do then with Jesus which is called Christ ? They all say unto him , Let him be crucified .
text2: Tutai aniasarmiayi " Jesusnasha . Yusa Anaikiamuri Kristu tuinia nunasha , ṡItiúrkáttaja ? " Tutai Ashí " Krúsnum Máatá " tiarmiayi .

text: And the governor said , Why , what evil hath he done ? But they cried out the more , saying , Let him be crucified .
text2: Tuíniakui Piratu tiarmiayi " ṡWarí yajauchinia Túrait ? " Tutai kakantar untsumuk " Krúsnum Máatá " tiarmiayi .

text: When Pilate saw that he could prevail nothing , but that rather a tumult was made , he took water , and washed his hands before the multitude , saying , I am innocent of the blood of this just person : see ye to it .
text2: Tura Piratu Jesus uwemtikrachminiaitkiui antsu Ashí shuar charaatum ajainiakui entsa uturtitiarum tusa seamiayi . Tura Ashí iimiainiain ikijmiak Tímiayi " Ju pénker aishman Máatniunam wikia pachiintsujai . Antsu atumek iistarum . "

text: Then answered all the people , and said , His blood be on us , and on our children .
text2: Tutai Ashí shuar tiarmiayi " Iik ii shuarijiai ju aishman Máatin iistaji . "

text: Then released he Barabbas unto them : and when he had scourged Jesus , he delivered him to be crucified .
text2: Nuyá Piratu Parapásan ankant akupkamiayi . Tura Jesus Asutiárum Krúsnum Máatárum tusa akupkamiayi .

text: Then the soldiers of the governor took Jesus into the common hall , and gathered unto him the whole band of soldiers .
text2: Nuyá akupin pujutai jeanam akupniu suntari Jesusan Júkiar Ashí suntaraim irunturarmiayi .

text: And they stripped him , and put on him a scarlet robe .
text2: Tura pushiri aitkiar akupin entsatain kapaaku pushin aentsrarmiayi .

text: And when they had platted a crown of thorns , they put it upon his head , and a reed in his right hand : and they bowed the knee before him , and mocked him , saying , Hail , King of the Jews !
text2: Múuknúmsha tawaspan janki najanamun etsemtikiarmiayi . Tura karisun akupniu numiria aaniun Untsuuríni ataksarmiayi . Túrawar wishikiainiak tikishmatrar tiarmiayi " Israer - shuara uunt akupniurinme . "

text: And they spit upon him , and took the reed , and smote him on the head .
text2: Tiar usukiarmiayi . Tura karisun jurukiar Múuknum awatiarmiayi .

text: And after that they had mocked him , they took the robe off from him , and put his own raiment on him , and led him away to crucify him .
text2: Tura Núkap wishikrar kapaaku pushin aitkiar ni pushirin aentsrarmiayi . Nuyá Krúsnum maatai tusar Júkiarmiayi .

text: And as they came out , they found a man of Cyrene , Simon by name : him they compelled to bear his cross .
text2: Jesusan Jukí wésar Serini nunkanmaya shuaran , ni naari Semun , Jesusa Krúsrin jurukit tusar achikiarmiayi .

text: And when they were come unto a place called Golgotha , that is to say , a place of a skull ,
text2: Nuyá Kúrkutanam ejeniarmiayi . Kúrkutaka , shuar chichamjainkia , muuka ukunch Tútainti .

text: They gave him vinegar to drink mingled with gall : and when he had tasted thereof , he would not drink .
text2: Nui Jesusan umutai Yapájai pachimpra najanamun aartaj tusar Súsarmiayi . Tura Jesus apas iis umarchamiayi .

text: And they crucified him , and parted his garments , casting lots : that it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophet , They parted my garments among them , and upon my vesture did they cast lots .
text2: Krúsnum ajintrurar suntar Yáki Jesusa pushirin jukit tusar nakurusar awakmakua nuna Súsarmiayi . Nújainkia yaunchu Yúsnan etserin aarmia nu uminkiamiayi : " Winia entsarmarun akantrarmiayi tura nakurusar awakmakua nuna winia pushirun Súsarmiayi . " Tu aarmiayi .

text: And sitting down they watched him there ;
text2: Nuyá Wáinkiatai tusar pujursarmiayi .

text: And set up over his head his accusation written , THIS IS JESUS THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Tura urukamtai Máamuit Ashí aents nekaawarti tusa aarman muuknumaani anujtukarmiayi . JUITI JESUS , ISRAERA UUNT AKUPNIURI Tu aarmauyayi .

text: Then were there two thieves crucified with him , one on the right hand , and another on the left .
text2: Núnisan Niijiai métek Jimiará kasa chikichkin untsuurnumani tura chikichnasha menaanmani Krúsnum Máawarmiayi .

text: And they that passed by reviled him , wagging their heads ,
text2: Shuar nui nankaamainiak muuke peatar wishikiainiak

text: And saying , Thou that destroyest the temple , and buildest it in three days , save thyself . If thou be the Son of God , come down from the cross .
text2: tiarmiayi " Ame Yusa Uunt Jee Sáakim Menaintiú tsawantin jeamtatjai Tíchakaitiam . Nekas Yusa Uchirínkiumka Krúsnumia akaikim uwemprata " tiarmiayi .

text: Likewise also the chief priests mocking him , with the scribes and elders , said ,
text2: Núnisan Israer - patri uuntrisha , Israer - shuara jintinniurisha , Pariséusha , Israer - shuara uuntrisha , Jesusan wishikiainiak nuamtak tiarmiayi

text: He saved others ; himself he cannot save . If he be the King of Israel , let him now come down from the cross , and we will believe him .
text2: " Chikichnaka uwemtikraiti tura Nínkikia uwemtsui . Israera Uunt Akupniuríntkiunka Krúsnumia akaikimtai nekas Enentáimtustatji .

text: He trusted in God ; let him deliver him now , if he will have him : for he said , I am the Son of God .
text2: " Yúsan nekas Enentáimtiniaitjai " tawai . Wátsek , Yus nekas Niin aneakka uwemtikrati . " Wi Yusa Uchiríntjai " turamchamkaj ~ i " tiarmiayi .

text: The thieves also , which were crucified with him , cast the same in his teeth .
text2: Kasá shuarsha Niijiai ajintruamu armia nusha Niin wishikrarmiayi .

text: Now from the sixth hour there was darkness over all the land unto the ninth hour .
text2: Nuyá tutupin ai tee ajasmiayi . Túrunayat ataksha aanku Tsáapin ajasmiayi .

text: And about the ninth hour Jesus cried with a loud voice , saying , Eli , Eli , lama sabachthani ? that is to say , My God , my God , why hast thou forsaken me ?
text2: Nuni ai Jesus kakantar untsumkamiayi . " Erí , Erí , rama sapaktani ' Tímiayi . Nusha shuar chichamjainkia " Yusrú , Yusrú , ṡurukamtai ajapa ikiurkiniam ? " tawai .

text: Some of them that stood there , when they heard that , said , This man calleth for Elias .
text2: Shuar nui wajarmia nusha nuna Enentáimtsuk antukar tiarmiayi " Yaunchu Yúsnan etserniun Eríasan untsuawai . "

text: And straightway one of them ran , and took a spunge , and filled it with vinegar , and put it on a reed , and gave him to drink .
text2: Tura chikichik tsékenki we uruchin itiamiayi . Tura churuinian ajamper sapapjai Ijiú mukunati tusa susamiayi .

text: The rest said , Let be , let us see whether Elias will come to save him .
text2: Tura chikichcha Wíshikeak tiarmiayi " Iniáisatá , Erías Tarí uwemtikratpiash . "

text: Jesus , when he had cried again with a loud voice , yielded up the ghost .
text2: Jesus ataksha kakantar untsumak Nuyá jakamiayi .

text: And , behold , the veil of the temple was rent in twain from the top to the bottom ; and the earth did quake , and the rocks rent ;
text2: Nu chichamaik Yusa Uunt Jee tarach ajamu yakiiniya achik nunkaani tseu jaanakmiayi . Nunkasha úurkamiayi . Kayasha jakukarmiayi .

text: And the graves were opened ; and many bodies of the saints which slept arose ,
text2: Núnisan iwiarsamusha uraniarmatai Untsurí Yus - shuar Jákarusha nantakiarmiayi .

text: And came out of the graves after his resurrection , and went into the holy city , and appeared unto many .
text2: Nusha emka Jesus nantakmiatai niisha nantakiar iwiarsamun ikiukiar Yusa péprurin Jerusarénnum wayawarmatai Untsurí shuar Wáinkiarmiayi .

text: Now when the centurion , and they that were with him , watching Jesus , saw the earthquake , and those things that were done , they feared greatly , saying , Truly this was the Son of God .
text2: Nuyá suntar Jesusan Wáinkiarmia nusha tura ni Kapitiántrisha nunka úurkamtai Nuyá chikichcha ashammai ajasmatai ti sapijmiakarmiayi . Tura tiarmiayi " Ju aishman nekas Yusa Uchirínti . "

text: And many women were there beholding afar off , which followed Jesus from Galilee , ministering unto him :
text2: Nuisha nuwa Jesusan nemariarmia nu , arant wajasar , ii wajaarmiayi . Nusha Kariréanmaya pataatukiar Jesusan yainki ejeniarmiayi .

text: Among which was Mary Magdalene , and Mary the mother of James and Joses , and the mother of Zebedee ' s children .
text2: Nujai Máktaranmaya Marisha , Sepetéu nuwésha , tura Chíkich Marisha ármiayi . Chíkich Marikia Jakupuncha tura Jusencha Nukuríyayi .

text: When the even was come , there came a rich man of Arimathaea , named Joseph , who also himself was Jesus ' disciple :
text2: Kiarai shuar ti Kuítrintin Arimatéu péprunmaya ni naari Jusé Támiayi . Nusha Jesusan Enentáimtiniuyayi .

text: He went to Pilate , and begged the body of Jesus . Then Pilate commanded the body to be delivered .
text2: Nii Piratui we Jesusa ayashin seamiayi . Niin Súsarat tusa Piratu akupkamiayi .

text: And when Joseph had taken the body , he wrapped it in a clean linen cloth ,
text2: Túram Jusé Jesusa ayashin krusnumia jusa ti pénker tarachjai penuarmiayi .

text: And laid it in his own new tomb , which he had hewn out in the rock : and he rolled a great stone to the door of the sepulchre , and departed .
text2: Tura kaya waa Táurmanum yamaram amia nui iwiarsamiayi . Ni iwiarsatin Táumtikramunam Jusé iwiarsamiayi . Iwiaras kaya uuntjai etektuk ikiuak wémiayi .

text: And there was Mary Magdalene , and the other Mary , sitting over against the sepulchre .
text2: Nuisha Máktaranmaya Marísha tura Chíkich Marísha iwiarsamunam naka ii pujuarmiayi .

text: Now the next day , that followed the day of the preparation , the chief priests and Pharisees came together unto Pilate ,
text2: Nú Kíarain ayampratin tsawantna mash iwiarnakui Israer - patri uuntrisha Pariséusha Piratui wearmiayi .

text: Saying , Sir , we remember that that deceiver said , while he was yet alive , After three days I will rise again .
text2: Tura tiarmiayi " Uuntá , nu Wáitrin aishman iwiaaku pujus " Menaintiú tsawant jakan nantaktiatjai " Tíniuyi .

text: Command therefore that the sepulchre be made sure until the third day , lest his disciples come by night , and steal him away , and say unto the people , He is risen from the dead : so the last error shall be worse than the first .
text2: Nu asamtai iwiarsamunam menaintiu tsawant suntar Wáinkiarat tusa akuptukta . Ni unuiniamuri kashi tariar tura ni ayashin kasamkar " Pai , nantakni " Shuáran tiarain . Jujainkia nuna nankaamas Shuáran anankawarainti " tiarmiayi .

text: Pilate said unto them , Ye have a watch : go your way , make it as sure as ye can .
text2: Tutai Piratu tiarmiayi " Nui suntar takakrume . Werum iwiarsamu urakchamnia pénker Wáinkiatárum . "

text: So they went , and made the sepulchre sure , sealing the stone , and setting a watch .
text2: Tutai wear iwiarsamun urankashti tusar etektukma inkiunmanum serajai yakarar ni aarmarin anujtukarmiayi . Tura suntarnasha awajtukiarmiayi .

text: In the end of the sabbath , as it began to dawn toward the first day of the week , came Mary Magdalene and the other Mary to see the sepulchre .
text2: Ayampratin tsawant nankaamasmatai tumintin yama tsawaana ai Máktaranmaya Marisha Chíkich Marijiai iwiarsamu iyutai tusar wearmiayi .

text: And , behold , there was a great earthquake : for the angel of the Lord descended from heaven , and came and rolled back the stone from the door , and sat upon it .
text2: Tumai Yusa suntari nayaimpinmaya iwiarsamun Tarí kaya atutkamun urak nui pujusmiayi . Túmakui nunka ti úurkamiayi .

text: His countenance was like lightning , and his raiment white as snow :
text2: Yusa suntarisha peemia Tímiatrus Wínchauyayi . Pushirisha ti puju áuyayi .

text: And for fear of him the keepers did shake , and became as dead men .
text2: Tura iwiarsamun Wáiniarmia Nú suntarsha nuna Wáinkiar ashamainiak ti kurankarmiayi . Jaká ainis ajasarmiayi .

text: And the angel answered and said unto the women , Fear not ye : for I know that ye seek Jesus , which was crucified .
text2: Nuyá nayaimpinmaya suntar nuwan Tímiayi " Ashamkairap . Jesus Krúsnum Máawarmia nu eatsrumek .

text: He is not here : for he is risen , as he said . Come , see the place where the Lord lay .
text2: Juinkia pujatsui . Nii timia Núnisan nantakniuiti . Pai , aepsarma nu iitiarum .

text: And go quickly , and tell his disciples that he is risen from the dead ; and , behold , he goeth before you into Galilee ; there shall ye see him : lo , I have told you .
text2: Wárik wérum ni unuiniamuri " Jesus jakamunmaya nantakni tura wari Kariréanam wétatui . Nui werirum Wáinkiáttarme " titiarum . Wats , nunak Tájai " Tímiayi .

text: And they departed quickly from the sepulchre with fear and great joy ; and did run to bring his disciples word .
text2: Tutai nu nuwa iwiarsamunmaya Wárik Jíinkiar ashamainiayat ti warasar tseke waketkiarmiayi ni unuiniamurin ujaktai tusar .

text: And as they went to tell his disciples , behold , Jesus met them , saying , All hail . And they came and held him by the feet , and worshipped him .
text2: Tumai Jesus wantintiukarmiayi . Tura " pujarmek " takui Jesusan tariar tikishmatrar nawencha miniakrusar shiir awajsarmiayi .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , Be not afraid : go tell my brethren that they go into Galilee , and there shall they see me .
text2: Túram Jesus tiarmiayi " Ashamprukairap . Werum winia yatsur ujatruktarum . Kariréanam Weartí . Nui wear Wáitkiartatui . Tu ujaktarum " Tímiayi .

text: Now when they were going , behold , some of the watch came into the city , and shewed unto the chief priests all the things that were done .
text2: Nuwa wéarmatai iwiarsamu Wáinin suntarsha péprunam wéar Israer - patri uuntrin Ashí Túrunamun ujakarmiayi .

text: And when they were assembled with the elders , and had taken counsel , they gave large money unto the soldiers ,
text2: Niisha nuna antukar Israer - shuara uuntrijiai áujmatsatai tusar wearmiayi . Aujmatsar suntaran ti Kuít akikiar

text: Saying , Say ye , His disciples came by night , and stole him away while we slept .
text2: tiarmiayi " Atumsha étserkuram " Kashi kanararin ni unuiniamuri taar Jesusa ayashin kasamkarmai " titiarum .

text: And if this come to the governor ' s ears , we will persuade him , and secure you .
text2: Tura akupin átum kanarman nekamtaisha niijiai ii iwiarattaji atumin yajauch awajtamsain tusar " tiarmiayi .

text: So they took the money , and did as they were taught : and this saying is commonly reported among the Jews until this day .
text2: Nuyá suntarsha Kuítian achikiar tiarmia nuna Tímiatrusan Titiái tusar wéarmiayi . Tura tuke yamaisha Israer - shuar tu Túrunaiti Tuíniawai .

text: Then the eleven disciples went away into Galilee , into a mountain where Jesus had appointed them .
text2: Nuyá ni auntse ( 11 ) unuiniamuri Kariréanam wéarmiayi . Tura Jesus timia Nú nainnium jeawar

text: And when they saw him , they worshipped him : but some doubted .
text2: nui Jesusan Wáinkiar tikishmatrarmiayi . Kame Chíkichka Jesusashit Tuíniayat Niin Wáinkiar tikishmatrarmiayi .

text: And Jesus came and spake unto them , saying , All power is given unto me in heaven and in earth .
text2: Nuyá Jesus Tíjiuch Tantá Tímiayi " Ashí nayaimpinmasha nunkasha akupkatniun kakarman surusuiti .

text: Go ye therefore , and teach all nations , baptizing them in the name of the Father , and of the Son , and of the Holy Ghost :
text2: Tuma asamtai Ashí nunkanam werum Ashí shuar jintintiarum Wíi shuar awajsatarum . Túrarum Yus Apa Náarijiai , Yus Uchi Náarijiai , tura Yus Wakani Náarijiai imiaitiarum .

text: Teaching them to observe all things whatsoever I have commanded you : and , lo , I am with you alway , even unto the end of the world . Amen .
text2: Ashí atumin Wi akatramajrum nu Nútiksarmek umiktin unuiniartarum . Tura ju nekaatarum : Tuke tsawantai ikiutsuk atumjai pujuttajai " Tímiayi Jesus .

text: The beginning of the gospel of Jesus Christ , the Son of God ;
text2: Jui Jesukrístunu shiir chicham Nánkameawai . Jesukrístu Yusa Uchirínti .

text: As it is written in the prophets , Behold , I send my messenger before thy face , which shall prepare thy way before thee .
text2: Yuska imiakratin Juankan pachis ni etserniurin Isayasan ti yaunchu ni Papiriin juna aamtikramiayi : " Iisiana , ame wéamurmin emka Wetí tusan winia akatramurun akupeajai . Niisha ame jintimin iwiarattawai .

text: The voice of one crying in the wilderness , Prepare ye the way of the Lord , make his paths straight .
text2: Niisha aents atsamunam untsumuk juna Títiatui : " Uunta jinti iwiarturtarum ; naka awajsatarum . " Nuke aarmaiti .

text: John did baptize in the wilderness , and preach the baptism of repentance for the remission of sins .
text2: Wats , aents atsamunam imiakratin Juan imiaittsa pujus étseruk , " " tunaarun Yus asakatrurat " tusarum , Enentáim Yapajiárum imiantiarum " Tímiayi .

text: And there went out unto him all the land of Judaea , and they of Jerusalem , and were all baptized of him in the river of Jordan , confessing their sins .
text2: Anturkatai tusar Ashí Jutía nunkanmaya shuar tura Jerusarén peprunmaya shuarsha Niin tariarmiayi . Taar , ni tunaarin ujakarmatai , Juan Jurtan entsanam imiainiarmiayi .

text: And John was clothed with camel ' s hair , and with a girdle of a skin about his loins ; and he did eat locusts and wild honey ;
text2: Juansha kamiriu ure najantramun entsauyayi . Emenmamkesha nuapeyayi . Tura chinijiai yutai - Títikriatsnasha yuuyayi .

text: And preached , saying , There cometh one mightier than I after me , the latchet of whose shoes I am not worthy to stoop down and unloose .
text2: Niisha aentsun ujaak Tímiayi " Wíjiainkia nankaamas ana nu winia ukurui winittiawai . Niisha nekas ii Uuntri asamtai , wikia tsuntsumpruan ni sapatri jinkiamurinkisha atitrachminiaitjai .

text: I indeed have baptized you with water : but he shall baptize you with the Holy Ghost .
text2: Wikia entsajain aya ayashmin imiaajrume , antsu Ninkia imiantinia aanis Yusa Wakani atumi Enentáin enketramprattarme " Tímiayi .

text: And it came to pass in those days , that Jesus came from Nazareth of Galilee , and was baptized of John in Jordan .
text2: Juan aentsun imiak pujurainiai , Jesuska Nasarét pepru Kariréa nunkanam ana Nuyá jiinki Juankan tarimiayi . Tura Juan Jurtan entsanam Jesusan imiaimiayi .

text: And straightway coming up out of the water , he saw the heavens opened , and the Spirit like a dove descending upon him :
text2: Nuin , Jesus entsaya jiiniuk , nayaimpin uranniun Wáinkiamiayi . Tura Yusa Wakanín Yámpitsa Núnin najanar Niin taarun Wáinkiamiayi .

text: And there came a voice from heaven , saying , Thou art my beloved Son , in whom I am well pleased .
text2: Tura nayaimpinmaya chichaamun juna antukmiayi , " Ameka winia aneamu Uchiruitme . Amin shiir Enentáimtajme . "

text: And immediately the Spirit driveth him into the wilderness .
text2: Nuyá Wárik Yusa Wakaní Jesusan atsamunam jukimiayi .

text: And he was there in the wilderness forty days , tempted of Satan ; and was with the wild beasts ; and the angels ministered unto him .
text2: Tura nui , yajasma yujamunam , kuarenta tsawant pujumiayi . Nui pujai uunt iwianch Satanás naartin Jesusan nekapsataj tusa pujurmiayi . Túramtai Jesusan Wáinkiatai tusar nayaimpinmaya suntar tariarmiayi .

text: Now after that John was put in prison , Jesus came into Galilee , preaching the gospel of the kingdom of God ,
text2: Ukunam , Juankan sepunam enkeawarmatai , Jesuska Kariréa nunkanam Yusa akupeamurin pachis shiir chichaman etserki Támiayi .

text: And saying , The time is fulfilled , and the kingdom of God is at hand : repent ye , and believe the gospel .
text2: " Tsawant jeayi . Shuarnum Yusa akupeamuri jeatemai . Tuma asamtai , yaunchu Enentáimsamuram Yapajiárum , Uwempratin Chicham umirkatarum " tu etserkamiayi .

text: Now as he walked by the sea of Galilee , he saw Simon and Andrew his brother casting a net into the sea : for they were fishers .
text2: Jesus Kariréa antumianka Kánmatkariin wekas , namakan achinian Semunnasha ni yachi Antresnasha nekan ajuntuk pujuinian Wáinkiamiayi .

text: And Jesus said unto them , Come ye after me , and I will make you to become fishers of men .
text2: Wáiniak " Nemartustarum , Tímiayi . Namak achiarmena Nútiksanak aentsun - eau Yusna arti tusan awajsatjarme " Tímiayi .

text: And straightway they forsook their nets , and followed him .
text2: Tura nuyanka ni nekarin ajapa ikiuiniak Jesusan nemarsarmiayi .

text: And when he had gone a little further thence , he saw James the son of Zebedee , and John his brother , who also were in the ship mending their nets .
text2: Nuyasha Jesus ishichik arantach wesa , Sepetéu Uchirín Jakupun ni yachin Juánnasha kanunam ni nekarin Apáa pujuinian Wáinkiarmiayi .

text: And straightway he called them : and they left their father Zebedee in the ship with the hired servants , and went after him .
text2: Wáiniak , nemartusta tusa untsukarmiayi . Tutai ni Aparíncha , ni apari takarniurincha kanunam ikiuiniak Jesusan nemarsarmiayi .

text: And they went into Capernaum ; and straightway on the sabbath day he entered into the synagogue , and taught .
text2: Nuyá Kapernáum péprunam jeawarmiayi . Nui Israer - shuara ayampratin tsawantri jeakui Jesus Israer - shuar iruntainiam Wayá Yus - Chichaman unuiniamiayi .

text: And they were astonished at his doctrine : for he taught them as one that had authority , and not as the scribes .
text2: Tura ni jintinniuri jintintiarmia nuna iniankas uunt chichamjai Jesus Jintíakui ni chichamen anturkar ti Enentáimprarmiayi .

text: And there was in their synagogue a man with an unclean spirit ; and he cried out ,
text2: Nuisha nu iruntainiam aishman iwianchruku ámiayi . Niisha untsumuk

text: Saying , Let us alone ; what have we to do with thee , thou Jesus of Nazareth ? art thou come to destroy us ? I know thee who thou art , the Holy One of God .
text2: " ṡWarí itiurtamkattsamea incha taum , Nasarétnumia Jesusa ? Wikia nékajme . Ametme Tunaartichu Yúsaiya winiamna nu . Iin emestamprataj tusam Táchamek " Tímiayi .

text: And Jesus rebuked him , saying , Hold thy peace , and come out of him .
text2: Tutai , Jesus kakantar chicharuk " Takamátsatá . Ni Enentáiya Jíinkitia , Tájame " Tímiayi .

text: And when the unclean spirit had torn him , and cried with a loud voice , he came out of him .
text2: Tutai íwianch aishmankan ukurak ajakninkiar untsumak kakaar aa Jíinkimiayi .

text: And they were all amazed , insomuch that they questioned among themselves , saying , What thing is this ? what new doctrine is this ? for with authority commandeth he even the unclean spirits , and they do obey him .
text2: Nuna Wáinkiar , ashamkar Nuámtak aniniaisarmiayi . " ṡAusha warinkit . Yamaram chicham Warí chichamait ? Ju Jesuska Timiá kakaram asa ímia iwianchin akupeatsuk . Iisiana umirainiatsuk " tiarmiayi .

text: And immediately his fame spread abroad throughout all the region round about Galilee .
text2: Tura ti Wárik nu Túrunamu Ashí Kariréa nunkanam antunkamiayi .

text: And forthwith , when they were come out of the synagogue , they entered into the house of Simon and Andrew , with James and John .
text2: Nuyá Israer - shuara iruntai jeenia jiinki Jesuska Jakupujai Juanjaisha we , Semun ni yachi Antresjai pujuarmia nui jeawarmiayi .

text: But Simon ' s wife ' s mother lay sick of a fever , and anon they tell him of her .
text2: Semunka tsatsari tsuer peaknum jaa tepemiayi . Núnaka Wárik Jesusan ujakarmiayi .

text: And he came and took her by the hand , and lifted her up ; and immediately the fever left her , and she ministered unto them .
text2: Nuinkia Jesus Werí uwejnum achik iniantkimiayi . Tura nu chichamaik michatramiayi . Michatar , pénker ajas , Jesusnasha ni nemarniurincha ayurawarmiayi .

text: And at even , when the sun did set , they brought unto him all that were diseased , and them that were possessed with devils .
text2: Nu tsawantai kiarai , Ashí Jáinian , iwianchrukuncha Jesusan itiariarmiayi .

text: And all the city was gathered together at the door .
text2: Tura Ashí Nú péprunmaya shuar taar Wáitiniam Jesusan Káutkarmiayi .

text: And he healed many that were sick of divers diseases , and cast out many devils ; and suffered not the devils to speak , because they knew him .
text2: Untsurí Shuáran Chíkich sunkuraim Jáinian Jesus tsuararmiayi . Tura iwianchruku armia nuna Enentáiyan iwianchin Jíirkiarmiayi . Jesuska íwianch nékamu asa , winia Náarun ántar pachisarain tusa suritkiarmiayi .

text: And in the morning , rising up a great while before day , he went out , and departed into a solitary place , and there prayed .
text2: Nuyá kashin Káshik tsawaatsain Jesus nantaki Yúsan áujsataj tusa jiinki atsamunam wémiayi .

text: And Simon and they that were with him followed after him .
text2: Tura Semun ni amikrijiai Jesus wemaanum wéarmiayi .

text: And when they had found him , they said unto him , All men seek for thee .
text2: Niin Wáinkiar " Ashi shuar Amin eatmainiawai " tiarmiayi .

text: And he said unto them , Let us go into the next towns , that I may preach there also : for therefore came I forth .
text2: Tutai Jesus chichaak " Chíkich péprunmasha arantach wetai . Nui Yusa chichame etserkatai ; nuna Túrattsan Táwitjai " Tímiayi .

text: And he preached in their synagogues throughout all Galilee , and cast out devils .
text2: Nuna ti Ashí Kariréa nunkanam Israer - shuar iruntai jeanam etseras wekaimiayi ; tura Núnisan iwianchniasha jiiki akupkini wekaimiayi .

text: And there came a leper to him , beseeching him , and kneeling down to him , and saying unto him , If thou wilt , thou canst make me clean .
text2: Túramtai , ti tunamaru shuar Jesusan seatajtsa tarimiayi . Taa tikishmatar Tímiayi " Wakerutakmeka tsuaratin tujintratsme . "

text: And Jesus , moved with compassion , put forth his hand , and touched him , and saith unto him , I will ; be thou clean .
text2: Jesus niin waitnentak uwejejai antinmiayi . Antin " Wakerajme . Pénker ajasta " Tímiayi .

text: And as soon as he had spoken , immediately the leprosy departed from him , and he was cleansed .
text2: Nu chichamaik , Jesus chichakmatai , ni sunkuri menkakamiayi . Tura pénker ajasmiayi .

text: And he straitly charged him , and forthwith sent him away ;
text2: Túrunamtai Jesus kakantar chicharuk

text: And saith unto him , See thou say nothing to any man : but go thy way , shew thyself to the priest , and offer for thy cleansing those things which Moses commanded , for a testimony unto them .
text2: akupeak " Wáinkiatá , Nánkamsam etseraip , Tímiayi . Antsu weme , Israer - patrirmin iniakmamsata . Túram Ashí aents ame pénker ajasmarumin nekaawarat tusam , Muisais aar akupkamiania nu umikiam Súsatin ana nu susata " Tímiayi .

text: But he went out , and began to publish it much , and to blaze abroad the matter , insomuch that Jesus could no more openly enter into the city , but was without in desert places : and they came to him from every quarter .
text2: Tura etserkaip Támaitiat , jiinki ni Túrunamurin mash etseramiayi . Tura nuna etserka asamtai , péprunam , aents írunmanum wétinian Jesus nakitramiayi , antsu aa atsamunam pujumiayi . Tura Ashí nunkanmaya Jesusan tariarmiayi .

text: And again he entered into Capernaum , after some days ; and it was noised that he was in the house .
text2: Kapernáum péprunam Jesus ukunam ataksha wémiayi . Jeamtai , ni jeen pujan nekaawarmiayi .

text: And straightway many were gathered together , insomuch that there was no room to receive them , no , not so much as about the door : and he preached the word unto them .
text2: Tuma asamtai shuar Wárik ti Untsurí Káutkarmiayi . Ti Untsurí asamtai , jea piakmiayi ; Wáitinmasha ankantchauyayi . Jesuska Yus - Chichaman nu aentsun ujaak pujurmiayi .

text: And they come unto him , bringing one sick of the palsy , which was borne of four .
text2: Nuinkia ni amikrin emearun kuatru shuar tampumpruawar Júkiar Jesusan itiariarmiayi .

text: And when they could not come nigh unto him for the press , they uncovered the roof where he was : and when they had broken it up , they let down the bed wherein the sick of the palsy lay .
text2: Tura jeawar , Untsurí shuar írunu ásamtai Jeá wayatniun tujinkiarmiayi . Tuma ásar , yakinini wakar jea urakar , aankawar , tampunam ni amikrin Jesus pujamunam awaintiuawar itiararmiayi .

text: When Jesus saw their faith , he said unto the sick of the palsy , Son , thy sins be forgiven thee .
text2: Tura niisha Jesus nekas Tsuártatui tu Enentáimmiarin Jesus Nekáa emearun chicharuk , " Uchirú , ame tunaarumka tsankuramuiti " Tímiayi .

text: But there were certain of the scribes sitting there , and reasoning in their hearts ,
text2: Israer - shuara jintinniurisha nuna Antúu pujuarmiayi . Tura ni Enentáijiai Enentáimsar ,

text: Why doth this man thus speak blasphemies ? who can forgive sins but God only ?
text2: " ṡJusha urukamtai emearun tu chichara ? Yúsan Imiá yajauch chicharui . Warí , yaki tunaan asakarminiait ; aya Yúsak tunaan asakarchamniakait " tu Enentáimsarmiayi .

text: And immediately when Jesus perceived in his spirit that they so reasoned within themselves , he said unto them , Why reason ye these things in your hearts ?
text2: Jesuska ni Enentáimmiarin nekarawar " ṡUrukamtia átum tu Enentáimprum ? Tímiayi .

text: Whether is it easier to say to the sick of the palsy , Thy sins be forgiven thee ; or to say , Arise , and take up thy bed , and walk ?
text2: Emearu , tunaarum tsankuramuiti Títinjai , emearu , wajakim tampuram entsakim wekasata Títinjai ṡTuá Imiá Yúpichuchit ?

text: But that ye may know that the Son of man hath power on earth to forgive sins , ( he saith to the sick of the palsy , )
text2: Wats wi , Aents Ajasu asan Yusa kakarmarijiai shuara tunaari tsankuramniaitjiana nuna paant iwiaintiuktajrume " Tímiayi . Nuna tinia emearun chicharuk

text: I say unto thee , Arise , and take up thy bed , and go thy way into thine house .
text2: " Wajaktia , Tájame ; Túram tampuram jukim jéemiin Wetá " Tímiayi .

text: And immediately he arose , took up the bed , and went forth before them all ; insomuch that they were all amazed , and glorified God , saying , We never saw it on this fashion .
text2: Nu chichamaik emearu wajaki , tampurin Jukí , Ashí íimiainiain Jíinkimiayi . Nuna Túrunamtai Ashí ashamkarmiayi . Tura " Jútikiamu penké Wáinchaitji " tiar Yusa Náarin uunt awajsarmiayi .

text: And he went forth again by the sea side ; and all the multitude resorted unto him , and he taught them .
text2: Nuyá ukunam Jesus antumiannum waketkimiayi . Tura Ashí shuar Káunkarmatai jintintiawarmiayi .

text: And as he passed by , he saw Levi the son of Alphaeus sitting at the receipt of custom , and said unto him , Follow me . And he arose and followed him .
text2: Tura jintintiawar amuk , akupin akitiai jeanam nankaamak , Arpeu uchirin Riwin pujan Wáinkiamiayi . Wáiniak " Nemartusta " Tímiayi . Tutai Riwí wajaki Jesusan nemarsamiayi .

text: And it came to pass , that , as Jesus sat at meat in his house , many publicans and sinners sat also together with Jesus and his disciples : for there were many , and they followed him .
text2: Chíkich tsawant , Riwisha Jesusan ni jeen itiaamiayi . Tura Untsurí Kuítian - juu shuarsha , yajauch shuarsha Jesusjai ni unuiniamurijiaisha ashi nuim misanam pujuarmiai .

text: And when the scribes and Pharisees saw him eat with publicans and sinners , they said unto his disciples , How is it that he eateth and drinketh with publicans and sinners ?
text2: Tura Kuítian - juu shuarsha yajauch shuarsha Jesusjai irunar Yurumáinian Wáinkiar , Pariséu jintinniurisha Israer - shuara jintinniurisha Jesusa unuiniamurin aniasarmiayi . " ṡUrukamtai ame uuntrum Jesus , Kuítian - juu shuarjai tura yajauch shuarjaisha yuruma ? " tiarmiayi .

text: When Jesus heard it , he saith unto them , They that are whole have no need of the physician , but they that are sick : I came not to call the righteous , but sinners to repentance .
text2: Jesus nuna antuk Tímiayi " Jaachu shuar Tsuákratniun atsumainiatsui . Antsu jaa ana nu Tsuákratniun atsumainiawai . Wats , " pénkeraitjai " tuinia Nú shuaran untsuktajtsan Táchaitjai ; antsu " tunaitjai " tuinia Nú shuaran Winia ajasat tusan untsuktajtsan Táwitjai " Tímiayi .

text: And the disciples of John and of the Pharisees used to fast : and they come and say unto him , Why do the disciples of John and of the Pharisees fast , but thy disciples fast not ?
text2: Juanka unuiniamurisha Pariséu unuiniamurisha yurumtsuk Yúsan áujiarmiayi . Túmakui Chíkich shuar Jesusan tariar chicharainiak , " Juanka unuiniamurisha , Pariséu unuiniamurisha yurumtsuk Yúsan áujainiatsuk ; ṡame unuiniamurmeka urukamtai yurumtsuk áujainiatsu ? " tiarmiayi .

text: And Jesus said unto them , Can the children of the bridechamber fast , while the bridegroom is with them ? as long as they have the bridegroom with them , they cannot fast .
text2: Tutai Jesus chichaak , " ṡNuatma nampernum ipiaamu ainia nu ijiarmawartiniak ainia ? Yama nuatu pujakui ni amikri warainiak ijiarmachartin ainiawai . Núnisan winia unuiniamur , Wi pujakui , warainiak yurumtsuk pujuschartin ainiawai .

text: But the days will come , when the bridegroom shall be taken away from them , and then shall they fast in those days .
text2: Tura tsawant jeattawai , Winia jurukiartin . Nuinkia winia unuiniamur ijiarmawartatui ' Tímiayi Jesus .

text: No man also seweth a piece of new cloth on an old garment : else the new piece that filled it up taketh away from the old , and the rent is made worse .
text2: Tura Nuyá juna Tímiayi ` Mamuru Pushí jaanakmatai yamaram tarach anujtukchatniuiti . Túramka nijiam yamaram tarach sumpeak mamushan Chinkiá nuna nankaamas Jáaktatui .

text: And no man putteth new wine into old bottles : else the new wine doth burst the bottles , and the wine is spilled , and the bottles will be marred : but new wine must be put into new bottles .
text2: Nijiamanch Yamái nawar nuap najanamu arutnum yaraachminiaiti . Túramka wakaprua Karíak nuap najanamu ijiakratniuiti . Tura nijiamanch ukarattawai . Nuap najanamu yajauch ajastatui . Antsu yamaram nijiamanch yamaram nuap najanamunam yaraatniuiti " Tímiayi .

text: And it came to pass , that he went through the corn fields on the sabbath day ; and his disciples began , as they went , to pluck the ears of corn .
text2: Chíkich ayampratin tsawantai Jesus ajanman ajapén nankaamarmiayi . Tura ni unuiniamuri trikiu neren majukiar wearmiayi .

text: And the Pharisees said unto him , Behold , why do they on the sabbath day that which is not lawful ?
text2: Nuna Wáinkiar Pariséu Jesusan chicharainiak " ṡWarí , urukamtai ame unuiniamuram ayampratin tsawant takastin surimkiamu aisha takainia ? " tiarmiayi .

text: And he said unto them , Have ye never read what David did , when he had need , and was an hungred , he , and they that were with him ?
text2: Tutai Jesus Tímiayi " Ii uuntri Tawitia Túramuri Yús - Papinium áujsachukaitrum . Niisha ni nemarniurisha tsukamainiak , ni yurumkari atsakui , Túrawarmia nu áujsachukaitrum .

text: How he went into the house of God in the days of Abiathar the high priest , and did eat the shewbread , which is not lawful to eat but for the priests , and gave also to them which were with him ?
text2: Apiatár Yusnan pujurniu uuntri pujai Uunt Tawit Yusa Jeen wayamiayi . Tura Tawitkia , patri nankaamas uunt asa , Pátrichuitiat , iniaktusma tantan , aya patri Yútainiak , yuamiayi ; tura ni nemarniurincha ajamsamiayi . Nu áujsachukaitrum , Tímiayi .

text: And he said unto them , The sabbath was made for man , and not man for the sabbath :
text2: Ayampratin tsawantai Túrashtinian umirkashtimpiash tusa Yuska aentsun najanachmiayi . Antsu aents ayamprarat tusa Yus ayampratin tsawantan tesamiayi .

text: Therefore the Son of man is Lord also of the sabbath .
text2: Wisha , Aents Ajasu asan imia ayampratin tsawantan Nerenniurintjai " Tímiayi .

text: And he entered again into the synagogue ; and there was a man there which had a withered hand .
text2: Ataksha Chíkich tsawantai Israer - shuar iruntainiam Jesus wayamiayi . Nui shuar ámiayi , ni uweje jaka .

text: And they watched him , whether he would heal him on the sabbath day ; that they might accuse him .
text2: Tura Tunáan Túrayi titiai tusar wakeruiniak " ayampratin tsawantai Tsuártimpiash " tusar , Pariséu shuarsha Jesusan ii pujuriarmiayi .

text: And he saith unto the man which had the withered hand , Stand forth .
text2: Nuinkia Jesus uweje jaka shuaran chicharuk " Ajapén wajasta " Tímiayi .

text: And he saith unto them , Is it lawful to do good on the sabbath days , or to do evil ? to save life , or to kill ? But they held their peace .
text2: Nuinkia mamikmaun chicharuk " ṡAyampratin tsawantai pénker Túratin yajauch Túratniujai Tuá Imiá pénkerait . Shuar uwemtikratin Máatniujai Tuá Imiá pénkerait ? " Tímiayi . Nuna takui niisha pachischarmiayi .

text: And when he had looked round about on them with anger , being grieved for the hardness of their hearts , he saith unto the man , Stretch forth thine hand . And he stretched it out : and his hand was restored whole as the other .
text2: Tura Jesus kajek niin iiyarmiayi ; tura ni Enentáin Kátsuram ásarmatai Kúntuts Enentáimsamiayi . Tura Shuáran chicharuk " Uwejem iniakmasta " Tímiayi . Iniakmasmatai ni uweje jaruku ataksha pénker ajatsamiayi .

text: And the Pharisees went forth , and straightway took counsel with the Herodians against him , how they might destroy him .
text2: Nuyá Pariséu shuar Jíinkiar , Jesus maami tusar Erutis shuarjai áujmatsarmiayi .

text: But Jesus withdrew himself with his disciples to the sea : and a great multitude from Galilee followed him , and from Judaea ,
text2: Nuyá Jesus ni unuiniamurijiai antumiannum wémiayi . Kariréa nunkanmaya Untsurí shuarsha Jesusan nemariarmiayi .

text: And from Jerusalem , and from Idumaea , and from beyond Jordan ; and they about Tyre and Sidon , a great multitude , when they had heard what great things he did , came unto him .
text2: Untsurí nunkanmayasha Káunkarmiayi . Jutía nunkanmayasha , Jerusarén péprunmayasha , Itiumía nunkanmayasha , Jurtan entsa amainiasha , Tiru tura Setun pepru pujuinia Nú nunkanmayasha , Untsurí shuar ni Túramurin nekaawar , Jesusan Káutkarmiayi .

text: And he spake to his disciples , that a small ship should wait on him because of the multitude , lest they should throng him .
text2: Untsurí Káunkar chanuntawarain tusa Jesus ni unuiniamurin kanuram Inianáastarum tusa seamiayi .

text: For he had healed many ; insomuch that they pressed upon him for to touch him , as many as had plagues .
text2: Kame Untsurí shuaran Jesus nuik tsuaru asamtai , jaa shuar nui Káunkarmiania nu Jesusan antintaj tusar shitianainiakui nuna seamiayi .

text: And unclean spirits , when they saw him , fell down before him , and cried , saying , Thou art the Son of God .
text2: Tura iwianchrukusha Jesusan Wáinkiar tikishmatrarmiayi . Untsumainiak " Ame nekas Yusa Uchirínme " tiarmiayi .

text: And he straitly charged them that they should not make him known .
text2: Tura nuna etserkairap tusa Jesuska kakantramiayi .

text: And he goeth up into a mountain , and calleth unto him whom he would : and they came unto him .
text2: Nuyá Jesus Náinnium wakamiayi . Tura anaikiatniun wakerimia Nú shuaran untsukmiayi . Tura niisha Jesusan weriarmiayi .

text: And he ordained twelve , that they should be with him , and that he might send them forth to preach ,
text2: Tura Niijiai wekasar Yus - Chichaman unuiniartinian tuse Shuáran anaikiarmiayi .

text: And to have power to heal sicknesses , and to cast out devils :
text2: Tura sunkur Tsuártinian , iwianchcha jiiki akupkatniun ni kakarmarin Súsarmiayi Nú shuaran .

text: And Simon he surnamed Peter ;
text2: Ju Shuáran anaikiamu ármiayi : Semun , Jesus Chíkich naarin Pítiur apujtusmiania nu ;

text: And James the son of Zebedee , and John the brother of James ; and he surnamed them Boanerges , which is , The sons of thunder :
text2: Sepetéu uchiri Jakupu , ni patai Juánsha ; ipiamtajai métek kakaram ásarmatai nuna mai " Puanérjis " naari susamiayi . Nusha shuar chichamjainkia " ipiamta nuke " tawai .

text: And Andrew , and Philip , and Bartholomew , and Matthew , and Thomas , and James the son of Alphaeus , and Thaddaeus , and Simon the Canaanite ,
text2: Nuyá Antressha , Jiripi , Parturumí , Mateu , Tumas , Arpeu Uchirí Jakupu , Tateu , ásump Semun ,

text: And Judas Iscariot , which also betrayed him : and they went into an house .
text2: Jútas Iskariúti . Jesusan ukunam surukmia Nú Jútasauyayi . Anaik amukmatai Jeá waketrarmiayi .

text: And the multitude cometh together again , so that they could not so much as eat bread .
text2: Waketkiarmatai , ti Untsurí shuar taarmatai takatri ti akui , Yurumátniun jeacharmiayi .

text: And when his friends heard of it , they went out to lay hold on him : for they said , He is beside himself .
text2: Jesusa Shuárisha nuna nekaawar Jesus ti itiurchat pujus Wáurtsuash tu Enentáimsar jukitiai tusar nu jeanam jeariarmiayi .

text: And the scribes which came down from Jerusalem said , He hath Beelzebub , and by the prince of the devils casteth he out devils .
text2: Nuyá Israer - shuara jintinniuri Jerusarénnumia Táarmiania nu , Jesusan áujmatainiak " Pirsepú enkea asa iwianchrukuiti . Tuma asa uunt iwianchi kakarmarijiai iwianchin jiiki akupeawai " tiarmiayi .

text: And he called them unto him , and said unto them in parables , How can Satan cast out Satan ?
text2: Tutai Jesus winitiarum tusa niin untsukmiayi . Tura Enentáimtikrataj tusa juna Tímiayi : " ṡIwianch Satanáskesha itiur ajapmamatin ~ ki ?

text: And if a kingdom be divided against itself , that kingdom cannot stand .
text2: Chikichik Nú nunkanmaya shuar Nuámtak kajernaiyakuinkia , nu nunka wari meserchattawak .

text: And if a house be divided against itself , that house cannot stand .
text2: Nuámtak shuar ni shuarijiai kajernaiyakuinkia nu shuarsha amunaikchartatuak .

text: And if Satan rise up against himself , and be divided , he cannot stand , but hath an end .
text2: Núnisan ṡSatanáskesha ni suntarijiai Máaniakka itiurak tuke pujusarat ? Amunaikiartatui .

text: No man can enter into a strong man ' s house , and spoil his goods , except he will first bind the strong man ; and then he will spoil his house .
text2: Nánkamas shuar kakaram shuara jeen Wayá , nérenniun jinkiatsuk ni Kuítrin kasarkachminiaiti . Antsu nérenniun Jinkiá ni Kuítrin kasarkamniaiti .

text: Verily I say unto you , All sins shall be forgiven unto the sons of men , and blasphemies wherewith soever they shall blaspheme :
text2: Nekas Tájarme , shuar Tunáa Ashí Túruiniana nuka tsankuramniaiti . Winiasha winia Aparnasha yajauch áujmatusha tsankuramniaiti .

text: But he that shall blaspheme against the Holy Ghost hath never forgiveness , but is in danger of eternal damnation :
text2: Antsu Yusa Wakanín yajauch áujmatna nuka tsankurachminiaiti ; antsu nu shuar ninki tuke sumamattawai . "

text: Because they said , He hath an unclean spirit .
text2: " Jesuska iwianchrukuiti " Tuíniakui Jesus Nuní Tímiayi .

text: There came then his brethren and his mother , and , standing without , sent unto him , calling him .
text2: Nuyá ni yachi ni Nukuríjiai taar aa wajasar , Jesusan untsukat tusa akupkarmiayi .

text: And the multitude sat about him , and they said unto him , Behold , thy mother and thy brethren without seek for thee .
text2: Shuar Jesusan téntak pujuarmia nu tiarmiayi " Iis , nukusha , yatsumsha aa wajasar untsurmainiawai . "

text: And he answered them , saying , Who is my mother , or my brethren ?
text2: Tutai Jesus chichaak " Ya ainia winia nukursha yatsursha " Tímiayi .

text: And he looked round about on them which sat about him , and said , Behold my mother and my brethren !
text2: Niin téntakar pujuarmia nuna iis " Júiti winia nukurka , yatsurka , Tímiayi .

text: For whosoever shall do the will of God , the same is my brother , and my sister , and mother .
text2: Shuar Yusa wakeramurin uminiana nu winia yatsuruiti , winia umaruiti , winia nukuruiti " Tímiayi .

text: And he began again to teach by the sea side : and there was gathered unto him a great multitude , so that he entered into a ship , and sat in the sea ; and the whole multitude was by the sea on the land .
text2: Nuyá jiinki antumianka yantamen Jesus ataksha unuiniartinian juarkimiayi . Tura Untsurí shuar iruntrarmatai , kanunam enkempramiayi . Shuarsha antumianka Káanmatkarin pujuarmiayi .

text: And he taught them many things by parables , and said unto them in his doctrine ,
text2: Jesuska métek - taku chichamjai ti Jintintiármiayi . Jintintiuk juna Tímiayi :

text: Hearken ; Behold , there went out a sower to sow :
text2: " Antuktarum . Atsaamin atsaamprataj tusa Jíinkimiai .

text: And it came to pass , as he sowed , some fell by the way side , and the fowls of the air came and devoured it up .
text2: Atsaamkui ni arakri Jintiá iniararmai . Chinki yakiya Káutkar yuawarmai .

text: And some fell on stony ground , where it had not much earth ; and immediately it sprang up , because it had no depth of earth :
text2: Chikichcha kaya írunmanum iniararmai , nunka ishichik ámanum . Tura nunka ishichik asamtai Wárik tsapainiarmai .

text: But when the sun was up , it was scorched ; and because it had no root , it withered away .
text2: Tura etsa etsantar Sukuám kankape Atsá asamtai Káararmai .

text: And some fell among thorns , and the thorns grew up , and choked it , and it yielded no fruit .
text2: Chikichcha Jankí nupanam iniararmai . Jankisha tsapainiar kankar ajakrarmai ; Túram nerekcharmai .

text: And other fell on good ground , and did yield fruit that sprang up and increased ; and brought forth , some thirty , and some sixty , and some an hundred .
text2: Chikichcha pénker nunkanam iniararmai . Tura tsapainiar nerekarmai , Chíkich trainta , Chíkich sesenta , Chíkich sian nerekarmai .

text: And he said unto them , He that hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Kuíshim ákuinkia antuktarum " Tímiayi .

text: And when he was alone , they that were about him with the twelve asked of him the parable .
text2: Untsurí wearmatai , ishichik Niijiai juakarmiania nu , ni tuse unuiniamurijiai aniasarmiayi " ṡAme jintintiamna nusha warimpiait ? " tiarmiayi .

text: And he said unto them , Unto you it is given to know the mystery of the kingdom of God : but unto them that are without , all these things are done in parables :
text2: Tutai Jesus chichaak " Yuska ni akupeamurin atumin paant nekamtikramattsa wakerutmarme . Antsu Chíkich shuarka aya métek - taku chichamjai Jintintiáwartatui .

text: That seeing they may see , and not perceive ; and hearing they may hear , and not understand ; lest at any time they should be converted , and their sins should be forgiven them .
text2: Iiniayatan Wáinkiacharat tusa , antukarsha nekaacharat tusa , umirtsuk ni tunaari tsankurnacharat tusa Túrattawai ' Tímiayi .

text: And he said unto them , Know ye not this parable ? and how then will ye know all parables ?
text2: Tura Tímiayi ` Wi jintintiajrumna Nú métek - taku chicham nekaachurmek . Nu nékachkurmeka ṡitiurak Chíkich métek - taku chichamsha nekaatarum ?

text: The sower soweth the word .
text2: Atsaamniua nuka Yus - Chichaman étserna nuna nakumui .

text: And these are they by the way side , where the word is sown ; but when they have heard , Satan cometh immediately , and taketh away the word that was sown in their hearts .
text2: Jinkiái Jintiá iniaarua nuna Chíkich shuar ántuiniamun nakumui . Nu shuar chichaman ántuiniawai . Tura antukarmatai Satanás Wárik Tarí ni Enentáin atsaampramun jurawai .

text: And these are they likewise which are sown on stony ground ; who , when they have heard the word , immediately receive it with gladness ;
text2: Chíkich shuar ántuiniamu kayanam atsaampramua Núniskete . Niisha chichaman antukar Wárik warainiak umiktasa wakeruiniawai .

text: And have no root in themselves , and so endure but for a time : afterward , when affliction or persecution ariseth for the word ' s sake , immediately they are offended .
text2: Tura ni kankape atsakui , aya ishichik katsuiniawai . Tura ukunam , Yus - Chichaman wakeruiniakui shuar kajeram tura Chíkich itiurchatan Wáinkiar Yúsaiya kanainiawai .

text: And these are they which are sown among thorns ; such as hear the word ,
text2: Chíkich ántuiniamuka Jankí nupanam atsaampramua Núniskete . Nu shuar Yus - Chichaman ántuiniawai .

text: And the cares of this world , and the deceitfulness of riches , and the lusts of other things entering in , choke the word , and it becometh unfruitful .
text2: Antuiniayat ju nunkanam ana nuna ti Páchiniawai . Tuma ásar Kuítian tura shiirmachin ti takustinian wakeruiniawai . Nú wakeramu ni Enentáin Yus - Chicham ana nuna kankar emenkatui . Tuma asamtai nerektinian tujintiainiawai .

text: And these are they which are sown on good ground ; such as hear the word , and receive it , and bring forth fruit , some thirtyfold , some sixty , and some an hundred .
text2: Tura Chíkich ántuiniamusha pénker Núnkanam atsaampramua Núniskete . Nú shuarsha Yus - Chichaman antukar umiiniawai . Tura nerenawai , Chíkich shuar trainta , Chíkich shuar sesenta Chíkich shuar siansha nerenawai . '

text: And he said unto them , Is a candle brought to be put under a bushel , or under a bed ? and not to be set on a candlestick ?
text2: Nuyá Jesus juna Tímiayi ` ṡShuar shiripkin ekeemak Itiá pitiaknum enkeattawak . Peaknum wakenam ikiustatuak ? Atsá . Antsu misanam ekentsashtinkiait .

text: For there is nothing hid , which shall not be manifested ; neither was any thing kept secret , but that it should come abroad .
text2: Núnisan Ashí uukma ana nu ukunam paant nekanattawai . Tura Núnisan Yamái ishishmasa chichasmasha ukunam paant nekanattawai .

text: If any man have ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Kuíshim ákuinkia antuktarum . '

text: And he said unto them , Take heed what ye hear : with what measure ye mete , it shall be measured to you : and unto you that hear shall more be given .
text2: Tura Nuyá Tímiayi ` Antarmena nu esetrarum Enentáimsarum antuktarum . Urutá pénkerak Enentáimsatarum , Núnisan Yuska ámin nekaatniun suramsattarme , tura Nú Núkap patatramsattarme .

text: For he that hath , to him shall be given : and he that hath not , from him shall be taken even that which he hath .
text2: Tuma asamtai shuar Núkap takakna nu patatnastatui . Antsu Chíkich shuar ishichik takakuk jurunkittiawai . '

text: And he said , So is the kingdom of God , as if a man should cast seed into the ground ;
text2: Nuyá Jesus chichaak juna Tímiayi ` Yusa akupeamuri Júnisaiti . Shuar jinkiain atsaampratniua Núniskete .

text: And should sleep , and rise night and day , and the seed should spring and grow up , he knoweth not how .
text2: Jinkiáin atsaamar , Untsurí kanar , tsawar , uruksanpi tusa Nákawai . Tura itiura tsapainia Núnaka nékatsui .

text: For the earth bringeth forth fruit of herself ; first the blade , then the ear , after that the full corn in the ear .
text2: Kame Jinkiái nunkanam init aku ninki tsapaatsuk ; emka nukareawai , Nuyá tuyureawai tura nujamar katsuawai .

text: But when the fruit is brought forth , immediately he putteth in the sickle , because the harvest is come .
text2: Túruna Káakmatai Júuktin tsawant jeayi tusar Juíniawai . '

text: And he said , Whereunto shall we liken the kingdom of God ? or with what comparison shall we compare it ?
text2: Ataksha Jesus Tímiayi ` ṡYusa akupeamuri warijiaink ~ i nakumkataj . Warijiaink ~ i métek - takuit ?

text: It is like a grain of mustard seed , which , when it is sown in the earth , is less than all the seeds that be in the earth :
text2: Mustasa Jinkiaí araamua nujai métek - takuiti . Nu jinkiaisha Ashí nankaamas ishitiupchichiti .

text: But when it is sown , it groweth up , and becometh greater than all herbs , and shooteth out great branches ; so that the fowls of the air may lodge under the shadow of it .
text2: Tura araam Tsapái Ashí nankaamas uunt ajawai ; tura tsenkeakmarisha Kámpuram asamtai nui mikintranam chinkisha shiir ayamainiawai . "

text: And with many such parables spake he the word unto them , as they were able to hear it .
text2: Núnisan Jesus Untsurí métek - taku chichamjai Yus - Chichaman ujaamiayi . Nii nekaatniun jearmia nunak ujaamiayi .

text: But without a parable spake he not unto them : and when they were alone , he expounded all things to his disciples .
text2: Chíkich shuaran aya métek - taku chichamjai ujaamiayi ; antsu ni unuiniamurijiai Ninki pujus Ashí paant jintintrarmiayi .

text: And the same day , when the even was come , he saith unto them , Let us pass over unto the other side .
text2: Nu tsawantai etsa akaikimtai Jesus ni unuiniamurin chicharainiak " Entsa amain katintai " Tímiayi .

text: And when they had sent away the multitude , they took him even as he was in the ship . And there were also with him other little ships .
text2: Tutai kanunam enkemprarmiayi . Chíkich shuarnaka Káanmatkanam ikiukiar Jesusan kanunam pujan Júkiarmiayi . Chíkich kanunmayasha atampriarmiayi .

text: And there arose a great storm of wind , and the waves beat into the ship , so that it was now full .
text2: Tura nasesha ti nasenkatasa nankammiayi ; Chíchimi kanunam Yaráná Piáktasa ajamiayi .

text: And he was in the hinder part of the ship , asleep on a pillow : and they awake him , and say unto him , Master , carest thou not that we perish ?
text2: Jesuska Kanú senkarin atamprus Kanúu tepemiayi . Tura , ni unuiniamuri Jesusan ishintiak chicharuk " Uunta ii wayajnia juka pachitmatsmek " tiarmiayi .

text: And he arose , and rebuked the wind , and said unto the sea , Peace , be still . And the wind ceased , and there was a great calm .
text2: Tutai Jesus nantaki nasen kakantramiayi . Entsancha chicharuk " Takamatsata . Miaku ajasta " Tímiayi . Tutai nasesha menkakamiayi , entsasha miaaku ajasmiayi .

text: And he said unto them , Why are ye so fearful ? how is it that ye have no faith ?
text2: Túrunamtai Jesus ni unuiniamurin chicharainiak " ṡUrukamtai ashamarum ? Itiura Yus nekas Enentáimtatsrum " Tímiayi .

text: And they feared exceedingly , and said one to another , What manner of man is this , that even the wind and the sea obey him ?
text2: Tura Imiá ashamainiak " ṡMaa jusha yait ? Nasesha entsasha niin umirainiatsuk " tunaiyarmiayi .

text: And they came over unto the other side of the sea , into the country of the Gadarenes .
text2: Nuyá antumian amaini Jatara nunkanam jeawarmiayi .

text: And when he was come out of the ship , immediately there met him out of the tombs a man with an unclean spirit ,
text2: Jesus kanunmaya jiinkimtai aishman iwianchruku , shuar Jakáa iwiartainiumia Wárik taa Jesusan inkiunmiayi .

text: Who had his dwelling among the tombs ; and no man could bind him , no , not with chains :
text2: Nu shuar iwiartainium tuke pujuyayi . Tura jirujainkia niin jinkiaatniun tujinkiarmiayi .

text: Because that he had been often bound with fetters and chains , and the chains had been plucked asunder by him , and the fetters broken in pieces : neither could any man tame him .
text2: Jirujai nawenmasha , uwejnumsha tuke jinkiau ármiayi . Túramaitiat jinkiaarman tsuriar tepet - tepet awajmiayi . Tura ti kakaram asamtai niin nupetkachminiuyayi .

text: And always , night and day , he was in the mountains , and in the tombs , crying , and cutting himself with stones .
text2: Tuke tsawaisha Káshisha , iwiartainiumsha murasha kayajai ijiumak untsumuu wekainiuyayi .

text: But when he saw Jesus afar off , he ran and worshipped him ,
text2: Tura yajayan Wáiniak Jesusan tseke tarimiayi ; tura tikishmatramiayi .

text: For he said unto him , Come out of the man , thou unclean spirit .
text2: Túrunamtai Jesus chicharuk " Iwianchiá , ni Enentáiya jiinkitia , Tájame " Tímiayi . Takui íwianch kakantar chichaak " ṡWiniasha urukamtai tarutnium , Uunt Nankaamaku Yusa Uchiri Jesusá ? Yus iirmanum Wáitkiarsaip , Tájame " Tímiayi .

text: And he asked him , What is thy name ? And he answered , saying , My name is Legion : for we are many .
text2: Takui Jesus Tímiayi " ṡAme Náarmesha yait ? " Tutai niisha ayak " Untsurí ásar wikia Untsurí - suntar tu anaikiamuitjai " Tímiayi .

text: And he besought him much that he would not send them away out of the country .
text2: Nuna ti amik , nu nunkanmaya akuptukain tusa Jesusan ti seamiayi .

text: Now there was there nigh unto the mountains a great herd of swine feeding .
text2: Nuisha nainnium nuntumas Untsurí kuchi shushunmak matsamarmiayi .

text: And all the devils besought him , saying , Send us into the swine , that we may enter into them .
text2: Tuma asamtai , kuchiniam Enkemátin tsankatrukta tusar Jesusan seawarmiayi .

text: And forthwith Jesus gave them leave . And the unclean spirits went out , and entered into the swine : and the herd ran violently down a steep place into the sea , ( they were about two thousand ; ) and were choked in the sea .
text2: Tuiniakui Jesus " ayu " Tímiayi . Takui íwianch aishmankainia Jíinkiar kuchiniam Enkemáwarmiayi . Kuchisha ti Untsurí , Jimiará mir ( 2 . 000 ) áchiawash . Ashí mash Nánatanam iniaawar antumiannum iniankarmiayi . Nuisha Entsá kiakar jakerarmiayi .

text: And they that fed the swine fled , and told it in the city , and in the country . And they went out to see what it was that was done .
