text: And again he sent unto them another servant ; and at him they cast stones , and wounded him in the head , and sent him away shamefully handled .
text2: Ataksha Chíkich takarniun akupkamai , tura nunasha kayajai tukurar , Múuknum katsumkar , katsekar awainkiarmai .

text: And again he sent another ; and him they killed , and many others ; beating some , and killing some .
text2: Tuma ain ataksha Chíkichan akupkamai , tura nunasha Máawarmai . Ti Untsurín akupramai . Chikichnasha katsumkarmai , chikichan Máawarmai .

text: Having yet therefore one son , his wellbeloved , he sent him also last unto them , saying , They will reverence my son .
text2: Tura niijiai chikichik tuke ámiayi , nuka ni aneamu uchiri . Nu uchincha ukunam akupkamai . Akupeak " Winia uchirnaka shiir awajsartatui " Tímiai .

text: But those husbandmen said among themselves , This is the heir ; come , let us kill him , and the inheritance shall be ours .
text2: Tura ni uchiri winian Wáinkiar , takau shuar Nuámtak chichainiak " Juka Ajá nérenniu Uchirínti . Wátsek , maatai ; Túramka ájaka iiniu átatui " tiarmai .

text: And they took him , and killed him , and cast him out of the vineyard .
text2: Túsar achikiar Máawarmai . Ayashincha ajanmaya ajapawarmai " Tímiayi .

text: What shall therefore the lord of the vineyard do ? he will come and destroy the husbandmen , and will give the vineyard unto others .
text2: Tura Nuyá aniasmiayi , " ṡWats , Warí Enentáimsarum ; Ajá nérenniuri itiurkattawa ? Jeashtanmayá taa , Ajá takainia Nú shuaran amuktatui . Ni Ajaríncha chikichan ikiastatui .

text: And have ye not read this scripture ; The stone which the builders rejected is become the head of the corner :
text2: Ju , Yus - Papinium aarma ana nu áujsachukaitrum : Kaya pénkernak , jeammin " yajauchiiti " tusar ajapawarmia nu Ashí kayajai nankaamas pénker apujsamuiti .

text: This was the Lord ' s doing , and it is marvellous in our eyes ?
text2: Nusha Yus Túramuiti . Iisha iisar ti Enentáimtaji . Nuke aarmaiti " Tímiayi .

text: And they sought to lay hold on him , but feared the people : for they knew that he had spoken the parable against them : and they left him , and went their way .
text2: Tura Nú metek - taku chichamjai niin áujmatma asa achiktai tusar chichaman jurusarmiayi . Túmainiayat Shuáran ashamainiak Jesusan ikiuiniak wearmiayi .

text: And they send unto him certain of the Pharisees and of the Herodians , to catch him in his words .
text2: Tura wear , imiaamtikiar Yajá chichakmatai Nújai yajauch Títiai tusar Pariséu shuarnasha , Erutisa nemarin shuarnasha akatar Jesusan akuptukarmiayi .

text: And when they were come , they say unto him , Master , we know that thou art true , and carest for no man : for thou regardest not the person of men , but teachest the way of God in truth : Is it lawful to give tribute to Caesar , or not ?
text2: Túram Niin jeariar chicharainiak : " Uuntá , aents nakitiainiain tuke nekas chicham Páchitsuk chichaame , nu nékaji . Aents Pátatek iiyatsme , antsu nekas Yusa jinti unuiniame . ṡWaritia Enentáimiam , ii kuitri uunt Sesar Súsatin pénkerkait . Susattajik . Suritkiattajik ? Nu nekaatai tusar wakeraji " tiarmiayi .

text: Shall we give , or shall we not give ? But he , knowing their hypocrisy , said unto them , Why tempt ye me ? bring me a penny , that I may see it .
text2: Tura Jesus ni yajauch Enentáimmiarin nekara " ṡUrukamtai Winia yajauch titi tusarum wakerutarum ? Kuit itiatarum , Wi iistaj " Tímiayi .

text: And they brought it . And he saith unto them , Whose is this image and superscription ? And they said unto him , Caesar ' s .
text2: Tutai Kuítian itiariarmiayi . Jesus nuna iis Tímiayi , " ṡJuisha yana yapi tura yana naari aarmait ? " Tímiayi . Tutai " Uunt Sésarna " tiarmiayi .

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , Render to Caesar the things that are Caesar ' s , and to God the things that are God ' s . And they marvelled at him .
text2: Nuyá Jesus Tímiayi " Uunt Sésarna ana nu susatarum ; Túrarum Yúsnaka Yus susatarum " Tímiayi . Tura ni aimkiamurin antukar ti Enentáimprarmiayi .

text: Then come unto him the Sadducees , which say there is no resurrection ; and they asked him , saying ,
text2: Nuisha Satuséu aents , jakamunmaya nantaktin penké atsawai tiniu armia nu , Jesusan tariarmiayi . Taar Jesusan chicharainiak :

text: Master , Moses wrote unto us , If a man ' s brother die , and leave his wife behind him , and leave no children , that his brother should take his wife , and raise up seed unto his brother .
text2: " Uuntá , Muisais juna aatrampramiaji : " Aishman ni nuari Júreatsain jakamtainkia , yachin yajutmatrattsa , ni yachi nu wajen Nuátkatniuiti . "

text: Now there were seven brethren : and the first took a wife , and dying left no seed .
text2: Wats , siati yachi ármiayi . Iwiairi nuwan nuatak yajutmatsuk jakamiayi .

text: And the second took her , and died , neither left he any seed : and the third likewise .
text2: Ni yachi wajen akinkiamiayi . Nusha Núnisan yajutmatsuk jakamiayi . Nuna yachisha Núnisan tura nuna yachisha Núnisan Túramiayi .

text: And the seven had her , and left no seed : last of all the woman died also .
text2: Tura Ashí siati patainman , patainman nu nuwan Nuátkarmiayi . Yajutmatsuk , yajutmatsuk Jíiniawarmiayi . Tura ukunam nuwasha jakamiayi .

text: In the resurrection therefore , when they shall rise , whose wife shall she be of them ? for the seven had her to wife .
text2: Nuinkia nantaktin tsawantai , nantakiarmatai , ṡyana nuarin ati ? Ashí siati Nuátkacharmaka " tiarmiayi .

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , Do ye not therefore err , because ye know not the scriptures , neither the power of God ?
text2: Tutai Jesus Tímiayi " " Jakamunmaya nantaktin atsawai " Tátsurmek . Yusa chichame tura Yusa kakarmari nékachu asarum awajiarme , Tímiayi .

text: For when they shall rise from the dead , they neither marry , nor are given in marriage ; but are as the angels which are in heaven .
text2: Iimiatarum , aents jakamunmaya nantakiarmatai , nuatnaikiatin atsuttawai , antsu nayaimpinmaya suntara Núnisaran pujusartatui .

text: And as touching the dead , that they rise : have ye not read in the book of Moses , how in the bush God spake unto him , saying , I am the God of Abraham , and the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob ?
text2: Tura jakamunmaya nantaktiniapitia tusarum nu nekaatin nekas wakerakrumka Muisais aarmia nu Enentáimtustarum . Yuska numichinmaya Muisaisan chicharuk " Wikia Apraáma Isaaka tura Jakupu Yúsrintjai " Yus Tímiayi .

text: He is not the God of the dead , but the God of the living : ye therefore do greatly err .
text2: Yaunchu Jákaru ain , Yus nuna taku , ayashnium jakayat iwiaaku pujuinia nuna Yusrintjai , tawai . Nekas jaka ainia nuna Yusrinchuiti . Nantaktin atsawai tau asarum awajirurme " Tímiayi Jesus .

text: And one of the scribes came , and having heard them reasoning together , and perceiving that he had answered them well , asked him , Which is the first commandment of all ?
text2: Jesussha Satuséusha áujmatnainian Israer - shuara jintinniuri taa anturkamiayi . Anturak , Jesus ti penker aimkiui , niisha Jesusan juna aniasmiayi : " ṡYus akupkamu Tuá Imiá pénkerait ? " Tímiayi .

text: And Jesus answered him , The first of all the commandments is , Hear , O Israel ; The Lord our God is one Lord :
text2: Tutai Jesus Tímiayi " Júiti Yus akupkamu Imiá pénker : Antukta Israer Shuará . Ii Yusri uuntaiti , tura Ninki nekas Yúsaiti .

text: And thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart , and with all thy soul , and with all thy mind , and with all thy strength : this is the first commandment .
text2: Tuma asamtai , tuke Enentáimjai ti Enentáimsam Uunt Yus aneeta . Túram ame iwiaakmarmesha , kakarmarmesha Yus iiktusta . Núiti nekas pénker akupkamu " Tímiayi .

text: And the second is like , namely this , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself . There is none other commandment greater than these .
text2: Nuyasha chikichcha awai , " ame ayashim aneamna Tímiatrusmek ame írutramurmesha aneeta . " Chíkich nu nankaamas pénker akupkamu atsawai ' Tímiayi .

text: And the scribe said unto him , Well , Master , thou hast said the truth : for there is one God ; and there is none other but he :
text2: Tutai jintintin Tímiayi " Ee , pénkeraiti , Uunta . Nékasmek tame . Chikichík Yus awai , Chíkichkia atsawai .

text: And to love him with all the heart , and with all the understanding , and with all the soul , and with all the strength , and to love his neighbour as himself , is more than all whole burnt offerings and sacrifices .
text2: Tura tuke Enentáijiai ti Enentáimsar , ii kakarmarisha Yus iiktusar Niin aneakrikia , ii ayashi aneajnia Núnik ii írutramurisha aneatniuitji . Nusha Ashí Yus sutai ana nujai nankaamas pénkeraiti ' Tímiayi .

text: And when Jesus saw that he answered discreetly , he said unto him , Thou art not far from the kingdom of God . And no man after that durst ask him any question .
text2: Nuna tiniu asamtai Jesus ni pénker aimkian Nekáa " Ameja Yus akupeamunam pachiinkiatin ishichik Táasume " Tímiayi . Tura Nuyá Chíkich shuar Jesusan aniastinian arantukarmiayi .

text: And Jesus answered and said , while he taught in the temple , How say the scribes that Christ is the Son of David ?
text2: Jesus Yusa Uunt Jeen unuiniak pujumiayi . Tura chichaak " ṡUrukamtai ii jintinniuri " Yus anaikiamu Krístun Tawitia shuari " tuinia ? "

text: For David himself said by the Holy Ghost , The Lord said to my Lord , Sit thou on my right hand , till I make thine enemies thy footstool .
text2: Tawit , antsu , Yusa Wakaní aarta tutai , Yus - Papinium juna aarmiayi : Uunt winia uuntrun Tímiayi " Ame nemasrumin nupetkatin amuatsain winia untsuuruinini pujusta " .

text: David therefore himself calleth him Lord ; and whence is he then his son ? And the common people heard him gladly .
text2: Kame Tawitkia , Krístun áujmatuk , " winia Uuntru " taisha , ṡitiura Ní shuarisha átin ~ ki ? " Tímiayi Jesus . Tuma asamtai Untsurí shuar nui matsamarmia nu ti shiir antukarmiayi .

text: And he said unto them in his doctrine , Beware of the scribes , which love to go in long clothing , and love salutations in the marketplaces ,
text2: Jesus unuiniak Tímiayi , " Israer - shuara jintinniuri ainia nujai aneartarum . Niisha waantu Enentáimtumasar , esaram pushin entsarar wekasatajtsar wakeruiniawai . Péprunmasha shuar shiir áujtusarat tusa wakeruiniawai .

text: And the chief seats in the synagogues , and the uppermost rooms at feasts :
text2: Israer - shuar iruntainiam penkeri pujutainium pujustinian wakeruiniawai . Nampernumsha penkeri pujutainium pujustinniasha wakeruiniawai .

text: Which devour widows ' houses , and for a pretence make long prayers : these shall receive greater damnation .
text2: Tura wajé jeencha atantainiawai . Túrawar aents nekaracharat tusar ti esaram chichamjai Yúsan áujainiawai . Nincha chikichjai nankaamas Yus asutiawartatui " Tímiayi .

text: And Jesus sat over against the treasury , and beheld how the people cast money into the treasury : and many that were rich cast in much .
text2: Jesus Yusa Uunt Jeen kuit enketainiam naka pujus aents Kuítrin chumpian Wáinkiamiayi . Untsurí Kúitrintin Núkap enkeawarmiayi .

text: And there came a certain poor widow , and she threw in two mites , which make a farthing .
text2: Nuyá waje Kuítrincha taa Jimiará uchich Kuítian , reara aantsan , enkeamiayi .

text: And he called unto him his disciples , and saith unto them , Verily I say unto you , That this poor widow hath cast more in , than all they which have cast into the treasury :
text2: Jesuska unuiniamurin untsuk " Nekas Tájarme , ju waje Kuítrinchaitiat , Ashí enkeena Nú nankaamas Núkap enkeayi .

text: For all they did cast in of their abundance ; but she of her want did cast in all that she had , even all her living .
text2: Iis , Kuítrinniusha nii ampirma nuna enkeenawai , tura antsu ju nuwa Kuítrinchaitiat , ampirmatsuk ni yurumatniurin takurmakman Ashí enkeayi " Tímiayi .

text: And as he went out of the temple , one of his disciples saith unto him , Master , see what manner of stones and what buildings are here !
text2: Yusa Uunt Jeenia Jesus jiinkimtai , unuiniamuri Niin Tímiayi " Iisia , Uunta , kayasha ti shiir ainiawai . Jeasha Imiá uuntchakait . "

text: And Jesus answering said unto him , Seest thou these great buildings ? there shall not be left one stone upon another , that shall not be thrown down .
text2: Tutai Jesus Tímiayi " Ju Imiá uunt jea Wáinmek . Kaya ekentramu au Ashí mash yumpuntrartatui " Tímiayi .

text: And as he sat upon the mount of Olives over against the temple , Peter and James and John and Andrew asked him privately ,
text2: Nuyá Uriwiu Náinnium wakar , Yusa Uunt Jee naka pujusar , Pítrusha , Jakupusha , Juansha , Antressha , Nínkimias Jesusan aniiniak

text: Tell us , when shall these things be ? and what shall be the sign when all these things shall be fulfilled ?
text2: " Uuntá , Tímiam nu , ṡUrutiá Túrunatta . Nu Túrunatin jeakuisha itiura nekaattajia ? Paant ujatmakta " tiarmiayi .

text: And Jesus answering them began to say , Take heed lest any man deceive you :
text2: Tutai Jesus Tímiayi " Aneartarum , anankramawairap .

text: For many shall come in my name , saying , I am Christ ; and shall deceive many .
text2: Nekaatarum , Untsurí winia naarun pachisar winiartatui . Chíkich Chíkich " Wiitjai Kristu " taku , Untsurín anankawartatui .

text: And when ye shall hear of wars and rumours of wars , be ye not troubled : for such things must needs be ; but the end shall not be yet .
text2: Tura meset chicham ántakrumka , yajaya meset chicham ántakrumsha sapijmiakairap . Nekas Túrunashtinkiait . Nujaisha amuukatin tsawantka tuke jeatsui , Tímiayi .

text: For nation shall rise against nation , and kingdom against kingdom : and there shall be earthquakes in divers places , and there shall be famines and troubles : these are the beginnings of sorrows .
text2: Shuar Chíkich shuarjai mesetan najanawartatui ; apachcha Chíkich apachjai Núnisaran mesetan najanawartatui . Untsurí nunkanam úurkattawai . Tsukasha ártatui , charaatum ajamusha Núnisan átatui . Tura nujai itiurchatka aya yama nankamui . '

text: But take heed to yourselves : for they shall deliver you up to councils ; and in the synagogues ye shall be beaten : and ye shall be brought before rulers and kings for my sake , for a testimony against them .
text2: ` Túmaitkui atumsha aneartarum . Akupin iruntainiumsha surutmakartatrume , tura ii shuar iruntainmasha katsumpramkartatrume . Wíi shuar asakrumin , Kapitiánnium , akupniunmasha juramkittiarme . Nui jearum , Winia chichastatrume .

text: And the gospel must first be published among all nations .
text2: Nu Túruntsain Ashí aentsnum Yus - Chicham etsernaktiniaiti .

text: But when they shall lead you , and deliver you up , take no thought beforehand what ye shall speak , neither do ye premeditate : but whatsoever shall be given you in that hour , that speak ye : for it is not ye that speak , but the Holy Ghost .
text2: Atumin surutmaktasar juramainiakuisha , warintiajak tusarum ti Enentáimsairap . Chichastin jeamtai , Yusa Wakaní jintintramattarmena nu titiarum . Iis , Atumí Enentáijiai Tíchattarme , antsu Yusa Wakaní jintintiam Títiatrume .

text: Now the brother shall betray the brother to death , and the father the son ; and children shall rise up against their parents , and shall cause them to be put to death .
text2: Nu tsawantin shuarsha ni yachin mantamnati tusa suruktatui . Apasha ni Uchirín suruktatui . Uchisha Aparíncha Nukuríncha kajerak , jakati tusa suruktatui . Núnisan Untsurí shuar Túrawartatui .

text: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name ' s sake : but he that shall endure unto the end , the same shall be saved .
text2: Nuinkia Wíi shuar asakrumin Ashí nakitramprartatui . Tura shuar yawetsuk katsuntranka uwemprattawai " Tímiayi .

text: But when ye shall see the abomination of desolation , spoken of by Daniel the prophet , standing where it ought not , ( let him that readeth understand , ) then let them that be in Judaea flee to the mountains :
text2: Nuyá Jesus Tímiayi " Shuar juna áujeana nu nekaati . Yúsnan etserin , ni naari Taniar , ti yajauch tuke emesin ana nuna yaunchu aar etserkamiayi . Nuka pujushtainiam pujan Wáinkiurmesha , Ashí Jutía nunkanam pujarmena nu , Náinnium pisartarum .

text: And let him that is on the housetop not go down into the house , neither enter therein , to take any thing out of his house :
text2: Jea yakiini pujana nu akaiki wariri achiktajtsa , jeen wayashti .

text: And let him that is in the field not turn back again for to take up his garment .
text2: Ajanam pujana nusha ni pushirin jukitiajtsa waketkishti .

text: But woe to them that are with child , and to them that give suck in those days !
text2: Tura ajamtin ainiana nusha , Kuírchin umuntsainia nusha , nu tsawantin Timiá itiurchatan Wáinkiartatui .

text: And pray ye that your flight be not in the winter .
text2: Tuma asamtai átum pisaarmena nui yumitin achati tusarum Yus seatarum .

text: For in those days shall be affliction , such as was not from the beginning of the creation which God created unto this time , neither shall be .
text2: Nu tsawantinkia ti Wáitsatin átatui . Yama nankamtaik Yus nunkan najanama nuisha , yamaisha ukunmasha timiu Wáitsatin penké atsuttawai .

text: And except that the Lord had shortened those days , no flesh should be saved : but for the elect ' s sake , whom he hath chosen , he hath shortened the days .
text2: Tura Uunt Yus Wáitsatin tsawantan ishichik awajsattajai Tíchaitkuinkia , uwempratin penké atsuinti . Tura ni shuarin anaikiamia nuna Yáintajtsa wakerak , nu tsawantan ishichik awajsattawai .

text: And then if any man shall say to you , Lo , here is Christ ; or , lo , he is there ; believe him not :
text2: Nu tsawantai " Júiti Kristu " Túramkuinkia anturkairap .

text: For false Christs and false prophets shall rise , and shall shew signs and wonders , to seduce , if it were possible , even the elect .
text2: Kame " Krístuitjai " ántar tuinia nu , tura " Yúsnan etserniuitjai " ántar tuinia nusha wantinkiartatui . Wantinkiar Yus anaikiamu Shuárnasha anankatai tusar wakeruiniak , ni kakarmarin iniakmainiak aentsti tujintiamun Túrartatui .

text: But take ye heed : behold , I have foretold you all things .
text2: Tura átum aneartarum . Aetak , Túruntsain ujakchajrumek ' Tímiayi Jesus .

text: But in those days , after that tribulation , the sun shall be darkened , and the moon shall not give her light ,
text2: Jesus tuke unuiniak juna Tímiayi : ` Tura nu Wáitsatin nankaamasmatai , etsaasha nantusha etsantrashtatui .

text: And the stars of heaven shall fall , and the powers that are in heaven shall be shaken .
text2: Yaasha nayaimpinmaya kakekartatui , tura nayaimpiniam kakaram ainia nu muchitrartatui .

text: And then shall they see the Son of man coming in the clouds with great power and glory .
text2: Nuyasha Ashí aents Winia Wáitkiartatui . Wi , Aents Ajasuitjiana ju , ti kakaran , ti wincha ajasan , yuranminiam Winiái Wáitkiartatui .

text: And then shall he send his angels , and shall gather together his elect from the four winds , from the uttermost part of the earth to the uttermost part of heaven .
text2: Nui nayaimpinmaya suntarun akupkattajai , Wíi shuaran Ashí nunkanmayan irurarat tusan . Arakaaniya , nunkaaniya , Ashí nunka Nánkatkamunmayan Wíi shuaran irurartatui . '

text: Now learn a parable of the fig tree ; When her branch is yet tender , and putteth forth leaves , ye know that summer is near :
text2: ` Iikiu numi nakumea nu nekaatarum . Ni chinkimpri punkak nuke jeakui , " ju nunkanam esat jeatemai " Tátsurmek .

text: So ye in like manner , when ye shall see these things come to pass , know that it is nigh , even at the doors .
text2: Núnisrumek Wi Tájarmena nu Wáinkiurmeka , ni tatintri jeatemai tu nekaattarme .

text: Verily I say unto you , that this generation shall not pass , till all these things be done .
text2: Nekas Tájarme , Yamaí aents pujuinia nu kajin amuiniatsain , Ashí Wi Tájana nu Túrunatniuiti .

text: Heaven and earth shall pass away : but my words shall not pass away .
text2: Nayaimpisha nunkasha amuukatniuiti . Tura winia chichampruka amuukashtiniaiti .

text: But of that day and that hour knoweth no man , no , not the angels which are in heaven , neither the Son , but the Father .
text2: Tura tsawantcha nekanachminiaiti . Nayaimpinmaya suntarsha nékainiatsui ; Wisha Yusa Uchiríntiatan nékatsjai . Aya winia Aparuk nékawai .

text: Take ye heed , watch and pray : for ye know not when the time is .
text2: Atumsha anearum Enentáimprarum Yus aujsa pujustarum , tsawant nékachu asarum . '

text: For the Son of man is as a man taking a far journey , who left his house , and gave authority to his servants , and to every man his work , and commanded the porter to watch .
text2: ` Tura Wikia ju shuarjai méteketjai . Ju shuarsha jeachat weak , ni jeen ikiuawai . Ikiuak ni shuarin Wáitrukartí tusa apujas ikiuak Ashí shuaran takatrin Súawai . Tura Wáitin Wáinniun , " ameja pénker Wáinkiata " Tímiai .

text: Watch ye therefore : for ye know not when the master of the house cometh , at even , or at midnight , or at the cockcrowing , or in the morning :
text2: Wikia nu jea nérenniua Núnisnak , urutai Tátataj nékachu asarum anearum pujustarum . Kíaraimpiash , tura ajapkeash , atash shiniukaimpiash , Káshikiash Tátatjai .

text: Lest coming suddenly he find you sleeping .
text2: Nérentin aya aneachmak taa , Kanúu tepai Wáitkiai tusarum aneartarum .

text: And what I say unto you I say unto all , Watch .
text2: Wi atumin Tájana nu , Ashí Shuáran tajai , anearum pujustarum " Tímiayi Jesus .

text: After two days was the feast of the passover , and of unleavened bread : and the chief priests and the scribes sought how they might take him by craft , and put him to death .
text2: Jímiarchikí tsawant ajasmiayi paskua tutai Námper jeatin . Paskua Námpertincha wakapruachu tantan yuatin Námpernasha métek najanin ármiayi . Israer - patri uuntrisha , Israer - shuara jintinniurisha Jesusan anankar achikiar maatai tusar wakeriarmiayi .

text: But they said , Not on the feast day , lest there be an uproar of the people .
text2: Túrasha " Jista tsawantin Túrachmi , aents charaatum ajarain tusar " tiarmiayi .

text: And being in Bethany in the house of Simon the leper , as he sat at meat , there came a woman having an alabaster box of ointment of spikenard very precious ; and she brake the box , and poured it on his head .
text2: Jesussha Petania péprunam tunamaru Semunka jeen misanam pujan , nuwa tarimiayi . Nartu kunkuinian Arapástru tutai kaya najanamunam piakun itiamiayi . Nu kunkuin ti kuitiaiti . Mutí chuchuke kupik Jesusa muuken kunkuinian ukatramiayi .

text: And there were some that had indignation within themselves , and said , Why was this waste of the ointment made ?
text2: Tura nui pujuarmia nu , kajerar tunaiyarmiayi " ṡUrukamtai ju kunkuinian ántar wasurea ?

text: For it might have been sold for more than three hundred pence , and have been given to the poor . And they murmured against her .
text2: Junasha Súrakka , Menaintiú sian Kuítnium surukminiuyi . Nu kuitcha Kuítrinchan Súsanka maak " tiarmiayi . Tusa nuwan kajerkarmiayi .

text: And Jesus said , Let her alone ; why trouble ye her ? she hath wrought a good work on me .
text2: Antsu Jesus chicharainiak " Iniaisatarum . ṡUrukamtai au kajerarum ? Winia shiir Túrutayi , Tímiayi .

text: For ye have the poor with you always , and whensoever ye will ye may do them good : but me ye have not always .
text2: Kuítrincha atumjai tuke íruntsuk . Wakerakrumka tuke pénker awajsatniuitrume . Antsu Wikia atumjai tuke pujushtatjai .

text: She hath done what she could : she is come aforehand to anoint my body to the burying .
text2: Ju nuwa Ashí nii Túramnia Núnaka umikiai . Wi Jákatin jeatsain , iwiarsatin kunkuinian shiir ukatrurai .

text: Verily I say unto you , Wheresoever this gospel shall be preached throughout the whole world , this also that she hath done shall be spoken of for a memorial of her .
text2: Nekas Tájarme , Ashí nunkanam Yus - Chicham etsernaktatna nui , ju nuwa Túramurisha etsernaktatui , niin kajinmatkiarain tusa " Tímiayi .

text: And Judas Iscariot , one of the twelve , went unto the chief priests , to betray him unto them .
text2: Nuyá Jútas Iskariúti , Jesusa unuiniamurintiat , Israer - patri uuntrin werimiayi , Jesusan suruktaj tusa .

text: And when they heard it , they were glad , and promised to give him money . And he sought how he might conveniently betray him .
text2: Niisha nuna antukar , warasar " Kuit amastatji " tiarmiayi . Jútassha Jesusan itiurak Yúpichuch tsankamkattaj tusa Enentáimias wekaimiayi .

text: And the first day of unleavened bread , when they killed the passover , his disciples said unto him , Where wilt thou that we go and prepare that thou mayest eat the passover ?
text2: Wakapruachu tantan yuatin Jísat nankama tsawant tsawarmatai , paskua Námpertin Yúatin murik Máatin jeamtai , Jesusa unuiniamuri iniasarmiayi " Paskuatin murikiu Yúatin iwiaratai tusar ṡtui wétataj ~ i . Tui yurumattam ? " tiarmiayi .

text: And he sendeth forth two of his disciples , and saith unto them , Go ye into the city , and there shall meet you a man bearing a pitcher of water : follow him .
text2: Tutai Niisha Jimiará unuiniamurin akatar akupeak " Péprunam wetarum . Nui aishman yumin Jukí wéa Wáinkiattarme . Nu aishman nemarsatarum .

text: And wheresoever he shall go in , say ye to the goodman of the house , The Master saith , Where is the guestchamber , where I shall eat the passover with my disciples ?
text2: Wayana nui Jeá nérenniuri Títiarum " Uunt Túramui , ṡwisha , unuiniamurjai tui Yurumáttaj ? "

text: And he will shew you a large upper room furnished and prepared : there make ready for us .
text2: Nu nérentin , Yakí Písunam uunt tesamunam Ashí iwiaramun iniakturmastatrume . Nui Jísat ii najanatin iwiaratarum " Tímiayi .

text: And his disciples went forth , and came into the city , and found as he had said unto them : and they made ready the passover .
text2: Ni unuiniamuri wear , péprunam jeawar , Jesus timia Núnisan Wáinkiarmiayi . Tuma ásar paskua Námperan iwiararmiayi .

text: And in the evening he cometh with the twelve .
text2: Nuyá Kíakui Jesus ni tuse unuiniamurijiai wayawarmiayi .

text: And as they sat and did eat , Jesus said , Verily I say unto you , One of you which eateth with me shall betray me .
text2: Niisha misanam pekaamak , Yurumáiniak pujusar , Jesus Tímiayi . " Nekas Tájarme , Chikichík shuar Wijiai yurumna nu , surutkattawai . "

text: And they began to be sorrowful , and to say unto him one by one , Is it I ? and another said , Is it I ?
text2: Nujai Kúntuts Enentáimprarmiayi . Chíkich Chíkich Jesusan aniasar " Wíashitiaj " tiarmiayi .

text: And he answered and said unto them , It is one of the twelve , that dippeth with me in the dish .
text2: Jesus Tímiayi " Ju misanam tuse irunar yurumprum nu , chikichik surutkattawai . Wijiai pininnum yurumkan ayak yuana Núiti .

text: The Son of man indeed goeth , as it is written of him : but woe to that man by whom the Son of man is betrayed ! good were it for that man if he had never been born .
text2: Nekas Wi , Aents Ajasuitjiana ju , Jákatniunam wéajai , aarturma aintsanak . Tura aishman Súrutna nu ti Wáitsattawai . Niisha akiinmainchu ajakuiti " Tímiayi .

text: And as they did eat , Jesus took bread , and blessed , and brake it , and gave to them , and said , Take , eat : this is my body .
text2: Yurumainiak Jesus Yúsan yuminkias , yurumkan achik , puuk , chicharainiak " Achiktarum , jusha winia ayashruiti " Tímiayi .

text: And he took the cup , and when he had given thanks , he gave it to them : and they all drank of it .
text2: Pininnasha achik , Yúsan yuminkias , ni unuiniamurin Súsarmiayi . Ashí umararmiayi .

text: And he said unto them , This is my blood of the new testament , which is shed for many .
text2: Umararmatai Jesus Tímiayi " Júiti winia numpar , Untsurín Yáintajtsa Puártinia nu . Nujai Yamaram Chichaman Yus najanaiti .

text: Verily I say unto you , I will drink no more of the fruit of the vine , until that day that I drink it new in the kingdom of God .
text2: Nekas Tájarme , uwa yumiri ataksha jui umarchattajai . Tura tsawant jeamtai , ukunmasha , Yus akupeana nui yamarman umartatjai " Tímiayi .

text: And when they had sung an hymn , they went out into the mount of Olives .
text2: Yus - kantan Kantámawar , Jíinkiar , Uriwiu Náinnium wearmiayi .

text: And Jesus saith unto them , All ye shall be offended because of me this night : for it is written , I will smite the shepherd , and the sheep shall be scattered .
text2: Nuinkia Jesus niin Tíarmiayi " Ju kashi átum natsantrurtatrume . " Murikiu Wáinniun Máattajai , Túramtai murik tsakinmakartatui " tu aarchamukait .

text: But after that I am risen , I will go before you into Galilee .
text2: Tura ukunam Wi nantakin atumin Kariréanam émtuktiajrume " Tímiayi .

text: But Peter said unto him , Although all shall be offended , yet will not I .
text2: Tutai Pítiur chicharuk " Amin Ashí natsantramainiakuisha , wikia natsantrashtatjame " Tímiayi .

text: And Jesus saith unto him , Verily I say unto thee , That this day , even in this night , before the cock crow twice , thou shalt deny me thrice .
text2: Tutai Jesus Tímiayi " Nekas Tájame , ju kashi atash Jimiará shiniatsain , natsantrurtatme . " Núnaka nékatsjai " Menaintiú turuttiatme " Tímiayi .

text: But he spake the more vehemently , If I should die with thee , I will not deny thee in any wise . Likewise also said they all .
text2: Tutai Pítiur kakaram chichaak " Amijiai métek Máantuiniakuisha , Núnaka penké Tíchattajai " Tímiayi . Ashí ni unuiniamuri Núnisan tiarmiayi .

text: And they came to a place which was named Gethsemane : and he saith to his disciples , Sit ye here , while I shall pray .
text2: Nuyá Jitsemaní ajanam wearmiayi . Jeawar Jesus ni unuiniamurin Tímiayi " Jui pujustarum , Yúsan áujsatasa pujai " .

text: And he taketh with him Peter and James and John , and began to be sore amazed , and to be very heavy ;
text2: Pítrun , Jakupuncha , Juánnasha jukimiayi . Tura Jesuska ti kuntuts Enentáimiar wake mesek nekapsatasa nankammiayi .

text: And saith unto them , My soul is exceeding sorrowful unto death : tarry ye here , and watch .
text2: Tura niin chicharuk " Wi ti kuntuts Enentáimjai , tura jakamnia nekapeajai . Jui iimia pujutarum " Tímiayi .

text: And he went forward a little , and fell on the ground , and prayed that , if it were possible , the hour might pass from him .
text2: Jesussha ishichik arantach we , Nunká piniakumar tepes Yúsan aujmiayi . " Ju Wáitsatin átatna nu , Túrutatniuitkuinkia iniaitiusta " tu seamiayi .

text: And he said , Abba , Father , all things are possible unto thee ; take away this cup from me : nevertheless not what I will , but what thou wilt .
text2: Tuke áujuk Tímiayi " Apawá , Ashí tujinchaitme . Pininnumia Ashí umartinia aantsan ti nekapsatajna Nú Wáitsatniun , jurutkitia . Antsu Wi wakeraj nucha , ame wakeramuram Túrunati . "

text: And he cometh , and findeth them sleeping , and saith unto Peter , Simon , sleepest thou ? couldest not thou watch one hour ?
text2: Tura ni unuiniamurin tarin , Kanúu tepenan Wáinkiamiayi . Pítrun Tímiayi " ṡSemunka Kánamek . Kanutsuk ishichkisha iimia pujustin tujinkiamek ?

text: Watch ye and pray , lest ye enter into temptation . The spirit truly is ready , but the flesh is weak .
text2: Anearum Yus áujsatarum , tunaanum iniaaraij tusarum . Atumí wakaniin kakarmaitrume , antsu Atumí ayashiin kakarmachuitrume " Tímiayi .

text: And again he went away , and prayed , and spake the same words .
text2: Ataksha we , nuik Yúsan áujsama Núnisan áujsamiayi .

text: And when he returned , he found them asleep again , ( for their eyes were heavy , ) neither wist they what to answer him .
text2: Ataksha waketruki , ni unuiniamurin Kanúu tepenan tarimiayi . Kari ti Pujá asamtai , Jesusan áujsatniun tujinkiarmiayi .

text: And he cometh the third time , and saith unto them , Sleep on now , and take your rest : it is enough , the hour is come ; behold , the Son of man is betrayed into the hands of sinners .
text2: Jesus ataksha we , Tarí Tímiayi " Kanarum ayampratarum . Máakete . Jeayi . Wi , Aents Ajasuitjiana ju , Tunáa shuarnum surukmaitjai .

text: Rise up , let us go ; lo , he that betrayeth me is at hand .
text2: Nantáktiárum , Wemí . Iis , Winia Súrutna nu nuntumsai " Tímiayi Jesus .

text: And immediately , while he yet spake , cometh Judas , one of the twelve , and with him a great multitude with swords and staves , from the chief priests and the scribes and the elders .
text2: Jesus nuna Chicháa Pujá unuiniamuri Jútas tarimiayi . Niijiai Untsurí aents Puniá takaku , tura numincha takaku Káutarmiayi . Israer - patri uuntri , Israer - shuara jintinniuri , tura Israer - shuara uuntri akupkarma asa Káutkarmiayi .

text: And he that betrayed him had given them a token , saying , Whomsoever I shall kiss , that same is he ; take him , and lead him away safely .
text2: Káuntsain Jútas chicharainiak , " Wi mukunattaj áujkin Núiti Jesus . Achiirum , pénker emetarum jukitiarum " Tímiayi .

text: And as soon as he was come , he goeth straightway to him , and saith , Master , master ; and kissed him .
text2: Tura Jesusan Tarí , mukunuk áujas " Uuntá , Uuntá " Tímiayi .

text: And they laid their hands on him , and took him .
text2: Túramtai aencha Jesusan achikiar emetawarmiayi .

text: And one of them that stood by drew a sword , and smote a servant of the high priest , and cut off his ear .
text2: Túruiniakui nui wajatusha puniari úkuitsan , patri uuntri takarniurin awati ni kuishin tsupirkamiayi .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , Are ye come out , as against a thief , with swords and with staves to take me ?
text2: Túram Jesus aentsun Tímiayi " Kasakaitiaj . Puniajai numijiai , Kasá Nútiksarmek achirkatai tusarum tarutniurme .

text: I was daily with you in the temple teaching , and ye took me not : but the scriptures must be fulfilled .
text2: Ashí tsawant atumjai Yusa Uunt Jeen wayan unuiniakun pujuchmakaj . Túmai nui achirkachmarme . Tura Yus timia nu uminkiat tusa ju Túrunayi . "

text: And they all forsook him , and fled .
text2: Nuinkia ni unuiniamuri Niniak ikiuiniak pisararmiayi .

text: And there followed him a certain young man , having a linen cloth cast about his naked body ; and the young men laid hold on him :
text2: Tura aishman Nátsaach aya tarachin penumas Jesusan atamprimiayi . Tura natsaach suntar achikiam

text: And he left the linen cloth , and fled from them naked .
text2: tarachrin ajapa ikiuak Misú tsékenkimiayi .

text: And they led Jesus away to the high priest : and with him were assembled all the chief priests and the elders and the scribes .
text2: Patri uuntriin Jesusan ejeniarmiayi . Nui Patri uuntrisha , Israer - shuara jintinniurisha , Israer - shuara uuntrisha irunturarmiayi .

text: And Peter followed him afar off , even into the palace of the high priest : and he sat with the servants , and warmed himself at the fire .
text2: Tura Pítiur iikian nemarki Patri jeen aach Jeá , Patri suntarijiai jinia anamuk pujumiayi .

text: And the chief priests and all the council sought for witness against Jesus to put him to death ; and found none .
text2: Patri uuntri Ashí naamka uunt armia nujai iruntrar maatai tusar wakeruiniak shuar Jesusan tsanumprurat tusar eatkarmiayi . Nu chichamjai mantamnati , tiarmiayi . Túrasha Wáinkiacharmiayi .

text: For many bare false witness against him , but their witness agreed not together .
text2: Túrasha Untsurí shuar Jesusan tsanumpruiniayatan Yapajiá Yapajiá chichainia ásarmatai Wáinkiacharmiayi .

text: And there arose certain , and bare false witness against him , saying ,
text2: Nuyá Chíkich wajakiar Wáitruiniak juna tiarmiayi

text: We heard him say , I will destroy this temple that is made with hands , and within three days I will build another made without hands .
text2: " Yusa Uunt Jeen , aents jeamarmia nuna yumpuntiatjai . Túran Menaintiú tsawantai , chikichan , aents jeamchamun jeamtatjai " tau antukmaji " tiarmiayi .

text: But neither so did their witness agree together .
text2: Tura tuke Yapajiáwar tiarmiayi .

text: And the high priest stood up in the midst , and asked Jesus , saying , Answerest thou nothing ? what is it which these witness against thee ?
text2: Nuisha Patri uuntri ajapén wajaki Jesusan chicharuk " ṡAimsatin penké tujintiamek . Warinia turamainia ? " Tímiayi .

text: But he held his peace , and answered nothing . Again the high priest asked him , and said unto him , Art thou the Christ , the Son of the Blessed ?
text2: Tura Jesus takamtak aimtsuk pujumiayi . Patri uuntri atak chicharuk " ṡAme nekas Yusa Anaikiamurinkaitiam . Ii Yusri Uunt tajinia nuna Uchirinkaitiam ? "

text: And Jesus said , I am : and ye shall see the Son of man sitting on the right hand of power , and coming in the clouds of heaven .
text2: Tutai Jesus Tímiayi " Ee , Núitjai . Winia , Aents Ajasu tutaintiajna nu Kakaram Yusa untsuurini pujai Wáitkiattarme . Tura nayaimpinmaya yuranminiam winiai Wáitkiattarme " Tímiayi .

text: Then the high priest rent his clothes , and saith , What need we any further witnesses ?
text2: Tutai Patri uuntri kajek , ni pushirin jaak Tímiayi " ṡChíkich Títincha Warí atsumaj ~ i ?

text: Ye have heard the blasphemy : what think ye ? And they all condemned him to be guilty of death .
text2: Nii tana nujai Yúsan Kátsekeamu antukurme . ṡWarintia Enentáimprum ? " Tímiayi . Takui " jakamniaiti " Ashí tiarmiayi .

text: And some began to spit on him , and to cover his face , and to buffet him , and to say unto him , Prophesy : and the servants did strike him with the palms of their hands .
text2: Chíkich Chíkich Jesusan Usukiáwarmiayi . Jiin epetkar awatiar " ṡYa aitkiarma ? etserkata " tiarmiayi . Patri suntarisha yapiniam awatiarmiayi .

text: And as Peter was beneath in the palace , there cometh one of the maids of the high priest :
text2: Núnaka Túruiniai Pítru Nunká , jea aani pujan , nuwa Patri uuntri takarniuriya nu tarimiayi .

text: And when she saw Peter warming himself , she looked upon him , and said , And thou also wast with Jesus of Nazareth .
text2: Niisha Pitrun jinia anamu pujan Wáinkiamiayi . Wáiniak , " Amesha Nasaretnumia Jesusjai wekaichukaitiam " Tímiayi .

text: But he denied , saying , I know not , neither understand I what thou sayest . And he went out into the porch ; and the cock crew .
text2: Tutai Pítiur chicharuk , " Nékatsjai . Ame Támena nuna nékatsjai " Tímiayi . Tura aa Wáitiainiam jiinkimiayi . Tumai atash shiniukmiayi .

text: And a maid saw him again , and began to say to them that stood by , This is one of them .
text2: Nu Núwasha Pitrun ataksha Wáiniak , Shuáran nui pujuinian Tímiayi " Júiti ni shuari . "

text: And he denied it again . And a little after , they that stood by said again to Peter , Surely thou art one of them : for thou art a Galilaean , and thy speech agreeth thereto .
text2: Tura Ataksha " atsá " Tímiayi . Ishichik árusan , shuar nui pujuarmia nu ataksha Pitrun chicharuk " Nekas ni shuarinme . Kariréanmaya Shuárchakaitiam . Auya shuara Nuní chichaame " tiarmiayi .

text: But he began to curse and to swear , saying , I know not this man of whom ye speak .
text2: Tutai Pítrusha kakantar chichaak , " Ju aishmannaka átum Tárumna Núnaka nékatsjai . Wáitrakuinkia Yus iirsati " Tímiayi .

text: And the second time the cock crew . And Peter called to mind the word that Jesus said unto him , Before the cock crow twice , thou shalt deny me thrice . And when he thought thereon , he wept .
text2: Nuya ataksha atash shiniukmiayi . Pítrusha , Jesus nuik timian Enentáimmiayi . Iis , Jesus nuik Tíchamka " Atash jimiar shiniatsain , ame , Núnaka nékatsjai , menaintiu turuttiatme " Tíchamka . Pítru nuna Enentáimias ti uutmiayi .

text: And straightway in the morning the chief priests held a consultation with the elders and scribes and the whole council , and bound Jesus , and carried him away , and delivered him to Pilate .
text2: Tura kashin Káshik Patri uuntri , Israer - shuara uuntrijiai , Israer - shuara jintinniurijiai , Ashí naamka armia nujai irunturar , chichaman jurusarmiayi . Túrawar Jesusan jinkiamun apach Kapitián Piratuiin ejeniarmiayi .

text: And Pilate asked him , Art thou the King of the Jews ? And he answering said unto him , Thou sayest it .
text2: Ejeniarmatai Piratu aniasmiayi " ṡAmesha Israer - shuara Uuntrinkáitiam ? " Tutai Jesussha " Amek tame " Tímiayi .

text: And the chief priests accused him of many things : but he answered nothing .
text2: Nuyá Patri uuntri ti tsanumprurarmiayi .

text: And Pilate asked him again , saying , Answerest thou nothing ? behold how many things they witness against thee .
text2: Ataksha Piratu aniasmiayi " ṡAimsatin penké tujintiamek ? Ti Untsurí etserturmainiatsuk . "

text: But Jesus yet answered nothing ; so that Pilate marvelled .
text2: Tura Jesus nunasha aikchamiayi . Túmakui Piratu ti Enentáimpramiayi .

text: And there was one named Barabbas , which lay bound with them that had made insurrection with him , who had committed murder in the insurrection .
text2: Shuar ámiayi , ni naari Parapás . Niisha ni shuarijiai meset ámanum , shuaran maa asamtai sepunam enkeamuyayi . Tura Námper tsawantai Piratu sepunmaya Chikichík shuarnak Jíiki akupniuyayi , aents seawarmia nuna .

text: And the multitude crying aloud began to desire him to do as he had ever done unto them .
text2: Nuisha Untsurí shuar Piratun Káutkar tiarmiayi " Ame ju Námpertin tuke Túramna nu Túratá .

text: For he knew that the chief priests had delivered him for envy .
text2: Patri uuntri Jesusan kajeraru ásar surukarmiayi . Piratusha , nuna Nekáa chicharainiak " Israer - shuartiram ṡAtumí akupniurin jiiki akupkattajak ? ṡNu wakerarmek ? " Tímiayi .

text: But the chief priests moved the people , that he should rather release Barabbas unto them .
text2: Tutai Patri uuntri aentsun chichainiak " " Antsu Parapás Jíikim Akúpkatá " titiarum " tiarmiayi .

text: And Pilate answered and said again unto them , What will ye then that I shall do unto him whom ye call the King of the Jews ?
text2: Tutai Parapásan seawarmatai Piratu ataksha chicharainiak " Jesusnasha , átum ii akupniuri tarumna nuna , ṡitiurkattaja ? " Tímiayi .

text: And they cried out again , Crucify him .
text2: Ataksha ni kakantar tiarmiayi " Krúsnum mantamnati . "

text: Then Pilate said unto them , Why , what evil hath he done ? And they cried out the more exceedingly , Crucify him .
text2: Piratusha niin tiarmiayi " ṡWarí tunaana Túriniait ? " Tímiayi . Takui niisha Nú nankaamas kakantar Tíarmiayi " Krúsnum mantamnati . "

text: And so Pilate , willing to content the people , released Barabbas unto them , and delivered Jesus , when he had scourged him , to be crucified .
text2: Tuma asamtai , aents shiir Enentáimprartí tusa , Piratu Tunáa shuaran , Parapásan jiiki akupkamiayi . Tura Jesusnasha katsumkarum krusnum ajintrurtarum tusa suntaran tsankatkamiayi .

text: And the soldiers led him away into the hall , called Praetorium ; and they call together the whole band .
text2: Tiniu asamtai suntar Jesusan jukiar , Kapitiáni jeen awayawarmiayi . Nu jea naari Piritiúriuiti . Túrawar Untsurí suntaran untsukarmiayi .

text: And they clothed him with purple , and platted a crown of thorns , and put it about his head ,
text2: Ashí Káunkar , pushin kapaanniun Jesusan aentsrarmiayi . Tawasap janki najanamun etsenkrumtikiarmiayi .

text: And began to salute him , Hail , King of the Jews !
text2: Nuisha Jesusan áujsar " Shíiraitme , Jesusá , Israer - shuara akupniuriya " wishikiainiak tiarmiayi .

text: And they smote him on the head with a reed , and did spit upon him , and bowing their knees worshipped him .
text2: Muuknumsha sapapjai awatiarmiayi ; Nuyá usukiawarmiayi , Túrawar ántar tikishmatrarmiayi .

text: And when they had mocked him , they took off the purple from him , and put his own clothes on him , and led him out to crucify him .
text2: Tura Jesusan wishikrar amukar , kapaantin pushin aitkiar , ni pushirin aentsrarmiayi . Túrawar Krúsnum ajintrurtai tusar Jíikiarmiayi .

text: And they compel one Simon a Cyrenian , who passed by , coming out of the country , the father of Alexander and Rufus , to bear his cross .
text2: Semun Serini Núnkanmaya Shuárauyayi . Arijantruncha , Rupuncha Aparíyayi . Semunkan takatnumia winian suntar emetawarmiayi , Jesusa krusrin yanaki jukiti tusar .

text: And they bring him unto the place Golgotha , which is , being interpreted , The place of a skull .
text2: Jesusnasha Kúrkuta Náinnium Júkiarmiayi . Kúrkuta , shuar chichamjainkia , muuka ukunch naint , tutainti .

text: And they gave him to drink wine mingled with myrrh : but he received it not .
text2: Jeawarmatai , Karía , mira kunkuinjai pachimprar aartaj tusa susarmiayi Jesusan . Túrasha umarchamiayi .

text: And it was the third hour , and they crucified him .
text2: Nantu Yakí jatemsamtai Krúsnum ayapar ajintrurar ikiusarmiayi . Túrawar suntar yaki jukit tusar nakurutaijiai nakurusar Jesusa pushirin yaruakarmiayi .

text: And the superscription of his accusation was written over , THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Urukamtai Máamuit , Ashí aents nuna nekaawarat tusa , ni Krúsrin ju aarmauyayi : ISRAER SHUARA AKUPNIURI

text: And with him they crucify two thieves ; the one on his right hand , and the other on his left .
text2: Nu Náinnium Jimiará kasa shuaran Niijiai Máawarmiayi . Chikichik Jesusa untsuurini Krúsnum , chikichik ni menaarini Krúsnum Máawarmiayi .

text: And the scripture was fulfilled , which saith , And he was numbered with the transgressors .
text2: Yus - Papinium aarma ana nujai uminkiauyayi . Nui " Tunáa shuarjai nekapmarmauyayi " tu aarmaiti .

text: And they that passed by railed on him , wagging their heads , and saying , Ah , thou that destroyest the temple , and buildest it in three days ,
text2: Shuar nankaamainiak , muuke pearar , Jesusan katsekainiak tiarmiayi " Iisia , amesha , " Yusa Uunt Jeen yumpuntiatjai , tura Menaintiú tsawantai ataksha jeamkattajai " Tíchakaitiam , tiarmiayi .

text: Save thyself , and come down from the cross .
text2: Amek Krúsnumia akaikim uwemprata . "

text: Likewise also the chief priests mocking said among themselves with the scribes , He saved others ; himself he cannot save .
text2: Núnisan Patri uuntrisha , Israer - shuara jintinniurisha Jesusan wishikrar chicharnaisarmiayi " Chikichan uwemtikraitiat , Ninki uwempratniun tujintiawai .

text: Let Christ the King of Israel descend now from the cross , that we may see and believe . And they that were crucified with him reviled him .
text2: Yusa anaikiamuri Krístuashit , ii akupniuriniashit , tiarmiayi . Wats , Yamái Krúsnumia Akáikití , iisha nu iisar Yus - shuar ajastai " wishikiainiak ántar nuna tiarmiayi . Jesusjai Krúsnum ajintruamusha Niin wishikiarmiayi .

text: And when the sixth hour was come , there was darkness over the whole land until the ninth hour .
text2: Tutupin jeamtai ti kiritin ajasmiayi Ashí nunkanam . Tura , nantu nunkaach ajasmatai ataksha tsaapnirmiayi .

text: And at the ninth hour Jesus cried with a loud voice , saying , Eloi , Eloi , lama sabachthani ? which is , being interpreted , My God , my God , why hast thou forsaken me ?
text2: Nuin Jesus kakantar untsumuk Tímiayi " Iruí , Iruí , rama sapaktani . " Nuka shuar chichamjainkia , " Yusrú , Yusrú , ṡurukamtai ajapa ikiurkiniam ? " tawai .

text: And some of them that stood by , when they heard it , said , Behold , he calleth Elias .
text2: Shuar nui pujuarmia nu , nu chichaman nékachu ásar , nuna antukar " Eríasan Untsúawai " Tíarmiayi .

text: And one ran and filled a spunge full of vinegar , and put it on a reed , and gave him to drink , saying , Let alone ; let us see whether Elias will come to take him down .
text2: Chikichik shuar churuinian uruchjai ajamper , sapapjai Ijiú mukunati tusa susamiayi . Tura Tímiayi " Wajastarum , Erías Niin jukitiaj tusa winishtimpiash . Iistai " Tímiayi .

text: And Jesus cried with a loud voice , and gave up the ghost .
text2: Nuinkia Jesus kakaram untsumak jakamiayi .

text: And the veil of the temple was rent in twain from the top to the bottom .
text2: Túramtai Yusa Uunt Jeen ejamu ninki jaanakmiayi , Yakíya Nunká .

text: And when the centurion , which stood over against him , saw that he so cried out , and gave up the ghost , he said , Truly this man was the Son of God .
text2: Suntara Kapitiántrisha Jesusan ayamtus wajamia nu , Jesus kakaram untsumak jaamun iis Tímiayi " Nuka ti nekas Yusa Uchiriyayi . "

text: There were also women looking on afar off : among whom was Mary Magdalene , and Mary the mother of James the less and of Joses , and Salome ;
text2: Nuwasha arant ii pujuarmiayi . Nu nuwajai Máktara péprunmaya Marí , Chíkich Marisha , Sarumáisha pujuarmiayi . Chíkich Marisha uchich Jakupuncha Jusencha Nukuríyayi .

text: ( Who also , when he was in Galilee , followed him , and ministered unto him ; ) and many other women which came up with him unto Jerusalem .
text2: Nu Núwaka , Kariréa nunkanam Jesus wekaimia nui , Niin nemarsar Yáintaitsar wekasarmiayi . Untsurí Chíkich nuwasha Jesusjai Jerusarénnum wear , nu nuwajai arant ii pujuarmiayi .

text: And now when the even was come , because it was the preparation , that is , the day before the sabbath ,
text2: Kiatemamtai , ayampratin tsawant jeatsain , Námper iwiaratin tsawant asamtai ,

text: Joseph of Arimathaea , and honourable counseller , which also waited for the kingdom of God , came , and went in boldly unto Pilate , and craved the body of Jesus .
text2: Arimiatíanmaya Jusé arantutsuk , kakaram ajas , Piratuí Jeá Jesusa ayashin seatajtsa utuamiayi . Nu Jusencha Ashí irunin ainia nu anturin ármiayi . Niisha Yus ju nunkanam akupin ajasat tusa Nákasmiayi .

text: And Pilate marvelled if he were already dead : and calling unto him the centurion , he asked him whether he had been any while dead .
text2: Tura Jesusa ayashin seam , Piratusha " Wárik jaka " Tímiayi . Tuma asa suntara Kapitiántrin untsurak " ṡNekas jakayik ? " Tímiayi .

text: And when he knew it of the centurion , he gave the body to Joseph .
text2: Tutai Kapitián " Ee " takui , Jesusa ayashin Jusen tsankatkamiayi .

text: And he bought fine linen , and took him down , and wrapped him in the linen , and laid him in a sepulchre which was hewn out of a rock , and rolled a stone unto the door of the sepulchre .
text2: Jusesha puju tarachin pénkeran sumarak , Jesusa ayashin itiar aepas penuarmiayi . Tura yamaram kaya Táurmanum ikiusmiayi . Ikius Wáitiniam kayan átutmiayi .

text: And Mary Magdalene and Mary the mother of Joses beheld where he was laid .
text2: Tura Máktaranmaya Marí , Jusé Nukurí Marijiai ni ikiuamun ii wajarmiayi .

text: And when the sabbath was past , Mary Magdalene , and Mary the mother of James , and Salome , had bought sweet spices , that they might come and anoint him .
text2: Tura ayampratin tsawant nankaamasmatai , Máktaranmaya Marisha , Jakupu Nukurí Marisha , Sarumáisha , kunkuinian Jesusa ayashin kuertai tusar sumakarmiayi .

text: And very early in the morning the first day of the week , they came unto the sepulchre at the rising of the sun .
text2: Tura kashin Tumintin , ti Káshik , nantu Yáma jiiniai , iwiarsamunam jeariarmiayi .

text: And they said among themselves , Who shall roll us away the stone from the door of the sepulchre ?
text2: Wésar chichainiak " Iwiarsamu Wáitiri kayancha ṡyaki akanketramkattaj ~ i ? " tiarmiayi .

text: And when they looked , they saw that the stone was rolled away : for it was very great .
text2: Jear uunt kaya akankekman Wáinkiarmiayi .

text: And entering into the sepulchre , they saw a young man sitting on the right side , clothed in a long white garment ; and they were affrighted .
text2: Iwiarsamunam wayawar , natsan esaram puju pushin entsar , untsuurnumaani pujan Wáinkiar ti ashamkarmiayi .

text: And he saith unto them , Be not affrighted : Ye seek Jesus of Nazareth , which was crucified : he is risen ; he is not here : behold the place where they laid him .
text2: Túmainiakui natsa Tímiayi " Ashamkairap . Nasarétnumia Jesus Krúsnum jakama nu éarme . Iniantkimiuiti . Jui pujatsui . Wátsek , ju ikiusmanum iistarum .

text: But go your way , tell his disciples and Peter that he goeth before you into Galilee : there shall ye see him , as he said unto you .
text2: Túrarum werum Pítrusha , Chíkich unuiniamurisha ju ujaktarum . Kariréanam atumin émkiyi . Turammarumna Núnisan Túruna Wáinkiattarme " Tímiayi .

text: And they went out quickly , and fled from the sepulchre ; for they trembled and were amazed : neither said they any thing to any man ; for they were afraid .
text2: Niisha ti ashamainiak purushniarar iwiarsamunmaya tseke wearmiayi . Ti ashamainia ásar , chikichkinkesha ujakcharmiayi .

text: Now when Jesus was risen early the first day of the week , he appeared first to Mary Magdalene , out of whom he had cast seven devils .
text2: émkaka Tumintin ti Káshik Jesus nantaki , Máktaranmaya Marin Wantintiúkmiayi . Nu María Enentáiya siati iwianchin Jesus yaunchu ajapruyayi .

text: And they , when they had heard that he was alive , and had been seen of her , believed not .
text2: Marisha Jesusa nemari Kúntuts uutu matsatainian Werí , " Jesus iwiaakui , imia wi wainkiajai " Tímiayi . Támaitiat anturkacharmiayi .

text: After that he appeared in another form unto two of them , as they walked , and went into the country .
text2: Tura urum jimiara shuar Jerusarénnumia tsanin weenan , Jesus Nusháa iira ajas tarimiayi .

text: And they went and told it unto the residue : neither believed they them .
text2: Niisha Jesusan Wáinkiar waketkiar , unuiniamurin ujakarmiayi , tura ni chichamencha anturkacharmiayi .

text: Afterward he appeared unto the eleven as they sat at meat , and upbraided them with their unbelief and hardness of heart , because they believed not them which had seen him after he was risen .
text2: Nuyasha Jesusa auntse unuiniamuri misanam pekaamkar pujuinian Jesus tarimiayi . " ṡAtumí Enentái urukamtai Kátsuram ainia , urukamtai Winia nekas Enentáimtursachuram ? " Tímiayi . Ni nantakmiarin Wáinkiaru chichamen anturkacharu ásarmatai kakantramiayi .

text: And he said unto them , Go ye into all the world , and preach the gospel to every creature .
text2: Nuyá chichaak " Ashí nunkanam wetarum . Túrarum Ashí shuarnum Yusa shiir chichame etserkatarum .

text: He that believeth and is baptized shall be saved ; but he that believeth not shall be damned .
text2: Shuar anturak imiani uwemprartatui . Shuar antukcharka , tuke sumamawartatui .

text: And these signs shall follow them that believe ; In my name shall they cast out devils ; they shall speak with new tongues ;
text2: Shuar winia Náarun pachis , Yúsan nekas Enentáimtakka , juna Túrawartatui , Yusa kakarmarin iniakmastaj tusa : iwianchin jiiki akupkartatui ; Chíkich chichamjai chichasartatui ;

text: They shall take up serpents ; and if they drink any deadly thing , it shall not hurt them ; they shall lay hands on the sick , and they shall recover .
text2: napincha achiksha , tseasnasha úmaksha , jaa ajaschartatui . Jaa shuaran ni uwejejai antin , nu shuaran pénker awajsartatui . " Tu Tímiayi .

text: So then after the Lord had spoken unto them , he was received up into heaven , and sat on the right hand of God .
text2: Jesus chichas amukmatai , Yus nayaimpiniam jukimiayi . Túruna Yusa untsuurini pujusmiayi .

text: And they went forth , and preached everywhere , the Lord working with them , and confirming the word with signs following . Amen .
text2: Ni unuiniamurisha Jíinkiar , Ashí nunkanam Yus - Chichaman etserkarmiayi . Tura Uunt Yus niin Yáinmiayi . Tura etserainiakui , Ashí aents ni kakarmarin nekaawarat tusa , aentsti tujintiamun Túratniun susamiayi . Nuke Atí .

text: Forasmuch as many have taken in hand to set forth in order a declaration of those things which are most surely believed among us ,
text2: Nekas Iiní Túramia nuna " ímiatrusan aartajai " Untsurí aents tiarmiayi .

text: Even as they delivered them unto us , which from the beginning were eyewitnesses , and ministers of the word ;
text2: Yámankamtaikniumian iisarmia Nú shuar , tura Yus - Chichaman etserkatniun Yáinkiarmia nusha iin unuitiamprarmia Nútiksaran aartinian wakeriarmiayi .

text: It seemed good to me also , having had perfect understanding of all things from the very first , to write unto thee in order , most excellent Theophilus ,
text2: Wisha Núnisnak esetsaran Enentáimsan , Yámankamtaikniumia nuna nekaamjai . Tuma asan Túrunamia nuna ímiatrusnak amincha aatratajtsan wakerimjiame , winia uuntur Tiupiru .

text: That thou mightest know the certainty of those things , wherein thou hast been instructed .
text2: Jintintramawarma Nú nankaamas nekaata tusan wakerakun aatjame .

text: There was in the days of Herod , the king of Judaea , a certain priest named Zacharias , of the course of Abia : and his wife was of the daughters of Aaron , and her name was Elisabeth .
text2: Jutía nunkanam uunt akupin Erutis akupkamia Nú tsawantin Israer - shuar Yúsnan pujurin ámiayi , ni naari Sakarías . Niisha Aptías weeauyayi . Ni nuwesha Irisapít Arun weeauyayi . Irisapítia uuntrisha Israer - shuar Yúsnan pujurin ármiayi .

text: And they were both righteous before God , walking in all the commandments and ordinances of the Lord blameless .
text2: Yúsjaisha Sakaríassha Irisapítcha Mái - metek pénker ármiayi . Yus akupkamia nunasha umirin ármiayi . Tuma asamtai penkesha Chíkich niin yajauch chicharkatin atsuarmiayi .

text: And they had no child , because that Elisabeth was barren , and they both were now well stricken in years .
text2: Yusjai pénker wekainiayat Irisapít Júrechuyayi . Túrasha mai uuntach ármiayi .

text: According to the custom of the priest ' s office , his lot was to burn incense when he went into the temple of the Lord .
text2: Israer - shuar Yúsnan pujurin Chíkich weeanmaya Nuyá Chíkich weeanam , ankant ankant Yusa jeen Takáu ármiayi . Chíkich tsawant , Sakarías Weeá takastin amia nui , Sakaríaska kunkuinian ekeemaktaj tusa init wayatniuyayi .

text: And the whole multitude of the people were praying without at the time of incense .
text2: Init kunkuinian ekeemai Untsurí aents aani matsamsar Yúsan áujtak pujuarmiayi .

text: And there appeared unto him an angel of the Lord standing on the right side of the altar of incense .
text2: Sakarías init pujai kunkuin ekeematainiam untsuurnumaani aya aneachma nayaimpinmaya suntar wajamiayi .

text: And when Zacharias saw him , he was troubled , and fear fell upon him .
text2: Nuna wajan Wáiniak Sakaríaska purushnairmiayi .

text: But the angel said unto him , Fear not , Zacharias : for thy prayer is heard ; and thy wife Elisabeth shall bear thee a son , and thou shalt call his name John .
text2: Túrasha nayaimpinmaya suntar chicharuk Tímiayi " Sapijmiakaip Sakaríasa . Nekaata , Ame seamna nuna Yus Anturtamkayi . tura ame nuwem Irisapít uchin takustatui . Nii akiiniamtai , " Juan " anaikiat .

text: For he shall be great in the sight of the Lord , and shall drink neither wine nor strong drink ; and he shall be filled with the Holy Ghost , even from his mother ' s womb .
text2: Ame uchiram akiiniattana nuka Yusjaisha nankaamantu átatui . Tuma asamtai akiiniamtai , amesha shiir Enentáimsam warastatme . Tura Chíkich aents Untsurí warasartatui . Ame uchirmesha Karía ainia nuna umarchattawai . Tura aetak akiinchanak Yusa Wakaní pimiutkattawai , Tímiayi .

text: And many of the children of Israel shall he turn to the Lord their God .
text2: Tura ni shuarin Israer - shuar ainiana nuna , ii Uuntri Yusjai ataksha nawamtikiartatui .

text: And he shall go before him in the spirit and power of Elias , to turn the hearts of the fathers to the children , and the disobedient to the wisdom of the just ; to make ready a people prepared for the Lord .
text2: Uunt Yúsaiya akatramu átatui . Yaunchu Yúsnan etserin Erías kakaram etserkamia Núnisan niisha etserkattawai . Nujai shuaran ni Uchiríjiai nawamtikiartatui . Tura umichu ainia nuna eseer Enentáimtikrartatui . Ni Uuntri taakui ni Enentái iwiaramu arti tusa etserkattawai " Tímiayi nayaimpinmaya suntar .

text: And Zacharias said unto the angel , Whereby shall I know this ? for I am an old man , and my wife well stricken in years .
text2: Nuna takui Sakarías nayaimpinmaya suntaran Tímiayi " ṡNunasha warijiain paant nekaataj ? Wisha nuarjai Mái - metek ti uuntchichukaitiaj " Tímiayi .

text: And the angel answering said unto him , I am Gabriel , that stand in the presence of God ; and am sent to speak unto thee , and to shew thee these glad tidings .
text2: Tutai nayaimpinmaya suntar Tímiayi " Wikia Kapriiraitjai , Yusa suntarintjai . Nii akatturmatai Chichastájam tusan tura nu shiir chichaman Ujaktájam tusan tarijme , Tímiayi .

text: And , behold , thou shalt be dumb , and not able to speak , until the day that these things shall be performed , because thou believest not my words , which shall be fulfilled in their season .
text2: Túrasha wi Tájamna nu " nekasaiti " tu Enentáimprachume . Tura asam uchiram akiintsain muut ajastatme . Chichastin penké tujinkiattame . Tura wi tajana nu , tsawant jeamtai Túrunattawai . "

text: And the people waited for Zacharias , and marvelled that he tarried so long in the temple .
text2: Nuna tumai Yusa jeen aani pujusar , Sakaríasan Nákas pujuarmiayi . " ṡUrukamtaik init we Imiá menkaka ? " tu Enentáimprarmiayi .

text: And when he came out , he could not speak unto them : and they perceived that he had seen a vision in the temple : for he beckoned unto them , and remained speechless .
text2: Nuyá Sakarías jiinkimtai , áujsartaj Tukamá tujinkiarmiayi . Sakaríaska , muut ajasu asa , aya úwijmiasan chichamiayi . Túmakui , Sakarías init pujus Yúsai Wáimiakun nekaawarmiayi .

text: And it came to pass , that , as soon as the days of his ministration were accomplished , he departed to his own house .
text2: Yusa jeen takastin tsawantri amuukamtai Sakaríaska ni jeen waketkimiayi .

text: And after those days his wife Elisabeth conceived , and hid herself five months , saying ,
text2: Nuyá ukunam ni nuari Irisapít ajaprukmiayi . Tura senku nantutin aya jean pujusmiayi .

text: Thus hath the Lord dealt with me in the days wherein he looked on me , to take away my reproach among men .
text2: Jeá pujus , " Aents wishikruiniakui natsantan jurutkitiaj tusa uchi takustinian Yus tsankatrukai " tu Enentáimpramiayi Irisapít .

text: And in the sixth month the angel Gabriel was sent from God unto a city of Galilee , named Nazareth ,
text2: Nu senku nantu nankaamasmatai Yus ni suntarin Kapriiran Nasarét péprunam akupkamiayi . Nu pepru Kariréa nunkanam pujawai .

text: To a virgin espoused to a man whose name was Joseph , of the house of David ; and the virgin ' s name was Mary .
text2: Nasarétnumia nuwan , naari Marí , Iyutí tusa akuptukmiayi . Nu Núwaka aishmanjai pujuchuyayi . Niisha Jusejai nuatnaikiatsa anajmanair pujumiayi . Juseka uunt Tawit weeauyayi .

text: And the angel came in unto her , and said , Hail , thou that art highly favoured , the Lord is with thee : blessed art thou among women .
text2: Wats , nayaimpinmaya suntar Marí pujamunam Wayá Tímiayi " Yus pénker Enentáimturma asamtai , ámin winitjiame , Mariya . Yuska ámin nemartamuk Ashí nuwa nankaamas pénker awajtamui " Tímiayi .

text: And when she saw him , she was troubled at his saying , and cast in her mind what manner of salutation this should be .
text2: Tura Marisha nayaimpinmaya suntaran Wáiniak , chichaamun nékatsuk " Urukamtaik tu Chicháa " tu Enentáimpramiayi .

text: And the angel said unto her , Fear not , Mary : for thou hast found favour with God .
text2: Nuyá nayaimpinmaya suntar chicharuk Tímiayi " Mariya , sapijmiakaip . Yus shiir Enentáimturmawai .

text: And , behold , thou shalt conceive in thy womb , and bring forth a son , and shalt call his name JESUS .
text2: Antukta . Amesha ajapruktatme . Túram Uchi takustatme . Nusha " Jesus " anaikiata .

text: And he shall reign over the house of Jacob for ever ; and of his kingdom there shall be no end .
text2: Niisha uunt átatui . Nincha " Uunt Nankaamaku Yusa Uchiri " tiartatui . Tura Uunt Yuska yaunchu Tawitian uunt akupniuri awajsamia Núnisan ame Uchirmin ame Shuárumin Israer tutain Uunt akupin awajsattawai . Ni akupeamurisha Yus susamu asa penké amuukashtiniaiti " Tímiayi .

text: Then said Mary unto the angel , How shall this be , seeing I know not a man ?
text2: Nayaimpinmaya suntar nuna tutai Marí Tímiayi " Nusha winia aishur atsaisha , ṡitiurak Túrunataj ? "

text: And the angel answered and said unto her , The Holy Ghost shall come upon thee , and the power of the Highest shall overshadow thee : therefore also that holy thing which shall be born of thee shall be called the Son of God .
text2: Tutai nayaimpinmaya suntar Marín Tímiayi " Yusa Wakaní tarutramtatui . Tura yuranmia Núnisan Uunt Yusa kakarmari ijirmattawai . Nu tuma asamtai Uchi akiiniattana nu Yúsaiya asamtai , " Yusa Uchirínti " tiartatui , Tímiayi .

text: And , behold , thy cousin Elisabeth , she hath also conceived a son in her old age : and this is the sixth month with her , who was called barren .
text2: Tura Irisapít ame Kaná kaimia nusha Núnisan weamtanam ajaprukai . Iis , " Júrechuiti " tiarmia nu , yamaikia sais nantu pujawai ajamtin .

text: For with God nothing shall be impossible .
text2: Yúsjainkia itiurchatka penké atsawai " Tímiayi .

text: And Mary said , Behold the handmaid of the Lord ; be it unto me according to thy word . And the angel departed from her .
text2: Tutai Marí Tímiayi " Yus wakeramun Túriniaitjai wikia . Ame tame nuna Yus wakerana nuna Túrutati , tajai " Tímiayi . Nuna Tímiatai nayaimpinmaya suntarka wémiayi .

text: And entered into the house of Zacharias , and saluted Elisabeth .
text2: Nu tsawant Marí Wárikmas muranam Jutía nunkanam ni Kaná kain Irisapítian iyutaj tusa wémiayi . Sakaríasai Jeá , ni jeen Wayá , Irisapítian áujsamiayi .

text: And it came to pass , that , when Elisabeth heard the salutation of Mary , the babe leaped in her womb ; and Elisabeth was filled with the Holy Ghost :
text2: Marí áujeamun antukmatai Irisapítia ampujén uchiri muchitkiamiayi . Tumai Yusa Wakaní ni Enentáin pimiutkamiayi .

text: And she spake out with a loud voice , and said , Blessed art thou among women , and blessed is the fruit of thy womb .
text2: Nuinkia kakantar chichaak Marin Tímiayi " Yus amincha ti shiir awajtamsaiti . Tura Uchiram akiiniattana nusha Yus shiir awajsamuiti .

text: And whence is this to me , that the mother of my Lord should come to me ?
text2: Kairua , ame winia Uuntru Nukurí áminin , Yus winia ti waitnentra asa , áujsata tusa ámin akuptamkachaik , Tímiayi .

text: For , lo , as soon as the voice of thy salutation sounded in mine ears , the babe leaped in my womb for joy .
text2: Warí , wisha ame áujtamna nuna ántakui ampujrui uchi waras muchitrutkayi .

text: And blessed is she that believed : for there shall be a performance of those things which were told her from the Lord .
text2: Amesha Yus Turámiania nu umikiu asam shiir pujame . Yus Tímia nu Túrunattawai auka " Tímiayi .

text: And Mary said , My soul doth magnify the Lord ,
text2: Nuna tinia iniaisamtai Marí juna Tímiayi : " Wikia tuke enentairjai " Yus Timiá uuntaiti " tajai .

text: And my spirit hath rejoiced in God my Saviour .
text2: Tura Uunt Yuska winia Uwemtikruru asamtai ti waraajai .

text: For he that is mighty hath done to me great things ; and holy is his name .
text2: Wisha péejchach ain ni wakeramurin umiktajtsan wakerakui winia Enentáimturayi . Tuma asamtai Ashí aents , " Marincha Yus shiir awajsaiti " tuke turutiartatui . Yuska Imiá penker tura Imiá kakaram ana nu winia ti uuntan Túrutaiti . Tuma asamtai Ashí aents " Marincha Yus shiir awajsaiti " turutiartatui . Núnaka Yamái nankamamunak tuke Turutú ajartatui .

text: And his mercy is on them that fear him from generation to generation .
text2: Tura Niin umirkatniun wakerana nunasha Yus tuke waitnentrartatui .

text: He hath shewed strength with his arm ; he hath scattered the proud in the imagination of their hearts .
text2: Ti itiurchatan Páchitsuk Túraiti Nii . " Nankaamantuitjai " tu Enentáimtumainia nuna nupetkaiti .

text: He hath put down the mighty from their seats , and exalted them of low degree .
text2: Ashí akupin ainia nuna awakkaruiti . Tura íksan péejchach ainia nuna uunt awajsaruiti .

text: He hath filled the hungry with good things ; and the rich he hath sent empty away .
text2: Pénker ana nuna kitiamainiakui Yus pénkeran Súsaruiti . Tura antsu " Ashí takakjai " tuinia nuna aya Júnik awajsaruiti .

text: He hath holpen his servant Israel , in remembrance of his mercy ;
text2: Israer - shuar Niiniu ájinia Núnaka waitnentratniun kajinmattsuk Yáinmákuitji .

text: As he spake to our fathers , to Abraham , and to his seed for ever .
text2: Yaunchu ii Uuntri Apraáman tura Ní shuarnasha " Túrattajai " timia nuna ímiatrusan tuke Túraiti . " Nuní Tímiayi Marí .

text: And Mary abode with her about three months , and returned to her own house .
text2: Marikia Irisapítjai Menaintiú nantu pujus ni jeen waketkimiayi .

text: Now Elisabeth ' s full time came that she should be delivered ; and she brought forth a son .
text2: Nuyasha ni jurertin tsawantri jeamtai Irisapítcha uchin aishmankan takusmiayi .

text: And her neighbours and her cousins heard how the Lord had shewed great mercy upon her ; and they rejoiced with her .
text2: Tura ni shuarisha , ni írutramurisha " Irisapítian Yus ti shiir Yáinmiayi " Tuíniak , niin iyuwearmiayi . Tura Mái - metek warasarmiayi .

text: And it came to pass , that on the eighth day they came to circumcise the child ; and they called him Zacharias , after the name of his father .
text2: Israer - shuar Túrutai Júnisaiti : uchi akiiniamuri uchu tsawant jeamtai , shunichiri nuapen tsupiktin awai , Sirkunsisiún tutai . Yus nuna Tú tiniu asamtai tuke Túrin ármiayi . Wats , Irisapítia uchiri akiiniamurinia uchu tsawant jeamtai tsupirkatai tusar ni jeen jearmiayi . Nuinkia ni apari naari Sakarías anaikiataitsar wakeriarmiayi .

text: And his mother answered and said , Not so ; but he shall be called John .
text2: Tura ni Nukurí Tímiayi " Atsá . Antsu ni naari Juan átatui . "

text: And they said unto her , There is none of thy kindred that is called by this name .
text2: Tutai tiarmiayi " ṡNusha urukamtia ? Amée shuarumsha nu Náartincha áwak " tiarmiayi .

text: And they made signs to his father , how he would have him called .
text2: Nuinkia uchi Aparín " ṡWarí anaikiatajtsam wakeram ? " tusar aya úwejejain iniasarmiayi .

text: And he asked for a writing table , and wrote , saying , His name is John . And they marvelled all .
text2: Tutai Uchí Aparísha " Nakash surusta ; aartaj tusan wakerajai " tusa aya úwejejain iniakmamiayi . Takui nakash susam , ni naari Juánkaiti , tu aarmiayi . Nuna Wáinkiar " Ayawa urukakun ta " tu Enentáimprarmiayi .

text: And his mouth was opened immediately , and his tongue loosed , and he spake , and praised God .
text2: Nú chichamaik Sakarías chichatsuk pujamun chichakmiayi . Tura nuin Yusa Náarincha shiir awajsamiayi .

text: And fear came on all that dwelt round about them : and all these sayings were noised abroad throughout all the hill country of Judaea .
text2: Nuinkia ni írutramurisha ashamkarmiayi ; tura Ashí Jutía nunka Murá amia nui nu Túrunamun ujakam Ashí nekaawarmiayi .

text: And all they that heard them laid them up in their hearts , saying , What manner of child shall this be ! And the hand of the Lord was with him .
text2: Nu Túrunamun antukar ti Enentáimsarmiayi . Tura " ju uchin Yus nekas pujurtsuk . Tuma asamtai uunt ajas ṡurukuk ati ? " tu Enentáimprarmiayi .

text: And his father Zacharias was filled with the Holy Ghost , and prophesied , saying ,
text2: Uchí Aparí Sakarías , Yusa Wakaní pimiutkam tura Yus jintintiam , juna Tímiayi :

text: Blessed be the Lord God of Israel ; for he hath visited and redeemed his people ,
text2: " Israer - Shuartí ii Yusri naari shiir awajsatniuitji . Ii Yúsrisha tarutmaitji . Tura uwemtikrampraitji .

text: And hath raised up an horn of salvation for us in the house of his servant David ;
text2: Yaunchu ii uuntri Tawit Yusa wakeramurijiai uunt akupin áchamkia . Tura ni ukurin ti kakaram Uwemtikkiartinian suramsaitji .

text: To perform the mercy promised to our fathers , and to remember his holy covenant ;
text2: Yuska ii nemasriya tura iin nakitramainiajnia Nuyá uwemtikrampratniun Enentáimsamia nuna , yaunchu ni etserniurin pénker armia nuna ujakmiayi . " Winia ti penker chichamprun Tájana nuna yapajitsuk umirkan tuke Wáitnentratajrume " yaunchu ii uuntrin Tímiania nunasha ni etserniurin ujakarmiayi . Yaunchu nu ujakma Yamái iisha wainji .

text: In holiness and righteousness before him , all the days of our life .
text2: Nu ujakman Yuska Yámankamtaik Imiá yaunchu ii uuntri Apraáman Tíchamkia . Apraáman ujakmia nu Júiti : " Wi wakeraj Nútiksaran , Winia umirtukar pénker wekainia nuna ni nemasriya uwemtikrattajai . Sapijmiatsuk winia tuke takartusarat tusan Túrattajai " Yus Tímiayi Apraáman . Iisha ni shuari asakrin , nuna taku incha Túramaji .

text: And thou , child , shalt be called the prophet of the Highest : for thou shalt go before the face of the Lord to prepare his ways ;
text2: Tura amincha , uchiru , " Uunt Yusna etserniuiti " turamartatui . Amesha ni Tátintri iwiarataj tusam Uuntai émkim wétatme .

text: To give knowledge of salvation unto his people by the remission of their sins ,
text2: Ni shuari , ni tunaari tsankurnar uwemprarat tusam Túrattame .

text: To give light to them that sit in darkness and in the shadow of death , to guide our feet into the way of peace .
text2: Yuska Ashí shuaran anea asa , incha Wáitnentramak ni pujamunmaya ni Tsáapnintrin suramsaitji . Ni Enentáin kiritniunam wekainia nuna , mesertinnium Jeatemá ásarmatai , ni Tsáapnintri jeat ~ i tusa Túraiti . Tura Ashí incha ii Enentáin imiatkinchanum Wekasarmí tusa Túraiti . " Nuní Tímiayi Sakarías .

text: And the child grew , and waxed strong in spirit , and was in the deserts till the day of his shewing unto Israel .
text2: Uchisha tsakarmiayi . Tura Yúsan nekaki - nekaki wémiayi . Israer shuarnum etserkatin tsawantri jeatsainkia atsamunam pujuyayi .

text: And it came to pass in those days , that there went out a decree from Caesar Augustus , that all the world should be taxed .
text2: Wats , Juan akiiniamia Nú uwitin uunt akupin Akustu Ashí nunkanam aentsun Nekapmarartí tu chichakmiayi .

text: ( And this taxing was first made when Cyrenius was governor of Syria . )
text2: Nu nekapmartinian yaunchu Túrushtain Yamái Túriarmiayi . Siria nunkanam Seriniu akupin Pujái Túrawarmiayi .

text: And all went to be taxed , every one into his own city .
text2: Ni naari aartaj tusa Ashí shuar ni nunkenin wétin ármiayi .

text: And Joseph also went up from Galilee , out of the city of Nazareth , into Judaea , unto the city of David , which is called Bethlehem ; ( because he was of the house and lineage of David : )
text2: Tuma asamtai Jusé Nasarét péprunmaya Kariréa nunkanam amia Nuyá jiinki Pirin péprunam Jutía nunkanam amia nui wémiayi . Juseka Tawit weeanam akiinia asa , ni nekas nunkenka Pirinkauyayi .

text: To be taxed with Mary his espoused wife , being great with child .
text2: Nu asamtai , ni Náarin aartaj tusa Jusé wémiayi Marijiai . Marisha Jusé Núweyayi . Tura tsanincharuyayi . Túmaitiat Marisha Yusa Wakaní kakarmarijiai ajamtiniuyayi .

text: And so it was , that , while they were there , the days were accomplished that she should be delivered .
text2: Tura nui Pirinnum pujuiniai Marí takustintri jeamiayi .

text: And she brought forth her firstborn son , and wrapped him in swaddling clothes , and laid him in a manger ; because there was no room for them in the inn .
text2: Nui iwiairin uchin aishmankan takusmiayi . Tura uchi penutaijiai penuar , waaka yurumtainiam aepsamiayi . Irar kanutainiam pujustin ankant Atsá asamtai Túrawarmiayi .

text: And there were in the same country shepherds abiding in the field , keeping watch over their flock by night .
text2: Tura Pirinnum Tíjiuch murikiun Wáinin kashi murikrin Wáiniuk pujuarmiayi .

text: And , lo , the angel of the Lord came upon them , and the glory of the Lord shone round about them : and they were sore afraid .
text2: Túmainiai nayaimpinmaya suntar murikiun Wáinin matsatainian wantintiukmiayi . Tura Yúsnumia Tsáapnin ni matsatainiamunam etsantramiayi . Túrunamtai murikiun Wáinniuka ti ashamkarmiayi .

text: And the angel said unto them , Fear not : for , behold , I bring you good tidings of great joy , which shall be to all people .
text2: Túrasha nayaimpinmaya suntar Tímiayi " Ashamprukairap . Ashí aentsnum ti warastin Atí tusan ti penker chichaman itiarjiarme .

text: For unto you is born this day in the city of David a Saviour , which is Christ the Lord .
text2: Júiti : Yamái tsawantai uunt Tawitia péprurin Pirinnum yaunchu Yus anaikiamu KRISTU tutai , uwemtikramprataj tusa akiintiurmarme . Nu Uchisha Ashí aentsun akupniuiti , Tímiayi .

text: And this shall be a sign unto you ; Ye shall find the babe wrapped in swaddling clothes , lying in a manger .
text2: Tura jujai nekaattarme : uchi penutaijiai penuarma waaka yurumtainiam Tepá Wáinkiattarme . Nu Wáinkiarum nekas Júiti , tu nekaattarme . "

text: And suddenly there was with the angel a multitude of the heavenly host praising God , and saying ,
text2: Nu chichamaik nayaimpinmaya suntar ti Untsurí , nayaimpinmaya Káunkarmiayi . Túrawar Yusa naarin shiir awajainiak juna tiarmiayi :

text: Glory to God in the highest , and on earth peace , good will toward men .
text2: " Nayaimpinmasha Yus nankaamantuiti tu Enentáimtusarti . Tura ju nunkanmasha Yusjai nawamnaikiaru ainia nu imiatkinchanum pujusarti . " Tu tiarmiayi .

text: And it came to pass , as the angels were gone away from them into heaven , the shepherds said one to another , Let us now go even unto Bethlehem , and see this thing which is come to pass , which the Lord hath made known unto us .
text2: Tura Yusa suntari nayaimpiniam waketkiarmatai murikiun Wáinin tiarmiayi " Wats , Pirinnum Wárik Wetái . Nu Túrunamu Yus turamajnia nu iyumi " tiarmiayi .

text: And they came with haste , and found Mary , and Joseph , and the babe lying in a manger .
text2: Nuna tiar Wárik wearmiayi . Tura Marincha Jusencha Wáinkiarmiayi . Tura uchincha waaka yurumtainiam tepan Wáinkiarmiayi .

text: And when they had seen it , they made known abroad the saying which was told them concerning this child .
text2: Wear nuna Wáinkiar , nayaimpinmaya suntar uchi Túrunamurin timia nuna etserkarmiayi .

text: And all they that heard it wondered at those things which were told them by the shepherds .
text2: Tura murikiun Wáinin tiarmia nuna antukaruka ti Enentáimtusarmiayi .

text: But Mary kept all these things , and pondered them in her heart .
text2: Túrasha Marikia Ashí Túrunamia nuna ni Enentáijiainkia Enentáimtu pujumiayi .

text: And the shepherds returned , glorifying and praising God for all the things that they had heard and seen , as it was told unto them .
text2: Tura murikiun Wáinniuka antukarmia nuna Enentáimtusar , tura iisarmia nunasha Enentáimtusar " Nayaimpinmaya suntar ujatmakmajnia Tímiatrusan Túrunayi " tiarmiayi . Tuma ásar Yusa Náarin shiir awajsar kantampruawar waketkiarmiayi .

text: And when eight days were accomplished for the circumcising of the child , his name was called JESUS , which was so named of the angel before he was conceived in the womb .
text2: Tura uchi akiiniamu uchu tsawant jeamtai , ni Túrutairin Túrin ásar , ni shunichiri nuapen tsupirkarmiayi . Túrawar Marí ajapratsain nayaimpinmaya suntar Tímia Nútiksan " Jesus " anaikiarmiayi .
