text: And when the days of her purification according to the law of Moses were accomplished , they brought him to Jerusalem , to present him to the Lord ;
text2: Tura Muisais akiiniatniunam akupkamia Núnisan , tsawantri jeamtai , Yusa Uunt Jeen Jerusarénnum uchin Yus iiktustai tusar Júkiarmiayi .

text: ( As it is written in the law of the Lord , Every male that openeth the womb shall be called holy to the Lord ; )
text2: Kame Yus - Papinium ju aarma awai : " Ashí uchi iwiairi aishman akiinkiunka Yusna átatui . "

text: And to offer a sacrifice according to that which is said in the law of the Lord , A pair of turtledoves , or two young pigeons .
text2: Tuma asamtai , Marí Yusa Uunt Jeen Wáitsuk pujamu wayatniuri jeamtai , uchin Yus Iistí tusa Yusa Uunt Jeen Jerusarénnum pujana nui itiarmiayi . Tura yampitsan Jímiaran Súsarmiayi . Muisáis akupkamun umiiniak nuna Túrawarmiayi .

text: And , behold , there was a man in Jerusalem , whose name was Simeon ; and the same man was just and devout , waiting for the consolation of Israel : and the Holy Ghost was upon him .
text2: Nu Túmai Semeún naartin aishman Jerusarénnum pujumiayi . Semeúnsha Yusa Wakaní pujurma asa pénker aishmankauyayi . Yúsan nekas Enentáimtiniuyayi . Yusa anaikiamurijiai Israer - shuar ankant ajastin jeati tusa Nákauyayi .

text: And it was revealed unto him by the Holy Ghost , that he should not see death , before he had seen the Lord ' s Christ .
text2: " Winia anaikiamur KRISTU tutai Wáintsuk Jákashtatme " uunt Yusa Wakaní tu jintintiamiayi .

text: And he came by the Spirit into the temple : and when the parents brought in the child Jesus , to do for him after the custom of the law ,
text2: Nú Semeún Yusa Wakani " Wetá " tutai , Yusa Uunt Jeen wémiayi . Tura Nú tsawantai Muisáis Tímia Núnisan umirkatai tusar Marisha Jusesha uchin Jesusan Yusa Uunt Jeen itiariarmiayi .

text: Then took he him up in his arms , and blessed God , and said ,
text2: Itiariarmatai Semeún uchin jusa miniakas Yúsan áujuk juna Tímiayi :

text: Lord , now lettest thou thy servant depart in peace , according to thy word :
text2: " Yamaikia , Uunta , Amiin wi jeatin ankant Atí . Turutmiamna nu ímiatrusmek umikiume .

text: Which thou hast prepared before the face of all people ;
text2: Ju Uchi Ashí aents Uwemtikrartá tusam susamna nuna Yamái imia winia jiirujai Wáinkiajai .

text: A light to lighten the Gentiles , and the glory of thy people Israel .
text2: Israer - shuarcha ainia nu Tsáapninium wekasarat tusa akuptukmaiti ju Uchi . Tura Israer - shuar Aminiuram ájinia nuna Ashí aents shiir Enentáimtikrartí tusam ju Uchi akuptukmaitji . Nuna Wáinkian shiir Enentáimsan Jákatniuitjai . "

text: And Joseph and his mother marvelled at those things which were spoken of him .
text2: Tura Semeún Uchiniun tu chicharkui Jusesha Jesusa Nukurísha ti Enentáimprarmiayi .

text: And Simeon blessed them , and said unto Mary his mother , Behold , this child is set for the fall and rising again of many in Israel ; and for a sign which shall be spoken against ;
text2: Semeúnsha chichaak " Yus shiir Enentáimturmasartí " niin Tímiayi . Nuyasha Marin chicharuk Tímiayi " Nekaata . Ju Uchin Israer - shuartisha Untsurí nakitrar iniarartatji . Tura Chíkich Israer - shuartikia ju Uchin shiir Enentáimtusar ti wararsartatji . Tura Uchiram Yusa kakarmarin ti paant iniakmastatui . Tuma ain Untsurí Aun yajauch chichariartatui .

text: ( Yea , a sword shall pierce through thy own soul also , ) that the thoughts of many hearts may be revealed .
text2: Nujai shuar ni Enentáin warinia Enentáimia nu , paant átatui . Maaj , Ashí nu Túmakui , ijiumua Núnismek ame Enentáimin ti Wáitsattame , Mariya . " Tu chichasmiayi Semeún .

text: And there was one Anna , a prophetess , the daughter of Phanuel , of the tribe of Aser : she was of a great age , and had lived with an husband seven years from her virginity ;
text2: Nuwasha Ana naartin nui Yusa Uunt Jeen pujumiayi . Niisha Yúsnan etserniuyayi . Ni Aparísha Panuíruyayi tura Aser shuarauyayi nu nuwa . Niisha ti uuntchiyayi . Niisha yama nuatnaikiamujai siati uwi ni aishrijiai tsanin pujusarmiayi .

text: And she was a widow of about fourscore and four years , which departed not from the temple , but served God with fastings and prayers night and day .
text2: Tura wajemamiayi . Tura uchenta kuatru uwi takakuyayi . Tura ninkia Yusa Uunt Jeenia Jíintsuk Káshisha tsawaisha tuke Yúsan áujniuyayi . Tura yurumtsuk Yúsan áujniuyayi .

text: And she coming in that instant gave thanks likewise unto the Lord , and spake of him to all them that looked for redemption in Jerusalem .
text2: Semeún tuasua amikmatai Anasha taa , Uchin Wáiniak Yúsan yuminsamiayi . Tura Jerusarénnum Yus uwemtikrampratai tusa Nákarmia nuna áujkunka uchin áujmat wémiayi .

text: And when they had performed all things according to the law of the Lord , they returned into Galilee , to their own city Nazareth .
text2: Nuyá Yus Tímia nuna Ashí Túrawar amikiar Kariréa nunkanam , kame nii pujumia Nú peprunam Nasarétnum Jusesha Marisha Uchisha waketkiarmiayi .

text: And the child grew , and waxed strong in spirit , filled with wisdom : and the grace of God was upon him .
text2: Uchi Jesus tsakaki , kakaram ajaki tura Nú nankaamas nekaki wémiayi . Tura Yus Niin ti shiir awajsamiayi .

text: Now his parents went to Jerusalem every year at the feast of the passover .
text2: Jusesha , Jesusa Nukurísha tuke uwitin paskua Námper jeakui Jerusarénnum weu ármiayi .

text: And when he was twelve years old , they went up to Jerusalem after the custom of the feast .
text2: Ni Túrutairi Túruiniak , Jerusarénnum weak Jesusan tuse Uwí jeamtai Júkiarmiayi .

text: And when they had fulfilled the days , as they returned , the child Jesus tarried behind in Jerusalem ; and Joseph and his mother knew not of it .
text2: Námper amuukamtai ni Nukurísha Jusesha nékachmanum Jesuska Jerusarénnum Juákmiayi .

text: But they , supposing him to have been in the company , went a day ' s journey ; and they sought him among their kinsfolk and acquaintance .
text2: Marisha Jusesha " Wíi shuarjai winiawai " tusa , Núnaka eatsuk Chikichík tsawant wekasarmiayi . Nuyá Wáinkiataj Tukamá , ni shuariin tura ni nékamunam eakarsha ,

text: And when they found him not , they turned back again to Jerusalem , seeking him .
text2: Wáinkiacharmiayi . Nuinkia Jerusarénnum ataksha waketrukiarmiayi , eaktai tusar .

text: And it came to pass , that after three days they found him in the temple , sitting in the midst of the doctors , both hearing them , and asking them questions .
text2: Tura Menaintiú tsawant eakar Yusa Uunt Jeen Yus akupkamun jintinnian anturak Anintrú pujan Wáinkiarmiayi .

text: And all that heard him were astonished at his understanding and answers .
text2: Tura nui Ashí Jesusan anturkarmiania nu , niisha ti nékakui tura aimtanash ti pénker aimkiui , ti Enentáimturarmiayi .

text: And when they saw him , they were amazed : and his mother said unto him , Son , why hast thou thus dealt with us ? behold , thy father and I have sought thee sorrowing .
text2: Ni Aparísha Nukurísha Tumáa pujan Wáinkiar , ti Enentáimprarmiayi . Tura ni nukuri chichaak Tímiayi " Uchiru , ṡausha urukamtai itiurchat Enentáimtikrurmam ? Ame apasha wisha urukayik tusar ti eakjame " Tímiayi .

text: And he said unto them , How is it that ye sought me ? wist ye not that I must be about my Father ' s business ?
text2: Tutai Jesus Tímiayi " ṡUrukamtai eatrum ? Winia Aparnan Túratniuitjiana nuka nékatsrumek " Tímiayi .

text: And they understood not the saying which he spake unto them .
text2: Tura timia Núnaka penké nekaacharmiayi .

text: And he went down with them , and came to Nazareth , and was subject unto them : but his mother kept all these sayings in her heart .
text2: Nuyá Jesus niijiai Nasarétnum waketkimiayi . Ninkia tuke umiriarmiayi . Ashí nu Túrunamun Marikia tuke Enentáimtu pujumiayi .

text: And Jesus increased in wisdom and stature , and in favour with God and man .
text2: Jesuska tsakaki , tura nekaki wémiayi . Yussha tura aencha Niin shiir Enentáimtiarmiayi .

text: Now in the fifteenth year of the reign of Tiberius Caesar , Pontius Pilate being governor of Judaea , and Herod being tetrarch of Galilee , and his brother Philip tetrarch of Ituraea and of the region of Trachonitis , and Lysanias the tetrarch of Abilene ,
text2: Tipiriu uunt akupin pujamu kinse Uwí jeamtai , Jutía nunkanam Punseu Piratu akupin pujumiayi . Tura Kariréa nunkanam Erutis akupin pujumiayi . Itiurea nunkanmasha Trakuniti nunkanmasha ni yachi Jiripi akupin pujumiayi . Tura Apirinia nunkanam Risanias akupin pujumiayi .

text: Annas and Caiaphas being the high priests , the word of God came unto John the son of Zacharias in the wilderness .
text2: Tura nu uwitin Anassha Kaipiássha Israer - patri uuntri pujuarmiayi . Nu uwitin Sakaríasa Uchirí Juan atsamunam pujan Yúsaiya chichaman antukmiayi .

text: And he came into all the country about Jordan , preaching the baptism of repentance for the remission of sins ;
text2: Nuyá Jurtan entsanam supichik matsamarma nuna Juan wekaatusar juna Tímiayi " Winia tunaarun Yus tsankurturat tusarum , enentai Yapajiárum imiantiarum . " Tu ujakmiayi .

text: As it is written in the book of the words of Esaias the prophet , saying , The voice of one crying in the wilderness , Prepare ye the way of the Lord , make his paths straight .
text2: Nu ujakman Isayas yaunchu juna aarmiayi : Atsamunam wekaana nu untsumun ántuiniawai . Nii untsumuk juna tawai : Atumí Enentái Uunta jinti iwiarturtarum ; naka awajsatarum .

text: Every valley shall be filled , and every mountain and hill shall be brought low ; and the crooked shall be made straight , and the rough ways shall be made smooth ;
text2: Jápaaka ainia nusha aimkiamu arti . Naint ainia nusha paka awajsamu arti . Jintia apijiaru ainia nusha naka jiikmia arti . Tura pujutrin ainia nusha métekrak paka awajsamu arti .

text: And all flesh shall see the salvation of God .
text2: Túrunamtai Ashí nunkanmaya aents Yúsaiya uwempratin aan nekaawartatui .

text: Then said he to the multitude that came forth to be baptized of him , O generation of vipers , who hath warned you to flee from the wrath to come ?
text2: Untsurí aents imiatit tusar tariarmia nuna Juan chicharainiak Tímiayi " Napia aaniutirmincha , ti Asutniátin Jeatemáttana Nuyá uwempratarum tusa ṡya ujatmakuram ? Tímiayi .

text: Bring forth therefore fruits worthy of repentance , and begin not to say within yourselves , We have Abraham to our father : for I say unto you , That God is able of these stones to raise up children unto Abraham .
text2: " Iikia Apraám weeaitji , tuma asakrin Yus shiir Enentáimturmaji " tu Enentáimtumasairap . Antsu Enentáim Yapajiámuitkiuinkia pénker wekaamurmijiai paant iniakmastarum . Warí , Yus wakerakka , ju kayan Apraáma shuarin Páchitsuk najankainti , Tímiayi .

text: And now also the axe is laid unto the root of the trees : every tree therefore which bringeth not forth good fruit is hewn down , and cast into the fire .
text2: Aneartarum . Numi ajaktinian Kampuwárin jacha atuttsamuiti . Numi pénker nereatsna nuka ajakar jinium apeamu ártatui " Tímiayi .

text: And the people asked him , saying , What shall we do then ?
text2: Tutai aentska Enentáimprar " ṡNuinkia itiurkatjik ? " tiarmiayi .

text: He answereth and saith unto them , He that hath two coats , let him impart to him that hath none ; and he that hath meat , let him do likewise .
text2: Tutai Juan Tímiayi " Jimiará pushin takakna nu , takaktsuna nuna chikichan Súsatniuiti . Yurumkan takakna nusha takaktsuna nuna ajamsatniuiti " Tímiayi .

text: Then came also publicans to be baptized , and said unto him , Master , what shall we do ?
text2: Uunt akupniu Kuítrin juu armia Nú shuar imiantiaj tusar Juánkan weriar aniasarmiayi . " Uunta , ṡiisha Warí itiurkatjik ? " tiarmiayi .

text: And he said unto them , Exact no more than that which is appointed you .
text2: Tutai Juan Tímiayi " Kuit uunt akupin tana nu iniankasrum achikiairap . "

text: And the soldiers likewise demanded of him , saying , And what shall we do ? And he said unto them , Do violence to no man , neither accuse any falsely ; and be content with your wages .
text2: Suntarsha aniasarmiayi " Uunta , ṡiisha Warí itiurkatjik ? " Juansha Tímiayi " Ame kakarmarmijiai chikichna jurukip . Tura niin tsanumpruraip . Tura uunt akupin akirmana Nújain warasta " Tímiayi .

text: And as the people were in expectation , and all men mused in their hearts of John , whether he were the Christ , or not ;
text2: " Ju Juan Yusa anaikiamurinchuashit " tu Enentáimsar paant nekaataitsar Nákarmiayi .

text: John answered , saying unto them all , I indeed baptize you with water ; but one mightier than I cometh , the latchet of whose shoes I am not worthy to unloose : he shall baptize you with the Holy Ghost and with fire :
text2: Tumai Juan Tímiayi " Wikia aya ayashmin entsanam imiajrume . Tura wijiai nankaamas ana nu Tátatui . Ni sapatri jinkiamurinkisha atitrachminiaitjai . Niisha taa , imiantinia aanis tura Jíiya aanis Yusa Wakanin enketramprattarme .

text: Whose fan is in his hand , and he will throughly purge his floor , and will gather the wheat into his garner ; but the chaff he will burn with fire unquenchable .
text2: Shuar aruusan awajtia Núnisan , nusha yajauch ana nuna ajapa aya pénkernak Júuktatui . Neren ikiustatui tura yajauchinkia ji tuke kajinchatainiam apeattawai " Tímiayi .

text: And many other things in his exhortation preached he unto the people .
text2: Juan nu arant shiir chichaman aentsun ti Núkap ujakarmiayi .

text: But Herod the tetrarch , being reproved by him for Herodias his brother Philip ' s wife , and for all the evils which Herod had done ,
text2: Tura nuyasha akupin Erutisan chicharkamiayi . Ni yachi Jiripi nuarin Jirutíasan kasarak nuatkui tura Chíkich yajauchincha Túrakui chicharkamiayi .

text: Added yet this above all , that he shut up John in prison .
text2: Tura Erutis Núnaka ántutsuk Chíkich yajauchin Túramiayi . Juánkan achik sepunam enkeamiayi .

text: Now when all the people were baptized , it came to pass , that Jesus also being baptized , and praying , the heaven was opened ,
text2: Nu Túruntsain , Juansha Ashí Nú nunkanmaya aentsun imiak pujurainai Jesussha imianmiayi . Niisha Yúsan áujuk pujai nayaimpisha uranmiayi .

text: And the Holy Ghost descended in a bodily shape like a dove upon him , and a voice came from heaven , which said , Thou art my beloved Son ; in thee I am well pleased .
text2: Tura Yusa Wakaní Yámpits najanar paant tarurmiayi . Tura Yus nayaimpinmaya chicharuk " Amek winia aneamur Uchiruitme ; Amin ti wararjame " Tímiayi .

text: And Jesus himself began to be about thirty years of age , being ( as was supposed ) the son of Joseph , which was the son of Heli ,
text2: Jesus trainta ( 30 ) Uwí takaku asa ni takatrin nankamamiayi . " Jusé Uchirínti " tiniu armiayi . Jusésha Iría Uchiríyayi .

text: Which was the son of Matthat , which was the son of Levi , which was the son of Melchi , which was the son of Janna , which was the son of Joseph ,
text2: Irísha Matata Uchiríyayi ; Matat Riwí Uchiríyayi ; Riwí Mirkía Uchiríyayi ; Mirki Jana Uchiríyayi . Jana Jusé Uchiríyayi ;

text: Which was the son of Mattathias , which was the son of Amos , which was the son of Naum , which was the son of Esli , which was the son of Nagge ,
text2: Jusé Matatíasa Uchiríyayi ; Matatías Amusa Uchiríyayi ; Amus Najuma Uchiríyayi ; Najum Esrí Uchiríyayi ; Esri Nakaia Uchiríyayi ;

text: Which was the son of Maath , which was the son of Mattathias , which was the son of Semei , which was the son of Joseph , which was the son of Juda ,
text2: Nakai Maata Uchiríyayi ; Maat Matatíasa Uchiríyayi ; Matatías Semái Uchiríyayi ; Semái Jusé Uchiríyayi ; Jusé Jutáa Uchiríyayi ;

text: Which was the son of Joanna , which was the son of Rhesa , which was the son of Zorobabel , which was the son of Salathiel , which was the son of Neri ,
text2: Jutá Juana Uchiríyayi ; Juana Resa Uchiríyayi ; Resa Surupapira Uchiríyayi ; Surupapir Saratiira Uchiríyayi ; Saratiir Nerí Uchiríyayi ;

text: Which was the son of Melchi , which was the son of Addi , which was the son of Cosam , which was the son of Elmodam , which was the son of Er ,
text2: Neri Mirkí Uchiríyayi ; Mirki Atí Uchiríyayi ; Atí Kusama Uchiríyayi ; Kusam Irmutama Uchiríyayi ; Irmutam Ira Uchiríyayi ;

text: Which was the son of Jose , which was the son of Eliezer , which was the son of Jorim , which was the son of Matthat , which was the son of Levi ,
text2: Ir Jusué Uchiríyayi ; Jusué Irieséra Uchiríyayi ; Iriesér Jurema Uchiríyayi ; Jurem Matata Uchiríyayi ;

text: Which was the son of Simeon , which was the son of Juda , which was the son of Joseph , which was the son of Jonan , which was the son of Eliakim ,
text2: Matat Riwi uchiriyayi ; Riwí Semeúnka Uchiríyayi ; Semeún Jutáa Uchiríyayi ; Jutá Jusé Uchiríyayi ; Jusé Junanka Uchiríyayi ; Junan Iriakímia Uchiríyayi ;

text: Which was the son of Melea , which was the son of Menan , which was the son of Mattatha , which was the son of Nathan , which was the son of David ,
text2: Iriakím Mirea Uchiríyayi ; Mirea Mainiánka Uchiríyayi ; Mainián Matata Uchiríyayi ; Matata Natanka Uchiríyayi ;

text: Which was the son of Jesse , which was the son of Obed , which was the son of Booz , which was the son of Salmon , which was the son of Naasson ,
text2: Natan Tawitia Uchiríyayi ; Tawit Isaí Uchiríyayi ; Isaí Upitia Uchiríyayi ; Upit Puusa Uchiríyayi ; Puus Saramúnka Uchiríyayi ; Saramún Naasunka Uchiríyayi ;

text: Which was the son of Aminadab , which was the son of Aram , which was the son of Esrom , which was the son of Phares , which was the son of Juda ,
text2: Naasun Aminiatapa Uchiríyayi ; Aminiatap Arama Uchiríyayi ; Aram Esruma Uchiríyayi ; Esrum Paresa Uchiríyayi ; Páres Jutáa Uchiríyayi ;

text: Which was the son of Jacob , which was the son of Isaac , which was the son of Abraham , which was the son of Thara , which was the son of Nachor ,
text2: Jutá Jakupa Uchiríyayi ; Jakup Isaka Uchiríyayi ; Isak Apraáma Uchiríyayi ; Apraám Tarea Uchiríyayi ; Taré Nakura Uchiríyayi ;

text: Which was the son of Saruch , which was the son of Ragau , which was the son of Phalec , which was the son of Heber , which was the son of Sala ,
text2: Nakur Seruka Uchiríyayi ; Seruk Rakaua Uchiríyayi ; Rakau Pirikia Uchiríyayi ; Pirik Epera Uchiríyayi ; Eper Sará Uchiríyayi ;

text: Which was the son of Cainan , which was the son of Arphaxad , which was the son of Sem , which was the son of Noe , which was the son of Lamech ,
text2: Sara Kainiánka Uchiríyayi ; Kainián Arpaksata Uchiríyayi ; Arpaksat Sema Uchiríyayi ; Sem Nuaia Uchiríyayi ; Nuai Ramikia Uchiríyayi ;

text: Which was the son of Mathusala , which was the son of Enoch , which was the son of Jared , which was the son of Maleleel , which was the son of Cainan ,
text2: Ramik Matusarínkia Uchiríyayi ; Matusarín Enuka Uchiríyayi ; Enuk Jaritia Uchiríyayi ; Jarit Maararíira Uchiríyayi ; Maararíir Kainianka Uchiríyayi ;

text: Which was the son of Enos , which was the son of Seth , which was the son of Adam , which was the son of God .
text2: Kainian Enusa Uchiríyayi ; Enus Seta Uchiríyayi ; Set Atanka Uchiríyayi ; tura Atan Yus najanamuyayi .

text: And Jesus being full of the Holy Ghost returned from Jordan , and was led by the Spirit into the wilderness ,
text2: Jesusa Enentáin Yusa Wakaní pimiutkamiayi . Jesussha Jurtan entsanmaya waketkimtai Yusa Wakaní aents atsamunam jukimiayi .

text: Being forty days tempted of the devil . And in those days he did eat nothing : and when they were ended , he afterward hungered .
text2: Tura nuisha kuarenta tsawant pujusmiayi . Tura íwianch Niin tunaanum ajuaraintiajtai tusa pujurmiayi . Nu kuarenta tsawantin Jesus yurumtsuk Pujá asa ti tsukammiayi .

text: And the devil said unto him , If thou be the Son of God , command this stone that it be made bread .
text2: Nuinkia íwianch chicharuk " Amesha nekas Yusa Uchiríntkiumka ju kaya apatuk najanata " Tímiayi .

text: And Jesus answered him , saying , It is written , That man shall not live by bread alone , but by every word of God .
text2: Tutai Jesus Tímiayi " Yus - Papí tawai : " Aya apatkujain shuar iwiaaku pujuschamniaiti . Antsu Ashí Yus - Chicham tana nujai nekas iwiaaku pujusminiaiti , " tawai " Tímiayi .

text: And the devil , taking him up into an high mountain , shewed unto him all the kingdoms of the world in a moment of time .
text2: Tura Nuyá íwianch naint Yakí Wájakmanum Jukí , Ashí nunka ainia nuna ju chichamaik iniaktusmiayi .

text: If thou therefore wilt worship me , all shall be thine .
text2: Tura chicharuk Tímiayi " Ashí ju nunka Wáinmena nu Wíniaiti . Tura wi wakerajna Nú shuaran Súsatniuitjai . Tuma asamtai tikishmatrurakminkia ju nunkanam Ashí akupkatniun susattajme . Tura nui ni wariri ainia nusha áminiu átatui " Tímiayi .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto him , Get thee behind me , Satan : for it is written , Thou shalt worship the Lord thy God , and him only shalt thou serve .
text2: Tutai Jesus Tímiayi " Yus - Papí tawai : " Aya Ninki Yus ame Uuntrum tikishmatram Enentáimtustiniaitme . " Tau asamtai , werumta , iwianchi " Tímiayi .

text: And he brought him to Jerusalem , and set him on a pinnacle of the temple , and said unto him , If thou be the Son of God , cast thyself down from hence :
text2: Ataksha íwianch Jesusan Jerusarén péprunam jukimiayi . Tura Yusa Uunt Jee yakiini iwiak Tímiayi :

text: For it is written , He shall give his angels charge over thee , to keep thee :
text2: " Yus - Papí tatsuk : " Yuska ni suntarin Wáinkiatá tusa akupturmaktatui .

text: And in their hands they shall bear thee up , lest at any time thou dash thy foot against a stone .
text2: Kayanam ajintrain tusa wenkurmaktatui . " Tuma asamtai nekas Yusa Uchirinkiumka Juyá akaikim iniaata " Tímiayi .

text: And Jesus answering said unto him , It is said , Thou shalt not tempt the Lord thy God .
text2: Tutai Jesus aimiuk Tímiayi " Yus - Papí junasha tawai : Yus ame Uuntrum nekapsataj tiip . "

text: And when the devil had ended all the temptation , he departed from him for a season .
text2: Tuma asamtai íwianch penké tujintiak ishichik tsawant Jesusan iniaisamiayi .

text: And Jesus returned in the power of the Spirit into Galilee : and there went out a fame of him through all the region round about .
text2: Jesus ni Enentáin Yusa Wakaní kakarmari pimiutkamu ajas Kariréa nunkanam waketkimiayi . Nu nunkanam nankaamantu Túramurin áujmatiarmiayi .

text: And he taught in their synagogues , being glorified of all .
text2: Nu nunkanam Ashí péprunam Israer - shuar iruntai jea armia nui unuiniarmiayi . Tura anturkarmia nuka ni Náarin shiir awajsarmiayi .

text: And he came to Nazareth , where he had been brought up : and , as his custom was , he went into the synagogue on the sabbath day , and stood up for to read .
text2: Ni tsakarmariin Nasarétnum Jesus wémiayi . Tura Israer - shuar ayampratin tsawantin iruntai jeanam wayamiayi , tuke turin asa . Tura Wayá Yus - Papin áujsataj tusa wajakmiayi .

text: And there was delivered unto him the book of the prophet Esaias . And when he had opened the book , he found the place where it was written ,
text2: Nuinkia Yúsnan etserin Isayasa aarmarin Súsarmiayi . Nuna urak , nui juna aarman Wáinkiamiayi :

text: The Spirit of the Lord is upon me , because he hath anointed me to preach the gospel to the poor ; he hath sent me to heal the brokenhearted , to preach deliverance to the captives , and recovering of sight to the blind , to set at liberty them that are bruised ,
text2: Yusa Wakaní Winí pujurtawai . Shuar warainiachun shiir chichaman ujaktinian anaitiukuiti . Kúntuts Enentáimiar wake mesek pujuinian Tsuártinian akuptukuiti . Tura jii kusuruncha iimtiktinian , tura yajauch awajsamu ainia nuna pénker awajsatniuncha ,

text: To preach the acceptable year of the Lord .
text2: tura Uunt Yus , Shuáran yaintin tsawantri Jeán etserkatniuncha akuptukuiti .

text: And he closed the book , and he gave it again to the minister , and sat down . And the eyes of all them that were in the synagogue were fastened on him .
text2: Nu aarman aujsua amik papin nukukmiayi . Tura iruntai jeanam Yáimin pujan susa iniais Ninkia etserkataj tusa pujusmiayi . Tura Ashí shuar pujuarmia nu émamkes ii pujuarmiayi .

text: And he began to say unto them , This day is this scripture fulfilled in your ears .
text2: Jesussha chicharuk Tímiayi " Yus - Chicham Yamái antukurmena nu Yamái tsawantin Túrunayi . "

text: And all bare him witness , and wondered at the gracious words which proceeded out of his mouth . And they said , Is not this Joseph ' s son ?
text2: Jesusan Ashí pénker áujmatiarmiayi . Tura Jesus ti shiir chichaakui ti Enentáimprar " Juka Jusé Uchirínchukait " tiarmiayi .

text: And he said unto them , Ye will surely say unto me this proverb , Physician , heal thyself : whatsoever we have heard done in Capernaum , do also here in thy country .
text2: Tu Enentáimiainiakui , Jesus chicharuk " Atumsha shuar tuke tuinia Núnisrumek , " Tsuákratniuitkiumka amek Tsuámarta , " turuttiatrume . Kapernáum péprunam aentsti Túrachmin Túramamna Núnismek juisha Túrata tusarum nu turuttiatrume .

text: And he said , Verily I say unto you , No prophet is accepted in his own country .
text2: Túrasha nekas Tájarme , Yúsnan etserniun ni nunkenkikia nii tana nuna anturainiatsui .

text: But I tell you of a truth , many widows were in Israel in the days of Elias , when the heaven was shut up three years and six months , when great famine was throughout all the land ;
text2: Nuyasha Tájarme , Irías pujumia Nú tsawantin , Menaintiú Uwí nankaamas yumi yutukcha asamtai Ashí Israer Núnkanam ti tsuka amia nui ti Untsurí waje irunmiayi .

text: But unto none of them was Elias sent , save unto Sarepta , a city of Sidon , unto a woman that was a widow .
text2: Tuma ain nu wajen yainti tusa Yus Iríasan akuptukchamiayi . Antsu Chíkich nunkanmaya wajen Sarepta péprunam pujumia nuna yainti tusa akuptukmiayi . Sarepta pepru Sitiún péprunam Tíjiuch pujawai .

text: And many lepers were in Israel in the time of Eliseus the prophet ; and none of them was cleansed , saving Naaman the Syrian .
text2: Núnisan ii nunkesha Iriséu pujumia nu tsawantin ti Untsurí tunamaru iruniarmiayi . Tura Núnaka Tsuárcharmiayi . Antsu Chíkich nunka , Sírianmaya Naamankan Tsuármiayi " Tímiayi Jesus .

text: And all they in the synagogue , when they heard these things , were filled with wrath ,
text2: Israer - shuarsha iruntai jeen pujuarmia nu , nuna antukar ti kajerkarmiayi .

text: And rose up , and thrust him out of the city , and led him unto the brow of the hill whereon their city was built , that they might cast him down headlong .
text2: Tura wajatkiar Jesusan jiiki péprunmaya akupkarmiayi . Tura pepru amia nui naint Yakí Nánkatkamunam , Nuyá akaki ajuatai tusar Júkiarmiayi .

text: But he passing through the midst of them went his way ,
text2: Túrasha Jesuska irunar matsatainiamunman etempraktak jiinki wémiayi .

text: And came down to Capernaum , a city of Galilee , and taught them on the sabbath days .
text2: Nuyá Jesus Kariréa nunkanam Kapernáum pepru amia nui wémiayi . Tura Israer - shuara ayampratin tsawantriin tuke etserki wémiayi .

text: And they were astonished at his doctrine : for his word was with power .
text2: Yusa kakarmarin takaku asa nujai etserkamiayi . Tuma asamtai " Yusa kakarmarijiai unuitiamtsujik " tiar ti Enentáimprarmiayi .

text: And in the synagogue there was a man , which had a spirit of an unclean devil , and cried out with a loud voice ,
text2: Chíkich tsawantai aishman iwianchruku Israer - shuar iruntai jeanam pujumia nu untsumuk Tímiayi ,

text: Saying , Let us alone ; what have we to do with thee , thou Jesus of Nazareth ? art thou come to destroy us ? I know thee who thou art ; the Holy One of God .
text2: " Inikiartusta . Iikia Aminkia pachistin nakitiaji . ṡWarí , incha amukratkataj tusam Táchamek ? Wikia nékajme . Ameka ti penker Tunaarincha Núitme " Tímiayi .

text: And Jesus rebuked him , saying , Hold thy peace , and come out of him . And when the devil had thrown him in the midst , he came out of him , and hurt him not .
text2: Tutai Jesus iwianchin kakantar chicharuk " Takamatsata . Ju aishman ikiuktia " Tímiayi . Tutai nu chichamaik íwianch aishmannumia jiinki weak Nunká ajuant ikiukmiayi . Túrasha nekas yajauch awajtsuk ikiukmiayi .

text: And they were all amazed , and spake among themselves , saying , What a word is this ! for with authority and power he commandeth the unclean spirits , and they come out .
text2: Ashí pujuarmiania nu ti Enentáimiar mai tunai ajarmiayi . " ṡJusha Warí chichamait ? Ju aishman Yusa kakarmarijiai iwianchin jiiki awematsuk " tiarmiayi .

text: And the fame of him went out into every place of the country round about .
text2: Tura Ashí Nú nunkanam Jesusa Túramurin áujmatiarmiayi .

text: And he arose out of the synagogue , and entered into Simon ' s house . And Simon ' s wife ' s mother was taken with a great fever ; and they besought him for her .
text2: Jesussha Israer - shuara iruntai jeenia jiinki Semunka jeen wémiayi . Semunka tsatsari tsuer ti Jáamiayi . Ti jaakui Jesusan " Tsuárturtá " tiarmiayi .

text: And he stood over her , and rebuked the fever ; and it left her : and immediately she arose and ministered unto them .
text2: Jesussha jaa tepan tsuntsumprua tsuemun " michatrata " Tímiayi . Tutai Nú chichamaik nuwasha michatramiayi . Nú chichamaik nantaki nincha ayurawarmiayi .

text: Now when the sun was setting , all they that had any sick with divers diseases brought them unto him ; and he laid his hands on every one of them , and healed them .
text2: Etsa akaikin ai ni shuari Nánkamas sunkurjai jaarmia nuna Jesusan ikiaatkarmiayi . Jesussha Jáinian chikichkiniak chikichkiniak uwejéjai antinkiar Tsuárarmiayi .

text: And devils also came out of many , crying out , and saying , Thou art Christ the Son of God . And he rebuking them suffered them not to speak : for they knew that he was Christ .
text2: Ti Untsurí iwianchruku armia nunasha iwianchrin Jíirkiarmiayi . Jíinkiar íwianchkia untsumainiak " Ameka Yusa Uchirínme " Jesusan tiarmiayi . Tura niisha " Jesuska Yusa anaikiamurinti " tu nékainiakui Jesus kakantar chicharak itiatmamtikiarmiayi .

text: And when it was day , he departed and went into a desert place : and the people sought him , and came unto him , and stayed him , that he should not depart from them .
text2: Kashin Káshik tsawaak Jesus péprunmaya jiinki atsamunam Ninki wémiayi . Tura shuarsha eakiar ni pujamunam jeariarmiayi . Tura iijiai tuke pujusat tusar emetataitsar wakeriarmiayi .

text: And he said unto them , I must preach the kingdom of God to other cities also : for therefore am I sent .
text2: Túmain Jesus Tímiayi " Yus ii Enentáin akupkatajtsa wakera Nú shiir chichaman Chíkich péprunam matsatainia nunasha ujaktiniaitjai . Nu Túrata tusa akupkamuitjai " Tímiayi .

text: And he preached in the synagogues of Galilee .
text2: Tuma asamtai Kariréa nunkanam Israer - shuar iruntai jeanam Jesus tuke etserki wémiayi .

text: And it came to pass , that , as the people pressed upon him to hear the word of God , he stood by the lake of Gennesaret ,
text2: Chíkich tsawantai Jesus Jinisarít antumianka tutainium Káanmatkari pujai ti Untsurí shuar , Yusa chichamen antuktai tusar wakeruiniak Jesusai Káunkarmiayi . Antuktai tusar wakeruiniak kae ajattsarmiayi .

text: And saw two ships standing by the lake : but the fishermen were gone out of them , and were washing their nets .
text2: Tura Jimiará kanun antumiankan Káanmatkariin tepan Wáinkiarmiayi . Ni nérenniurinkia Jíinkiar ni nekarin Nijiá pujuinia asamtai Kánuka ankant ármiayi .

text: And he entered into one of the ships , which was Simon ' s , and prayed him that he would thrust out a little from the land . And he sat down , and taught the people out of the ship .
text2: Tuma asamtai Jesus Semunka Kanuríin enkempramiayi . Tura Semunkan chicharuk " Ishichik ajapén Juruktía " Tímiayi . Nuinkia kanunam enkemas aentsun Káanmatkanam pujuinian unuiniamiayi .

text: Now when he had left speaking , he said unto Simon , Launch out into the deep , and let down your nets for a draught .
text2: Unuiniasua amik Semunkan chicharuk " Kanu kunanam jukim neka ai ajunkatarum " Tímiayi .

text: And Simon answering said unto him , Master , we have toiled all the night , and have taken nothing : nevertheless at thy word I will let down the net .
text2: Tutai Semun Tímiayi " Túrasha , Uuntá , Káshisha tuke aju - junkuar tsawarji . Túrasha penké achikchaji . Kame aankisha Ame Támajai ajunkatjai " Tímiayi .

text: And when they had this done , they inclosed a great multitude of fishes : and their net brake .
text2: Tura ajunkar namakan ti Untsurín achikiarmiayi . Túram nekasha jaanaki wémiayi .

text: And they beckoned unto their partners , which were in the other ship , that they should come and help them . And they came , and filled both the ships , so that they began to sink .
text2: Tuma asamtai ni írutkamurin Chíkich kanunam pujuinian uwejéjai " winitia , Yáintkiamniuram " tusar untsukarmiayi . Niisha Táarmiayi . Túrawar Jimiará kanunam métej awajsarmiayi . Tura kanusha init wayastatuk ajamiayi .

text: When Simon Peter saw it , he fell down at Jesus ' knees , saying , Depart from me ; for I am a sinful man , O Lord .
text2: Nuna Túramtai Semun Pítiur Jesusan tikishmatar Tímiayi " Uuntá , wikia ti tunaitjai . ṡWíjiaisha itiurak pujustam ? "

text: For he was astonished , and all that were with him , at the draught of the fishes which they had taken :
text2: Semunsha ni írutkamurijiai namakan Timiá Untsurín Wáinkiar ashamkarmiayi . Tuma asa Semunsha Nuní Tímiayi .

text: And so was also James , and John , the sons of Zebedee , which were partners with Simon . And Jesus said unto Simon , Fear not ; from henceforth thou shalt catch men .
text2: Tura Sepetéu uchiri Jakupusha Juansha Semunjai pujuarmia nusha ashamkarmiayi . Tura Jesus Semunkan Tímiayi " Ashamkaip . Yamaikia namaka - achinia aintsamek aents - eau ajastatme . "

text: And when they had brought their ships to land , they forsook all , and followed him .
text2: Nuyasha kanurin kukar Júkiar , Ashí takakmarincha ikiukiar Jesusan nemarki wearmiayi .

text: And it came to pass , when he was in a certain city , behold a man full of leprosy : who seeing Jesus fell on his face , and besought him , saying , Lord , if thou wilt , thou canst make me clean .
text2: Ukunam Jesus Chíkich péprunam pujai tunamaru aishman taa Jesusan Wáiniak tikishmatar Nunká shushuma Pankái Jesusan Tímiayi " Uuntá , wakerutakmeka Páchitsuk Tsuáramniaitme . "

text: And he put forth his hand , and touched him , saying , I will : be thou clean . And immediately the leprosy departed from him .
text2: Nuna tutai Jesus antin Tímiayi " Wakerajai . Tsuaajme . " Tura Nú chichamaik tunamarusha pénker ajasmiayi .

text: And he charged him to tell no man : but go , and shew thyself to the priest , and offer for thy cleansing , according as Moses commanded , for a testimony unto them .
text2: Túrasha Jesus chicharuk " Ameka nu etserkaip , Tímiayi . Antsu Israer - shuar Patrii werim ame pénker ajasmanum Muisáis akupkamia Núnismek susata . Nujai Ashí shuar ame pénker ajasmarmin nekaawartatui " Tímiayi .

text: But so much the more went there a fame abroad of him : and great multitudes came together to hear , and to be healed by him of their infirmities .
text2: Tura Jesusa Túramuri ti etsernamiayi . Túmakui Untsurí aents anturkataj tusar Káutkarmiayi . Tura ni sunkurincha Tsuámartaj tusar Káutiarmiayi .

text: And he withdrew himself into the wilderness , and prayed .
text2: Núnisan Jesuska aents atsuiniamunam we ni Aparin áujmiayi .

text: And it came to pass on a certain day , as he was teaching , that there were Pharisees and doctors of the law sitting by , which were come out of every town of Galilee , and Judaea , and Jerusalem : and the power of the Lord was present to heal them .
text2: Chíkich tsawantai Jesus unuiniak pujai Pariséu aents tura Israer - shuara jintinniurisha Kariréa péprunmayasha , Jutía péprunmayasha tura Jerusarénnumiasha Káunkarmia nu Antúu pujuarmiayi . Jaa Tsuártinian Yusa kakarmarin takakuyayi Jesus .

text: And , behold , men brought in a bed a man which was taken with a palsy : and they sought means to bring him in , and to lay him before him .
text2: Nuinkia emearun tampumprua kuatru shuar itiariarmiayi . Jesus pujamunam init awayattsar wakeriarmiayi .

text: And when they could not find by what way they might bring him in because of the multitude , they went upon the housetop , and let him down through the tiling with his couch into the midst before Jesus .
text2: Tura shuar ti Untsurí piaku asamtai wayamnia atsumiayi . Túmaitkui yakiini wear jean urakar , aents kae ajas matsatmanum Jesus pujamunam emearun tampunam Nená itiararmiayi .

text: And when he saw their faith , he said unto him , Man , thy sins are forgiven thee .
text2: Niin itiarmiania nu , Jesus Yusa kakarmarin takakui , Tú Enentáimtamun Jesus Nekáa emearun Tímiayi " Ame tunaarum tsankuramuitme . "

text: And the scribes and the Pharisees began to reason , saying , Who is this which speaketh blasphemies ? Who can forgive sins , but God alone ?
text2: Nuinkia Israer - shuara jintinniurisha , Pariséusha ni Enentáin Enentáimsar " ṡJusha yait Yúsa Náarin yajauch awajtin ? Warí , aya Yúsak tunaan tsankurachminkiait " tu Enentáimsarmiayi .

text: But when Jesus perceived their thoughts , he answering said unto them , What reason ye in your hearts ?
text2: Tura Jesus ni Enentáimsamurin Nekáa Tímiayi " ṡUrukamtai Tú Enentáimprarum átum ?

text: Whether is easier , to say , Thy sins be forgiven thee ; or to say , Rise up and walk ?
text2: Nuinkia ṡWarí Imiá Yúpichuchit , Tsuártiniak , ni tunaari tsankuratniuk ?

text: But that ye may know that the Son of man hath power upon earth to forgive sins , ( he said unto the sick of the palsy , ) I say unto thee , Arise , and take up thy couch , and go into thine house .
text2: Wats , Aents Ajasu tutai Wisha tunaan tsankuratniun Yusa kakarmarin takakjai . Jujai nekaatarum tusan wats itiurchat Tárumna nuna Túrattajai . " Nuyá emearun chicharuk Tímiayi " Amesha wajakim , tampuram achikiam ame jeemiin Wetá . "

text: And immediately he rose up before them , and took up that whereon he lay , and departed to his own house , glorifying God .
text2: Nú chichamaik emearu niisha iimiainiamunman tampurin achik wajaki ni jeen Yúsan wararki wémiayi .

text: And they were all amazed , and they glorified God , and were filled with fear , saying , We have seen strange things to day .
text2: Túmakui Ashí shuar ti Enentáimprar Yusa Náarin shiir awajsarmiayi . Tura ashamainiak " aentsti tujinkiamu Yamái Wáinkiaji " tiarmiayi .

text: And after these things he went forth , and saw a publican , named Levi , sitting at the receipt of custom : and he said unto him , Follow me .
text2: Ukunam Jesus wekas akupniu Kuítrin - juu , naari Riwí , ni Chíkich naari Mateu , akupin akitiai jeanam pujan Wáinkiamiayi . Wáiniak " nemartusta " Tímiayi .

text: And he left all , rose up , and followed him .
text2: Tutai Riwí wajaki takakmarinkia ikiuak Jesusan nemarsamiayi .

text: And Levi made him a great feast in his own house : and there was a great company of publicans and of others that sat down with them .
text2: Nuyá ukunam Riwí namperan Jesusan najatamiayi . Tura Untsurí akupniu Kuítrin - juu tura Chíkich shuarsha Káunkar misanam pujuarmiayi .

text: But their scribes and Pharisees murmured against his disciples , saying , Why do ye eat and drink with publicans and sinners ?
text2: Tura Pariséusha Israer - shuara jintinniurisha Jesusan tsanumpruiniak Jesusa unuiniamurin tiarmiayi " ṡMaaj , urukamtai atumsha akupniu Kuítrin - juu ainia Nújaisha tura Chíkich yajauch shuarjaisha iruntrarum yurumprum ? "

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , They that are whole need not a physician ; but they that are sick .
text2: Tutai Jesus aimkiamiayi " Shuar jaachu pénker ainiana nu ṡTsuákratniun atsumainiawak ? Antsu jaa ainia nu Tsuákratniun atsumainiawai .

text: I came not to call the righteous , but sinners to repentance .
text2: " Wikia pénkeraitjai " tuinia nuna untsuktajtsan Táchaitjai . Antsu yajauch shuar ni Enentáin Yapajiá Winia ajasat tusan untsuajai " Tímiayi .

text: And they said unto him , Why do the disciples of John fast often , and make prayers , and likewise the disciples of the Pharisees ; but thine eat and drink ?
text2: Nuyá Jesusan Aníak tiarmiayi " Juanka unuiniamurisha , Pariséu unuiniamurisha yurumtsuk Yúsan áujainiatsuk . Tura ame unuiniamurmeka ṡurukamtai ijiarma Yúsan áujainiatsu ? " tiarmiayi .

text: And he said unto them , Can ye make the children of the bridechamber fast , while the bridegroom is with them ?
text2: Tutai Jesus Tímiayi " Nuatma nampernum , ṡipiaamu ainia nu ijiarmamniakait , Yamái - nuatu pujai ?

text: But the days will come , when the bridegroom shall be taken away from them , and then shall they fast in those days .
text2: Atsá . Wats Wisha ukunam junaktiatjai ; nuinkia ijiarmatin átatui " Tímiayi .

text: And he spake also a parable unto them ; No man putteth a piece of a new garment upon an old ; if otherwise , then both the new maketh a rent , and the piece that was taken out of the new agreeth not with the old .
text2: Tura junasha nujai métek - taku unuiniamiayi : " ṡYamaram Pushí tsupikiar nujai arut pushiniam anujtukminkiait ? Nu Túramka yamaram Pushí yajauch ajasaintiui ; Túrasha shiir anujkamu arut pushijiai mai metek yamaram Wáinkiachminiaiti .

text: And no man putteth new wine into old bottles ; else the new wine will burst the bottles , and be spilled , and the bottles shall perish .
text2: Núnisan nijiamanch Yamái nawamu nuap najanamu arutnum yaraachminiaiti . Túramka nijiamanch Karíak ijiakratniuiti ; Túmak nijiamchisha nuap najanamusha mai metek menkainiawai .

text: But new wine must be put into new bottles ; and both are preserved .
text2: Tuma asamtai nijiamanch Yamái nawamu yamaram nuap najanamunam yaraatniuiti . Nu Túramka mai metek pénker átiniaiti .

text: No man also having drunk old wine straightway desireth new : for he saith , The old is better .
text2: Yaunchu nawamu úmana nuka yamarman nakitrattui . " Yaunchu nawamu Imiá penkeraiti " Tiártatui " Tímiayi Jesus .

text: And it came to pass on the second sabbath after the first , that he went through the corn fields ; and his disciples plucked the ears of corn , and did eat , rubbing them in their hands .
text2: Ayampratin tsawantai Jesussha unuiniamurijiai araamunam wekasar , unuiniamurisha trikiu neren majurkutak wekainiarmiayi ; tura tishisar neren yuawarmiayi .

text: And certain of the Pharisees said unto them , Why do ye that which is not lawful to do on the sabbath days ?
text2: Nuna Túruiniakui Pariséu tiarmiayi " Maaj , atumsha ayampratin tsawantai takaschatniua nui , ṡurukamtai takaarum ? "

text: And Jesus answering them said , Have ye not read so much as this , what David did , when himself was an hungred , and they which were with him ;
text2: Takui Jesus ayak Tímiayi " Yaunchu uunt akupin Tawitcha tura nemarniusha tsukamainiak Túrawarmia nu ántichukaitrum .

text: How he went into the house of God , and did take and eat the shewbread , and gave also to them that were with him ; which it is not lawful to eat but for the priests alone ?
text2: Tawit Yusa Jeen Wayá , Yus iniaktusma tantan Yuámiayi ; tura nemarniuncha ajamsamiayi . Tura nu tantancha aya Israer - shuara Pátriri Yúatin ármiayi . Tuma ain Tawitcha yajauchin Túrutsuk achikmiayi , Tímiayi .

text: And he said unto them , That the Son of man is Lord also of the sabbath .
text2: Wisha Aents Ajasuitkiun ayampratin tsawantan Nérenniurintjai " Tímiayi Jesus .

text: And it came to pass also on another sabbath , that he entered into the synagogue and taught : and there was a man whose right hand was withered .
text2: Chíkich ayampratin tsawantai Israer - shuar iruntai jeanam Jesus Wayá unuiniartasa nankamamiayi . Nui shuar uweje untsuuria nu jakaa pujumiayi .

text: And the scribes and Pharisees watched him , whether he would heal on the sabbath day ; that they might find an accusation against him .
text2: Tura Israer - shuara jintinniurisha , Pariséusha Jesusan " yajauch Túrayi " titiai tusar wakeruiniak , " ju ayampratin tsawantai nu shuaran tsuartimpiash " tusar ii pujuarmiayi .

text: But he knew their thoughts , and said to the man which had the withered hand , Rise up , and stand forth in the midst . And he arose and stood forth .
text2: Túrasha Jesuska ni Enentáimmiarin nekariarmiayi . Túmayat uweje jakaan chicharuk " Jui ajapén wajasta " Tímiayi . Tutai aishman ajapén wajasmiayi .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , I will ask you one thing ; Is it lawful on the sabbath days to do good , or to do evil ? to save life , or to destroy it ?
text2: Nuinkia iruniarmiania nuna Jesus Tímiayi " Enentáimpratarum . Ayampratin tsawantai yajauch Túratin , pénker Túratniujai ṡTuá pénkerait ? ṡUwemtikratin , Máatniujaisha Tuá pénkerait ? " Tímiayi .

text: And looking round about upon them all , he said unto the man , Stretch forth thy hand . And he did so : and his hand was restored whole as the other .
text2: Nuyá téntakarmia nuna iis aishmankan Tímiayi " Uwejem takuitia . " Aishmansha uwején takuimtai Nú chichamaik pénker ajasmiayi .

text: And they were filled with madness ; and communed one with another what they might do to Jesus .
text2: Tura Chíkichkia ti kajerkarmiayi . Túrawar " Jesus Warí itiurkamniakit " tusar aniniaisarmiayi .

text: And it came to pass in those days , that he went out into a mountain to pray , and continued all night in prayer to God .
text2: Nuyá Jesus Yúsan áujsataj tusa Náinnium wakamiayi . Tura nu kashi Yúsan au - aujkua tsawarmiayi .

text: And when it was day , he called unto him his disciples : and of them he chose twelve , whom also he named apostles ;
text2: Tsawarmatai unuiniamurin ikiankar tuse anaikiamiayi . " Winia akatramuruitrume " Tímiayi .

text: Simon , ( whom he also named Peter , ) and Andrew his brother , James and John , Philip and Bartholomew ,
text2: Ju ármiayi : Emka , Semun Chíkich naari Pítiur apujtusmia nu ; tura Nuyá ni yachi Antres , Jakupusha , Juansha , Jiripisha , Parturumísha ,

text: Matthew and Thomas , James the son of Alphaeus , and Simon called Zelotes ,
text2: Mateusha , Tumassha , Arpeu uchiri Jakupusha , Asump Semunsha ,

text: And Judas the brother of James , and Judas Iscariot , which also was the traitor .
text2: Jakupu yachi Jútassha , tura Jútas Iskariúti Jesusan ukunam surukmia nu . Nu tuse achikma ármiayi .

text: And he came down with them , and stood in the plain , and the company of his disciples , and a great multitude of people out of all Judaea and Jerusalem , and from the sea coast of Tyre and Sidon , which came to hear him , and to be healed of their diseases ;
text2: Niijiai Jesus Náinniumia pakanam taawarmiayi . Nui pujusarmiayi . Nuisha Untsurí unuiniamurisha , tura Jutía nunkanmaya , tura Jerusarénnumia tura nayaantsanam ayamach Tiru , tura Setun péprunmaya ti Untsurí aents antuktaitsar pujuarmiayi . Jesus tsuarati tusar Káunkarmiayi .

text: And they that were vexed with unclean spirits : and they were healed .
text2: Iwianchrukusha Tsuámararmiayi .

text: And the whole multitude sought to touch him : for there went virtue out of him , and healed them all .
text2: Jesus Tsuártinian tujinkiachu asamtai ashi shuar antintaj tusar wakeriarmiayi .

text: And he lifted up his eyes on his disciples , and said , Blessed be ye poor : for yours is the kingdom of God .
text2: Ni unuiniamurin Jesus iis juna Tímiayi : " " Yusan atsumajai " Tárumna nu , Yus akupeamunam Páchitkiaitrume ; tuma asamtai warasminiaitrume . '

text: Blessed are ye that hunger now : for ye shall be filled . Blessed are ye that weep now : for ye shall laugh .
text2: ` Yamái tsukamarmena nu ukunam ejemartatrume . Tuma asamtai warasminiaitrume . Yamái uutrumna nu , ukunmanka wishirtatrume . Tuma asamtai warasminiaitrume . '

text: Blessed are ye , when men shall hate you , and when they shall separate you from their company , and shall reproach you , and cast out your name as evil , for the Son of man ' s sake .
text2: ` Atumin nakitramprarmatai , ajapramawarmataisha , tura Winia Aents Ajasu tutaiya Nú shuar ajasuiti tusar tsanumprutmak katsekkramkarmataisha warasminiaitrume . '

text: Rejoice ye in that day , and leap for joy : for , behold , your reward is great in heaven : for in the like manner did their fathers unto the prophets .
text2: ` Túramtai nayaimpiniam ti shiir ana nu Núkap sunastin átatui tu Enentáimsarum ti warastarum . Warí , ju shuara uuntri yaunchu Yúsnan etserniun Nútiksaran yajauch awajsacharmakia . '

text: But woe unto you that are rich ! for ye have received your consolation .
text2: ` Tura Kuítrinniutiram atumsha Atumí waratairi aya yamaik waintrume . Ukunmanka waraschattarme . '

text: Woe unto you that are full ! for ye shall hunger . Woe unto you that laugh now ! for ye shall mourn and weep .
text2: ` Atsumatsjai , tu Enentáimprumna nu , ukunmanka atsumattarme . Nuinkia waraschattarme . Yamái Wishíarmena nu , ukunmanka Wáitiakrum uuttiatrume . Nuinkia waraschattarme . '

text: Woe unto you , when all men shall speak well of you ! for so did their fathers to the false prophets .
text2: ` Ashí aents atumin shiir awajtamkurmin aneartarum . Nujai waraschatniuitrume . Warí nuna uuntri ántar - yusnan etserin armia nuna Nútiksaran yaunchu shiir awajsarmiayi . '

text: But I say unto you which hear , Love your enemies , do good to them which hate you ,
text2: ` Winia anturtarmena nuna juna Tájarme : Ame nemasrum aneata , nakitramainia nusha shiir awajsata ;

text: Bless them that curse you , and pray for them which despitefully use you .
text2: yajauch chichartamainia nusha shiir Enentáimtusarta ; katsekramainia nusha Yus áujtusarta .

text: And unto him that smiteth thee on the one cheek offer also the other ; and him that taketh away thy cloke forbid not to take thy coat also .
text2: Ame yapimin ijiutmamtai Aatú yapiruisha ijiuti tusam iniaktusta ; ame pushirmin jurutramkitiaj Tuíniakuisha Sákurmencha jukiti tusam iniaisata .

text: Give to every man that asketh of thee ; and of him that taketh away thy goods ask them not again .
text2: Seatmana nu susata , tura áminiun jurutramainiakuisha ataksha awanturkitia tiip .

text: And as ye would that men should do to you , do ye also to them likewise .
text2: Chíkich winia Túrutati tusam wakeramna Nútiksamek chikichcha Túrata . '

text: For if ye love them which love you , what thank have ye ? for sinners also love those that love them .
text2: ` Iista , aya atumin anenmainia nuke aneakmesha , ṡnusha Warí pénkera Túrarum ? Yajauch shuarsha nuna Túrin ainiawai .

text: And if ye do good to them which do good to you , what thank have ye ? for sinners also do even the same .
text2: Tura atumniasha pénker awajtamainia nuke pénker awajkurmesha ṡnusha Warí pénkera Túrarum ? Yajauch shuarsha nuna Túrin ainiawai .

text: And if ye lend to them of whom ye hope to receive , what thank have ye ? for sinners also lend to sinners , to receive as much again .
text2: Awanturkimniaiti tu Enentáimtarum nuke íkiakrumsha ṡnusha Warí pénkera Túrarum ? Yajauch shuar nuamtak yajauch shuarjai awanturkimniaiti tu Enentáimsar ikianainiawai .

text: But love ye your enemies , and do good , and lend , hoping for nothing again ; and your reward shall be great , and ye shall be the children of the Highest : for he is kind unto the unthankful and to the evil .
text2: Tura atumsha nemasrum aneatniuitrume , tura pénker Túratniuitrume , tura awanturkittiawai tu Enentáimtsuk ikiastiniaitrume . Túrakrumninkia Uunt Yus pénker akirmaktatrume ; tura ni Uchiríntjai tu iniakmastatrume . Yuska , " yuminsajme " ticha nunasha tura yajauch shuarnasha shiir awajeawai .

text: Be ye therefore merciful , as your Father also is merciful .
text2: Ii Aparí waitnentramniua Nútiksarmek atumsha waitnentratarum . '

text: Judge not , and ye shall not be judged : condemn not , and ye shall not be condemned : forgive , and ye shall be forgiven :
text2: ` Chikicha Túramuri ti Enentáimtusairap . Núnisan Yuska Atumí tunaarin iirtamsashtatui . Chikicha tunaarin " nuke asutniatniuiti " tiirap . Núnisan Yus atumin sumamtikramashtatrume . Tsankurnairatarum . Núnisan Yus tsankurtamprattawai .

text: Give , and it shall be given unto you ; good measure , pressed down , and shaken together , and running over , shall men give into your bosom . For with the same measure that ye mete withal it shall be measured to you again .
text2: Chikichcha susata . Núnisan Yus atumin suramsattarme . Niisha pénker nekapma , tura Núkap ati tusa teeka awajas tura patas Núkap enkea emetsai amastatui . Atum Chíkich Túrarmena Nútiksan atumniasha Túrutmattarme . "

text: And he spake a parable unto them , Can the blind lead the blind ? shall they not both fall into the ditch ?
text2: Tura nuyasha juna métek - taku chichaman ujakarmiayi : " Jii kusurusha ṡitiurak Chíkich kusuruncha jukimniait . Mai metek waanam iniaashtatuak ?

text: The disciple is not above his master : but every one that is perfect shall be as his master .
text2: Unuiniamua nu unuiniana nuna nankaamas áchatniuiti . Túrasha niisha ti unuimiatar unuiniana nujai métek nekaamniaiti . '

text: And why beholdest thou the mote that is in thy brother ' s eye , but perceivest not the beam that is in thine own eye ?
text2: ` ṡItiurtsuk atumi jiin numi enketna auk iitskesha Atumí Yachí jiin tsuat enketusha iiyarum ?

text: Either how canst thou say to thy brother , Brother , let me pull out the mote that is in thine eye , when thou thyself beholdest not the beam that is in thine own eye ? Thou hypocrite , cast out first the beam out of thine own eye , and then shalt thou see clearly to pull out the mote that is in thy brother ' s eye .
text2: Ame jiimiin numi tuke enketaisha ṡitiurtsuk ame yatsumi jiiya Tsuátan jurustajme tame ? ḂAntraitrume ! Emka ame jiimiin numi enketna nu jusata . Nuinkia paant Wáinkiattame yatsumi jiin tsuat enketna nu jurustin . '

text: For a good tree bringeth not forth corrupt fruit ; neither doth a corrupt tree bring forth good fruit .
text2: ` Pénker numi yajauchin nereatsui ; tura yajauch numi pénkeran nereatsui .

text: For every tree is known by his own fruit . For of thorns men do not gather figs , nor of a bramble bush gather they grapes .
text2: Numisha ni neren nékanui . Tsachikniumiasha kushinkiap Júukchamniaiti . Tura naranmaya shuinia Júukchamniaiti .

text: A good man out of the good treasure of his heart bringeth forth that which is good ; and an evil man out of the evil treasure of his heart bringeth forth that which is evil : for of the abundance of the heart his mouth speaketh .
text2: Núnisan pénker shuar ni Enentái pénker asamtai pénkeran chichaawai ; tura yajauch shuar , Enentái yajauch asamtai yajauchin chichaawai . Páantchakait . Enentáin pimiutkamu ana nuyan ni wenejai chichaawai . '

text: And why call ye me , Lord , Lord , and do not the things which I say ?
text2: ` Wi Tájana nu Túrachiatrumsha ṡurukamtai Winia , Uunta , Túrutrum ?

text: Whosoever cometh to me , and heareth my sayings , and doeth them , I will shew you to whom he is like :
text2: Shuar winia chichamprun ántuinia nu jea jeammajai métekete . Winia anturtuk Umíana nu jujai métekete :

text: He is like a man which built an house , and digged deep , and laid the foundation on a rock : and when the flood arose , the stream beat vehemently upon that house , and could not shake it : for it was founded upon a rock .
text2: Shuar jean jeamuk emka init taur kayanam ukurmai . Tura yumi ti yutuk , entsa nujankrua tukummaitiat pukukachmai kayanam ukuamu asa .

text: But he that heareth , and doeth not , is like a man that without a foundation built an house upon the earth ; against which the stream did beat vehemently , and immediately it fell ; and the ruin of that house was great .
text2: Antsu Winia anturtukiat umiatsna nuka jujai métekete : Shuar jean jeamuk aya naikminiam jeammai . Tura entsa nujankrua tukumpram nu jeaka pukukamai . Tura mash Sáantramai . " Tu unuiniamiayi Jesus .

text: Now when he had ended all his sayings in the audience of the people , he entered into Capernaum .
text2: Jesus aentsun unuiniasua amik Kapernáum péprunam wémiayi .

text: And a certain centurion ' s servant , who was dear unto him , was sick , and ready to die .
text2: Nui Rúmanmaya suntara Kapitiántri pujumiayi . Nu Kapitiáni takarniuri , ti aneamuri , jakamnia jaamiayi .

text: And when he heard of Jesus , he sent unto him the elders of the Jews , beseeching him that he would come and heal his servant .
text2: Tura Jesusan pachis áujmatainian antuk , ame shuarum Jesusan itiartiti tura winia takarniun Tsuárturti tusa Israer - shuara uuntrin akupkamiayi .

text: And when they came to Jesus , they besought him instantly , saying , That he was worthy for whom he should do this :
text2: Niisha Jesusan weriar , umirtukat tusa ti seainiak tiarmiayi " Ju Kapitián nekas Yáintin pénkeraiti .

text: For he loveth our nation , and he hath built us a synagogue .
text2: Niisha yajaya apachitiat iin shiir Enentáimturmaji . Tura iruntai jean jeamtinniasha ninki chicharkaiti , tura yayawai . "

text: Then Jesus went with them . And when he was now not far from the house , the centurion sent friends to him , saying unto him , Lord , trouble not thyself : for I am not worthy that thou shouldest enter under my roof :
text2: Nuyá Jesus niijiai wémiayi . Tura ni jeen jeastatuk jatemsamtai Kapitiáncha ni amikrin akatar ju titiarum tusa Jesusan akuptukarmiayi . Niisha Jesusan chicharuk juna tiarmiayi " Uuntá , ántram wayataj tu Enentáimsaip . Ame ti nankaamaku asam winia jearui wayachminiaitme .

text: Wherefore neither thought I myself worthy to come unto thee : but say in a word , and my servant shall be healed .
text2: Tuma asakmin imia wiki Amiin jeatniun arantukjame . Ayatik " pénker Ajastí " Tákumin winia takarniusha pénker ajatrustatui .

text: For I also am a man set under authority , having under me soldiers , and I say unto one , Go , and he goeth ; and to another , Come , and he cometh ; and to my servant , Do this , and he doeth it .
text2: Wi nékajai . Winia uuntur winia akuptuiniawai . Tura wisha suntaran akupenajai . Nunasha wi " Wetá " takui wéawai . Tura chikichnasha " Winitiá " tutai winiawai . Tura winia takartinian " ju Túratá " tutai Umíawai . " Tu Tímiayi .

text: When Jesus heard these things , he marvelled at him , and turned him about , and said unto the people that followed him , I say unto you , I have not found so great faith , no , not in Israel .
text2: Jesus nuna antuk ti Enentáimias ni nemarainian Tímiayi " Nekas Tájarme Israer - shuar Yúsan Tímiatrus Enentáimtinian Wáinchaitjai . "

text: And they that were sent , returning to the house , found the servant whole that had been sick .
text2: Tura kapitiani akatramuri Jeá waketkiar , takarniuri pénker ajasun Wáinkiarmiayi .

text: And it came to pass the day after , that he went into a city called Nain ; and many of his disciples went with him , and much people .
text2: Nuyá ukunam Chíkich pepru Naín tutainium ni unuiniamurijiai tura Chíkich Untsurí aentsjai Jesus wémiayi .

text: Now when he came nigh to the gate of the city , behold , there was a dead man carried out , the only son of his mother , and she was a widow : and much people of the city was with her .
text2: Tura péprunam nuntumas jakaan iwiarsatai tusar Juínian Wáinkiamiayi . Jakáa nukuri Wájeyayi , tura uchiri jakamia Núchikiiyayi . Tura ti Untsurí nu peprunmaya niin nemarsarmiayi .

text: And when the Lord saw her , he had compassion on her , and said unto her , Weep not .
text2: Jesus nu wajen Wáiniak tura waitnentar " úutip " Tímiayi .

text: And he came and touched the bier : and they that bare him stood still . And he said , Young man , I say unto thee , Arise .
text2: Nuinkia Jesus jakaa enkerman tarunt antinmiayi ; nuna Juíniasha wajasarmiayi . Nuinkia Jesus jakaan chicharuk " Umpa nantaktia , Tájame " Tímiayi .

text: And he that was dead sat up , and began to speak . And he delivered him to his mother .
text2: Tutai niisha nantaki pujus chichaamiayi . Tura Jesus ni nukurin " Jujú uchiram " Tímiayi .

text: And there came a fear on all : and they glorified God , saying , That a great prophet is risen up among us ; and , That God hath visited his people .
text2: Tura matsamiarmia nu , nuna Wáinkiar ashamkarmiayi . Tura Yusa Náarin shiir awajsarmiayi . Tura chichainiak , " Yúsnan etserniuchukait Niisha . Ataksha Yúsnan etserin uunt ana nu tarutramji " tiarmiayi . Tura " Israer - shuarti Niiniu ájinia nuna Yáinmaktai tusa Yus tarutramji " tiarmiayi .

text: And this rumour of him went forth throughout all Judaea , and throughout all the region round about .
text2: Tura Ashí Jutía nunkanmayasha tura ni írutkamu nunka ármia nuyasha Jesus Túramia nuna nekaawarmiayi .

text: And the disciples of John shewed him of all these things .
text2: Juan ni írutkamuri ujakam Jesus Túramun nekaamiayi . Nekáa ni írutkamurín Jímiaran untsukmiayi .

text: And John calling unto him two of his disciples sent them to Jesus , saying , Art thou he that should come ? or look we for another ?
text2: Tura Jesusai akupkarmiayi . " Atumsha Jesus aniastarum . ṡAmesha nekas Kristu Yus akupkamu Tátinia Núkaitiam . Kame chikichak Nákastataj ~ i ? titiarum . Nu Nekáa ikiuutarum ' Tímiayi .

text: When the men were come unto him , they said , John Baptist hath sent us unto thee , saying , Art thou he that should come ? or look we for another ?
text2: Tutai niisha Jesusan Werí jeariar tiarmiayi " Incha imiakratin Juan akatar akuptamkaji . ṡAmesha nekas Tátinia Núkaitiam . Chikichak Nákastataj ~ i ? Nu nekaatai tusar wakeraji " tiarmiayi .

text: And in that same hour he cured many of their infirmities and plagues , and of evil spirits ; and unto many that were blind he gave sight .
text2: Wats , nii jeawarmia nui Jesus Untsurí jaan Tsuártasa pujurmiayi . Iwianchrukuncha iwianchrin jiirki akupkatasa pujurmiayi . Tura kusuruncha iimtikmiayi .

text: Then Jesus answering said unto them , Go your way , and tell John what things ye have seen and heard ; how that the blind see , the lame walk , the lepers are cleansed , the deaf hear , the dead are raised , to the poor the gospel is preached .
text2: Tuma asa Jesus akatramun juna Tímiayi : " Waketkirum Ashí átum antukurmena nusha , Wáinkiarumna nusha ujaktarum . Kusurusha Wáinmainiawai ; shutuap ainia nu pénker wekainiawai ; tunamarusha Tsuámainiawai ; empekusha ántuiniawai ; jakaasha atak iwiaaku ajainiawai ; tura Kuítrinchanumsha uwempratin chicham ujakmaiti . Juan nu ujaktarum .

text: And blessed is he , whosoever shall not be offended in me .
text2: Yawetsuk Winia tuke shiir Enentáimturna Nú shuar shiir átatui " Tímiayi Jesus .

text: And when the messengers of John were departed , he began to speak unto the people concerning John , What went ye out into the wilderness for to see ? A reed shaken with the wind ?
text2: Waketkiarmatai Jesus Juánkan pachis áujmatman antuk shuar matsamarmia nui juna Tímiayi : " Shuar atsamunmasha ṡWarí werimiarum . Pintiu nase Umpúam Atúu we Juní we ajana nu iistai tusarmek wémarum ? Juan Núnischaiti .

text: But what went ye out for to see ? A man clothed in soft raiment ? Behold , they which are gorgeously apparelled , and live delicately , are in kings ' courts .
text2: Nuikia ṡWarí werimiarum . Shuar pénker iwiarmampra iistai tusarmek wémarum ? Warí , pénker iwiarmampraka uunt akupniu jeen pujuiniatsuk .

text: But what went ye out for to see ? A prophet ? Yea , I say unto you , and much more than a prophet .
text2: Nuinkia ṡWarí werimiarum . Yúsnan etserniuk werimiarum ? Maa , Nú nankaamas Wáinkiarme .

text: This is he , of whom it is written , Behold , I send my messenger before thy face , which shall prepare thy way before thee .
text2: Yaunchu Yus - Chichamnum ju aarmaiti : " Winia akatramurun amiini emka akupeajai ame jintimin iwiarat tusan . " Juan nu akatramuiti .

text: For I say unto you , Among those that are born of women there is not a greater prophet than John the Baptist : but he that is least in the kingdom of God is greater than he .
text2: Nekasan Tájarme , Yúsnan etserin imiakratin Juanjai nankaamas uunt atsuwiti . Túmaitiat Yus akupeamunam Páchinia nu shuarka nekas imianchaitiat , Juanjai nankaamas átatui " Tímiayi .

text: And all the people that heard him , and the publicans , justified God , being baptized with the baptism of John .
text2: Penké shuarsha , Kuítian - juusha , Juan imiaimiujai imianiarmia nu , Jesus timian antukar Yusa Náarin shiir awajsarmiayi .

text: But the Pharisees and lawyers rejected the counsel of God against themselves , being not baptized of him .
text2: Túrasha Pariséusha Israer - shuara jintinniurisha Yus Yáintaj Támaitiat Juan imiaamujai imiancha ásar nakitrarmiayi .

text: And the Lord said , Whereunto then shall I liken the men of this generation ? and to what are they like ?
text2: Nuinkia Uunt Jesus Tímiayi " Yamaiya aentstiram , warijiain métek árum nuna paant Títiatjarme .

text: They are like unto children sitting in the marketplace , and calling one to another , and saying , We have piped unto you , and ye have not danced ; we have mourned to you , and ye have not wept .
text2: Uchijiai métek árume . Ni aijiai iruntrar nakurustaj Tukamá Tuíniawai " Námpera ainis nakurustaitsar peem umpuarji , Túrasha Jantsemáchurme . Nuyá iwiarsatniua ainis nakurustaitsar íwiareakur kantamtai Kantamáaji , Túrasha átum uutcharme . " Tu Tuíniawai .

text: For John the Baptist came neither eating bread nor drinking wine ; and ye say , He hath a devil .
text2: Atumsha Núnisaitrume . Kame Juan Núkap yurumtsuk úmutsuk wekaimiayi . Túmakui átumka " iwianchrukuiti " Tímiarme .

text: The Son of man is come eating and drinking ; and ye say , Behold a gluttonous man , and a winebibber , a friend of publicans and sinners !
text2: Nuyá Wisha Aents Ajasan Támajai . Tura Yurumá úmakuisha " ti yurumin tura ti nampenaiti ; kame Ashí yajauch shuaran tura Kuítian - juu amikrinti " Túrutrume .

text: But wisdom is justified of all her children .
text2: Wats , nekas neka ainia nu , Yusa nekatairin iniakmainiawai . " Tu Tímiayi .

text: And one of the Pharisees desired him that he would eat with him . And he went into the Pharisee ' s house , and sat down to meat .
text2: " Winí Yurumáitia " tusa Pariséu Jesusan ipiaamiayi . Tutai Jesus ni jeen Werí misanam pujusmiayi .

text: And , behold , a woman in the city , which was a sinner , when she knew that Jesus sat at meat in the Pharisee ' s house , brought an alabaster box of ointment ,
text2: Nuinkia nu péprunmaya yajauch nuwa , Jesus Pariséu jeen Yurumáttsa weyi Táman antuk , Kayá mutinium kunkuin asuiti aimkiamun Takukí jearmiayi .

text: And stood at his feet behind him weeping , and began to wash his feet with tears , and did wipe them with the hairs of her head , and kissed his feet , and anointed them with the ointment .
text2: Tura uutki Jesusa nawen pujuras neajkijiai nijiarmiayi . Tura intiashijiai japirmiayi ; Nuyá nawenam mukuta kunkuinian ni nawen ukatramiayi .

text: Now when the Pharisee which had bidden him saw it , he spake within himself , saying , This man , if he were a prophet , would have known who and what manner of woman this is that toucheth him : for she is a sinner .
text2: Pariséu Jesusan ipiaamia nu , nuna Wáiniak juna Enentáimsamiayi : " Ju nekas Yúsnan etserniuitkiunka , ju yajauch nuwa ántiana nuna nekaawainti . Warí , niisha netse nuwachukait " tu Enentáimsamiayi .

text: And Jesus answering said unto him , Simon , I have somewhat to say unto thee . And he saith , Master , say on .
text2: Nuinkia Jesus Pariséun chicharuk Tímiayi " Semunká , ámin titiaj tusan wakerajai . " Tutai Pariséu chichaak " Turuttiá , Uuntá " Tímiayi .

text: There was a certain creditor which had two debtors : the one owed five hundred pence , and the other fifty .
text2: Tutai Jesus Tímiayi " Kuítian ikiamniun Jimiará aishman tumashmakarmiayi . Chíkich kiniantus ( 500 ) tura Chíkichka aya senkuentak tumashmakmiayi .

text: And when they had nothing to pay , he frankly forgave them both . Tell me therefore , which of them will love him most ?
text2: Akiktin tsawant jeamtai Mái - metek takakcha ármiayi . Tuma asamtai Kuítian ikiamin ni tumashrin Mái - metek Asakátrarmiayi . Wats , Turuttiá ṡTú aishmanka ikiamniun nekas aneamia ? " Tímiayi .

text: Simon answered and said , I suppose that he , to whom he forgave most . And he said unto him , Thou hast rightly judged .
text2: Tutai Semun Tímiayi " Enta , Núkap tumashrin tsankuramia nu . "

text: And he turned to the woman , and said unto Simon , Seest thou this woman ? I entered into thine house , thou gavest me no water for my feet : but she hath washed my feet with tears , and wiped them with the hairs of her head .
text2: Tutai Jesus Tímiayi " Nekas tame . " Nuinkia nu nuwan iis Semunkan Tímiayi " Ju nuwa Wáintsumek . Ame jeemiin wayamtai winia nawer nijiartin entsa suruschamame ; antsu ju nuwaka nawerun neajkijiai nijiarturai , tura intiashijiai japirturai .

text: Thou gavest me no kiss : but this woman since the time I came in hath not ceased to kiss my feet .
text2: Mukutam áujtuschamame ; antsu ninkia nawerun tuke mukutui .

text: My head with oil thou didst not anoint : but this woman hath anointed my feet with ointment .
text2: Winia muukaruisha asuiti ikiurtuschamame ; antsu ninkia nawerui kunkuin asuitin ukatrurai .

text: Wherefore I say unto thee , Her sins , which are many , are forgiven ; for she loved much : but to whom little is forgiven , the same loveth little .
text2: Nu tuma asamtai Tájame , niisha Winia ti anentu asamtai ni tunaari Untsurí ana nu tsankuramuiti . Tura tunaar ishichik awai tau tsankuramu ana nuka ishichik anenkratniuiti . " Tu Tímiayi Jesus .

text: And he said unto her , Thy sins are forgiven .
text2: Nuinkia nuwan Tímiayi " Ame tunaarum tsankuramuitme . "

text: And they that sat at meat with him began to say within themselves , Who is this that forgiveth sins also ?
text2: Tura Chíkich ipiaamu Jesusjai misanam pujuarmiania nu " ṡJusha ya asan tunaancha tsankurea ? " nuamtak tunainiarmiayi .

text: And he said to the woman , Thy faith hath saved thee ; go in peace .
text2: Tura Jesus nuwan chicharuk " " Uwemtikiartiniaiti " tu Enentáimturu asam uwempraitme . Shiir Wetá " Tímiayi .

text: And it came to pass afterward , that he went throughout every city and village , preaching and shewing the glad tidings of the kingdom of God : and the twelve were with him ,
text2: Nuyá Untsurí péprunam Jesus Wekaráktak Yus akupeana nuna shiir chichaman etserkini wekaimiayi . Tura ni unuiniamuri tuse ármia nu nemarsarmiayi .

text: And certain women , which had been healed of evil spirits and infirmities , Mary called Magdalene , out of whom went seven devils ,
text2: Yaunchu Untsurí nuwa jaa armia nuna tura iwianchruku armia nunasha Jesus Tsuárarmiayi . Nu nuwasha Niin nemarsarmiayi . Nusha ju ármiayi : Maktaranmaya Marí , siati íwianch Jíirkimiuyania nusha

text: And Joanna the wife of Chuza Herod ' s steward , and Susanna , and many others , which ministered unto him of their substance .
text2: tura uunt akupin Erutisa takarniuri Chusa nuwé Juancha , tura Susancha ; tura Chíkich Untsurí ni takakmarin Súsar Jesusan Yáinkiarmiayi .

text: And when much people were gathered together , and were come to him out of every city , he spake by a parable :
text2: Untsurí péprunmaya Jesusan iistai tusar Jíinkiarmiayi . Tura Untsurí Káunkarmatai ju métek - taku chichaman Jesus unuiniamiayi :

text: A sower went out to sow his seed : and as he sowed , some fell by the way side ; and it was trodden down , and the fowls of the air devoured it .
text2: " Atsaamin atsaamprataj tusa Jíinkimiayi . Atsaamki wesa Jinkiái Jintiá iniaararmiayi . Túrunamtai weenak najakarmiayi . Nuyá chinki tariar yuawarmiayi .

text: And some fell upon a rock ; and as soon as it was sprung up , it withered away , because it lacked moisture .
text2: Chíkich Jinkiái kaya írunmanum iniaararmiayi . Nu Jinkiái tsapainiar , Wárik nantu sukuam Kárarmiayi .

text: And some fell among thorns ; and the thorns sprang up with it , and choked it .
text2: Chíkich Jinkiái jankiniam iniaararmiayi . Tura jankisha Jinkiáisha Mái - metek tsapainiar , janki kankar ajakramiayi .

text: And other fell on good ground , and sprang up , and bare fruit an hundredfold . And when he had said these things , he cried , He that hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Tura Chíkich Jinkiáisha pénker nunkanam iniaararmiayi . Tura tsapainiar , pénker nerekar Chíkichkia siansha ( 100 ) nerekarmiayi . " Tuasua amik kakantar chichaak Jesus Tímiayi " Kuishim ákuinkia antuktarum . "

text: And his disciples asked him , saying , What might this parable be ?
text2: Nuyá ni unuiniamuri Jesusan aniak tiarmiayi " Ju métek - taku chicham tamena nu ṡwarintkumea tame ? "

text: And he said , Unto you it is given to know the mysteries of the kingdom of God : but to others in parables ; that seeing they might not see , and hearing they might not understand .
text2: Tutai Jesus Tímiayi " Atumnia Yus ni akuptairin nekaachma ana nuna nekamtikramprume . Tura chikichnaka , Wáiniainiayat kusurua Núnin ártí tusan , tura ántuiniayat nekaacharat tusan aya métek - taku chichamjai jintintiatjai , " Tímiayi .

text: Now the parable is this : The seed is the word of God .
text2: ` Wats , ju nekaatarum , Tímiayi . Jinkiáisha Yusa chichamen nakumui .

text: Those by the way side are they that hear ; then cometh the devil , and taketh away the word out of their hearts , lest they should believe and be saved .
text2: Jintiá iniaaru tana nuka shuar aya ántana nuna nakumui . Yúsan nekas Enentáimtus uwempracharti tusa íwianch Wárik taa nu chichaman ni Enentáiyan Júawai .

text: They on the rock are they , which , when they hear , receive the word with joy ; and these have no root , which for a while believe , and in time of temptation fall away .
text2: Kayanam iniaaru tana nuka shuar antuk waras umiana nuna nakumui . Tura Nú shuar kankape Atsá asamtai , ishichik tsawantinin umikiar itiurchatan Wáinkiar Wárik kanainiawai .

text: And that which fell among thorns are they , which , when they have heard , go forth , and are choked with cares and riches and pleasures of this life , and bring no fruit to perfection .
text2: Jankiniam iniaaru tana nuka tuke Enentáijiai Umíatsna nuna nakumui . Nu shuarsha ántuiniawai , Túrasha ni wakeramurijiai wekainiawai . Ju nunkanman ana nuna ti Páchiniakui , tura Kuítian ti wakeruiniakui , warastinniak Enentáimtuiniakui , Yus - Chicham ni Enentáin takaatsui . Nujai kankarma ásar nerektinian tujintiainiawai .

text: But that on the good ground are they , which in an honest and good heart , having heard the word , keep it , and bring forth fruit with patience .
text2: Tura Jinkiái pénker nunkanam iniaaru tana nuka shuar antuk umiinia nuna nakumui . Niisha antukarmia nuna pénker Enentáimtusar , yawetsuk umirkar ti pénker nerenawai . '

text: No man , when he hath lighted a candle , covereth it with a vessel , or putteth it under a bed ; but setteth it on a candlestick , that they which enter in may see the light .
text2: ` ṡShiripkin ekeemak nukuktinkiait ? Peaknum waaptak ikiuschatniuiti . Antsu jeanam Wáiniana nu paant Wáinkiarat tusa Yakí ekentsatniuiti .

text: For nothing is secret , that shall not be made manifest ; neither any thing hid , that shall not be known and come abroad .
text2: Núnisan Ashí nekaachma ana nu paant átatui . Tura úukma ana nu nekanattawai . Tura iwiainiakma átatui .

text: Take heed therefore how ye hear : for whosoever hath , to him shall be given ; and whosoever hath not , from him shall be taken even that which he seemeth to have .
text2: Tuma asamtai anearum pénker antuktarum . Shuar takakna nu patatsamnia átatui . Túrasha takaktsuna nu , takakjai tu Enentáimtumana nuka Jurunkíttiawai . " Tu timiayi .

text: Then came to him his mother and his brethren , and could not come at him for the press .
text2: Jesus pujamunam Nukurí ni yachisha tariarmiayi .

text: And it was told him by certain which said , Thy mother and thy brethren stand without , desiring to see thee .
text2: Turamtai Jesusan tiarmiayi " Ame nukusha yatsumsha aa wajasar untsurmainiawai . "

text: And he answered and said unto them , My mother and my brethren are these which hear the word of God , and do it .
text2: Tutai Jesus Tímiayi " Ee , nukuruiti , yatsuruiti , tura Yus tana nuna antuk Umíana nusha winia nukuruiti , winia yatsuruiti . "

text: Now it came to pass on a certain day , that he went into a ship with his disciples : and he said unto them , Let us go over unto the other side of the lake . And they launched forth .
text2: Chíkich tsawantai Jesus ni unuiniamurijiai kanunam enkemprar " Antumian amaini wetai " Tímiayi .

text: But as they sailed he fell asleep : and there came down a storm of wind on the lake ; and they were filled with water , and were in jeopardy .
text2: Entsanam wesar Jesus kanarmiayi . Tura aya aneachma nase ti kakaram Násentkui Chíchimi Tampá tukumar kanun init awayastatuk awajmiayi .

text: And they came to him , and awoke him , saying , Master , master , we perish . Then he arose , and rebuked the wind and the raging of the water : and they ceased , and there was a calm .
text2: Túram nuinkia Jesusan ishintiainiak " Uuntá , iisha Entsá wayaaji " tiarmiayi . Nuinkia Jesus nantaki nasencha entsancha chicharkamiayi . Nú chichamaik nasesha menkakamiayi , tura entsasha miaaku ajasmiayi .

text: And he said unto them , Where is your faith ? And they being afraid wondered , saying one to another , What manner of man is this ! for he commandeth even the winds and water , and they obey him .
text2: Nuyá ni unuiniamurin chicharuk " ṡUrukamtai Winia Enentáimtursachuram ? " Tímiayi . Tura niisha ashamainiak , ti Enentáimprar " ṡAusha Warí aishmankait ? Nasesha entsasha Nii chicharkam umirainiatsuk " tiarmiayi .

text: And they arrived at the country of the Gadarenes , which is over against Galilee .
text2: Kariréa nunka amaini Jatara nunkanam jeawarmiayi .

text: And when he went forth to land , there met him out of the city a certain man , which had devils long time , and ware no clothes , neither abode in any house , but in the tombs .
text2: Kanunmaya Jesus jiinkimtai nu péprunmaya aishman Niin taruntamiayi . Nu aishmansha yaunchu iwianchrukuyayi . Misú wekas , Jeá pujutsuk aents iwiarsamunam pujuyayi .

text: ( For he had commanded the unclean spirit to come out of the man . For oftentimes it had caught him : and he was kept bound with chains and in fetters ; and he brake the bands , and was driven of the devil into the wilderness . )
text2: Iwianchkia nu aishmankan ti kakaram nupet wémiayi . Tura emetatai tusar uwejencha nawencha jirujai Jinkiá wearmiayi . Túrasha tujinkiarmiayi . Niisha jiruncha Tsurí wémiayi . Tura íwianch aents atsamunam útsuk awemamiayi . Nu aishman Jesusan Wáiniak tikishmatar kakantar chicharuk " ṡUrukamtai winiisha tarutnium , Uunt Nankaamaku Yusa Uchiri Jesusa ? Winia Wáitkiarsaip tusan seajme " Tímiayi . Iwianch niin pujurun Jesus jiiki akupeam tu Tímiayi .

text: And Jesus asked him , saying , What is thy name ? And he said , Legion : because many devils were entered into him .
text2: Jesus nu aishmankan anias " ṡYáitiam ? " Tímiayi . Tútai nii chichaak " Wikia Untsuríntjai " Tímiayi . Untsurí íwianch niin pujurma asa nuna Tímiayi .

text: And they besought him that he would not command them to go out into the deep .
text2: " Iin uunt Wáanam ii jiinkimiaj nuin akuptukam amutkaip " íwianch seawarmiayi Jesusan .
