text: And there was there an herd of many swine feeding on the mountain : and they besought him that he would suffer them to enter into them . And he suffered them .
text2: Nui ishichik arantach Náinnium Untsurí kuchi shushunmak yujaarmiayi . Tura íwianch chichainiak , " Antsu kuchiniam wayatin tsankatrukta " tiarmiayi . Tutai Jesuska " Ayu , wetarum " Tímiayi .

text: Then went the devils out of the man , and entered into the swine : and the herd ran violently down a steep place into the lake , and were choked .
text2: Nuna takui íwianch aishmannumia Jíinkiar kuchiniam wayawarmiayi . Túram kuchisha Nánatanam akaiki iniaawar entsanam utsanawarmiayi . Túrunawar jakekarmiayi .

text: When they that fed them saw what was done , they fled , and went and told it in the city and in the country .
text2: Kuchin Wáinniusha Túrunan Wáinkiar , ashamkar , péprunmasha tura arantcha etserkatai tusar tseke wearmiayi .

text: Then they went out to see what was done ; and came to Jesus , and found the man , out of whom the devils were departed , sitting at the feet of Jesus , clothed , and in his right mind : and they were afraid .
text2: Etserkarmatai , iyutai tusar Untsurí shuar wearmiayi . Tura Jesus pujamunam jeawar , íwianch Jíintiukiarmia Nú aishmankan pénker ajas Pushí entsar Jesusa nawen pujan Wáinkiarmiayi . Tura ashamkarmiayi .

text: They also which saw it told them by what means he that was possessed of the devils was healed .
text2: Iwianchruku aishman Tsuárman Wáinkiarmia nu yama taan ujakarmiayi .

text: Then the whole multitude of the country of the Gadarenes round about besought him to depart from them ; for they were taken with great fear : and he went up into the ship , and returned back again .
text2: Tura ti ashamainiak Jatara nunkanmaya aents Ashí Jesusan " Wetá " tiarmiayi . Tutai Jesus kanunam enkemar wémiayi .

text: Now the man out of whom the devils were departed besought him that he might be with him : but Jesus sent him away , saying ,
text2: Iwianch Jíintiukiarmia Nú aishman Jesusan , wisha ame wéamunam winitiaj tusa seamiayi . Tutai Jesus nuna suritiak ,

text: Return to thine own house , and shew how great things God hath done unto thee . And he went his way , and published throughout the whole city how great things Jesus had done unto him .
text2: " Antsu ame jeemiin weme Yus ámin Túrutma nu Ashí etserkata " Tímiayi . Tutai aishman we Jesus niin Túramia nuna Ashí nu péprunam etserkamiayi .

text: And it came to pass , that , when Jesus was returned , the people gladly received him : for they were all waiting for him .
text2: Tura Jesus katinki Kariréanam Tatí tusar Nákas pujuarmiayi . Tuma ásar Nii waketki katinki Támatai nu aencha warasar áujsarmiayi .

text: And , behold , there came a man named Jairus , and he was a ruler of the synagogue : and he fell down at Jesus ' feet , and besought him that he would come into his house :
text2: Tumai Israer - shuara iruntai Jeá uuntri Jairu naartin Támiayi . Nii taa , Jesusa nawen tikishmatar " Winia jearui waitneasam Winítrítiá " Tímiayi .

text: For he had one only daughter , about twelve years of age , and she lay a dying . But as he went the people thronged him .
text2: Ni nawantri chikichik amia nu , tuse Uwí takaku , jakatasa pujakui nuna Tímiayi . Jesus " ayu " tinia weakui ti Untsurí aents nemariarmiayi . Tura Untsurí shuar kae ajas weena ásar chanuawarmiayi .

text: And a woman having an issue of blood twelve years , which had spent all her living upon physicians , neither could be healed of any ,
text2: Nui nuwa Páchitkia wémiayi . Niisha tuse Uwí numpa ajapeak Wáitias pujuyayi . Tsuákratniua nuisha ni Kuítrin Ashí ajapaitiat Tsuámarchauyayi .

text: Came behind him , and touched the border of his garment : and immediately her issue of blood stanched .
text2: Jesusa úkuriini Winiá weantuk ni Pushirí Nánkatramurin antinmiayi . Nuna tura Nú chichamaik numpé ájapeamuncha pénker ajasmiayi .

text: And Jesus said , Who touched me ? When all denied , Peter and they that were with him said , Master , the multitude throng thee and press thee , and sayest thou , Who touched me ?
text2: Nuinkia Jesus chichaak " ṡYa Winia antintkia ? " Tímiayi . Tura " penkesha antinchajme " Tuíniakui Pítiur ni tsaniakmarijiai Jesusan chicharuk " Uuntá , ti Untsurí antinmasha , tura ti Untsurí chanunmainiasha ṡitiura " ya Winia antintkia " tame ? " Tíarmiayi .

text: And Jesus said , Somebody hath touched me : for I perceive that virtue is gone out of me .
text2: Tútaisha Jesus Tímiayi " Nekas Winia antintkiayi . Winia kakarmarjai Tsuárajna nuna nékajai " Tímiayi .

text: And when the woman saw that she was not hid , she came trembling , and falling down before him , she declared unto him before all the people for what cause she had touched him and how she was healed immediately .
text2: Nuyá nu nuwasha , nekarayapi tusa kuranki taa Jesusa nawen tikishmatramiayi . Tura Ashí aents ántuiniamunam urukaku antinkia tura itiura Wárik pénker ajasmia nuna ujakmiayi .

text: And he said unto her , Daughter , be of good comfort : thy faith hath made thee whole ; go in peace .
text2: Nuinkia Jesus nuwan Tímiayi " Nawantrú , shiir Wetá . Winia nekas Enentáimtursa asam pénker ajasume . "

text: While he yet spake , there cometh one from the ruler of the synagogue ' s house , saying to him , Thy daughter is dead ; trouble not the Master .
text2: Jesus tuke chichas pujai uunt Jairu jeenia taa , Jáirun Tímiayi " Ame nawantrum jakayi . Unuikiartin tuke itit awajipia " Tímiayi .

text: But when Jesus heard it , he answered him , saying , Fear not : believe only , and she shall be made whole .
text2: Tura Jesus nuna antuk Tímiayi " Ashamkaip . Ayatik Winia nekas Enentáimtursata . Túrakmin nawantrum pénker ajastatui " Tímiayi .

text: And when he came into the house , he suffered no man to go in , save Peter , and James , and John , and the father and the mother of the maiden .
text2: Jeá jeawar Jesussha Niijiai Untsurí wayatniun surimkiamiayi . Antsu aya Pítrun , Jakupun , Juánnasha tura nuwachi Aparín Nukuríncha wayatniun tsankatkamiayi .

text: And all wept , and bewailed her : but he said , Weep not ; she is not dead , but sleepeth .
text2: Ashí uutainiak atakka Wáinkiashtatjapi tu uutiarmiayi . Túmainiakui Jesus penké jakaan nékayat Tímiayi " Uutirpa . Nuwachkia Jákachai , antsu kanarai " Tímiayi .

text: And they laughed him to scorn , knowing that she was dead .
text2: Jakaancha urukaku ta tusar wishikrarmiayi .

text: And he put them all out , and took her by the hand , and called , saying , Maid , arise .
text2: Nuyá Jesus nuwachi uwején achik , Kákantar chicharuk " Nawantru nantaktia " Tímiayi .

text: And her spirit came again , and she arose straightway : and he commanded to give her meat .
text2: Túram niisha jakayat atak iwiaaku ajasmiayi . Tura Nú chichamaik nantakmiayi ; Túrunamtai Jesus " ayuratarum " Tímiayi .

text: And her parents were astonished : but he charged them that they should tell no man what was done .
text2: Nuwachi Aparí Nukurísha ti Enentáimprarmiayi . Tura Jesus " Ju Túramu penké etserkairap " Tímiayi .

text: Then he called his twelve disciples together , and gave them power and authority over all devils , and to cure diseases .
text2: Ni tuse unuiniamurin ikiaanak ni chichamejai iwianchrukun Enentáiyan iwianchin jiirki akupkatniun tura sunkurjai jaa Tsuártinniasha ni kakarmarin Súsarmiayi .

text: And he sent them to preach the kingdom of God , and to heal the sick .
text2: " Yus akupin ajastin ujaktarum , tura jaa Tsuártarum " tinia akupkarmiayi Jesus .

text: And he said unto them , Take nothing for your journey , neither staves , nor scrip , neither bread , neither money ; neither have two coats apiece .
text2: Nuyá Tímiayi " Wéakrum áyatik wetarum . Ushukrustincha , uyuncha , yurumkasha , kuitcha penké jukiirap . Aya Chikichík Pushí jukitiarum .

text: And whatsoever house ye enter into , there abide , and thence depart .
text2: Nánkamas jeanam jearum wayarmeka nuin pujustarum . Nuin pujusrumek Chíkich péprunam wéakrum Jíinkitiarum , Tímiayi .

text: And whosoever will not receive you , when ye go out of that city , shake off the very dust from your feet for a testimony against them .
text2: Tura atumin awaintiamatniun nakitiana Nú péprunmaya jiinkirum nawemiya nunka akakekrum ikiuktiarum . Awaintiamachma paant ati tusarum nu Túratarum " Tímiayi .

text: And they departed , and went through the towns , preaching the gospel , and healing every where .
text2: Nuyá Jíinkiar Ashí péprunam uwempratin chichaman ujakiar wearmiayi ; tura Ashí péprunam Jáiniancha Tsuákiar wearmiayi .

text: And of some , that Elias had appeared ; and of others , that one of the old prophets was risen again .
text2: Uunt akupin Erutis Jesus Túramun antukmiayi . Nu Túramun Chíkich shuarka " Juan jakamunmaya nantaki Túrawai " tu wearmiayi . Chíkichkia , " yaunchu Yúsnan etserin Erías wantiniak Túrawai " tu wearmiayi . Chíkichkia , " Chíkich yaunchu etserin nantaki Túrawai " tiarmiayi . Tuma asamtai Erutis penké nekaachmiayi .

text: And Herod said , John have I beheaded : but who is this , of whom I hear such things ? And he desired to see him .
text2: Tura Tímiayi " Wiki , Juanka muuke tsupirkatarum , Tíchamkaj . Tuma aisha , ṡju shuar , ni Túramuri Ashí shuar chichainia nusha Yátsukait ? " Tu Enentáimiuk " iistaj " Tímiayi .

text: And the apostles , when they were returned , told him all that they had done . And he took them , and went aside privately into a desert place belonging to the city called Bethsaida .
text2: Atak Jesusa akatramuri waketki taar ni Túramurin Jesusan ujakarmiayi . Nuinkia aents atsamunam Petsaitia péprunam Tíjiuch weak nui Júkiarmiayi .

text: And the people , when they knew it , followed him : and he received them , and spake unto them of the kingdom of God , and healed them that had need of healing .
text2: Tura penké shuar nuna nekaawar nemariarmiayi . Túram Jesus niin shiir áujsamiayi . Tura Yusa akuptairi pachis unuiniamiayi . Tura jaa armia nuna Tsuárarmiayi .

text: And when the day began to wear away , then came the twelve , and said unto him , Send the multitude away , that they may go into the towns and country round about , and lodge , and get victuals : for we are here in a desert place .
text2: Tura Kíakui , tuse unuiniamu Jesusan wériar tiarmiayi " Uuntá , shuar akupkachminiashit . Tíjiuch péprunmasha , Shúarnumkesha wear ni Yurumátniurin sumarmakarti , tura kanartintrin Wáinkiarti . Jui pujajnia juinkia penké atsawai " tiarmiayi .

text: But he said unto them , Give ye them to eat . And they said , We have no more but five loaves and two fishes ; except we should go and buy meat for all this people .
text2: Tutai Jesus Tímiayi " Atumsha ayuratarum . " Tutai chichainiak " Iisha aya senku tanta tura namaksha Jímiarchik takakji . Ju shuar ayuratin sumaktai tusar wétiniaitji " tiarmiayi .

text: For they were about five thousand men . And he said to his disciples , Make them sit down by fifties in a company .
text2: Aishmansha ti Untsurí senku mir ( 5000 ) Jeeá ámiayi . Tura Jesus ni unuiniamurin chicharainak " " senkuenta senkuenta kanaarum ankant ankant pujustarum , " titiarum " Tímiayi .

text: And they did so , and made them all sit down .
text2: Túrawarmatai Ashí pujusarmiayi .

text: Then he took the five loaves and the two fishes , and looking up to heaven , he blessed them , and brake , and gave to the disciples to set before the multitude .
text2: Nuyá senku tantan tura Jimiará namaknasha Jesus achik , yakiini iimias Yúsan yuminsamiayi . Nuyá ajamsarat tusa ni unuiniamurin Súsarmiayi .

text: And they did eat , and were all filled : and there was taken up of fragments that remained to them twelve baskets .
text2: Ashí Yurumáwar ejemararmiayi . Tura ampirman tuse chankinnium aimkiarmiayi .

text: And it came to pass , as he was alone praying , his disciples were with him : and he asked them , saying , Whom say the people that I am ?
text2: Jesus ni unuiniamurijiai aentsnumia kanaki pujuarmiayi . Jesus Yúsan aujsua umik ni unuiniamurin tiarmiayi " ṡYáiti turutainia Winia ? "

text: They answering said , John the Baptist ; but some say , Elias ; and others say , that one of the old prophets is risen again .
text2: Niisha aimkiarmiayi , " Chíkich " Imiakratin Juánkaiti " turamainiawai ; chikichcha " Iríasaiti " tura Chíkichkia " yaunchu Yúsnan etserin nantakniua Núiti " turamainiawai " tiarmiayi .

text: He said unto them , But whom say ye that I am ? Peter answering said , The Christ of God .
text2: Tutai " Tura atumsha ṡYáiti Túrutrum ? " tiarmiayi . Takui Pítiur chichaak " Ameka Yusa Anaikiamuri , Kristu tutai , Núitme " Tímiayi .

text: And he straitly charged them , and commanded them to tell no man that thing ;
text2: Tutai Jesus " Penké etserkairap " Tímiayi .

text: Saying , The Son of man must suffer many things , and be rejected of the elders and chief priests and scribes , and be slain , and be raised the third day .
text2: Nuyá Jesus Tímiayi " Wi Aents Ajasuitjiana ju ti waitsatniuitjai . Wíi shuara uuntri , tura ni Pátriri uuntrisha tura ni jintinniurisha nakitrurar Maantuáwartatui . Túrasha iwiartusarmatai menaintiu tsawant jeamtai nantaktiatjai . "

text: And he said to them all , If any man will come after me , let him deny himself , and take up his cross daily , and follow me .
text2: Nuyá Ashí aentsun chicharuk juna Tímiayi " Shuar Winia nekas nemartustajtsa wakerakka ni wakeramurinkia iniaisati . Tuke tsawant ni krusri yanaki nemartusti .

text: For whosoever will save his life shall lose it : but whosoever will lose his life for my sake , the same shall save it .
text2: Kame shuar ju nunkanam aya pénker pujustaj Tákunka nu shuar uwemtsuk jakattawai . Antsu Winia anentu asa pénker pujustinniak Enentáimtsuna Nú shuarka nekas iwiaakman Wáinkiattawai .

text: For what is a man advantaged , if he gain the whole world , and lose himself , or be cast away ?
text2: Iimiata , shuar Ashí ju nunkanam ana nuna Súmakui tura jinium wétin ákuisha ṡitiurak pénker pujusat ?

text: For whosoever shall be ashamed of me and of my words , of him shall the Son of man be ashamed , when he shall come in his own glory , and in his Father ' s , and of the holy angels .
text2: Wi Aents Ajasuitjiana ju Winiasha tura winia chichampruncha shuar natsantraitkuinkia , winia wincharujai , winia Aparu wincharijiai tura nayaimpinmaya pénker suntara wincharijiai atak Táakun shuar natsantrurmia nuna natsantrattajai Wi .

text: But I tell you of a truth , there be some standing here , which shall not taste of death , till they see the kingdom of God .
text2: Tura shuar Yusa akuptairin Wáintsuk Jákachartatna nu jui pujuiniawai . Nuna nekas Tájarme " Tímiayi .

text: And it came to pass about an eight days after these sayings , he took Peter and John and James , and went up into a mountain to pray .
text2: Nuna tuasua amik Nuyá Chíkich semanatin Yúsan áujsataj tusa Jesus Náinnium wakamiayi . Pítiur , Jakupu , Juanjai nemariarmiayi .

text: And as he prayed , the fashion of his countenance was altered , and his raiment was white and glistering .
text2: Jesus auju pujus Nusháa iira ajattsarmiayi . Ni pushirisha ti puju Jíitsumir ajasmiayi .

text: And , behold , there talked with him two men , which were Moses and Elias :
text2: Nuinkia Jimiará aishman Niijiai Chicháa wajarmiayi . Nuka Muisáis Eríasjai ármiayi .

text: Who appeared in glory , and spake of his decease which he should accomplish at Jerusalem .
text2: Níincha wincha Jíitsumir téntakarmiayi . Tura Jesus Wáitias Jerusarénnum Jákatniurin amia nuna áujmatiarmiayi .

text: But Peter and they that were with him were heavy with sleep : and when they were awake , they saw his glory , and the two men that stood with him .
text2: Pítiur ni tsaniakmarijiai kari ti pujainiain Iwiáa pujuarmiayi . Tuma ásar Jesusan tura Jimiará aishmanjai Jíitsumir ajas wajainian Wáinkiarmiayi .

text: And it came to pass , as they departed from him , Peter said unto Jesus , Master , it is good for us to be here : and let us make three tabernacles ; one for thee , and one for Moses , and one for Elias : not knowing what he said .
text2: Tura nu aishman Jesusan ikiuki weenai Pítiur Jesusan chicharuk " Uuntá , iisha ti shiir pujatsjik . Menaintiu aakmaktai , Aminiusha , Muisaisnasha , Eríasnasha aakmaktai " Tímiayi . Tura Pítrusha Enentáimtsuk nuna Tímiayi .

text: While he thus spake , there came a cloud , and overshadowed them : and they feared as they entered into the cloud .
text2: Nuna Chicháa pujai yurankim Tarí kaput amuawarmiayi . Tura yurankim amuam ti ashamkarmiayi .

text: And there came a voice out of the cloud , saying , This is my beloved Son : hear him .
text2: Nuinkia yuranminmaya ju chichaamun antukarmiayi : " Juka winia aneamu Uchiruiti . Nii anturkatarum . "

text: And when the voice was past , Jesus was found alone . And they kept it close , and told no man in those days any of those things which they had seen .
text2: Chichaamun antasua amikiar Jesus ninki wajan Wáinkiarmiayi . Nuinkia takamtak pujuarmiayi . Tura Wáinkiarmia nuna penké etserkacharmiayi .

text: And it came to pass , that on the next day , when they were come down from the hill , much people met him .
text2: Kashin tsawantai , Náinniumia Táarmatai , ti Untsurí shuar Jesus inkiuntai tusar wearmiayi .

text: And , behold , a man of the company cried out , saying , Master , I beseech thee , look upon my son : for he is mine only child .
text2: Nu shuarnumia chikichik aishman Jesusan untsuak Tímiayi " Uuntá , waitneasam uchir Iirtústá . Uchirsha Júchikiiti .

text: And , lo , a spirit taketh him , and he suddenly crieth out ; and it teareth him that he foameth again , and bruising him hardly departeth from him .
text2: Iwianch achik Núpeteam niisha Nánkamas untsumui . Tura chichichiptu ajas wenunmasha saun kaput apaawai . Iwianch niin tuke yajauch awajas ankant awajsatniun nakitiawai .

text: And I besought thy disciples to cast him out ; and they could not .
text2: Túmakui ame unuiniamurmin iwianchin Jíirtukit tusan seamjai . Túrasha tujinkiarmai " Tímiayi .

text: And Jesus answering said , O faithless and perverse generation , how long shall I be with you , and suffer you ? Bring thy son hither .
text2: Tutai Jesus Tímiayi " Yus Enentáimtichutirmin , tutupnik wekaichatirmin ṡUrutmá tsawanttsuk atumjai pujustaj . Urutmá katsuntratjatsuk ? Uchiram jui itiata " Tímiayi .

text: And as he was yet a coming , the devil threw him down , and tare him . And Jesus rebuked the unclean spirit , and healed the child , and delivered him again to his father .
text2: Tura uchi winiai íwianch Nunká ajuant chichichiptu aepsamiayi . Tura Jesus iwianchin kakantar chicharkamiayi . Tura uchin pénker awajas ni aparin awantuki susamiayi .

text: And they were all amazed at the mighty power of God . But while they wondered every one at all things which Jesus did , he said unto his disciples ,
text2: Tura Ashí pujuarmia nu ti Enentáimprar " Yuska Imiá uuntchakait " tiarmiayi . Jesus Túramun ti Enentáimtu pujuiniai Jesus ni unuiniamurin Tímiayi

text: Let these sayings sink down into your ears : for the Son of man shall be delivered into the hands of men .
text2: " Wi Tájarmena ju pénker antuktarum . Winia Aents Ajasu Tútain surutkartatui . "

text: But they understood not this saying , and it was hid from them , that they perceived it not : and they feared to ask him of that saying .
text2: Tura Nii timia nuna unuiniamuri nekaacharmiayi . Nekaawarain tusa paantcha awajsamuyayi . Tura warinkit tusa anintrustinniasha arantukarmiayi .

text: Then there arose a reasoning among them , which of them should be greatest .
text2: Nuyá ni unuiniamuri , yaki Imiá nankaamaku ati tusa , nuamtak mai tunai ajarmiayi .

text: And Jesus , perceiving the thought of their heart , took a child , and set him by him ,
text2: Tura ni Enentáimsamurin Jesus nekaamiayi . Tuma asa uchin achik ni pujamunam itiamiayi .

text: And said unto them , Whosoever shall receive this child in my name receiveth me : and whosoever shall receive me receiveth him that sent me : for he that is least among you all , the same shall be great .
text2: Itiá Tímiayi " Winia anentuk ju uchin shiir awajeana nuka Winiasha shiir awajtawai . Tura Winia shiir awajtana nuka Winia akuptana nunasha shiir awajeawai . Kame átum nankaamantuchu Tárumna nu ti nekas nankaamantuiti ' Tímiayi .

text: And John answered and said , Master , we saw one casting out devils in thy name ; and we forbad him , because he followeth not with us .
text2: Nuyá Juan Tímiayi " Uuntá , shuar ame Náarmin pachis iwianchin jiiki akupea nu Wáinkiámji . Tura iin Páchitkiachu asamtai nuka suritkiamji . "

text: And Jesus said unto him , Forbid him not : for he that is not against us is for us .
text2: Tutai Jesus Tímiayi " Antsu suritkiairap . Shuar iin nakitramachkunka iin Páchitkiawai . "

text: And it came to pass , when the time was come that he should be received up , he stedfastly set his face to go to Jerusalem ,
text2: Jesus , nayaimpiniam waketkitniuri jeatemamtai , Enentáimmia ímiatrusan Jerusarénnum we - wémiayi .

text: And sent messengers before his face : and they went , and entered into a village of the Samaritans , to make ready for him .
text2: Wesa , kanartinian Wáinkiarat tusa akatar émtikiarmiayi . Tura niisha Samaria péprunam jeawarmiayi .

text: And they did not receive him , because his face was as though he would go to Jerusalem .
text2: Tura Samarianmaya aentska , Jerusarénnum wéenan nekaawaru ásar itiaatniun nakitrarmiayi .

text: And when his disciples James and John saw this , they said , Lord , wilt thou that we command fire to come down from heaven , and consume them , even as Elias did ?
text2: Jesusa unuiniamuri Jakupusha Juansha nuna nekaawar , Jesusan tiarmiayi " ṡUuntá , Erías yaunchu Túramia Núnisrik iisha Túrat tusam wakeramek . Nayaimpinmaya ji tara Samarianmaya aentsun amukarti , Títiatjik ? "

text: But he turned , and rebuked them , and said , Ye know not what manner of spirit ye are of .
text2: Tutai Jesus niin iisar kakantar chicharuk Tímiayi " Atumsha atumi Enentái urukukit nuka nekamatsrume .

text: For the Son of man is not come to destroy men ' s lives , but to save them . And they went to another village .
text2: Wi Aents Ajasu aentsun emesrattsan Táchaitjai . Antsu uwemtikratajtsan Táwitjai " Tímiayi . Nuyá Chíkich péprunam wearmiayi .

text: And it came to pass , that , as they went in the way , a certain man said unto him , Lord , I will follow thee whithersoever thou goest .
text2: Jintiá weenai , Chíkich aishman Jesusan chicharuk " Uuntá , Tuí wétatam nuisha nemarsatjame " Tímiayi .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Foxes have holes , and birds of the air have nests ; but the Son of man hath not where to lay his head .
text2: Tutai Jesus Tímiayi " Kujanchmasha ni Wáarin takaktsuk . Chinkisha pasunken takaktsuk . Tura Wi Yusa Uchiríntiatan tepesan ayampratniur atsawai . "

text: And he said unto another , Follow me . But he said , Lord , suffer me first to go and bury my father .
text2: Chíkich aishmankan Jesus " Nemartusta " Tímiayi . Tutai nii chichaak " Antsu , Uuntá , winia apar jakamtai , iwiarsa ikiuakun nemarsatjame . Nu Tsankátrúktá " Tímiayi .

text: Jesus said unto him , Let the dead bury their dead : but go thou and preach the kingdom of God .
text2: Tutai Jesus Tímiayi " Jakaa ainia nu ni shuarin iwiarsatniunka Enentáimtusarti . Tura ámeka weme Yus - shuar átin urukukit nu etserkata " Tímiayi .

text: And another also said , Lord , I will follow thee ; but let me first go bid them farewell , which are at home at my house .
text2: Nuyá Chíkich Tímiayi " Uuntá , nemarsataj tusan wakerajme . Túrasha Wíi shuaran emka áujsan ikiuweartaj Tsankátrúktá " Tímiayi .

text: And Jesus said unto him , No man , having put his hand to the plough , and looking back , is fit for the kingdom of God .
text2: Tutai Jesus Tímiayi " Shuar arayat ukunmaani apajas iimna nu , Yus akupeana nui takaschamniaiti . "

text: After these things the Lord appointed other seventy also , and sent them two and two before his face into every city and place , whither he himself would come .
text2: Nuyá ukunam Chíkich unuiniamurin setenta anaikiarmiayi Jesus . Tura Jímiar Jímiaran apatak émkitiarum tusa Ashí péprunam Ashí nunkanam ni wétin amia nui akupkamiayi .

text: Therefore said he unto them , The harvest truly is great , but the labourers are few : pray ye therefore the Lord of the harvest , that he would send forth labourers into his harvest .
text2: Akupeak Tímiayi " Nekas Tájarme , Yus - Chicham étserkum , Júuktinia Núnisan , aents Yus - shuar awajsatin ti awai . Tura ṡyaki Júukat , aya ishichik takainiasha ? Tuma asamtai ni takarniuri akupkat tusarum Nerentin seatarum .

text: Go your ways : behold , I send you forth as lambs among wolves .
text2: Wetarum . Atumka murikiua Núninaitrume . Uunt yawa yujamua Núninnium tsuumai ámunam akupeajrume .

text: Carry neither purse , nor scrip , nor shoes : and salute no man by the way .
text2: Yurumkasha , kuitcha , sapatcha Júkiirap ; shuarjai Jintiá áujmamsatai tusarum wajasairap .

text: And into whatsoever house ye enter , first say , Peace be to this house .
text2: Jea wayakrum emka ju titiarum : " Ju jeanam pujuinia nuna Yus shiir awajsarti . "

text: And if the son of peace be there , your peace shall rest upon it : if not , it shall turn to you again .
text2: Nérentin " Ee , nuna wakerajai " Tákuinkia Túrunattawai . Tura " Atsá , wakeratsjai " Tákuinkia , " nuinkia Túrunashti " titiarum .

text: And in the same house remain , eating and drinking such things as they give : for the labourer is worthy of his hire . Go not from house to house .
text2: Jeá wayattarmena Nú jeanman pujustarum . Tura ajampramsattarmena nu yuatarum . Warí , takaana nu akinkiashtinkiait . Chíkich jeanam nui werum nui werum ajairap .

text: And into whatsoever city ye enter , and they receive you , eat such things as are set before you :
text2: Awaintiamawartatna Nú peprunam jearmeka ajampramsartatna nu yuatarum .

text: And heal the sick that are therein , and say unto them , The kingdom of God is come nigh unto you .
text2: Jaa ainia nu Tsuártarum . Túrarum " Yus ju nunkanam akupin ajastin ishichik ajatemsai " nu peprunmaya shuar titiarum .

text: But into whatsoever city ye enter , and they receive you not , go your ways out into the streets of the same , and say ,
text2: Iksarmek itiaarmachartatna Nú peprunam jearum , Jintiá wajasrum ju titiarum ,

text: Even the very dust of your city , which cleaveth on us , we do wipe off against you : notwithstanding be ye sure of this , that the kingdom of God is come nigh unto you .
text2: " Yusna nakitra asakrumin , atumi péprurinia nunka ii nawen peema japirar akakekji . Túrasha ju paant nekaatarum : Yus ju nunkanam akupkatin ishichik ajatemsai . "

text: But I say unto you , that it shall be more tolerable in that day for Sodom , than for that city .
text2: Yusa nekapsatin tsawantri jeamtai nu peprunmaya shuaran ti Asutiáttawai . Yaunchu Sutumanmaya shuaran Asutiámia nujai nankaamas Asutiáttawai . Núnaka paant Tájarme Tímiayi .

text: Woe unto thee , Chorazin ! woe unto thee , Bethsaida ! for if the mighty works had been done in Tyre and Sidon , which have been done in you , they had a great while ago repented , sitting in sackcloth and ashes .
text2: ` Wáinkiatá , Kurasín péprunmayatiram . Wáinkiatá Petsaitia péprunmayatirmesha . Atumí pépruriin aents tujintiamun ti Túraitjai . Warí , yaunchu Tiru péprunmasha , Setun péprunmasha nu tujintiamu Túramuitkuinkia yaunchu ni Enentáin Yapajiáwaraayi . Túrawar Kúntuts pujutai pushin entsarar yunkunim ajakiaraayi .

text: But it shall be more tolerable for Tyre and Sidon at the judgment , than for you .
text2: Tura atumsha aents tujintiamu Túramu Wáiniatrum yapajiachu asakrumin Tirunmaya tura Setunnumia aentsjai nankaamas Asutniáttarme .

text: And thou , Capernaum , which art exalted to heaven , shalt be thrust down to hell .
text2: Tura atumsha Kapernáumnumiatirmesha , " ti nankaamantu ajasar nayaimpiniam jeattaji " tu Enentáimtsurmek . Maaj , antsu jaka matsamtainium jeattarme , auka " Tímiayi .

text: He that heareth you heareth me ; and he that despiseth you despiseth me ; and he that despiseth me despiseth him that sent me .
text2: Tura Jesus ni unuiniamurin junasha Tímiayi : " Atumin anturtamainiakka Winiasha anturtuiniawai ; atumin nakitramainiakka Winiasha nakitruiniawai ; tura Nú arant , Winia nakitrakka Winia akuptukua nunasha nakitiawai . " Tú áujas Jesus niin akupkarmiayi .

text: And the seventy returned again with joy , saying , Lord , even the devils are subject unto us through thy name .
text2: Ukunam nu setenta unuiniamu warasar waketki Táarmiayi . Tura chichainiak " Uuntá , ame Náarmiin íwianch jiiki akupeam umirtamkamji " tiarmiayi .

text: And he said unto them , I beheld Satan as lightning fall from heaven .
text2: Tutai Jesus Tímiayi " Ee , Wisha nayaimpinmaya peem peetna Núnisan , uunt iwianch Satanásan akaiki iniaan Wáinkiamjai .

text: Behold , I give unto you power to tread on serpents and scorpions , and over all the power of the enemy : and nothing shall by any means hurt you .
text2: Atumniaka winia kakarmarun susamjarme , napi najarmasha titin najarmasha yajauch awajtamsairum tusan ; tura ii nemasri kakarmari nupetkatniuncha susamjarme .

text: Notwithstanding in this rejoice not , that the spirits are subject unto you ; but rather rejoice , because your names are written in heaven .
text2: Túrasha íwianch umirtamkui nu Enentáimsam warasairap . Antsu Atumí naari nayaimpiniam aarma aa asamtai warastarum " Tímiayi Jesus .

text: In that hour Jesus rejoiced in spirit , and said , I thank thee , O Father , Lord of heaven and earth , that thou hast hid these things from the wise and prudent , and hast revealed them unto babes : even so , Father ; for so it seemed good in thy sight .
text2: Nuinkia ni Enentáin Yusa Wakaní waramtiksam Jesus juna Tímiayi : " Aparú , Ashí nayaimpijiai nunka Uuntrinme ; tuma asam ju Túrunamu ti unuimiaru Enentáimtumainia Nuyá úukuitme ; antsu uchichia Núnis nankaamantuchu Enentáimtumainia Nú shuar paant awajtusuitme . Ee , Aparú , Núnik wakerichmakum . Tuma asamtai shiir Enentáimtajme , Aparú " Tímiayi .

text: All things are delivered to me of my Father : and no man knoweth who the Son is , but the Father ; and who the Father is , but the Son , and he to whom the Son will reveal him .
text2: " Winia Apar Ashí surusuiti . Wisha ni Uchiri asamtai Winia nékarui . Tura Chíkich Winia nekas nekarainiatsui . Yus Apancha Wiki nékajai . Tura Wi wakeraj Nú shuaran winia Aparun paant awajtajai . Nú shuarsha winia Aparun nékainiawai . " Tu Tímiayi Jesus .

text: For I tell you , that many prophets and kings have desired to see those things which ye see , and have not seen them ; and to hear those things which ye hear , and have not heard them .
text2: Nuyá ni unuiniamurin iis Tímiayi " Wi Tájarme , Untsurí Yúsnan etserniusha tura uunt akupniusha átum Yamái Wáintrum nuna Wáinkiatniun wakeruiniayatan Wáinkiacharmiayi . Tura átum Yamái ántarme nuna antuktinian wakeruiniayatan antukcharmiayi . Tura Yus achirmaku asakrumin , Wáintrumna nu ti pénkeraiti " Tímiayi .

text: And , behold , a certain lawyer stood up , and tempted him , saying , Master , what shall I do to inherit eternal life ?
text2: Nuyá akupkamun jintinkiartin Jesus warintiak chichakat tusa wajatki werimiayi . Werí iniimiayi " Uuntá , wi tuke iwiaaku átaj takun ṡwarinia Túratniuitiaj ? " Tímiayi .

text: He said unto him , What is written in the law ? how readest thou ?
text2: Tutai Jesus ayak " ṡYús - Papinium Muisáis aarmanum waritia aarmait . Waritia Enentáimiam ? " Tímiayi .

text: And he answering said , Thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart , and with all thy soul , and with all thy strength , and with all thy mind ; and thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: Akupkamun jintinkiartin ayak Tímiayi " Juna tawai : Ti Enentáimsam , tuke Enentáimjai Uunt Yus aneeta . Ame kakarmaram , iwiaakmarmesha Yus iiktusta . Tura ame ayashim aneamna Núnismek ame írutramurmesha aneeta . Núchakait " Tímiayi .

text: And he said unto him , Thou hast answered right : this do , and thou shalt live .
text2: Tutai Jesus Tímiayi " Pénker aimsame . Nu Túrakmeka tuke iwiaaku átatme . "

text: But he , willing to justify himself , said unto Jesus , And who is my neighbour ?
text2: Tutai akupkamun jintinkiartin ni anintramun Kíishtumaktajtsa wakerak " Winia írutramursha ṡya ainia ? " Tímiayi .

text: And Jesus answering said , A certain man went down from Jerusalem to Jericho , and fell among thieves , which stripped him of his raiment , and wounded him , and departed , leaving him half dead .
text2: Takui Jesus Tímiayi " Jerusarénnumia jintia Jirikiú péprunam jeana Nú jintianam aishman wean , kasa aishman tariar ni waririn , pushirincha kasarkarmiayi . Tura katsumkar Mayái ashirak ajuantar ikiukiarmiayi .

text: And by chance there came down a certain priest that way : and when he saw him , he passed by on the other side .
text2: Tura Israer - shuar Patri ukunman winis nu aishmankan Wáiniak aya iikian iis ikiukmiayi .

text: And likewise a Levite , when he was at the place , came and looked on him , and passed by on the other side .
text2: Nuyá ukunam Patri Yáintrisha nu jintianam wesa , nu aishmankan Wáiniak , áyatik iis ikiuak wémiayi .

text: But a certain Samaritan , as he journeyed , came where he was : and when he saw him , he had compassion on him ,
text2: Tura Nuyá Samaria nunkanmaya aishmansha nu jintianman wesa , nu aishmankan Wáiniak Ní Shuárinchunak Wáitnéntramiayi .

text: And went to him , and bound up his wounds , pouring in oil and wine , and set him on his own beast , and brought him to an inn , and took care of him .
text2: Nuyá nu aishmankan weantuk ni numpamnamurin asuitijiai tura Wíniujai tsuar jaanchjiai penuarmiayi . Tura ni kawairiin ekenak jukimiayi . Tura írar kanutainiam Jukí ejé nu aishmankan pénker Wáinkiamiayi .

text: And on the morrow when he departed , he took out two pence , and gave them to the host , and said unto him , Take care of him ; and whatsoever thou spendest more , when I come again , I will repay thee .
text2: Tura kashin tsawarmatai Samarianmaya aishman weak Jimiará Kuítian jusa Jeá nérenniurin susamiayi . Susa Tímiayi " Ju aishman pénker Wáitrukta . Tura wi amaajna ju Táasmataisha wi Wáketkun akiktajme " Tímiayi .

text: Which now of these three , thinkest thou , was neighbour unto him that fell among the thieves ?
text2: Ayu , ámijiaisha , nu menaintiu ainiana nu , ṡTuá Imiá nekas katsumkamun waitnentramia ? " Tímiayi Jesus .

text: And he said , He that shewed mercy on him . Then said Jesus unto him , Go , and do thou likewise .
text2: Takui akupkamun jintinkiartin chichaak " Entá , katsumkamun Wáitnentramia Núa " Tímiayi . Tutai Jesus Tímiayi " Amesha weme Núnismek Túrata . "

text: Now it came to pass , as they went , that he entered into a certain village : and a certain woman named Martha received him into her house .
text2: Nuyá Jesus Jintiá wesa Chíkich péprunam jeamiayi . Nu péprunmaya nuwa naari Marta ni jeen itiaamiayi .

text: And she had a sister called Mary , which also sat at Jesus ' feet , and heard his word .
text2: Marta kai ámiayi ni naari Marí . Marisha unuiniamun anturkataj tusa Jesusa nawen pujursamiayi .

text: But Martha was cumbered about much serving , and came to him , and said , Lord , dost thou not care that my sister hath left me to serve alone ? bid her therefore that she help me .
text2: Tura Mártaka ni takatrin ti Enentáimtak Jesusan weantuk Tímiayi " Uuntá Jesusá , ṡwinia kair takatan winiak iiktursainia nuka Enentáimtsumek ? Winia Yáintá turuttia " Tímiayi .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto her , Martha , Martha , thou art careful and troubled about many things :
text2: Tutai Jesus Tímiayi " Maaj Martá , Untsurí Túratin ana nu ti Enentáimsam itit awajtamui .

text: But one thing is needful : and Mary hath chosen that good part , which shall not be taken away from her .
text2: Tura aya chikichik nekas Túratniuiti . Marikia nekas pénker ana nuna achikiai . Nusha penké jurunkishtatui " Tímiayi .

text: And it came to pass , that , as he was praying in a certain place , when he ceased , one of his disciples said unto him , Lord , teach us to pray , as John also taught his disciples .
text2: Chíkich tsawantai Jesus Yúsan áujsataj tusa atsamunam pujumiayi . Aujsua amikmatai ni unuiniamuri chikichik Niin Tímiayi " Uuntá , imiakratin Juan ni unuiniamurin unuiniamia Núnismek Yus áujsatin unuitiurta . "

text: And he said unto them , When ye pray , say , Our Father which art in heaven , Hallowed be thy name . Thy kingdom come . Thy will be done , as in heaven , so in earth .
text2: Tutai Jesus Tímiayi " Yus áujkuram ju titiarum : Aparu Yus , nayaimpiniam pujamna nu , ii Aparínme . Ame Náarmincha shuar ántar pachischarti . Ashí aentsnum ame akupkatin tsawantrum wari jeati . Ame wakeramuram nayaimpiniam umikma ana Núnisan ju nunkanmasha Uminkiatí .

text: Give us day by day our daily bread .
text2: Aparú , ii yurumkari Ashí tsawant amasta .

text: And forgive us our sins ; for we also forgive every one that is indebted to us . And lead us not into temptation ; but deliver us from evil .
text2: Tura winia nemasrun tsankurajna Núnismek , Aparú , winia tunaaru tumashrisha tsankurturta . Tunáa wakeruktin tsankatrukaip . Antsu Ashí tunaanumia uwemtikrurta . "

text: For a friend of mine in his journey is come to me , and I have nothing to set before him ?
text2: Nuyá Jesus juna Tímiayi . " Wats , ju Titiái . Kashi ajapén amikrum werishtameash . Tura " Winia amikiur yajaya winia jearui yama tayi . Tura ajamsatniun penké takaktsujai . Tuma asamtai amikru , menaintiu apatuk Ajamprustá " Tíchatameash .

text: And he from within shall answer and say , Trouble me not : the door is now shut , and my children are with me in bed ; I cannot rise and give thee .
text2: Tura nii init pujusan chichaak " Warí , Wáitisha epenmiaiti , tura winia uchirsha wijiai Ashí tepeenawai . Itiur nantakniak amastaj . Itit awajtipia " turamchanpiash .

text: I say unto you , Though he will not rise and give him , because he is his friend , yet because of his importunity he will rise and give him as many as he needeth .
text2: Wats , paant Tájarme , niisha amikrum asa , nantaki ikiatmastinian nakitiayat , itit awajtin tusa nantaki Ashí wakeramna nuna suramsattawai .

text: And I say unto you , Ask , and it shall be given you ; seek , and ye shall find ; knock , and it shall be opened unto you .
text2: Tuma asamtai Tájarme : Yus seatarum ; Túrakrumin suramsattarme . Eakrumka Wáinkiattarme . " Winiajai " Tákurmin awaintiamattarme .

text: For every one that asketh receiveth ; and he that seeketh findeth ; and to him that knocketh it shall be opened .
text2: Seana Núnaka Suíniatsuk . Eana nuka Wáintsuk . " Winiajai " tuinia Núnaka awainiatsuk . '

text: If a son shall ask bread of any of you that is a father , will he give him a stone ? or if he ask a fish , will he for a fish give him a serpent ?
text2: ` Wats , átum uchirtintiram , ame uchiram apatkun seatmakui ṡkayaash Súsaintiam ? Namakan seatmakui ṡNapíash Súsaintiam ?

text: Or if he shall ask an egg , will he offer him a scorpion ?
text2: Nujintian seatmakuisha ṡtitinkiash Súsaintiam ?

text: If ye then , being evil , know how to give good gifts unto your children : how much more shall your heavenly Father give the Holy Spirit to them that ask him ?
text2: Warí , átum Imiá yajauchitirmesha Atumí uchiri pénker ana nu tuke Súchakaitrum . Atumí Apari nayaimpiniam pujana nu , seakrumninkia Nú nankaamas ni Wakanin suramsattawai . " Tu unuiniamiayi .

text: And he was casting out a devil , and it was dumb . And it came to pass , when the devil was gone out , the dumb spake ; and the people wondered .
text2: Shuar iwianchruku asa chichachu ámiayi . Nuna Enentáiyan nu iwianchin Jesus jiiki akupkamiayi . Iwianch jiinkimtai chichachu chichasmiayi . Túramtai shuar nui pujuarmia nu ti Enentáimprarmiayi .

text: But some of them said , He casteth out devils through Beelzebub the chief of the devils .
text2: Tura Chíkich tiarmiayi " Juka iwianchi Kapitiántri Satanásan , ni Chíkich naari Pirsepún umirniuiti . Tuma asa nuna kakarmarijiai iwianchin jiiki akupeawai . "

text: And others , tempting him , sought of him a sign from heaven .
text2: Tura Chíkichkia , nekas Yúsnumia taawashit tusar " Nayaimpinmaya kakaram ana nu iniakmasam aents tujintiamu Túrata " Jesusan tiarmiayi .

text: But he , knowing their thoughts , said unto them , Every kingdom divided against itself is brought to desolation ; and a house divided against a house falleth .
text2: Tura Jesus tu Enentáimiainian neka asa Tímiayi " Núu nunkanmayan shuar nuamtak kajernaiyakuinkia Nú nunka Wárik meserchattawak ; nuamtak shuarsha ni shuarijiai kajernaiyaksha amunaikchartatuak .

text: If Satan also be divided against himself , how shall his kingdom stand ? because ye say that I cast out devils through Beelzebub .
text2: Wíniaka " Pirsepú iwianchi kakarmarijiai iwianchin jiiki akupeawai " Túruttsurmek . Tuma asamtai Tájarme , uunt iwianch Satanás naartin , ni suntarijiai kajernaiyaksha ṡitiur tuke kakaram átin ~ ki ?

text: And if I by Beelzebub cast out devils , by whom do your sons cast them out ? therefore shall they be your judges .
text2: Tura Wi Pirsepú kakarmarijiai iwianchin jiiki akupeakuinkia , atumi shuarisha ṡyana kakarmarijiain iwianchin jiiki akupena ? Niisha " iwianchi kakarmarijiai Túrichuitji " tuiniaisha ṡitiura Winiasha , " iwianchi kakarmarijiai Túraiti " turutminiaitrum ?

text: But if I with the finger of God cast out devils , no doubt the kingdom of God is come upon you .
text2: Wikia Yusa kakarmarijiai iwianchin jiikin akupeajai . Nu nekaarum Yus atumi Enentáin akupin ajasuana nu nékarme . '

text: When a strong man armed keepeth his palace , his goods are in peace :
text2: ` Kakaram aishman Kíishtumaktajtsa iwiarnar wajas jeen Wáinkiui , ni wariri init ana nusha Tímiatrusan ainiawai .

text: But when a stronger than he shall come upon him , and overcome him , he taketh from him all his armour wherein he trusted , and divideth his spoils .
text2: Antsu niijiai nankaamas kakaram ana nu winiakka nupetkashtatuak . Tura Kíishtumaktinian iwiar takakman jurawai . Tura Kasamkámun ni amikrin Súawai . Kakaram aishman iwianchin nakumeawai . Tura nujai nankaamas kakaram aishman Winia nakumprawai .

text: He that is not with me is against me : and he that gathereth not with me scattereth .
text2: Iista . Winia nemartatsna nu winia nemasruiti . Núnisan Winia Yáintsuna nuka aya itiurchat Nájateawai . '

text: When the unclean spirit is gone out of a man , he walketh through dry places , seeking rest ; and finding none , he saith , I will return unto my house whence I came out .
text2: Nuyá Jesus juna Tímiayi : ` Shuara Enentáiya íwianch jiinki ayamprataj tusa yumi penké Yútatsna nui wéawai . Tura ayampratniun Wáincha asa ataksha waketkitniun Enentáimui . " Wi Jíinkimiaj nuin waketkitjai " tawai .

text: And when he cometh , he findeth it swept and garnished .
text2: Tura waketki pénker iwiaramun tura ankant aan Wáiniui .

text: Then goeth he , and taketh to him seven other spirits more wicked than himself ; and they enter in , and dwell there : and the last state of that man is worse than the first .
text2: Nuna Wáiniak , ni ain siati iwianchin niijiai nankaamas yajaunchin Itiá Enkemáwartatui . Túrunamtai nu shuar nuiki nuna nankaamas yajauch ajastatui . " Tu Tímiayi Jesus .

text: And it came to pass , as he spake these things , a certain woman of the company lifted up her voice , and said unto him , Blessed is the womb that bare thee , and the paps which thou hast sucked .
text2: Shuar iruniarmia nui Jesus nuna chichaa pujai , nuwa untsumuk " Ame nukun Yus ti Yáinkiai . Ni ampujén ame pujuschamkam . Amin amuntstamachmakam " Tímiayi .

text: But he said , Yea rather , blessed are they that hear the word of God , and keep it .
text2: Tutai Jesus Tímiayi " Antsu ni chichamen antukar umirainia nuna , nukurjai nankaamas Yus ti Yáinkiaru ainiawai , tajai " Tímiayi .

text: And when the people were gathered thick together , he began to say , This is an evil generation : they seek a sign ; and there shall no sign be given it , but the sign of Jonas the prophet .
text2: Shuar Untsurí Niin Káunkarmatai Jesus Tímiayi " Yamaiya shuarka yajauch ainiawai . Yajauch ásar , chichartuiniak " Nekas Yúsnumiaitkiumka aents tujintiamua nu Túram Yusa kakarmari iniakmasta " turutainiawai . Túrasha áyatik yaunchu Junas Túrunamujai iniakmasmia nujain nekaatin ainiawai .

text: For as Jonas was a sign unto the Ninevites , so shall also the Son of man be to this generation .
text2: Kame Junas Túrunamujai Níniwi péprunmaya shuaran yaunchu Yus ni kakarmarin iniakmasmia Núnisan yamaisha Aents Ajasu tutainjiana nu Wi Túrunamujai Yuska ni kakarmarin iniakturmastatrume .

text: The queen of the south shall rise up in the judgment with the men of this generation , and condemn them : for she came from the utmost parts of the earth to hear the wisdom of Solomon ; and , behold , a greater than Solomon is here .
text2: Yaunchu Sarumún uunt akupin pujai Sepa Núnkanmaya nuwa akupin Sarumunka chichamen nekaataj tusa ti jeashtanmaya Támiayi . Tura yamaikia Sarumunjai nankaamas pujai átumka anturtatsrume . Tuma asamtai Wi Tájarme , Yus Ashí shuaran nekapsattana nu tsawant jeamtai nu nuwa , akupniun pénker anturka asamtai , Yus iimianum pénker átatui . Antsu atumsha Winia anturtukcha asakrumin Yus iimianum yajauch átatrume .

text: The men of Nineve shall rise up in the judgment with this generation , and shall condemn it : for they repented at the preaching of Jonas ; and , behold , a greater than Jonas is here .
text2: Tura Yúsnan etserin Junas Níniwi péprunmaya shuarnum Yus Chichaman etserkamtai nu shuar ni tunaarin Enentáimtusar Enentáin Yapajiáwarmiayi . Tura jui Yamái Junasjai nankaamas etserin pujajai . ḂTuma asamtai nekapsatin tsawant jeamtai Níniwinmaya shuar yamaiya shuar árumna nuna sumamtikramattarme ! '

text: No man , when he hath lighted a candle , putteth it in a secret place , neither under a bushel , but on a candlestick , that they which come in may see the light .
text2: ` ṡShirikip ekeemakar úuktinkiait ? Pitiaknumsha enkeashtiniaiti . Antsu shuar Jeá wayana nu paant iimsat tusar Yakí ekensatniuiti .

text: The light of the body is the eye : therefore when thine eye is single , thy whole body also is full of light ; but when thine eye is evil , thy body also is full of darkness .
text2: Ame Jíimijiai Wáinkiam nujai wekasatin nekaattame . Tuma asamtai ame jiimijiai pénker ana nu Wáinkiumka pénker wekasattame ; antsu ame jiimijiai yajauch ana nu Wáinkiumka , kiritniunam wekasatniua Núnisan yajauchiniam wekasattame .

text: Take heed therefore that the light which is in thee be not darkness .
text2: Anearta . Enentáimin Tsáapin ana nu kiritin ajaschati tusam anearam wekasata .

text: If thy whole body therefore be full of light , having no part dark , the whole shall be full of light , as when the bright shining of a candle doth give thee light .
text2: Ame ayashmiin kirit ajatsuk aya Tsáapniniaitkiuinkia , shirikip paant awajea Núnisan Ashí paant Wáinkiattame " Tímiayi .

text: And as he spake , a certain Pharisee besought him to dine with him : and he went in , and sat down to meat .
text2: Jesus chichasua amikmatai Pariséu shuar , winia jearui Yurumáitia tusa untsukmiayi . Tutai Jesus Wayá misanam pujusmiayi .

text: And when the Pharisee saw it , he marvelled that he had not first washed before dinner .
text2: Tura Israer - shuar ikijmiartin ana nuna Túrutsuk aya pujakui Pariséusha nuna Wáiniak " maa ṡurukamtia tura ? " tu Enentáimsamiayi .

text: And the Lord said unto him , Now do ye Pharisees make clean the outside of the cup and the platter ; but your inward part is full of ravening and wickedness .
text2: Tura Uunt Jesus Tímiayi " Pariséutirmeka Atumí yurumtairi aya Pátatek nijiaktin ti wakeriniaitrume . Atumsha nu yurumtaijiai méteketrume . Pátatek pénker Túrarme . Tura Atumí Enentáinkia kasamkatniusha tura yajauchia nusha piakuiti .

text: Ye fools , did not he that made that which is without make that which is within also ?
text2: ḂEnentáimcha ! Warí , Ashí Pátatek Wáiniaj ~ i nuna Yus najanachmakia ; tura init paantcha ana nunasha Yúsak najanachmakia .

text: But woe unto you , Pharisees ! for ye tithe mint and rue and all manner of herbs , and pass over judgment and the love of God : these ought ye to have done , and not to leave the other undone .
text2: Aneartarum , Pariséutirmesha . Aya nuka méntasha , anissha tura aya apatkusha Yus Súsatin ti Enentáimprume . Nukasha tsuriasrum apatkusha tias ana Nuyá chikichik achikrum , Yúsnaiti Tátsurmek . Tura antsu nu Túratin iniaitsuk pénker wekasatniusha , Yus anenmarmena nusha pénker Enentáimsatniuitrume . Wats init , Enentáimin ana Nútiksarmek jusam susarta . Nuinkia Ashí chamir átatui . '

text: Woe unto you , Pharisees ! for ye love the uppermost seats in the synagogues , and greetings in the markets .
text2: ` Tura aneartarum Pariséutirmesha . Yus áujtai jeanam penkeri pujutainium pujustin wakerarme . Tura Jintiá aents iimiainiamunam ti shiir áujtusarat tusarum wakerarme . '

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye are as graves which appear not , and the men that walk over them are not aware of them .
text2: ` Jintinniutirmesha , Pariséutirmesha Mái - metek aneartarum . ḂAntar shiir chichamtinia ! Iwiarsamu paantcha Núniniaitrume . Shuar nu nankaamaksha Nájamiat nékatsui . Núnisan shuar atumi chichame antukar yajauchia nuna nekartamtsurme . "

text: Then answered one of the lawyers , and said unto him , Master , thus saying thou reproachest us also .
text2: Nuikia Israer - shuara jintinniuri chikichik Jesusan chicharuk Tímiayi " Uuntá , nu Tákum incha yajauch chichareame . "

text: And he said , Woe unto you also , ye lawyers ! for ye lade men with burdens grievous to be borne , and ye yourselves touch not the burdens with one of your fingers .
text2: Tutai Jesus Tímiayi " Atumsha jintinniutiram aneartarum . Atumi akupkamurijiai Káarak ti kijin entsakchamnia Súarme . Tura átumka Yáintaj tusarum Atumí uwejejaisha penké ántiatsrume . '

text: Woe unto you ! for ye build the sepulchres of the prophets , and your fathers killed them .
text2: ` Aneartarum Tájarme . Yaunchu Atumí uuntri Yúsnan étserniun Máawarmia nuna iwiarsamuri átum jeamniuitrume nu etserin ti pénker ásarmatai kajinmatkishtin .

text: Truly ye bear witness that ye allow the deeds of your fathers : for they indeed killed them , and ye build their sepulchres .
text2: Nu Túrakrum Atumí uuntri Túrawarmia nu , " yajauchichuiti " tarume . Warí , niisha Máawarmiayi , tura atumsha Máawarai Táyatrum niijiai méteketrume . Warí , Yúsnan etserniu iwiarsamurin jeamkuram atumek sumamarme . '

text: Therefore also said the wisdom of God , I will send them prophets and apostles , and some of them they shall slay and persecute :
text2: ` Atumí Túramurin Nekáa Yus juna yaunchu Tímiayi : " Winia etserturniun tura winia akatramurnasha niin akuptukartatjai . Túramtai chikichnaka Máawartatui , tura chikichnaka pataatukartatui . "

text: That the blood of all the prophets , which was shed from the foundation of the world , may be required of this generation ;
text2: Tuma asamtai Ashí ni etserniurin maamu ainia nuna , yamaiya aentstirmin Yus sumamtikramattarme . Nunka najanamunmaya Jukí

text: From the blood of Abel unto the blood of Zacharias , which perished between the altar and the temple : verily I say unto you , It shall be required of this generation .
text2: Yamái ímiajai maamu ainia nuna , kame Apir maamunmaya Jukí Yamái Sakarías maamua Tímiajai anintrustatui . Naman maar Yus sutai ámanum tura Yus - jea ámanum ajapén atenkamunam Máawarmia Nú Sakaríasan tajai . Nu tuma asamtai Tájarme , ni etserniuri maantamnawarmia nuna Yamái matsatrumna Nútirmin aninmasartatui . '

text: Woe unto you , lawyers ! for ye have taken away the key of knowledge : ye entered not in yourselves , and them that were entering in ye hindered .
text2: ` Jintinniutiram aneartarum . Waiti asakatniua Núnisrumek nekas nekaatin surimiarme . Atumkesha nékatsrume . Tura nekaataj tana nusha suritiarme " Tímiayi .

text: Laying wait for him , and seeking to catch something out of his mouth , that they might accuse him .
text2: Jesus nuna takui Pariséusha , jintinniusha ti kajerkarmiayi . Tura nii tana nujai " yajauch Túrame " titiai tusar wakeruiniak Untsurí anintriarmiayi .

text: In the mean time , when there were gathered together an innumerable multitude of people , insomuch that they trode one upon another , he began to say unto his disciples first of all , Beware ye of the leaven of the Pharisees , which is hypocrisy .
text2: Nu tumai shuar ti Untsurí Káunkarmiayi . Ti kaunka ásar nawen mai - najatnai ajarmiayi . Tura Jesus ni unuiniamurin Tútan juarkimiayi . " Pariséu ántar chichamtin ainiawai . Nuka wakaprutaiya Núnisaiti . Wakaprutaikia nijiamanch yumirnium yama enkeam Páantchaiti . Tura ukunam nekaamniaiti .

text: For there is nothing covered , that shall not be revealed ; neither hid , that shall not be known .
text2: Núnisan Ashí paantcha ana nu iwiainiakma átatui . Uukma ana nusha nekaamu átatui .

text: Therefore whatsoever ye have spoken in darkness shall be heard in the light ; and that which ye have spoken in the ear in closets shall be proclaimed upon the housetops .
text2: Nu tuma asamtai , kiritniunam Tímiarmena nusha Tsawái Tsáapin ajasmanum antunkattawai . Tura jea init pujusrum ishishmasrum Tímiarmena nusha áa ti paant etsernaktatui . '

text: And I say unto you my friends , Be not afraid of them that kill the body , and after that have no more that they can do .
text2: ` Amikrutiram , aya ayashmin main ainia nu ashamkairap , Tájarme . Ayashmin maa Nú arantka Máashtatui .

text: But I will forewarn you whom ye shall fear : Fear him , which after he hath killed hath power to cast into hell ; yea , I say unto you , Fear him .
text2: Tura ya nekas ashamkatniuitrum , nuna paant jintintiattajrume . Ame ayashmi maa , Nuyá ámin jinium akuptamkatniun tujintiatsna nu ashamkatarum . Ee , Yus ashamkatarum , Tájarme . '

text: Are not five sparrows sold for two farthings , and not one of them is forgotten before God ?
text2: ` Jimiará chinki Ishitiúpchich ishichik kuitjai surukchatniukait . Túrasha Yussha nu chinkin penké kajinmatkishtatui .

text: But even the very hairs of your head are all numbered . Fear not therefore : ye are of more value than many sparrows .
text2: Wats , ashamkairap . Untsurí chinkijiai nankaamas Yuska atumin Enentáimturmarme . Warí , ame intiashmin mash Yus nekapmaruiti . '

text: Also I say unto you , Whosoever shall confess me before men , him shall the Son of man also confess before the angels of God :
text2: ` Ashí shuar Ashí iimiainiamunam Winia Aents Ajasu tutain , Winia natsantruiniatsna Núnaka , Wisha Yusa suntari iimiainiamunam natsantrashtatjai ;

text: But he that denieth me before men shall be denied before the angels of God .
text2: antsu shuar iimiainiamunam Winia natsantrana Núnaka Wisha Yusa suntari iimiainiamunam natsantrattajai . '

text: And whosoever shall speak a word against the Son of man , it shall be forgiven him : but unto him that blasphemeth against the Holy Ghost it shall not be forgiven .
text2: ` Winia , Aents Ajasu tutain , shuar yajauch chichartakuinkia nusha tsankuramniaiti , tura Yusa Wakaníncha yajauch chicharkuinkia nuka penké tsankurachminiaiti . '

text: And when they bring you unto the synagogues , and unto magistrates , and powers , take ye no thought how or what thing ye shall answer , or what ye shall say :
text2: ` Wats , Israer - shuar iruntai jeanmasha , tura Israer - shuar Kapitiánniumsha , uuntnumsha juramainiakui , aninmainiakuisha warintiajak tusam ti Enentáimsáip .

text: For the Holy Ghost shall teach you in the same hour what ye ought to say .
text2: Ame aimkiatin jeamtai , Yusa Wakani ame Títiatmena nuna jintintramattawai , " tu timiayi .

text: And one of the company said unto him , Master , speak to my brother , that he divide the inheritance with me .
text2: Chíkich aishman Jesusan Tímiayi " Uuntá , ii Aparí ikiurtamkimiaj nuna yatsur winiasha nakak Surustí , titia " Tímiayi .

text: And he said unto him , Man , who made me a judge or a divider over you ?
text2: Tutai Jesus Tímiayi " Aishmanka , atumin nu Túratin anaikiamukaitiaj . "

text: And he said unto them , Take heed , and beware of covetousness : for a man ' s life consisteth not in the abundance of the things which he possesseth .
text2: Nuyá Tímiayi " Pénker Enentáimsatarum . Nii takakna Nújain shuar iwiaaku áchatniuiti . Tuma asamtai Kuítrintin ajastin aya nuke Enentáimsaip . "

text: And he spake a parable unto them , saying , The ground of a certain rich man brought forth plentifully :
text2: Nuyá juna métek - taku chichaman unuiniak Tímiayi : " Kuítrintin aishman ni ajariyan arakan ti nukap juukmai .

text: And he thought within himself , saying , What shall I do , because I have no room where to bestow my fruits ?
text2: Tura " ṡTi nukap asamtai tuin ikiustaj . Itiurkatjak ? " tu Enentáimsamiai .

text: And he said , This will I do : I will pull down my barns , and build greater ; and there will I bestow all my fruits and my goods .
text2: Wats , wi nékajai . Winia Ikiutái - jearun ashiran Nú nankaamas uuntan najanatjai . Tura nui Ashí ikiustajai .

text: And I will say to my soul , Soul , thou hast much goods laid up for many years ; take thine ease , eat , drink , and be merry .
text2: Nuinkia Untsurí uwitin shiir pujustinian ikiusman takustatjai . Tuma asamtai , ayampran , Yurumán , umaran shiir pujustatjai " timiai . '

text: But God said unto him , Thou fool , this night thy soul shall be required of thee : then whose shall those things be , which thou hast provided ?
text2: ` Tura Yus niin chicharuk timiai " Netse . Yamái kashi jakattame . Nuinkia Imiá Núkap ikiusumna nusha ṡyana átata ? " timiai " Tímiayi .

text: So is he that layeth up treasure for himself , and is not rich toward God .
text2: Nuyá Jesus Tímiayi " Shuar ninki Kuítrin ikiauntumna nu , Núnisaiti . Túrasha Yusjai iismaka Kuítrinchaiti . "

text: And he said unto his disciples , Therefore I say unto you , Take no thought for your life , what ye shall eat ; neither for the body , what ye shall put on .
text2: Nuyá ni unuiniamurin Jesus juna Tímiayi : " Warí yuarik pujustaj ~ i tura warin entsartaj ~ i tusarum nuke ti Enentáimsairap .

text: The life is more than meat , and the body is more than raiment .
text2: Yus iwiaaku átinian amasu asa yurumkancha amastatui . Tura ju ayashniasha najana asa entsataincha amastatui .

text: Consider the ravens : for they neither sow nor reap ; which neither have storehouse nor barn ; and God feedeth them : how much more are ye better than the fowls ?
text2: Chinkisha Enentáimsatarum . Niisha arakmainiatsui . Juuk yurumkan ikiuiniatsui . Tuma ain Yuska ni Yurumátniurin tuke Súawai . Atumsha chinkia Nú nankaamaschakaitrum .

text: And which of you with taking thought can add to his stature one cubit ?
text2: Tura ya shuarak , ti Enentáimtana nujai Nú naya ajasminiait .

text: If ye then be not able to do that thing which is least , why take ye thought for the rest ?
text2: Kame Yúpichuch ana nusha Túrachminiaitiatrumsha , ṡurukamtai Chíkich ainia nusha ti Enentáimtarum ? '

text: Consider the lilies how they grow : they toil not , they spin not ; and yet I say unto you , that Solomon in all his glory was not arrayed like one of these .
text2: ` Iistá , kukujsha takaachitiat tura Nájanchitiat ti Shíirmach ainiawai . Yaunchu akupin Sarumún ti shiir iwiarmamniuitiat kukujia Tímianchauyayi .

text: If then God so clothe the grass , which is to day in the field , and to morrow is cast into the oven ; how much more will he clothe you , O ye of little faith ?
text2: Iis , nupa Yamái tsakaawai tura kashin aents tsupikiar jinium Apeánáwai . Tuma ain Yus ti shiir awajeatsuk . Nuna tura asa atumniasha Nú pénker Wáitmakchattawak . ṡUrukamtai Yus nekas Enentáimtatsrum ?

text: For all these things do the nations of the world seek after : and your Father knoweth that ye have need of these things .
text2: Ju nunkanam ana nu ti pachiirap . Chíkich shuar , Yúsan nékainiatsna nu , warin yuataj ~ i , warin umartaj ~ i nuna ti pachiiniawai . Tura atumsha tu Enentáimsairap . Urukatjak , tiirap . Ame Apa nayaimpiniam pujana nu , Ashí atsumarmena nuna nékawai .

text: But rather seek ye the kingdom of God ; and all these things shall be added unto you .
text2: Antsu emka Yusna nu Enentáimtustarum . Túrakrumninkia atsumamna nuna Yus suramsattawai . '

text: Fear not , little flock ; for it is your Father ' s good pleasure to give you the kingdom .
text2: ` Winia murikrutiram ashamkairap . Untsuríchuitrume . Túrasha Atumí Apari ni akuptairiin pachitmaktasa ti wakerutmarme .

text: For where your treasure is , there will your heart be also .
text2: Kuítrum tui aa , nui tuke Enentáimtittiarme . Tume asamtai takakrumna nu surukrum atsumainia nu susatarum . Nuka enketai arut ajatsna nui enkeatniua Núniskete . Túrakrum nayaimpinmaya kuit amuatsna nu íkiauwearme . Nuisha kasa nu kuitian kasamkataj tusa wayachminiaiti , tura kayaasha nu kuitian Yúatniun tujintiawai . '

text: And ye yourselves like unto men that wait for their lord , when he will return from the wedding ; that when he cometh and knocketh , they may open unto him immediately .
text2: ` Ju Enentáimsatarum . Ni uuntri nuatnaikiatin Námpernumia taa , " uraitia " takui , takarniuri jinia ekeemakar Wárik urattiai tusar Nakáa pujuiniawai . Atumsha Núnisrumek Wi atumi Uuntri Támatai , shiir itiaatai tusarum anearum wekasatarum .

text: Blessed are those servants , whom the lord when he cometh shall find watching : verily I say unto you , that he shall gird himself , and make them to sit down to meat , and will come forth and serve them .
text2: Ni uuntri taak Iwiáa pujuinian Wáinkiarai nuka shiir pujuiniawai . Nu uuntak iwiar , " misanam pujustarum " ni takarniurin Títiatui tura yurumkan Súsartatui .

text: And if he shall come in the second watch , or come in the third watch , and find them so , blessed are those servants .
text2: Kashi ajapén taaksha tura tsawaana ai taaksha ni takarniurin Iwiáa pujuinian Wáinkiuinka , nu takarin shiir pujuiniawai .

text: And this know , that if the goodman of the house had known what hour the thief would come , he would have watched , and not have suffered his house to be broken through .
text2: Tura jusha nekaatarum . Jeenniua nu , kasa Tátinian nékaitkiunka , Iwiáa pujusaayi . Kasa Wayá kasamkatniun suritkiaayi .

text: Be ye therefore ready also : for the Son of man cometh at an hour when ye think not .
text2: Atumsha Núnisrumek , anearum pujustarum . Wi Aents Ajasu tutai aya aneachmanum Tátatjai " Tímiayi .

text: Then Peter said unto him , Lord , speakest thou this parable unto us , or even to all ?
text2: Nuyá Pítiur aniasmiayi " ṡAya ínkik unuiniartaj tusam nu métek - taku chicham Támek . Kame Ashí nekaawarat tusamek tame ? ' Tímiayi .

text: And the Lord said , Who then is that faithful and wise steward , whom his lord shall make ruler over his household , to give them their portion of meat in due season ?
text2: Tutai Jesus Tímiayi " Atumsha pénker takatan Wáinniua Núnisketrume . Takatan Wáinin ni uuntri takatrin takainia nuna , Yurumátin jeamtai , ayurkamna Núiti ni uuntrin shiir umirna nu , tura pénker Enentáimtana nu .

text: Blessed is that servant , whom his lord when he cometh shall find so doing .
text2: Ni uuntri taa , takatrin Tímiatrusan Túran Wáinkiuinkia nu Wáinniusha shiir Enentáimsamniaiti .

text: Of a truth I say unto you , that he will make him ruler over all that he hath .
text2: Umirin asamtai , ni uuntri Ashí ni waririn Wáitrukat tusa apujsattawai . Nuna paant Tájarme .

text: But and if that servant say in his heart , My lord delayeth his coming ; and shall begin to beat the menservants and maidens , and to eat and drink , and to be drunken ;
text2: Tura nu takatan Wáinniusha " úuntur wau Táchattawai " tu Enentáimias , ni uuntri takarniurin yajauch awajeakuinkia tura ninki ti Yurumá , ti umar nampeakuinkia ,

text: The lord of that servant will come in a day when he looketh not for him , and at an hour when he is not aware , and will cut him in sunder , and will appoint him his portion with the unbelievers .
text2: nuinkia ni uuntri ni Nákachmanum aya aneachma taa ti Asutiáttawai . Umichu pujuinia nui akupkattawai . '

text: And that servant , which knew his lord ' s will , and prepared not himself , neither did according to his will , shall be beaten with many stripes .
text2: ` Takarin ni uuntri wakera nuna nékayat , iwiartsuk umitsuk pujakka ti awatramu átatui .

text: But he that knew not , and did commit things worthy of stripes , shall be beaten with few stripes . For unto whomsoever much is given , of him shall be much required : and to whom men have committed much , of him they will ask the more .
text2: Túrasha takarin nékachu asa , Asutniámnia Túrakka , ishichik awatnartatui . Núkap susamu ana Núnaka Núkap seawartatui . Núkap ataksamu ana Núnaka Núnisan nankaamas seawartatui . '

text: I am come to send fire on the earth ; and what will I if it be already kindled ?
text2: ` Jijiai nekapsatniua Nútiksanak nunkanam jinia ikiapartaj tusan tamajai . Tura Túrunat tusan ti wakerajai .

text: But I have a baptism to be baptized with ; and how am I straitened till it be accomplished !
text2: Imiantinia Núnisan itiurchat ukatruktatui . Nusha Wárik amuukat tusan ti wakerajai .

text: Suppose ye that I am come to give peace on earth ? I tell you , Nay ; but rather division :
text2: " Ashí shuar shiir pujusarat tusa Táwiti " tu Enentáimturumek . Núchaiti . Antsu shuar tesanairat tusan Táwitjai .

text: For from henceforth there shall be five in one house divided , three against two , and two against three .
text2: Yamái jukimiutak Chikichík shuarnum senku ainia nu akannakartatui ; menaintiu shuar ni shuarin Jímiaran nakitrartatui . Jímiarsha ni shuarin menaintiun nakitrartatui .

text: The father shall be divided against the son , and the son against the father ; the mother against the daughter , and the daughter against the mother ; the mother in law against her daughter in law , and the daughter in law against her mother in law .
text2: Apasha ni Uchirín nakitrattawai . Núnisan uchisha ni Aparín nakitrattawai . Nukusha ni nawantrin nakitrattawai , nawantrisha Nukurín nakitrattawai . Tsatsarisha ni najatin nakitrattawai ; najatisha tsatsarin nakitrattawai . "

text: And he said also to the people , When ye see a cloud rise out of the west , straightway ye say , There cometh a shower ; and so it is .
text2: Jesus aentsun chicharuk junasha Tímiayi " Atumsha nantu akaatainmaani kiarmatai " yutuktatui " Tátsurmek . Nusha nekas Tárume .

text: And when ye see the south wind blow , ye say , There will be heat ; and it cometh to pass .
text2: Tura anaarania nase Násenkamtai " séejik átatui " Tárume . Tura nekas Tárume .

text: Ye hypocrites , ye can discern the face of the sky and of the earth ; but how is it that ye do not discern this time ?
text2: Yuranminmasha nunkanmasha Túruna nu nékarme . Túmaitiatrumsha ju tsawantai Túrunattana nusha ṡitiura nékatsrum ? ḂMaaj , ántraitrume ! "

text: Yea , and why even of yourselves judge ye not what is right ?
text2: ` Túrasha pénker ana nusha ṡurukamtai atumek Enentáimsarum Wáintsuram ?

text: When thou goest with thine adversary to the magistrate , as thou art in the way , give diligence that thou mayest be delivered from him ; lest he hale thee to the judge , and the judge deliver thee to the officer , and the officer cast thee into prison .
text2: Irutramuram uuntnum Júramkuinkia jintia wésamek " nuamtak iwiarartai " Titiá . Túrachkumninkia akupniunam juramkittiame . Tura niisha suntarnum akuptamkattame . Tura niisha sepunam enketmattawai .

text: I tell thee , thou shalt not depart thence , till thou hast paid the very last mite .
text2: Tura nekas tajai , nui enkemamka Ashí rearchisha akikmachkumka Jíinkishtatme " Tímiayi .

text: There were present at that season some that told him of the Galilaeans , whose blood Pilate had mingled with their sacrifices .
text2: Nu tsawantin Chícham ujaktai tusar Jesusan tariarmiayi . Kariréa nunkanam Israer - shuar ni waakarin Máawar Yus susatai tusar pujuiniai , Piratu niin maa , nuna numpen waaka numpejai pachimpramun ujakarmiayi .

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , Suppose ye that these Galilaeans were sinners above all the Galilaeans , because they suffered such things ?
text2: Tura Jesus Tímiayi " ṡWarí Enentáimsarum ? Kariréanmaya aishman Tárumna nu , Chíkich Kariréanmaya aishmanjai nankaamas yajauch ásar Túrunawarai ṡtu Enentáimprumek ?

text: I tell you , Nay : but , except ye repent , ye shall all likewise perish .
text2: Atsá ; Atumí Enentái Yapajiáchkurmeka Núnisrumek atumsha jakattarme . Nuna paant Tájarme , Tímiayi .

text: Or those eighteen , upon whom the tower in Siloam fell , and slew them , think ye that they were sinners above all men that dwelt in Jerusalem ?
text2: Tura Tiasiúchu aishman Yakí jea Seruí kupiniak iniaak nekenkarmiania nu , ṡWarí Enentáimtarum ? Chíkich Jerusarénnumia shuarjai nankaamas Tunáa ásar Túrunawarai ṡtu Enentáimprumek ?

text: I tell you , Nay : but , except ye repent , ye shall all likewise perish .
text2: Atsá , Tájarme . Atumí Enentái Yapajiáchkurmeka Núnisrumek atumsha jakattarme . "

text: He spake also this parable ; A certain man had a fig tree planted in his vineyard ; and he came and sought fruit thereon , and found none .
text2: Junasha Jesus métek - taku chichaman Tímiauyi . Júiti : Shuar ni ajariin iikiu numin araamun takakuyi . Nerekchiash tusa iyumai . Túrasha nere atsumai .

text: Then said he unto the dresser of his vineyard , Behold , these three years I come seeking fruit on this fig tree , and find none : cut it down ; why cumbereth it the ground ?
text2: Nuinkia ni ajarin Wáinniun timiai " Antukta , Menaintiú uwitin juna nere átai tusan Waketrú pujajai ; Túrasha penké Wáinkiachjai . Ajakta . ṡUrukamtai ántrash wajastata ? "

text: And he answering said unto him , Lord , let it alone this year also , till I shall dig about it , and dung it :
text2: Tutai Ajá Wáinin timiai " Atsá , Uuntá ; ju uwitin Wajastí . Wajamurin takarsatjai tura pénker nunkan matsatkatjai .

text: And if it bear fruit , well : and if not , then after that thou shalt cut it down .
text2: Nujai nerekchampiash . Tura tuke nereachkuinkia nuinkia ajakta " timiai " , Tímiayi .

text: And he was teaching in one of the synagogues on the sabbath .
text2: Ayampratin tsawantai Israer - shuar iruntai jeanam Jesus unuiniak pujumiayi .

text: And , behold , there was a woman which had a spirit of infirmity eighteen years , and was bowed together , and could in no wise lift up herself .
text2: Nuisha nuwa pujumiayi . Nu nuwasha Tiasiúchu uwitin tuke jaa pujumiayi . Iwianch niin yajauch awajas apuna tuke ikiaramiayi . Túramu asa Pankái nakuenkataj Tukamá penké tujinmiayi .

text: And when Jesus saw her , he called her to him , and said unto her , Woman , thou art loosed from thine infirmity .
text2: Jesus nuna Wáiniak , chicharuk " Nawantrú , ame jaamurmiya ankant ajasume " Tímiayi .

text: And he laid his hands on her : and immediately she was made straight , and glorified God .
text2: Nuna tinia ni uwejejai antinmiayi . Tura Nú chichamaik nuwasha Pankái nakuenkamiayi . Tura Yusa Náarin uunt awajsamiayi .

text: And the ruler of the synagogue answered with indignation , because that Jesus had healed on the sabbath day , and said unto the people , There are six days in which men ought to work : in them therefore come and be healed , and not on the sabbath day .
text2: Tura Jesus ayampratin tsawantai tsuaru asamtai , iruntai jea uuntri kajek iruntrarmia nuna Tímiayi " Sais tsawantin takaschatniukait ; ayampratin tsawantai Tsuámartaj tusarum Táchatniuitrume . Sais tsawant ana nui Tátiniaitrume . "

text: The Lord then answered him , and said , Thou hypocrite , doth not each one of you on the sabbath loose his ox or his ass from the stall , and lead him away to watering ?
text2: Tura Jesus Tímiayi , " ḂAntar chichamtinia ! ṡatumi waakarisha atumi umpuururisha yumi aartai tusarum ayampratin tsawantin Atíarum Júatsrumek ?

text: And ought not this woman , being a daughter of Abraham , whom Satan hath bound , lo , these eighteen years , be loosed from this bond on the sabbath day ?
text2: Tura ju nuwasha , atumi shuari Apraám shuarnumia akiiniaiti . Nii Tiasiúchu Uwí Satanás yajauch awajsamujai jinkiamuyayi . Nincha ayampratin tsawant ain yajauch awajsamunmaya Atíachminkiait " Tímiayi .

text: And when he had said these things , all his adversaries were ashamed : and all the people rejoiced for all the glorious things that were done by him .
text2: Jesus nuna takui ni nemasrisha natsaararmiayi . Tura penké shuar ni pénker Túramurin Wáinkiar warasarmiayi .

text: Then said he , Unto what is the kingdom of God like ? and whereunto shall I resemble it ?
text2: Nuyá Jesus Tímiayi " ṡYusa akupeamuri warijiain métek - takuit ?

text: It is like a grain of mustard seed , which a man took , and cast into his garden ; and it grew , and waxed a great tree ; and the fowls of the air lodged in the branches of it .
text2: Mustasa Jinkiáijiai métek - takuiti . Mustasa jinkiaincha shuar ni ajariin araamiayi . Tsapái , tsakaak , uunt numi ajasmiayi . Ti uunt asamtai chinki ni kanawen pasunmarmiayi . "

text: And again he said , Whereunto shall I liken the kingdom of God ?
text2: Tura junasha Tímiayi : " ṡYusa akupeamuri warijiain métek - takuit ?

text: It is like leaven , which a woman took and hid in three measures of meal , till the whole was leavened .
text2: Tanta wakaprutaia métek - takuiti . Arinia Núkap ana nui nuwa wakaprutain ishichik Enkeámiayi . Túram Ashí wakapruamiayi . " Tu Tímiayi .

text: And he went through the cities and villages , teaching , and journeying toward Jerusalem .
text2: Jesus Jerusarénnum jeattsa weak Untsurí peprunam Wayá unuiniarkutak wémiayi .

text: Then said one unto him , Lord , are there few that be saved ? And he said unto them ,
text2: Weai Chíkich shuar aniasmiayi " Uuntá , ṡuwemainia nu ishichkikiait ? "

text: Strive to enter in at the strait gate : for many , I say unto you , will seek to enter in , and shall not be able .
text2: Tutai Jesus Tímiayi " Yupikiach Wáitiniam wayataj tusam ti wakeritiarum . Kame Untsurí wayataj tusar wakeriartatui , Túrasha tujinkiartatui , Tájarme .

text: When once the master of the house is risen up , and hath shut to the door , and ye begin to stand without , and to knock at the door , saying , Lord , Lord , open unto us ; and he shall answer and say unto you , I know you not whence ye are :
text2: Jeá nérenniuri Wáitin epenmiatai , atumsha aa wajarum nu , Wáitiniam wajasrum Untsúakrum " Uuntá , uratritia " Títiatrume . Túrasha " Nékatsjarme . ṡTuyantskaitrum ? " turamtatrume .

text: Then shall ye begin to say , We have eaten and drunk in thy presence , and thou hast taught in our streets .
text2: Nuyá átum Títiatrume " Túrasha , Uuntá , iisha ámijiai Yurumámji , ámijiai umarmaji . Tura ii péprurincha unuiniamame . "

text: But he shall say , I tell you , I know you not whence ye are ; depart from me , all ye workers of iniquity .
text2: Túrasha nii Títiatui " Tuyantskaitrum , nékatsjarme , Tátsujrumek . Yajauch Túrintirmeka winiyanka kanaktiarum . " '

text: There shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth , when ye shall see Abraham , and Isaac , and Jacob , and all the prophets , in the kingdom of God , and you yourselves thrust out .
text2: ` Nuyá Apraámsha , Isaksha , Jakupsha tura Ashí Yúsnan etserin Yus akupeana nui wayawaru Wáinkiarum tura aa ajapam pujusrum ti uutkuram naim Tásarara ajattarme .

text: And they shall come from the east , and from the west , and from the north , and from the south , and shall sit down in the kingdom of God .
text2: Tura Yus akupeana nui , nantu tatainmaaniyasha nantu akaatainmaaniyasha , arakiasha , nunkaaniasha taar , imia Israer - shuarchaitiat Yurumátai tusar pujusartatui . Tura atumsha , " Apraám Shuáraitjai " Táyatrum , wayashtatrume .

text: And , behold , there are last which shall be first , and there are first which shall be last .
text2: Nuisha Yamái ukunmaani ainia nusha emka ártatui ; tura Yamái emka ainia nusha nuisha ukunmaani ártatui . "

text: The same day there came certain of the Pharisees , saying unto him , Get thee out , and depart hence : for Herod will kill thee .
text2: Nu tsawantai Pariséu aents Jesusan tariar tiarmiayi " Erutis mantamattsa wakerutmawai . Tuma asamtai juyanka Wetá . "

text: And he said unto them , Go ye , and tell that fox , Behold , I cast out devils , and I do cures to day and to morrow , and the third day I shall be perfected .
text2: Tutai Jesus Tímiayi " Werum nu kujancham ju titiarum : " Iistá . Yamaisha ishichik tsawant iwianchin Jíikin akupkartajai ; Túran jaancha Tsuárartajai . Tura ukunam amuktatjai . "

text: Nevertheless I must walk to day , and to morrow , and the day following : for it cannot be that a prophet perish out of Jerusalem .
text2: Tura Jerusarénnumaani ishichik tsawant tuke wétiniaitjai . Yúsnan etserin aya Jerusarénnuman Jákatniuiti . '

text: O Jerusalem , Jerusalem , which killest the prophets , and stonest them that are sent unto thee ; how often would I have gathered thy children together , as a hen doth gather her brood under her wings , and ye would not !
text2: ` ḂJerusarénnumiatiram , Yúsnan etserin Máiniaitrume ; tura Yus akatar akupturmakmania nusha kayajai tukurum Máiniaitrume ! Tuma ain atash ni shiamprin etektana Núnisnak Wisha weaktasan wakerimjiarme , Túrasha nakitramarme .

text: Behold , your house is left unto you desolate : and verily I say unto you , Ye shall not see me , until the time come when ye shall say , Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord .
text2: Iistarum . Atumniasha Yus ajapramaitrume . Tura " Yusa Náariin winiana nu , shiir Atí " Títiatrumna Nú tsawant jeatsain penké Wáitkiashtatrume . Nuna Tájarme " Tímiayi Jesus .

text: And it came to pass , as he went into the house of one of the chief Pharisees to eat bread on the sabbath day , that they watched him .
text2: Ayampratin tsawantai Pariséu uuntri jeen Jesus Yurumáttsa wémiayi . Tura Chíkich Pariséu wariniak Túrat tusar ii pujuarmiayi .

text: And , behold , there was a certain man before him which had the dropsy .
text2: Nui aishman eaak - jaa Jesus pujamunam naka pujumiayi .

text: And Jesus answering spake unto the lawyers and Pharisees , saying , Is it lawful to heal on the sabbath day ?
text2: Jintinniuncha Pariséuncha Jesus aniasmiayi " ṡWarí Tárum ? ṡAyampratin tsawantai jaa Tsuárminkiait . Tsuárchamniakait ? " Tímiayi .

text: And they held their peace . And he took him , and healed him , and let him go ;
text2: Tura niisha aimtsuk pujuarmiayi . Nuinkia jaan antin Tsuármiayi . Tura " shiir Wetá " Tímiayi .

text: And answered them , saying , Which of you shall have an ass or an ox fallen into a pit , and will not straightway pull him out on the sabbath day ?
text2: Nuyá Pariséun chicharuk , " Atumí umpuurarisha , waakarisha waa Táurmanum akaiki iniamtai , ayampratin tsawant ain nu chichamaik Júatsrumek " Tímiayi .

text: And they could not answer him again to these things .
text2: Takui aimkiatniun penké tujinkiarmiayi .

text: And he put forth a parable to those which were bidden , when he marked how they chose out the chief rooms ; saying unto them ,
text2: Ipiaamusha penkeri pujutainium pujustaitsar ti wakeruiniakui , Jesus nuna Wáiniak juna jintintramiayi :
