text2: Tura Jesus Pitruncha , Juánnasha akupeak " Paskua tutai Námper iwiaratarum " Tímiayi .

text: And they said unto him , Where wilt thou that we prepare ?
text2: Tutai niisha chichainiak " ṡTuí iwiarat tusamea wakeram ? " tiarmiayi .

text: And he said unto them , Behold , when ye are entered into the city , there shall a man meet you , bearing a pitcher of water ; follow him into the house where he entereth in .
text2: Tutai Jesus juna Tímiayi " Péprunam wetarum . Jearum aishman yumin takaku Wekáa Wáinkiattarme . Nú aishman nemarsatarum . Tura Jeá wayaakui ,

text: And ye shall say unto the goodman of the house , The Master saith unto thee , Where is the guestchamber , where I shall eat the passover with my disciples ?
text2: Nú jea nérenniuri chichareakrum " Uunt chichartamuk unuiniamurjai paskua Yurumátin ṡtui aa ? turamui " titiarum , Tímiayi .

text: And he shall shew you a large upper room furnished : there make ready .
text2: Tákurmin nu nérentin Yakí Písunam uunt Kuártun Ashí iwiaramun iniakturmastatrume . Nui ii Yurumátin iwiaratarum " Tímiayi .

text: And they went , and found as he had said unto them : and they made ready the passover .
text2: Tutai niisha wear Jesus Tímiania Tímiatrusan Wáinkiarmiayi . Tura paskua namperan nui iwiararmiayi .

text: And when the hour was come , he sat down , and the twelve apostles with him .
text2: Yurumátin jeamtai ni unuiniamurijiai Jesus misanam pujusarmiayi .

text: And he said unto them , With desire I have desired to eat this passover with you before I suffer :
text2: Pujusarmatai , Jesus chichaak " Wisha Játsuk atumjai ju paskua najanatniun ti wakerimjai ,

text: For I say unto you , I will not any more eat thereof , until it be fulfilled in the kingdom of God .
text2: atakka ju nunkanam atumjai najanashtin asan . Tura antsu Yus akupeana nui jear atak najanattaji " Tímiayi .

text: And he took the cup , and gave thanks , and said , Take this , and divide it among yourselves :
text2: Nuyá pininkian achik , Yúsan yuminkias , ni unuiniamurin Tímiayi " Ju pinin achikrum sunaisatarum .

text: For I say unto you , I will not drink of the fruit of the vine , until the kingdom of God shall come .
text2: Atakka ju nunkanam uwa yumirin atumjai umarchattajai , tajarme . Tura antsu Yus akupin ajastin jeamtai atak iijiai umartatji " Tímiayi .

text: And he took bread , and gave thanks , and brake it , and gave unto them , saying , This is my body which is given for you : this do in remembrance of me .
text2: Nuyasha yurumkan achik , Yúsan yuminkias puuk susarmiayi . Tura chicharainiak " Juka winia ayashruiti . Winia ayashur atum pénker pujustinnium surunkattana Núiti . Winia Enentáimtursarum yuatarum " Tímiayi .

text: Likewise also the cup after supper , saying , This cup is the new testament in my blood , which is shed for you .
text2: Tura yurumsua amikiarmatai pininkian achik , " Ju pinin winia numparun nakumea asa uwempratin yamaram chicham najanamun nakumeawai . Winia numpar atumnian puartamprattawai ' Tímiayi .

text: But , behold , the hand of him that betrayeth me is with me on the table .
text2: ` Túrasha winia surutkattana nu Wijiai métek ju misanam pujawai .

text: And truly the Son of man goeth , as it was determined : but woe unto that man by whom he is betrayed !
text2: Kame Wi , Aents Ajasuitjiana ju , Yus iwiaramua Nútiksanak jakattajai . Túrasha Winia surutkana nu Nekaatí . Ti asutniattawai " Tímiayi .

text: And they began to inquire among themselves , which of them it was that should do this thing .
text2: Nuna antukar " Wíashitiaj , Yákit " tunaim ajarmiayi .

text: And there was also a strife among them , which of them should be accounted the greatest .
text2: " ṡIijiai yaki Imiá nankaamantu aint ? " tunaim ajarmiayi .

text: And he said unto them , The kings of the Gentiles exercise lordship over them ; and they that exercise authority upon them are called benefactors .
text2: Tura Jesus Tímiayi " Ju nunkanam akupin ainia nu , waantu Enentáimtumasar akupenawai . Tura akupenakui " pénker Túrin ainiawai " Tuíniawai .

text: But ye shall not be so : but he that is greatest among you , let him be as the younger ; and he that is chief , as he that doth serve .
text2: Tura atumjainkia nuka Atsutí . Antsu nankaamantu ana nu , uchichia Núnik ajastiniaiti ; akupeana nusha takarniua Núnik ajastiniaiti .

text: For whether is greater , he that sitteth at meat , or he that serveth ? is not he that sitteth at meat ? but I am among you as he that serveth .
text2: Enentáimsatarum . Misanam pujus yurumna nu , yurumkan ajamana nujai ṡTuá Imiá nekas nankaamantuit ? ṡYurumna nu nekas nankaamantuchukait ? Tura Wisha atumin yurumkan ajamna Núnisnak pujajai . '

text: Ye are they which have continued with me in my temptations .
text2: ` Winia itiurchatrun Wáinmiaj nui atumsha Wijiai tuke pujumarme .

text: And I appoint unto you a kingdom , as my Father hath appointed unto me ;
text2: Tuma asakrumin akupin ajastinian winia Apar surusu asamtai Wisha Nútiksanak akupkatniun Súajrume . Wi akupkatjana nui atumsha Wijiai Yurumáttarme , tura Wijiai umartatrume , Tájarme .

text: That ye may eat and drink at my table in my kingdom , and sit on thrones judging the twelve tribes of Israel .
text2: Tura akupin pujutainium pujusrum , Israer - shuar tuse írutkamu akupkattarme tajai . " Tu Tímiayi .

text: And the Lord said , Simon , Simon , behold , Satan hath desired to have you , that he may sift you as wheat :
text2: Nuyá Uunt Jesus Tímiayi , " Nekaatá , Semunká . Trikiu neré Tsatsamátniua aintsan Satanás atumi Enentáin Páchim Enentáimtikramprataj tusa seayi .

text: But I have prayed for thee , that thy faith fail not : and when thou art converted , strengthen thy brethren .
text2: Tuma ain Yus Enentáimtustinian kajinmatkiin tusan Wisha Yúsan seamjai . Tura Yúsnum waketkim ame yatsum Ikiakárarta " Tímiayi .

text: And he said unto him , Lord , I am ready to go with thee , both into prison , and to death .
text2: Tutai Semun Tímiayi " Uuntá , sepunam enketmainiakuisha wisha nemarsatajme . Tura mantamainiakuisha métek jakatjai " Tímiayi .

text: And he said , I tell thee , Peter , the cock shall not crow this day , before that thou shalt thrice deny that thou knowest me .
text2: Tutai Jesus Tímiayi " Pitrú , nekas Tájame , yamaik atash shiniatsain ame Menaintiú natsantrurtatme " Tímiayi .

text: And he said unto them , When I sent you without purse , and scrip , and shoes , lacked ye any thing ? And they said , Nothing .
text2: Nuyá Jesus Tímiayi " Wisha yurumkajainchu , Kuítjainchu , sapatjainchu akupkamjarmena nui ṡTáatramsamkarum ? " Niisha " Atsá penké Táatramsachmaji " tiarmiayi .

text: Then said he unto them , But now , he that hath a purse , let him take it , and likewise his scrip : and he that hath no sword , let him sell his garment , and buy one .
text2: Tutai Nii Tímiayi " Antsu yamaikia yurumkan takakkunka Takustí , Kuítniasha Núnisan ; tura puniancha takakchakka ni pushirin suruk punian sumakti .

text: For I say unto you , that this that is written must yet be accomplished in me , And he was reckoned among the transgressors : for the things concerning me have an end .
text2: Nekaatarum . Yus - Papinium yaunchu aarma ana nu wi Túrunamujai uminkiattawai . Juiti aarma : Yajauch shuarnum pachikiarmiayi . Warí , Yus - Papinium Ashí Winia aarma ana nu uminkiatniuiti . "

text: And they said , Lord , behold , here are two swords . And he said unto them , It is enough .
text2: Tutai ni unuiniamuri tiarmiayi " Uuntá , jui Jimiará Puniá awai . " Tutai Niisha " Asati " Tímiayi .

text: And he came out , and went , as he was wont , to the mount of Olives ; and his disciples also followed him .
text2: Nuyá Jesus Jíinkimiayi . Tura tuke Túrin asa Uriwiu Náinnium wémiayi . Ni unuiniamurisha nemariarmiayi .

text: And when he was at the place , he said unto them , Pray that ye enter not into temptation .
text2: Ai Jeá niin chicharuk " Itiurchat winiakui iniaraij tusarum Yus áujsatarum " Tímiayi .

text: And he was withdrawn from them about a stone ' s cast , and kneeled down , and prayed ,
text2: Tuasua amik arantach , kaya nankimiam jeana Núnik Jesus wémiayi . Tura Yúsan áujsataj tusa tikishmarmiayi .

text: Saying , Father , if thou be willing , remove this cup from me : nevertheless not my will , but thine , be done .
text2: Tikishmar juna Tímiayi " Apawá , pininnum Yapá umartinia ántsan Wi Wáitsattajna nu wakerakmeka jurutkitia . Tura Wi wakerajna nucha antsu Ame wakeramna nu Atí , tajai " Tímiayi .

text: And there appeared an angel unto him from heaven , strengthening him .
text2: Nuyá , Ikiakártaj tusa Yusa suntari nayaimpinmaya tarimiayi .

text: And being in an agony he prayed more earnestly : and his sweat was as it were great drops of blood falling down to the ground .
text2: Tura Jesus Imiá Wáitias pujak Nú kakaram Yúsan áujsamiayi . Tura ni searmarisha Numpá ántsan Nunká kitiawarmiayi .

text: And when he rose up from prayer , and was come to his disciples , he found them sleeping for sorrow ,
text2: Yúsan aujsua amik wajaki ni unuiniamurin werimiayi . Tura Kúntuts Enentáimmiarijiai ti pimpiki Kanúu tepenan tarimiayi .

text: And said unto them , Why sleep ye ? rise and pray , lest ye enter into temptation .
text2: Nuinkia chicharainiak " ṡUrukamtai Kanúu teparum ? Itiurchat winiakui iniaraij tusarum nantakrum Yus áujsatarum ' Tímiayi .

text: And while he yet spake , behold a multitude , and he that was called Judas , one of the twelve , went before them , and drew near unto Jesus to kiss him .
text2: Jesus tuke chichaa pujai , Untsurí shuar Táarmiayi . Tura Nuní eemka Jesusa unuiniamuri Jútas naartin winimiayi . Tura Jesusan mukunatajtsa tarunmiayi .

text: But Jesus said unto him , Judas , betrayest thou the Son of man with a kiss ?
text2: Támatai Jesus chicharuk " Jútasá , ṡAents Ajasu tutai mukunamek surutkattam ? " Tímiayi .

text: When they which were about him saw what would follow , they said unto him , Lord , shall we smite with the sword ?
text2: Jesusjai pujuarmia nu , Túmamun Wáinkiar " ṡUunt puniajai íjiuartatjik ? " tiarmiayi .

text: And one of them smote the servant of the high priest , and cut off his right ear .
text2: Tura chikichik Patri uuntri Takarniurí kuishin untsuurin tsupirkamiayi .

text: And Jesus answered and said , Suffer ye thus far . And he touched his ear , and healed him .
text2: Tura Jesus Tímiayi " Iniaisatarum . " Nuna tinia ni kuishin antin Tsuármiayi .

text: Then Jesus said unto the chief priests , and captains of the temple , and the elders , which were come to him , Be ye come out , as against a thief , with swords and staves ?
text2: Nuyá Israer - patri uuntrin , Yus - jea uuntrincha , tura pepru uuntrincha , Niin achiktaj tusa tariarmia nuna chicharuk " ṡWisha kasakaitiaj . Urukamtai puniajaisha numijiaisha tarutniuram ?

text: When I was daily with you in the temple , ye stretched forth no hands against me : but this is your hour , and the power of darkness .
text2: Nuik Yusa Uunt Jeen tuke tsawant atumjai pujumaj nui achirkachmarme . Túrasha átum kiritniumia kakarmajai nupetkatin Yamái tsawantin tsankatkamuitrume " Tímiayi Jesus .

text: Then took they him , and led him , and brought him into the high priest ' s house . And Peter followed afar off .
text2: Nuinkia Jesusan achikiar emetawar Israer - patri uuntri jeen Júkiarmiayi . Tura Pítrusha íkian nemarki wémiayi .

text: And when they had kindled a fire in the midst of the hall , and were set down together , Peter sat down among them .
text2: Tura aach jinia Ikiapárarmiayi . Túrawar anamuk pujuarmiayi . Pítrusha niijiai pujusmiayi .

text: But a certain maid beheld him as he sat by the fire , and earnestly looked upon him , and said , This man was also with him .
text2: Tura nuwa , Patri takarniuri amia nu , Pítiur jinia anamuk pujan Wáiniak " Ju aishmansha Niijiai pujumiayi " Tímiayi .

text: And he denied him , saying , Woman , I know him not .
text2: Tutai Pítiur chichaak " Nuwá , Niin nékatsjai " Tímiayi .

text: And after a little while another saw him , and said , Thou art also of them . And Peter said , Man , I am not .
text2: Tura árusan Chíkich niin Wáiniak " Amesha Niin Páchitkiaitme " Tímiayi . Tutai Pítiur Tímiayi " Atsá . Wikia ainkia Páchitkiatsjai " Tímiayi .

text: And about the space of one hour after another confidently affirmed , saying , Of a truth this fellow also was with him : for he is a Galilaean .
text2: Chikichik ura nankaamasmatai Chíkich apach chichaak " Nekas ju aishmansha Niijiai pujumiayi . Warí , niisha Kariréanmayanchakait " Tímiayi .

text: And Peter said , Man , I know not what thou sayest . And immediately , while he yet spake , the cock crew .
text2: Tutai Pítiur chichaak " Ame Támena Núnaka nékatsjai " Tímiayi . Nú chichamaik Pítiur Chicháa pujain ~ ki atash shiniukmiayi .

text: And the Lord turned , and looked upon Peter . And Peter remembered the word of the Lord , how he had said unto him , Before the cock crow , thou shalt deny me thrice .
text2: Tura nuinkia Uunt Jesus Pítrun apajas iismiayi . Túra " atash shiniatsain ame menaintiu natsantrurtatme " Uunt Jesus timia nuna Enentáimpramiayi .

text: And Peter went out , and wept bitterly .
text2: Nuyá Pítiur jiinki ti uutmiayi .

text: And the men that held Jesus mocked him , and smote him .
text2: Aishman Jesusan Wáiniarmiania nu ti wishikiainiak awattiarmiayi .

text: And when they had blindfolded him , they struck him on the face , and asked him , saying , Prophesy , who is it that smote thee ?
text2: Jiin epetkar yapiniam awattiar chicharainiak " Nekamata , ya awatama " tiarmiayi .

text: And many other things blasphemously spake they against him .
text2: Tura katsekainiak ti Untsurí chikichnasha Nánkamas tiarmiayi .

text: And as soon as it was day , the elders of the people and the chief priests and the scribes came together , and led him into their council , saying ,
text2: Tsawarmatai , Israer - shuara uuntrisha , Israer - patri uuntrisha , Israer - shuara jintinniurisha iruntrar ni iruntairiin ejeniarmiayi . Nui chicharainiak

text: Art thou the Christ ? tell us . And he said unto them , If I tell you , ye will not believe :
text2: " Paant Titiá . ṡYus anaikiamu Kristu tutaia Núkaitiam ? " tiarmiayi . Tutai Jesus Tímiayi " Wi " ee " Tákuisha , " nekasaiti " Tíchattarme .

text: And if I also ask you , ye will not answer me , nor let me go .
text2: Tura Wi Aníamsha airkashtatrume , Túrasha akuptukchattarme .

text: Hereafter shall the Son of man sit on the right hand of the power of God .
text2: Tura Wárik Wisha Aents Ajasuitjiana nu , Ashí nankaamaku ajasan , Yusa untsuurini pujustatjai " Tímiayi .

text: Then said they all , Art thou then the Son of God ? And he said unto them , Ye say that I am .
text2: Tutai niisha tiarmiayi " ṡNuinkia amesha Yusa Uchirínkaitiam ? " Tutai Jesus Tímiayi " Ee , Wíitjai , átum Winia Túrutrum Núnisnak . "

text: And they said , What need we any further witness ? for we ourselves have heard of his own mouth .
text2: Tutai niisha tiarmiayi " Warí , ṡiisha Chíkich ujatkat tusar atsumajik ? Imia ninki chichaamu antukchajik " tiarmiayi .

text: And the whole multitude of them arose , and led him unto Pilate .
text2: Nuyá Ashí Uunt iruntrarmia nu wajatkiar Rúmanmaya akupin Piratuí Jesusan Júkiarmiayi .

text: And they began to accuse him , saying , We found this fellow perverting the nation , and forbidding to give tribute to Caesar , saying that he himself is Christ a King .
text2: Nui jeawar , Piratun chicharainiak " Ju aishman ii shuaran awajimtikiar Enentáimtikiainia nu nekaamji . Rúmanmaya uunt akupin Sésaran kuit akiktinian suritramaji . Tura nu arant Ninki , akupin Kristu tutaintjai , tawai " tiarmiayi .

text: And Pilate asked him , saying , Art thou the King of the Jews ? And he answered him and said , Thou sayest it .
text2: Tutai Piratu Jesusan chicharuk " ṡAme Israer - shuara Akupniurinkáitiam ? " Tímiayi . Tutai Jesus Tímiayi " Ee , Núitjai , ame Támena Núnisnak . "

text: Then said Pilate to the chief priests and to the people , I find no fault in this man .
text2: Nuyá Israer - patri uuntrincha tura aents nui iruntrarmia nunasha Piratu chicharainiak " Ju aishman tunaan Túran penké Wáinkiachuitjai , tajai " Tímiayi .

text: And they were the more fierce , saying , He stirreth up the people , teaching throughout all Jewry , beginning from Galilee to this place .
text2: Túrasha niisha Nú kakantar chicharainiak " Antsu nekas Ashí Jutía nunkanmaya aentsun ni unuiniana nujai akajenawai . Kariréa nunkanmaya nankaamas ímiajaisha tayi " Tímiayi .

text: When Pilate heard of Galilee , he asked whether the man were a Galilaean .
text2: Piratusha nuna antuk " Nu aishman ṡKariréanmayankáit ? " Tímiayi .

text: And as soon as he knew that he belonged unto Herod ' s jurisdiction , he sent him to Herod , who himself also was at Jerusalem at that time .
text2: " Ee " tuiniakui , Erutisan akuptukarmiayi . Erutiska Kariréanmaya aentsun akupniuyayi . Túmaitiat nu tsawantin Jerusarénnum ishichik tsawant pujusmiayi .

text: And when Herod saw Jesus , he was exceeding glad : for he was desirous to see him of a long season , because he had heard many things of him ; and he hoped to have seen some miracle done by him .
text2: Erutiska Jesusan iistaj tusa ti wakerimiayi . Jesusa Túramurin áujmatman ti antukmiayi . Tuma asa , " Wi iimiai aents tujintiamun Túrashtimpiash " tusa Jesusan Wáiniak warasmiayi .

text: Then he questioned with him in many words ; but he answered him nothing .
text2: Jesusan ti nukap aniasmiayi ; Túramsha penké aimkiachmiayi .

text: And the chief priests and scribes stood and vehemently accused him .
text2: Nuisha Israer - patri uuntrisha , tura Israer - shuara jintinniurisha yajauchiiti tusar charaatum awajiarmiayi .

text: And Herod with his men of war set him at nought , and mocked him , and arrayed him in a gorgeous robe , and sent him again to Pilate .
text2: Tura Erutissha ni suntarijiai Jesusan yajauch Enentáimtuiniak Niin wishikiainiak ti penker pushin , akupniu entsatairiya ánniun , aentsrarmiayi . Nuyasha Erutis ataksha Piratuíin akupkamiayi .

text: And the same day Pilate and Herod were made friends together : for before they were at enmity between themselves .
text2: Túram nu tsawant Piratu Erutisjai nawamnaikiarmiayi . Kame Yáunchuka nemasnaikiau ármiayi .

text: And Pilate , when he had called together the chief priests and the rulers and the people ,
text2: Nuyá Israer - patri uuntrin aentsu uuntrijiai tura penké aentsjai Piratu ikiaanak Tímiayi

text: Said unto them , Ye have brought this man unto me , as one that perverteth the people : and , behold , I , having examined him before you , have found no fault in this man touching those things whereof ye accuse him :
text2: " Ju aishman aentsu awajimtikiui tusarum itiartintrume . Túrasha átum iimprumnin anintrusan yajauch átum Tárumna nuna penké nekarachjai .

text: No , nor yet Herod : for I sent you to him ; and , lo , nothing worthy of death is done unto him .
text2: Erutissha Núnisan yajauchin nekaachai . Warí , jui awainkichmaka . Nuikia Páantchakait Jú aishman jakamnia tunaanka Túrichuiti " Tímiayi .

text: ( For of necessity he must release one unto them at the feast . )
text2: Túraitiat tuke Túrutai asamtai , Jísat jeakui sepunmaya Chikichík aishmankan Piratu ankant akupkatin ámiayi . Tuma asamtai , nii chichaak " juna Asutián awematjai " Tímiayi .

text: And they cried out all at once , saying , Away with this man , and release unto us Barabbas :
text2: Tura aencha iruntrar ti untsumainiak " Atsá ; jucha . Ju nakitiaji . Antsu Parapás akupkata " tiarmiayi .

text: ( Who for a certain sedition made in the city , and for murder , was cast into prison . )
text2: Nu Parapássha akupniun nakitiak mesetan najana asa tura mankartin asa sepunam enkeamuyayi .

text: Pilate therefore , willing to release Jesus , spake again to them .
text2: Piratuka Jesusan akupkattsa wakerak ataksha aentsun áujsarmiayi .

text: But they cried , saying , Crucify him , crucify him .
text2: Túrasha Nú arant untsumainiak " Atsá . Krúsnum mantamnati " tiarmiayi .

text: And he said unto them the third time , Why , what evil hath he done ? I have found no cause of death in him : I will therefore chastise him , and let him go .
text2: Tura ataksha Piratu chicharainiak " ṡUrukamtai . Warí tunaan Túrait ? Jakamnia tunaan Túrachiash tusan , aniasan penké nekarachjai . Asutián akupkatjai " Tímiayi .

text: And they were instant with loud voices , requiring that he might be crucified . And the voices of them and of the chief priests prevailed .
text2: Tura niisha kakaram untsumainiak " Jesus mantamnati " tiarmiayi . Kame aencha tura Patri uuntrisha ti untsumaina ásarmatai ni wakeramuri tsankatnakarmiayi .

text: And Pilate gave sentence that it should be as they required .
text2: Nii wakeriarmia nuna Piratu " Túrattajai " Tímiayi .

text: And he released unto them him that for sedition and murder was cast into prison , whom they had desired ; but he delivered Jesus to their will .
text2: Tuma asa Parapásan , mesetan najanin tura mankartin amia nuna akupkamiayi . Tura Jesusnaka ni wakeramun Túrawarti tusa iiktusarmiayi .

text: And as they led him away , they laid hold upon one Simon , a Cyrenian , coming out of the country , and on him they laid the cross , that he might bear it after Jesus .
text2: Jesusan jukitiasa pujuiniai Serini nunkanmaya Semun ni pépruriya Jerusarénnum yama jeamiayi . Niin achikiar , Jesusa krusri ayantkar " ni ukuri Wetá " tiarmiayi .

text: And there followed him a great company of people , and of women , which also bewailed and lamented him .
text2: Untsurí aents Jesusan nemariarmiayi . Tura Untsurí nuwasha ti kuntuts Enentáimiainiak uutkiar tura wa - wa ajakiar wearmiayi .

text: But Jesus turning unto them said , Daughters of Jerusalem , weep not for me , but weep for yourselves , and for your children .
text2: Túmainiakui Jesus niin iis , " Jerusarénnumia nuwatiram Winia Enentáimtursarum uuttiirap . Antsu atumniak tura atumi uchiri Enentáimtusrum uuttiarum .

text: For , behold , the days are coming , in the which they shall say , Blessed are the barren , and the wombs that never bare , and the paps which never gave suck .
text2: Warí , ti iturchat tsawant jeawartatui . Tuma asamtai " Uchirtichu ainia nu , ajaprukchana nu tura amuntsachu ainia nu , Chíkich aentsjai nankaamas pénker pujuiniawai " tiartatui .

text: Then shall they begin to say to the mountains , Fall on us ; and to the hills , Cover us .
text2: Nu tsawantai aents chicharainiak " Náint iin nekentmak yuturmaartai " tiartatui .

text: For if they do these things in a green tree , what shall be done in the dry ?
text2: Warí , numi sameka ainis yajauch aya Nánkamna ainsha ju itiurchat átsuk . Tura numi kukaru ainkiamtai itiurak Nú yajauch Túrunachat ~ i . " Tu timiayi Jesus .

text: And there were also two other , malefactors , led with him to be put to death .
text2: Tura Jesusjai Krúsnum maatai tusar Jímiar yajauch aishmankan Júkiarmiayi .

text: And when they were come to the place , which is called Calvary , there they crucified him , and the malefactors , one on the right hand , and the other on the left .
text2: Karawír nain tutainium jeawar Jesusan Krúsnum ajintrurarmiayi . Tura Jesusa untsuurini Chikichík yajauch aishmankan tura ni menaarini Chíkich yajauch aishmankan Núnisan Krúsnum ajintrurarmiayi .

text: Then said Jesus , Father , forgive them ; for they know not what they do . And they parted his raiment , and cast lots .
text2: Tura Jesus Krúsnum ajintraku pujuram , chichaak " Apawá , tsankurarta . Nii aitkiainia nuna nékainiatsui " Tímiayi . Tura suntar pujuarmiania nu , yaki Jesusa pushiri jukit tusar nakurusarmiayi .

text: And the people stood beholding . And the rulers also with them derided him , saying , He saved others ; let him save himself , if he be Christ , the chosen of God .
text2: Péprunmaya aents ii wajatiarmiayi . Tura uunt armia nusha Niin wishikiainiak " Chikichnaka uwemtikniuiti . Wats , Yamái nekas Yusa anaikiamuri Kristu Tútainkiunka imia Ninki Uwémpratí " tiarmiayi .

text: And the soldiers also mocked him , coming to him , and offering him vinegar ,
text2: Suntarsha Niin wishikrarmiayi . Tariar Churuínian aartai tusar awajiarmiayi .

text: And saying , If thou be the king of the Jews , save thyself .
text2: Tura chicharainiak " Amesha nekas Israer - shuara uunt akupniurinkiumka amek uwemprata " tiarmiayi .

text: And a superscription also was written over him in letters of Greek , and Latin , and Hebrew , THIS IS THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Tura muuknumaani , Kriaku chichamjai , Rúmanmaya apach chichamjaisha tura Israer chichamjaisha ju aarar anujkamu ámiayi : JUITI ISRAER - SHUARA UUNT AKUPIN

text: And one of the malefactors which were hanged railed on him , saying , If thou be Christ , save thyself and us .
text2: Chikichík yajauch aishman nui ajintruamu amia nu Kátsekeak chicharuk " Amesha nekas Yusa anaikiamurintkiumka amek uwemprata tura incha uwemtikramprata " Tímiayi .

text: But the other answering rebuked him , saying , Dost not thou fear God , seeing thou art in the same condemnation ?
text2: Tura Chíkich ni tsaniakmarin kakantar chicharuk " ṡAmesha Niijiai métek Asutniátasa pujayatam , Yus ashamatsmek ? Tímiayi .

text: And we indeed justly ; for we receive the due reward of our deeds : but this man hath done nothing amiss .
text2: Iikia yajauch asar Wáitsatniuitji ; ii tunaari akikmakur Wáitiaji . Antsu ju aishmanka yajauchin Túrichuiti " Tímiayi .

text: And he said unto Jesus , Lord , remember me when thou comest into thy kingdom .
text2: Nuyá Jesusan chicharuk " Amesha akupin ajasam winiasha Enentáimtursata " Tímiayi .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Verily I say unto thee , To day shalt thou be with me in paradise .
text2: Tutai Jesus chicharuk " Nekas Tájame , jakar shiir pujutainium Yamái tsawant Wijiai pujustatme " Tímiayi .

text: And it was about the sixth hour , and there was a darkness over all the earth until the ninth hour .
text2: Tutupin ai Ashí nunkanam ti kirit ajasmiayi . Tura Menaintiú ura nankaamasu ain , nantu nunkaach ajassha tuke kirit ámiayi .

text: And the sun was darkened , and the veil of the temple was rent in the midst .
text2: Tsawái nantusha mushatmarmiayi . Tura Jerusarénnum Yusa Uunt Jeencha tarach ajamu aa Jímiapetek nakaakamiayi .

text: And when Jesus had cried with a loud voice , he said , Father , into thy hands I commend my spirit : and having said thus , he gave up the ghost .
text2: Nuyá Jesus untsumuk " Apawá , winia wakantrun Amiin ikiuajai " Tímiayi . Nuna tinia jakamiayi .

text: Now when the centurion saw what was done , he glorified God , saying , Certainly this was a righteous man .
text2: Suntara Kapitiántri nu Túrunamun Wáiniak , Yusa Náarin shiir awajeak " Jusha Imiá nekas pénker aishmankuyi " Tímiayi .

text: And all the people that came together to that sight , beholding the things which were done , smote their breasts , and returned .
text2: Tura Untsurí aents pujuarmia nu , nu Túrunamun Wáinkiar ti kuntuts Enentáimiainiak ni netsepen paat awatiar waketkiarmiayi .

text: And all his acquaintance , and the women that followed him from Galilee , stood afar off , beholding these things .
text2: Tura Jesusa amikrisha tura nuwa Kariréanmaya Niin nemariarmia nusha íkian wajasar ii wajarmiayi .

text: And , behold , there was a man named Joseph , a counseller ; and he was a good man , and a just :
text2: Naka Enentáimin pénker aishman ámiayi ni naari Jusé . Arimatéa pepru Jutía Núnkanam ana nuyauyayi . Israer - shuara Uunt Iruntairin Páchitkiauyayi .

text: ( The same had not consented to the counsel and deed of them ; ) he was of Arimathaea , a city of the Jews : who also himself waited for the kingdom of God .
text2: Yus ju nunkanam akupin ajasat tusa Jusé nakas pujumiayi . Tuma asa Uunt Iruntainium Jesusan Túrawarmia nuna nakitmiayi .

text: This man went unto Pilate , and begged the body of Jesus .
text2: Tuma asamtai Piratui we Jesusa ayashin seamiayi .

text: And he took it down , and wrapped it in linen , and laid it in a sepulchre that was hewn in stone , wherein never man before was laid .
text2: Piratu " ayu " takui , Jesusa ayashin Krúsnumia jusa tarachjai penuar kaya Táurmanum iwiarsamiayi . Nu Táurmanum Chíkich iwiarsachmauyayi .

text: And that day was the preparation , and the sabbath drew on .
text2: Iwiaratin tsawantai , ayampratin tsawant tsawastatuk ajasmatai Túrunamiayi .

text: And the women also , which came with him from Galilee , followed after , and beheld the sepulchre , and how his body was laid .
text2: Tura nuwa Kariréanmaya jukiniutak Jesusan nemarsarmia nusha iwiarsamunam weriar , Jesusa ayashi itiur ikiusmait nuna iisarmiayi .

text: And they returned , and prepared spices and ointments ; and rested the sabbath day according to the commandment .
text2: Iisar ikiuak ni jeen waketkiarmiayi . Tura Jesusa ayashi mejeenin tusar kunkuinian iwiararmiayi . Tura ayampratin tsawantai , Israer - shuar akupkamun umikiar ayamprarmiayi .

text: Now upon the first day of the week , very early in the morning , they came unto the sepulchre , bringing the spices which they had prepared , and certain others with them .
text2: Tumintin Káshik kunkuinian iwiaramun Júkiar nu nuwa Jesus iwiarsamunam weriarmiayi . Tura Chíkich nuwasha atampriarmiayi .

text: And they found the stone rolled away from the sepulchre .
text2: Tura iwiarsamu kaya atutkamu urani aan Wáinkiarmiayi .

text: And they entered in , and found not the body of the Lord Jesus .
text2: Tura wayawar uunt Jesusa ayashin Wáinkiacharmiayi .

text: And it came to pass , as they were much perplexed thereabout , behold , two men stood by them in shining garments :
text2: Wáinkiachu ásar ashamkarmiayi . Tura " itiurkatjik " tiarmiayi . Tumai Jimiará aishmankan pushin wincharpatniun entsaru niin ayaamach wajainian Wáinkiarmiayi .

text: And as they were afraid , and bowed down their faces to the earth , they said unto them , Why seek ye the living among the dead ?
text2: Nuna Wáinkiar ti sapijmiainiak tsuntsumawarmiayi . Túmakui nu aishman chicharainiak " ṡIwiaakusha urukamtai jakaanumsha earum ? tiarmiayi .

text: He is not here , but is risen : remember how he spake unto you when he was yet in Galilee ,
text2: Jui pujatsui . Antsu nantakni . Nékatsrumek . Niisha Kariréanam tuke pujus

text: Saying , The Son of man must be delivered into the hands of sinful men , and be crucified , and the third day rise again .
text2: " Wi , Aents Ajasuitjiana nu , yajauch aentsnum surunkattajai . Túran Krúsnum mantamnattajai . Tura Menaintiú tsawantai nantaktiatjai " turamchamkarum " Tímiayi .

text: And they remembered his words ,
text2: Nuna takui Jesus timian Enentáimprarmiayi .

text: And returned from the sepulchre , and told all these things unto the eleven , and to all the rest .
text2: Tura iwiarsamunmaya waketki taar , Jesusa unuiniamurin auntse armia nuna tura chikichnasha Ashí nu Túrunamun ujakarmiayi .

text: It was Mary Magdalene , and Joanna , and Mary the mother of James , and other women that were with them , which told these things unto the apostles .
text2: Jesusa unuiniamurin ujakarmia nu ju ainiawai : Maktaranmaya Marí , Juánasha , Jakupu Nukurí Marisha , tura Chíkich nuwajai .

text: And their words seemed to them as idle tales , and they believed them not .
text2: Tura Jesusa unuiniamurisha nuwa Tuíniakuisha nekasaiti tu Enentáimtsuk " Wáuruk Tuíniawai " tiarmiayi .

text: Then arose Peter , and ran unto the sepulchre ; and stooping down , he beheld the linen clothes laid by themselves , and departed , wondering in himself at that which was come to pass .
text2: Túrasha Pítrusha jiinki Jesus iwiarsamunam tsékenki werimiayi . Jeá , init iis , aya Tárachik tepenan Wáinkiamiayi . Tura Túrunamia nuna ti Enentáimiar ni jeen waketkimiayi .

text: And , behold , two of them went that same day to a village called Emmaus , which was from Jerusalem about threescore furlongs .
text2: Nu tsawantaik Jesusa nemarniuri Jímiar Emaús péprunam wéarmiayi . Emaúska Jerusarénnumia auntse kirumitru Jeá pujawai .

text: And they talked together of all these things which had happened .
text2: Túrunamia nuna chichaki wearmiayi .

text: And it came to pass , that , while they communed together and reasoned , Jesus himself drew near , and went with them .
text2: " Itiurkit " tu aujmatki weenai imia Jesus taa nui Páchiniak niijiai wearmiayi .

text: But their eyes were holden that they should not know him .
text2: Tura Wáinkiariat nekaashtin asamtai yait nekaacharmiayi .

text: And he said unto them , What manner of communications are these that ye have one to another , as ye walk , and are sad ?
text2: We - wénakua Jesus chicharainiak " Jintiasha ṡWarí áujmatkirum wéarum ? ṡUrukamtai Kúntuts Enentáimprum ? " Tímiayi .

text: And the one of them , whose name was Cleopas , answering said unto him , Art thou only a stranger in Jerusalem , and hast not known the things which are come to pass therein these days ?
text2: Chikichik , Kreupas Náartin chicharuk " Jerusarénnum Túruna nuna Ashí nékainiawai . ṡAmeka amekek Túrunamia nu nékachu Páchitkiam ? " Tímiayi .

text: And he said unto them , What things ? And they said unto him , Concerning Jesus of Nazareth , which was a prophet mighty in deed and word before God and all the people :
text2: Tutai Jesus Tímiayi " ṡWarí urukait ? " Tutai tiarmiayi " Entá , Nasarétnumia Jesusa Túrunamuri taji . Niisha Yúsnan etserin asa Yusa kakarmarijiai chichasmiayi tura nuna kakarmarijiai takasmiayi . Núnaka Ashí aents nékainiawai .

text: And how the chief priests and our rulers delivered him to be condemned to death , and have crucified him .
text2: Tura ii Pátriri uuntri tura ii pépruri uuntri " Tunáa jakamnia Túrayi " tusar " Krúsnum mantamnati " tiarmiayi .

text: But we trusted that it had been he which should have redeemed Israel : and beside all this , to day is the third day since these things were done .
text2: Tura ii Israer - aentstin uwemtikrampratin tu Enentáimsamji . Tura ni maamusha Menaintiú tsawant nankaamasai .

text: And when they found not his body , they came , saying , that they had also seen a vision of angels , which said that he was alive .
text2: Túrasha ii nuwa ni iwiarsamunam Yamaí Káshik weriar ni ayashin Wáinkiacharmai . Tura " Yusa suntari Wáinkiaji tura " Jesus iwiaakuiti " Túramji " tiarmai . Nuna tu ujatmakakrin ti Enentáimpraji .

text: And certain of them which were with us went to the sepulchre , and found it even so as the women had said : but him they saw not .
text2: Nuyá ii shuar iwiarsamun weriar , nuwa tiarmia Tímiatrusan Wáinkiarmiayi . Tura Jesusnaka Wáinkiacharmai . " Tu ujakarmai Jesusan .

text: Then he said unto them , O fools , and slow of heart to believe all that the prophets have spoken :
text2: Nuyá Jesus niin chicharainiak " Enentáimchaitrume . Ashí Yúsnan etserin tiarmia nu wau Enentáimtatsrume .

text: Ought not Christ to have suffered these things , and to enter into his glory ?
text2: ṡYusa anaikiamuri , Kristu tutai , shiir awajnatsuk ti Wáitsashtinkiait ? " Tímiayi .

text: And beginning at Moses and all the prophets , he expounded unto them in all the scriptures the things concerning himself .
text2: Tura Nuyá Yus - Papinium Muisáis aarmia Nuyá jukin Ashí Yúsnan etserin ni Túrunatniurin aararmia nuna jintintiatasa nankamamiayi .

text: And they drew nigh unto the village , whither they went : and he made as though he would have gone further .
text2: Ayu , nii wearmia Nú peprunam jeawarmiayi . Tura Jesuska nui nankaamaki wétaj tau ajamiayi .

text: But they constrained him , saying , Abide with us : for it is toward evening , and the day is far spent . And he went in to tarry with them .
text2: Tura niisha chicharainiak " Weep . Iijiai Pujustá . Warí , nantu akaikiyi , kirit ajatemsai " tiarmiayi . Tutai Jesus niijiai pujustaj tusa wayamiayi .

text: And it came to pass , as he sat at meat with them , he took bread , and blessed it , and brake , and gave to them .
text2: Tura niijiai irunar misanam pujus , yurumkan achik , Yúsan yuminkias nincha puuk Súsarmiayi .

text: And their eyes were opened , and they knew him ; and he vanished out of their sight .
text2: Nu chichamaik , ni jii uranniua Núnikiarmatai Jesusan nekaawarmiayi . Tura Niisha Nú chichamaik menkakamiayi .

text: And they said one to another , Did not our heart burn within us , while he talked with us by the way , and while he opened to us the scriptures ?
text2: Tura nu shuarsha mai tunai ajainiak " Jintia winis Niisha Yus - Papin jintintramuk nekas ii Enentáin shiir Enentáimtikramprachmakaj ~ i " tiarmiayi .

text: And they rose up the same hour , and returned to Jerusalem , and found the eleven gathered together , and them that were with them ,
text2: Nuyá , Emaúsnumia Wárik Jíinkiar Jerusarénnum waketkiarmiayi . Nui Jesusa unuiniamurin auntse armia nuna tura Chíkich shuar Jesusan nemariarmia nunasha iruntrar pujuinian Wáinkiarmiayi .

text: Saying , The Lord is risen indeed , and hath appeared to Simon .
text2: Auntse armia nusha tiarmiayi " Uunt Jesus nekas nantakni . Semun Niin Wáinkiaiti . "

text: And they told what things were done in the way , and how he was known of them in breaking of bread .
text2: Tutai niisha Jintiá Túrunamun ujakarmiayi . " Jesus yurumkan ajaamakui nui nekaamji " tiarmiayi .

text: And as they thus spake , Jesus himself stood in the midst of them , and saith unto them , Peace be unto you .
text2: Nuna áujmatuk pujuiniai Jesus aya aneachma ajapén wajas " Shiir Enentáimsatarum " Tímiayi .

text: But they were terrified and affrighted , and supposed that they had seen a spirit .
text2: Nuna antukar , ti sapijmiakar , wakanchashit , Enentáimsarmiayi .

text: And he said unto them , Why are ye troubled ? and why do thoughts arise in your hearts ?
text2: Tura Jesus chicharainiak " ṡUrukamtai sapijmiakrum wakanchashit , tu Enentáimsarum ?

text: Behold my hands and my feet , that it is I myself : handle me , and see ; for a spirit hath not flesh and bones , as ye see me have .
text2: Winia uwejrusha , nawersha iirtustarum . Wíkiitjai . Takarsa iirsatarum . Warí , wakancha ayashtinkiait , ukunchtinkiait " Tímiayi .

text: And when he had thus spoken , he shewed them his hands and his feet .
text2: Nuna tinia ni uwejéncha nawencha iniaktusarmiayi .

text: And while they yet believed not for joy , and wondered , he said unto them , Have ye here any meat ?
text2: Warainiayat sapijmiainia ásar , Niimpiashit tu Enentáimtusarmiayi . Tuma asamtai , niin chicharainiak " ṡyurumak takakrumek ? " Tímiayi .

text: And they gave him a piece of a broiled fish , and of an honeycomb .
text2: Takui , namaknasha , Míshkincha Súsarmiayi .

text: And he took it , and did eat before them .
text2: Tura Jesus nuna achik niisha iimiainiamunman yuamiayi .

text: And he said unto them , These are the words which I spake unto you , while I was yet with you , that all things must be fulfilled , which were written in the law of Moses , and in the prophets , and in the psalms , concerning me .
text2: Tura niin tiarmiayi " Winia Túrutawarma nuna , Wi atumjai nuik pujusan Tímiajrume . Nekas uminkiatniuyayi . Iis , wi Túrunatniurun Muisáis aarmia nusha , Yúsnan etserin aarmia nusha , tura Sarmu papinium aarma ana nusha Ashí uminkiatniuyayi " Tímiayi .

text: Then opened he their understanding , that they might understand the scriptures ,
text2: Nuyá Yus - Papinium aarman jintintiawarmiayi .

text: And said unto them , Thus it is written , and thus it behoved Christ to suffer , and to rise from the dead the third day :
text2: Jintintiuk juna Tímiayi : " Yusa anaikiamuri Kristu tutai jaka Menaintiú tsawantai jakamunmaya nantaktinia nu Yáunchuk áarmauyayi . Tura Wi Nú Krístuchukaitiaj .

text: And that repentance and remission of sins should be preached in his name among all nations , beginning at Jerusalem .
text2: Winia Náarun pachisar , Jerusarénnumia nankama Ashí nunkanam nu chicham etsernaktinia nu aarmauyayi . Shuar ni tunaari tsankurnarat tusar Enentáin Yapajiátniuiti . Tura tu etserkatniua nusha yaunchu aarmauyayi .

text: And ye are witnesses of these things .
text2: Tura wi Túrunamu neka asarum etserkatniuitrume , Tímiayi .

text: And , behold , I send the promise of my Father upon you : but tarry ye in the city of Jerusalem , until ye be endued with power from on high .
text2: Tura winia Apar , winia Wakantrun susartatjai , turammarumna nuna akuptuktatjarme . Tura nayaimpinmaya Táatsain jui Jerusarén péprunam Pujústárum . Taa ni kakarmarin suramsattarme . " Tu Tímiayi .

text: And he led them out as far as to Bethany , and he lifted up his hands , and blessed them .
text2: Nuyá Jesus Jerusarén péprunmaya Júkiar Petania péprunam ejeniarmiayi . Tura nui ni uweje Takuí , " Yus Yáinmakarti " Tímiayi .

text: And it came to pass , while he blessed them , he was parted from them , and carried up into heaven .
text2: Nuna tu pujus , niiya kanakmiayi . Tura nayaimpiniam junakmiayi .

text: And they worshipped him , and returned to Jerusalem with great joy :
text2: Ni unuiniamurisha Niin Imiá shiir Enentáimtusarmiayi . Tura Nuyá ti warasar Jerusarénnum waketkiarmiayi .

text: And were continually in the temple , praising and blessing God . Amen .
text2: Tura Yusa Uunt Jeen pujusar Yusa Náarin shiir Awajú pujuarmiayi . Aukete .

text: In the beginning was the Word , and the Word was with God , and the Word was God .
text2: Ashí nankamamia Nú yaunchu Yusa Uchirí tuke pujuyayi . Niisha Yúsan ti paant awajeakui , Chícham Tíminiaiti . Chichamsha Yusjai pujuyayi . Chichamsha Yúsauyayi .

text: The same was in the beginning with God .
text2: Yámankamtaik Niisha pujuyayi Yusjai .

text: All things were made by him ; and without him was not any thing made that was made .
text2: Ashí najanamu ainia nu Niijiai najanamuiti . Nii najanachmaka penké atsawai .

text: In him was life ; and the life was the light of men .
text2: Niisha iwiaaku átinia nérenniuti . Nu iwiaaku atincha Tsáapninia ainis Yusna ana nuna Ashí shuaran paant nekamtikiamniaiti .

text: And the light shineth in darkness ; and the darkness comprehended it not .
text2: Nu Tsáapnin kiritniunam Tsáapniawai . Tura kiritniusha Tsáapninian ikiajniaktinian tujinkiaiti .

text: There was a man sent from God , whose name was John .
text2: Aishman ámiayi , Yus akupkamu , ni naari Juan .

text: The same came for a witness , to bear witness of the Light , that all men through him might believe .
text2: Niisha Tsáapnin chichaman etserkatajtsa Támiayi . Nuna étseruk Ashí umirkarat tusa Támiayi .

text: He was not that Light , but was sent to bear witness of that Light .
text2: Juansha nu Tsáapninchauyayi . Ayatik akupkamuyayi Tsáapnin chichaman etserkat tusa .

text: That was the true Light , which lighteth every man that cometh into the world .
text2: Nu Tsáapninkia nekas tsaapniniaiti . Ju nunkanam taa Ashí shuaran Enentáin Tsáapniartiniaiti .

text: He was in the world , and the world was made by him , and the world knew him not .
text2: Chichamsha taramiayi ju nunkanam . Tura nunkasha ni najanamu ain , nunkaya aents Niin nekaacharmiayi .

text: He came unto his own , and his own received him not .
text2: Támiayi ni nunkén tura ni shuarsha ni Enentáin itiaacharmiayi .

text: But as many as received him , to them gave he power to become the sons of God , even to them that believe on his name :
text2: Tuma ain Chíkich shuar Niin Enentáimtuiniak ni Enentáin itiaawarua nuna Yusa Uchirí ajastinian Yus tsankatkamiayi .

text: Which were born , not of blood , nor of the will of the flesh , nor of the will of man , but of God .
text2: Niisha Yusa Uchirí ajasar ataksha Númpentin Ayashímkiacharmai . Aentsnúmia akiiniachu ainiawai niisha . Aishman wakeramujaisha akiiniacharmai . Antsu Yúsnumia akiiniawaru ásar Yusa Uchirí ainiawai .

text: And the Word was made flesh , and dwelt among us , ( and we beheld his glory , the glory as of the only begotten of the Father , ) full of grace and truth .
text2: Nú Chichamsha ayashtin ajas iijiai Núkap tsawant pujumiayi . Yusa anenkratairijiai piakuyi . Aya nekasa nunak chichaamiayi . Núnisan ni pénkerin , aya Yusa Uchiri chikichkia nu takusminia nuna iniakmamiayi . Nusha iisha paant Wáinkiaitji .

text: John bare witness of him , and cried , saying , This was he of whom I spake , He that cometh after me is preferred before me : for he was before me .
text2: Juansha Niin neka asa , étseruk Tímiayi " Júiti wi Tímiaj nu : " Winia ukuruini winittiana nu Wíjiainkia émkaiti . Maa , wi atsaisha tuke pujuyayi " tiniujai . " Tu etserkamiayi .

text: And of his fulness have all we received , and grace for grace .
text2: Chichamsha ti anenkartin asa Ashí pénker ana nuna iniaitsuk Súramji .

text: For the law was given by Moses , but grace and truth came by Jesus Christ .
text2: Yusa akupeamurin Muisais yaunchu jintintraiti , antsu aneatniuncha tura Ashí nekas ana nunasha Jesukrístu jintintraiti .

text: No man hath seen God at any time ; the only begotten Son , which is in the bosom of the Father , he hath declared him .
text2: Chikichkisha Yúsan penké Wáinkiachuiti . Tura ni Uchirí chikichkia nu tuke Niijiai Tsaníaku asa Yúsan paant awajturmasuitji .

text: And this is the record of John , when the Jews sent priests and Levites from Jerusalem to ask him , Who art thou ?
text2: Jerusarénnumia Israer - shuar ni Pátririncha Riwí - shuarjai Juankai akupkarmiayi Yákit tusar .

text: And he confessed , and denied not ; but confessed , I am not the Christ .
text2: Inintruiniakui paant ujakmiayi . " Wikia Krístuchuitjai " Tímiayi .

text: And they asked him , What then ? Art thou Elias ? And he saith , I am not . Art thou that prophet ? And he answered , No .
text2: Takui ataksha aniasarmiayi " ṡNuikia Yáitiam . Yúsnan etserin yaunchu amia Nú Eríaskaitiam ? " tiarmiayi . Juansha " Atsá , Núchaitjai " Tímiayi . Nuyá ataksha aniasarmiayi " Nuikia ṡYúsnan etserin Tátinia Núkáitiam ? " tiarmiayi . Niisha " Atsá " Tímiayi .

text: Then said they unto him , Who art thou ? that we may give an answer to them that sent us . What sayest thou of thyself ?
text2: Takui " ṡNu arantcha Yáitiam . Iin akuptamkajnia nusha Warí Títiataj ~ i . Warintia Enentáimiam ? " tiarmiayi .

text: He said , I am the voice of one crying in the wilderness , Make straight the way of the Lord , as said the prophet Esaias .
text2: Juansha Tímiayi " Yúsnan etserin Isayas yaunchu timia Núitjai . Niisha aarmiayi " Aents atsamu nunkanam shuar untsumui " Ii uuntri Jintí naka awajsatarum , " tu untsumui . " Núnaka Isayas aaruiti . Tura wikia untsumna Nú shuaraitjai " Tímiayi .

text: And they which were sent were of the Pharisees .
text2: Juanjai chichainiakka Pariséu akupkarma ármiayi .

text: And they asked him , and said unto him , Why baptizest thou then , if thou be not that Christ , nor Elias , neither that prophet ?
text2: Niisha tiarmiayi " Nuikia Krístuchuitiatmesha , Eríaschaitiatmesha , Yúsnan etserin Tátinia Núchaitiatmesha ṡurukamtai imiakratam ? " tiarmiayi .

text: John answered them , saying , I baptize with water : but there standeth one among you , whom ye know not ;
text2: Juansha Tímiayi " Wikia entsajain imiakratjai . Tura átum írutramunam shuar átum nékatsrumna nu wajaawai .

text: He it is , who coming after me is preferred before me , whose shoe ' s latchet I am not worthy to unloose .
text2: Niisha winia ukuruini winiayat Wíjiainkia ti nankaamantuiti . Nii ti pénker asamtai wisha ni sapatri jinkiamurincha atitrachminiaitjai " Tímiayi .

text: These things were done in Bethabara beyond Jordan , where John was baptizing .
text2: Nuka Petapara peprunam Túrunamiayi . Petaparasha Juan imiakratmia nui Jurtan entsa amain amai .

text: The next day John seeth Jesus coming unto him , and saith , Behold the Lamb of God , which taketh away the sin of the world .
text2: Nuyá kashin Juan Jesusan winian Wáiniak Tímiayi " Iistarum . Núiti Yusa Murikri Ashí aentsu tunaarin Júana nu .

text: This is he of whom I said , After me cometh a man which is preferred before me : for he was before me .
text2: Núiti wi timiaj nu , " Winia ukurui winiana nu Wíjiainkia nankaamantuiti . Tura wi atsaisha tuke pujuyayi " Tímiajai .

text: And I knew him not : but that he should be made manifest to Israel , therefore am I come baptizing with water .
text2: Wisha Niin nekaachmajai . Tura Ashí Israer - shuar Niin nekaawarat tusan imiakin Támajai " Tímiayi .

text: And John bare record , saying , I saw the Spirit descending from heaven like a dove , and it abode upon him .
text2: Nuyá Tímiayi " Yusa Wakanin Yámpitsa Núnin nayaimpinmayan Táarun Wáinkiámjai . Tura ekemsamai .

text: And I knew him not : but he that sent me to baptize with water , the same said unto me , Upon whom thou shalt see the Spirit descending , and remaining on him , the same is he which baptizeth with the Holy Ghost .
text2: Nu Túruntsain tuke Niin nekaachmajai . Tura Yuska winia imiakrattinian akuptak turutmiai " Chikichik shuarnum Yusa Wakaní tara ekemsa Wáinkiam , nujai nekaattame . Yusa Pénker Wakaníjiai imiakratniua Núiti " Túrutmiayi . Tura nujai Niin nekaamjai .

text: And I saw , and bare record that this is the Son of God .
text2: Yamaikia wainkia asan ti paant nékajai Tí nekas Yusa Uchirínti " Tímiayi Juan .

text: Again the next day after John stood , and two of his disciples ;
text2: Kashincha ataksha Juan nui wajasmiayi ni unuiniamuri Jímiarjai .

text: And looking upon Jesus as he walked , he saith , Behold the Lamb of God !
text2: Jesussha nui nankaamakui Juan Tímiayi " Iistarum , Yusa Murikrí áuwiti . "

text: And the two disciples heard him speak , and they followed Jesus .
text2: Juanka unuiniamuri nuna antukar mai Jesusan pataatukarmiayi .

text: Then Jesus turned , and saw them following , and saith unto them , What seek ye ? They said unto him , Rabbi , ( which is to say , being interpreted , Master , ) where dwellest thou ?
text2: Jesussha úkumur iimias nu Jímiaran wininian Wáinkiámiayi . Tura Tímiayi " ṡYa earum ? " Niisha " Uuntá , ṡtui pujam ? " tiarmiayi .

text: He saith unto them , Come and see . They came and saw where he dwelt , and abode with him that day : for it was about the tenth hour .
text2: Jesussha Tímiayi " Wats , iitiarum . " Niisha wear ni pujutairin Wáinkiarmiayi . Tura Aankú ajasmatai nu tsawantai nui kintiamprarmiayi .

text: One of the two which heard John speak , and followed him , was Andrew , Simon Peter ' s brother .
text2: Juanka chichamen antukar Jesusan pataatukaruka Jímiar ármiayi . Chikichik Antresauyayi . Niisha Semun Pitru yachiiyayi .

text: He first findeth his own brother Simon , and saith unto him , We have found the Messias , which is , being interpreted , the Christ .
text2: Antressha Wárik ni yachi Semunkan eaktajtsa wémiayi . Tura Wáiniak " Misías Wáinkiaji " Tímiayi . Misíaska ni chichamen " Kristu " tawai . Krístuka Israer - shuaran yainkiarat tusa Yus anaikiamuiti .

text: And he brought him to Jesus . And when Jesus beheld him , he said , Thou art Simon the son of Jona : thou shalt be called Cephas , which is by interpretation , A stone .
text2: Nuyá Antres ni yachi Semunkan Jesus pujamunam jukimiayi . Jesussha Wáiniak Tímiayi " Ametme Semun , Junasa Uchirí . Túrasha Sépas átatme . " Sépaska Israer - shuar chichamnum kaya tawai . Tura Kriaku chichamnum nuka Pítruiti .

text: The day following Jesus would go forth into Galilee , and findeth Philip , and saith unto him , Follow me .
text2: Kashincha Jesus Kariréa nunkanam wétajtsa pujumiayi . Tura Jiripin Wáiniak " Nemartusta " Tímiayi .

text: Now Philip was of Bethsaida , the city of Andrew and Peter .
text2: Jiripisha Petsaitia péprunmayauyayi . Antressha Pítrusha nu péprunmayauyayi .

text: Philip findeth Nathanael , and saith unto him , We have found him , of whom Moses in the law , and the prophets , did write , Jesus of Nazareth , the son of Joseph .
text2: Nuyá Jiripi Natanaéran eakmiayi . Tura Wáiniak Tímiayi " Muisais Yus akupkamu papinium " Anaikiamu Tátatui " tu aarchamkia . Yaunchu Yúsnan etserniusha ujakcharmakia . Nu shuar Wáinkiaji . Jesusaiti , Jusé Uchirí . Nasarét péprunmayaiti . "

text: And Nathanael said unto him , Can there any good thing come out of Nazareth ? Philip saith unto him , Come and see .
text2: Natanaérsha Tímiayi " ṡNasarétnumia pénker shuar áminkiait ? " Jiripisha " Winim Iitiá " Tímiayi .

text: Jesus saw Nathanael coming to him , and saith of him , Behold an Israelite indeed , in whom is no guile !
text2: Jesussha Natanaéran Tíjiuch winian Wáiniak Tímiayi " Ju shuar iistarum . Ti pénker Israer - shuaraiti . Penké anankartichuiti . "

text: Nathanael saith unto him , Whence knowest thou me ? Jesus answered and said unto him , Before that Philip called thee , when thou wast under the fig tree , I saw thee .
text2: Natanaérsha Tímiayi " ṡItiur nékaram ? " Jesussha Tímiayi " Jiripi tuke untsurmatsain Wáinkiájme ikiu numirin ejamkam wajamin . "

text: Nathanael answered and saith unto him , Rabbi , thou art the Son of God ; thou art the King of Israel .
text2: Natanaér nuikia Tímiayi , " Uunta , nekas Yusa Uchirínme . Israer - shuar akupniuitme " Tímiayi .

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , Because I said unto thee , I saw thee under the fig tree , believest thou ? thou shalt see greater things than these .
text2: Tura Jesus Tímiayi " ṡAya wi " Ikiu numirin ajamkam wajamin Wáinkiájme " takui Winia Enentáimturamek ? Antsu nuna nankaamas nekaachmin ana nusha Wáinkiáttame " Tímiayi .

text: And he saith unto him , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Hereafter ye shall see heaven open , and the angels of God ascending and descending upon the Son of man .
text2: Nuyasha Jesus Tímiayi " Wi nekas Tájarme , Aents Ajasu asan atumsha nayaim uranmianum Yusa suntari Winin tara waka ajainia Wáinkiáttarme . " Tu Tímiayi .

text: And the third day there was a marriage in Cana of Galilee ; and the mother of Jesus was there :
text2: Menaintiu tsawant nankaamasmatai nuatnaikiatin Jísat Kaná péprunam ámiayi . Kaná péprusha Kariréa nunkanmauyayi . Jesusa Nukurísha nui pujumiayi .

text: And both Jesus was called , and his disciples , to the marriage .
text2: Jesussha ni unuiniamurisha nu nuatnaiyamunam ipiaamu ármiayi .

text: And when they wanted wine , the mother of Jesus saith unto him , They have no wine .
text2: Umutai amuukamtai Jesusa Nukurí Tímiayi " Umutai amuukai . Penké takakainiatsui . "

text: Jesus saith unto her , Woman , what have I to do with thee ? mine hour is not yet come .
text2: Tura Jesus Tímiayi " Nukuá , ṡurukamtai Winia Túrutam ? Iniáitiústá . Winia kakarmar iniakmastin jeaatsui . "

text: His mother saith unto the servants , Whatsoever he saith unto you , do it .
text2: Nuyá umutain Wáinmainia nuna ni Nukurí Tímiayi " Ashí ni tana nu Umiktárum . "

text: And there were set there six waterpots of stone , after the manner of the purifying of the Jews , containing two or three firkins apiece .
text2: Nui kayajai najanamu yumi - yaraatai sais ( 6 ) ámiayi . Nu yaraatainmaya Israer - shuar ni ewejéncha ni nawencha nijiamau ármiayi Yus shiir Enentáimtursatí tusar . Chíkich Chíkich yaraatainium uchenta ( 80 ) Rítrusha , sian ( 100 ) Rítrusha yumi wayamniauyayi .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Fill the waterpots with water . And they filled them up to the brim .
text2: Nuyá Jesus umutain Wáinmaun " Ju yaraatai aimpratarum " Tímiayi . Takui mete aimprarmiayi .

text: And he saith unto them , Draw out now , and bear unto the governor of the feast . And they bare it .
text2: Aimprarmatai Jesus Tímiayi " Pai , ishichik shikikrum Námper chicharu suutarum . " Tutai Nútiksan Túrawarmiayi .

text: When the ruler of the feast had tasted the water that was made wine , and knew not whence it was : ( but the servants which drew the water knew ; ) the governor of the feast called the bridegroom ,
text2: Jista chicharusha nu umutai ajasun Nekáprámiayi . Yaraatainmaya yumi jusamun nekaachmai niisha tura umutai ajamau jusaru ásar nékarmai . Jista chicharusha nuwatun untsuk

text: And saith unto him , Every man at the beginning doth set forth good wine ; and when men have well drunk , then that which is worse : but thou hast kept the good wine until now .
text2: Tímiayi " Jístanmanka pénker umutain emka Suíniatsuk . Tura jémararmatainkia Tímianchan suiniatsuk . Túrasha ámeka pénker umutai ikiusam Yamái Jíikchamek " Tímiayi .

text: This beginning of miracles did Jesus in Cana of Galilee , and manifested forth his glory ; and his disciples believed on him .
text2: Jesus Túramu Kananum Kariréa nunkanam Túrunamiayi . Nújainkia Jesus emka ni kakarmarin paant iniaktusmiayi . Nuna iisar ni unuiniamurisha Niin Enentáimtusarmiayi .

text: After this he went down to Capernaum , he , and his mother , and his brethren , and his disciples : and they continued there not many days .
text2: Nuyá Kapernáum péprunam wémiayi . Ni Nukurísha ni yachisha ni unuiniamurisha nemariarmiayi . Nuisha Untsurí tsawant pujusarmiayi .

text: And the Jews ' passover was at hand , and Jesus went up to Jerusalem ,
text2: Israer - shuara namperi , paskua tutai , ishichik ajasmatai Jesus Jerusarénnum wémiayi .

text: And found in the temple those that sold oxen and sheep and doves , and the changers of money sitting :
text2: Nui Jeá Yusa Uunt Jeen Súruinian Wáinkiámiayi . Turuncha murikniasha yampitsnasha Súrin ármiayi . Chikichcha ni misarin pujusar Kuítian Yapajíniancha Wáinkiámiayi .

text: And when he had made a scourge of small cords , he drove them all out of the temple , and the sheep , and the oxen ; and poured out the changers ' money , and overthrew the tables ;
text2: Nuna Wáiniak yaranken chapikmar asutkiartutain najana nujai Ashí waakartiuk murikrintiuk aa Jíirmiayi . Kuítian yapajniu misarincha ayantar ni Kuítrin Nunká utsankarmiayi .

text: And said unto them that sold doves , Take these things hence ; make not my Father ' s house an house of merchandise .
text2: Yampitsan Súrinniasha Tímiayi " Nuka Juyá Jíitiarum . Winia Aparu Jeen surutai jea najanawairap " Tímiayi .

text: And his disciples remembered that it was written , The zeal of thine house hath eaten me up .
text2: Nuna iisar ni unuiniamuri yaunchu Yus - Papinium aarman Enentáimprarmiayi . Ju aarmaiti : " Ame Jeem shiir Atí tusan ti wakerukuitjai . "

text: Then answered the Jews and said unto him , What sign shewest thou unto us , seeing that thou doest these things ?
text2: Nuikia Israer - shuara uuntri Jesusan aniasarmiayi " Juna Túramniaitjai tusam ṡWarí kakarmak iniakmastatam ? "

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Destroy this temple , and in three days I will raise it up .
text2: Jesussha Tímiayi " Ju Jea Sáakiakrumin Menaintiú Tsawantaí iniantaittiajai Wikia . "

text: Then said the Jews , Forty and six years was this temple in building , and wilt thou rear it up in three days ?
text2: Israer - shuarsha tiarmiayi " Kuarentisáis ( 46 ) uwitin juna jeamtinian pujursarmiayi . Amesha Menaintiú tsawantai Jeamtámeash . "

text: But he spake of the temple of his body .
text2: Kame Jesus " Jea " chichayat ni ayashin Tímiayi .

text: When therefore he was risen from the dead , his disciples remembered that he had said this unto them ; and they believed the scripture , and the word which Jesus had said .
text2: Tuma asamtai Jesus ukunam jakamunmaya nantakmiatai ni unuiniamuri ni timian Enentáimprar ni chichamencha tura yaunchu Yus - Papinium aarmancha " Nekasaiti " tu Enentáimtusarmiayi .

text: Now when he was in Jerusalem at the passover , in the feast day , many believed in his name , when they saw the miracles which he did .
text2: Paskua Námpertin ti Untsurí Jerusarénnum pujuarmia nu , Jesus aents tujintiamun Túramtai , nuna Wáinkiar Niin nekas Enentáimtusarmiayi .

text: But Jesus did not commit himself unto them , because he knew all men ,
text2: Tuma ain Jesus Ashí neka asa ninkia Enentáimtuscharmiayi .

text: And needed not that any should testify of man : for he knew what was in man .
text2: Ninki Ashí shuara Enentáin neka asa Chíkich ujatkat tusa atsumchamiayi .

text: There was a man of the Pharisees , named Nicodemus , a ruler of the Jews :
text2: Shuar ámiayi ni naari Nikiutému . Niisha Pariséu asa nii tuinia aintsan Yúsnan takauyayi . Niisha Israer - shuara uuntriyayi .

text: The same came to Jesus by night , and said unto him , Rabbi , we know that thou art a teacher come from God : for no man can do these miracles that thou doest , except God be with him .
text2: Niisha kashi Jesusai irastajtsa wé Tímiayi " Uuntá , Shuáran unuiniarat tusa Yus Akúptámkaiti . Nu paant nékaji . Yúsaiyanchuitkiumka aentsti tujintiamu Túramna nu tujinkiaintme ' Tímiayi .

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , Verily , verily , I say unto thee , Except a man be born again , he cannot see the kingdom of God .
text2: Jesussha Tímiayi " Tí nekas Tájame . Atak yamaram akiiniachuka Yus akupeamunam pachiinkiashtatui . "

text: Nicodemus saith unto him , How can a man be born when he is old ? can he enter the second time into his mother ' s womb , and be born ?
text2: Tutai Nikiutému aniasmiayi " ṡItiurak shuar uunta nu ataksha akiiniat . Ataksha ni Nukurí ampujén enkempramniakait atak akiiniatniuna ? "

text: Jesus answered , Verily , verily , I say unto thee , Except a man be born of water and of the Spirit , he cannot enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: Ataksha Jesus Tímiayi " Ti nekas Tájame . Shuar entsayasha tura Wakanniumiasha akiiniachuka Yus akupeamunam penké pachiinkiashtatui .

text: That which is born of the flesh is flesh ; and that which is born of the Spirit is spirit .
text2: Ayashniumia akiinia nuka ayashchakait . Núnisan Wakanniúmia akiinia nuka wakanchakait .

text: Marvel not that I said unto thee , Ye must be born again .
text2: Wi " atak yamaram akiiniatniuiti " takui itiurchat Enentáimpraip .

text: The wind bloweth where it listeth , and thou hearest the sound thereof , but canst not tell whence it cometh , and whither it goeth : so is every one that is born of the Spirit .
text2: Nase Enentáimpratá . Nase Nánkamsan Umpúawai . Amesha ántame tura tuyan Winiá Túrasha tuin weti nékatsme . Núniskete Ashí Wakanniúmia akiinia nu . "

text: Nicodemus answered and said unto him , How can these things be ?
text2: Tuma asamtai Nikiutémusha atak anias " ṡJusha itiurak áminiait ? " Tímiayi .

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , Art thou a master of Israel , and knowest not these things ?
text2: Jesus aikmiayi " Ame Israer - shuara jintinniurintiatmesha ṡitiura nékatsmea ?

text: Verily , verily , I say unto thee , We speak that we do know , and testify that we have seen ; and ye receive not our witness .
text2: Ti nekasan Tájame . Nekas nékakur chichaaji . Iismajnia nusha ujaaji . Tuma ain ii chichame ántatsrume .

text: If I have told you earthly things , and ye believe not , how shall ye believe , if I tell you of heavenly things ?
text2: Aya ju nunkanmaya Túramu ujaam ántachkurmeka ṡitiurak nayaimpinmaya Túramusha antuktarum ? '

text: And no man hath ascended up to heaven , but he that came down from heaven , even the Son of man which is in heaven .
text2: ` Shuar chikichkisha nayaimpiniam waka atsawai . Aya Wiki , nayaimpinmaya taran Aents Ajasu asan , Túraitjai . Tura Wikia nayaimpinmayaitjai .

text: And as Moses lifted up the serpent in the wilderness , even so must the Son of man be lifted up :
text2: Tura Winiasha , Aents Ajasu ain , mantuawartatui . Iis , yaunchu Israer - shuar atsamunam wekainiak napijiai ti Jáiniakui tuke tsuamarti tusa Muisais napin Jirú najana Yakí numiniam awajaimiayi . Núnisnak Wisha awajnitniuitjai .

text: That whosoever believeth in him should not perish , but have eternal life .
text2: Nújainkia Ashí Winia Enentáimturna nuka jinium wétsuk Yusai tuke iwiaaku pujustatui . "

text: For God so loved the world , that he gave his only begotten Son , that whosoever believeth in him should not perish , but have everlasting life .
text2: Yuska Ashí shuaran ti anea asa , ni Uchirin chikichik ana nuna Shuáran uwemtikrarat tusa tsankatkamiayi . Ashí shuar Niin Enentáimtana nu , jinium wécharat tusa , antsu Yúsnum tuke iwiaaku pujusarat tusa ni Uchirín Akúpturmakmiaji .

text: For God sent not his Son into the world to condemn the world ; but that the world through him might be saved .
text2: Yus aentsun kajerak jinium surukat tusa ni Uchirín akupkachmiayi . Antsu uwemtikrarat tusa akupkamiayi .

text: He that believeth on him is not condemned : but he that believeth not is condemned already , because he hath not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God .
text2: Yusa Uchirín Enentáimtana nuka jinium penké surunkashtiniaiti . Tura Niin Enentáimtatsna nuka , Yusa Uchirín chikichik ana nuna Enentáimtachu asa , Páchitsuk jinium surukmaiti .

text: And this is the condemnation , that light is come into the world , and men loved darkness rather than light , because their deeds were evil .
text2: Yusa Uchiri Tsáapninia aintsan ii tunaari paant awajturmaji . Nu Tsáapnisha ju nunkanam Táraiti . Shuar Tunáa ti tura ásar Tsáapninian nakitrar kiritniun wakeriarmai . Nuna tura ásar jinium surunkaruiti .

text: For every one that doeth evil hateth the light , neither cometh to the light , lest his deeds should be reproved .
text2: Ashí tunaan Túruinia nuka Tsáapninian Muíjiainiawai . Túrawar yupitiainiawai ni Tunáa Túramu paant ajasai tusa .

text: But he that doeth truth cometh to the light , that his deeds may be made manifest , that they are wrought in God .
text2: Antsu Ashí nekas Túratniun umiiniana nuka Tsáapninian weantainiawai . Yus ni Enentái pujuram Tsáapninium takainiawai . Nuka ti paantaiti .

text: After these things came Jesus and his disciples into the land of Judaea ; and there he tarried with them , and baptized .
text2: Nuyá Jesussha ni unuiniamurijiaisha Jutía nunkanam wear nui pujusar imiakratiarmiayi .

text: And John also was baptizing in Aenon near to Salim , because there was much water there : and they came , and were baptized .
text2: Juansha Enun nunkanam , Sarim Tíjiuchia nui , imiakratuk pujumiayi entsa nui Núkap aa asamtai . Tura aents Táarmatai imiainiarmiayi .

text: For John was not yet cast into prison .
text2: Nusha Juánkan sepunam enkenatsain Túrunamiayi .

text: Then there arose a question between some of John ' s disciples and the Jews about purifying .
text2: Tura Juanka unuiniamuri Israer - shuarjai jianaiktinian nankamawarmiayi . " ṡYa imiakratma Imiá pénkerait ? " tusar áujmatiarmiayi .

text: And they came unto John , and said unto him , Rabbi , he that was with thee beyond Jordan , to whom thou barest witness , behold , the same baptizeth , and all men come to him .
text2: Juánkai inintrustai tusar wéarmiayi . " Uunta , ame nuik Jurtan entsa amain pujakum shuar nui Pujá " Núiti Yusa Murikri " Tíchamkum . Yamaikia imiakratui tura Ashí shuar Niin nemarainiawai " tiarmiayi .

text: John answered and said , A man can receive nothing , except it be given him from heaven .
text2: Tutai Juan Tímiayi " Ashí kakarmaka aya Yúsaiyanchakait .

text: Ye yourselves bear me witness , that I said , I am not the Christ , but that I am sent before him .
text2: Wisha paant Tímiajai " Wikia Krístuchuitjai antsu ni jintin iwiarat tusan emka akupkamuitjai . " Nusha antukmarme .

text: He that hath the bride is the bridegroom : but the friend of the bridegroom , which standeth and heareth him , rejoiceth greatly because of the bridegroom ' s voice : this my joy therefore is fulfilled .
text2: Kame shuar nuwan nuatna nuna aishrinti . Nuatnaiyak aishman nuwejai áujnainiakui , ni amikrisha nuna antuk ti waraatsuk . Wisha Núnisnak aents Jesusai wénakui ti waraajai .

text: He must increase , but I must decrease .
text2: Niisha tuke nankaamaku uunt ajastiniaiti antsu wikia tuke Tímiancha ajastiniaitjai . " Juan tu chichasmiayi .

text: He that cometh from above is above all : he that is of the earth is earthly , and speaketh of the earth : he that cometh from heaven is above all .
text2: Nayaimpinmaya tara nuka Ashí nankaamakuiti . Nunkaya nuka , nunkaya asa Jú nunkanmayanak áujmatui . Nayaimpinmaya tara nuka Ashí nankaamakuiti

text: And what he hath seen and heard , that he testifieth ; and no man receiveth his testimony .
text2: tura nui antukmancha iismancha áujmatui . Túrasha ni chichamen ántuiniatsui .

text: He that hath received his testimony hath set to his seal that God is true .
text2: Antsu ni chichamen ántana nuka " Yusa chichame Imiá nekasaiti " tawai .

text: For he whom God hath sent speaketh the words of God : for God giveth not the Spirit by measure unto him .
text2: Yus akupkamuka Yusa chichamen étserui . Yuska ni Wakanín ementutsuk susa asamtai tu étserui .

text: The Father loveth the Son , and hath given all things into his hand .
text2: Yus Apa ni Uchirín anea asa Ashí ana nuna Iistí tusa ataksaiti .

text: He that believeth on the Son hath everlasting life : and he that believeth not the Son shall not see life ; but the wrath of God abideth on him .
text2: Shuar Yusa Uchirín Enentáimta nuka yamaram iwiaakmanum akiinia asa tuke Yusai shiir pujustiniaiti . Antsu Yusa Uchirín Enentáimtatsna nuka nu iwiaakmanum akiiniachuiti antsu Yus tuke niin kajerkaiti .

text: When therefore the Lord knew how the Pharisees had heard that Jesus made and baptized more disciples than John ,
text2: " Jesus Untsurí shuaran ni nemarin awajeawai ; kame Juanjai nankaamas Untsurí imiaawai " taman Pariseu shuar antukarmiayi .

text: ( Though Jesus himself baptized not , but his disciples , )
text2: Nekaska Jesus imiakratchamiayi , antsu ni unuiniamuri Túrawarmiayi .

text: He left Judaea , and departed again into Galilee .
text2: Pariséu nu chichaman antukarman Jesussha Nekáa Jutía nunkanmaya jiinki Kariréa nunkanam waketkimiayi .

text: And he must needs go through Samaria .
text2: Wáketuk Samaria nunkanmaani nankaamaktiniuyayi .

text: Then cometh he to a city of Samaria , which is called Sychar , near to the parcel of ground that Jacob gave to his son Joseph .
text2: Samaria nunkanam wéak Sekar péprunam jeamiayi . Nu pepru jeastatuk Jakupa nunke ámiayi . Jakupsha nu nunkan ni Uchirín Jusen Tí yaunchu susamiayi .

text: Now Jacob ' s well was there . Jesus therefore , being wearied with his journey , sat thus on the well : and it was about the sixth hour .
text2: Nuisha yumirmat ámiayi . Jakup taurma asamtai " Jakupa yumirmatri " tiarmiayi . Tutupin jeamtai Jesussha pimpiki winis yumirmat ayamach pujusmiayi .

text: There cometh a woman of Samaria to draw water : Jesus saith unto her , Give me to drink .
text2: Nui pujai Samarianmaya nuwa Yumí shikiktajtsa Támiayi . Tura Jesus " Entsa surusta " Tímiayi .

text: ( For his disciples were gone away unto the city to buy meat . )
text2: Jesusa unuiniamurisha yurumkan péprunam sumaktajtsa wéaru asamtai aya Jesusak pujumiayi .

text: Then saith the woman of Samaria unto him , How is it that thou , being a Jew , askest drink of me , which am a woman of Samaria ? for the Jews have no dealings with the Samaritans .
text2: Samarianmaya nuwa Jesusan Tímiayi " ṡItiura Israer - shuaraitiatmesha Samarianmaya nuwa aisha entsa seatam ? " Kame Israer - shuar Samarianmaya shuarjainkia penké chichachu ásar nuna Tímiayi .

text: Jesus answered and said unto her , If thou knewest the gift of God , and who it is that saith to thee , Give me to drink ; thou wouldest have asked of him , and he would have given thee living water .
text2: Jesussha Tímiayi " Yus Súamu nékakmeka tura entsa surusta Tájam nusha nékakmeka ame antsu Seattínme tura Wikia iwiaaku entsan amasaintjai . "

text: The woman saith unto him , Sir , thou hast nothing to draw with , and the well is deep : from whence then hast thou that living water ?
text2: Nuwasha Tímiayi " Uunta , entsasha ti initiaiti tura shikiktincha takaktsume . ṡTuyan iwiaaku entsasha surustam ?

text: Art thou greater than our father Jacob , which gave us the well , and drank thereof himself , and his children , and his cattle ?
text2: Ii uuntri Jakup ju yumirmatan taur juyanak niisha ni Uchirísha ni Waakarísha umararmiayi . Nuyá ikiurtamkimiaji . ṡAmesha Jakupjai nankaamas kakarmakaitiam ? "

text: Jesus answered and said unto her , Whosoever drinketh of this water shall thirst again :
text2: Jesussha Tímiayi " Ashí shuar ju entsan umarka ataksha kitiamtiatui .

text: But whosoever drinketh of the water that I shall give him shall never thirst ; but the water that I shall give him shall be in him a well of water springing up into everlasting life .
text2: Antsu Wi Súajna Nú entsan umarka penké kitiamchattawai . Antsu nu entsa Wi susamuka ni Enentáin Púkunia aintsan tuke pajamtiatui nujai tuke iwaaku Pujustí tusa .

text: The woman saith unto him , Sir , give me this water , that I thirst not , neither come hither to draw .
text2: Tutai nuwa Tímiayi " Uuntá , winiasha nu entsa surusta . Wisha kitiamcha átaj . Tura ju entsancha shikiktinian Táchataj " Tímiayi .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Go , call thy husband , and come hither .
text2: Nuyasha Jesus Tímiayi " Aishrum untsukam utitia , turam jui Tatá . "

text: The woman answered and said , I have no husband . Jesus said unto her , Thou hast well said , I have no husband :
text2: Nuwasha " Winia aishur atsawai " Tímiayi . Tutai Jesus Tímiayi " Maa , nekas tame . Aishrum atsawai .

text: For thou hast had five husbands ; and he whom thou now hast is not thy husband : in that saidst thou truly .
text2: Kame ame aishrum senku ( 5 ) takusuitme . Yamái takakmena nusha ame aishrumchaiti . Nekas tame . "

text: The woman saith unto him , Sir , I perceive that thou art a prophet .
text2: Nuna antuk nuwasha Tímiayi " Uunta , ame Yúsnan etserniuchukaitiam .

text: Our fathers worshipped in this mountain ; and ye say , that in Jerusalem is the place where men ought to worship .
text2: Ii uuntrinkia tuke Samarianam pujuarmia nu Jú nainnium Yúsan tikishmatrarmiayi . Antsu átum Israer - shuar árumna nu aya Jerusarénnum Yus Tikíshmátratniuiti Tárume . "

text: Jesus saith unto her , Woman , believe me , the hour cometh , when ye shall neither in this mountain , nor yet at Jerusalem , worship the Father .
text2: Jesus Tímiayi " Nuwá , Enentáimsata . Tsawant jeattawai átum Jú Náinniumsha Tátsuk tura Jerusarénnumsha wétsuk Yus Apa tikishmatratin .

text: Ye worship ye know not what : we know what we worship : for salvation is of the Jews .
text2: Atum tikishmatrum nuka nékatsrume . Iikia tikishmatrajnia nu nékaji . Israer - shuarnumia Uwemtikkiartin winiakui nékaji .

text: But the hour cometh , and now is , when the true worshippers shall worship the Father in spirit and in truth : for the Father seeketh such to worship him .
text2: Tsawant winittiana nu Yamái jeayi . Ashí shuar Yus Apan nekas tikishmatainiakka tuke wakanjai tuke Enentáijiaisha awajitsuk tikishmatrartatui . Núnisan tikishmatrurat tusa wakerawai Yus Apa .

text: God is a Spirit : and they that worship him must worship him in spirit and in truth .
text2: Yuska Wakaniiti tura Ashí Niin tikishmatainia nuka tuke Wakaníjiai tura tuke Enentáijiai awajitsuk tikishmatratin ainiawai . "

text: The woman saith unto him , I know that Messias cometh , which is called Christ : when he is come , he will tell us all things .
text2: Nuwasha Tímiayi " Anaikiamua nu Tátiniaiti . Nusha Krístuiti . Niisha taa Ashí jintintramattaji . "

text: Jesus saith unto her , I that speak unto thee am he .
text2: Jesus Tímiayi " Wiitjai . Amin chichaajmena Nú Kristuitjai . "

text: And upon this came his disciples , and marvelled that he talked with the woman : yet no man said , What seekest thou ? or , Why talkest thou with her ?
text2: Nuin ni unuiniamuri Táarmiayi tura nuwajai chichaa pujan Wáinkiar ti Enentáimprurarmiayi . Tumaitiat " ṡWarí wakerakmea nuwajai chichaam ? " Títinian arantukarmiayi .

text: The woman then left her waterpot , and went her way into the city , and saith to the men ,
text2: Nuyanka nuwa ni yumirin ikiuki péprunam we Ashí aentsun Tímiayi

text: Come , see a man , which told me all things that ever I did : is not this the Christ ?
text2: " Winiirum iitiarum , shuar Ashí wi Túramun Túruta nu . ṡJuka Krístuittiya ? "

text: Then they went out of the city , and came unto him .
text2: Tutai péprunmaya Jíinkiar Jesus pujamunam wearmiayi .

text: In the mean while his disciples prayed him , saying , Master , eat .
text2: Jeainiatsain ni unuiniamuri seak tiarmiayi " Uunta , Yurumáta . "

text: But he said unto them , I have meat to eat that ye know not of .
text2: Tura Jesus Tímiayi " Wi Yúatniunka takakjai átum nékachman . "

text: Therefore said the disciples one to another , Hath any man brought him ought to eat ?
text2: Ni uniuniamurisha Nuámtak anniasarmiayi " ṡChíkich shuar yurumak Itiarím Tátsuash ? " tiarmiayi .

text: Jesus saith unto them , My meat is to do the will of him that sent me , and to finish his work .
text2: Tura Jesus Tímiayi " Winia akuptukua nuna wakeramuri Túrakun tura ni takatrin takaakun Wíjiainkia Yurumátniua aintsan Ikiakáatui .

text: Say not ye , There are yet four months , and then cometh harvest ? behold , I say unto you , Lift up your eyes , and look on the fields ; for they are white already to harvest .
text2: Atumka " Tuke kuatru nantu árak Júuktin taasai " Tátsurmek . Túrasha Wi Tájarme , shuar wininia nu iistarum . Yus - Chicham ni Enentáin araamuiti . Tura Júuktin tsawant jeayi .

text: And he that reapeth receiveth wages , and gathereth fruit unto life eternal : that both he that soweth and he that reapeth may rejoice together .
text2: Arakan Júaka akinkiatniuiti . Júukmataisha nu shuar uwemprar tuke iwiaaku pujusartatui . Núnisan arakan araana nusha Júana nusha mai metek warasartatui .

text: And herein is that saying true , One soweth , and another reapeth .
text2: Tiniu armia nuka nekasaiti : " Chikichik araawai Chíkichcha Júawai . "

text: I sent you to reap that whereon ye bestowed no labour : other men laboured , and ye are entered into their labours .
text2: Iis , Chíkich araakmamu Júuktinian akupkaitjarme . Atum araachiatrumek Chíkich takasmanum atumsha pachiintiukuitrume " Tímiayi .

text: And many of the Samaritans of that city believed on him for the saying of the woman , which testified , He told me all that ever I did .
text2: Tura Núwaka péprunam Jeá " Ashí wi Túramun ujatkayi " takui Untsurí shuar Jesusan ti shiir Enentáimtusarmiayi . Niisha Samarianmaya shuar ármiayi .

text: So when the Samaritans were come unto him , they besought him that he would tarry with them : and he abode there two days .
text2: Nu asamtai Ashí Jesusai taar niijiai Pujusát tusa seawarmiayi . Tutai Jesus Jimiará tsawant nui pujusmiayi .

text: And many more believed because of his own word ;
text2: Nú shuar Untsurí ni chichamen antukar Jesusan ti shiir Enentáimturarmiayi .

text: And said unto the woman , Now we believe , not because of thy saying : for we have heard him ourselves , and know that this is indeed the Christ , the Saviour of the world .
text2: Nuyá nuwan tiarmiayi " Yamaikia aya ame chichammijiain Jesus Enentáimtatsji antsu imia iisha ni chichamen anturkaji . Tura nékaji nekas Krístuiti , Ashí shuaran Uwemtikin . "

text: Now after two days he departed thence , and went into Galilee .
text2: Jimiará tsawant nankaamasmatai Jesus Samaria nunkanmaya jiinki Kariréa nunkanam wémiayi .

text: For Jesus himself testified , that a prophet hath no honour in his own country .
text2: Kariréasha Jesusa nunke asamtai , ainsha Jesus timia aintsan ámiayi : " Yúsnan etserniun Ashí shuar pénker anturainiawai antsu nuna nunkeyanka niin anturainiatsui . "

text: Then when he was come into Galilee , the Galilaeans received him , having seen all the things that he did at Jerusalem at the feast : for they also went unto the feast .
text2: Tuma ain Kariréa nunkanam jeamtai auya shuarsha Jerusarénnum paskua Námpernum wearu ásar tura Ashí ni Túramun nui wainkia ásar ti shiir awajsarmiayi .

text: So Jesus came again into Cana of Galilee , where he made the water wine . And there was a certain nobleman , whose son was sick at Capernaum .
