text2: Nuyá Jesus Kaná péprunam atak Támiayi . Nu péprunmasha nuik Jesus yumin umutai awajsamiayi . Jesussha nui pujai Yajá péprunam Kapernáumnum akupniu takarin ámiayi . Ni Uchirísha jaa tepemiayi .

text: When he heard that Jesus was come out of Judaea into Galilee , he went unto him , and besought him that he would come down , and heal his son : for he was at the point of death .
text2: Niisha Jesus Jutíanmaya Kariréa nunkanam taman antuk Jesusai wémiayi . Tura ni Uchirí Jákatin tepakui ni jeen we ni Uchirín tsuarat tusa Jesusan seamiayi .

text: Then said Jesus unto him , Except ye see signs and wonders , ye will not believe .
text2: Jesussha Tímiayi " Aya aents Túrachminian Túrakui iisrum aya Nújain Winia Enentáimtarme . "

text: The nobleman saith unto him , Sir , come down ere my child die .
text2: Tura takarin Tímiayi " Uunta , winia uchir Jáatsain wari winitia . "

text: Jesus saith unto him , Go thy way ; thy son liveth . And the man believed the word that Jesus had spoken unto him , and he went his way .
text2: Nuinkia Jesus Tímiayi " Jeemiin waketkitia . Yamaikia ame uchiram pénker ajasai . " Tutai Nú aishman Jesus Táman antuk wémiayi .

text: And as he was now going down , his servants met him , and told him , saying , Thy son liveth .
text2: Ni jeen Jeátemámtai ni takarniuri inkiun tiarmiayi " Yamaikia uchiram pénker ajasai . "

text: Then inquired he of them the hour when he began to amend . And they said unto him , Yesterday at the seventh hour the fever left him .
text2: Apasha inintrusmiayi nantu urukaim pénker ajasma . Niisha tiarmiayi " Yau , nantu pukuntamtai , tsuemun michatramai " tiarmiayi . Nuna antuk Uchí Aparísha Enentáimsamai .

text: So the father knew that it was at the same hour , in the which Jesus said unto him , Thy son liveth : and himself believed , and his whole house .
text2: Nantu pukunta ai Jesus " Ame uchiram pénker ajasai " timia Nuní ain michatraiti . Tuma asamtai niisha Ashí ni shuarisha Jesusan nekas Enentáimturarmiayi .

text: This is again the second miracle that Jesus did , when he was come out of Judaea into Galilee .
text2: Jesus nu Túramujai ni kakarmarin Jimiará iniakmasmiayi . Nunasha Jutíanmaya jiinki Kariréa nunkanam Jeá Túramiayi .

text: After this there was a feast of the Jews ; and Jesus went up to Jerusalem .
text2: Nu nankaamasmatai , Israer - shuar namperan najanainiakui Jesus ataksha Jerusarénnum waketkimiayi .

text: Now there is at Jerusalem by the sheep market a pool , which is called in the Hebrew tongue Bethesda , having five porches .
text2: Jerusarén yama wayamunam murik wayatin waiti Tíjiuch amia nui entsa pajamtai jeammauyayi . Nu pajamtain Petesta tiarmiayi . Nuna Wáitirisha senku ( 5 ) ármiayi .

text: In these lay a great multitude of impotent folk , of blind , halt , withered , waiting for the moving of the water .
text2: Nui Untsurí Jáiniak nunkanam tepearmiayi . Kusurusha shutuapsha tampemakusha tepesar entsa miartukat tusa Nákasarmiayi .

text: For an angel went down at a certain season into the pool , and troubled the water : whosoever then first after the troubling of the water stepped in was made whole of whatsoever disease he had .
text2: Kame ni Tátaj taku Yusa suntari Táuyayi entsan umuchkiattsa . Nuyanka emka shuar Entsá Wayá nu ni Jáamuriya Tsuámarmiayi .

text: And a certain man was there , which had an infirmity thirty and eight years .
text2: Aishman Traintiúchu ( 38 ) uwi jaa Tepá nui ámiayi .

text: When Jesus saw him lie , and knew that he had been now a long time in that case , he saith unto him , Wilt thou be made whole ?
text2: Jesussha nu shuaran nui tepan Wáinkiámiayi . Tura Untsurí uwitin jaa tepan Nekáa aniasmiayi " ṡShiir ajastiniak wakeram ? "

text: The impotent man answered him , Sir , I have no man , when the water is troubled , to put me into the pool : but while I am coming , another steppeth down before me .
text2: Tutai jaasha Tímiayi " Uunta , entsa muchitkiui ṡwinia yaki Enkétát ? Kame wi Enkemátaj tai Chíkich emka Enkemáiniawai . "

text: Jesus saith unto him , Rise , take up thy bed , and walk .
text2: Nuyá Jesus Tímiayi " Nantaktia . Ame peakrum jukim Wetá . "

text: And immediately the man was made whole , and took up his bed , and walked : and on the same day was the sabbath .
text2: Nu chichamtaik aishman shiir ajasmiayi . Tura ni peakrin Jukí wémiayi . Nusha ayampratin tsawantai Túrunamiayi .

text: The Jews therefore said unto him that was cured , It is the sabbath day : it is not lawful for thee to carry thy bed .
text2: Tuma asamtai Israer - shuar shiir ajasun tiarmiayi " Yamái ayampratin tsawantaiti . Peakrum Júkishtiniaitme " tiarmiayi .

text: He answered them , He that made me whole , the same said unto me , Take up thy bed , and walk .
text2: Aishmansha Tímiayi " Winia tsuara nu " Peakrum jukim Wetá " turutni " Tímiayi .

text: Then asked they him , What man is that which said unto thee , Take up thy bed , and walk ?
text2: Nuinkia aniasarmiayi " ṡYa " Peakrum jukim Wetá " Túramam ? " tiarmiayi .

text: And he that was healed wist not who it was : for Jesus had conveyed himself away , a multitude being in that place .
text2: Tura aishmansha Niin Tsuárun nékachmiayi . Untsurí shuar nui aa asamtai tura Jesus weu asamtai niin nekaachmiayi .

text: Afterward Jesus findeth him in the temple , and said unto him , Behold , thou art made whole : sin no more , lest a worse thing come unto thee .
text2: Atak Jesus Yusa Uunt Jeen aishmankan Wáiniak Tímiayi " Antukta . Yamaikia shiir ajasume . Atak Tunáa Túrawaip ; nu arant Ajasáim " Tímiayi .

text: The man departed , and told the Jews that it was Jesus , which had made him whole .
text2: Nuinkia aishman Jesus niin Tsuárman Nekáa Israer - shuaran ujakmiayi .

text: And therefore did the Jews persecute Jesus , and sought to slay him , because he had done these things on the sabbath day .
text2: Tuma asamtai ayampratin tsawantai Túramtai Israer - shuar Jesusan maatai tusar aintrarmiayi .

text: But Jesus answered them , My Father worketh hitherto , and I work .
text2: Tura Jesus Tímiayi " Wina Apar tuke yamaisha takawiti . Núnisnak Wisha takaajai . "

text: Therefore the Jews sought the more to kill him , because he not only had broken the sabbath , but said also that God was his Father , making himself equal with God .
text2: Tutai Israer - shuar nuna nankaamas maatai tusa wakeriarmiayi . Ayampratin tsawantai takaakui kajerkarmiayi . Tura nu arantcha " Yus winia Aparuiti " takui Yusjai métek Enentáimtumawai tusar nu arant kajerkarmiayi .

text: Then answered Jesus and said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , The Son can do nothing of himself , but what he seeth the Father do : for what things soever he doeth , these also doeth the Son likewise .
text2: Nuyá Jesus Tímiayi " Ti nekas Tájarme , Yusa Uchirínkia ni Enentáijiain takaatsui . Antsu aya winia Apar takaana nuna iisan métek takaajai . Ashí winia Apar Túramun Wisha ni Uchirí asan métek takaajai .

text: For the Father loveth the Son , and sheweth him all things that himself doeth : and he will shew him greater works than these , that ye may marvel .
text2: Ni Uchirí asamtai winia Apar anentui tura Ashí tura nuna iniakturui . Tura nuna nankaamas tujinkiamnian iniaktursattawai Wisha Túratniun . Tura nuna Túrakui ashamkattarme .

text: For as the Father raiseth up the dead , and quickeneth them ; even so the Son quickeneth whom he will .
text2: Winia Apar jakamunmayan iwiaaku ajasat tusa Ni wakerana nuna inianteatsuk . Núnisnak , ni Uchirí asan , Wi wakeraj nuna iwiaaku Awájsámniaitjai .

text: For the Father judgeth no man , but hath committed all judgment unto the Son :
text2: Winia Aparka Súmamtiktsui antsu shuar Súmamtikiatniun ni Uchirín Súsaiti .

text: That all men should honour the Son , even as they honour the Father . He that honoureth not the Son honoureth not the Father which hath sent him .
text2: Tuma asamtai Ashí shuar Yus Apan shiir awajainia aintsan ni Uchiríncha métek shiir awajsatin ainiawai . Yus Apa ni Uchirín akupka asamtai , Uchin shiir awajeatsna nuka Yus Apancha shiir awajeatsui ' Tímiayi .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that heareth my word , and believeth on him that sent me , hath everlasting life , and shall not come into condemnation ; but is passed from death unto life .
text2: ` Ti nekasaiti . Winia chichamprun ántana Nú shuarka Winia Akuptukun Enentáimtak ni iwiaakmarin tuke amuukashtinian takakui . Nu shuarsha Ayashí iwiaakuitiat Jákauyi antsu Yamái nekas iwiaakuiti . Tuma asa sumamashtatui .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , The hour is coming , and now is , when the dead shall hear the voice of the Son of God : and they that hear shall live .
text2: Ti nekasaiti . Tsawant winittiana nu jeayi . Nu tsawant jaka ainia nu Wi untsumman antukar umirkarka iwiaaku ajasartatui .

text: For as the Father hath life in himself ; so hath he given to the Son to have life in himself ;
text2: Iis , winia Apar iwiaaku awajsatniun takakui . Tura Winiasha , ni Uchirí asamtai , iwiaaku awajsatniun surusuiti .

text: And hath given him authority to execute judgment also , because he is the Son of man .
text2: Nu arantcha wi Aents Ajasu asamtai , shuaran Súmamtikiatniun surusuiti .

text: Marvel not at this : for the hour is coming , in the which all that are in the graves shall hear his voice ,
text2: " Ju chicham itiurchataiti " Enentáimprairap . Atak tsawantai wi untsumman Ashí Jákaru ainia nu antukartatui .

text: And shall come forth ; they that have done good , unto the resurrection of life ; and they that have done evil , unto the resurrection of damnation .
text2: Tura Ashí iwiarsamunmaya Jíinkiartatui . Pénker Túrawarusha nantakiar tuke iwiaaku pujusartatui . Antsu Tunáa Túrawarusha nantakiar jinium surunkartatui ' Tímiayi .

text: I can of mine own self do nothing : as I hear , I judge : and my judgment is just ; because I seek not mine own will , but the will of the Father which hath sent me .
text2: ` Imia Wíki takaatsjai . Antsu Yus tana Núnisnak Súmamtikeajai . Wi wakeraj nuna Enentáimtsuk antsu winia Apar wakera nuna wakerukan , Nii akupta asamtai , awajitsuk Súmamtikjai .

text: If I bear witness of myself , my witness is not true .
text2: Aya Wiki " Yúsaiyaitjai " Tákunka winia chichamur ántar ainti .

text: There is another that beareth witness of me ; and I know that the witness which he witnesseth of me is true .
text2: Chikichcha awai . Niisha " Yúsaiyaiti " Túrutui . Ni chichamesha Imiá nekasaiti .

text: Ye sent unto John , and he bare witness unto the truth .
text2: Atumsha Juankai wi Túramu inintrusmarme tura nii timia nu nekasaiti .

text: But I receive not testimony from man : but these things I say , that ye might be saved .
text2: Tuma ain aents Táman atsumatsjai . Antsu Juanka chichame Enentáimkiuram uwempratarum tusan Tájarme .

text: He was a burning and a shining light : and ye were willing for a season to rejoice in his light .
text2: Juansha jiya Núnis keemai . Atumsha ishichik tsawantin Nú Tsáapninnium warastin Enentáimpramarme .

text: But I have greater witness than that of John : for the works which the Father hath given me to finish , the same works that I do , bear witness of me , that the Father hath sent me .
text2: Tura Winia " Yúsaiyaiti " Túrutna nu , Juanjai nankaamas pénkeran takakjai . Wi takasma Núiti . Winia Apar takastinian surusma nuna takaakun nujai Páantaiti Yus Apa akupkamuitjai .

text: And the Father himself , which hath sent me , hath borne witness of me . Ye have neither heard his voice at any time , nor seen his shape .
text2: Winia Aparsha , akuptuku asa , ayamprutui . Túrasha átumka ni chichamesha antukchaitrume tura Wáintiash Wáinkiachuitrume .

text: And ye have not his word abiding in you : for whom he hath sent , him ye believe not .
text2: Yus Apa akuptukuiti . Tuma asamtai Winia Enentáimturchakrum winia Aparu chichamesha atumi Enentáin wayachuiti .

text: Search the scriptures ; for in them ye think ye have eternal life : and they are they which testify of me .
text2: Atumka Yus - Chicham yaunchu aarma nui iwiaaku átinian Wáinkiataj tusarum ti unuimiaruitrume . Nu chichamsha Wínian áujmatui .

text: And ye will not come to me , that ye might have life .
text2: Tuma ain nekas iwiaaku átaj tusarum Winí Tátin nakitiarme " Tímiayi .

text: I receive not honour from men .
text2: " Shuar Winia " Shíiraiti " Túrutainiakuisha nuna Páchiatsjai .

text: But I know you , that ye have not the love of God in you .
text2: Maa , Wi nékajrume . Atumka Yus aneatsrume .

text: I am come in my Father ' s name , and ye receive me not : if another shall come in his own name , him ye will receive .
text2: Winia Apar akuptukmatai Táwitjai Túrasha nakitrarme . Antsu Chíkichka Ní Enentáijiain jeartamkuinkia nuka átum wakerarme .

text: How can ye believe , which receive honour one of another , and seek not the honour that cometh from God only ?
text2: Atumka Nuámtak " Shiir Enentáimtursatí " tu Enentáimtunaiyarme . Tura Yus Enentáimturma nuka Páchiatsrume . Nújainkia ṡitiurak Yus Enentáimtustam ?

text: Do not think that I will accuse you to the Father : there is one that accuseth you , even Moses , in whom ye trust .
text2: " Ii tunaarin Yusai etserturmaktatji " turutiirap . " Muisais akupkamun umirkan uwemprattajai " Tátsurmek . Antsu Muisais aarma nujai Atumí tunaari etsernaktatui .

text: For had ye believed Moses , ye would have believed me : for he wrote of me .
text2: Iis , Muisais Winia aatrurmiayi . Atumsha ni timia Enentáimtakrumka Winiasha Enentáimturaintrume .

text: But if ye believe not his writings , how shall ye believe my words ?
text2: Tura ni aarma Enentáimtachkurmeka ṡitiurak wi tama Enentáimtustarum ? " Tímiayi Jesus .

text: After these things Jesus went over the sea of Galilee , which is the sea of Tiberias .
text2: Nu nankaamasmatai Jesus Kariréa antumiannum amain katinmiayi . Nu antumiansha Tipirias antumian tuiniawai . Jimiará Náartiniaiti .

text: And a great multitude followed him , because they saw his miracles which he did on them that were diseased .
text2: Untsurí shuar Jesus ti Jáinian Timiá Wárik tsuan Wáinkiaru ásar Niin nemariarmiayi .

text: And the passover , a feast of the Jews , was nigh .
text2: Israer - shuara paskuanamperi ishichik ajasmatai Jesussha ni unuiniamurijiai Náinnium waka nui pujusmiayi .

text: When Jesus then lifted up his eyes , and saw a great company come unto him , he saith unto Philip , Whence shall we buy bread , that these may eat ?
text2: Jesussha Untsurí aents wininian Wáiniak Jiripin Tímiayi " Timiá Untsurí shuar ayuratniusha ṡtuyan yurumak sumaktaj ~ i ? ' Tímiayi .

text: And this he said to prove him : for he himself knew what he would do .
text2: Kame Jesuska Nii Túrattana nuna neka asa Jiripi warittin tusa Tímiayi .

text: Philip answered him , Two hundred pennyworth of bread is not sufficient for them , that every one of them may take a little .
text2: Jiripisha Nuyá Tímiayi " Timiá nukap kuitjai tanta sumakmesha Ashí ishichik susamsha jeachaintjia " Tímiayi .

text: One of his disciples , Andrew , Simon Peter ' s brother , saith unto him ,
text2: Nuyá Chíkich unuiniamuri Antres , Pitru yachi , Tímiayi

text: There is a lad here , which hath five barley loaves , and two small fishes : but what are they among so many ?
text2: " Uchi jui senku ( 5 ) tantan Jimiará namakjai takakui . Ausha Timiá Untsurínmasha jeatpiash " Tímiayi .

text: And Jesus said , Make the men sit down . Now there was much grass in the place . So the men sat down , in number about five thousand .
text2: Nuyanka " " Ashí pujustarum " titiarum " Tímiayi Jesus . Aishmansha nuwasha uchisha irunmiayi . Tura Chírichri Núkap aa asamtai nuisha senku mir ( 5 . 000 ) aishman pujusarmiayi .

text: And Jesus took the loaves ; and when he had given thanks , he distributed to the disciples , and the disciples to them that were set down ; and likewise of the fishes as much as they would .
text2: Jesussha nu tantan achik Yúsan yuminkias ni unuiniamurin susamiayi . Niisha Ashí nui pujuinian Súsarmiayi . Namaknasha Núnisan Ashí ni wakeriarmiania nuna Súsarmiayi .

text: When they were filled , he said unto his disciples , Gather up the fragments that remain , that nothing be lost .
text2: Jémararmataisha Jesus ni unuiniamurin Tímiayi " Ampirma Júukrum chankinnium chumpiatarum . Wasúrnákain . "

text: Therefore they gathered them together , and filled twelve baskets with the fragments of the five barley loaves , which remained over and above unto them that had eaten .
text2: Niisha senku ( 5 ) tantanmaya ampirman Júukar tuse ( 12 ) chankinnium aimkiarmiayi .

text: Then those men , when they had seen the miracle that Jesus did , said , This is of a truth that prophet that should come into the world .
text2: Nu shuarsha Jesus Túramun iisar tiarmiayi " Ju nekas Yúsnan etserin Tátinia Núchakait . "

text: When Jesus therefore perceived that they would come and take him by force , to make him a king , he departed again into a mountain himself alone .
text2: Shuar Jesusan uunt akupin awajsataj tutai Jesus Nekáa Ninki Náinnium wémiayi .

text: And when even was now come , his disciples went down unto the sea ,
text2: Kíakui Jesusa unuiniamuri antumiannum wearmiayi .

text: And entered into a ship , and went over the sea toward Capernaum . And it was now dark , and Jesus was not come to them .
text2: Káshisha Jesus tuke Táchamtai uunt kanunam Enkemáwar Kapernáum péprunam wéenak Jíinkiarmiayi .

text: And the sea arose by reason of a great wind that blew .
text2: Tura nase ti Umpúakui Chíchimi ti wajaimiayi .

text: So when they had rowed about five and twenty or thirty furlongs , they see Jesus walking on the sea , and drawing nigh unto the ship : and they were afraid .
text2: Ajapén ajasar Jesus Entsá Pátatek nanamas Tíjiuch winian Wáinkiar ashamkarmiayi .

text: But he saith unto them , It is I ; be not afraid .
text2: Tura Jesus " Wiitjai . Ashamprukairap " Tímiayi .

text: Then they willingly received him into the ship : and immediately the ship was at the land whither they went .
text2: Nújainkia ti shiir warasar kanunam itiaawarmiayi . Tura nu chichamtaik ni wéamunam jeawarmiayi .

text: The day following , when the people which stood on the other side of the sea saw that there was none other boat there , save that one whereinto his disciples were entered , and that Jesus went not with his disciples into the boat , but that his disciples were gone away alone ;
text2: Kashincha Chíkich shuar amain ayuramunam kanararu nekaawarmai . Jesusa unuiniamuri Jesusjainchu chikichik kanu amia nujai wéarun nekaawarmai .

text: ( Howbeit there came other boats from Tiberias nigh unto the place where they did eat bread , after that the Lord had given thanks : )
text2: Nui chichak matsatai Tipirias péprunmaya Chíkich kanu Táarmiayi . Yau Jesus Yúsan yuminkias tantan ayuramunam Tíjiuch Táarmatai

text: When the people therefore saw that Jesus was not there , neither his disciples , they also took shipping , and came to Capernaum , seeking for Jesus .
text2: nu shuar , Jesussha ni unuiniamurisha nui atsuiniakui , nu kanunam Enkemáwar Kapernáum péprunam Jesusan Eáktajtsa wearmiayi .

text: And when they had found him on the other side of the sea , they said unto him , Rabbi , when camest thou hither ?
text2: Entsa amain Jesusan Wáinkiar aniasarmiayi " Uunta , ṡUrutía juisha Támam ? "

text: Jesus answered them and said , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Ye seek me , not because ye saw the miracles , but because ye did eat of the loaves , and were filled .
text2: Jesussha Tímiayi " Ti nekas Tájarme . Aents tujintiamu Nekáa asarum éatsurme . Antsu tanta yuarum jémaru asarum éatrume .

text: Labour not for the meat which perisheth , but for that meat which endureth unto everlasting life , which the Son of man shall give unto you : for him hath God the Father sealed .
text2: Juyá yurumak amuukatin asamtai ti pachisairap . Antsu amuukashtin yurumak tuke iwiaaku pujustinian amaana nu takarsatniuiti . Nú yurumkanka Wi , Aents Ajasu asan , susattajrume . Yus Apa nuna Túratniun surus " Juka Shuáran Yáinkiartiniaiti " Túrutui " Tímiayi .

text: Then said they unto him , What shall we do , that we might work the works of God ?
text2: Tutai inintrusarmiayi " ṡWarí Túratniuitiaj ~ i Yus wakerana nu umiktin ? "

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , This is the work of God , that ye believe on him whom he hath sent .
text2: Jesussha Tímiayi " Yus akupta asa Winia Enentáimtursarat tusa wakerawai . "

text: They said therefore unto him , What sign shewest thou then , that we may see , and believe thee ? what dost thou work ?
text2: Tutai aniasarmiayi " ṡAentsti tujintiamuka Warí Túrattam ii iisar Amin nekas Enentáimtustin ? Chikichcha Túratá .

text: Our fathers did eat manna in the desert ; as it is written , He gave them bread from heaven to eat .
text2: Yaunchu ii uuntri aents atsamunam Maná yurumkan nayaimpinmaya susamun Yurumáwarmiayi . Yus - Chichamnum Núnik aarmaiti : " Nayaimpinmaya yurumkan Yus susamiayi . " Tu aarmaiti " tiarmiayi .

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Moses gave you not that bread from heaven ; but my Father giveth you the true bread from heaven .
text2: Jesussha Tímiayi " Wi Tájana nu nekasaiti . Muisais Atumí uuntrin nayaimpinmaya yurumkan Súsachmiayi . Antsu winia Apar Yamái nekas apatkun nayaimpinmaya Súramui .

text: For the bread of God is he which cometh down from heaven , and giveth life unto the world .
text2: Iis , Yusaiya apatkunka , nayaimpinmaya Tára nu Súramui tura nekas apatuk asa Ashí shuaran nekas iwiaakman Súawai . "

text: Then said they unto him , Lord , evermore give us this bread .
text2: Tutai " Uunta , nu apatuk tuke amasta " tiarmiayi .

text: And Jesus said unto them , I am the bread of life : he that cometh to me shall never hunger ; and he that believeth on me shall never thirst .
text2: Tura Jesussha Tímiayi " Wiitjai nu apatuk nekas iwiaakman Súana nu . Winí winiana Nú shuar penké tsukamashtatui , tura Winia Enentáimturna nusha tuke kitiaarchattawai .

text: But I said unto you , That ye also have seen me , and believe not .
text2: Túrasha wi Túramu Wáinkiurmesha winia chichamur Enentáimtatsrume .

text: All that the Father giveth me shall come to me ; and him that cometh to me I will in no wise cast out .
text2: Ashí shuaran winia Apar tsankatrukarmiania nu , Wíi shuar ajasartatui . Winin winiana Núnaka penké nakitrashtatjai .

text: For I came down from heaven , not to do mine own will , but the will of him that sent me .
text2: Wi wakeraj nuna Túratniun Táchaitjai antsu Winia akuptukmia nuna umirkatniun Táwitjai .

text: And this is the Father ' s will which hath sent me , that of all which he hath given me I should lose nothing , but should raise it up again at the last day .
text2: Winia Apar akuptukuiti tura juna wakerawai . Ashí winia tsankatrukman Emenkátsuk amuukatin tsawantai iniantkiarat tusa wakerawai .

text: And this is the will of him that sent me , that every one which seeth the Son , and believeth on him , may have everlasting life : and I will raise him up at the last day .
text2: Yus Apa wakerana nu Júiti . Ashí shuar Winia " Yusa Uchirinti " tu Enentáimturkui yamaram iwiaakman tuke takusat tusa wakerawai . Nú shuarnaka amuukatin tsawantai iniantkittiajai " Tímiayi Jesus .

text: The Jews then murmured at him , because he said , I am the bread which came down from heaven .
text2: Tura Jesus " Wiitjai , nayaimpinmaya apatuk akupkamu " takui Israer - shuar Jesusan áujmatiarmiayi .

text: And they said , Is not this Jesus , the son of Joseph , whose father and mother we know ? how is it then that he saith , I came down from heaven ?
text2: Tura tiarmiayi " Ju Jesuschakait , Jusé Uchiríya nu . Iikia ni Aparísha Nukurísha nékatsjik . ṡItiurak " Nayaimpinmaya Táraitjai " ta ? " tiarmiayi .

text: Jesus therefore answered and said unto them , Murmur not among yourselves .
text2: Jesussha Tímiayi " Tu áujmatrukairap .

text: No man can come to me , except the Father which hath sent me draw him : and I will raise him up at the last day .
text2: Shuáran winia Apar Akúpturkachuitkiuinkia penké weanturkachainti . Tura Winia akupturna nuna amuukatin tsawantai Iniántkíttiajai .

text: It is written in the prophets , And they shall be all taught of God . Every man therefore that hath heard , and hath learned of the Father , cometh unto me .
text2: Yúsnan etserniu aarmarin tawai " Ashí Yus jintintiamu ártatui " . Núnisan Ashí Yusa chichamen antukar unuimiatainiakka Winí Táiniawai ' Tímiayi .

text: Not that any man hath seen the Father , save he which is of God , he hath seen the Father .
text2: ` Aya Wiki Yúsaiya tau asan Yúsan Wáinkiaitjai . Chíkichka penké Wáinkiachuiti .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that believeth on me hath everlasting life .
text2: Ti nekas Tájarme . Winia Enentáimturna Nú shuarka yamaram iwiaakman amuukashtinian takakui .

text: I am that bread of life .
text2: Wikia iwiaakman Súana Nú apatkuitjai .

text: Your fathers did eat manna in the wilderness , and are dead .
text2: Iis , Atumí uuntri aents atsamunam Maná yurumkan Yúawariatcha Ashí Jákarmiayi .

text: This is the bread which cometh down from heaven , that a man may eat thereof , and not die .
text2: Antsu Wi Tájana Nú apatkun shuar Yúakka Jákachartatui .

text: I am the living bread which came down from heaven : if any man eat of this bread , he shall live for ever : and the bread that I will give is my flesh , which I will give for the life of the world .
text2: Wikia nayaimpinmaya iwiaaku apatkuitjai . Nu apatkun shuar yuakka tuke iwiaaku átiniaiti . Nu apatkun Wi susattaj nusha winia ayashruiti . Ashí shuar Yusai iwiaaku pujusarti tusan winia ayashrun susattajai " Tímiayi Jesus .

text: The Jews therefore strove among themselves , saying , How can this man give us his flesh to eat ?
text2: Nuyá Nuámtak áujmattsar tiarmiayi " ṡItiurak ni ayashinkesha ayurtamattaj ~ i ? " tiarmiayi .

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Except ye eat the flesh of the Son of man , and drink his blood , ye have no life in you .
text2: Jesussha Tímiayi " Ti nekas Tájarme , Wi Aents Ajasu asamtai winia ayashur Yúatniuitrume . Winia ayashur Yúachmeka tura winia numpar umarchamka nekas iwiaaku pujatsrume .

text: Whoso eateth my flesh , and drinketh my blood , hath eternal life ; and I will raise him up at the last day .
text2: Winia ayashrun Yúana nuka tura winia numparun úmakka yamaram iwiaakman amuukashtinian takakui . Tura nu shuaran amuukatin tsawantai Iniántkíttiajai .

text: For my flesh is meat indeed , and my blood is drink indeed .
text2: Winia ayashruka nekas yurumkaiti tura winia numparsha nekas umutainti .

text: He that eateth my flesh , and drinketh my blood , dwelleth in me , and I in him .
text2: Winia ayashruncha Yúaka tura winia numparnasha úmaka Wijiai tsanin pujawai tura Wisha nu shuarjai tsaninkian pujajai .

text: As the living Father hath sent me , and I live by the Father : so he that eateth me , even he shall live by me .
text2: Yus Apa , Winia akuptukuka , nu iwiaakma nérenniuiti . Tuma asamtai ni iwiaakmariin iwiaaku pujajai . Núnisan Winia yurakka winia iwiaakmarui iwiaaku pujustatui .

text: This is that bread which came down from heaven : not as your fathers did eat manna , and are dead : he that eateth of this bread shall live for ever .
text2: Nayaimpinmaya apatkun tajai . Ju apatuk Maná yurumka aintsachuiti . Atumí uuntri Maná yurumkan yuawarsha Ashí Jákarmiayi . Antsu ju apatkun shuar Yúakka tuke iwiaaku pujustatui " Tímiayi Jesus .

text: These things said he in the synagogue , as he taught in Capernaum .
text2: Núnaka Jesus Israer - shuar iruntainiam unuiniarmiayi .

text: Many therefore of his disciples , when they had heard this , said , This is an hard saying ; who can hear it ?
text2: Nu chichaman antukar Jesusa unuiniamuri chicharainiak " Nii tana nu ti itiurchat asamtai ṡyaki antukminiait ? " tiarmiayi .

text: When Jesus knew in himself that his disciples murmured at it , he said unto them , Doth this offend you ?
text2: Jesussha ni áujmatman Nekáa Tímiayi " Atum " ju chicham itiurchataiti " Tárumek .

text: What and if ye shall see the Son of man ascend up where he was before ?
text2: Wátsek , Wi nayaimpiniam pujumiaj nui waketkimtaisha ṡurukawaintrumek ?

text: It is the spirit that quickeneth ; the flesh profiteth nothing : the words that I speak unto you , they are spirit , and they are life .
text2: Warí , aya wakanik iwiaakman Súwaiti . Ayashkia penké aantraiti nekas iwiaaku awajsatniun . Wi Tájana nujai Imiá nekas wakankia iwiaaku awajsamniaiti " Tímiayi Jesus .

text: But there are some of you that believe not . For Jesus knew from the beginning who they were that believed not , and who should betray him .
text2: Tura Jesus Niin Enentáimtachun tura Niin suruktatna nunasha yaunchu neka asa ni unuiniamurin Tímiayi " Atumíincha winia chichamprun Enentáimtachu tuke awai .

text: And he said , Therefore said I unto you , that no man can come unto me , except it were given unto him of my Father .
text2: Nu asamtai Tímiajrume " Shuáran winia Apar akupturkachmaitkiuinkia penké weanturkachainti " Tímiajai " Tímiayi Jesus .

text: From that time many of his disciples went back , and walked no more with him .
text2: Nuyasha ni nemarniuri Untsurí armia nu Jesusan ikiukiar atakka Niijiai wekasacharmiayi .

text: Then said Jesus unto the twelve , Will ye also go away ?
text2: Nuyá Jesus ni tuse ( 12 ) unuiniamurin chicharainiak " ṡAtumsha wétin wakerarmek ? " Tímiayi .

text: Then Simon Peter answered him , Lord , to whom shall we go ? thou hast the words of eternal life .
text2: Semun Pítrusha áikmiayi " Uunta , ṡYáinin wetaj ~ i ? Ame chichammijiain nekas iwiaaku áminiaiti .

text: And we believe and are sure that thou art that Christ , the Son of the living God .
text2: Ame Kristu asam nekas iwiaaku Yusa Uchirínme . Nuka Enentáimtusar ti paant nékaji " Tímiayi .

text: Jesus answered them , Have not I chosen you twelve , and one of you is a devil ?
text2: Jesussha Tímiayi " Ashí tuse ( 12 ) árumna nu achikiuitjiarme nekas Wíi shuar ajastin . Tuma ain Atumíin chikichik iwianchiiti " Tímiayi .

text: He spake of Judas Iscariot the son of Simon : for he it was that should betray him , being one of the twelve .
text2: Nuna taku Jútas Iskariútin , Semunka Uchirín , Enentáimtus Tímiayi . Jútassha ni unuiniamurintiat Jesusan ukunam surukmiayi .

text: After these things Jesus walked in Galilee : for he would not walk in Jewry , because the Jews sought to kill him .
text2: Nu nankaamasmatai Jesus Kariréa nunkanam wekaimiayi . Jutía nunkanam wéchamiayi Israer - shuara uuntri nui Máataj tutai .

text: Now the Jews ' feast of tabernacles was at hand .
text2: Tura Israer - shuar aak aakmatai namperi jeatemamtai

text: His brethren therefore said unto him , Depart hence , and go into Judaea , that thy disciples also may see the works that thou doest .
text2: Jesusa yachi wishikiainiak tiarmiayi " ṡUrukamtai juisha pujam ? Jutía nunkanam Wetá , aisha ame unuiniamuram Túram nuna iisarat .

text: For there is no man that doeth any thing in secret , and he himself seeketh to be known openly . If thou do these things , shew thyself to the world .
text2: Ashí shuar nekaawarat Tákumka úukam Túrawaip . Ti tujintiamu Túriniaitkiumka Ashí shuar iimmianum Túratá " tiarmiayi .

text: For neither did his brethren believe in him .
text2: Ni yachisha ishichkisha Niin Enentáimtachu ásar tiarmiayi .

text: Then Jesus said unto them , My time is not yet come : but your time is alway ready .
text2: Tura Jesus Tímiayi " Winia tsawantur nampernum wétin jeatsui . Atumjainkia Nánkamas tsawant wétin pénkeraiti .

text: The world cannot hate you ; but me it hateth , because I testify of it , that the works thereof are evil .
text2: Ju nunkanmaya aents atumniaka kajertamatsrume . Antsu ni tunaarin etsertin asamtai Wíniaka kajertuiniawai .

text: Go ye up unto this feast : I go not up yet unto this feast ; for my time is not yet full come .
text2: Atumka nampernum wetarum . Wikia tsawantur jeachkui wéatsjai . "

text: When he had said these words unto them , he abode still in Galilee .
text2: Juna tinia Jesuska Kariréa nunkanam Juákmiayi .

text: But when his brethren were gone up , then went he also up unto the feast , not openly , but as it were in secret .
text2: Ni yachi wearmatai Jesussha nampernum wémiayi . Tura nekarawarain tusa úumak wémiayi .

text: Then the Jews sought him at the feast , and said , Where is he ?
text2: Israer - shuara uuntrisha Námper irunturmanum eakar " Nu aishmansha ṡtuin Pujá ? " tiarmiayi .

text: And there was much murmuring among the people concerning him : for some said , He is a good man : others said , Nay ; but he deceiveth the people .
text2: Ashí shuarsha Niin áujmatiarmiayi . Chíkich " pénkeraiti " tiarmiayi . Tura chikichcha " Pénkerchaiti . Aya anankartawai " tiarmiayi .

text: Howbeit no man spake openly of him for fear of the Jews .
text2: Tura Israer - shuara uuntrin ashamainiak uuk áujmatiarmiayi .

text: Now about the midst of the feast Jesus went up into the temple , and taught .
text2: Nampersha ajapén ajasmatai Jesus Yusa Uunt Jeen Wayá Shuáran unuiniamiayi .

text: And the Jews marvelled , saying , How knoweth this man letters , having never learned ?
text2: Israer - shuara uuntrisha nuna iisar ti Enentáimsar chichaak " Jusha Unuimiátrachiatcha ṡitiurak Imiá neka ? " tiarmiayi .

text: Jesus answered them , and said , My doctrine is not mine , but his that sent me .
text2: Jesussha Tímiayi " Wi unuiniajna nu winia chichampruchuiti antsu Winia akuptukua Núnan unuiniajai .

text: If any man will do his will , he shall know of the doctrine , whether it be of God , or whether I speak of myself .
text2: Yus wakerana nuna shuar nekas umiktinian wakerakka winia chichamprun nekaattawai . Nekas Yúsnaitkiuinkia , nuna nekaattawai . Aya wi Enentáimmiajain chichaakuisha , nuna nekaattawai .

text: He that speaketh of himself seeketh his own glory : but he that seeketh his glory that sent him , the same is true , and no unrighteousness is in him .
text2: Ni Enentáimmiajai chichaana nuka Ashí shiir Enentáimtursarti tusa chichaawai . Antsu niin akupka nuna shiir awajsarti tusa wakerak , nekas Wáitratsuk tawai .

text: Did not Moses give you the law , and yet none of you keepeth the law ? Why go ye about to kill me ?
text2: Muisais Yusa akupkamurin Atumí uuntrin amaschamka . Tuma ain nu umitsuk mantuatin wakerutarme " Tímiayi Jesus .

text: The people answered and said , Thou hast a devil : who goeth about to kill thee ?
text2: Nu shuarsha tiarmiayi " Wáurtsumek . ṡYa mantamataj tusa wakera ? "

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , I have done one work , and ye all marvel .
text2: Jesussha Tímiayi " Ayampratin tsawantai Chikichkí Túramtai ti Enentáimtsurmek .

text: Moses therefore gave unto you circumcision ; ( not because it is of Moses , but of the fathers ; ) and ye on the sabbath day circumcise a man .
text2: Muisais Ashí tsupirnaktinian akupkachmiayi . Antsu ni uuntrinkia nuna akupka ainiawai . Tuma ain átumka Muisais akupkamu umiktai tusarum ayampratin tsawantaisha uchi aishman Tsúpirnaitrume .

text: If a man on the sabbath day receive circumcision , that the law of Moses should not be broken ; are ye angry at me , because I have made a man every whit whole on the sabbath day ?
text2: Wátsek , Muisais akupkamu uminkiati tusarum ayampratin tsawantaisha uchi aishman Tsúpirkurmekaka ṡurukamtai Wi ayampratin tsawantai aishmanka Ayashí takamtsuk Tsuármatai kajertarum ?

text: Judge not according to the appearance , but judge righteous judgment .
text2: Shuar Túrana nu iisam Wárik Súmamtikiawaip . Antsu Inintrúsam paant nekaam , nekasa nu Enentáimtusta " Tímiayi Jesus .

text: Then said some of them of Jerusalem , Is not this he , whom they seek to kill ?
text2: Nuyá Jerusarénnumia shuar tiarmiayi " Maatai tuinia Núchakait .

text: But , lo , he speaketh boldly , and they say nothing unto him . Do the rulers know indeed that this is the very Christ ?
text2: Tura nui Ashí ántamunam étserui tura suntar Páchiniatsui . ṡIi uuntrisha " Nekas Krístuiti " tu Enentáimtuiniawash ?

text: Howbeit we know this man whence he is : but when Christ cometh , no man knoweth whence he is .
text2: Antsu nekas Kristu taa tuyan Winiá nekanashtatui tura ju pujamuka Ashí nékaji " tiarmiayi .

text: Then cried Jesus in the temple as he taught , saying , Ye both know me , and ye know whence I am : and I am not come of myself , but he that sent me is true , whom ye know not .
text2: Jesus nuna antuk , Yusa Uunt Jeen Wajá kakaram chichaak Tímiayi " Winia nekararum Tuyá winiaj nu nékarme . Kame Núnisrum Enentáimprume . Tura winia Enentáirjai Táchaitjai antsu winia Apar akuptukuiti . Niisha ti nekas akupniusha átumka nékatsrume .

text: But I know him : for I am from him , and he hath sent me .
text2: Antsu Winia akuptukuitkiui aiya tau asan Wikia nékajai " Tímiayi .

text: Then they sought to take him : but no man laid hands on him , because his hour was not yet come .
text2: Nuyá sepunam enkeataj Táyat achikcharmiayi ni tsawantri jeachu asamtai .

text: And many of the people believed on him , and said , When Christ cometh , will he do more miracles than these which this man hath done ?
text2: Tura Untsurí shuar Niin Enentáimtusar " Kristu ta ṡnuna nankaamas aentsti tujintiamun Túratpiash ? " tiarmiayi .

text: The Pharisees heard that the people murmured such things concerning him ; and the Pharisees and the chief priests sent officers to take him .
text2: Pariséusha Israer - patri uuntrisha Jesusnan timian antukar suntaran akupkarmiayi Jesusan achikiar sepunam enkeawarat tusar .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , Yet a little while am I with you , and then I go unto him that sent me .
text2: Nuyá Jesussha Tímiayi " Aya ishichik tsawant atumjai pujustatjai . Nuyá ataksha Winia akuptuku pujana nui waketkittiajai .

text: Ye shall seek me , and shall not find me : and where I am , thither ye cannot come .
text2: Atumka Eátkáttarme tura Wi wéajna nui wéchamniaitkiuram Wáitkiashtatrume . "

text: Then said the Jews among themselves , Whither will he go , that we shall not find him ? will he go unto the dispersed among the Gentiles , and teach the Gentiles ?
text2: Israer - shuarsha nuamtak aniniaisarmiayi " ṡJusha tui wéakuin iisha Wáinkiashtataj ~ i . Israer - shuar apachnium pujuinia nui we apachin unuiniartatuak .

text: What manner of saying is this that he said , Ye shall seek me , and shall not find me : and where I am , thither ye cannot come ?
text2: Nii timia nu itiurkit . " Atumka Eátkáttarme tura Wi wéajna nui wéchamniaitkiuram Wáitkiashtatrume " tana nu itiurkit ? " tiarmiayi .

text: In the last day , that great day of the feast , Jesus stood and cried , saying , If any man thirst , let him come unto me , and drink .
text2: Jista Amúamunam ti shiir najanawarmia nu tsawantai Jesus wajaki kakaram chichaak Tímiayi " Shuar ni Enentáin kitiamakka Winin taa umar kitiakén Imíkráti .

text: He that believeth on me , as the scripture hath said , out of his belly shall flow rivers of living water .
text2: Winia Enentáimturna nuka ni Enentáiya entsa wa aintsan yamaram iwiaakman Súana Nú entsa jiinkittiawai . "

text: ( But this spake he of the Spirit , which they that believe on him should receive : for the Holy Ghost was not yet given ; because that Jesus was not yet glorified . )
text2: Nuna taku Jesus " Ashí Yúsan Enentáimtusarun Yusa Shiir Wakaní Súsatniuiti " Tímiayi . Tura Núnisan Yus - Papiniumsha aarmaiti . Antsu Jesus tuke nayaimpiniam wéatsain Yusa Wakaní shuar Súsachmauyayi .

text: Many of the people therefore , when they heard this saying , said , Of a truth this is the Prophet .
text2: Chíkich shuarsha nuna antukar " Ju nekas Yúsnan etserin Tátinia Núiti " tiarmiayi .

text: Others said , This is the Christ . But some said , Shall Christ come out of Galilee ?
text2: Chikichcha " Juka nekas Krístuiti " tiarmiayi . Tura Chíkichkia Jesus Kariréanmayaiti tu Enentáimiainiak tiarmiayi " Warí , ṡKariréa nunkanmaya Kristu áminkiait ?

text: Hath not the scripture said , That Christ cometh of the seed of David , and out of the town of Bethlehem , where David was ?
text2: Yus - Papinium paant tawai " Krístuka yaunchu uunt akupin Tawit weeanmaya akiiniatniuiti , tawai . Tura Tawitia pépruriya Pirinnumia átiniaiti " tawai " tiarmiayi .

text: So there was a division among the people because of him .
text2: Tuma asamtai shuar Niisháa Niisháa Enentáimprar kanakiarmiayi .

text: And some of them would have taken him ; but no man laid hands on him .
text2: Chíkich aiya nuka " sepunam enkeatai " tiarmiayi Túrasha Túracharmiayi .

text: Then came the officers to the chief priests and Pharisees ; and they said unto them , Why have ye not brought him ?
text2: Suntarsha waketkiarmiayi . Tura Pariséusha Israer - patri uuntrisha " ṡUrukamtai itiachuram ? " tiarmiayi .

text: The officers answered , Never man spake like this man .
text2: Suntarsha tiarmiayi " Chikichkisha ju aishman chichaa aanis chichaschaiti " tiarmiayi .

text: Then answered them the Pharisees , Are ye also deceived ?
text2: Nuyá Pariséu tiarmiayi " Atumsha anannarume .

text: Have any of the rulers or of the Pharisees believed on him ?
text2: Pariséutisha uuntcha nuna Enentáimtuiniawash .

text: But this people who knoweth not the law are cursed .
text2: Penké shuarka yaunchu akupkamun nékachua nuka yajauchiniam yuminkramu ainiawai " tiarmiayi .

text: Nicodemus saith unto them , ( he that came to Jesus by night , being one of them , )
text2: Nikiutémusha , kashi Jesusan tarimia nu , Pariséuitiat Tímiayi

text: Doth our law judge any man , before it hear him , and know what he doeth ?
text2: " Ii shuartikia , shuar ni Túramun etserkamu ántutsuk Súmamtikiachminiaiti " Tímiayi .

text: They answered and said unto him , Art thou also of Galilee ? Search , and look : for out of Galilee ariseth no prophet .
text2: Nuinkia niisha tiarmiayi " Wats , amesha Kariréanmayanchuashitiam . Yus - Chicham áujsam nekaattame . Kariréanmaya Yúsnan etserin penké Táiniatsui " tiarmiayi .

text: And every man went unto his own house .
text2: Nuyá Ashí ni jeen waketkiarmiayi .

text: Jesus went unto the mount of Olives .
text2: Tura Jesuska Uriwiu Náinnium wémiayi .

text: And early in the morning he came again into the temple , and all the people came unto him ; and he sat down , and taught them .
text2: Tura kashin tsawar Yusa Uunt Jeen atak Támatai Ashí shuar Niin Káutkarmiayi . Túrawarmatai Jesus pujus unuiniarmiayi .

text: And the scribes and Pharisees brought unto him a woman taken in adultery ; and when they had set her in the midst ,
text2: Nuyá Israer - shuara jintinniurisha Pariséusha nuwan Wáinmakman Jesusan itiariarmiayi . Tura Ashí iruntramunam ajapén awajsarmiayi .

text: They say unto him , Master , this woman was taken in adultery , in the very act .
text2: Tura Jesusan tiarmiayi " Uunta , ju nuwa tsanirma Pujá achinkiayi .

text: Now Moses in the law commanded us , that such should be stoned : but what sayest thou ?
text2: Muisais akupkamunmasha nuna Túraka " kayajai tukurar Máatniuiti " tawai . ṡAmesha warintmea ? " tiarmiayi .

text: This they said , tempting him , that they might have to accuse him . But Jesus stooped down , and with his finger wrote on the ground , as though he heard them not .
text2: Aya mamikmar nekapsatai tusar tiarmiayi . Niin sumamtikiatniun wakeriarmiayi . Nuyá Jesus Tsuntsumá ni uwejéjai Nunká aarmiayi .

text: So when they continued asking him , he lifted up himself , and said unto them , He that is without sin among you , let him first cast a stone at her .
text2: Tura tuke Iníam wajaki Tímiayi " Ayu , atumiiya Tunáa Túrichu ákunka kayan achik niin emka tukuti " Tímiayi .

text: And again he stooped down , and wrote on the ground .
text2: Tura nuna ti , ataksha Tsuntsumá Nunká aimiayi .

text: And they which heard it , being convicted by their own conscience , went out one by one , beginning at the eldest , even unto the last : and Jesus was left alone , and the woman standing in the midst .
text2: Tura ni chichamen antukar ni Enentáin sumamawar uuntnumia Jukí chikichik chikichik jiinki wéarmiayi . Ashí wéarmatai Jesus Ninki Nuwájai Juákmiayi .

text: When Jesus had lifted up himself , and saw none but the woman , he said unto her , Woman , where are those thine accusers ? hath no man condemned thee ?
text2: Jesussha wajaki aya nuwanak Wáiniak Tímiayi " ṡAmin Súmamtikramainia nusha tuin pujuinia . Chikichkisha áwak ? " Tímiayi .

text: She said , No man , Lord . And Jesus said unto her , Neither do I condemn thee : go , and sin no more .
text2: Niisha " Atsá , Uunta . Chikichkisha atsawai " Tímiayi . Nuyá Jesus Tímiayi . " Ayu . Wisha Súmamtikiatsjame . Yamaikia weme atakka Tunáa Túrawaip " Tímiayi .

text: Then spake Jesus again unto them , saying , I am the light of the world : he that followeth me shall not walk in darkness , but shall have the light of life .
text2: Ataksha Jesus Yusa Uunt Jeen iruntrarun Tímiayi " Ju nunkanam Wi Tsáapninia aintsan shuara Enentáin Tsáapniajai . Ashí Wijiai tsanin wekaana Nú shuar ni Enentáin kiritniunam wekasashtatui antsu Tsáapnin yamaram iwiaakman Súana nujai wekasattawai . "

text: The Pharisees therefore said unto him , Thou bearest record of thyself ; thy record is not true .
text2: Pariséu nuikia tiarmiayi " Ame pénkerum tau asam Támena nu aantraiti . "

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Though I bear record of myself , yet my record is true : for I know whence I came , and whither I go ; but ye cannot tell whence I come , and whither I go .
text2: Jesus Tímiayi " Tuyá winiaj tura tui weaj nu nékatsrume , tura Wikia nékajai . Tuma asan winia pénkerun Táyatnak Tájana nu pénkeraiti .

text: Ye judge after the flesh ; I judge no man .
text2: Ju nunkanmaya aents Enentáimmiajai Enentáimtakrum ti Súmamtikrume . Tura Wikia chikichkinkesha Súmamtiktsujai .

text: And yet if I judge , my judgment is true : for I am not alone , but I and the Father that sent me .
text2: Tura Súmamtikkiunka awajitsuk Túrajai . Iis , Wiki shuar Túramun pénkerashit tusan Enentáimtsujai antsu winia Apar Winia akuptukua nusha Wijiai métek shuar Túramun nékawai .

text: It is also written in your law , that the testimony of two men is true .
text2: Atumí akupkamuriin aarmaiti : " Jimiará shuar mai Nú chichamnak Tákuinkia nu chicham nekasaiti . "

text: I am one that bear witness of myself , and the Father that sent me beareth witness of me .
text2: Wátsek Wisha winia Aparsha mai métek taji . Winia Aparsha akuptukuiti " Tímiayi .

text: Then said they unto him , Where is thy Father ? Jesus answered , Ye neither know me , nor my Father : if ye had known me , ye should have known my Father also .
text2: Tutai " ṡAme apasha tui Pujá ? " tiarmiayi . Jesussha Tímiayi " Atumka Winiasha winia Aparsha nékatsrume . Winia nékarkurmeka winia Aparsha nekaawaintrume . "

text: These words spake Jesus in the treasury , as he taught in the temple : and no man laid hands on him ; for his hour was not yet come .
text2: Nuna Yusa Uunt Jeen Yusa Kuítrin suinia nui Tímiayi . Tuma ain sepunam enkeatniun achikcharmiayi ni tsawantri jeachu asamtai .

text: Then said Jesus again unto them , I go my way , and ye shall seek me , and shall die in your sins : whither I go , ye cannot come .
text2: Jesus ataksha Tímiayi " Wikia wéajai . Atumsha Eátkáttarme tura wi wéamunam wéchamniaitkiuram Atumí tunaarijiain jakattarme . "

text: Then said the Jews , Will he kill himself ? because he saith , Whither I go , ye cannot come .
text2: Israer - shuarsha tiarmiayi " Wi wéamunam wéchamniaitrume " tutai , nuinkia Máamatpiash " tiarmiayi .

text: And he said unto them , Ye are from beneath ; I am from above : ye are of this world ; I am not of this world .
text2: Nuinkia Jesus Tímiayi " Atumka nunkayaitrume antsu Wikia nayaimpinmayaitjai . Ju nunkayaitrume tura Wikia juyanchuitjai .

text: I said therefore unto you , that ye shall die in your sins : for if ye believe not that I am he , ye shall die in your sins .
text2: Tuma asamtai Tájarme " Atumi tunaarijiai jakattarme . " Nekas Wi Tájana Núitjai . Tura nu Enentáimtachkurmeka atumi tunaarijiai jakattarme " Tímiayi .

text: Then said they unto him , Who art thou ? And Jesus saith unto them , Even the same that I said unto you from the beginning .
text2: Niisha aniasarmiayi " ṡAmesha Yáitiam ? " Jesussha Tímiayi " Yaunchu Tájarme .

text: I have many things to say and to judge of you : but he that sent me is true ; and I speak to the world those things which I have heard of him .
text2: Nu arantcha atumin Súmamtikiatjarum tusan ti Tíminiaitjai . Winia Apar akuptukua nuka tuke nekasa nuna tawai . Tura aya ni taman antukan Ashí shuaran nunak tajai " Tímiayi .

text: They understood not that he spake to them of the Father .
text2: Tuma ain ni Aparin áujmatman penké nekaacharmiayi .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , When ye have lifted up the Son of man , then shall ye know that I am he , and that I do nothing of myself ; but as my Father hath taught me , I speak these things .
text2: Tuma asamtai Tímiayi " Aents Ajasuitjiana ju , numiniam ajintruarum Yakí takuriakrumin Nújainkia nekarattarme . Wi Tájana Núitjai tura winia Enentáirjain takatsuk aya winia Apar unuitiurmanak Tájai .

text: And he that sent me is with me : the Father hath not left me alone ; for I do always those things that please him .
text2: Winia akuptukua nuka tuke Wíjiain pujawai . Winia Apar wakeramun tuke shiir Túrakui ikiurkichuiti " Tímiayi .

text: As he spake these words , many believed on him .
text2: Tutai Untsurí shuar Niin nekas Enentáimtusarmiayi .

text: Then said Jesus to those Jews which believed on him , If ye continue in my word , then are ye my disciples indeed ;
text2: Israer - shuaran Niin shiir Enentáimtusarmia nuna Jesus Tímiayi " Wi Tájarmena nu yawetsuk Túrakrumka nekas winia unuiniamur átatrume .

text: And ye shall know the truth , and the truth shall make you free .
text2: Nújaisha Timiá nekas ana nu nekaattarme tura nekas ankant ajastatrume " Tímiayi .

text: They answered him , We be Abraham ' s seed , and were never in bondage to any man : how sayest thou , Ye shall be made free ?
text2: Niisha tiarmiayi " Iisha Apraám weeaitji . Chikicha takarniur átai tusar penké emetachmaitji . ṡUrukamtai " Ankant ajastatrume " tame ? " tiarmiayi .

text: Jesus answered them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Whosoever committeth sin is the servant of sin .
text2: Jesus Tímiayi " Timiá nekasaiti , Ashí shuar tunaan Túruinia nuka nu tunaajai emetamuiti . Tuma asa takarniua Núnisan ajasuiti .

text: And the servant abideth not in the house for ever : but the Son abideth ever .
text2: Takarniusha ajapnamnia asamtai Yus atumin ajapramamniaitrume . Tura Akupniu Uchirínkia ni Aparíjiai tuke pujawai .

text: If the Son therefore shall make you free , ye shall be free indeed .
text2: Tuma asamtai Akupniu Uchirí ankant awajtamsamtainkia Imiá nekas ankant pujustatrume .

text: I know that ye are Abraham ' s seed ; but ye seek to kill me , because my word hath no place in you .
text2: Atum Apraám weeaitrume nékajai . Túmaitiatrum winia chichamur ántachu asarum mantuataj Tárume .

text: I speak that which I have seen with my Father : and ye do that which ye have seen with your father .
text2: Winia Apar iniaktursamun áujmatjai . Atumka Atumí uuntri timia Túrarme " Tímiayi .

text: They answered and said unto him , Abraham is our father . Jesus saith unto them , If ye were Abraham ' s children , ye would do the works of Abraham .
text2: Tutai niisha tiarmiayi " Iikia Israer - shuar asakrin ii uuntrinkia Apraámaiti " tiarmiayi . Tura Jesus Tímiayi " Nekas Enentáimin Apraám weeaitkiurmeka Níiya Núnis Túrawaintrume .

text: But now ye seek to kill me , a man that hath told you the truth , which I have heard of God : this did not Abraham .
text2: Nekas ana nuna Yus iniaktursamtai nuna ujakjarme , tuma ain mantuataj tarume . Apraámka Nuní Túrachmiayi .

text: Ye do the deeds of your father . Then said they to him , We be not born of fornication ; we have one Father , even God .
text2: Antsu Atumí uuntri Túrana aintsarum Túrarme " Tímiayi . Tutai niisha tiarmiayi " Warí , tsanirnumia akiiniachuitji . Ii uuntri Yúskete . Niisha ii Aparínti . "

text: Jesus said unto them , If God were your Father , ye would love me : for I proceeded forth and came from God ; neither came I of myself , but he sent me .
text2: Tura Jesus Tímiayi " Yus nekas atumi Aparíntkiuinkia Winiasha Anentíntrume Yúsnumia tau asamtai . Wisha winia Enentáimmiarjai jui Táchaitjai antsu Yus akuptukuiti .

text: Why do ye not understand my speech ? even because ye cannot hear my word .
text2: ṡUrukamtai Wi Tájana nu Imiá nékatsrum ? Wi Tájana nu nakitia asarum winia chichamur ántatsrume .

text: Ye are of your father the devil , and the lusts of your father ye will do . He was a murderer from the beginning , and abode not in the truth , because there is no truth in him . When he speaketh a lie , he speaketh of his own : for he is a liar , and the father of it .
text2: Atumí Aparínkia uunt iwianchiiti . Tura niiniu asarum nii wakera nu Túrarme . Yámankamtaiksha uunt iwianchkia tuke mankartiniaiti . Nekas ana nunasha nakitiawai tuke Wáitrin asa . Wáitraksha Níiniunak chichaawai . Iis , waitia uuntri asa tuke Wáitriniaiti .

text: And because I tell you the truth , ye believe me not .
text2: Tura Wikia nekas takui átum Enentáimturtsurme .

text: Which of you convinceth me of sin ? And if I say the truth , why do ye not believe me ?
text2: ṡYaki Chikichkí tunaajai Súmamtikruamniait ? Nuikia Wi nekasa nuna tau aisha ṡurukamtai Enentáimturtsuram ?

text: He that is of God heareth God ' s words : ye therefore hear them not , because ye are not of God .
text2: Yús - shuarka Yus timian ántawai tura átum Yúsnachu asarum Wi Tájana nu nakitiarme " Tímiayi .

text: Then answered the Jews , and said unto him , Say we not well that thou art a Samaritan , and hast a devil ?
text2: Nuikia Israer - shuar tiarmiayi " Maa , ti nekas Tátsujik " Ame Samarianmaya Shuáraitme . Tuke yajauch ainiawai nusha . Nu arantcha iwianchrukuitme amesha " nekas taji " tiarmiayi .

text: Jesus answered , I have not a devil ; but I honour my Father , and ye do dishonour me .
text2: Jesussha Tímiayi " Iwianchrukchaitjai . Ayatik winia Aparun shiir Enentáimtikiajai . Tura átumka yajauch chichartarme .

text: And I seek not mine own glory : there is one that seeketh and judgeth .
text2: Wikia " shiir Enentáimturarti " Tátsujai Túrasha Yuska Ashí shuar Winia shiir Enentáimturat tusa wakerawai . Niisha Yus asa Ashí shuar Túramun pénkerashit tusa nekaattawai .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , If a man keep my saying , he shall never see death .
text2: Ti nekasaiti . Wi Tájana nuna Enentáimta Nú shuarka penké Jákashtiniaiti " Tímiayi .

text: Then said the Jews unto him , Now we know that thou hast a devil . Abraham is dead , and the prophets ; and thou sayest , If a man keep my saying , he shall never taste of death .
text2: Nuinkia Israer - shuar tiarmiayi " Pai , yamaikia ti paant íwianch takakme . Apraámsha Ashí Yúsnan etserniusha Jákaruiti tura Ame " Wi Tájana nuna Enentáimtaka penké Jákashtiniaiti " Tátsumek tiarmiayi .

text: Art thou greater than our father Abraham , which is dead ? and the prophets are dead : whom makest thou thyself ?
text2: ṡNuinkia ii uuntri Apraám nankaamaskaitiam . Niisha tura Yúsnan etserniusha Jákacharuk ainia . Itiurak Imiá nankaamantu Enentáimtumam ? " tiarmiayi .

text: Jesus answered , If I honour myself , my honour is nothing : it is my Father that honoureth me ; of whom ye say , that he is your God :
text2: Jesussha Tímiayi " Wiki shiir Enentáimtumaknaka penké aantraiti . Antsu Winia shiir Enentáimturna nu winia Aparuiti . Nusha átumka " winia Yúsruiti " Tárumna Núiti .

text: Yet ye have not known him ; but I know him : and if I should say , I know him not , I shall be a liar like unto you : but I know him , and keep his saying .
text2: Nusha Táyatrum Niin nékatsrume . Wikia Niin nékajai . " Niin nékatsjai " Tákunka atumjai métek Wáitrin aintjai . Tura Niin neka asan Nii tana nuna tuke Túriniaitjai .

text: Your father Abraham rejoiced to see my day : and he saw it , and was glad .
text2: Apraámka , Atumí uuntri , Imiá yaunchu Jákaitiat Wi ju nunkanam Tátinian wararas Nákasmiayi . Tura Wáitiak ti shiir warartusmiayi " Tímiayi .

text: Then said the Jews unto him , Thou art not yet fifty years old , and hast thou seen Abraham ?
text2: Nuyá Israer - shuar Jesusan tiarmiayi " Warí , senkuenta ( 50 ) Uwí takaktsume Túmaitiatam Apraáman Wáinkiámjai tame . "

text: Jesus said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Before Abraham was , I am .
text2: Jesussha Tímiayi " Ti nekas Tájarme , Apraámka pujatsain Wikia pujajai " Tímiayi Jesus .

text: Then took they up stones to cast at him : but Jesus hid himself , and went out of the temple , going through the midst of them , and so passed by .
text2: Nuna takui kayan achikiar " Jesusan tukutai " tiarmiayi . Tura Jesus úumak ni matsatmanum ajapénin weak Yusa Uunt Jeenia jiinki wémiayi .

text: And as Jesus passed by , he saw a man which was blind from his birth .
text2: Jesus ni unuiniamurijiai wesa aishmankan kusuru akiinian Wáinkiamiayi .

text: And his disciples asked him , saying , Master , who did sin , this man , or his parents , that he was born blind ?
text2: Ni unuiniamurisha aniasarmiayi " Uunta , jusha ṡurukamtai kusuru akiiniawit . Yana tunaarijiain kusuru akiiniait . Niiniujaimpiash , Aparíniujaimpiash Túrunawit ? " tiarmiayi .

text: Jesus answered , Neither hath this man sinned , nor his parents : but that the works of God should be made manifest in him .
text2: Jesus Tímiayi " Ni tunaarijiainchusha ni Aparíniujainchusha Túrunaiti . Antsu Yus ni Ayashín Túratniua nu paant Atí tusa Túrunaiti .

text: I must work the works of him that sent me , while it is day : the night cometh , when no man can work .
text2: Tsawaikia takastiniaiti . Yamaikia Winia akuptukua nuna Takatrín Túratniuitjai . Kashi ajasmatai takastin atsuttawai .

text: As long as I am in the world , I am the light of the world .
text2: Jú nunkanam pujakun shuara Enentáin Tsáapnimtikratniuitjai " Tímiayi .

text: When he had thus spoken , he spat on the ground , and made clay of the spittle , and he anointed the eyes of the blind man with the clay ,
text2: Nuna chichas Nunká usukmi nunkajai pachimiar kusuru jiin yakarmiayi .

text: And said unto him , Go , wash in the pool of Siloam , ( which is by interpretation , Sent . ) He went his way therefore , and washed , and came seeing .
text2: Nuyá chichaak " Siruí pajamtai entsanam nijiamauta " Tímiayi . Siruísha nu chichamnum " akupkamu " tawai . Kusurusha we nijiamar pénker iimiar Támiayi .

text: The neighbours therefore , and they which before had seen him that he was blind , said , Is not this he that sat and begged ?
text2: Nuyá ni írutkamurisha nuik Wáinin ármia nusha tiarmiayi " Juka pujus tuke Kuítian seamniuya Núchakait . "

text: Some said , This is he : others said , He is like him : but he said , I am he .
text2: Chíkich " Ee , Núkete " tiarmiayi . Chikichcha " Atsá , Núchaiti ; kame nuash tumainti " tiarmiayi . Tura ninki " Ee , wiitjai " Tímiayi .

text: Therefore said they unto him , How were thine eyes opened ?
text2: Tutai aniiniak " ṡItiurak yamaikia iimiam ? " tiarmiayi .

text: He answered and said , A man that is called Jesus made clay , and anointed mine eyes , and said unto me , Go to the pool of Siloam , and wash : and I went and washed , and I received sight .
text2: Niisha Tímiayi " Aishman Jesusa nu tsakusan Jíirun yakartur " Siruí pajamtai entsanam nijiamauta " turutmiai . Takui wena nijiamaran paant iimpramjai " Tímiayi .

text: Then said they unto him , Where is he ? He said , I know not .
text2: Tutai " Nu aishmansha tuin Pujá " tiarmiayi . Niisha " Cha , nékatsjai " Tímiayi .

text: They brought to the Pharisees him that aforetime was blind .
text2: Nuyá kusuru Tsuárman Pariséunam Júkiarmiayi .

text: And it was the sabbath day when Jesus made the clay , and opened his eyes .
text2: Kame Jesus kusurun tsuarmia nui ayampratin tsawantauyayi .

text: Then again the Pharisees also asked him how he had received his sight . He said unto them , He put clay upon mine eyes , and I washed , and do see .
text2: Tuma asamtai Pariséusha itiurak iimnium tusar aniasarmiayi . Niisha Tímiayi " Jiiruin tsakusan Yakaarámtai , nijiamaran paant iimjiai . "

text: Therefore said some of the Pharisees , This man is not of God , because he keepeth not the sabbath day . Others said , How can a man that is a sinner do such miracles ? And there was a division among them .
text2: Nuyá Chíkich Pariséu shuarnumia nuamtak tunaiyar " Juna Tsuáruka Yúsaiyanchuiti . Kame ayampratin tsawantai Túraiti " tiarmiayi . Tura chikichcha " Tunáa shuaraitkiuinkia Júnisan Túratniun tujinkiaayi " tiarmiayi . Nujai akannaikiarmiayi .

text: They say unto the blind man again , What sayest thou of him , that he hath opened thine eyes ? He said , He is a prophet .
text2: Tsuármancha ataksha aniasarmiayi " Amin Tsuármarua nu ṡWarí Enentáimtam ? " tiarmiayi . Tutai " Wikia " Yúsnan etserniuiti " tajai " Tímiayi .

text: But the Jews did not believe concerning him , that he had been blind , and received his sight , until they called the parents of him that had received his sight .
text2: Tura Israer - shuar nekas kusuruitiat Yamái iimiui tu Enentáimtuscharmiayi Pariseu . Tuma ásar ni Aparíncha untsukar

text: And they asked them , saying , Is this your son , who ye say was born blind ? how then doth he now see ?
text2: inintrusarmiayi " ṡAme uchiram kusuru akiinia Tárumna nukait . Itiurak yamaikia iimia ? " tiarmiayi .

text: His parents answered them and said , We know that this is our son , and that he was born blind :
text2: Ni Aparísha tiarmiayi " Ii Uchirínkia kusuru akiiniama nu nékaji .

text: But by what means he now seeth , we know not ; or who hath opened his eyes , we know not : he is of age ; ask him : he shall speak for himself .
text2: Tura iisha nékatsji itiurak yamaikia iimia . ṡYátsuk pénker Tsuáruit ? Niisha uuntchakait , nii aniastarum . Ninki ujatmakarti " tiarmiayi .

text: These words spake his parents , because they feared the Jews : for the Jews had agreed already , that if any man did confess that he was Christ , he should be put out of the synagogue .
text2: Sapijmiak tiarmiayi . Israer - shuara uuntrinkia " Jesus Yus akupkamu asa nekas Krístuiti " tuinia Núnaka Israer - shuara iruntainmaya jiiki akupnakti tiniu ásarmatai tsuarma Aparí ashamkarmiayi .

text: Therefore said his parents , He is of age ; ask him .
text2: Nu asamtai ni Aparí " Niisha uuntchakait , nii aniastarum " tiarmiayi .

text: Then again called they the man that was blind , and said unto him , Give God the praise : we know that this man is a sinner .
text2: Nuinkia Israer - shuara uuntri kusuru Tsuárman ataksha untsuk tiarmiayi " Yus iimmianum nekasa nu Titiá , ju aishmankka tunaarinniuiti nékaji " tiarmiayi .

text: He answered and said , Whether he be a sinner or no , I know not : one thing I know , that , whereas I was blind , now I see .
text2: Tutai Tímiayi " Kame tunaarinchashit . Nékatsjai . Antsu junak nékajai . Yaunchu kusuruitiatan yamaikia iimjiai . "

text: Then said they to him again , What did he to thee ? how opened he thine eyes ?
text2: Ataksha aniiniak " ṡItiurtámkama . Itiur iimtikrammia ? " tiarmiayi .

text: He answered them , I have told you already , and ye did not hear : wherefore would ye hear it again ? will ye also be his disciples ?
text2: Niisha Tímiayi " Yaunchu Tájarme tura anturtatsrume . ṡUrukamtai ataksha titi tusa wakerarum . Niiniu ajastin Enentáimprurmek ? " Tímiayi .

text: Then they reviled him , and said , Thou art his disciple ; but we are Moses ' disciples .
text2: Nuinkia katsekkar " Ameka Ní shuarinme . Tura iikia Muisaisa Shuárintji , tiarmiayi .

text: We know that God spake unto Moses : as for this fellow , we know not from whence he is .
text2: Yus Muisaisan akupkaiti iikia nékaji antsu nu aishman nékatsji . ṡTuyantskait ? " tiarmiayi .

text: The man answered and said unto them , Why herein is a marvellous thing , that ye know not from whence he is , and yet he hath opened mine eyes .
text2: Aishman tsuarma Tímiayi " ṡAusha itiurtsuk áminiait ? Winia iimtikrurma nu átumka nékatsrume tuyankit .

text: Now we know that God heareth not sinners : but if any man be a worshipper of God , and doeth his will , him he heareth .
text2: Paant nékaji tunaarinniun Yus anturtsui . Tikishmatar ni wakeramun Túruinia nunak anturui .

text: Since the world began was it not heard that any man opened the eyes of one that was born blind .
text2: Yáunchusha kusuru akiinian Tsuáruka tuke atsuwaiti .

text: If this man were not of God , he could do nothing .
text2: Ju aishman Yúsaiyanchuitkiunka penké Túrachaayi " Tímiayi .

text: They answered and said unto him , Thou wast altogether born in sins , and dost thou teach us ? And they cast him out .
text2: Nuinkia tiarmiayi " Ameka tunaarintin akiiniaitiatmesha ṡin jintintin átaj tamek ? " Nuna tiar jiiki awemarmiayi .

text: Jesus heard that they had cast him out ; and when he had found him , he said unto him , Dost thou believe on the Son of God ?
text2: Kusuru Tsuárman jiiki awemarma nuna Jesus nekaamiayi . Tura Wáiniak " Yusa Uchiría nu Enentáimtamek " Tímiayi .

text: He answered and said , Who is he , Lord , that I might believe on him ?
text2: Tsuarma Tímiayi " Uunta , turuttia wisha nekaan Enentáimtustaj . "

text: And Jesus said unto him , Thou hast both seen him , and it is he that talketh with thee .
text2: Jesussha Tímiayi " Wainme . Wiitjai ámijiai chichaajna nu . "

text: And he said , Lord , I believe . And he worshipped him .
text2: Tutai , tikishmatar " Uunta , Enentáimtajme " Jesusan Tímiayi .

text: And Jesus said , For judgment I am come into this world , that they which see not might see ; and that they which see might be made blind .
text2: Nuyá Jesus Tímiayi " Shuara Enentáin nekaan , akantratajtsan Táwitjai . Ni Enentáin kusuru ain iimtiktinian tura ananmamuk " Yusnan nekaan paant iimjiai " tana nuna ukusturtinian Táwitjai " Tímiayi .

text: And some of the Pharisees which were with him heard these words , and said unto him , Are we blind also ?
text2: Tutai Pariséu shuar nui pujuarmia nu nuna antukar " ṡNuinkia iikia kusurukaitiaj ~ i ? " tiarmiayi .

text: Jesus said unto them , If ye were blind , ye should have no sin : but now ye say , We see ; therefore your sin remaineth .
text2: Jesussha Tímiayi " Atum kusuruitkiurmeka Atumí tunaari Wáinchakrum sumamachu aintrume . Tura " paant iimjiai " tau asarum sumamaitrume " Tímiayi .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that entereth not by the door into the sheepfold , but climbeth up some other way , the same is a thief and a robber .
text2: Jesus Tímiayi " Wi Tájana nu ti nekasaiti . Shuar murikiun takakna nu ni murikrin wenuimiunam kashi ikiuawai . Tura murik wenuimiunam pujuiniakui yajauch shuar murikiun kasamkatniun wakerakka Wáitiniam wayachmin asa tanishnum waruk Yajá wayawainti .

text: But he that entereth in by the door is the shepherd of the sheep .
text2: Antsu murikiu Wáinniuka Wáitiniam wayaawai .

text: To him the porter openeth ; and the sheep hear his voice : and he calleth his own sheep by name , and leadeth them out .
text2: Waiti Wáinniuka nekas murikiun Wáinniun Wáitin uratui . Muriksha ni Wáinniuri chichamen nékainiawai . Niisha Ashí ni murikrin chikichik chikichik Náarin anaitius Untsúawai . Tura tsawaikia ni murikrin jiiki ayurtainiam yarumui .

text: And when he putteth forth his own sheep , he goeth before them , and the sheep follow him : for they know his voice .
text2: Tura Ashí ni murikrin jiir émtuki wéawai . Muriksha ni chichamen ántuiniak untsuam nemarainiawai .

text: And a stranger will they not follow , but will flee from him : for they know not the voice of strangers .
text2: Chíkich Shuárnaka nékachu ásar nemarainiatsui . Antsu ni chichamen nékainiachu ásar pisainiawai . "

text: This parable spake Jesus unto them : but they understood not what things they were which he spake unto them .
text2: Nu métek - taku chichamnaka Jesus áujmatsamiayi tura shuar antukar nekaacharmiayi .

text: Then said Jesus unto them again , Verily , verily , I say unto you , I am the door of the sheep .
text2: Nuyá Jesus Tímiayi " Ti nekasan Tájarme . Wenuimiu Wáitiri murik wainia nuka Wiitjai . Shuarsha murikiu aintsar Winí wayamin ainiawai .

text: All that ever came before me are thieves and robbers : but the sheep did not hear them .
text2: Wi Táatsain Ashí Táaruka kasa ainiak winia shuarun kasamkatai tusa wakeriarmiayi . Tura winia murikiur Wíi shuar ainiak nu shuaran anturkacharmiayi .

text: I am the door : by me if any man enter in , he shall be saved , and shall go in and out , and find pasture .
text2: Wikia Wáititjai . Ashí Winin wayaaka uwemprattawai . Tura murikiua aintsan wenuimiunmaya jiinki pénker Yurumáttawai tura atak Wayá ayamprattawai ' Tímiayi .

text: The thief cometh not , but for to steal , and to kill , and to destroy : I am come that they might have life , and that they might have it more abundantly .
text2: ` Kásaka aya kasamkatniuncha Máatniuncha emesratniuncha wakerawai . Antsu Wikia yamaram iwiaakman tuke shiir atsumtsuk takusarti tusan Táwitjai .

text: I am the good shepherd : the good shepherd giveth his life for the sheep .
text2: Wikia pénker Wáinniuitjai . Pénker Wáinniuka ni murikrin uwemtikrartaj tusa jakattawai .

text: But he that is an hireling , and not the shepherd , whose own the sheep are not , seeth the wolf coming , and leaveth the sheep , and fleeth : and the wolf catcheth them , and scattereth the sheep .
text2: Antsu aya kuitjai takauka ni murikrichu ainiakui tura nekas Wáinniuchu asa pénker Wáintsui . Kame uunt Yawá winiakui murikiun ikiuki pisaawai . Uunt yawasha murikiun achik tsakinmawai .

text: The hireling fleeth , because he is an hireling , and careth not for the sheep .
text2: Nu shuarsha akikiam Takáa asa murikiun Enentáimtatsui . Nu asamtai aya pisaawai ' Tímiayi .

text: As the Father knoweth me , even so know I the Father : and I lay down my life for the sheep .
text2: ` Wikia pénker Wáinniuitjai . Winia Aparsha nékarui . Wisha Aparun nékajai . Núnisnak murikrun nékajai tura winia murikrusha nékarui . Wisha murikiun uwemtikrataj tusan jakattajai .

text: And other sheep I have , which are not of this fold : them also I must bring , and they shall hear my voice ; and there shall be one fold , and one shepherd .
text2: Chíkich muriknasha takakjai . Nusha ju wenuimiunmayanchu ainiawai . Nunasha itiattajai . Nu muriksha Winia umirtukar Ashí métek matsamsar Chikichík wenuimiunmaya ajasartatui tura chikichik Wáinin átatui ' Tímiayi .

text: Therefore doth my Father love me , because I lay down my life , that I might take it again .
text2: ` Winia murikrun uwemtikrataj tusan jakattajai turan atak nantaktiatjai . Nu asamtai winia Apar anentui .

text: No man taketh it from me , but I lay it down of myself . I have power to lay it down , and I have power to take it again . This commandment have I received of my Father .
text2: Wi wakerakun jakattajai . Wi wakerachkuinkia Chíkichkia mantuachminiaiti . Jákatniuncha tura nantaktinniasha winia Apar surusuiti " Tímiayi Jesus .

text: There was a division therefore again among the Jews for these sayings .
text2: Israer - shuarsha nuna antukar Niisháa Enentáimprar kanakiarmiayi .

text: And many of them said , He hath a devil , and is mad ; why hear ye him ?
text2: Untsurí tiarmiayi " ṡUrukamtai ántarum Wáuruk tausha . Yajauch wakanin takaktsuk ? "

text: Others said , These are not the words of him that hath a devil . Can a devil open the eyes of the blind ?
text2: Tura chikichcha tiarmiayi " ṡYajauch wakantrinniusha Núnisan chichasminkiait . Yajauch wakantrinniusha kusurun iimtikramniashit ? " tiarmiayi .

text: And it was at Jerusalem the feast of the dedication , and it was winter .
text2: Micha nantutin Israer - shuar Jerusarénnum namperan najanainiawai . Nu nampernumsha Yusa Uunt Jee atak jeamman Enentáimtuiniawai .

text: And Jesus walked in the temple in Solomon ' s porch .
text2: Jesussha Yusa Uunt Jee áachiniam wekasamiayi Sarumúnka Wáitiria nui .

text: Then came the Jews round about him , and said unto him , How long dost thou make us to doubt ? If thou be the Christ , tell us plainly .
text2: Israer - shuarsha Niin téntakar tiarmiayi " ṡAme nekas Krístukaitiam ? Ju chichamaik etserkata . ṡUrukamtia nekas paant Tátsum ? " tiarmiayi .

text: Jesus answered them , I told you , and ye believed not : the works that I do in my Father ' s name , they bear witness of me .
text2: Tutai Jesus Tímiayi " Yaunchu tiniu ain Enentáimturachmarme . Winia Apar akupkamun takaajna nu ti paant awajtawai .

text: But ye believe not , because ye are not of my sheep , as I said unto you .
text2: Tura átumka winia murikruchu asarum Enentáimturtsurme .

text: My sheep hear my voice , and I know them , and they follow me :
text2: Wisha winia murikrun untsuam anturtuiniak nemartuiniawai . Wisha Wínianak mash nékajai .

text: And I give unto them eternal life ; and they shall never perish , neither shall any man pluck them out of my hand .
text2: Tura yamaram iwiaakman tuke Jákashtinian Súajai . Nu asamtai niisha menkakachartatui antsu Wi wainkia asamtai ṡyaki jurutkit ?

text: My Father , which gave them me , is greater than all ; and no man is able to pluck them out of my Father ' s hand .
text2: Winia Apar murikiun surusuiti . Niisha Ashí nankaamas kakaram asamtai ṡyaki uwejéyan atankit ?

text: I and my Father are one .
text2: Wisha winia Aparjai iisha aya chikichkiitji " Tímiayi Jesus .

text: Then the Jews took up stones again to stone him .
text2: Tutai Israer - shuarsha atak kayan achikiar tukutaj tiarmiayi .

text: Jesus answered them , Many good works have I shewed you from my Father ; for which of those works do ye stone me ?
text2: Jesussha Tímiayi " Winia Aparu kakarmarijiai ti untsuri pénkera nuna takasuitjai . ṡTújaimpia mantuattarum ? "

text: The Jews answered him , saying , For a good work we stone thee not ; but for blasphemy ; and because that thou , being a man , makest thyself God .
text2: Israer - shuarsha Niin tiarmiayi " Pénker Túra asakmin Máataj Tátsuji antsu Yus yajauch chicharkumin Túrattaji . Ameka Shuáraitiatam Yusa nuke Enentáimtumame " tiarmiayi .

text: Jesus answered them , Is it not written in your law , I said , Ye are gods ?
text2: Nuyá Jesussha Tímiayi " Atumí akupeamuriin Yus timia nu aarmaiti : " Atum Yúsaitrume " tawai .

text: If he called them gods , unto whom the word of God came , and the scripture cannot be broken ;
text2: Kame Yus - Papinium aarma nu tuke nekaschakait . Tuma asamtai ni chichamen antukarun Yuska " Yúsaitrume " takui nuikia ti nekaschakait .

text: Say ye of him , whom the Father hath sanctified , and sent into the world , Thou blasphemest ; because I said , I am the Son of God ?
text2: Niisha Yúsaitkiuinkia nuikia Yus Apa anaikia ju nunkanam akupkamu asan ti nekas Yúschakaitiaj . Nújainkia wi " Yusa Uchiríntjai " takui ṡitiurak " Yusan yajauch chicharui " Túrutrum ?

text: If I do not the works of my Father , believe me not .
text2: Winia Apar Túramu Túrachkuinkia Enentáimtursairap .

text: But if I do , though ye believe not me , believe the works : that ye may know , and believe , that the Father is in me , and I in him .
text2: Tura nekas Túrakuinkia Enentáimtursatarum . Tura Winia nakitrakrumsha nuikia wi Túramu Enentáimtustarum . Nujainkia winia Apar Winin pujamu Ashí nekaattarme . Núnisnak Wisha Niin pujajai . Iisha chikichkiitji . "

text: Therefore they sought again to take him : but he escaped out of their hand ,
text2: Tutai ataksha sepunam enkeatai tiarmiayi . Túrasha Jesus uwempramiayi .

text: And went away again beyond Jordan into the place where John at first baptized ; and there he abode .
text2: Nuyá Jesus Jurtan entsa amain wé yaunchu Juan imiakrattainium pujusmiayi .

text: And many resorted unto him , and said , John did no miracle : but all things that John spake of this man were true .
text2: Ti Untsurí shuar iyuwar tiarmiayi " Nekas Juanka aentsti tujintiamun Túrachiat Ashí Jesusnan Tímia nu nekasaiti " tu tiarmiayi .

text: And many believed on him there .
text2: Nuisha Untsurí Jesusan Enentáimtusarmiayi .

text: Now a certain man was sick , named Lazarus , of Bethany , the town of Mary and her sister Martha .
text2: Petania péprunam aishman , ni naari Rásaru , jaa pujumiayi . Nu péprunam Marí ni kaijiai Mártajai pujumiayi .

text: ( It was that Mary which anointed the Lord with ointment , and wiped his feet with her hair , whose brother Lazarus was sick . )
text2: Niisha Rásaru umai ármiayi . Nu Marisha ukunmanka kunkuinian sumak Jesusan kuer ni Intiashíjiai japirmiayi .

text: Therefore his sisters sent unto him , saying , Lord , behold , he whom thou lovest is sick .
text2: Tura Rásaru jaakui ni umai Jesusan chichaman akuptuiniak tiarmiayi " Uunta , ame amikrum jaawai . "

text: When Jesus heard that , he said , This sickness is not unto death , but for the glory of God , that the Son of God might be glorified thereby .
text2: Jesussha nuna antuk Tímiayi " Tuke jakataj tusa jaatsui . Antsu Yusa kakarmarisha tura ni Uchirí kakarmarisha Jú sunkur Tsuármanum paant Atí tusa jaawai . "

text: Now Jesus loved Martha , and her sister , and Lazarus .
text2: Jesus Mártancha ni kaincha tura ni umai Rásaruncha nekas aneemiayi .

text: When he had heard therefore that he was sick , he abode two days still in the same place where he was .
text2: Túmaitiat Rásaru jaawai taman antukiat ni pujamunam Jimiará tsawant pujusmiayi .

text: Then after that saith he to his disciples , Let us go into Judaea again .
text2: Nuyá ni unuiniamurin " Ataksha Jutía nunkanam Wetái " Tímiayi .

text: His disciples say unto him , Master , the Jews of late sought to stone thee ; and goest thou thither again ?
text2: Tura ni unuiniamurisha tiarmiayi " Uunta , nuiksha Israer - shuar kayajai tukurmar mantamatai Tícharmaka . ṡNui ataksha wétai Támek ? "

text: Jesus answered , Are there not twelve hours in the day ? If any man walk in the day , he stumbleth not , because he seeth the light of this world .
text2: Jesussha ju métek - taku chichaman Tímiayi " Tsawaikia Páantchakait . Tsawai wekaana nu paant asamtai tukumkashtatui .

text: But if a man walk in the night , he stumbleth , because there is no light in him .
text2: Tura kashi wekaana nusha kirit asamtai Tukumkáttawai . Núnisan Wíi tuke pujakun winia takatrun takastiniaitjai . Túraknasha itiurchatan Wáinkiashtatjai . "

text: These things said he : and after that he saith unto them , Our friend Lazarus sleepeth ; but I go , that I may awake him out of sleep .
text2: Nuyásha Jesus atak Tímiayi " Ii amikri Rásaru kanarai . Wi ishintiartatjai . "

text: Then said his disciples , Lord , if he sleep , he shall do well .
text2: Tutai ni unuiniamuri tiarmiayi " Uunta , aya kanarka nuinkia pénker ajastatui . "

text: Howbeit Jesus spake of his death : but they thought that he had spoken of taking of rest in sleep .
text2: Jesuska Rásaru jakamu nékayat " kanarai " Tímiayi . Tura ni unuiniamuri Rásaru kajinmakua aintsan kanarai Enentáimprarmiayi .

text: Then said Jesus unto them plainly , Lazarus is dead .
text2: Jesus nuikia ti paant Tímiayi " Rásaru yamaikia jakayi .

text: And I am glad for your sakes that I was not there , to the intent ye may believe ; nevertheless let us go unto him .
text2: Tura nui pujuscha asan Kúntuts pujatsjai . Jean Túrattajna nu iisrum ti nekas Enentáimtursattarme . Nuna nekaan shiir Enentáimjai . Wátsek , iyutai . "

text: Then said Thomas , which is called Didymus , unto his fellowdisciples , Let us also go , that we may die with him .
