text2: Nuyá Jimiampramu Tumas Chíkich unuiniamuri nui armia nuna " Iisha weri Niijiai métek jakatai " Tímiayi .

text: Then when Jesus came , he found that he had lain in the grave four days already .
text2: Nui taa , Rásarun kuatru tsawant ikiusman Wáinkiamiayi .

text: Now Bethany was nigh unto Jerusalem , about fifteen furlongs off :
text2: Petania pépruka Jerusarénnumia Menaintiú kirumitru ainis Tíjiuchiiti .

text: And many of the Jews came to Martha and Mary , to comfort them concerning their brother .
text2: Tuma asamtai untsuri Israer - shuar Mártasha Marísha , ni umai jakamtai uutkui atsankrataj tusa weriarmiayi .

text: Then Martha , as soon as she heard that Jesus was coming , went and met him : but Mary sat still in the house .
text2: Mártasha Jesus Tíjiuch ajasun Nekáa inkiuntajtsa wémiayi . Antsu Marikia Jeá pujumiayi .

text: Then said Martha unto Jesus , Lord , if thou hadst been here , my brother had not died .
text2: Tura Marta Jesusan inkiun Tímiayi " Uunta , Ame pujakminkia winia umar Jákachaayi .

text: But I know , that even now , whatsoever thou wilt ask of God , God will give it thee .
text2: Tura tuke nékajai Ashí Yus seamna nuna Súramui . "

text: Jesus saith unto her , Thy brother shall rise again .
text2: Jesussha Tímiayi " Ame umaimisha nantaktiatui . "

text: Martha saith unto him , I know that he shall rise again in the resurrection at the last day .
text2: Mártasha Tímiayi " Nekas , Ashí amuamunam Jákaru nantaktin tsawantai nantaktiatui . Nuna nékajai . "

text: Jesus said unto her , I am the resurrection , and the life : he that believeth in me , though he were dead , yet shall he live :
text2: Nuyá Jesus Tímiayi " Iwiaaku átinia nérentin asan Wikia iniantkartiniaitjai . Winia Enentáimturna nuka jakasha nantaktiatui .

text: And whosoever liveth and believeth in me shall never die . Believest thou this ?
text2: Tura Ashí iwiaaku pujana nusha Winia Enentáimturaka penke Jákashtatui . ṡNu nekasaiti tu Enentáimtamek ? "

text: She saith unto him , Yea , Lord : I believe that thou art the Christ , the Son of God , which should come into the world .
text2: Niisha " Ee , Uunta , ame Yusa Uchirínme . Krístuitme , uwemtikkiartin Jú nunkanam Tátinia nu " Tímiayi .

text: And when she had so said , she went her way , and called Mary her sister secretly , saying , The Master is come , and calleth for thee .
text2: Mártasha nuna ti , ni kai Marin untsuk úukan Tímiayi " Uunt jui taa untsurmawai . "

text: As soon as she heard that , she arose quickly , and came unto him .
text2: Marisha nuna antuk Wárik wajaki Jesusa iyuttsa wémiayi .

text: Now Jesus was not yet come into the town , but was in that place where Martha met him .
text2: Jesussha péprunam jeatsuk Marta inkiunmanum pujumiayi .

text: The Jews then which were with her in the house , and comforted her , when they saw Mary , that she rose up hastily and went out , followed her , saying , She goeth unto the grave to weep there .
text2: Marí wari wajaki wématai Israer - shuar nu jeanam atsankrattsa pujuiniasha nuna iisar weriarmiayi . Iwiarsamunam uuttiasa wéatsuash tusa weriarmiayi .

text: Then when Mary was come where Jesus was , and saw him , she fell down at his feet , saying unto him , Lord , if thou hadst been here , my brother had not died .
text2: Marisha Jesus pujamunam Jeá tikishmatar Tímiayi " Uunta , Ame pujakminkia winia umar Jákachaayi . "

text: When Jesus therefore saw her weeping , and the Jews also weeping which came with her , he groaned in the spirit , and was troubled ,
text2: Jesussha Marincha tura niijiai uutuncha Wáiniak Wáitnentaimta asa ti Kúntuts pujusmiayi .

text: And said , Where have ye laid him ? They said unto him , Lord , come and see .
text2: Tura " Tui iwiarsamarum " Tímiayi . Niisha " Uunta , iitia " tiarmiayi .

text: Jesus wept .
text2: Jesussha uutmiayi .

text: Then said the Jews , Behold how he loved him !
text2: Israer - shuarsha " Ti aneatsuk " tiarmiayi .

text: And some of them said , Could not this man , which opened the eyes of the blind , have caused that even this man should not have died ?
text2: Tura Chíkich " Kusuru Tsuáruchukait . Nii pujakuisha Rásaru Jákaampiash " tiarmiayi .

text: Jesus therefore again groaning in himself cometh to the grave . It was a cave , and a stone lay upon it .
text2: Jesussha ti kuntuts Enentáimiar iwiarsamunam Weankámiayi . Náinnium asa paka taurma áuyayi . Tura kaya atutkamuyayi .

text: Jesus said , Take ye away the stone . Martha , the sister of him that was dead , saith unto him , Lord , by this time he stinketh : for he hath been dead four days .
text2: Tura Jesus " Kaya jurustarum " Tímiayi . Rásaru umai Marta Tímiayi " Uunta , kuatru tsawant Jákaiti . Mejeatsuk ' Tímiayi .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Said I not unto thee , that , if thou wouldest believe , thou shouldest see the glory of God ?
text2: Tura Jesus Tímiayi " Yus Enentáimtakmeka Yusa kakarmari Wáinkiattame Tíchamkajam . "

text: Then they took away the stone from the place where the dead was laid . And Jesus lifted up his eyes , and said , Father , I thank thee that thou hast heard me .
text2: Nuikia kayarin uratiarmatai Jesus nayaimpin iis Tímiayi " Aparu , Winia anturtakmin yuminsajme .

text: And I knew that thou hearest me always : but because of the people which stand by I said it , that they may believe that thou hast sent me .
text2: Winiasha tuke anturtame tura ju shuaran pénker Enentáimtikrataj tusan tajai . Ame akuptukuitmena nuna nekarmawarti . "

text: And when he thus had spoken , he cried with a loud voice , Lazarus , come forth .
text2: Nuna tinia kakaram untsuak " Rásaru Jíinkitia " Tímiayi .

text: And he that was dead came forth , bound hand and foot with graveclothes : and his face was bound about with a napkin . Jesus saith unto them , Loose him , and let him go .
text2: Nujainkia penuarmartiuk jiinkimiayi . Yapinmasha jaanchjiai ijiamuyayi . Tura Jesus " Atirtarum . Wéti " Tímiayi .

text: Then many of the Jews which came to Mary , and had seen the things which Jesus did , believed on him .
text2: Untsurí Israer - shuar Marin nemariaru Jesus Túramun iisar Enentáimtusarmiayi .

text: But some of them went their ways to the Pharisees , and told them what things Jesus had done .
text2: Tura Chíkichkia Pariséunam wear Jesus Túramun ujakarmiayi .

text: Then gathered the chief priests and the Pharisees a council , and said , What do we ? for this man doeth many miracles .
text2: Nuna antukar Pariséusha Israer - patri uuntrisha Ashí naamka uunt armia nujai iruntrar tiarmiayi " ṡWarí itiurkamniait ? Nu shuarka aentsti tujintiamun ti Túratsuk .

text: If we let him thus alone , all men will believe on him : and the Romans shall come and take away both our place and nation .
text2: Aya Júnik iniaiyakrinkia Ashí shuar Niin Enentáimtuschartatuak . Nuyá Rúmanmaya apach taar mesetan najanawartatui tura iin amutmakar Yusa Uunt Jeencha emesrartatui . "

text: And one of them , named Caiaphas , being the high priest that same year , said unto them , Ye know nothing at all ,
text2: Nu uwitin Kaipias Israer - patri uuntriyayi . Niisha Tímiayi " Atumka nékatsrume .

text: Nor consider that it is expedient for us , that one man should die for the people , and that the whole nation perish not .
text2: ṡAshí Israer - shuar mesertin pénkerkait . Antsu aya chikichik shuar Jákatin pénkerchakait ? " Tímiayi .

text: And this spake he not of himself : but being high priest that year , he prophesied that Jesus should die for that nation ;
text2: Kaipiaska aya ni Enentáimmiajain Tíchamiayi . Antsu nu uwitin Israer - patri uuntri asamtai Yus nuna Enentáimtikramiayi . Nújainkia Israer - shuar Jesus jaruktinian ujakmiayi .

text: And not for that nation only , but that also he should gather together in one the children of God that were scattered abroad .
text2: Tura aya Israer - shuarnakcha antsu niijiaisha Ashí nunkanam Yus - shuar ajasarun irurtajtsa Jákatniuyi .

text: Then from that day forth they took counsel together for to put him to death .
text2: Tuma asamtai nu tsawantinin Israer - shuara uuntri Jesus Máatai tusar áujmatsarmiayi .

text: Jesus therefore walked no more openly among the Jews ; but went thence unto a country near to the wilderness , into a city called Ephraim , and there continued with his disciples .
text2: Nu asamtai Jesus paant wantiniak Israer - shuarnum wekaichmiayi . Antsu Jutía nunkanmaya jiinki atsamu nunkanam Eprain pepru Tíjiuch wémiayi . Tura nui pujusmiayi ni unuiniamurijiai .

text: And the Jews ' passover was nigh at hand : and many went out of the country up to Jerusalem before the passover , to purify themselves .
text2: Israer - shuara namperi paskua ishichik jatemsamtai Untsurí shuar Yajá péprunmaya Jerusarénnum Káunkarmiayi . Kame paskua jeatsain Muisais timia Núnisan ni Ayashísha Enentáisha iwiarnarat tusa wakeriarmiayi .

text: Then sought they for Jesus , and spake among themselves , as they stood in the temple , What think ye , that he will not come to the feast ?
text2: Jesusnasha eak yujarmiayi . Tura Yusa Uunt Jeen pujusar nuamtak aniniaisar " ṡWarí Enentáimiam . Jístanam tatimpiash ? " tiarmiayi .

text: Now both the chief priests and the Pharisees had given a commandment , that , if any man knew where he were , he should shew it , that they might take him .
text2: Pariséusha Israer - patri uuntrisha akupainiak " Jesus Pujá nekaamka ujatkata " tiarmiayi . Jesusan sepunam enkeatai tusar tiarmiayi .

text: Then Jesus six days before the passover came to Bethany , where Lazarus was which had been dead , whom he raised from the dead .
text2: Paskua Jísat jeatin sais tsawant ajasmatai Jesus Petania péprunam wémiayi . Jesus jakamunmaya iniantkimia Nú Rásaru nuin pujumiayi .

text: There they made him a supper ; and Martha served : but Lazarus was one of them that sat at the table with him .
text2: Jesus jeamtai ayurawarmiayi . Rásarusha niijiai Yurumámiayi . Mártasha yurumkan iwiasmakmiayi .

text: Then took Mary a pound of ointment of spikenard , very costly , and anointed the feet of Jesus , and wiped his feet with her hair : and the house was filled with the odour of the ointment .
text2: Tura Marikia kunkuinian ti kuitjai ritru ajapén sumak itiamiayi . Tura Jesusa nawen kuer ni intiashijiai japirmiayi . Jeasha nu kunkuinjai ti shiir kunkunmiayi .

text: Then saith one of his disciples , Judas Iscariot , Simon ' s son , which should betray him ,
text2: Jútas Iskariúti , Semunka Uchirí , nui pujumiayi . Niisha Jesusa unuiniamurintiat ukunam Jesusan surukmiayi Máawarat tusa . Niisha Tímiayi

text: Why was not this ointment sold for three hundred pence , and given to the poor ?
text2: " ṡUrukamtai nu kunkuinian ti kuitjai surukchama Kuítrinchan Súsatniun ? "

text: This he said , not that he cared for the poor ; but because he was a thief , and had the bag , and bare what was put therein .
text2: Kame Kuítrinchan Enentáimtak Tíchamiayi . Antsu unuiniamu Kuítrin wainkia asa Yúpichuch kasamkamniuyayi . Tuma asa nuna Tímiayi .

text: Then said Jesus , Let her alone : against the day of my burying hath she kept this .
text2: Tura Jesus Tímiayi " Iniaisata . Wi iwiarnakui kuératniun sumak ikiurtusuiti .

text: For the poor always ye have with you ; but me ye have not always .
text2: Kuítrincha tuke atumjai íruntsuk . Antsu Wikia atumjai tuke pujuschattajai " Tímiayi .

text: Much people of the Jews therefore knew that he was there : and they came not for Jesus ' sake only , but that they might see Lazarus also , whom he had raised from the dead .
text2: Israer - shuarsha Jesus Petania péprunam pujan antukar Jesus iistaitsar weriarmiayi . Rásaruncha Jesus jakamunmaya iniantkimiua nusha iyutai tusar wearmiayi .

text: But the chief priests consulted that they might put Lazarus also to death ;
text2: Túramtai Israer - patri uuntrinkia chichaman jurusarmiayi Rásaru maatai tusar .

text: Because that by reason of him many of the Jews went away , and believed on Jesus .
text2: Untsurí Israer - shuar Rásaru iniantkimiun nekaawar Israer - patrin ikiukiar Jesusan Enentáimtusarmiayi . Túrawarmatai Rásaruncha Máatniun wakerukarmiayi .

text: On the next day much people that were come to the feast , when they heard that Jesus was coming to Jerusalem ,
text2: Paskua namperan pachiintiuktajtsa ti Untsurí shuar Jerusarénnum wearmiayi . Kashin tsawar Jesus Nú peprunam Tátinian nekaawarmiayi .

text: Took branches of palm trees , and went forth to meet him , and cried , Hosanna : Blessed is the King of Israel that cometh in the name of the Lord .
text2: Niisha tintiuki nuké ainis nukan Júurar Jesusan inkiuntai tusar Jíinkiarmiayi . Túrawar untsumainiak " Shiir tati , tiarmiayi . Yusa kakarmarijiai winiana nu Tí pénkeraiti . Israer - shuara uuntri asa shiir Atí " tu untsumiarmiayi .

text: And Jesus , when he had found a young ass , sat thereon ; as it is written ,
text2: Jesussha umpuurun Wáiniak entsamkamai . Núnisan aarmaiti Yus - Chichamnum :

text: Fear not , daughter of Sion : behold , thy King cometh , sitting on an ass ' s colt .
text2: " Seun péprunmaya shuara , ashamkairap . Atumí Akupniuri umpuurunam entsamak winiawai . "

text: These things understood not his disciples at the first : but when Jesus was glorified , then remembered they that these things were written of him , and that they had done these things unto him .
text2: Nu chichamaik Jesusa unuiniamuri nu Túrunamun nekaacharmiayi . Tura ukunam Jesus nayaimpiniam shiir waketkimtai Enentáimprarmiayi . Ashí Jesusna aarma Núnisan Túrunamiayi .

text: The people therefore that was with him when he called Lazarus out of his grave , and raised him from the dead , bare record .
text2: Jesus Rásarun iwiarsamunmaya iniantkimiun Wáinkiarua Nú shuar nuna áujmatiarmiayi .

text: For this cause the people also met him , for that they heard that he had done this miracle .
text2: Tuma asamtai shuar Jesus nu tujintiamun Túramtai nekaawar Jesusan inkiunktaj tusar Jíinkiarmiayi .

text: The Pharisees therefore said among themselves , Perceive ye how ye prevail nothing ? behold , the world is gone after him .
text2: Tura Pariséusha nuamtak tiarmiayi " Iis , penké tujinkiaji . Maa iista , Ashí shuar Niin nemarainiatsuk . "

text: And there were certain Greeks among them that came up to worship at the feast :
text2: Paskua nampernum Yus shiir awajsatniun Jerusarénnum weriaruka Untsurí nunkanmaya shuar ármiayi . Kriaku apachcha ármiayi .

text: The same came therefore to Philip , which was of Bethsaida of Galilee , and desired him , saying , Sir , we would see Jesus .
text2: Niisha Jiripin weantukarmiayi . Kame nu Jiripi Petsaitia péprunmayauyayi . Petsaitia péprusha Kariréa nunkanam awai . Nincha Kriaku apach seainiak " Uunta , Jesusjai chichastaitsar wakeraji " tiarmiayi .

text: Philip cometh and telleth Andrew : and again Andrew and Philip tell Jesus .
text2: Jiripisha Antresan Werí ujakmiayi . Nuyá niijiai métek tsaninkiar Jesusan weriar ujakarmiayi .

text: And Jesus answered them , saying , The hour is come , that the Son of man should be glorified .
text2: Jesussha Tímiayi " Wi Aents Ajasuitjiana ju tsawantur jeayi . Túramtai shiir Awájnástatjai .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , Except a corn of wheat fall into the ground and die , it abideth alone : but if it die , it bringeth forth much fruit .
text2: Wi Tájana nu ti nekasaiti . Jinkiaia ántsanketjai . Araachmaka ninki pujatsuk . Antsu araamka tsapain jinkiaichiri kaushmariat nerek ti Untsurí ajatsuk . Núnisnak Wi jakamtai ti Untsurí shuar yamaram iwiaakman takusartatui .

text: He that loveth his life shall lose it ; and he that hateth his life in this world shall keep it unto life eternal .
text2: Shuarsha jinkiaia nuke aya ju nunkanam pénker pujustinian Enentáimkiunka ántar pujak nekas iwiaakmarin emenkaktatui . Tura ju nunkanam pénker pujustinian Enentáimtsuk Jákatniuncha ashamchaa Nú shuarka nekas iwiaakman Wáiniak tuke iwiaaku átatui .

text: If any man serve me , let him follow me ; and where I am , there shall also my servant be : if any man serve me , him will my Father honour .
text2: Shuar winia átaj takunka nemartusti . Túranka Wi pujajna nui Wíi shuar tuke átatui . Núnisan Wíi shuar winia takatrun Takáa nuna winia Aparsha shiir Enentáimtustatui ' Tímiayi .

text: Now is my soul troubled ; and what shall I say ? Father , save me from this hour : but for this cause came I unto this hour .
text2: ` Yamaikia Enentáirui ti itiurchat pujajai . ṡWarittiajak . " Aparu , ju Túrunatniunmaya uwemtikrurta " titiajash ? Antsu Jú Túrunatniun Táwitjai .

text: Father , glorify thy name . Then came there a voice from heaven , saying , I have both glorified it , and will glorify it again .
text2: Aparu , wi Túramujai Ashí shuar ame Náarmin shiir Enentáimturarti " Tímiayi Jesus . Tutai nayaimpinmaya chichaman antukarmiayi . " Winia Náarun shiir awajsaitjai tura ataksha shiir awajsattajai " Tímiayi .

text: The people therefore , that stood by , and heard it , said that it thundered : others said , An angel spake to him .
text2: Shuarsha nui pujuinia " ipiamtachuashit " tiarmiayi . Tura chikichcha " Nayaimpinmaya suntar Niin chichasai " tiarmiayi .

text: Jesus answered and said , This voice came not because of me , but for your sakes .
text2: Jesussha Tímiayi " Wi antuktinian chichaschayi antsu átum nekaatarum tusa chichasai .

text: Now is the judgment of this world : now shall the prince of this world be cast out .
text2: Yamaikia nunkanam makumatin jeayi . Tura íwianch ju nunkanam akupniua nu nupetnak ajapnattawai .

text: And I , if I be lifted up from the earth , will draw all men unto me .
text2: Tura numiniam awajnaintai Ashí nunkanmayanka shuar Enentáimturartatui " Tímiayi .

text: This he said , signifying what death he should die .
text2: Juna taku Krúsnum Jákatniun ujakmiayi .

text: The people answered him , We have heard out of the law that Christ abideth for ever : and how sayest thou , The Son of man must be lifted up ? who is this Son of man ?
text2: Shuarsha awajirar tiarmiayi " Yaunchu Yus akupkamu papiniumia áujsar nékaji . Kristu tutai tuke Jáatsuk iwiaaku pujustiniaiti . ṡItiurak nuikia " Aents Ajasu numiniam awajnaitniuiti " tame ? Aents Ajasuka Krístuchukait , Yus anaikiamu . Núchaitkiuinkia Aents Ajasuka yait ? " tiarmiayi .

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Yet a little while is the light with you . Walk while ye have the light , lest darkness come upon you : for he that walketh in darkness knoweth not whither he goeth .
text2: Nuinkia Jesus Tímiayi " Wi Tsáapninia aintsanketjai . Tsáapnisha Atumíin aya ishichik tsawantin Tsáapniartatui . Tsáapin ana juik wekasatarum kirit ajatsain . Kame kiritniunam wekaana nusha nékatsui itiuranimpia wea .

text: While ye have light , believe in the light , that ye may be the children of light . These things spake Jesus , and departed , and did hide himself from them .
text2: Tsáapnin Wáinkiuram niin Enentáimtustarum . Túrakrum winia Tsáapnintrui wekasattarme . " Jesussha nuna ti wémiayi uumak pujustaj tusa .

text: But though he had done so many miracles before them , yet they believed not on him :
text2: Jesus aentsti tujintiamun ti Untsurí Túramtaisha Niin Enentáimtuscharmiayi .

text: That the saying of Esaias the prophet might be fulfilled , which he spake , Lord , who hath believed our report ? and to whom hath the arm of the Lord been revealed ?
text2: Yúsnan etserin Isayas yaunchu aarma uminkiatniuyi : " Uunta , ṡya ii ujam antukuit . Yusa kakarmarisha yana iniaktusuit ? " tu aarmaiti .

text: Therefore they could not believe , because that Esaias said again ,
text2: Nuna uminiak Jesusan Enentáimtuscharmiayi . Tura nu arantcha Isayas aarmiayi :

text: He hath blinded their eyes , and hardened their heart ; that they should not see with their eyes , nor understand with their heart , and be converted , and I should heal them .
text2: " Yus niin kusuru awajsaiti tura ni Enentáincha Kátsuram awajsaiti . Ni jiijiai iimsain tusa tura ni Enentáijiai nekaawain tusa Túraiti . Kame ni tunaari iisar Enentáimtuiniakui Yus niin Tsuárainti " tu aarmaiti .

text: These things said Esaias , when he saw his glory , and spake of him .
text2: Isayas yaunchu Jesusan nayaimpiniam ti shiir pujan Wáiniak nuna Tímiayi .

text: Nevertheless among the chief rulers also many believed on him ; but because of the Pharisees they did not confess him , lest they should be put out of the synagogue :
text2: Tuma ain Untsurí Israer - shuarsha tura ni uuntrinmayasha Jesusan nekas Enentáimtusarmiayi . Tura niisha Pariséun ashamainiak paant Tícharmiayi . Israer - shuara iruntairiya jiiki awetamaij tusa ashammiarmiayi .

text: For they loved the praise of men more than the praise of God .
text2: Yus shiir Enentáimtursati tutsuk antsu shuar shiir Enentáimtursati tusar Túrawarmiayi .

text: Jesus cried and said , He that believeth on me , believeth not on me , but on him that sent me .
text2: Jesus kakantar untsumuk Tímiayi " Winia Enentáimturuk aya Winiak Enentáimturtsui antsu winia Aparun Winia akuptukua nunasha Enentáimtawai .

text: And he that seeth me seeth him that sent me .
text2: Winia Wáitkiusha Winia Aparnasha Wáinui .

text: I am come a light into the world , that whosoever believeth on me should not abide in darkness .
text2: Wikia Tsáapnin asan Winia Enentáimturainia nuka kiritniunam wekasain tusan ju nunkanam Táwitjai .

text: And if any man hear my words , and believe not , I judge him not : for I came not to judge the world , but to save the world .
text2: Shuáran sumamtikiatniun Táchaitjai antsu uwemtikratniun Táwitjai . Tuma asamtai shuar winia chichamprun antuk Umíachkunka sumamaiti . Tura Wikia sumamtikiachuitjai .

text: He that rejecteth me , and receiveth not my words , hath one that judgeth him : the word that I have spoken , the same shall judge him in the last day .
text2: Winia nakitrur chichampruncha Enentáimtachuka sumamtikiamuiti . Wi timiaj nuka amuukatin tsawantai niin sumamtikiattawai .

text: For I have not spoken of myself ; but the Father which sent me , he gave me a commandment , what I should say , and what I should speak .
text2: Wi Enentáimmiajain chichaatsjai . Winia Apar akattur akuptukuiti . Tura chichastinia nuna surusuiti .

text: And I know that his commandment is life everlasting : whatsoever I speak therefore , even as the Father said unto me , so I speak .
text2: Wisha nékajai , Ashí winia Apar akupeamuka yamaram iwiaakman tuke amuukashtinian Súawai . Tuma asamtai winia Apar Túrutmia Núnisnak tajai " Tímiayi Jesus .

text: Now before the feast of the passover , when Jesus knew that his hour was come that he should depart out of this world unto the Father , having loved his own which were in the world , he loved them unto the end .
text2: Paskua Jísat jeatin Chikichík tsawant ajasmatai Jesusa tsawantri jeatemayi . Túramtai ju nunkan ikiuki ni Aparíin wétiniuyi . Jesussha nuna nekaamiayi . Ashí Níiniun ju nunkanam pujuinian tuke anea asa Amúamunmasha yapajitsuk tuke aneemiayi .

text: And supper being ended , the devil having now put into the heart of Judas Iscariot , Simon ' s son , to betray him ;
text2: Nu tsawantaisha murikiun Yúatin ármiayi . Tura Yurumátin jeatsain , uunt iwianch Semunka Uchirí Jútas Iskariúti Enentáin Jesusan surukat tusa Enentáimtikramiayi .

text: Jesus knowing that the Father had given all things into his hands , and that he was come from God , and went to God ;
text2: Tura Jesus Yusaiya tau asa waketkitniuyi . Tura Yus Apa Ashí mash susamiayi akupin Atí tusa . Jesussha nuna Nekáa

text: He riseth from supper , and laid aside his garments ; and took a towel , and girded himself .
text2: Chíkich yurumuk pujuiniai wajakmiayi . Tura pushirin aimiak awankéman emenmamamiayi .

text: After that he poureth water into a bason , and began to wash the disciples ' feet , and to wipe them with the towel wherewith he was girded .
text2: Nuyá nijiaamatainium entsan Yará ni unuiniamuri nawen nijiatramiayi . Tura awankémjai japirmiayi .

text: Then cometh he to Simon Peter : and Peter saith unto him , Lord , dost thou wash my feet ?
text2: Semun Pítrunam jeamtai Pítiur Tímiayi " Uunta , ṡWinia nawer nijiartaj tamek ? "

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , What I do thou knowest not now ; but thou shalt know hereafter .
text2: Jesussha Tímiayi " Wi Túrajna nu Yamái nékatsme tura ukunam nekaattame . "

text: Peter saith unto him , Thou shalt never wash my feet . Jesus answered him , If I wash thee not , thou hast no part with me .
text2: Tura Pítiur Tímiayi " Penké winia nawer nijiarchattame . " Jesussha Tímiayi " Wi nijiaachkuinkia Wijiai tsaninkia pujuschamniaitme . "

text: Simon Peter saith unto him , Lord , not my feet only , but also my hands and my head .
text2: Tutai Semun Pítiur Tímiayi " Nuinkia , Uunta , aya nawerkechu antsu uwejrusha tura muukarsha nijiatrurta . "

text: Jesus saith to him , He that is washed needeth not save to wash his feet , but is clean every whit : and ye are clean , but not all .
text2: Tura Jesus Tímiayi " Yamái mainkia Ayashí shiir asamtai aya nawenin Nijiamártiniaiti . Atumí Enentáin Ashí pénkeraitrume . Túrasha Ashí shuarcha " Tímiayi .

text: For he knew who should betray him ; therefore said he , Ye are not all clean .
text2: Kame Jútas Niin suruktinian Nekáa " Ashí shuarcha " Tímiayi .

text: So after he had washed their feet , and had taken his garments , and was set down again , he said unto them , Know ye what I have done to you ?
text2: Jesussha nijiar umik ni pushirin entsarmiayi . Tura atak pujus Tímiayi " ṡAtumsha Wi Túrajna nu nekaarmek ?

text: Ye call me Master and Lord : and ye say well ; for so I am .
text2: Wi Atumí Uuntri asamtai nekas " Uunta " Túrutrume . Nusha pénkeraiti .

text: If I then , your Lord and Master , have washed your feet ; ye also ought to wash one another ' s feet .
text2: Tura Jintinniuitiatan tura Uuntaitiatan Atumí nawen nijiarchajak . Atumsha Núnisrumek nuamtak Náwem nijiatnairatarum .

text: For I have given you an example , that ye should do as I have done to you .
text2: Atumin nekapruatsan Túramjai . Atumsha Núnisrumek Túratarum .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , The servant is not greater than his lord ; neither he that is sent greater than he that sent him .
text2: Ti nekasan tajai . Takarniuka ni uuntri nankaamaschaiti . Akupkamusha akupea nuna nankaamaschaiti .

text: If ye know these things , happy are ye if ye do them .
text2: Nu nekaarum Túrakrumka shiir átatrume . '

text: I speak not of you all : I know whom I have chosen : but that the scripture may be fulfilled , He that eateth bread with me hath lifted up his heel against me .
text2: ` Tura Tájana nuna Ashí Tátsujrume . Anaikiaitiaj Núnaka Wi nékajai . Tura Yus - Chicham uminkiatniuiti , nékajai . Ju aarmaiti : " Wijiai yurumna nu winia nemasur ajasai . "

text: Now I tell you before it come , that , when it is come to pass , ye may believe that I am he .
text2: Nuka Túmatsain ujaajrume . Nuyá Túrunamtai Yusa Uchiríntjai nusha paant nekaattarme .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that receiveth whomsoever I send receiveth me ; and he that receiveth me receiveth him that sent me .
text2: Wi Tájana nu nekasaiti . Shuar Wi akupeaj nuna shiir itiaakka Winiasha shiir itiaarui . Tura Winia shiir itiaarna nusha Winia Akuptukuncha itiaawai " Tímiayi .

text: When Jesus had thus said , he was troubled in spirit , and testified , and said , Verily , verily , I say unto you , that one of you shall betray me .
text2: Nuna ti , Jesus ni Enentáin ti itiurchat Enentáimpramiayi . Tura paant Tímiayi " Nekas tajai , chikichik jui atumjai pujana nu Winia surutkattawai . "

text: Then the disciples looked one on another , doubting of whom he spake .
text2: Tutai ni unuiniamuri nuamtak iiniaisar " ṡYanak ta ? " tiarmiayi .

text: Now there was leaning on Jesus ' bosom one of his disciples , whom Jesus loved .
text2: Chikichík unuiniamuri , Jesus ti aneamu , Niijiai tsanin yurumuk pujumiayi .

text: Simon Peter therefore beckoned to him , that he should ask who it should be of whom he spake .
text2: Tuma asamtai Semun Pítiur ni uwejéjai iniakmas " Aniasta , ṡyanak áujmata ? " Tímiayi .

text: He then lying on Jesus ' breast saith unto him , Lord , who is it ?
text2: Tutai Jesusan áyanmatsan aniasmiayi . " ṡYait , Uunta ? " Tímiayi .

text: Jesus answered , He it is , to whom I shall give a sop , when I have dipped it . And when he had dipped the sop , he gave it to Judas Iscariot , the son of Simon .
text2: Jesussha ayak " Tantan Túumnium ajunkan susattaj Núiti " Tímiayi . Nújain tantan Túumnium ajun Semunka Uchirín Jútas Iskariútin susamiayi .

text: And after the sop Satan entered into him . Then said Jesus unto him , That thou doest , do quickly .
text2: Tura Wárik Jútas tantan achikmatai íwianch ni Enentáin wayamiayi . Nuyá Jesus Tímiayi " Túrattamna nu Wárik Túrata . "

text: Now no man at the table knew for what intent he spake this unto him .
text2: Tura Ashí nui yurumainiak pujuarmia nusha wariniak ta tusa nekaacharmiayi .

text: For some of them thought , because Judas had the bag , that Jesus had said unto him , Buy those things that we have need of against the feast ; or , that he should give something to the poor .
text2: " Kuítrincha kuit Súsarta " Tátsuash tu Enentáimprarmiayi . Tura chikichcha " nampernum Yurumátin atsumajnia nu sumakta " Tátsuash , tu Enentáimprarmiayi . Jútas Kuítian Wáinin asamtai tu Enentáimprarmiayi .

text: He then having received the sop went immediately out : and it was night .
text2: Jútas tantan yua kashi ajasmanum Jíinkimiayi .

text: Therefore , when he was gone out , Jesus said , Now is the Son of man glorified , and God is glorified in him .
text2: Jútas Jíinkimtai Jesus Tímiayi " Wi Aents Ajasu asamtai winia kakarmar yamaikia paant átatui . Tura wi Túramujai Yusa kakarmarisha ti paant átatui .

text: If God be glorified in him , God shall also glorify him in himself , and shall straightway glorify him .
text2: Wi Yusa kakarmarin paant awajeakui Wisha ni Uchirí asamtai winia kakarmarnasha Yuska Wárik paant awajsattawai .

text: Little children , yet a little while I am with you . Ye shall seek me : and as I said unto the Jews , Whither I go , ye cannot come ; so now I say to you .
text2: Uchichiru , atumjai ti Untsurí tsawant pujuschattajai yamaikia . Wi Israer - shuaran Tímiaj Nútiksanak atumin Tájarme . Atumsha Winia Eátkáttarme tura wi wéamunam winishtatrume .

text: A new commandment I give unto you , That ye love one another ; as I have loved you , that ye also love one another .
text2: Ju yamaram akupeamun amaajai nuamtak mai anenai ajatarum tusan . Wi atumin aneajrumna Núnisrumek atumsha nuamtak mai anenai ajatniuitrume .

text: By this shall all men know that ye are my disciples , if ye have love one to another .
text2: Anenaiyakrumninkia nujai Ashí shuar " Kristu unuiniamuri ainiawai " Túramartatui .

text: Simon Peter said unto him , Lord , whither goest thou ? Jesus answered him , Whither I go , thou canst not follow me now ; but thou shalt follow me afterwards .
text2: Semun Pítiur Jesusan aniasmiayi " Uunta , ṡtua wéam ? " Jesussha Tímiayi " Wi wéajna nui yamaikia winichminiaitrume . Tura ukunam winittiarme . "

text: Peter said unto him , Lord , why cannot I follow thee now ? I will lay down my life for thy sake .
text2: Nuyá Pítiur Tímiayi " Uunta , ṡurukamtai yamaikia winichminiaitiaj ? Amin Yáintajtsan jakataj tajai . "

text: Jesus answered him , Wilt thou lay down thy life for my sake ? Verily , verily , I say unto thee , The cock shall not crow , till thou hast denied me thrice .
text2: Jesussha Tímiayi " ṡNekasmek Táme ? Ti nekas Tájame , atash shiniatsain Winia Menáintiú natsantrurtatme " Tímiayi .

text: Let not your heart be troubled : ye believe in God , believe also in me .
text2: " Kúntuts pujusairap . Yus Enentáimtustarum , Winiasha Enentáimtursatarum .

text: In my Father ' s house are many mansions : if it were not so , I would have told you . I go to prepare a place for you .
text2: Winia Aparuí átum pujustin ti ankant awai . Tura nuna iwiarataj tusan Aparuí wéajai , nekasaiti . Nekaschaitkiuinkia ṡitiurak ujakaajrum ?

text: And if I go and prepare a place for you , I will come again , and receive you unto myself ; that where I am , there ye may be also .
text2: Tura iwiaaran amukan ataksha Tátatjai . Tura tana yaruaktatjarme , wi pujamunam atumsha Pujusúk tusan .

text: And whither I go ye know , and the way ye know .
text2: Wi wéaj nu nékarme tura jintiasha nékarme " Tímiayi Jesus .

text: Thomas saith unto him , Lord , we know not whither thou goest ; and how can we know the way ?
text2: Tumas Tímiayi " Uunta , Ame weam nu nékatsji . ṡJintiasha itiurak nekaattaj ~ i ? "

text: Jesus saith unto him , I am the way , the truth , and the life : no man cometh unto the Father , but by me .
text2: Jesussha Tímiayi " Wi nekas Jíntiaitjai . Wíjiainchu wekaana nuka winia Aparuí jeatniun penké tujintiawai . Tura Wisha tuke nekas tiniu asan nekas ana nuna Shuáran nékamtikiajai . Wisha Shuáran yamaram iwiaakman tuke amuukashtinian Súwitjai .

text: If ye had known me , ye should have known my Father also : and from henceforth ye know him , and have seen him .
text2: Winia nékarkurmeka winia Aparsha nekaawaintrume . Yamaisha Nii Wáinkia asarum nékarme " Tímiayi .

text: Philip saith unto him , Lord , shew us the Father , and it sufficeth us .
text2: Nuinkia Jiripisha Tímiayi " Uunta , Apasha Wáinkiarka maak . "

text: Jesus saith unto him , Have I been so long time with you , and yet hast thou not known me , Philip ? he that hath seen me hath seen the Father ; and how sayest thou then , Shew us the Father ?
text2: Jesussha Tímiayi " Jiripi , atumjai ti pujusu aisha ṡtuke nékartsumek ? Winia Wáitkia nuka Winia Aparnasha Wáinkiaiti . ṡItiurak , nuikia , " Apasha Wáinkiarka maak " tame ?

text: Believest thou not that I am in the Father , and the Father in me ? the words that I speak unto you I speak not of myself : but the Father that dwelleth in me , he doeth the works .
text2: Winia Aparjai tsaninkian pujakun tura winia Aparsha Wijiai pujakui tuke chikichkiitji . ṡNu nékatsrumek ? Wi Tájarmena nu Winia chichampruchuiti . Yus Apa Winí pujak ni wakeramun takaawai .

text: Believe me that I am in the Father , and the Father in me : or else believe me for the very works ' sake .
text2: Nekaatarum . Wisha winia Aparjai tsaninkia pujakur nekas chikichkiitji . " Nu chicham itiurchataiti " Enentáimkiurmeka wi Túramu nuikia Enentáimpratarum . Wi Túramujai chikichik ájinia nu Páantchakait .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that believeth on me , the works that I do shall he do also ; and greater works than these shall he do ; because I go unto my Father .
text2: Wi Tájarmena nu ti nekasaiti . Winia Enentáimturna nu Wi Túrajna nuna Túrattawai . Tura winia Aparuí wéakui nuna nankaamas tujintiamun Túrattawai .

text: And whatsoever ye shall ask in my name , that will I do , that the Father may be glorified in the Son .
text2: Ashí Winia Enentáimtursarum seatrumna nuna amastatjai . Nújainkia winia Apar shiir awajnastatui .

text: If ye shall ask any thing in my name , I will do it .
text2: Winia Enentáimtursarum seakrumninkia Ashí Túrattajai ' Tímiayi .

text: If ye love me , keep my commandments .
text2: ` Atumsha anentkurmeka winia chichamur umiktarum .

text: And I will pray the Father , and he shall give you another Comforter , that he may abide with you for ever ;
text2: Tura wéakun winia Aparun chikichan akupturmakti tusan seattajai . Niisha atumjai tuke pujak atsantamprartatui .

text: Even the Spirit of truth ; whom the world cannot receive , because it seeth him not , neither knoweth him : but ye know him ; for he dwelleth with you , and shall be in you .
text2: Nusha Yusa Wakaníinti . Yus - shuarcha Niin nekaachmin ainiawai . Tuma asamtai ni Enentáin wayachminiaiti . Antsu átumka atumi Enentáin pujakui Nii nékarme . Niisha Atumí Enentáin tuke pujustatui .

text: I will not leave you comfortless : I will come to you .
text2: Mitiaikia aitkiasnak ikiukchattajrume . Atumíin atak Tátatjai .

text: Yet a little while , and the world seeth me no more ; but ye see me : because I live , ye shall live also .
text2: Ishichik tsawant nankaamasmatai Chíkich shuar irunna nu Wáitkiachartatui . Tura Wi iwiaaku asamtai átumka nu iwiaakmajai pujustatrume . Tuma asarum Wáitkiattarme .

text: At that day ye shall know that I am in my Father , and ye in me , and I in you .
text2: Tura nu tsawantai ju nekaattarme . Wisha winia Aparjai tsaninkia pujakur chikichkiitji . Núnisnak Wisha atumjai tsaninkian pujajai . Tura atumsha Wijiai tsaninkia pujarme .

text: He that hath my commandments , and keepeth them , he it is that loveth me : and he that loveth me shall be loved of my Father , and I will love him , and will manifest myself to him .
text2: Shuar Winia anentuka wi akupkamun Nekáa Umíawai . Nú shuarnaka winia Aparsha aneawai . Wisha niin aneajai tura nekarati tusan iniaktustatjai . " Jesus nuna Tímiayi .

text: Judas saith unto him , not Iscariot , Lord , how is it that thou wilt manifest thyself unto us , and not unto the world ?
text2: Chíkich Jútas , Iskariútichu , Tímiayi " Uunta , ṡurukamtai Ashí shuarnum iniaktutskesha aya iin iniaktustatam ? "

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , If a man love me , he will keep my words : and my Father will love him , and we will come unto him , and make our abode with him .
text2: Jesus Tímiayi " Winia anentuka Tájana nuna Enentáimtawai . Winia Aparsha nu shuaran aneattawai . Tura Wisha winia Aparnum nu shuarjai tsaninkia pujustatji .

text: He that loveth me not keepeth not my sayings : and the word which ye hear is not mine , but the Father ' s which sent me .
text2: Antsu Winia anentchaka Tájana nuna Enentáimtatsui . Atum ántarmena Nú chichamka Wíniachuiti , antsu Yus Apa Winia akuptukua Núnaiti ' Tímiayi .

text: These things have I spoken unto you , being yet present with you .
text2: ` Atumjai tuke pujakun nuna Tájarme .

text: But the Comforter , which is the Holy Ghost , whom the Father will send in my name , he shall teach you all things , and bring all things to your remembrance , whatsoever I have said unto you .
text2: Yus Apa ni Shiir Wakanin atumin Yáinmak atsantamprarat tusa akupturmaktatrume . Wi seam Túrattawai . Nu Wakancha Ashí Wi ujakjarmena nuna atak Enentáimtikramprar Ashí unuitiamprartatui ' Tímiayi .

text: Peace I leave with you , my peace I give unto you : not as the world giveth , give I unto you . Let not your heart be troubled , neither let it be afraid .
text2: ` Imiatkinchanum pujustarum . Imiatkinchanum pujajna Núnisrumek pujustarum tusan amaajai . Jú nunkanmanka warastin Wáinkiashtatrume . Antsu itiurchatnum pujayatrumkesha Wijiai imiatkinchanum pujustatrume . Ashamtsuk pujustarum . Itiurchat Enentáimprairap .

text: Ye have heard how I said unto you , I go away , and come again unto you . If ye loved me , ye would rejoice , because I said , I go unto the Father : for my Father is greater than I .
text2: Nuik timiaj nu antukmarme . Aparuí wena atak Atumiín Tátatjai . Winia Aparka Wijiai nankaamas uuntaiti . Tuma asamtai ti nekas anentkurmeka " Aparuí wéajai " takui Ashí warasaarme .

text: And now I have told you before it come to pass , that , when it is come to pass , ye might believe .
text2: Nuka Túmatsain ujaajrume . Túrunamtai Nuyá Winia Enentáimtursattarme " Tímiayi .

text: Hereafter I will not talk much with you : for the prince of this world cometh , and hath nothing in me .
text2: ` Jú nunkanmayan akupin winiakui atumjai Núkap chichaschattajai yamaikia . Wíniaka nupettukchamniaiti .

text: But that the world may know that I love the Father ; and as the Father gave me commandment , even so I do . Arise , let us go hence .
text2: Tura Wikia winia Aparun aneajai tura Nii akupturkama nuna tuke Túrajai . Ashí shuar nuna nekaawarti tusa Ashí Túrunatniuiti . Wajaktiarum . Juyá Wetái ' Tímiayi .

text: I am the true vine , and my Father is the husbandman .
text2: ` Winia iwiaakmarun amaakun numi arakma aintsanketjai . Wikia kampuintjai atumsha kanawentrume . Winia Aparsha arakan Wáiniua Núnisaiti .

text: Every branch in me that beareth not fruit he taketh away : and every branch that beareth fruit , he purgeth it , that it may bring forth more fruit .
text2: Winia kanawernasha nereatsna Núnaka tsupik ájapeawai . Tura nereana Núnaka Púruawai Nú nukap nerekat tusa .

text: Now ye are clean through the word which I have spoken unto you .
text2: Wi ujakjarmena nujai puruarmaitrume .

text: Abide in me , and I in you . As the branch cannot bear fruit of itself , except it abide in the vine ; no more can ye , except ye abide in me .
text2: Numí kanawesha kampuin áchitkiachkunka ninki nerekchamniaiti . Núnisrumek atumsha Winí áchitkiachkurmeka nerekchamniaitrume . Wi atumjai áchitkiaj Núnisrumek atumsha Winí tuke áchitkia atarum ' Tímiayi .

text: I am the vine , ye are the branches : He that abideth in me , and I in him , the same bringeth forth much fruit : for without me ye can do nothing .
text2: ` Wikia kampuintjai atumsha kanawentrume . Kampuinkia kanawen áchitkia Núnisnak achiakjarme . Tura kanawe ni kampuinin áchitkia Núnisrum Winí áchitkia atarum . Túrakrumka Núkap nerektatrume . Antsu Wíjiainchuka pénker Túratin penké tujintiarme .

text: If a man abide not in me , he is cast forth as a branch , and is withered ; and men gather them , and cast them into the fire , and they are burned .
text2: Winí áchitkiachuka ajapam kukartatui . Kanawesha kukarmatai shuar irumkar aesawartatui ' Tímiayi .

text: If ye abide in me , and my words abide in you , ye shall ask what ye will , and it shall be done unto you .
text2: ` Tuke Winí áchitkiaitkiurmeka tura winia chichamprusha kajinmattsuk emetarmeka átum wakerarmena nu seakrumin amastatjai .

text: Herein is my Father glorified , that ye bear much fruit ; so shall ye be my disciples .
text2: Atum Núkap nereakrumninkia Ashí shuar " Nekas Jesusa unuiniamurinti " Túramartatui tura winia Aparnasha shiir awajsartatui .

text: As the Father hath loved me , so have I loved you : continue ye in my love .
text2: Winia Apar anenna Nútiksanak Wisha atumin aneajrume . Winia aneamur tuke atarum .

text: If ye keep my commandments , ye shall abide in my love ; even as I have kept my Father ' s commandments , and abide in his love .
text2: Winia Aparu akupkamurin umiakun tuke ni aneamurintjai . Núnisrumek winia akupkamur umiakrumka tuke winia aneamur átatrume ' Tímiayi .

text: These things have I spoken unto you , that my joy might remain in you , and that your joy might be full .
text2: ` Wi waraajna aintsarmek warastarum tusan nuna Tájarme . Tura ti shiir warastatrume .

text: This is my commandment , That ye love one another , as I have loved you .
text2: Wi akupkamu Júiti : " Wi aneajrumna Nútiksarmek Ashí anenaitiarum . "

text: Greater love hath no man than this , that a man lay down his life for his friends .
text2: Shuar ni amikrin Yáintaj tusa jakanka ti anenkartichukait .

text: Ye are my friends , if ye do whatsoever I command you .
text2: Wi akupeamu takaakrumka atumsha winia amikruitrume .

text: Henceforth I call you not servants ; for the servant knoweth not what his lord doeth : but I have called you friends ; for all things that I have heard of my Father I have made known unto you .
text2: Takarniuka ni uuntri takaana nuna nékatsui . Tuma asamtai " winia takarniuruitrume " Tátsujrume . Antsu Ashí winia Apar Táman ujaku asan " winia amikruitrume " Tájarme .

text: Ye have not chosen me , but I have chosen you , and ordained you , that ye should go and bring forth fruit , and that your fruit should remain : that whatsoever ye shall ask of the Father in my name , he may give it you .
text2: Aya Atumí Enentáimsamurijiain Wíi shuar ajaschamarme . Antsu akatramur ajastarum tusan atumniaka achikjarme Wi . Winia takatur takastiniaitrume . Túrarum pénker Túratniuitrume nerektinia aintsarmek . Tura nu nere amuutsuk tuke átiniaiti . Tuma asamtai winia Apar searmena nuna amastatui .

text: These things I command you , that ye love one another .
text2: Júnaka akupeajrume : Nuamtak mai anenai ajatarum ' Tímiayi .

text: If the world hate you , ye know that it hated me before it hated you .
text2: ` Ju nunkanmaya shuar Winia emka nakitrurar atumniasha nakitramarme .

text: If ye were of the world , the world would love his own : but because ye are not of the world , but I have chosen you out of the world , therefore the world hateth you .
text2: Atumsha ju nunkanmaya shuaraitkiurminkia niiniua Nútiksan anenmaintrume . Antsu Wíi shuar ajastarum tusan ju nunkanmaya achikmajrume . Túramtai nekas ju nunkanmayanchuitrume yamaikia . Nu asamtai nu shuar nakitramainiawai .

text: Remember the word that I said unto you , The servant is not greater than his lord . If they have persecuted me , they will also persecute you ; if they have kept my saying , they will keep yours also .
text2: " Takarniuka ni uuntri nankaamaschaiti " Tíchamkajrum . Shuar Winia yajauch awajtusaru ásar atumniasha yajauch awajtamsartatui . Chikichcha umirtukaru ásar atumniasha umirtamkartatui .

text: But all these things will they do unto you for my name ' s sake , because they know not him that sent me .
text2: Winia Akuptukun nékachu ásar Winia Enentáimturkurmin yajauch awajtamsartatui ' Tímiayi .

text: If I had not come and spoken unto them , they had not had sin : but now they have no cloke for their sin .
text2: ` Wi tana Yus - Chichaman niin ujakchamtainkia tunaanum sumamacharaayi . Antsu ujakma ásar " Nékachkun Túraitjai " Tíchamin ainiawai .

text: He that hateth me hateth my Father also .
text2: Winia nakitruinia nuka winia Aparnasha nakitiainiawai .

text: If I had not done among them the works which none other man did , they had not had sin : but now have they both seen and hated both me and my Father .
text2: Aents penké Túrachman Túrachuitkiuinkia tunaanum sumamacharainti . Antsu wi Túramun Wáinkiaru ainiayat Winiasha tura winia Aparnasha nakitiainiawai .

text: But this cometh to pass , that the word might be fulfilled that is written in their law , They hated me without a cause .
text2: Yaunchu Yus akupkamunam aarmaiti : " Penké ántar nakitrurarmai . " Nu chicham uminkiati tusa Túrunaiti ' Tímiayi .

text: But when the Comforter is come , whom I will send unto you from the Father , even the Spirit of truth , which proceedeth from the Father , he shall testify of me :
text2: ` Tura atsantamprattsa Yáinmana nuna winia Aparuiya akuptuktatjarme . Niisha tuke nekas tiniu Wakaniiti . Niisha Yusaiya taa atumin nekamtikramprattarme .

text: And ye also shall bear witness , because ye have been with me from the beginning .
text2: Atumsha yaunchu Wijiai pujusu asarum nekamtikiattarme ' Tímiayi .

text: These things have I spoken unto you , that ye should not be offended .
text2: ` Atum kanartukairum tusan Júnaka Tájarme .

text: They shall put you out of the synagogues : yea , the time cometh , that whosoever killeth you will think that he doeth God service .
text2: Israer - shuar iruntainiumia jiiki akuptamkattarme . Nu arantcha mantamainiaksha " Yúsan shiir awajsattsan Túrajai " Tiártatui .

text: And these things will they do unto you , because they have not known the Father , nor me .
text2: Nu shuar Winiasha tura winia Aparnasha nékachu ásar Túrutmawartatui .

text: But these things have I told you , that when the time shall come , ye may remember that I told you of them . And these things I said not unto you at the beginning , because I was with you .
text2: Núnaka Yamái Tájame . Tura Túrunamtai " Núnisan átiniaiti " timiaj nu nekaarum itiurchat Enentáimprairap ' Tímiayi . ` Atumjai tuke Pujá asan Núnaka yaunchu ujakchamajrume .

text: But now I go my way to him that sent me ; and none of you asketh me , Whither goest thou ?
text2: Antsu yamaikia Wáketjai winia Akuptukmia nujai pujustaj tusan . Tuma ain wéajna nu inintratsrume .

text: But because I have said these things unto you , sorrow hath filled your heart .
text2: Antsu nuna takui ti kuntuts Enentáimprarme .

text: Nevertheless I tell you the truth ; It is expedient for you that I go away : for if I go not away , the Comforter will not come unto you ; but if I depart , I will send him unto you .
text2: Tura Wi wématai atumjainkia nuna nankaamas pénker átatui . Iis , Wi wéaknaka atumin yainmaktinia nuna akupkattajai tura wéachkuinkia Táchattawai . Nuka ti nekasaiti .

text: And when he is come , he will reprove the world of sin , and of righteousness , and of judgment :
text2: Yusa Wakaní taa Ashí Jú nunkanmaya aentsun ju menaintiun nekamtikiattawai . Ni tunaari aan nekamtikiattawai . Pénker tunaajainchu wekasamniana nunasha nekamtikiattawai . Tura Yus tunaanum Súmamtikiamniana nunasha nekamtikiattawai .

text: Of sin , because they believe not on me ;
text2: Winia Enentáimturainiachu Tunáarintin ainiawai .

text: Of righteousness , because I go to my Father , and ye see me no more ;
text2: Winia Aparuí Wáketkui Wáitkiashtatrume . Tuma asamtai Ashí shuar wi pénker tunaajainchu wekaamun nekaawartatui .

text: Of judgment , because the prince of this world is judged .
text2: Tura ju nunkanam akupniunka Yus tunaanum Súmamtikia asa shuarnasha Súmamtikiamniaiti . Nuna paant nekaawartatui ' Tímiayi .

text: I have yet many things to say unto you , but ye cannot bear them now .
text2: ` Nu arantcha Núkap Tíintjiarme Túrasha átumka nekaachaintrume .

text: Howbeit when he , the Spirit of truth , is come , he will guide you into all truth : for he shall not speak of himself ; but whatsoever he shall hear , that shall he speak : and he will shew you things to come .
text2: Yusa Wakaní Ashí nekas tiniu asa Ashí nekasa nuna unuitiamprattarme . Ni Enentáimmiajai Tíchattawai antsu winia Aparuí antukma nuna ujatmaktatui . Ukunam átatna nunasha ujatmaktatui .

text: He shall glorify me : for he shall receive of mine , and shall shew it unto you .
text2: Ashí Wínian ujatmak Winia shiir awajtustatui .

text: All things that the Father hath are mine : therefore said I , that he shall take of mine , and shall shew it unto you .
text2: Ashí winia Apar takakna nusha Wíniaiti . Nu asamtai " Ashí Wínian ujatmaktatui " tajai ' Tímiayi .

text: A little while , and ye shall not see me : and again , a little while , and ye shall see me , because I go to the Father .
text2: ` Ishichik pujusrum Winia Wáitkiashtatrume . Nuyá ataksha ishichik pujusrum ataksha Wáitkiattarme . Wisha winia Aparuí wéajai " Tímiayi .

text: Then said some of his disciples among themselves , What is this that he saith unto us , A little while , and ye shall not see me : and again , a little while , and ye shall see me : and , Because I go to the Father ?
text2: Nuyá ni unuiniamuri nuamtak aniniaisarmiayi " ṡJú chichamsha warimpait ? " Ishichik pujusrum Wáitkiashtatrume tura ataksha ishichik pujusrum Wáitkiattarme tura Aparuí wéajai " Tátsuk .

text: They said therefore , What is this that he saith , A little while ? we cannot tell what he saith .
text2: " Ishichik pujusrum " tana nusha ṡwarimpait ? Nii tana nu ántatsji " tiarmiayi .

text: Now Jesus knew that they were desirous to ask him , and said unto them , Do ye inquire among yourselves of that I said , A little while , and ye shall not see me : and again , a little while , and ye shall see me ?
text2: Jesussha niin aniastai Táman Nekáa Tímiayi " Ishichik pujusrum Wáitkiashtatrume Nuyá ataksha ishichik pujusrum Wáitkiattarme " Tímiajai . ṡNúchakait átum inintrustin wakerarmena nu ?

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , That ye shall weep and lament , but the world shall rejoice : and ye shall be sorrowful , but your sorrow shall be turned into joy .
text2: Ti nekas Tájarme : Atumka Kúntuts pujusrum uuttiatrume tura Yus - shuarcha Warásártatui . Tuma ain ~ ki átum Kúntuts pujayatrumek ukunam warastatrume .

text: A woman when she is in travail hath sorrow , because her hour is come : but as soon as she is delivered of the child , she remembereth no more the anguish , for joy that a man is born into the world .
text2: Iis , nuwasha jurertin tsawant jeamtai najaimiak Wáitiatsuk . Tura uchin jurerka ti waraak Wáitsamunka Enentáimtsui .

text: And ye now therefore have sorrow : but I will see you again , and your heart shall rejoice , and your joy no man taketh from you .
text2: Atumsha Núnisrumek yamaik Kúntuts pujarme . Tura atak iitjiarum tusan winiakui ti shiir Atumí Enentáin warastatrume . Nu warastinian jurutramkichminia ainiawai . '

text: And in that day ye shall ask me nothing . Verily , verily , I say unto you , Whatsoever ye shall ask the Father in my name , he will give it you .
text2: ` Nu tsawantinkia penké ininsashtatrume . Ti nekas Tájarme Winia Enentáimtursarum winia Apar searum nuna Ashí amastatui .

text: Hitherto have ye asked nothing in my name : ask , and ye shall receive , that your joy may be full .
text2: Yamaisha Winia Enentáimtursarum winia Apar seachurme . Seakrumninkia amastatui ti shiir warasaruk tusa ' Tímiayi .

text: These things have I spoken unto you in proverbs : but the time cometh , when I shall no more speak unto you in proverbs , but I shall shew you plainly of the Father .
text2: ` Métek - taku chichamjai nakumkan nuna Tímiajai . Tura ukunmanka nujai chichatsuk winia Aparnan paant ujaktatjarme .

text: For the Father himself loveth you , because ye have loved me , and have believed that I came out from God .
text2: Nu tsawantai átumka Winia Enentáimtursarum winia Apar seattarme . Winia Aparsha atumin anea asamtai Wi Niin áujsatin atsumashtatrume . Winia anentu asarum tura winia Aparuíya taman Enentáimtakrumin Niisha anenmawai .

text: I came forth from the Father , and am come into the world : again , I leave the world , and go to the Father .
text2: Winia Aparuíya Jíinkin Jú nunkanam Táwitjai . Yamaikia Jú nunkanmaya Jíinkin ataksha Aparuí Wáketjai " Tímiayi .

text: His disciples said unto him , Lo , now speakest thou plainly , and speakest no proverb .
text2: Nuyá ni unuiniamuri tiarmiayi " Yamaikia métek - taku chichamjainchu chichaame .

text: Now are we sure that thou knowest all things , and needest not that any man should ask thee : by this we believe that thou camest forth from God .
text2: Mash nékaitme . Shuar Amin ininmatsain pénker aimkiatin nékame . Nu nekaar Ame nekas Yúsnumiaitme tu Enentáimtaji " tiarmiayi .

text: Jesus answered them , Do ye now believe ?
text2: Tura Jesus Tímiayi " ṡNekasash Enentáimtarum ?

text: Behold , the hour cometh , yea , is now come , that ye shall be scattered , every man to his own , and shall leave me alone : and yet I am not alone , because the Father is with me .
text2: Ti warik átumka ashamkarum Niisháa tsakinmaktatrume tura Winiak ikiurkittiarme . Antsu winia Apar pujakui Wiki pujatsjai .

text: These things I have spoken unto you , that in me ye might have peace . In the world ye shall have tribulation : but be of good cheer ; I have overcome the world .
text2: Winia Enentáimturkuram imiatkinchanum pujusarat tusan Tájarme . Jú nunkanam ti Wáitsattarme . Tura Wi Jú nunkanmayan nupetka asamtai warastarum " Tímiayi Jesus .

text: These words spake Jesus , and lifted up his eyes to heaven , and said , Father , the hour is come ; glorify thy Son , that thy Son also may glorify thee :
text2: Nuna ti Jesus nayaimpinmaani iimias Tímiayi " Aparu , Yamái jeayi ame Uchiram shiir awajsatin . Núnisan ame Uchirmisha pénker awajtamsattawai .

text: As thou hast given him power over all flesh , that he should give eternal life to as many as thou hast given him .
text2: Ashí shuara Akupniuri najataitme . Nujainkia Winia surusumna Nú shuaran yamaram iwiaakman tuke amuukashtinian Súsaitjai .

text: And this is life eternal , that they might know thee the only true God , and Jesus Christ , whom thou hast sent .
text2: Aparu , Chíkich atsawai . Amek nekas Yúsaitme . Wisha Jesuskrístuitjai Ame akuptukmamna nu . Nu asamtai Ashí shuar nuna Enentáimtak yamaram iwiaakman tuke amuukashtinian takakui . '

text: I have glorified thee on the earth : I have finished the work which thou gavest me to do .
text2: ` Ashí Túratniun akuptukmamna nuna amukuitjai . Túran ju nunkanam shiir awajsaitjame .

text: And now , O Father , glorify thou me with thine own self with the glory which I had with thee before the world was .
text2: Nuna Túramtai , Aparu , ti yaunchu Jú nunka atsaisha Amijiai pujakui shiir awajtusmamna Núnismek yamaisha shiir awajtusta . '

text: I have manifested thy name unto the men which thou gavest me out of the world : thine they were , and thou gavest them me ; and they have kept thy word .
text2: ` Ashí Jú nunkanmaya surusmamna Nú shuaran Amin nekamtikiamjai . Aminiu ainiakui surusmame . Niisha ame chichammin Umirtámkaruiti .

text: Now they have known that all things whatsoever thou hast given me are of thee .
text2: Ashí Wi takaajna nu Amek surusuitme . Niisha nuna nékainiawai .

text: For I have given unto them the words which thou gavest me ; and they have received them , and have known surely that I came out from thee , and they have believed that thou didst send me .
text2: Ame chichamem surusmam nuna ujakam niisha Umirtámkaruiti . Ame akuptukakmin Amiiníya Táwitjai . Nu nekasaiti tu Enentáimtuiniawai . '

text: I pray for them : I pray not for the world , but for them which thou hast given me ; for they are thine .
text2: ` Niin yainkiarta tusan seajme . Jú nunkanmaya shuaran Amin Enentáimturmainiatsna nuna seattsujai . Antsu Ame surusmam nuna , Aminiu ajasarmatai , Yáinkiarta tusan seajme .

text: And all mine are thine , and thine are mine ; and I am glorified in them .
text2: Ashí Winia ainia nuka Aminiuiti . Tura Ashí Aminiu ainia nuka Winia ainiawai . Winia pénkerusha ni Túramunam paant awajsaiti . '

text: And now I am no more in the world , but these are in the world , and I come to thee . Holy Father , keep through thine own name those whom thou hast given me , that they may be one , as we are .
text2: ` Wikia yamaikia Jú nunkanam pujuschattajai . Tura nu shuarka jui pujuartatui . Antsu Amijiai pujustajtsan winiakui Ashí surusumna nuka , Aparu , ti shiir asam ame kakarmarmijiai Wáinkiata . Wisha Amijiai chikichik ájinia Núnisan niisha Ashí iruntrar chikichik ajasarti .

text: While I was with them in the world , I kept them in thy name : those that thou gavest me I have kept , and none of them is lost , but the son of perdition ; that the scripture might be fulfilled .
text2: Jui niijiai pujakun ame kakarmarmijiai ti pénker Wáinkiamjai . Antsu Yus - Chichamnum aarma uminkiati tusa aya chikichik menkakaiti . Niisha tuke emesnartinia Núiti . '

text: And now come I to thee ; and these things I speak in the world , that they might have my joy fulfilled in themselves .
text2: ` Yamaikia Amiini winiajai . Tura jui tuke pujakun juna Tájame . Niisha Wi waraajna Núnisar ti shiir warasarat tusan tajai .

text: I have given them thy word ; and the world hath hated them , because they are not of the world , even as I am not of the world .
text2: Wi Jú nunkanmayanchuitjai . Niisha Núnisan Jú nunkanmayanchu ainiawai . Tuma asamtai ame chichammin Wi susamtai Jú nunkanmaya shuarka niin nakitiainiawai .

text: I pray not that thou shouldest take them out of the world , but that thou shouldest keep them from the evil .
text2: Jú nunkanmaya Jíiki tusan seatsjame . Antsu íwianch niin nupetkain tusan seajme .

text: They are not of the world , even as I am not of the world .
text2: Wi juyanchuitiaj aintsan niisha juyanchu ainiawai .

text: Sanctify them through thy truth : thy word is truth .
text2: Ame chichammin ti nekasa nuna ántuiniakui pénker awajsata .

text: As thou hast sent me into the world , even so have I also sent them into the world .
text2: Juya shuarnum akuptukmam aintsan Wisha niin Chíkich shuarnum akupeajai .

text: And for their sakes I sanctify myself , that they also might be sanctified through the truth .
text2: Aya Aminiunak takastaj tusan Enentáimtimjai . Túra asamtai niisha aya Aminiunak takastinian Enentáimpratin ainiawai ' áujtak Tímiayi .

text: Neither pray I for these alone , but for them also which shall believe on me through their word ;
text2: ` Aya Níiniunkeka seatsjame antsu Ashí ni chichamen antukar Winia Enentáimtursartatna nusha ame Yáinkiarta tusan seajme .

text: That they all may be one ; as thou , Father , art in me , and I in thee , that they also may be one in us : that the world may believe that thou hast sent me .
text2: Ashí niisha chikichkiniak Enentáimtusarti tusan seajme . Wisha Amesha , Aparu , chikichik ájinia Núnisan niisha Iijiai iruntrar chikichik ajastai tusar seajme . Wíi shuar chikichik najanata tusan seajme . Nuyá ju nunkanmaya shuar akuptukuitmena nuna nekaawartatui .

text: And the glory which thou gavest me I have given them ; that they may be one , even as we are one :
text2: Ame shiir awajtursamna Núnisnak Wisha niin shiir awajsaitjai . Iikia chikichik ájinia Núnisan niisha chikichik ajasarti tusan Túraitjai .

text: I in them , and thou in me , that they may be made perfect in one ; and that the world may know that thou hast sent me , and hast loved them , as thou hast loved me .
text2: Wi ni Enentáin pujakui Amesha Winin pujakmin penké chikichik ajasarti . Túramtai Ashí shuar juna nekaawartatui : Ame akuptukuitme , tura Winia anenmena aintsam nu shuarsha aneame . Wíi shuar chikichik ajasmajai Ashí shuar nuna nekaawartatui . '

text: Father , I will that they also , whom thou hast given me , be with me where I am ; that they may behold my glory , which thou hast given me : for thou lovedst me before the foundation of the world .
text2: ` Aparu , shuar surusmam nu , Wi pujustatjana nui pujusarti tusan seajme . Tura ti shiir awajtusmamna nuna iisarti tusan nuna seajme . Ju nunka najanchamunman tuke anentin asam ti shiir awajtusuitme .

text: O righteous Father , the world hath not known thee : but I have known thee , and these have known that thou hast sent me .
text2: Aparu , ti pénker áminin ju nunkanmaya shuar nekarmainiatsui . Antsu Wi nékajme . Ju shuarsha ame akuptukman nékainiawai .

text: And I have declared unto them thy name , and will declare it : that the love wherewith thou hast loved me may be in them , and I in them .
text2: Nú shuaran Amin nekarmawarti tusan jintintiaitjai . Tura nu arantcha jintintiattajai . Nújainkia Wisha ni Enentáin pujurkui Winia anenmena aintsan niisha anenkratin ajasartatui " áujtak Tímiayi Jesus .

text: When Jesus had spoken these words , he went forth with his disciples over the brook Cedron , where was a garden , into the which he entered , and his disciples .
text2: Jesussha nuna tinia amuk ni unuiniamurijiai Setrun Entsá katin numi arakmanum wémiayi .

text: And Judas also , which betrayed him , knew the place : for Jesus ofttimes resorted thither with his disciples .
text2: Jútassha Niin suruktajtsa pujumia nuka nu ajan nekaamiayi . Untsurí tsawant Jesus ni unuiniamurijiai nui iruntramtai Jútas Jesusan nui Wáinkiatniun Enentáimpramiayi .

text: Judas then , having received a band of men and officers from the chief priests and Pharisees , cometh thither with lanterns and torches and weapons .
text2: Tura Untsurí suntarjaisha Jesusan tariarmiayi . Pariséusha Israer - shuar Patri uuntrisha suntarnasha Yusa Jeen Wáiniuncha Jesusan achikiarat tusa akupkarmiayi . Niisha machitniasha nankincha Rámparancha jiniasha Júkiar weriarmiayi .

text: Jesus therefore , knowing all things that should come upon him , went forth , and said unto them , Whom seek ye ?
text2: Jesussha Ashí átinia nuna neka asa jiintiuki " ṡYa eaarum ? " Tímiayi .

text: They answered him , Jesus of Nazareth . Jesus saith unto them , I am he . And Judas also , which betrayed him , stood with them .
text2: Niisha " Nasarétnumia Jesus " tiarmiayi . Jesussha " Wiitjai " Tímiayi . Jútassha Jesusan surukua nu niijiai pujuarmiayi .

text: As soon then as he had said unto them , I am he , they went backward , and fell to the ground .
text2: Tura Jesus " Wiitjai " takui ti ashamkar úkumur waketainiak iniaararmiayi .

text: Then asked he them again , Whom seek ye ? And they said , Jesus of Nazareth .
text2: Ataksha Jesus " ṡYa eaarum ? " Tímiayi . Niisha " Nasarétnumia Jesus " tiarmiayi .

text: Jesus answered , I have told you that I am he : if therefore ye seek me , let these go their way :
text2: Nuinkia Jesus Tímiayi " Wiitjai , Tájarme . Winia eatkurmeka Wíi shuar ainia juka waketkiarti " Tímiayi .

text: That the saying might be fulfilled , which he spake , Of them which thou gavest me have I lost none .
text2: Jesus nuik aujuk " Winia Apar surusma nu menkakacharai " timia nu uminkiati tusa Jesus " waketkiarti " Tímiayi .

text: Then Simon Peter having a sword drew it , and smote the high priest ' s servant , and cut off his right ear . The servant ' s name was Malchus .
text2: Nuyá Semun Pítiur machitian jusa Marku Kuíshin untsuurnumaani tsupirkamiayi . Markusha Israer - patri Uuntrí takarniuriyayi .

text: Then said Jesus unto Peter , Put up thy sword into the sheath : the cup which my Father hath given me , shall I not drink it ?
text2: Túramtai Jesus Pítrun Tímiayi " Machitrumka awainki ikiusta . Winia Apar Wáitsatniun surakuinkia ṡWáitsashtinkaitiaj ? "

text: Then the band and the captain and officers of the Jews took Jesus , and bound him ,
text2: Nuinkia apach suntarsha ni Kapitiántrisha Yusa Jeen wainniusha Jesusan achikiar jinkiawarmiayi .

text: And led him away to Annas first ; for he was father in law to Caiaphas , which was the high priest that same year .
text2: Nuyá Anasa jeen Júkiarmiayi . Anassha Kaipiasa Wearíyayi . Tura Kaipias nu uwitin Israer - patri uuntriyayi .

text: Now Caiaphas was he , which gave counsel to the Jews , that it was expedient that one man should die for the people .
text2: Kaipiaska nuik " ṡAshí Israer - shuar mesertin pénkerkait . Antsu aya chikichik shuar Jákatin pénkerchakait ? " timia Núiti .

text: And Simon Peter followed Jesus , and so did another disciple : that disciple was known unto the high priest , and went in with Jesus into the palace of the high priest .
text2: Semun Pítiur Chíkich unuiniamujai Jesusa uku weriarmiayi . Israer - patri uuntri Nú unuiniamunka nékauyayi . Tuma asamtai ni jeen jeawar , suntar Jesusjai aa tanishnum Wáiniakui niisha wayamiayi .

text: But Peter stood at the door without . Then went out that other disciple , which was known unto the high priest , and spake unto her that kept the door , and brought in Peter .
text2: Tura Pítiur aa Wáitiniam wajaamiayi . Túramtai Chíkich unuiniamu jiinki Wáitin Wáinia Nú nuwajai chichas Pítrun Awayámiayi . Nui nékanu asa Yúpichuch Awayámiayi .

text: Then saith the damsel that kept the door unto Peter , Art not thou also one of this man ' s disciples ? He saith , I am not .
text2: Waiti Wáinniusha Pítrun aniasmiayi " ṡAmesha nuna unuiniamurinchukaitiam ? " Pítrusha " Atsá , Núchaitjai " Tímiayi .

text: And the servants and officers stood there , who had made a fire of coals ; for it was cold : and they warmed themselves : and Peter stood with them , and warmed himself .
text2: Tsetsek asamtai suntarsha tura nui takarniusha jinia Ikiapárar ni nawen anaak pujuarmiayi . Pítrusha nui pachiiniak anamuk pujumiayi .

text: The high priest then asked Jesus of his disciples , and of his doctrine .
text2: Israer - patri uuntri Jesusan aniasmiayi " Ame unuiniamurmesha ṡya ainia . Tura Warí niin jintintiaitiam ? "

text: Jesus answered him , I spake openly to the world ; I ever taught in the synagogue , and in the temple , whither the Jews always resort ; and in secret have I said nothing .
text2: Jesussha Tímiayi " Ashí iimiainiain tuke etserniuitjai . Israer - shuar iruntainmasha Yusa Uunt Jeencha Israer - shuar irunainia nui arantutsuk tuke etserkaitjai .

text: Why askest thou me ? ask them which heard me , what I have said unto them : behold , they know what I said .
text2: ṡUrukamtai Winia inintiam ? Winia chichamprun antukua nu aniastarum . Wi timian nii ujatmakarti . Wi timiancha niisha nékainiatsuk . "

text: And when he had thus spoken , one of the officers which stood by struck Jesus with the palm of his hand , saying , Answerest thou the high priest so ?
text2: Jesus nuna takui Yusa Jeen Wáiniua nu nui Pujá Jesusan yapiniam awati Tímiayi " ṡNúnisan nekas uuntnum chichastinkait ? "

text: Jesus answered him , If I have spoken evil , bear witness of the evil : but if well , why smitest thou me ?
text2: Jesussha Tímiayi " ṡWarinmampa yajauch aa ? Turuttia . Tura Tájana nu pénkeraitkiuinkia ṡurukamtai awattiniam ? "

text: Now Annas had sent him bound unto Caiaphas the high priest .
text2: Nuyá Anas Jesusan Jinkiá Kaipias takaamunam akupkamiayi Kaipias Patri uuntri asamtai .

text: And Simon Peter stood and warmed himself . They said therefore unto him , Art not thou also one of his disciples ? He denied it , and said , I am not .
text2: Tuke Anasa jeen chichainiai Pítiur jinia anamuk Puján shuar aniak " ṡAmesha Jesusa unuiniamurinchukaitiam ? " tiarmiayi . Pítrusha " Atsá , Wíchaitjai " Tímiayi .

text: One of the servants of the high priest , being his kinsman whose ear Peter cut off , saith , Did not I see thee in the garden with him ?
text2: Chíkich takarin , Marku shuari , nui pujumiayi . Pítiur Marku Kuíshin tsupirkamia nuna shuari asa Tímiayi " ṡAjanam Jesusjai wekaamin Wáinkiachmakajam ? "

text: Peter then denied again : and immediately the cock crew .
text2: Pítrusha ataksha " Atsá " tain atash shiniukmiayi .

text: Then led they Jesus from Caiaphas unto the hall of judgment : and it was early ; and they themselves went not into the judgment hall , lest they should be defiled ; but that they might eat the passover .
text2: Nuyá Kaipiasaiya Jesusan Júkiar tsawant tsawaamunam apach Kapitián Piratu takatai jeanam ejeniarmiayi . Israer - shuarsha ni uuntri akupkamia nunisar wapik ajasaij tusar nu jeanam wayacharmiayi . Wayawarka paskua nampernum Yurumáchmin ármiayi .

text: Pilate then went out unto them , and said , What accusation bring ye against this man ?
text2: Nu asamtai Piratu niijiai chichastaj tusa Jíinki Tímiayi " ṡJú aishmansha Warí Tunáa Túrait ? "

text: They answered and said unto him , If he were not a malefactor , we would not have delivered him up unto thee .
text2: Niisha " Tunaarinchaitkiuinkia amiini itiachaaji " tiarmiayi .

text: Then said Pilate unto them , Take ye him , and judge him according to your law . The Jews therefore said unto him , It is not lawful for us to put any man to death :
text2: Tutai Piratu Tímiayi " Atumek Júkirum Atumí akuptammarijiai ni tunaari nekaatarum . " Israer - shuarsha tiarmiayi " Antsu iikia Israer - shuartikia Tunáa shuarsha Máachminiaitji . "

text: That the saying of Jesus might be fulfilled , which he spake , signifying what death he should die .
text2: Yaunchu Jesus ni Jákatniurin Enentáimtus " Wi awajnaitniuitjai " Tímiayi . Niisha Krúsnum awajnain asamtai apach Máataijiai Nii timia nu uminkiammiayi .

text: Then Pilate entered into the judgment hall again , and called Jesus , and said unto him , Art thou the King of the Jews ?
text2: Piratusha atak Jeá Wayá Jesusan untsuk " ṡAmeka Israera Uunt Akupniurinkaitiam ? " Tímiayi .

text: Jesus answered him , Sayest thou this thing of thyself , or did others tell it thee of me ?
text2: Jesussha Tímiayi " ṡAmekek nu inintram . Kame Chíkich Túramainiatsuash ? "

text: Pilate answered , Am I a Jew ? Thine own nation and the chief priests have delivered thee unto me : what hast thou done ?
text2: Piratusha Tímiayi " ṡWi Israer - shuarkaitiaj ? Amee shuarak Israer - patri uuntrijiai winin itiarmarai . ṡWarí Tunáa Túraitiam ? "

text: Jesus answered , My kingdom is not of this world : if my kingdom were of this world , then would my servants fight , that I should not be delivered to the Jews : but now is my kingdom not from hence .
text2: Nuinkia Jesus Tímiayi " Wi Jú nunkanam akupniuchuitjai . Juyaitkiuinkia Winia nemartuiniana nu Máanaikiaraayi . Túrawarmatai Israer - shuarnum surutkacharaayi . Antsu juyan akupniuchuitjai . "

text: Pilate therefore said unto him , Art thou a king then ? Jesus answered , Thou sayest that I am a king . To this end was I born , and for this cause came I into the world , that I should bear witness unto the truth . Every one that is of the truth heareth my voice .
text2: Piratusha " ṡNuikia ame nekas uunt akupniukaitiam ? " Tímiayi . Jesussha Tímiayi " Ee , ame Támena nu nekasaiti . Jú nunkanam akiinian Ashí shuaran nekas ana nuna ujaktinian Táwitjai . Ashí shuar nekas ana nuna umirniuka Wi Táman ántawai . "

text: Pilate saith unto him , What is truth ? And when he had said this , he went out again unto the Jews , and saith unto them , I find in him no fault at all .
text2: Tura Piratu " ṡNekasa nusha warimpiait ? " Tímiayi . Piratusha nuna ti , atak Israer - shuarjai chichastajtsa jiinki Tímiayi " Jú aishmanka tunaarin penké Wáittsujai .

text: But ye have a custom , that I should release unto you one at the passover : will ye therefore that I release unto you the King of the Jews ?
text2: Tura Ashí uwitin paskua nampernum sepunmaya shuar ankant akupkatniuiti . Núnisrum tuke searme . Tuma asamtai , ṡyamaikia Israera Uunt Akupniurin ankant akupkattajak ? " Tímiayi .

text: Then cried they all again , saying , Not this man , but Barabbas . Now Barabbas was a robber .
text2: Nuinkia Ashí kakantar untsumainiak " Ju akupkaip ; antsu Parapás Akupkatá " tiarmiayi . Nu Parapássha Kásauyayi .

text: Then Pilate therefore took Jesus , and scourged him .
text2: Nuyá Piratu suntaran akupkamiayi Jesusan Asutiáwarat tusa .

text: And the soldiers platted a crown of thorns , and put it on his head , and they put on him a purple robe ,
text2: Suntarsha Jesusan wishikrar tawasap janki najanamun etsenkrumtikiarmiayi . Yamakai pushincha uunt akupniua aintsan aentsrarmiayi .

text: And said , Hail , King of the Jews ! and they smote him with their hands .
text2: Nuyá " Israera Uuntria , kakaram ajasta " tiar yapiniam awatiarmiayi .

text: Pilate therefore went forth again , and saith unto them , Behold , I bring him forth to you , that ye may know that I find no fault in him .
text2: Nuyá Piratu atak jiinki Tímiayi " Atum Wáinkiarum nekaatarum tusan Jesusan Jíiktiatjai . Wikia tunaarinkia penké Wáittsujai . "

text: Then came Jesus forth , wearing the crown of thorns , and the purple robe . And Pilate saith unto them , Behold the man !
text2: Tímiatai Jesussha jankin etsenkruku tura pushin yamakairman entsaru Jíinkimiayi . Tura Piratu nui Káunkarun tiarmiayi " Pai juiti , iistarum . "

text: When the chief priests therefore and officers saw him , they cried out , saying , Crucify him , crucify him . Pilate saith unto them , Take ye him , and crucify him : for I find no fault in him .
text2: Israer - patri uuntrisha suntarsha Jesusan iisar ataksha ataksha kakantar untsumainiak " Krúsnum jakati " tiarmiayi . Piratusha " Atum Júkiirum Máatarum . Ni tunaarin penké Wáittsujai " Tímiayi .

text: The Jews answered him , We have a law , and by our law he ought to die , because he made himself the Son of God .
text2: Tura Israer - shuar tiarmiayi " Nu shuar " Yusa Uchiríntjai " takui Jákatniuiti . Iiniu akupeamu aarma nui Núniskete " tiarmiayi .

text: When Pilate therefore heard that saying , he was the more afraid ;
text2: Nuna antuk Piratusha nu nankaamas ashamkamiayi .

text: And went again into the judgment hall , and saith unto Jesus , Whence art thou ? But Jesus gave him no answer .
text2: Ataksha init Wayá Jesusan aniasmiayi " ṡTuyampaitiam ? " Tura Jesussha penké áikchamiayi .

text: Then saith Pilate unto him , Speakest thou not unto me ? knowest thou not that I have power to crucify thee , and have power to release thee ?
text2: Nuyá Piratu Tímiayi " ṡUrukamtia winia airtsum . Wi jeajna nu nékatsmek ? Wakeraknaka Krúsnum Máatniuncha tura ankant akupkatniuncha jeajai . "

text: Jesus answered , Thou couldest have no power at all against me , except it were given thee from above : therefore he that delivered me unto thee hath the greater sin .
text2: Tutai Jesussha Tímiayi " Yus nuna amaschaitkiuinkia penké tujinkiaintme . Nu asamtai amiin surutka nu ámin nankaamas tunaarinniuiti . "

text: And from thenceforth Pilate sought to release him : but the Jews cried out , saying , If thou let this man go , thou art not Caesar ' s friend : whosoever maketh himself a king speaketh against Caesar .
text2: Piratusha Nú chichamtaik Jesusan ankant akupkattsa wakerimiayi . Antsu Israer - shuar untsumainiak tiarmiayi " Ju ankant Iníakmeka ame uunt akupniu amikrinchuitme . Juka " úunt akupniuitjai " taku Atumí uunt Akupníuri nemasrinti " tu untsumkarmiayi .

text: When Pilate therefore heard that saying , he brought Jesus forth , and sat down in the judgment seat in a place that is called the Pavement , but in the Hebrew , Gabbatha .
text2: Piratusha taman antuk akupin pujutainium pujus Jesusan untsukmiayi . Nui kaya ukatkamu asamtai Israer - shuara chichamen Kapata anaikiarmiayi .

text: And it was the preparation of the passover , and about the sixth hour : and he saith unto the Jews , Behold your King !
text2: Paskua jisat jeatsain nantu tutupin ajatsain Piratu Israer - shuaran Tímiayi " Uunt akupniuram iistarum . "

text: But they cried out , Away with him , away with him , crucify him . Pilate saith unto them , Shall I crucify your King ? The chief priest answered , We have no king but Caesar .
text2: Tura Ashí " Jakati , jakati , Krúsnum Máatá " tu untsumkarmiayi . Tura Piratu " ṡAtumí uunt akupniurin Krúsnum Máattajak ? " Tímiayi . Tura Israer - patri uuntri tiarmiayi " Atumí uunt Kapitiántrumek iin akuptamji . Chíkichka atsawai . "

text: Then delivered he him therefore unto them to be crucified . And they took Jesus , and led him away .
text2: Tutai Piratu Jesusan krusnum mantamnati tusa tsankatkarmiayi . Tutai niisha Jesusan Júkiar wearmiayi .

text: And he bearing his cross went forth into a place called the place of a skull , which is called in the Hebrew Golgotha :
text2: Jesussha ni krusri yanaki Kúrkuta Náinnium wémiayi . Kúrkuta naarisha Israer - shuara chichamen " muuka ukunch " tawai .

text: Where they crucified him , and two other with him , on either side one , and Jesus in the midst .
text2: Nui Krúsnum ajintrurar awajainiarmiayi . Tura mai pae Jimiará shuaran chikichik chikichik awajainiarmiayi . Tura Jesus ajapén ámiayi .

text: And Pilate wrote a title , and put it on the cross . And the writing was , JESUS OF NAZARETH THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Piratusha Jesusa Krúsrin uunt aarman anujkamiayi . NASARETNUMIA JESUS , ISRAERA UUNT AKUPNIURI Tu aarmauyayi .

text: This title then read many of the Jews : for the place where Jesus was crucified was nigh to the city : and it was written in Hebrew , and Greek , and Latin .
text2: Israer chichamjaisha Kriaku chichamjaisha Rúmanmaya chichamjaisha aarmauyayi . Menaintiu chichamnum aarma asamtai tura Jesusarén pepru Tíjiuch asamtai Israer - shuar ti Untsurí áujiarmiayi .

text: Then said the chief priests of the Jews to Pilate , Write not , The King of the Jews ; but that he said , I am King of the Jews .
text2: Nu asamtai Israer - patri uuntri Piratun jeariar " Israera Uunt Akupniuri " aaraip . Antsu " Israera Uunt Akupniurintjai tawai " tu aarta " tiarmiayi .

text: Pilate answered , What I have written I have written .
text2: Tura Piratu nincha áikiar " Wi aaraj nuke átatui " Tímiayi .

text: Then the soldiers , when they had crucified Jesus , took his garments , and made four parts , to every soldier a part ; and also his coat : now the coat was without seam , woven from the top throughout .
text2: Suntarsha Jesusan Krúsnum awajainiar ni entsarmarin Kuátru akankar ankant ankant Júkiarmiayi . Tura ni pushirin apatsuk najanamu asamtai Jáaktinian nakitrarmiayi . Kame Yakíya nunkaani apaiyiachma takamtsukuyi .
