Tura Yusa Uunt Jeen wainniu uuntrisha Satuséu aentcha Táarmiayi . Taar Pitruncha Juánnasha kajerkarmiayi , niisha Jesusa nantakmiari chichaman jintintinia asamtai .

text: Who seeing Peter and John about to go into the temple asked an alms .
text2: Tura Nú shutuapsha Pitrun Juanjai wayan Wáinkiamiayi . Wáiniak Kuítian seamiayi .
column6: Who seeing Peter and John about to go into the temple asked an alms .
column8: Yamaikia Kíawai , kashin Iismí tusar achik sepunam enkea iniaisarmiayi .

text: Who seeing Peter and John about to go into the temple asked an alms .
text2: Tura Nú shutuapsha Pitrun Juanjai wayan Wáinkiamiayi . Wáiniak Kuítian seamiayi .
column6: Who seeing Peter and John about to go into the temple asked an alms .
column8: Yamaikia Kíawai , kashin Iismí tusar achik sepunam enkea iniaisarmiayi .

text: And Peter , fastening his eyes upon him with John , said , Look on us .
text2: Tura Pítiur Juanjai apajas iisarmiayi . Tura Nú aishmannasha chicharuk " Iirsata " Tímiayi .
column6: And Peter , fastening his eyes upon him with John , said , Look on us .
column8: Tura Pitrun nuik anturkarmia Nú aents Untsurí Yus - shuar ajasarmiayi . Nuik Yus - shuaraim tura yamaiyaim iruram ti Untsurí ajasarmiayi . Aya aishmankak , senku mir ( 5000 ) aents ármiayi .

text: And Peter , fastening his eyes upon him with John , said , Look on us .
text2: Tura Pítiur Juanjai apajas iisarmiayi . Tura Nú aishmannasha chicharuk " Iirsata " Tímiayi .
column6: And Peter , fastening his eyes upon him with John , said , Look on us .
column8: Tura Pitrun nuik anturkarmia Nú aents Untsurí Yus - shuar ajasarmiayi . Nuik Yus - shuaraim tura yamaiyaim iruram ti Untsurí ajasarmiayi . Aya aishmankak , senku mir ( 5000 ) aents ármiayi .

text: And he gave heed unto them , expecting to receive something of them .
text2: Aishmansha , surustatuapi , tu Enentáimias , iimsamiayi .
column6: And he gave heed unto them , expecting to receive something of them .
column8: Kashin tsawarmatai Israer - shuara akupniuri , ni uuntrisha , tura ni jintinniurisha Jerusarénnum iruntrarmiayi .

text: And he gave heed unto them , expecting to receive something of them .
text2: Aishmansha , surustatuapi , tu Enentáimias , iimsamiayi .
column6: And he gave heed unto them , expecting to receive something of them .
column8: Kashin tsawarmatai Israer - shuara akupniuri , ni uuntrisha , tura ni jintinniurisha Jerusarénnum iruntrarmiayi .

text: Then Peter said , Silver and gold have I none ; but such as I have give I thee : In the name of Jesus Christ of Nazareth rise up and walk .
text2: Nuyá Pítiur chichaak " Kuítrusha atsawai , Tímiayi . Kurisha atsawai . Antsu Kuítjai nankaamas takakjana nuna amastajai . Wats , Nasarétnumia Jesukrístu kakarmarijiai wajakim wekasata " Tímiayi .
column6: Then Peter said , Silver and gold have I none ; but such as I have give I thee : In the name of Jesus Christ of Nazareth rise up and walk .
column8: Nuisha Anassha , Israer - patri uuntri anaikiamu amia nu , tura Kaipiassha , Juansha , Arejantrusha , tura Israer - patri Kapitiántri shuarisha Tímian iruntrarmiayi .

text: Then Peter said , Silver and gold have I none ; but such as I have give I thee : In the name of Jesus Christ of Nazareth rise up and walk .
text2: Nuyá Pítiur chichaak " Kuítrusha atsawai , Tímiayi . Kurisha atsawai . Antsu Kuítjai nankaamas takakjana nuna amastajai . Wats , Nasarétnumia Jesukrístu kakarmarijiai wajakim wekasata " Tímiayi .
column6: Then Peter said , Silver and gold have I none ; but such as I have give I thee : In the name of Jesus Christ of Nazareth rise up and walk .
column8: Nuisha Anassha , Israer - patri uuntri anaikiamu amia nu , tura Kaipiassha , Juansha , Arejantrusha , tura Israer - patri Kapitiántri shuarisha Tímian iruntrarmiayi .

text: And he took him by the right hand , and lifted him up : and immediately his feet and ancle bones received strength .
text2: Tinia iniais , Pítiur ni untsuurini achik awajkimiayi . Túram ni nawesha , wanusesha kakaram ajasmiayi .
column6: And he took him by the right hand , and lifted him up : and immediately his feet and ancle bones received strength .
column8: Iruntrar Pitruncha Juánnasha utitiarum tusar akupkarmiayi . Tura itiarmatai , ajapén awajsarmiayi . Tura aniasarmiayi " Kame ṡyana kakarmarijiai , yana chichamejai Túrarum ? " tiarmiayi .

text: And he took him by the right hand , and lifted him up : and immediately his feet and ancle bones received strength .
text2: Tinia iniais , Pítiur ni untsuurini achik awajkimiayi . Túram ni nawesha , wanusesha kakaram ajasmiayi .
column6: And he took him by the right hand , and lifted him up : and immediately his feet and ancle bones received strength .
column8: Iruntrar Pitruncha Juánnasha utitiarum tusar akupkarmiayi . Tura itiarmatai , ajapén awajsarmiayi . Tura aniasarmiayi " Kame ṡyana kakarmarijiai , yana chichamejai Túrarum ? " tiarmiayi .

text: And he leaping up stood , and walked , and entered with them into the temple , walking , and leaping , and praising God .
text2: Tura niisha wajaki nantent ajakmiayi . Nuyasha wekasamiayi . Tura Pítrujaisha Juánjaisha Yusa Uunt Jeen wayawarmiayi . Nuik shutuapka Wayá nantent nantent ajak Yusa Náarin shiir pachimiayi .
column6: And he leaping up stood , and walked , and entered with them into the temple , walking , and leaping , and praising God .
column8: Tutai Nuyá Pítiur , ni Enentáin Yusa Wakaní pimiutkamu asa Tímiayi " Akupniutiram , tura uuntirmesha antuktarum .

text: And he leaping up stood , and walked , and entered with them into the temple , walking , and leaping , and praising God .
text2: Tura niisha wajaki nantent ajakmiayi . Nuyasha wekasamiayi . Tura Pítrujaisha Juánjaisha Yusa Uunt Jeen wayawarmiayi . Nuik shutuapka Wayá nantent nantent ajak Yusa Náarin shiir pachimiayi .
column6: And he leaping up stood , and walked , and entered with them into the temple , walking , and leaping , and praising God .
column8: Tutai Nuyá Pítiur , ni Enentáin Yusa Wakaní pimiutkamu asa Tímiayi " Akupniutiram , tura uuntirmesha antuktarum .

text: And all the people saw him walking and praising God :
text2: Ashí aents pujuarmia nu , niin wekaan Wáinkiarmiayi . Tura ni chichamen anturkarmiayi .
column6: And all the people saw him walking and praising God :
column8: Ju aishman nuik shutuap amia nu pénker ajasmari anintrarme . Kame itiurak pénker ajasuit Tátsurmek .

text: And all the people saw him walking and praising God :
text2: Ashí aents pujuarmia nu , niin wekaan Wáinkiarmiayi . Tura ni chichamen anturkarmiayi .
column6: And all the people saw him walking and praising God :
column8: Ju aishman nuik shutuap amia nu pénker ajasmari anintrarme . Kame itiurak pénker ajasuit Tátsurmek .

text: And they knew that it was he which sat for alms at the Beautiful gate of the temple : and they were filled with wonder and amazement at that which had happened unto him .
text2: Tura chichainiak " Nuik Yusa Uunt Jeen Wáitirin , Shiir Waiti tutainium , nu aishman tuke pujuuya Núchakait " tiarmiayi . Tura ni Túrunamurin nekaawar , ti ashamkar Nusháa Enentáimsarmiayi .
column6: And they knew that it was he which sat for alms at the Beautiful gate of the temple : and they were filled with wonder and amazement at that which had happened unto him .
column8: Urukamtia úuktataj . Anintrakrumin iisha paant Títiatji , Israernumia shuar Ashí nekaawarat tusar . Ju aishman Jesukrístu kakarmarijiai pénker ajasuiti . Nasarétnumia Jesukrístun , átum Máamurmena nuna , tura Yus jakamunmaya iniantkimiania nuna tajai , Tímiayi .

text: And they knew that it was he which sat for alms at the Beautiful gate of the temple : and they were filled with wonder and amazement at that which had happened unto him .
text2: Tura chichainiak " Nuik Yusa Uunt Jeen Wáitirin , Shiir Waiti tutainium , nu aishman tuke pujuuya Núchakait " tiarmiayi . Tura ni Túrunamurin nekaawar , ti ashamkar Nusháa Enentáimsarmiayi .
column6: And they knew that it was he which sat for alms at the Beautiful gate of the temple : and they were filled with wonder and amazement at that which had happened unto him .
column8: Urukamtia úuktataj . Anintrakrumin iisha paant Títiatji , Israernumia shuar Ashí nekaawarat tusar . Ju aishman Jesukrístu kakarmarijiai pénker ajasuiti . Nasarétnumia Jesukrístun , átum Máamurmena nuna , tura Yus jakamunmaya iniantkimiania nuna tajai , Tímiayi .

text: And as the lame man which was healed held Peter and John , all the people ran together unto them in the porch that is called Solomon ' s , greatly wondering .
text2: Shutuapka pénker ajasu asa Pítrujai Juánjaisha penké tsurachmiayi . Tura aents nui pujuarmia nu , warinkit tusar , Jeáshkiri tsékenki wearmiayi . Nuka Sarumúnna tiniu ármiayi .
column6: And as the lame man which was healed held Peter and John , all the people ran together unto them in the porch that is called Solomon ' s , greatly wondering .
column8: Nú Jesuska kayaa aintsankete . Atumsha jeamniutiram , Nú kaya yajauchiiti , Tímiarme Jesusna . Túrasha Túramaitiatan Niisha jeanam emka apujsamua Núnisan ajasuiti , Tímiayi .

text: And as the lame man which was healed held Peter and John , all the people ran together unto them in the porch that is called Solomon ' s , greatly wondering .
text2: Shutuapka pénker ajasu asa Pítrujai Juánjaisha penké tsurachmiayi . Tura aents nui pujuarmia nu , warinkit tusar , Jeáshkiri tsékenki wearmiayi . Nuka Sarumúnna tiniu ármiayi .
column6: And as the lame man which was healed held Peter and John , all the people ran together unto them in the porch that is called Solomon ' s , greatly wondering .
column8: Nú Jesuska kayaa aintsankete . Atumsha jeamniutiram , Nú kaya yajauchiiti , Tímiarme Jesusna . Túrasha Túramaitiatan Niisha jeanam emka apujsamua Núnisan ajasuiti , Tímiayi .

text: And when Peter saw it , he answered unto the people , Ye men of Israel , why marvel ye at this ? or why look ye so earnestly on us , as though by our own power or holiness we had made this man to walk ?
text2: Aents Káunkarun Pítiur Wáiniak , chicharuk " Israer - shuartiram , ṡurukamtai winiasha Imiá iirum ? tiarmiayi . ṡIisha pénker asarik ~ i tsuarmaj ~ i ? ṡIi kakarmarijiainkik ~ i ewekamsamaj ~ i ?
column6: And when Peter saw it , he answered unto the people , Ye men of Israel , why marvel ye at this ? or why look ye so earnestly on us , as though by our own power or holiness we had made this man to walk ?
column8: Tura Chíkichjai uwempratin penké atsawai . Ju nunkanam ii chikicha naari pachisar uwempratin atsaji . Jesuskete ii uwemtikrampratniun Yus suramsamiaj nu " Tímiayi Pítiur .

text: And when Peter saw it , he answered unto the people , Ye men of Israel , why marvel ye at this ? or why look ye so earnestly on us , as though by our own power or holiness we had made this man to walk ?
text2: Aents Káunkarun Pítiur Wáiniak , chicharuk " Israer - shuartiram , ṡurukamtai winiasha Imiá iirum ? tiarmiayi . ṡIisha pénker asarik ~ i tsuarmaj ~ i ? ṡIi kakarmarijiainkik ~ i ewekamsamaj ~ i ?
column6: And when Peter saw it , he answered unto the people , Ye men of Israel , why marvel ye at this ? or why look ye so earnestly on us , as though by our own power or holiness we had made this man to walk ?
column8: Tura Chíkichjai uwempratin penké atsawai . Ju nunkanam ii chikicha naari pachisar uwempratin atsaji . Jesuskete ii uwemtikrampratniun Yus suramsamiaj nu " Tímiayi Pítiur .

text: The God of Abraham , and of Isaac , and of Jacob , the God of our fathers , hath glorified his Son Jesus ; whom ye delivered up , and denied him in the presence of Pilate , when he was determined to let him go .
text2: Atsá . Antsu Yuska ni Uchirin Jesusan Ashí nankaamantu awajsaiti . Ii uuntri Apraamsha , Isaksha tura Jakupsha Enentáimtin armia Nú Yusan tajai . Atumka Jesus nakitrarum Kapitián Piratuí surukmarme . Tura Piratu akupkataj tau atumsha suritkiamarme .
column6: The God of Abraham , and of Isaac , and of Jacob , the God of our fathers , hath glorified his Son Jesus ; whom ye delivered up , and denied him in the presence of Pilate , when he was determined to let him go .
column8: Pítrusha Juansha Nánkamas shuara aintsan ármiayi . Núkap unuimiarcharu ármiayi . Tura unuimiarchaitiat , arantutsuk etseriarmiayi . Aentsu uuntri Núnaka nekaawar " Nékachuitiat , itiura sapijmiatskesha chichainia " tiarmiayi . Tura , jusha Jesusa nemarin ármia Núiti tiar nekaawarmiayi .

text: The God of Abraham , and of Isaac , and of Jacob , the God of our fathers , hath glorified his Son Jesus ; whom ye delivered up , and denied him in the presence of Pilate , when he was determined to let him go .
text2: Atsá . Antsu Yuska ni Uchirin Jesusan Ashí nankaamantu awajsaiti . Ii uuntri Apraamsha , Isaksha tura Jakupsha Enentáimtin armia Nú Yusan tajai . Atumka Jesus nakitrarum Kapitián Piratuí surukmarme . Tura Piratu akupkataj tau atumsha suritkiamarme .
column6: The God of Abraham , and of Isaac , and of Jacob , the God of our fathers , hath glorified his Son Jesus ; whom ye delivered up , and denied him in the presence of Pilate , when he was determined to let him go .
column8: Pítrusha Juansha Nánkamas shuara aintsan ármiayi . Núkap unuimiarcharu ármiayi . Tura unuimiarchaitiat , arantutsuk etseriarmiayi . Aentsu uuntri Núnaka nekaawar " Nékachuitiat , itiura sapijmiatskesha chichainia " tiarmiayi . Tura , jusha Jesusa nemarin ármia Núiti tiar nekaawarmiayi .

text: But ye denied the Holy One and the Just , and desired a murderer to be granted unto you ;
text2: Jesus pénker Nákak Enentáimniuyana nu " akupnakchati " Tímiarme . Antsu Shuáran main akupnakat tusarum wakerimiarme .
column6: But ye denied the Holy One and the Just , and desired a murderer to be granted unto you ;
column8: Nuyasha aishman pénker ajasmia nu niijiai nui wajamiayi . Tuma asamtai , niisha ai wajakui , Israer - shuara uuntrinkia , pénker ajaschaiti Títiai Tukamá tujinkiarmiayi .

text: But ye denied the Holy One and the Just , and desired a murderer to be granted unto you ;
text2: Jesus pénker Nákak Enentáimniuyana nu " akupnakchati " Tímiarme . Antsu Shuáran main akupnakat tusarum wakerimiarme .
column6: But ye denied the Holy One and the Just , and desired a murderer to be granted unto you ;
column8: Nuyasha aishman pénker ajasmia nu niijiai nui wajamiayi . Tuma asamtai , niisha ai wajakui , Israer - shuara uuntrinkia , pénker ajaschaiti Títiai Tukamá tujinkiarmiayi .

text: And killed the Prince of life , whom God hath raised from the dead ; whereof we are witnesses .
text2: Túrarum iwiaaku átinian Amaana nu maamarme . Tuma ain Yuska Niin jakamunmaya iniantkimiayi . Nuka iisha neka asar étsereaji .
column6: And killed the Prince of life , whom God hath raised from the dead ; whereof we are witnesses .
column8: Tuma ásar , iik nuamtak áujmatsatai tusar , Pítrusha Juansha shutuapsha aa awemartai , tiarmiayi .

text: And killed the Prince of life , whom God hath raised from the dead ; whereof we are witnesses .
text2: Túrarum iwiaaku átinian Amaana nu maamarme . Tuma ain Yuska Niin jakamunmaya iniantkimiayi . Nuka iisha neka asar étsereaji .
column6: And killed the Prince of life , whom God hath raised from the dead ; whereof we are witnesses .
column8: Tuma ásar , iik nuamtak áujmatsatai tusar , Pítrusha Juansha shutuapsha aa awemartai , tiarmiayi .

text: And his name through faith in his name hath made this man strong , whom ye see and know : yea , the faith which is by him hath given him this perfect soundness in the presence of you all .
text2: Tura ju aishman jui wajaana ju tura nékarmena ju , Yusa Uchiri naari Enentáimta asa kakaram ajasuiti . Jesus Enentáimtusu asa nekas pénker ajasuiti . Nusha Wáinniu asarum nékarme ' Tímiayi .
column6: And his name through faith in his name hath made this man strong , whom ye see and know : yea , the faith which is by him hath given him this perfect soundness in the presence of you all .
column8: Tura áujmatainiak tiarmiayi " Ju Pítrusha ju Juansha itiurkatjik . Ju uunt Túrunamun Jerusarénnum matsatainia nu Ashí nékainiatsuk . Wáitiaiti titin tujintiaji , tiarmiayi .

text: And his name through faith in his name hath made this man strong , whom ye see and know : yea , the faith which is by him hath given him this perfect soundness in the presence of you all .
text2: Tura ju aishman jui wajaana ju tura nékarmena ju , Yusa Uchiri naari Enentáimta asa kakaram ajasuiti . Jesus Enentáimtusu asa nekas pénker ajasuiti . Nusha Wáinniu asarum nékarme ' Tímiayi .
column6: And his name through faith in his name hath made this man strong , whom ye see and know : yea , the faith which is by him hath given him this perfect soundness in the presence of you all .
column8: Tura áujmatainiak tiarmiayi " Ju Pítrusha ju Juansha itiurkatjik . Ju uunt Túrunamun Jerusarénnum matsatainia nu Ashí nékainiatsuk . Wáitiaiti titin tujintiaji , tiarmiayi .

text: And now , brethren , I wot that through ignorance ye did it , as did also your rulers .
text2: ` Wats , yatsurtiram , wi nékajai . Atumsha Atumí uuntrijiai Jesusan Túramarmena nu nékatsuk Túramarme .
column6: And now , brethren , I wot that through ignorance ye did it , as did also your rulers .
column8: Tura , Ashí aents nekaawarain tusar yamaik jiaktai . " Ju Jesusa naari pachisrum penké jintintiawarairap , " titiai " tiarmiayi .

text: And now , brethren , I wot that through ignorance ye did it , as did also your rulers .
text2: ` Wats , yatsurtiram , wi nékajai . Atumsha Atumí uuntrijiai Jesusan Túramarmena nu nékatsuk Túramarme .
column6: And now , brethren , I wot that through ignorance ye did it , as did also your rulers .
column8: Tura , Ashí aents nekaawarain tusar yamaik jiaktai . " Ju Jesusa naari pachisrum penké jintintiawarairap , " titiai " tiarmiayi .

text: But those things , which God before had shewed by the mouth of all his prophets , that Christ should suffer , he hath so fulfilled .
text2: Tura nu Túramurmijiai Yus yaunchu Tímia nu Tímianak umikiurme . Ni Krísturi Wáitsatniuya nuna Yuska Ashí ni etserniurin aamtikramiayi .
column6: But those things , which God before had shewed by the mouth of all his prophets , that Christ should suffer , he hath so fulfilled .
column8: Tura árusan Pitruncha Juánnasha shutuapnasha ataksha untsukarmiayi . Tura chicharkarmiayi . " Jesusa naari penké áujmatsairap . Tura Jesusa Túramuri penké jintintiairap " tiarmiayi .

text: But those things , which God before had shewed by the mouth of all his prophets , that Christ should suffer , he hath so fulfilled .
text2: Tura nu Túramurmijiai Yus yaunchu Tímia nu Tímianak umikiurme . Ni Krísturi Wáitsatniuya nuna Yuska Ashí ni etserniurin aamtikramiayi .
column6: But those things , which God before had shewed by the mouth of all his prophets , that Christ should suffer , he hath so fulfilled .
column8: Tura árusan Pitruncha Juánnasha shutuapnasha ataksha untsukarmiayi . Tura chicharkarmiayi . " Jesusa naari penké áujmatsairap . Tura Jesusa Túramuri penké jintintiairap " tiarmiayi .

text: Repent ye therefore , and be converted , that your sins may be blotted out , when the times of refreshing shall come from the presence of the Lord ;
text2: Tutai Pítiur Juanjai aimkiarmiayi " Enentáimpratarum . ṡYus warinia wakera ? ṡIikia Yus umirtsuk Atumí chichamen umirkatniukaitiaj ~ i ? tiarmiayi .

text: And he shall send Jesus Christ , which before was preached unto you :
text2: Wats , yamaikia tunaaruminia kanaktiarum . Túrarum Yúsnumaani Ayantártarum , tunaarun Asakárat tusarum . Túrunawakrumninkia , atumin uwemtikramprarat tusa Yus yaunchu anaikiamia nuna akupturmaktatrume . Nusha Jesukristuiti . Tura Niijiai Enentáimin ayampratin átatui .
column6: And he shall send Jesus Christ , which before was preached unto you :
column8: Nekaatarum . Iisha iisjinia nu , tura antukjinia nusha ii etsertsuk pujustin tujintiaji . " Tu aimkiarmiayi .

text: And he shall send Jesus Christ , which before was preached unto you :
text2: Wats , yamaikia tunaaruminia kanaktiarum . Túrarum Yúsnumaani Ayantártarum , tunaarun Asakárat tusarum . Túrunawakrumninkia , atumin uwemtikramprarat tusa Yus yaunchu anaikiamia nuna akupturmaktatrume . Nusha Jesukristuiti . Tura Niijiai Enentáimin ayampratin átatui .
column6: And he shall send Jesus Christ , which before was preached unto you :
column8: Nekaatarum . Iisha iisjinia nu , tura antukjinia nusha ii etsertsuk pujustin tujintiaji . " Tu aimkiarmiayi .

text: Whom the heaven must receive until the times of restitution of all things , which God hath spoken by the mouth of all his holy prophets since the world began .
text2: Tura yamaikia Jesukrístu nayaimpiniam pujustiniaiti , Ashí iwiarnatsain . Yuska ukunam ataksha nunkan shiir awajsattawai . Nuna ni etserniurin Tsáapin Enentái takaku armia nuna yaunchu aamtikramiayi .

text: For Moses truly said unto the fathers , A prophet shall the Lord your God raise up unto you of your brethren , like unto me ; him shall ye hear in all things whatsoever he shall say unto you .
text2: Tuma asa Muisais ii aparin Tímiayi : " Atumi Uunt Yusri ukunam etserniun akupturmaktatrume , winia akuptukmia Núnisan . Nuámtaktirminia achik akupturmaktatrume . Tura nii Títiatna nu umirkatarum " Tímiayi .
column6: For Moses truly said unto the fathers , A prophet shall the Lord your God raise up unto you of your brethren , like unto me ; him shall ye hear in all things whatsoever he shall say unto you .
column8: Shutuáp pénker ajasmia nu kuarenta ( 40 ) Uwí nankaamas takakuyayi . Ni pénker ajasmarin aents nekaawar , " juka aentsti Túrachminiaitji " tusar Yusa naarin uunt awajsarmiayi . Tuma asamtai aentsu uuntri Pitruncha , Juannasha Asutiátai Tukamá aentsun ashamainiak áyatik chicharkar iniaisarmiayi .

text: For Moses truly said unto the fathers , A prophet shall the Lord your God raise up unto you of your brethren , like unto me ; him shall ye hear in all things whatsoever he shall say unto you .
text2: Tuma asa Muisais ii aparin Tímiayi : " Atumi Uunt Yusri ukunam etserniun akupturmaktatrume , winia akuptukmia Núnisan . Nuámtaktirminia achik akupturmaktatrume . Tura nii Títiatna nu umirkatarum " Tímiayi .
column6: For Moses truly said unto the fathers , A prophet shall the Lord your God raise up unto you of your brethren , like unto me ; him shall ye hear in all things whatsoever he shall say unto you .
column8: Shutuáp pénker ajasmia nu kuarenta ( 40 ) Uwí nankaamas takakuyayi . Ni pénker ajasmarin aents nekaawar , " juka aentsti Túrachminiaitji " tusar Yusa naarin uunt awajsarmiayi . Tuma asamtai aentsu uuntri Pitruncha , Juannasha Asutiátai Tukamá aentsun ashamainiak áyatik chicharkar iniaisarmiayi .

text: And it shall come to pass , that every soul , which will not hear that prophet , shall be destroyed from among the people .
text2: Nánkamas aents nu etserniun chichamen Umíachkunka emesnartatui . Tura Israer - shuarnum Páchitkia áchattawai . Núnisan aarmiayi Muisaissha ' Tímiayi .
column6: And it shall come to pass , that every soul , which will not hear that prophet , shall be destroyed from among the people .
column8: Pítiur Juanjai ankant ajasar ni írutramuriin waketkiarmiayi . Tura jeawar Israer - patri uuntri tura aentsu uuntrisha niin tiarmia nuna mash etserkarmiayi .

text: And it shall come to pass , that every soul , which will not hear that prophet , shall be destroyed from among the people .
text2: Nánkamas aents nu etserniun chichamen Umíachkunka emesnartatui . Tura Israer - shuarnum Páchitkia áchattawai . Núnisan aarmiayi Muisaissha ' Tímiayi .
column6: And it shall come to pass , that every soul , which will not hear that prophet , shall be destroyed from among the people .
column8: Pítiur Juanjai ankant ajasar ni írutramuriin waketkiarmiayi . Tura jeawar Israer - patri uuntri tura aentsu uuntrisha niin tiarmia nuna mash etserkarmiayi .

text: Yea , and all the prophets from Samuel and those that follow after , as many as have spoken , have likewise foretold of these days .
text2: Pítiur tuke chichaak ` Iimiata , Yúsnan etserin Samuer ju tsawantin Túratniuri etserkamiayi . Nuyá Ashí Yúsnan etserniusha tuke nuna etseriarmiayi .
column6: Yea , and all the prophets from Samuel and those that follow after , as many as have spoken , have likewise foretold of these days .
column8: Nu ujakam antukar métekrak Yúsan áujuk tiarmiayi " Winia Uunt Yusru , Amesha nayaimpisha nunkasha najanaitme . Nayaantsasha tura jui írunna nusha najanamiame , tiarmiayi .

text: Yea , and all the prophets from Samuel and those that follow after , as many as have spoken , have likewise foretold of these days .
text2: Pítiur tuke chichaak ` Iimiata , Yúsnan etserin Samuer ju tsawantin Túratniuri etserkamiayi . Nuyá Ashí Yúsnan etserniusha tuke nuna etseriarmiayi .
column6: Yea , and all the prophets from Samuel and those that follow after , as many as have spoken , have likewise foretold of these days .
column8: Nu ujakam antukar métekrak Yúsan áujuk tiarmiayi " Winia Uunt Yusru , Amesha nayaimpisha nunkasha najanaitme . Nayaantsasha tura jui írunna nusha najanamiame , tiarmiayi .

text: Ye are the children of the prophets , and of the covenant which God made with our fathers , saying unto Abraham , And in thy seed shall all the kindreds of the earth be blessed .
text2: Etseriarmia nuka atumin Túramprume . Tuma asa átum pénker pujustinian Yuska ii uuntri Apraáman ju chichaman susamiayi . " Nekas Tájame , ame shuarum akiiniattana nujai Ashí aentsnasha shiir awajsattajai ' Tímiayi . Tura ii uuntrin Tímia Núnaka incha Túramji , Tímiayi .
column6: Ye are the children of the prophets , and of the covenant which God made with our fathers , saying unto Abraham , And in thy seed shall all the kindreds of the earth be blessed .
column8: Tura Tawit ámin umirtamin amia nu ju aamtikramiame : " ṡUrukamtai Ashí nunkanmaya aents charaatum ajainia ? ṡTura Israer - shuarsha urukamtai ántar chichaman Enentáimiainia ?

text: Ye are the children of the prophets , and of the covenant which God made with our fathers , saying unto Abraham , And in thy seed shall all the kindreds of the earth be blessed .
text2: Etseriarmia nuka atumin Túramprume . Tuma asa átum pénker pujustinian Yuska ii uuntri Apraáman ju chichaman susamiayi . " Nekas Tájame , ame shuarum akiiniattana nujai Ashí aentsnasha shiir awajsattajai ' Tímiayi . Tura ii uuntrin Tímia Núnaka incha Túramji , Tímiayi .
column6: Ye are the children of the prophets , and of the covenant which God made with our fathers , saying unto Abraham , And in thy seed shall all the kindreds of the earth be blessed .
column8: Tura Tawit ámin umirtamin amia nu ju aamtikramiame : " ṡUrukamtai Ashí nunkanmaya aents charaatum ajainia ? ṡTura Israer - shuarsha urukamtai ántar chichaman Enentáimiainia ?

text: Unto you first God , having raised up his Son Jesus , sent him to bless you , in turning away every one of you from his iniquities .
text2: Iimiata , Yus ni Uchirín iniantkimia nui , atumin emka akupturmakmiarme . Atumsha , Atumí tunaariya kanaktiarum tusa , tura atumin shiir awajtamsatniun wakerak Túramiayi . " Nunak Tímiayi Pítiur .
column6: Unto you first God , having raised up his Son Jesus , sent him to bless you , in turning away every one of you from his iniquities .
column8: Uunt Kapitián ármia nuka chichaman jurusarmiayi Uunt Yúsan . Tura pepru uuntrisha iruntrar Uunt Yúsan kajerkarmiayi . Ni anaikiamurin Krístun Nútiksan kajerkarmiayi . "

text: Unto you first God , having raised up his Son Jesus , sent him to bless you , in turning away every one of you from his iniquities .
text2: Iimiata , Yus ni Uchirín iniantkimia nui , atumin emka akupturmakmiarme . Atumsha , Atumí tunaariya kanaktiarum tusa , tura atumin shiir awajtamsatniun wakerak Túramiayi . " Nunak Tímiayi Pítiur .
column6: Unto you first God , having raised up his Son Jesus , sent him to bless you , in turning away every one of you from his iniquities .
column8: Uunt Kapitián ármia nuka chichaman jurusarmiayi Uunt Yúsan . Tura pepru uuntrisha iruntrar Uunt Yúsan kajerkarmiayi . Ni anaikiamurin Krístun Nútiksan kajerkarmiayi . "

text: But a certain man named Ananias , with Sapphira his wife , sold a possession ,
text2: Tura Chíkich aishman , ni naari Ananías , ni nuwe Sapirjai ni nunken surukarmiayi .

text: And kept back part of the price , his wife also being privy to it , and brought a certain part , and laid it at the apostles ' feet .
text2: Niisha nunkan suruk Kuítian emeenak akanak Jukí Jesusa akatramurin Werí takamtsukea Nútikias susamiayi . Ni nuwesha , Sapir , nuna Túran nekaamiayi .

text: But Peter said , Ananias , why hath Satan filled thine heart to lie to the Holy Ghost , and to keep back part of the price of the land ?
text2: Túramtai Pítiur chichaak " Ananíasa , ṡurukamtai uunt iwianch Enentáimin enkemturmatai , Yusa Wakanín anankataj tusam nunka surukam kuit achikiumna nu akankam ikiurmasam ? Tímiayi .

text: Whiles it remained , was it not thine own ? and after it was sold , was it not in thine own power ? why hast thou conceived this thing in thine heart ? thou hast not lied unto men , but unto God .
text2: Entá , nuinkia nunka áminiuchukait . Surukumna nu kuitcha áminiuchukait . Nusha , ṡurukataj tusamea tu Enentaímpram ? Amesha aya aentsnum Wáitruachume . Antsu Yusnumsha Wáitruame " Tímiayi Pítiur .

text: And Ananias hearing these words fell down , and gave up the ghost : and great fear came on all them that heard these things .
text2: Tutai Ananías nuna antuk Nú chichamaik jakamiayi . Tura Ashí shuar nuna antuk nekaawar ti ashamkarmiayi .

text: And the young men arose , wound him up , and carried him out , and buried him .
text2: Nú turunamtai aishman tariar Ananías jakan penuararmiayi . Túrawar iwiarsatai tusar Júkiarmiayi .

text: And it was about the space of three hours after , when his wife , not knowing what was done , came in .
text2: Tura Ananíasa nuwe arur , Menaintiú ura nankaamasai Támiayi . Túrasha ni aishri jakanka nekaachmiayi .

text: And Peter answered unto her , Tell me whether ye sold the land for so much ? And she said , Yea , for so much .
text2: Támatai Pítiur nuwan Tímiayi " Turuttia . Atum nunka surukurmena nui , ṡkuit itiarumna Núnikik surukuram ? " Tímiayi . Tutai nuwa Tímiayi " Ee , Núnik surukji . "

text: Then Peter said unto her , How is it that ye have agreed together to tempt the Spirit of the Lord ? behold , the feet of them which have buried thy husband are at the door , and shall carry thee out .
text2: Tutai Pítiur Tímiayi " ṡUrukamtai atumsha Uunt Yusa Wakaní nekapkamsatai tusarum Imiá Enentáimprarum ? Pai , Iisiá . Ame aishrumin iwiarsatai tusar Júkiaria nu wininiawai . Tura yamaikia amincha juramkiartatui " Tímiayi .

text: Then fell she down straightway at his feet , and yielded up the ghost : and the young men came in , and found her dead , and , carrying her forth , buried her by her husband .
text2: Tutai nu chichamaik niisha imia Pitru wajamunam jaka iniaantmiayi . Aishman wayaj Tukamá jaka tepan Wáinkiarmiayi . Túramtai Júkiar ni aishrinin ayamach iwiarsarmiayi .

text: And great fear came upon all the church , and upon as many as heard these things .
text2: Tura Ashí Yus - shuar armia nu tura Ashí aencha nuna antukarmia nu ti ashamkarmiayi .

text: And believers were the more added to the Lord , multitudes both of men and women . )
text2: Tura Ashí Yus - shuar Yusa Uunt Jeen shikiriin irunin ármiayi . Nu shikirisha , Sarumúnna , tu anaikiamuiti . Tura Chíkichmamtinkia nuim iruntratniun ashamiarmiayi . Túmainiayatan , ti pénker ainiawai , tu wearmiayi . Tura Yus - shuar Yusa kakarmarin iniakmasarmiayi . Túra asamtai Imiá Untsurí aents Yus - shuar ajasarmiayi .

text: Insomuch that they brought forth the sick into the streets , and laid them on beds and couches , that at the least the shadow of Peter passing by might overshadow some of them .
text2: Tura Chíkich aents ni shuari jainia nuna Jintiá amamtikiarmiayi . Peakjai Júkiar , tampunmasha enkeawar Júkiar Jintiá ayamach aepsarmiayi . Pítiur nankaamak ni Wakanínsha enkemprutmawainti tusar nu shuar Túrawarmiayi .

text: There came also a multitude out of the cities round about unto Jerusalem , bringing sick folks , and them which were vexed with unclean spirits : and they were healed every one .
text2: Núnisan arantia shuarsha ti Untsurí ni shuari Jáinian tura iwianchrukuncha nui Jerusarénnum itiarmiayi . Tura Ashí nui Táaruka Tsuámararmiayi .

text: Then the high priest rose up , and all they that were with him , ( which is the sect of the Sadducees , ) and were filled with indignation ,
text2: Israer - patri uuntri , tura Satuséu aencha niijiai pujuarmia nu suiir iiniak

text: And laid their hands on the apostles , and put them in the common prison .
text2: Jesusa akatramurin achikiar enkeawarmiayi .

text: But the angel of the Lord by night opened the prison doors , and brought them forth , and said ,
text2: Túrasha kashi Uunt Yusa suntari nayaimpinmaya tara Sepú Wáitirin uraimiayi . Tura Jesusa akatramurin aa Jíikiarmiayi .

text: Go , stand and speak in the temple to the people all the words of this life .
text2: Tura Tímiayi " Wetarum . Tura Yusa Uunt Jeen wajasrum Yusjai tuke iwiaaku átinia nu etserkatarum " Tímiayi .

text: And when they heard that , they entered into the temple early in the morning , and taught . But the high priest came , and they that were with him , and called the council together , and all the senate of the children of Israel and sent to the prison to have them brought .
text2: Nuna antukar kashin tsawar Káshik Yusa Uunt Jeen wayawar jintintiawarmiayi . Nu Túmainiai Israer - patri uuntri , tura niijiai pujuarmia nusha iruntrarmiayi . Tura Israer - shuara uuntri , naamka armia nuna iruntrami tusa untsukarmiayi . Ashí iruntrar akatar akupkarmiayi , Jesusa akatramuri sepunmaya itiatarum tusar .

text: But when the officers came , and found them not in the prison , they returned , and told ,
text2: Tura suntarsha sepunam jeariar Jesusa akatramurin Wáinkiacharmiayi . Atsawai tukam Táarmiayi .

text: Saying , The prison truly found we shut with all safety , and the keepers standing without before the doors : but when we had opened , we found no man within .
text2: Taar chichainiak " Sepú waiti asakamua Tímianisan aa Wáinkiaji , tiarmiayi . Tura suntar Wáitin iimpru wajainia Wáinkiaji . Tura waiti urair wayaj ~ i tukamar Atsá Wáinkiaji " tiarmiayi .

text: Now when the high priest and the captain of the temple and the chief priests heard these things , they doubted of them whereunto this would grow .
text2: Israer - patri uuntri , tura Yusa Uunt Jeen wainniu uuntrisha , nu chichaman antukar , " tsej ausha ṡurutiak nunasha iniaisarat ? " tiarmiayi .

text: Then came one and told them , saying , Behold , the men whom ye put in prison are standing in the temple , and teaching the people .
text2: Nu chichamaik aishman taa Tímiayi " Aishman átum sepunam enkeamarmena nu , Yusa Uunt Jeen wajasar aentsun jintintiuk pujuiniawai " Tímiayi .

text: Then went the captain with the officers , and brought them without violence : for they feared the people , lest they should have been stoned .
text2: Túrunamtai Yusa Uunt Jeen wainniu uuntri ni suntarijiai wear achik itiarmiayi . Túrasha penké aents kayajai tukurmaraij tusar , yajauch awajtsuk itiarmiayi .

text: And when they had brought them , they set them before the council : and the high priest asked them ,
text2: Tura achik itiaar Israer - shuar naamka pujamunam naka awajsarmiayi .

text: Saying , Did not we straitly command you that ye should not teach in this name ? and , behold , ye have filled Jerusalem with your doctrine , and intend to bring this man ' s blood upon us .
text2: Tura Israer - patri uuntri Tímiayi " Iisha atumin Chicháa chicharu awajsar , Jesusa naari pachisrum etserkairap tusar akupkachmakajrum . Túrasha , ṡantukurmek ? Atsá . Mash Jerusarénnum átum etserkamu pampankai . Jes , átum , Jesusan Máawarai , iin Tátsurmek . Nusha iin makuutai tusarum Tárume " tiarmiayi .

text: Then Peter and the other apostles answered and said , We ought to obey God rather than men .
text2: Nuyá tutai Pítiur Chíkich Jesusa akatramurijiai chichainiak " Iikia aentsjainkia iniankasar Yus emka umirkatniuitji , tiarmiayi .

text: The God of our fathers raised up Jesus , whom ye slew and hanged on a tree .
text2: Jesus atumek Krúsnum Máamurmena nuna ii iwiaaku Yusri Niin iniantkimiayi .

text: Him hath God exalted with his right hand to be a Prince and a Saviour , for to give repentance to Israel , and forgiveness of sins .
text2: Yus ni kakarmarijiai Niin nankaamantu awajsamiayi . Tura nekas Akupniuiti tusa ni untsuurini apujsamiayi . Tura aentsun Uwemtikniuiti . Israer - shuar Enentái Yapajiáwar tunaarinia uwemprarat tusa Yus Túraiti .

text: And we are his witnesses of these things ; and so is also the Holy Ghost , whom God hath given to them that obey him .
text2: Nu tuma asamtai iisha nu nekaar étsereaji . Tura Yusa Wakanísha nuna étsereawai . Túrasha aya Yusa umirkarua nunak ni Wakanín Súsaruiti " Tímiayi Pítiur .

text: When they heard that , they were cut to the heart , and took counsel to slay them .
text2: Tutai nuna antukar ti kajerkarmiayi . Túrawar , maatai tusar wakeriarmiayi .

text: Then stood there up one in the council , a Pharisee , named Gamaliel , a doctor of the law , had in reputation among all the people , and commanded to put the apostles forth a little space ;
text2: Tura nui Israer - shuara uuntri pujumiayi , ni naari Kamarír . Niisha Pariséunam Páchitkiauyayi . Tura akupeamun jintinniuriyayi . Túmakui Ashí aents niin shiir Enentáimtin ármiayi . Tura niisha wajaki Tímiayi " Ju aishman aa ishichik wajasarti " Tímiayi .

text: And said unto them , Ye men of Israel , take heed to yourselves what ye intend to do as touching these men .
text2: Nuyásha irunar matsamarmia nuna chicharuk " Israer shuartiram , ju aishman Tú Túratai tu Enentáimsarumna nu aneartarum .

text: For before these days rose up Theudas , boasting himself to be somebody ; to whom a number of men , about four hundred , joined themselves : who was slain ; and all , as many as obeyed him , were scattered , and brought to nought .
text2: Enentáimsatarum . Nuik aishman Tiútas wantinkiachmakia . Niisha Kapitiániitjai takui , kuatru Siántu ( 400 ) shuar nemarkarmiayi . Tura ukunam niin maawarmatai , ni némarkamurisha pisararmiayi . Túrunawar Nuní amuukamiayi .

text: After this man rose up Judas of Galilee in the days of the taxing , and drew away much people after him : he also perished ; and all , even as many as obeyed him , were dispersed .
text2: Ukunmasha , iruntrar nekapmartin tsawantincha Kariréanmaya Jútas wantinkiachmaka . Tura nincha Nútiksan ti Untsurí nemarkarmiayi . Túman Máawarmiayi . Nu Túrunamtai Nútiksan ni némarkamurisha pisararmiayi .

text: And now I say unto you , Refrain from these men , and let them alone : for if this counsel or this work be of men , it will come to nought :
text2: Jes , tuma asamtai nu aishman aa wajainia nu iniaisatarum . Auka pachisairap . Au tumainia nu aya aentsnaketkuinkia amuukattawai .

text: But if it be of God , ye cannot overthrow it ; lest haply ye be found even to fight against God .
text2: Tura antsu Yúsnaitkuinkia atumsha amuktai tukamarum tujinkiattarme . Aneartarum . Iniaiyachkurmeka nu Tumá pujusrum Yusjai Máanikchattarmeash " Tímiayi Kamarír .

text: And to him they agreed : and when they had called the apostles , and beaten them , they commanded that they should not speak in the name of Jesus , and let them go .
text2: Tú tutai Tímianak umikiarmiayi . Túrasha Jesusa akatramurin untsukar Asutiáwarmiayi . Tura chicharuk " Jesusa naari pachisrum penké ishichkisha etserkairap " tiarmiayi . Tú tiar akupkarmiayi .

text: And they departed from the presence of the council , rejoicing that they were counted worthy to suffer shame for his name .
text2: Jesusa akatramurisha Israer - shuara uuntri pujamunmaya Jíinkiarmiayi . Tura Wáitsamniaitrume tusa Yuska Jesusa naari pachia asakrin ii natsantin Wáitsatniun tsankatramkaitji tusar ti shiir Enentáimsar wearmiayi .

text: And daily in the temple , and in every house , they ceased not to teach and preach Jesus Christ .
text2: Tura Jesukrístunun áujmatsatniun penké iniaisacharmiayi . Antsu tuke tsawant Yusa Uunt Jeencha tura Chíkich jeanmasha Páchitsuk etseriarmiayi .

text: And in those days , when the number of the disciples was multiplied , there arose a murmuring of the Grecians against the Hebrews , because their widows were neglected in the daily ministration .
text2: Nú tsawantin Yusan umirkaru ti kawenkar ármiayi . Tura tuke tsawant yurumak Súsatin ámiayi . Túmakui Yus - shuar Kriaku chichaman chicharmia nu , Israer - shuaran kajeriarmiayi . " Tuke tsawantin yurumak Súarmena nui Atumí waje ti nukap Súarme . Tura iiniuka ishichik Súarme " tiarmiayi .

text: Then the twelve called the multitude of the disciples unto them , and said , It is not reason that we should leave the word of God , and serve tables .
text2: Túruinia Jesusa tuse akatramuri Ashí Yus - shuaran irurar tiarmiayi " Iisha Yus - Chicham etserkatin iniaisar yurumak Súsachminiaitji .

text: Wherefore , brethren , look ye out among you seven men of honest report , full of the Holy Ghost and wisdom , whom we may appoint over this business .
text2: Tuma asamtai yatsurtiram , Atumíinia siati aishman Eáktárum yurumkan Súsarat tusarum . Pénker wekainia nu , tura neka shuar , Yusa Wakaní pimiutkamu ainia nu achiktarum .

text: But we will give ourselves continually to prayer , and to the ministry of the word .
text2: Iikia antsu Yus áujkir unuiniakratkir Yusa chichame etserkir wétatji " tiarmiayi .

text: And the saying pleased the whole multitude : and they chose Stephen , a man full of faith and of the Holy Ghost , and Philip , and Prochorus , and Nicanor , and Timon , and Parmenas , and Nicolas a proselyte of Antioch :
text2: Akatramu tiarmia nuna Ashí aents Enentáimsar pujuarmiayi . Túmainiak Estepankan anaikiarmiayi . Estepansha Yúsan tuke Enentáimtiniuyayi . Tura Yusa Wakanísha pimiutkamuyayi . Chíkich aishmankan anaikiarmiayi , niisha Jiripi , tura Nuyá Purukuru , Nikianúrsha , Nuyá Temun , Parmenassha , Nikiurássha . Nikiurássha Antiukía nunkanmayaitiat Israernancha Ashí umirniuyayi .

text: Whom they set before the apostles : and when they had prayed , they laid their hands on them .
text2: Tura nu siati aishmankan Jesusa akatramurin itiariarmiayi . Táarmatai , akatramusha , Yus áujtusar , anaikiaji tusar Múuknumsha ni uwejen awantsarmiayi .

text: And the word of God increased ; and the number of the disciples multiplied in Jerusalem greatly ; and a great company of the priests were obedient to the faith .
text2: Túrasha Yusa chichamenka tuke pampanki wémiayi . Nui Jerusarénnumsha Yus - shuar ti kawenkarmiayi . Tura imia Israer - patrisha Untsurí Yus - Chichaman umiriarmiayi .

text: And Stephen , full of faith and power , did great wonders and miracles among the people .
text2: Estepansha Yusa waitnenkartutairi pimiutkamuyayi . Tura Yusa kakarmarisha pimiutkamuyayi . Tuma asa aentsti Túrachminian shuar írunmanum Túramiayi . Nu shuar Yusa kakarmarin nekaawarat tusa Túramiayi .

text: Then there arose certain of the synagogue , which is called the synagogue of the Libertines , and Cyrenians , and Alexandrians , and of them of Cilicia and of Asia , disputing with Stephen .
text2: Israer - shuar iruntai jea , ni naari Ankantin , ámiayi . Nuyá aishmansha tura Serini nunkanmaya aishmansha , tura Chíkich nunka Arijiantrianmayasha , Serisianmayasha , Asianmayasha , Tímian Estepanjai áujmatsatai tusar Káutkarmiayi .

text: And they were not able to resist the wisdom and the spirit by which he spake .
text2: Estepan Yusa Wakaní nekatairijiai Tímianak Chicháa asamtai , nu aishman Estepanjai inkiunaikiar nupetkataj Tukamá tujinkiarmiayi .

text: Then they suborned men , which said , We have heard him speak blasphemous words against Moses , and against God .
text2: Tuma asamtai suiir Enentáimtuiniak Chíkich aentsun Estepankan tsanumprurarat tusar Eákarmiayi . Estepan Muisaisnasha Yúsnasha yajauch áujmatui , titiarum tusar akikiarmiayi .

text: And they stirred up the people , and the elders , and the scribes , and came upon him , and caught him , and brought him to the council ,
text2: Penké aentsun , tura uunt ainia nunasha , jintintin ármia nujaisha chichaman Júsar yajauch Enentáimtikrarmiayi . Tura Estepankan Jintiá akirtuawar achikiarmiayi . Túrawar Israer - shuar naamka matsamarmia nui Júkiarmiayi .

text: And set up false witnesses , which said , This man ceaseth not to speak blasphemous words against this holy place , and the law :
text2: Tura wait chichamtinian itiarmiayi . Niisha taar chicharainiak " Yusa Uunt Jeen ti pénker ana nu , tura Yusa akupkamurincha ju Estepan tuke yajauch chicharui , tiarmiayi .

text: For we have heard him say , that this Jesus of Nazareth shall destroy this place , and shall change the customs which Moses delivered us .
text2: Nú arantcha ju Estepan Tímia nu antukji , tiarmiayi . Estepan chichaak " Nasarétnumia Jesuska Yusa Uunt Jeen Sáaktiatui , tura Nuyá Muisais iin ikiurtamkimiaj nunasha Yapajiáttawai " Tímiayi . Nusha Estepan Tímia nu antukji " tiarmiayi . Tura nunasha penké ántar tsanumprurarmiayi .

text: And all that sat in the council , looking stedfastly on him , saw his face as it had been the face of an angel .
text2: Nuyasha Ashí Israer - shuar naamka iruntramunam pujuarmia nu Estepankan iiyaj Tukamá ni yapin nayaimpinmaya suntara yapiya Nuní iiran Wáinkiarmiayi .

text: Then said the high priest , Are these things so ?
text2: Tuma Wáiniak Israer - patri uuntri Estepankan aniasmiayi " ṡJu tuinia nu nekaskait ? " Tímiayi .

text: And he said , Men , brethren , and fathers , hearken ; The God of glory appeared unto our father Abraham , when he was in Mesopotamia , before he dwelt in Charran ,
text2: Tutai niisha aimkiamiayi " Winia uuntrutirmesha , yatsurtirmesha anturtuktarum . Ii Waantu Yusri ii Uuntrín Apraáman wantintiukmiayi . Apraámka Misiuputámia - Kartea nunkanam pujai , Aran nunkanam wéatsain , nui wantintiukmiayi .
column6: And he said , Men , brethren , and fathers , hearken ; The God of glory appeared unto our father Abraham , when he was in Mesopotamia , before he dwelt in Charran ,
column8: Estepankan Máawarmatai Sauru , pénkeraiti , Tímiayi . Tura aishman Yúsan pénker Enentáimta armiania nu , Estepanka ayashincha iwiarsarmiayi , tura aneenak ti uutiarmiayi . Tura Nú tsawantai Yus - shuaran Jerusarénnum pujuarmia nuna ti kajerkatin nankamnamiayi .

text: And he said , Men , brethren , and fathers , hearken ; The God of glory appeared unto our father Abraham , when he was in Mesopotamia , before he dwelt in Charran ,
text2: Tutai niisha aimkiamiayi " Winia uuntrutirmesha , yatsurtirmesha anturtuktarum . Ii Waantu Yusri ii Uuntrín Apraáman wantintiukmiayi . Apraámka Misiuputámia - Kartea nunkanam pujai , Aran nunkanam wéatsain , nui wantintiukmiayi .
column6: And he said , Men , brethren , and fathers , hearken ; The God of glory appeared unto our father Abraham , when he was in Mesopotamia , before he dwelt in Charran ,
column8: Estepankan Máawarmatai Sauru , pénkeraiti , Tímiayi . Tura aishman Yúsan pénker Enentáimta armiania nu , Estepanka ayashincha iwiarsarmiayi , tura aneenak ti uutiarmiayi . Tura Nú tsawantai Yus - shuaran Jerusarénnum pujuarmia nuna ti kajerkatin nankamnamiayi .

text: And said unto him , Get thee out of thy country , and from thy kindred , and come into the land which I shall shew thee .
text2: Tura wantintiuk Tímiayi " Ame nunkemsha áminiurmesha ikiukim nunka Wi iniaktustatjamena nui Wetá " Tímiayi Yus .
column6: And said unto him , Get thee out of thy country , and from thy kindred , and come into the land which I shall shew thee .
column8: Sáuruka Yus - shuaran kajerak ti pataat wémiayi . Túmak nui Jeá Wayá , nui Wayá aishmannasha nuwancha Wáinkianka japiki Jukí sepunam enkeataj tusa Túrimiayi . Tumakui Yus - shuar Jerusarénnumia pisarar Jutía nunkanam , tura Samaria nunkanmasha jeawarmiayi . Jesusa akatramurinkia antsu Jerusarénnuman juakarmiayi .

text: And said unto him , Get thee out of thy country , and from thy kindred , and come into the land which I shall shew thee .
text2: Tura wantintiuk Tímiayi " Ame nunkemsha áminiurmesha ikiukim nunka Wi iniaktustatjamena nui Wetá " Tímiayi Yus .
column6: And said unto him , Get thee out of thy country , and from thy kindred , and come into the land which I shall shew thee .
column8: Sáuruka Yus - shuaran kajerak ti pataat wémiayi . Túmak nui Jeá Wayá , nui Wayá aishmannasha nuwancha Wáinkianka japiki Jukí sepunam enkeataj tusa Túrimiayi . Tumakui Yus - shuar Jerusarénnumia pisarar Jutía nunkanam , tura Samaria nunkanmasha jeawarmiayi . Jesusa akatramurinkia antsu Jerusarénnuman juakarmiayi .

text: Then came he out of the land of the Chaldaeans , and dwelt in Charran : and from thence , when his father was dead , he removed him into this land , wherein ye now dwell .
text2: Tutai Apraám Misiuputámia - Kartea nunkan ikiuki Aran nunkanam pujustaj tusa wémiayi . Nuyá ni Aparí jakamtai " Arant Wetá " Tímiayi Yus . Nuna taku ju nunkan ii pujajnia jui pujsamiayi .
column6: Then came he out of the land of the Chaldaeans , and dwelt in Charran : and from thence , when his father was dead , he removed him into this land , wherein ye now dwell .
column8: Túrasha Jerusarénnumia aents pisararmia nu , arant wénaksha tuke Yusa chichamen etserkini yujarmiayi .

text: Then came he out of the land of the Chaldaeans , and dwelt in Charran : and from thence , when his father was dead , he removed him into this land , wherein ye now dwell .
text2: Tutai Apraám Misiuputámia - Kartea nunkan ikiuki Aran nunkanam pujustaj tusa wémiayi . Nuyá ni Aparí jakamtai " Arant Wetá " Tímiayi Yus . Nuna taku ju nunkan ii pujajnia jui pujsamiayi .
column6: Then came he out of the land of the Chaldaeans , and dwelt in Charran : and from thence , when his father was dead , he removed him into this land , wherein ye now dwell .
column8: Túrasha Jerusarénnumia aents pisararmia nu , arant wénaksha tuke Yusa chichamen etserkini yujarmiayi .

text: And he gave him none inheritance in it , no , not so much as to set his foot on : yet he promised that he would give it to him for a possession , and to his seed after him , when as yet he had no child .
text2: Túrayat nunkan ishichkisha Súsachmiayi ju nunkanam . Antsu " Ukunam amastatjai . Ame jakakmin ame uchirmin susattajai " Tímiayi . Tura Apraama Uchirí penké atsan Nuní Tímiayi Yus .
column6: And he gave him none inheritance in it , no , not so much as to set his foot on : yet he promised that he would give it to him for a possession , and to his seed after him , when as yet he had no child .
column8: Tura Jiripi Jerusarénnumia we tura Chíkich péprunam Samaria Núnkanam ámiania nui Jeá , chichaak " Yus anaikiamu ana nu Jesusaiti " tu etsermiayi .

text: And he gave him none inheritance in it , no , not so much as to set his foot on : yet he promised that he would give it to him for a possession , and to his seed after him , when as yet he had no child .
text2: Túrayat nunkan ishichkisha Súsachmiayi ju nunkanam . Antsu " Ukunam amastatjai . Ame jakakmin ame uchirmin susattajai " Tímiayi . Tura Apraama Uchirí penké atsan Nuní Tímiayi Yus .
column6: And he gave him none inheritance in it , no , not so much as to set his foot on : yet he promised that he would give it to him for a possession , and to his seed after him , when as yet he had no child .
column8: Tura Jiripi Jerusarénnumia we tura Chíkich péprunam Samaria Núnkanam ámiania nui Jeá , chichaak " Yus anaikiamu ana nu Jesusaiti " tu etsermiayi .

text: And God spake on this wise , That his seed should sojourn in a strange land ; and that they should bring them into bondage , and entreat them evil four hundred years .
text2: Nuyasha Yus Tímiayi " Ame uchirmesha írara Núnisaran Chíkich nunkanam pujusartatui . Nuisha emetamu itit awajtai pujuartatui . Kuatru Siántu ( 400 ) Uwí , Tímianu Uwí Wáitsartatui , Tímiayi .
column6: And God spake on this wise , That his seed should sojourn in a strange land ; and that they should bring them into bondage , and entreat them evil four hundred years .
column8: Túrakui aents iruntrar Chikichík Enentáijiai Jiripi étsereamun Titiú pujusar antukarmiayi . Yusa kakarmarin nekaawarat tusa aentsti Túrachminian Túrimia nunasha Wáiniarmiayi .

text: And God spake on this wise , That his seed should sojourn in a strange land ; and that they should bring them into bondage , and entreat them evil four hundred years .
text2: Nuyasha Yus Tímiayi " Ame uchirmesha írara Núnisaran Chíkich nunkanam pujusartatui . Nuisha emetamu itit awajtai pujuartatui . Kuatru Siántu ( 400 ) Uwí , Tímianu Uwí Wáitsartatui , Tímiayi .
column6: And God spake on this wise , That his seed should sojourn in a strange land ; and that they should bring them into bondage , and entreat them evil four hundred years .
column8: Túrakui aents iruntrar Chikichík Enentáijiai Jiripi étsereamun Titiú pujusar antukarmiayi . Yusa kakarmarin nekaawarat tusa aentsti Túrachminian Túrimia nunasha Wáiniarmiayi .

text: And the nation to whom they shall be in bondage will I judge , said God : and after that shall they come forth , and serve me in this place .
text2: Túrasha , Wi Asutiáttajai ame Shuárumin Wáitkia Núnaka , Tímiayi . Túram Nuyá Nú nunkanmaya Shiákartatui . Tura Winia Enentáimtursartatui Jú nunkanam ' Tímiayi .
column6: And the nation to whom they shall be in bondage will I judge , said God : and after that shall they come forth , and serve me in this place .
column8: Ti Untsurí aents iwianchruku ármia nuna Jiripi nu iwianchin jiirki akuptiarmiayi . Tura íwianch Jíiniainiak kakantar Charáa tiar Jíiniarmiayi . Tura ti Untsurí emearusha shutuapsha pénker ajasarmiayi .

text: And the nation to whom they shall be in bondage will I judge , said God : and after that shall they come forth , and serve me in this place .
text2: Túrasha , Wi Asutiáttajai ame Shuárumin Wáitkia Núnaka , Tímiayi . Túram Nuyá Nú nunkanmaya Shiákartatui . Tura Winia Enentáimtursartatui Jú nunkanam ' Tímiayi .
column6: And the nation to whom they shall be in bondage will I judge , said God : and after that shall they come forth , and serve me in this place .
column8: Ti Untsurí aents iwianchruku ármia nuna Jiripi nu iwianchin jiirki akuptiarmiayi . Tura íwianch Jíiniainiak kakantar Charáa tiar Jíiniarmiayi . Tura ti Untsurí emearusha shutuapsha pénker ajasarmiayi .

text: And he gave him the covenant of circumcision : and so Abraham begat Isaac , and circumcised him the eighth day ; and Isaac begat Jacob ; and Jacob begat the twelve patriarchs .
text2: Yus tuke Apraámnasha chicharuk ` Yamaikia Wíi - shuar asarum tsupirnaktiniaitrume . Tuma asam amesha uchiram aishmankach akiiniamtai , Wi Tímiajna Núnismek , Sirkunsisiún tutai , shunichiri nuape tsupirkata , Tímiayi . Tura Chícham Wi yamaikia ámijiai najanaj nu nekas uminkatniuiti tusam nusha Túrata " Tímiayi Yus . Tuma asamtai ni Uchirí Isak akiiniamtai , uchu tsawant nankaamasmatai , Apraám niin tsupirkamiayi . Tura Isaksha ukunam ni tuse ( 12 ) uchirin ii uuntri armia nunasha Nútiksan Túramiayi .
column6: And he gave him the covenant of circumcision : and so Abraham begat Isaac , and circumcised him the eighth day ; and Isaac begat Jacob ; and Jacob begat the twelve patriarchs .
column8: Tuma asamtai Nú péprunmayanka Ashí shuar ti warasar pujuarmiayi .

text: And he gave him the covenant of circumcision : and so Abraham begat Isaac , and circumcised him the eighth day ; and Isaac begat Jacob ; and Jacob begat the twelve patriarchs .
text2: Yus tuke Apraámnasha chicharuk ` Yamaikia Wíi - shuar asarum tsupirnaktiniaitrume . Tuma asam amesha uchiram aishmankach akiiniamtai , Wi Tímiajna Núnismek , Sirkunsisiún tutai , shunichiri nuape tsupirkata , Tímiayi . Tura Chícham Wi yamaikia ámijiai najanaj nu nekas uminkatniuiti tusam nusha Túrata " Tímiayi Yus . Tuma asamtai ni Uchirí Isak akiiniamtai , uchu tsawant nankaamasmatai , Apraám niin tsupirkamiayi . Tura Isaksha ukunam ni tuse ( 12 ) uchirin ii uuntri armia nunasha Nútiksan Túramiayi .
column6: And he gave him the covenant of circumcision : and so Abraham begat Isaac , and circumcised him the eighth day ; and Isaac begat Jacob ; and Jacob begat the twelve patriarchs .
column8: Tuma asamtai Nú péprunmayanka Ashí shuar ti warasar pujuarmiayi .

text: And the patriarchs , moved with envy , sold Joseph into Egypt : but God was with him ,
text2: Tura niisha ni yachin Jusen suiir iiyarmiayi . Túmainiak Ejiptu nunkanam Júkiarat tusar surukarmiayi . Túrasha Yus némarkauyayi .
column6: And the patriarchs , moved with envy , sold Joseph into Egypt : but God was with him ,
column8: Tura Nú nunkanam uwishin Semun pujumiayi . Nuikkia wi ímianaitjai tusa Samarianmaya aentsun ananniuyayi .

text: And the patriarchs , moved with envy , sold Joseph into Egypt : but God was with him ,
text2: Tura niisha ni yachin Jusen suiir iiyarmiayi . Túmainiak Ejiptu nunkanam Júkiarat tusar surukarmiayi . Túrasha Yus némarkauyayi .
column6: And the patriarchs , moved with envy , sold Joseph into Egypt : but God was with him ,
column8: Tura Nú nunkanam uwishin Semun pujumiayi . Nuikkia wi ímianaitjai tusa Samarianmaya aentsun ananniuyayi .

text: And delivered him out of all his afflictions , and gave him favour and wisdom in the sight of Pharaoh king of Egypt ; and he made him governor over Egypt and all his house .
text2: Tuma asa , Ashí ni itiurchatriinia uwemtikramiayi . Tura waitnenkartutairincha nekatairincha susamiayi . Tuma asamtai Ejiptunam uunt akupin Paraún Ejiptu nunkaa akupniuri ajasat tura ni jeen Wáinniuri ajasat tusa anaikiamiayi . "
column6: And delivered him out of all his afflictions , and gave him favour and wisdom in the sight of Pharaoh king of Egypt ; and he made him governor over Egypt and all his house .
column8: Tuma asamtai Ashí aents úmamkesar uchichisha , uuntcha , niin anturiarmiayi . Tura tiarmiayi " Ju Semunsha Yusa kakarmarijiai aitkiawai . "

text: And delivered him out of all his afflictions , and gave him favour and wisdom in the sight of Pharaoh king of Egypt ; and he made him governor over Egypt and all his house .
text2: Tuma asa , Ashí ni itiurchatriinia uwemtikramiayi . Tura waitnenkartutairincha nekatairincha susamiayi . Tuma asamtai Ejiptunam uunt akupin Paraún Ejiptu nunkaa akupniuri ajasat tura ni jeen Wáinniuri ajasat tusa anaikiamiayi . "
column6: And delivered him out of all his afflictions , and gave him favour and wisdom in the sight of Pharaoh king of Egypt ; and he made him governor over Egypt and all his house .
column8: Tuma asamtai Ashí aents úmamkesar uchichisha , uuntcha , niin anturiarmiayi . Tura tiarmiayi " Ju Semunsha Yusa kakarmarijiai aitkiawai . "

text: Now there came a dearth over all the land of Egypt and Chanaan , and great affliction : and our fathers found no sustenance .
text2: ` Tímiatam tsuka tura itiurchatcha ámiayi Ejiptu Núnkanam . Tura jui Kanaan nunkanmasha Núnisan ámiayi . Tuma asamtai ii uuntri yurumkan penké Wáincharmiayi .
column6: Now there came a dearth over all the land of Egypt and Chanaan , and great affliction : and our fathers found no sustenance .
column8: Tura ti Untsurí Uwí wawekratmarijiai anankarta asamtai , umirkarmiayi nu aents .

text: Now there came a dearth over all the land of Egypt and Chanaan , and great affliction : and our fathers found no sustenance .
text2: ` Tímiatam tsuka tura itiurchatcha ámiayi Ejiptu Núnkanam . Tura jui Kanaan nunkanmasha Núnisan ámiayi . Tuma asamtai ii uuntri yurumkan penké Wáincharmiayi .
column6: Now there came a dearth over all the land of Egypt and Chanaan , and great affliction : and our fathers found no sustenance .
column8: Tura ti Untsurí Uwí wawekratmarijiai anankarta asamtai , umirkarmiayi nu aents .

text: But when Jacob heard that there was corn in Egypt , he sent out our fathers first .
text2: Tura Jakup , Ejiptunam yurumak ikiusma awai taman antuk ni Uchirín akupkarmiayi . Túrasha wekaicha wearmiayi . Wats , ii uuntriniun ujaajrume .
column6: But when Jacob heard that there was corn in Egypt , he sent out our fathers first .
column8: Túrasha Jiripi Yusa akupeamurin , tura Jesukrístununcha shiir chichaman etserkamiayi . Tura , nuna antukar nuwasha aishmansha umikiar imian wearmiayi .

text: But when Jacob heard that there was corn in Egypt , he sent out our fathers first .
text2: Tura Jakup , Ejiptunam yurumak ikiusma awai taman antuk ni Uchirín akupkarmiayi . Túrasha wekaicha wearmiayi . Wats , ii uuntriniun ujaajrume .
column6: But when Jacob heard that there was corn in Egypt , he sent out our fathers first .
column8: Túrasha Jiripi Yusa akupeamurin , tura Jesukrístununcha shiir chichaman etserkamiayi . Tura , nuna antukar nuwasha aishmansha umikiar imian wearmiayi .

text: And at the second time Joseph was made known to his brethren ; and Joseph ' s kindred was made known unto Pharaoh .
text2: Tura ii uuntri atak Ejiptunam wéenak Jusesha , Wíitjai takui ni yachi Jusen nekaawarmiayi . Tura Jusé " Yatsur ainiawai " takui Paraun , antuk " au shuarapitia " Tímiayi .
column6: And at the second time Joseph was made known to his brethren ; and Joseph ' s kindred was made known unto Pharaoh .
column8: Semunsha imia uwishniuitiat Yus - Chichaman Enentáimtus imianmiayi . Tura Jiripijiai tsanin wekaimiayi . Yusa kakarmarin shuar nekaawarat tusa Jiripikia aentsti Túrachminian Túrimiayi . Nuna Wáiniak Semun ti Enentáimsamiayi .

text: And at the second time Joseph was made known to his brethren ; and Joseph ' s kindred was made known unto Pharaoh .
text2: Tura ii uuntri atak Ejiptunam wéenak Jusesha , Wíitjai takui ni yachi Jusen nekaawarmiayi . Tura Jusé " Yatsur ainiawai " takui Paraun , antuk " au shuarapitia " Tímiayi .
column6: And at the second time Joseph was made known to his brethren ; and Joseph ' s kindred was made known unto Pharaoh .
column8: Semunsha imia uwishniuitiat Yus - Chichaman Enentáimtus imianmiayi . Tura Jiripijiai tsanin wekaimiayi . Yusa kakarmarin shuar nekaawarat tusa Jiripikia aentsti Túrachminian Túrimiayi . Nuna Wáiniak Semun ti Enentáimsamiayi .

text: Then sent Joseph , and called his father Jacob to him , and all his kindred , threescore and fifteen souls .
text2: Nuyanka Jusé ni yachin chicharuk " Apar itiatarum uchirtuk " Tímiayi . Nu shuarsha Untsurí , setenta senku ( 75 ) matsamarmiayi .
column6: Then sent Joseph , and called his father Jacob to him , and all his kindred , threescore and fifteen souls .
column8: Tura Jesusa akatramurisha Jerusarénnum pujuarmia nui Samarianmaya aents Yusa chichamen umirainiawai taman nekaawarmiayi . Tuma asamtai Pitruncha Juánnasha Nekáa ikiuutarum tusa akupkarmiayi .

text: Then sent Joseph , and called his father Jacob to him , and all his kindred , threescore and fifteen souls .
text2: Nuyanka Jusé ni yachin chicharuk " Apar itiatarum uchirtuk " Tímiayi . Nu shuarsha Untsurí , setenta senku ( 75 ) matsamarmiayi .
column6: Then sent Joseph , and called his father Jacob to him , and all his kindred , threescore and fifteen souls .
column8: Tura Jesusa akatramurisha Jerusarénnum pujuarmia nui Samarianmaya aents Yusa chichamen umirainiawai taman nekaawarmiayi . Tuma asamtai Pitruncha Juánnasha Nekáa ikiuutarum tusa akupkarmiayi .

text: So Jacob went down into Egypt , and died , he , and our fathers ,
text2: Nuní tutai Jakupsha ni shuarijiai Ejiptunam pujustai tusar wearmiayi . Tura ukunam Nú nunkanman jakamiayi . Tura ni uchirisha ii uuntri ainia nu , Núnisaran Nú nunkanman Jákarmiayi .

text: And were carried over into Sychem , and laid in the sepulchre that Abraham bought for a sum of money of the sons of Emmor the father of Sychem .
text2: Tura atak ukunam ni shuari Sikiam nunkanam ni ukunchin Júkiar iwiarsarmiayi . Kame Sikiam nunkanam Apraámka yaunchu Játsuk Amura Uchirí nunken sumakmiayi . Túramtai nui iwiarsarmiayi ' Tímiayi .
column6: And were carried over into Sychem , and laid in the sepulchre that Abraham bought for a sum of money of the sons of Emmor the father of Sychem .
column8: Tura Samarianmaya Yus - shuarsha aya Uunt Jesusa Náariin imianiarmiayi . Yusa Wakanínkia Tárachmiayi . Tuma asamtai Pítrusha Juanjai nui jeawar Samarianmaya Yus - shuara Enentáin Yusa Wakaní pimiutkarat tusan Yusan áujtusarmiayi .

text: And were carried over into Sychem , and laid in the sepulchre that Abraham bought for a sum of money of the sons of Emmor the father of Sychem .
text2: Tura atak ukunam ni shuari Sikiam nunkanam ni ukunchin Júkiar iwiarsarmiayi . Kame Sikiam nunkanam Apraámka yaunchu Játsuk Amura Uchirí nunken sumakmiayi . Túramtai nui iwiarsarmiayi ' Tímiayi .
column6: And were carried over into Sychem , and laid in the sepulchre that Abraham bought for a sum of money of the sons of Emmor the father of Sychem .
column8: Tura Samarianmaya Yus - shuarsha aya Uunt Jesusa Náariin imianiarmiayi . Yusa Wakanínkia Tárachmiayi . Tuma asamtai Pítrusha Juanjai nui jeawar Samarianmaya Yus - shuara Enentáin Yusa Wakaní pimiutkarat tusan Yusan áujtusarmiayi .

text: But when the time of the promise drew nigh , which God had sworn to Abraham , the people grew and multiplied in Egypt ,
text2: ` Yus , Apraáman chicharuk " Nekas wi susattajme " Tímiania Nú tsawant jeatemamtai , Ejiptu nunkanam Israer - aents pampanki ti kawenkarmiayi .
column6: But when the time of the promise drew nigh , which God had sworn to Abraham , the people grew and multiplied in Egypt ,
column8: Tura áujsua umikiar Pítiur Juanjai ni uwején Nú Yus - shuaran awantsarmiayi . Nuinkia Yusa Wakaní taramiayi .

text: But when the time of the promise drew nigh , which God had sworn to Abraham , the people grew and multiplied in Egypt ,
text2: ` Yus , Apraáman chicharuk " Nekas wi susattajme " Tímiania Nú tsawant jeatemamtai , Ejiptu nunkanam Israer - aents pampanki ti kawenkarmiayi .
column6: But when the time of the promise drew nigh , which God had sworn to Abraham , the people grew and multiplied in Egypt ,
column8: Tura áujsua umikiar Pítiur Juanjai ni uwején Nú Yus - shuaran awantsarmiayi . Nuinkia Yusa Wakaní taramiayi .

text: Till another king arose , which knew not Joseph .
text2: Nu tsawantincha Ejiptunam Chíkich akupin naamka ámiayi , tura Jusen nekaachmiayi nii .
column6: Till another king arose , which knew not Joseph .
column8: Jesusa akatramuri uweje awasmanum Yusa Wakaní taramtai , Semunsha nuna Wáiniak , kuitjai nu kakarman sumaktaj , Tímiayi .

text: Till another king arose , which knew not Joseph .
text2: Nu tsawantincha Ejiptunam Chíkich akupin naamka ámiayi , tura Jusen nekaachmiayi nii .
column6: Till another king arose , which knew not Joseph .
column8: Jesusa akatramuri uweje awasmanum Yusa Wakaní taramtai , Semunsha nuna Wáiniak , kuitjai nu kakarman sumaktaj , Tímiayi .

text: The same dealt subtilly with our kindred , and evil entreated our fathers , so that they cast out their young children , to the end they might not live .
text2: Nu akupin ii yaunchu uuntrin anankawar yajauch awajiarmiayi . " Atumí Uchirí Kuírchich ana nu ajapa ikiuktiarum " tu wémiayi . Pampankarain tusa Tímiayi .
column6: The same dealt subtilly with our kindred , and evil entreated our fathers , so that they cast out their young children , to the end they might not live .
column8: Tura Jesusa akatramurin chicharuk Tímiayi " Winiasha kuitjai surustarum nu kakaram . Wisha Nútiksanak Nánkamas aentsnum winia uwejur awantsam Yusa Wakaní tarurat tusan tajai " Tímiayi .

text: The same dealt subtilly with our kindred , and evil entreated our fathers , so that they cast out their young children , to the end they might not live .
text2: Nu akupin ii yaunchu uuntrin anankawar yajauch awajiarmiayi . " Atumí Uchirí Kuírchich ana nu ajapa ikiuktiarum " tu wémiayi . Pampankarain tusa Tímiayi .

text: In which time Moses was born , and was exceeding fair , and nourished up in his father ' s house three months :
text2: Tiri iniaisamunam Muisais akiiniamiayi . Muisaisnaka Yus shiir Enentáimtimiai . Tura ni Nukurí menaintiu nantu takusmiayi .
column6: In which time Moses was born , and was exceeding fair , and nourished up in his father ' s house three months :
column8: Tutai Pítiur Tímiayi Semunkan " Ameka Kuítrumjai métek menkakatniuitme . Warí , Yus amaana nu ṡkuitjai sumaktinkiait ?

text: And when he was cast out , Pharaoh ' s daughter took him up , and nourished him for her own son .
text2: Tura Nuyá ajapa ikiuktin jeamtai Entsá apujsamiayi . Uunt Paraunka nawantri Muisaisan wainiak jukimiayi . Achik , ni uchirinia Tímiatrusan Jukí tsakatmarmiayi .
column6: And when he was cast out , Pharaoh ' s daughter took him up , and nourished him for her own son .
column8: Yus esetram Enentáimtachu asam nu Túramu pachistincha penké tujinkiame , Tímiayi .

text: And when he was cast out , Pharaoh ' s daughter took him up , and nourished him for her own son .
text2: Tura Nuyá ajapa ikiuktin jeamtai Entsá apujsamiayi . Uunt Paraunka nawantri Muisaisan wainiak jukimiayi . Achik , ni uchirinia Tímiatrusan Jukí tsakatmarmiayi .

column8: Yus esetram Enentáimtachu asam nu Túramu pachistincha penké tujinkiame , Tímiayi .

text: And Moses was learned in all the wisdom of the Egyptians , and was mighty in words and in deeds .
text2: Tuma asa Muisais Unuimiátrauyayi Ashí Ejiptu aents nékarmia nuna . Túramurisha chichamesha kakarmauyayi . '
column6: And Moses was learned in all the wisdom of the Egyptians , and was mighty in words and in deeds .
column8: Enentáimprata . Túram Yus seata . Enentáimtamna nuna Yus tsankurtamprashtimpiash .

text: And Moses was learned in all the wisdom of the Egyptians , and was mighty in words and in deeds .

text: And when he was full forty years old , it came into his heart to visit his brethren the children of Israel .
text2: Estepan tuke étseruk juna Tímiayi : ` Nuyá Muisais kuarenta ( 40 ) Uwí takaku asa Israer aentsun iyutaj tusa wakerimiayi , ni shuari asamtai .
column6: And when he was full forty years old , it came into his heart to visit his brethren the children of Israel .
column8: Nékajme , tsaankea aintsan Yapá Enentáimin pimiutramkaiti . Tura tunaarmiin Jinkiámua Núniniaitme " Tímiayi .

text: And when he was full forty years old , it came into his heart to visit his brethren the children of Israel .
text2: Estepan tuke étseruk juna Tímiayi : ` Nuyá Muisais kuarenta ( 40 ) Uwí takaku asa Israer aentsun iyutaj tusa wakerimiayi , ni shuari asamtai .

text: And seeing one of them suffer wrong , he defended him , and avenged him that was oppressed , and smote the Egyptian :
text2: Nuyá we Ejiptunmaya aishman ni shuarin Máatasa pujurun Wáinkiamiayi . Tura Muisais ni shuarin ayamprak Ejiptunmaya aishmankan Máamiayi .
column6: And seeing one of them suffer wrong , he defended him , and avenged him that was oppressed , and smote the Egyptian :
column8: Tutai Semun aimkiamiayi " Uunt Yus aujtursatarum . Túrutrumna nuna Túrunawaij tusan tajai " Tímiayi .

text: And seeing one of them suffer wrong , he defended him , and avenged him that was oppressed , and smote the Egyptian :
text2: Nuyá we Ejiptunmaya aishman ni shuarin Máatasa pujurun Wáinkiamiayi . Tura Muisais ni shuarin ayamprak Ejiptunmaya aishmankan Máamiayi .
column6: And seeing one of them suffer wrong , he defended him , and avenged him that was oppressed , and smote the Egyptian :
column8: Tutai Semun aimkiamiayi " Uunt Yus aujtursatarum . Túrutrumna nuna Túrunawaij tusan tajai " Tímiayi .

text: For he supposed his brethren would have understood how that God by his hand would deliver them : but they understood not .
text2: Wíi turamujai Yuska Israer - aentsun uwemtikrattawai , tu nekaamiayi Muisais , Yus timia asamtai . Tura Israer - aencha aintsaran nékainiawai tu Enentáimsamiayi . Túrasha ninkia nekaacharmiayi .
column6: For he supposed his brethren would have understood how that God by his hand would deliver them : but they understood not .
column8: Nuyasha Jesusa akatramuri Jesusa Túramurin Nú aentsun ujakarmiayi . Tura wésar Samaria nunkanam pepru ámunmanka Yus - Chichaman nui etserkiar , nui etserkiar Jerusarénnum waketkiarmiayi .

text: For he supposed his brethren would have understood how that God by his hand would deliver them : but they understood not .
text2: Wíi turamujai Yuska Israer - aentsun uwemtikrattawai , tu nekaamiayi Muisais , Yus timia asamtai . Tura Israer - aencha aintsaran nékainiawai tu Enentáimsamiayi . Túrasha ninkia nekaacharmiayi .
column6: For he supposed his brethren would have understood how that God by his hand would deliver them : but they understood not .
column8: Nuyasha Jesusa akatramuri Jesusa Túramurin Nú aentsun ujakarmiayi . Tura wésar Samaria nunkanam pepru ámunmanka Yus - Chichaman nui etserkiar , nui etserkiar Jerusarénnum waketkiarmiayi .

text: And the next day he shewed himself unto them as they strove , and would have set them at one again , saying , Sirs , ye are brethren ; why do ye wrong one to another ?
text2: Kashin tsawar Muisais ni shuari Jímiar maani pujuinian Wáinkiamiayi . Tura nawamnaikiarat tusa " ṡUrukamtai nuamtak yatsumjaisha yajauch awajniarum ? " Tímiayi .
column6: And the next day he shewed himself unto them as they strove , and would have set them at one again , saying , Sirs , ye are brethren ; why do ye wrong one to another ?
column8: Tura Yus ni suntarin nayaimpinmayan Jiripincha akuptukmiayi . Niisha chicharuk Tímiayi " Wátskea . Juya jiinkim Jerusarénnumia jintia Enkasa péprunam wea Nuní weme , anaraani Wetá . Nú Jíntiaka atsamu nunkanam nankaamawai ' Tímiayi .

text: And the next day he shewed himself unto them as they strove , and would have set them at one again , saying , Sirs , ye are brethren ; why do ye wrong one to another ?
text2: Kashin tsawar Muisais ni shuari Jímiar maani pujuinian Wáinkiamiayi . Tura nawamnaikiarat tusa " ṡUrukamtai nuamtak yatsumjaisha yajauch awajniarum ? " Tímiayi .
column6: And the next day he shewed himself unto them as they strove , and would have set them at one again , saying , Sirs , ye are brethren ; why do ye wrong one to another ?
column8: Tura Yus ni suntarin nayaimpinmayan Jiripincha akuptukmiayi . Niisha chicharuk Tímiayi " Wátskea . Juya jiinkim Jerusarénnumia jintia Enkasa péprunam wea Nuní weme , anaraani Wetá . Nú Jíntiaka atsamu nunkanam nankaamawai ' Tímiayi .

text: But he that did his neighbour wrong thrust him away , saying , Who made thee a ruler and a judge over us ?
text2: Tutai emka nankaama nu Muisaisan Kárut Shitiá " ṡYa amincha ii akuptamin tura ii chichartamin anaitiamkamam ?
column6: But he that did his neighbour wrong thrust him away , saying , Who made thee a ruler and a judge over us ?
column8: Tutai Jiripisha wémiayi . Jintiá wesa Itiupianmaya aishmankan Wáinkiamiayi . Nú aishmansha Itiupia nunka akupniurin , ni naari Kantasen takarniuyayi . Kantaseka Núwauyayi . Tura nu aishman ti neka asa nuna Kuítrin iirniuyayi . Nú aishmansha Yúsan áujsataj tusa Jerusarénnum wéu Wáketmiayi .

text: But he that did his neighbour wrong thrust him away , saying , Who made thee a ruler and a judge over us ?
text2: Tutai emka nankaama nu Muisaisan Kárut Shitiá " ṡYa amincha ii akuptamin tura ii chichartamin anaitiamkamam ?
column6: But he that did his neighbour wrong thrust him away , saying , Who made thee a ruler and a judge over us ?
column8: Tutai Jiripisha wémiayi . Jintiá wesa Itiupianmaya aishmankan Wáinkiamiayi . Nú aishmansha Itiupia nunka akupniurin , ni naari Kantasen takarniuyayi . Kantaseka Núwauyayi . Tura nu aishman ti neka asa nuna Kuítrin iirniuyayi . Nú aishmansha Yúsan áujsataj tusa Jerusarénnum wéu Wáketmiayi .

text: Wilt thou kill me , as thou diddest the Egyptian yesterday ?
text2: ṡWiniasha Maantuátaj tusam wakeramek , yau Ejiptunmaya aishman Máamamna Nútiksamkea ? " Tímiayi .
column6: Wilt thou kill me , as thou diddest the Egyptian yesterday ?
column8: Karetanam enkemar wesa , Yusa etserniuri Isayas aarmia nuna aujki wémiayi .

column8: Karetanam enkemar wesa , Yusa etserniuri Isayas aarmia nuna aujki wémiayi .

text: Then fled Moses at this saying , and was a stranger in the land of Madian , where he begat two sons .
text2: Nuna antuk Muisaiska Matian nunkanam pisar , Nú nunkanam kuarenta ( 40 ) Uwí yajaya aintsan pujumiayi . Nú nunkanam pujus , nuatak , Jimiará uchin yajutmarmiayi .
column6: Then fled Moses at this saying , and was a stranger in the land of Madian , where he begat two sons .
column8: Wats , Jiripi Nú jintianam wéakui , Yusa Wakaní niin Tímiayi " Nú kareta Amayánta . "

text: And when forty years were expired , there appeared to him in the wilderness of mount Sina an angel of the Lord in a flame of fire in a bush .
text2: ` Kuarenta Uwí nankaamas , nu atsamu nunkanam Senai Náinnium Tíjiuch Yusa suntari nayaimpinmaya taa Muisaisan wantintiukmiayi . Numi uchich ukat - ukatin keamunam wantinkiamiayi .
column6: And when forty years were expired , there appeared to him in the wilderness of mount Sina an angel of the Lord in a flame of fire in a bush .
column8: Tura Jiripisha Amayán , Yusa etserniuri Isayasa aarmarin áujun antuk , chicharuk " ṡAujeamna nu nékamek ? " Tímiayi .

text: And when forty years were expired , there appeared to him in the wilderness of mount Sina an angel of the Lord in a flame of fire in a bush .
text2: ` Kuarenta Uwí nankaamas , nu atsamu nunkanam Senai Náinnium Tíjiuch Yusa suntari nayaimpinmaya taa Muisaisan wantintiukmiayi . Numi uchich ukat - ukatin keamunam wantinkiamiayi .
column6: And when forty years were expired , there appeared to him in the wilderness of mount Sina an angel of the Lord in a flame of fire in a bush .
column8: Tura Jiripisha Amayán , Yusa etserniuri Isayasa aarmarin áujun antuk , chicharuk " ṡAujeamna nu nékamek ? " Tímiayi .

text: When Moses saw it , he wondered at the sight : and as he drew near to behold it , the voice of the Lord came unto him ,
text2: Muisais , nuna kean wainiak ashamkamiayi . Tura weantuk iistaj Tukamá Uunt Yusa chichamen antukmiayi .
column6: When Moses saw it , he wondered at the sight : and as he drew near to behold it , the voice of the Lord came unto him ,
column8: Tutai Nú aishman Tímiayi " ṡItiurak nekaataj ? ṡYaki jintintruat ? " Tímiayi . Tura antsu iijiai Wetái tusa , Jiripincha enker jukimiayi karetanam .

text: Saying , I am the God of thy fathers , the God of Abrham , and the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob . Then Moses trembled , and durst not behold .
text2: Yus Tímiayi " Wiitjai Yus . Ame uuntrumi Apraáma Isaka , Jakupa Yúsrintjai " Tímiayi . Tutai antuk Muisaiska ti kuraimiayi sapijin . Tura iistinian tujinmiayi .

column8: Nu Papí aarman áujmia nu Júuyayi : " Murikiua aitkiasan Jákatniunam Júkiarmiayi . Tura uchich murik , ure Tsúpiram chichaatsna Núnisan niisha chichakchamiayi .

text: Then said the Lord to him , Put off thy shoes from thy feet : for the place where thou standest is holy ground .
text2: Nuyá Uunt Yus Tímiayi " Uuntrun shiir awajsataj tusam , ame sapatrum ukuinkiam ikiuktia , wajamna nui Wi pujakui .
column6: Then said the Lord to him , Put off thy shoes from thy feet : for the place where thou standest is holy ground .
column8: Nincha Iniatsárarmiayi . Túrasha penké chichamnaka Tútsuk tsankamakmiayi . Niisha nunkanam iwiaaku Pujá maamu asamtai , ṡyaki nuna áujmatkat ~ i ? " Nuní aarma ámiayi .

text: Then said the Lord to him , Put off thy shoes from thy feet : for the place where thou standest is holy ground .
text2: Nuyá Uunt Yus Tímiayi " Uuntrun shiir awajsataj tusam , ame sapatrum ukuinkiam ikiuktia , wajamna nui Wi pujakui .

text: I have seen , I have seen the affliction of my people which is in Egypt , and I have heard their groaning , and am come down to deliver them . And now come , I will send thee into Egypt .
text2: Nuyá nekaata , Tímiayi . Wíi - aents Ejiptunam Wáitias pujuinia nuna Wáinkiajai . Tura uutainia nunasha antukjai . Tuma asamtai uwemtikrataj tusan tarajai . Wats , akupkatjame ámin . Ejiptunam waketkitia " Yus Tímiayi Muisaisan . '
