text2: Tura nu shuarka Ashí Yusna nekaamnia nuna Yus paant awajsa asamtai pénker nékainiawai .

text: For the invisible things of him from the creation of the world are clearly seen , being understood by the things that are made , even his eternal power and Godhead ; so that they are without excuse :
text2: Kame Yámankamtaikniumia Yus Wáinchataitiat ni najanamurijiai juka paant nekaamniaiti : Nekas Yus asa tuke kakarmaiti . Nusha ti paant asamtai nu shuar tsankurnarchartatui .

text: Because that , when they knew God , they glorified him not as God , neither were thankful ; but became vain in their imaginations , and their foolish heart was darkened .
text2: Yúsan nékainiayat shiir awajsacharmiayi tura yuminsacharmiayi . Tuma ásar aya ántra nunak Enentáimtuiniak ni Enentái tunaajai piakai .

text: Professing themselves to be wise , they became fools ,
text2: Tura ti nekajai Tuíniayat Enentáimcha Núnin ajasarai .

text: And changed the glory of the uncorruptible God into an image made like to corruptible man , and to birds , and fourfooted beasts , and creeping things .
text2: Túmainiak Jákachmin Yus Imiá shiira nuna iniaisar shuar jakamnia nakumkamun shiir awajenawai . Tura nu arant nanamtinniasha napincha kuntinniasha yajasmancha nakumkar nuna shiir awajenawai .

text: Wherefore God also gave them up to uncleanness through the lusts of their own hearts , to dishonour their own bodies between themselves :
text2: Nu asamtai Imiá yajauch Enentáimiainiakui " áanik asati " Tímiayi Yus . Túramtai ti natsanmainian Túrunainiawai .

text: Who changed the truth of God into a lie , and worshipped and served the creature more than the Creator , who is blessed for ever . Amen .
text2: Yusna Imiá nekasa nuna nakitrar antsu wait - chichaman anturkar nuna Túrin ainiawai . Tuke Yúsak shiir awajsatniun iniaisar antsu ni najanamun tikishmatainiak shiir awajenawai . " Antsu tuke Yúsak shiir Awajnastí " tajai .

text: For this cause God gave them up unto vile affections : for even their women did change the natural use into that which is against nature :
text2: Nuna Túrin ásarmatai Yus natsanmainia nuna wakeruktinian tsankatkarmiayi . Túramtai nuwasha aishmanjai tsanintinian nakitrar nuamtak yajauch awajnainiawai .

text: And likewise also the men , leaving the natural use of the woman , burned in their lust one toward another ; men with men working that which is unseemly , and receiving in themselves that recompence of their error which was meet .
text2: Núnisan aishmansha nuwajai tsanintinian iniaisar nuamtak aishmankak tsanirmanainiawai . Ti wakerunainiak ti natsanmainia nuna yajauch Túrunainiawai . Tura yajauch Túruiniak ni ayashi Wáitsatniunak sumamawarmiayi .

text: And even as they did not like to retain God in their knowledge , God gave them over to a reprobate mind , to do those things which are not convenient ;
text2: Tura tuke Yúsan nakitiainia asamtai ti yajauch Enentáimiainiak penké Túrachminia nuna Túrawarti tusa Yus tsankatkarmiayi .

text: Being filled with all unrighteousness , fornication , wickedness , covetousness , maliciousness ; full of envy , murder , debate , deceit , malignity ; whisperers ,
text2: Nu shuar ti tunaajai piaku ainiawai . Tsanirmausha aya Kuítniak wakerincha tura yajauch awajin ainiawai . Nu arantcha awakmakun kajerniusha mankartincha tuke Máanaincha anankartincha pénkercha awajkartincha , tsanumniusha ainiawai .

text: Backbiters , haters of God , despiteful , proud , boasters , inventors of evil things , disobedient to parents ,
text2: Nu arantcha chikichnasha yajauch áujmatin ainiawai . Yúsnasha nakitiainiawai . Aimniusha ainiawai . Tura " pénkeraitjai " tiar nankaamantu Enentáimtumainiawai . Tunáa Túratniun eainiawai . Aparíncha Nukuríncha umirainiatsui .

text: Without understanding , covenantbreakers , without natural affection , implacable , unmerciful :
text2: Enentáincha ainiawai . Tana nuna umichu ainiawai . Anenkartichu ásar waitnenkartichu ainiawai . Tsankurcha ainiawai .

text: Who knowing the judgment of God , that they which commit such things are worthy of death , not only do the same , but have pleasure in them that do them .
text2: Yuska " Shuar nuna Túrinkia Jákatniuiti " taman nékainiayat tuke Túrukin wénawai . Tura nu arantcha Chíkich yajauch Túramtai ti shiir wararenawai .

text: Therefore thou art inexcusable , O man , whosoever thou art that judgest : for wherein thou judgest another , thou condemnest thyself ; for thou that judgest doest the same things .
text2: Amesha Enentáimtumastá . " Shuar nu yajauchin Túrana nu Imiá Tunáa shuaraiti " Tákumka amesha métek Túrakum Imiá nekas sumamame .

text: But we are sure that the judgment of God is according to truth against them which commit such things .
text2: Yuska nu tunaan Túrin ainia nuna Súmamtikiashtinkiait .

text: And thinkest thou this , O man , that judgest them which do such things , and doest the same , that thou shalt escape the judgment of God ?
text2: Amesha nuna Túrin " Imiá yajauchiiti " Táyatam amesha métek Túrakminkia Yus sumamtikiattana Nuyá ṡitiurak uwemprattam ?

text: Or despisest thou the riches of his goodness and forbearance and longsuffering ; not knowing that the goodness of God leadeth thee to repentance ?
text2: Yus ti waitnentrama asa nu Tunáa ikiukim Niin Enentáimtustinian katsuntramuk Nákarmawai . Tura pénker asa Wárik Asutiámchakui sumamashtiniaitjai ṡtu Enentáimtumamek ? Tu Enentáimkium ni waitnentrammari ántar awajsaitme .

text: But after thy hardness and impenitent heart treasurest up unto thyself wrath against the day of wrath and revelation of the righteous judgment of God ;
text2: Tura tunaarum Enentáimtutsuk tuke Túrakmeka Súmamtikiatin tsawantai ti Tunáa irutmampramujai ti Asutniáttame .

text: Who will render to every man according to his deeds :
text2: Nu tsawantai ni Túramujai métek Yus Ashí shuaran akirartatui .

text: To them who by patient continuance in well doing seek for glory and honour and immortality , eternal life :
text2: Shuar tuke pénker Túrak Ashí shiira nunasha tura tuke amuukachmin ainia nunasha wakeruiniana nuna Yus tuke iwiaaku Niijiai shiir pujustinian Súsartatui .

text: But unto them that are contentious , and do not obey the truth , but obey unrighteousness , indignation and wrath ,
text2: Antsu pénkera nuna wakerutsuk antsu aya yajauchin wakeruiniak Yúsan nakitiainia nuna Yus ti kajerak Asutiáwartatui .

text: Tribulation and anguish , upon every soul of man that doeth evil , of the Jew first , and also of the Gentile ;
text2: Nekas Israer - shuarsha tura Núnisan Israer - shuarchasha tunaan Túrin ainiakka ti Wáitsartatui .

text: But glory , honour , and peace , to every man that worketh good , to the Jew first , and also to the Gentile :
text2: Antsu nekas Israer - shuarnasha tura Núnisan Israer - shuarchancha pénker Túrin ainia Núnaka Yus ti shiir imiatkinchanum apujsartatui .

text: For there is no respect of persons with God .
text2: Yus Ashí shuaran akantsuk mai metek iyawai .

text: For as many as have sinned without law shall also perish without law : and as many as have sinned in the law shall be judged by the law ;
text2: Shuar Muisais akupkamun nékatsuk tunaan Túraka aya Júnisan sumamawartatui . Tura shuar Muisais akupkamun nékayat tunaan Túranka nu akupkamujai sumamawartatui .

text: ( For not the hearers of the law are just before God , but the doers of the law shall be justified .
text2: Akupkamun aya antukarua nuka Yusai pénker ainiatsui antsu antukar umirainia nuna Yuska " pénkeraiti " tawai .

text: For when the Gentiles , which have not the law , do by nature the things contained in the law , these , having not the law , are a law unto themselves :
text2: Israer - shuarchaka Muisais akupkamun takakainiachkusha aya ni Enentáijiai nu akupkamun umirainiak

text: Which shew the work of the law written in their hearts , their conscience also bearing witness , and their thoughts the mean while accusing or else excusing one another ; )
text2: nu umireamujai Yus nu akupkamun ni Enentáin ikiursarua nuka paant nekaamniaiti . Nujai métek Túruiniak shiir Enentáimiainiawai . Tura métek Túruiniachkunka pénkercha Enentáimiainiawai .

text: In the day when God shall judge the secrets of men by Jesus Christ according to my gospel .
text2: Wi Uwempratin Chichaman étsereaj nui Ashí shuar uukrisha Túramun Ashí paant awajsartatui . Tura nuna etserkatniun Jesukrístun anaitiukmiayi . Nu tsawantai tunaan Túrin sumamawartatui .

text: Behold , thou art called a Jew , and restest in the law , and makest thy boast of God ,
text2: Ameka " Tura Israer - shuaraitjai . Muisais akupkamun takakkui winia Yúsruka ti shiir Enentáimturui , Tátsumeash .

text: And knowest his will , and approvest the things that are more excellent , being instructed out of the law ;
text2: Yus wakeramuncha nékajai . Tura akupkamun nekaan pénkera nuna wakerajai , Tátsumeash .

text: And art confident that thou thyself art a guide of the blind , a light of them which are in darkness ,
text2: Wakannium kusuraru ainia nunasha jintintiamniaitjai . Tura Tsáapninian nekamtikiawarminiaitjai , Tátsumeash .

text: An instructor of the foolish , a teacher of babes , which hast the form of knowledge and of the truth in the law .
text2: Akupkamu ti penker neka asan nekasa nuna unuimiaruitjai . Tuma asan nékachuncha ántuiniachuncha jintintiamniaitjai " Tátsumeash .

text: Thou therefore which teachest another , teachest thou not thyself ? thou that preachest a man should not steal , dost thou steal ?
text2: Pai , Chíkichka unuiniaitiatmesha ṡurukamtai imia ámeka unuimiatsum ? " Kasamkashtiniaiti " tu étsereatsmek . Táyatmesha ṡurukamtai ámeka kasamam ?

text: Thou that sayest a man should not commit adultery , dost thou commit adultery ? thou that abhorrest idols , dost thou commit sacrilege ?
text2: " Tsanirmashtiniaiti " Tátsumek . Enta , ṡurukamtai ámeka tsanirmam ? " Antar - yusan nakitiajai " Tátsumek . ṡUrukamtai ámeka nu yusa jeenia kasamam ?

text: Thou that makest thy boast of the law , through breaking the law dishonourest thou God ?
text2: Akupkamun takakjai tusam shiir Enentáimtumayatam nu akupkamu umireachkum Yus yajauch awajeatsmek .

text: For the name of God is blasphemed among the Gentiles through you , as it is written .
text2: Yus - Papiniumsha Núnis aarmaiti : " Atum pénker umirchamujai Israer - shuarcha Yúsan yajauch chicharainiawai . "

text: For circumcision verily profiteth , if thou keep the law : but if thou be a breaker of the law , thy circumcision is made uncircumcision .
text2: Muisais akupkamia nu Ashí umireakmeka nii timia Núnismek tsupirnaktin pénkeraiti . Tura takamtsuk umireachkumka tsupirnakcha Núnisketme .

text: Therefore if the uncircumcision keep the righteousness of the law , shall not his uncircumcision be counted for circumcision ?
text2: Chíkich shuarsha tsupirnakchaitiat Muisais akupkamun umireakka tsupirnatskesha tsupirnakua aintsankete .

text: And shall not uncircumcision which is by nature , if it fulfil the law , judge thee , who by the letter and circumcision dost transgress the law ?
text2: Nu shuar tsupirnakchaitiat akupkamun Ashí umireak atumin tsupirnakutirmin akupkamu takakuitiatrum umircha asakrumin Súmamtikramawartatui .

text: But he is a Jew , which is one inwardly ; and circumcision is that of the heart , in the spirit , and not in the letter ; whose praise is not of men , but of God .
text2: Kame nekas Israer - shuarka aya Pátatkechu antsu tuke Enentáijiai Yúsnan wakera Núiti . Núnisan nekas tsupirnaktinkia aya Ayashíjiainchuiti antsu Enentáiniam shiir átinia Núiti . Nekas akupkamu aya aarchamuiti antsu nekas Enentáijiai umirkamua Núiti . Nekas Tú tura Núnaka aents shiir Enentáimtuiniachkuisha Yus shiir Enentáimtawai .

text: What advantage then hath the Jew ? or what profit is there of circumcision ?
text2: Núnis aisha Israer - shuar ainia nu ṡWarí pénkernak takakainia ? Tura tsupirnaktincha ṡwariniak Yayá ?

text: Much every way : chiefly , because that unto them were committed the oracles of God .
text2: Ti pénkeraiti . Warí , émkaka , Yus ni chichamen Israer - shuaran Súsacharmakia .

text: For what if some did not believe ? shall their unbelief make the faith of God without effect ?
text2: Kame Chíkich Chíkich umichu ainiakui Yus tsankatkamia nuna Nú shuaran Súsachmatainkia nuikia " Yus umichuiti " ṡTítinkiait ?

text: God forbid : yea , let God be true , but every man a liar ; as it is written , That thou mightest be justified in thy sayings , and mightest overcome when thou art judged .
text2: Pénkea . Antsu Yuska nekas Túratniua nujai métek Ashí Túriniaiti . Shuar umichu ainiakuisha ni Támarin mash umiktatui . Ni tamajai Shuáran Wáitrin awajeakka nusha pénkeraiti . Núnisan Atí . Yus - Papisha métek tawai : " Támena nuna " Imiá nekasaiti " tiartatui , tura Súmamtikramataj Tuíniakuisha nupetmaktatme " tawai .

text: But if our unrighteousness commend the righteousness of God , what shall we say ? Is God unrighteous who taketh vengeance ? ( I speak as a man )
text2: Nu arantcha , " Wi tunaan Túramujai Yus Imiá pénkera nuna paant awajeakka ṡurukamtai winia asutiua ? ṡNuka pénkerkait ? " Tíchatapash . ( Kame aents chichainia Núnisnak tajai . )

text: God forbid : for then how shall God judge the world ?
text2: Warí , Yus pénkerchaitkiunka ṡitiurak Ashí shuara tunaarin Súmamtikiawarat ? Kame Imiá pénkeraiti .

text: For if the truth of God hath more abounded through my lie unto his glory ; why yet am I also judged as a sinner ?
text2: Núnisan , " Wi umirkachmajai Yus tuke umiiniana nuna paant awajeaknaka nuikia nujai iin shiir awajsamtai ṡurukamtai " tunaitme " Túruta ? " Tíchatapash .

text: And not rather , ( as we be slanderously reported , and as some affirm that we say , ) Let us do evil , that good may come ? whose damnation is just .
text2: Warí , " Tunáa Túramujai Yúsan pénker awajeajai , " Tú nekas Enentáimpramniaitkiuinkia shuar nuikia " Wats , Ashí pénker áti tusar Tunáa Túratai " Tímin ainti . Kame Chíkich shuar iin kajertamainiak " nuna jintintiainiawai " Túramji . Nu shuar sumamawartin ainiawai .

text: What then ? are we better than they ? No , in no wise : for we have before proved both Jews and Gentiles , that they are all under sin ;
text2: Nuikia Israer - shuartikia chikichjai nankaamas ṡpénkerkaitiaj ~ i ? Penkesha . Warí , Israer - shuartisha Israer - shuarchajaisha Ashí métekrak tunaan Túrin ainiawai . Núnaka Jú aarmajai paant awajsaitjai .

text: As it is written , There is none righteous , no , not one :
text2: Yus - Papisha Núnisan tawai : " Pénkeran Túrin chikichkisha atsawai .

text: There is none that understandeth , there is none that seeketh after God .
text2: Yúsnan nekaatniun nakitiainiawai . Yusnasha eainiatsui .

text: They are all gone out of the way , they are together become unprofitable ; there is none that doeth good , no , not one .
text2: Yusnumia kanakiar menkakatniunam wénawai . Chikichkisha pénkeran Túrin penké atsawai .

text: Their throat is an open sepulchre ; with their tongues they have used deceit ; the poison of asps is under their lips :
text2: Ashí yajauch chichainiak iwiarsamu yama urainiua Núnisan ainiawai . Ni chichamejai tuke anankartin ainiawai . Chichame Napía aintsan najamin ainiawai .

text: Whose mouth is full of cursing and bitterness :
text2: Aya yajauchin kakaram áujmatin ainiawai .

text: Their feet are swift to shed blood :
text2: Máataj tusa Wárik yujarin ainiawai .

text: Destruction and misery are in their ways :
text2: Aya ti itiurchat ti yajauch awajin ainiawai .

text: And the way of peace have they not known :
text2: Shiir pujustinian nékainiatsui .

text: There is no fear of God before their eyes .
text2: Ishichkisha Yúsan ashamenatsui . "

text: Now we know that what things soever the law saith , it saith to them who are under the law : that every mouth may be stopped , and all the world may become guilty before God .
text2: Yaunchu akupkamun umirkatin ainia Nú shuar aya Tákamtak umirkatin ainiawai . Tuma asamtai Ashí shuar umirkachu ásarmatai Yus nujai Súmamtikiawartatui . Túrakui niisha pachischamin ainiawai .

text: Therefore by the deeds of the law there shall no flesh be justified in his sight : for by the law is the knowledge of sin .
text2: Akupkamuka aya ii tunaarin paant awajturmaji . Tuma asamtai akupkamu pénker umirkatniujai Yus " pénkeraitme " turamchamniaitji .

text: But now the righteousness of God without the law is manifested , being witnessed by the law and the prophets ;
text2: Yus - Chicham yaunchu aarmanum itiura Yus iin " pénkeraitme " Túramminiaitiaj nuna paant tawai . Kame akupkamujainchuiti .

text: Even the righteousness of God which is by faith of Jesus Christ unto all and upon all them that believe : for there is no difference :
text2: Antsu iisha Ashí shuarsha Núnisan aya Jesukrístu shiir Enentáimtakrin Yus " pénkeraitme " Túramminiaitji .

text: For all have sinned , and come short of the glory of God ;
text2: Kame Ashí shuarti Tunáa Túraitji . Tuma asar Yusjai métek pénker ajastin penké jeatsji .

text: Being justified freely by his grace through the redemption that is in Christ Jesus :
text2: Tura Yus iin waitnentrama asa Kuítchajai " pénkeraitme " Túramji . Jesukrístujai uwemtikrampra asa Túramji .

text: Whom God hath set forth to be a propitiation through faith in his blood , to declare his righteousness for the remission of sins that are past , through the forbearance of God ;
text2: Tura Krístun akupkamiayi ni jakamujai Ashí tunaan Asakátratniun . Túramtai shuar Niin nekas Enentáimtuiniakui Yus tsankuramniaiti . Yaunchu Tunáa Túramun katsunteak Enentáimtuschamiayi . Yamái tsankuramnia nuna yaunchu Nekáa , nuna Túramniuyayi .

text: To declare , I say , at this time his righteousness : that he might be just , and the justifier of him which believeth in Jesus .
text2: Tura yamaiya tunaancha tsankureak Ashí shuar Jesusan nekas Enentáimtuinia nuna " pénkeraitme " tuke Tíminiaiti . Kristu jakamujai nuka paant ajasai .

text: Where is boasting then ? It is excluded . By what law ? of works ? Nay : but by the law of faith .
text2: Nújainkia ii pénker ajasjinia nu " winia kakarmarjai Túrunajai " Tíchamnia asar ṡnankaamantu Enentáimtumarminkaitiaj ~ i ? Penkesha . Warí , akupkamu umitsuk aya Kristu nekas Enentáimtakrin Yus " pénkeraitme " Túramji .

text: Therefore we conclude that a man is justified by faith without the deeds of the law .
text2: Nujai Páantaiti . Akupkamu umirtsuk aya Jesukrístu shiir Enentáimtakrin Yus " pénkeraitme " Túramminiaitji .

text: Is he the God of the Jews only ? is he not also of the Gentiles ? Yes , of the Gentiles also :
text2: Warí , Yuska Israer - shuarnasha tura Núnisan Israer - shuarchancha mai ni Yúsrinchukait .

text: Seeing it is one God , which shall justify the circumcision by faith , and uncircumcision through faith .
text2: Kame aya chikichik Yúschakait . Tura tsupirnakuncha tsupirnakchancha mai metek aya Jesukrístun nekas Enentáimtuiniakui " pénkeraitme " Tíminiaiti .

text: Do we then make void the law through faith ? God forbid : yea , we establish the law .
text2: Shuar Yúsan shiir Enentáimtamujai pénker ajastin ainiakui nujai ṡakupkamu ántar awajsamukait ? Atsá . Antsu nuna nankaamas umirkatin awajsamuiti .

text: What shall we say then that Abraham our father , as pertaining to the flesh , hath found ?
text2: Ashí Israer - shuara uuntri Apraám Enentáimtustai . Niisha ṡitiurak Yusjai pénker ajasma ?

text: For what saith the scripture ? Abraham believed God , and it was counted unto him for righteousness .
text2: Ni pénker takasmajai Yusjai pénker ajasuitkiunka nankaamantu Enentáimtumarainti . Antsu Yus - Papí tawai : " Apraám Yúsan shiir Enentáimtakui Yus " pénkeraitme " Tímiayi " tawai . Nu Túramu asa Apraámsha Yus iimmianum nankaamantu Enentáimprachminiaiti .

text: Now to him that worketh is the reward not reckoned of grace , but of debt .
text2: Shuar íniamna nu takasmatai ṡaya tsanka asam akiktatmek ? Warí , ni takasmanum Páchitsuk akikchatniukait .

text: But to him that worketh not , but believeth on him that justifieth the ungodly , his faith is counted for righteousness .
text2: Antsu shuar ni pénker turamuri enentaimtsuk áyatik " Yus Tunáa shuaran pénker awajniuiti " tu Enentáimtakui Yuska tsanka asa " pénkeraitme " tawai .

text: Even as David also describeth the blessedness of the man , unto whom God imputeth righteousness without works ,
text2: Tura pénker Túrachunak Yus " pénkeraitme " takui nu shuar shiir warasminiaiti . Núnisan tawai uunt akupin Tawit :

text: Saying , Blessed are they whose iniquities are forgiven , and whose sins are covered .
text2: " Shuar Ashí ni tunaarin Yus Asakátar tsankuramu ana nuka shiir Enentáimpramniaiti .

text: Blessed is the man to whom the Lord will not impute sin .
text2: Uunt Yus ni tunaarin Enentáimtachma asa ti warasminiaiti . " Tu Tímiayi Tawit .

text: Cometh this blessedness then upon the circumcision only , or upon the uncircumcision also ? for we say that faith was reckoned to Abraham for righteousness .
text2: ṡAya tsupirnakukeash warasminiait ? Tura tsupirnakchasha waraschamniakait . Warí , Apraám Yúsan shiir Enentáimtakui Yus " pénkeraitme " Tímiayi .

text: How was it then reckoned ? when he was in circumcision , or in uncircumcision ? Not in circumcision , but in uncircumcision .
text2: Tura Apraám tuke tsupirnatsain Yus nuna Tímiayi . Emka Yus " pénkeraitme " timia Nú ukunam Apraám tsupirnakmiayi .

text: And he received the sign of circumcision , a seal of the righteousness of the faith which he had yet being uncircumcised : that he might be the father of all them that believe , though they be not circumcised ; that righteousness might be imputed unto them also :
text2: Apraám tsupirnatsuk Yúsan shiir Enentáimtusmatai Yus " pénkeraitme " tusa " tsupirnaktiniaitme " Tímiayi . Nújainkia Ashí Yúsan shiir Enentáimtuinia Nú shuar tsupirnatskesha Apraám Weeá ainiawai . Tura nu shuaran Yus " pénkeraitme " tawai .

text: And the father of circumcision to them who are not of the circumcision only , but who also walk in the steps of that faith of our father Abraham , which he had being yet uncircumcised .
text2: Tsupirnakusha aya tsupirnaku asa Apraám Weeá ainiatsui antsu nu arant Apraámjai métek Yúsan shiir Enentáimtuinia nuka Apraám Weeá ainiawai . Kame Apraám tuke tsupirnatsuk Yúsan shiir Enentáimtusmiayi .

text: For the promise , that he should be the heir of the world , was not to Abraham , or to his seed , through the law , but through the righteousness of faith .
text2: Yaunchu Apraáman Yus chicharuk " Amincha amée Weeá shuarnasha Jú nunkan susattajai " Tímiayi . Nunasha Apraám Yus akupkamun umireakui Tíchamiayi . Antsu Apraám Yúsan nekas Enentáimtakui Yus " pénkeraitme " taku nuna tsankatkamiayi .

text: For if they which are of the law be heirs , faith is made void , and the promise made of none effect :
text2: Kame aya akupkamun umirniun Súsatniuitkiuinkia nuikia Yus Enentáimtustin ántraiti . Tura Yus Apraáman timia nusha ántraiti .

text: Because the law worketh wrath : for where no law is , there is no transgression .
text2: Akupkamu akui shuar umirkachka ti Asutniáshtatuak . Tura atsakuinkia ṡAsutniátniukait ? ṡItiurak umirtsuk ikiuktin ?

text: Therefore it is of faith , that it might be by grace ; to the end the promise might be sure to all the seed ; not to that only which is of the law , but to that also which is of the faith of Abraham ; who is the father of us all ,
text2: Tuma asamtai Yus ti anenkartin asa Niin nekas Enentáimtuinian Ashí tsankatkaiti . Nújainkia Apraám weeasha Yus Apraáman timia nuna Páchitsuk Wáinkiártatui . Iisha Apraámjai métek Yus nekas Enentáimtakur Ní weeaitji . Tuma asamtai Muisais akupkamun umirniuncha tura umirniuchuncha mai metek Ashí iin Yus Ashí Apraáman timia nuna tsankatramkattaji .

text: ( As it is written , I have made thee a father of many nations , ) before him whom he believed , even God , who quickeneth the dead , and calleth those things which be not as though they were .
text2: Kame Yus - Papinium Apraám aatramuiti : " Untsurí shuarsha amée Weeá ajasartatui . " Nu asamtai iisha Apraámjai métek Yus shiir Enentáimtakrinkia Yus incha Apraám Weeá aintsan iirmaji . Nú Yuska ti kakaram asa jakancha iwiaaku awajniuiti ; tura atsana nunasha ana Nútiksan Nájanui .

text: Who against hope believed in hope , that he might become the father of many nations ; according to that which was spoken , So shall thy seed be .
text2: Yus " ti pampantatme " takui Apraám ti uuntach áyat Yus timian Enentáimtak yajutmartinian Nákasmiayi . Nujai Untsurí shuar Ní Weeá ajasarmiayi , Yus timia aintsan .

text: He staggered not at the promise of God through unbelief ; but was strong in faith , giving glory to God ;
text2: Apraámsha sian ( 100 ) Uwí takakuitiat tura ni nuwé Sarasha Júretsuk uunt ajasmataisha tuke iniaitsuk Yus Tímia nuna nekas Enentáimtusmiayi . " Yus nekasash ta " Tútsuk shiir awajsamiayi . Nujaisha nuna nankaamas kakaram ajasmiayi .

text: And being fully persuaded that , what he had promised , he was able also to perform .
text2: Tuma asa " nekas Yus tana nuna Páchitsuk umiktatui " tu Enentáimpramiayi .

text: And therefore it was imputed to him for righteousness .
text2: Nu asamtai Yus " pénkeraitme " Tímiayi .

text: Now it was not written for his sake alone , that it was imputed to him ;
text2: Tura Yus nekas Enentáimtamunam Yus " pénkeraitme " tana nu aya Apraámnak aatrachmaiti .

text: Who was delivered for our offences , and was raised again for our justification .
text2: Antsu incha Túramji . Iisha Núnisrik ii Uuntri Jesus nekas Enentáimtakrinkia Yus incha " pénkeraitme " turamtatji . Jesuska ii tunaarin jarutramkatniun surunkamiayi . Tura nujai Yus iin " pénkeraitrume " taku Jesusan ataksha iniantkimiayi .

text: Therefore being justified by faith , we have peace with God through our Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: Tuma asamtai Yus nekas Enentáimtakrin Yus " pénkeraitme " Túramji . Nujai iisha Yusjai shiir nawamnaikiar pujaji . Núnaka ii Uuntri Jesukrístu ni jakamujai sumartamkamiaji .

text: By whom also we have access by faith into this grace wherein we stand , and rejoice in hope of the glory of God .
text2: Tura Nii shiir Enentáimtakur Yusai weankaitji . Tura Kristu jarutramkakrin Yus ti anenmaji . Tura tuke anenma asakrin Niijiai métek shiir ajastin Nákakur waraaji .

text: And not only so , but we glory in tribulations also : knowing that tribulation worketh patience ;
text2: Nu arantcha Yamái itiurchat pujayatrik nu itiurchatjai unuimiartatji tusar waraaji . Katsuntratniuncha unuitiamji .

text: And patience , experience ; and experience , hope :
text2: Tura nu unuimiarar ii katsuntramu paant átatui . Tura Nuyá Yus ti shiir awajtamsattajnia nuka shiir Enentáijiai Nákastatji .

text: And hope maketh not ashamed ; because the love of God is shed abroad in our hearts by the Holy Ghost which is given unto us .
text2: Nu ti shiir Enentáimsar Nákamujai ananmamtsuji . Yuska ni Shiir Wakanin ii Enentáin pujurtamuk ni anenkartutairin ti paant awajturmaji . Tuma asamtai Yus Túratin Nákajnia nu Imiá nekas wainkiattaji .

text: For when we were yet without strength , in due time Christ died for the ungodly .
text2: Iikkia penké uwemprachmin asakrin tsawant jeamtai Kristu Ashí shuara tunaarin jarukmiayi .

text: For scarcely for a righteous man will one die : yet peradventure for a good man some would even dare to die .
text2: Shuar Chíkich shuaran uwemtikratniun ṡjaruktatuak ? Pénker shuar ain jarukchattawai . Kame ti penkeraitkiuinkia jarukchaintiash .

text: But God commendeth his love toward us , in that , while we were yet sinners , Christ died for us .
text2: Antsu ii tuke Tunáa árinin Kristu jarutramkamiaji . Nujai iin ti anenmajnia nuna ti paant iniakturmaji .

text: Much more then , being now justified by his blood , we shall be saved from wrath through him .
text2: Tura ni numpejai tunaarincha awajsamu asar Imiá nekas Yus Asutiámatniua Nuyá uwempraitji .

text: For if , when we were enemies , we were reconciled to God by the death of his Son , much more , being reconciled , we shall be saved by his life .
text2: Yusa nemasri áyatar Yusa Uchirí jakamujai yamaikia Yusjai shiir nawamnaikiar pujaji . Nu arant nuikia Kristu tuke iwiaaku asa iijiai tsaninkiu asa Ashí yajauchinmaya uwemtikramar tuke shiir awajtamsattaji .

text: And not only so , but we also joy in God through our Lord Jesus Christ , by whom we have now received the atonement .
text2: Ii Uuntri Jesukrístu jakamujai Yusjai shiir nawamnaikia asar ti waraaji .

text: Wherefore , as by one man sin entered into the world , and death by sin ; and so death passed upon all men , for that all have sinned :
text2: Ayu . Yámankamtaik emka aishman Atan ninki tunaan Túramtai Nú tunaajai Ashí shuar tunaarintin ajasarmiayi . Tura Ashí tunaarintin ajasar mash Jákatin ainiawai .

text: ( For until the law sin was in the world : but sin is not imputed when there is no law .
text2: Akupkamu atsakuinkia umirkachma nekaachminiaiti . Tuma ain Muisais akupkamu atsaisha tuke tunaan Túrin ármiayi .

text: Nevertheless death reigned from Adam to Moses , even over them that had not sinned after the similitude of Adam ' s transgression , who is the figure of him that was to come .
text2: Atan pujumia Nuyá Muisais tuke akupeatsain shuara tunaari paantcha ain Ashí shuar tunaan Túrawar Jákarmiayi . Kame ni tunaari Atanna aintsachauyayi . Atanka Yus akupkamu paant ujakman umirkachmiayi . Antsu nu shuar Yus akupkamu paant nékainiachiatan tunaan Túrin ainiak Jákarmiayi . Tura Atanka Krístujai apatkar Enentáimpratai .

text: But not as the offence , so also is the free gift . For if through the offence of one many be dead , much more the grace of God , and the gift by grace , which is by one man , Jesus Christ , hath abounded unto many .
text2: Atan Tunáa Túramia nujai apatka iisam , Yus iin tsankatramaj nuka nankaamas pénkeraiti . Kame Atan ninki tunaan Túramujai Ashí aents Untsurí armia nu , tunaarintin ainiak , Jákarmiayi . Tura Yus iin ti anenma asa chikichik aishmanjai nuna nankaamas Tí shiiran tsankatramaji . Jesukrístujainkia Untsurí shuaran uwemtikrar ti shiiran tsankateawai .

text: And not as it was by one that sinned , so is the gift : for the judgment was by one to condemnation , but the free gift is of many offences unto justification .
text2: Atanka tunaari Imiá yajauch ain nuna nankaamas pénkeran Yus tsankatramkaitji . Iis , aya chikichik tunaan Túramujai aents sumamawarmiayi . Antsu Yus uwempratniun tsankatramaj Nújainkia ti Untsurí tunaan Asakáruiti , tura " pénkeraitme " Túramji .

text: For if by one man ' s offence death reigned by one ; much more they which receive abundance of grace and of the gift of righteousness shall reign in life by one , Jesus Christ . )
text2: Chikichik aishman tunaan Túramujai aents Jákatin ainiawai . Tura nuna nankaamas chikichik aishman Jesukrístu Túramujai ti shiir pujustatji . Kame Yus ti anenma asa ii pénker Túratsrinin " pénkeraitrume " Túramji . Nu asamtai yamaram iwiaakmanum kakaram ajaji .

text: Therefore as by the offence of one judgment came upon all men to condemnation ; even so by the righteousness of one the free gift came upon all men unto justification of life .
text2: Atan tunaan Túramujai Ashí tunaarintin ajasar Jákarmiayi . Núnisan Jesukrístu pénker Túramujai Ashí shuar Yus " pénkeraitme " timia nuka yamaram iwiaakmajai tuke pujusartatui .

text: For as by one man ' s disobedience many were made sinners , so by the obedience of one shall many be made righteous .
text2: Núnisan chikichik aishman umirkachmajai Untsurí tunaarintin ajasarmiayi . Tura chikichik aishman umirkamujai Untsurí shuar pénker awajnasarmiayi .

text: Moreover the law entered , that the offence might abound . But where sin abounded , grace did much more abound :
text2: Wats , Tunáa ti paant Atí tusa Yus ni akupkamurin susamiayi . Túrasha ti Tunáa pampaakui Yus nuna nankaamas waitnentramak nu tunaan Asakátramji .

text: That as sin hath reigned unto death , even so might grace reign through righteousness unto eternal life by Jesus Christ our Lord .
text2: Shuar tunaan Túrin ásar Jákatin ármiayi . Tura Núnisan ii Uuntri Jesukrístu Túramujai Yus iin " pénkeraitrume " Túramkurin iisha tuke iwiaaku pujustiniaitji .

text: What shall we say then ? Shall we continue in sin , that grace may abound ?
text2: Núnisaitkiuinkia Yus nankaamas waitnentrampratai tusar ṡTunáa Túrattajik ?

text: God forbid . How shall we , that are dead to sin , live any longer therein ?
text2: Pénkea . Warí , iikia Tunáa Túrashtin Jákaitji . Jákaka ṡitiurak tunaan Túramniait ?

text: Know ye not , that so many of us as were baptized into Jesus Christ were baptized into his death ?
text2: Imianniutikia Krístujai tsaninkiu asar imianir Niijiai métek jaka aintsar aji .

text: Therefore we are buried with him by baptism into death : that like as Christ was raised up from the dead by the glory of the Father , even so we also should walk in newness of life .
text2: Tura imianir Krístujai jaka aintsar métek iwiarnasuitji . Tura Yus ti kakaram asa Krístun jakan iniantkimia Núnisan incha nu kakarmajai yamaram Enentáijiai pénker wekasatniun iniantamkimiaji .

text: For if we have been planted together in the likeness of his death , we shall be also in the likeness of his resurrection :
text2: Krístujai tsaninkiu asar Niijiai métek jaka aintsanketji . Tura Núnisan Niijiai métek nantaktiniaitji .

text: Knowing this , that our old man is crucified with him , that the body of sin might be destroyed , that henceforth we should not serve sin .
text2: Yaunchu Enentáimtainkia Krístujai métek jaka asamtai ii yajauch wakerutain Emenkátrutmakuitji . Tuma asamtai yamaikia penké umirkashtiniaitji .

text: For he that is dead is freed from sin .
text2: Kame ṡJákaka itiurak tunaan Túrat ? Yamaikia ankant ajasuitji .

text: Now if we be dead with Christ , we believe that we shall also live with him :
text2: Iisha nekas Krístujai Jákaitkiurkia Niijiai métek tuke iwiaaku pujustin Enentáimji .

text: Knowing that Christ being raised from the dead dieth no more ; death hath no more dominion over him .
text2: Kame Krístuka Chikichkí jaka nantakin asa atakka Jákashtatui . Túmaitkiui atakka ajakrachminiaiti .

text: For in that he died , he died unto sin once : but in that he liveth , he liveth unto God .
text2: Kristu Chikichkí jaka asa Ashí tunaajai itit awajsachmin Ajasuíti . Tura yamaikia iwiaaku Pujá asa Yúsan shiir awajsatniun pujawai .

text: Likewise reckon ye also yourselves to be dead indeed unto sin , but alive unto God through Jesus Christ our Lord .
text2: Atumsha Núnisrumek jaka aintsarum Tunáa Túrachmin Enentáimtumastarum . Antsu ii Uuntri Jesukrístujai tsaninkiu asarum iwiaaku pujakrum Yus shiir awajsatarum .

text: Let not sin therefore reign in your mortal body , that ye should obey it in the lusts thereof .
text2: Nu asamtai tunaaka ayashmiin akuptamkashtiniaitrume . Ayashí wakeramuri umirkashtiniaitrume . Ankantaitrume .

text: Neither yield ye your members as instruments of unrighteousness unto sin : but yield yourselves unto God , as those that are alive from the dead , and your members as instruments of righteousness unto God .
text2: Atumi Ayashí tunaan Túrat tusarum ikiasairap . Antsu jakamunmaya nantakin asarum Yus wakeramu Túratin surumaktarum . Tura ayashmisha aya pénkernak Túratí tusarum Yus iiktustarum .

text: For sin shall not have dominion over you : for ye are not under the law , but under grace .
text2: Akupkamu umirkatniujai iwiaaku pujatsrume . Antsu atumin Yus ti anenma asa yamaram iwiaakman suramsaitrume . Tuma asamtai yamaikia tunaaka nupettamkachminiaiti .

text: What then ? shall we sin , because we are not under the law , but under grace ? God forbid .
text2: Nuikia akupkamu umirtsuk antsu Yus ti anenma asakrin iwiaaku pujakur ṡ " Páchitsuk tunaan Túramniaitjai " Títiatjik ? Pénkea .

text: Know ye not , that to whom ye yield yourselves servants to obey , his servants ye are to whom ye obey ; whether of sin unto death , or of obedience unto righteousness ?
text2: Tuke umireajnia nuna takarniurintji . Nuka nékatsrumek . Tura ni takarin ajasam umirkatniuitme . Tuma asamtai Tunáa umirkurkia ni takarniurintji tura umirkar jakattaji . Tura Yus umirkurkia pénker wekasattaji .

text: But God be thanked , that ye were the servants of sin , but ye have obeyed from the heart that form of doctrine which was delivered you .
text2: Atumsha Yáunchuka Tunáa umirniuitiatrum ikiukrum yamaikia nekas chicham antukurmena nu nekas Atumí Enentáijiai umirkaitrume . Tuma asamtai Yus ti yuminsatniuiti .

text: Being then made free from sin , ye became the servants of righteousness .
text2: Yamaikia tunaanumia ankant ajasu asarum ti pénker wekasatniunam pachiinkiaitrume .

text: I speak after the manner of men because of the infirmity of your flesh : for as ye have yielded your members servants to uncleanness and to iniquity unto iniquity ; even so now yield your members servants to righteousness unto holiness .
text2: Paant nekaak tusan takarniun pachisan Tájarme . Wats , yaunchu Atumí ayashi Muíjmiainian tura Ashí yajauchin Túrat tusarum tsankamakmarme . Núnisrumek yamaikia Atumí ayashi pénkeran Túrat tusarum tura tuke Yusjai shiir wekasat tusarum tsankamaktarum .

text: For when ye were the servants of sin , ye were free from righteousness .
text2: Atumsha Tunáa umirniuyarme nuikia pénker wekaichauyarme .

text: What fruit had ye then in those things whereof ye are now ashamed ? for the end of those things is death .
text2: Tura Nújaisha ṡWarí pénkerna Yáinmakmarum ? Iista , Yamái natsanmainchakait . Nusha Jákatniunam Júawai .

text: But now being made free from sin , and become servants to God , ye have your fruit unto holiness , and the end everlasting life .
text2: Antsu yamaikia , tunaanumia uwempra asarum Yus umirniuitrume . Antsu juka Yusjai shiir wekasatniunam Júawai tura Nuyá tuke iwiaaku pujustatrume .

text: For the wages of sin is death ; but the gift of God is eternal life through Jesus Christ our Lord .
text2: Tunáa takarkumka tuke Jákatniun akirmaktatui . Antsu Yuska iikia takaatsrinin penké ántar tuke iwiaaku pujustinian suramsattaji . Ii Uuntri Jesukrístujai tsaninkia Pujá asakrin nuna Túrutmattaji .

text: Know ye not , brethren , ( for I speak to them that know the law , ) how that the law hath dominion over a man as long as he liveth ?
text2: Enentáimpratarum yatsuru . Jákaka akupkachminiaiti . Aya iwiaakna nu akupkamniaiti . Nu paant nékatsrumek .

text: For the woman which hath an husband is bound by the law to her husband so long as he liveth ; but if the husband be dead , she is loosed from the law of her husband .
text2: Wats , nuwa Nuátkamu ni aishri iwiaakkui niijiai tsanin pujustiniaiti . Tura aishri jakamtai ankant ajawai .

text: So then if , while her husband liveth , she be married to another man , she shall be called an adulteress : but if her husband be dead , she is free from that law ; so that she is no adulteress , though she be married to another man .
text2: Tuma asamtai aishri iwiaakain Chíkich aishmanjai Tsaníakka tsanirmawai . Tura ni aishri jakamtai Chíkich aishmanjai Páchitsuk nuatnakminiaiti tura nuikia tsanirmatsui .

text: Wherefore , my brethren , ye also are become dead to the law by the body of Christ ; that ye should be married to another , even to him who is raised from the dead , that we should bring forth fruit unto God .
text2: Núnisrumek atumsha , yatsuru , Kristu Ayashí muchitmari ajasu asarum akupkamu emettachmin jaka aintsarum ajasuitrume . Túrakrum Krístujai nuatnaikiatin aintsarum ankantaitrume . Niisha jakamunmaya nantakniuiti . Yamaikia Krístunu ajasu asar Niijiai tsaninkiar Yus wakeramu pénker Túratniuitji .

text: For when we were in the flesh , the motions of sins , which were by the law , did work in our members to bring forth fruit unto death .
text2: Yaunchu wakerutai umirniuyaj nui akupkamu Enentáimtusar nuna nankaamas yajauchia nu wakerimji tura Jákatniunam juramkimji .

text: But now we are delivered from the law , that being dead wherein we were held ; that we should serve in newness of spirit , and not in the oldness of the letter .
text2: Antsu yamaikia akupkamu emettachmin jaka asar ankant ajasuitji . Túrunar akupkamu yaunchu aarma nu iniaisar yamaikia Yusa Wakaníjiai Tsaníakur yamaram iwiaakmajai pénker wekasamniaitji .

text: What shall we say then ? Is the law sin ? God forbid . Nay , I had not known sin , but by the law : for I had not known lust , except the law had said , Thou shalt not covet .
text2: Núnisaitkiuinkia " Akupkamu yajauchiiti " ṡtitiajiash ? Atsá . Warí , akupkamuka tunaan ti paant awajeawai . Akupkamu " Chikichna wakerukaip " Táchakuinkia wakerukchaajai .

text: But sin , taking occasion by the commandment , wrought in me all manner of concupiscence . For without the law sin was dead .
text2: Tura nu akupkamun Enentáimtakui winia Enentáirui Tunáa ana nu Ashí yajauchin ti wakerumtikrimiayi . Kame akupkamu atsakui tunaan ti Enentáimtichaintjai .

text: For I was alive without the law once : but when the commandment came , sin revived , and I died .
text2: Yaunchu akupkamun nékachkun Nánkamsanak Enentáimniuyajai . Tura akupkamun nekaan tunaan nekaamjai tura jaka aintsanak ajasjai .

text: And the commandment , which was ordained to life , I found to be unto death .
text2: Tuma asamtai akupkamujai pénker wekasatniuitiatan umirkatniun tujintiakui aya Jákatniunam jurukni .

text: For sin , taking occasion by the commandment , deceived me , and by it slew me .
text2: Kame Tunáa wakerutainkia nu akupkamujai anankrua pénker iwiaaku pujustinian surutsuk nu akupkamujai Jákatniunam jurukmiayi .

text: Wherefore the law is holy , and the commandment holy , and just , and good .
text2: Tuma asamtai akupkamuka Yusna asa ti penkeraiti . Yajauchichuiti .

text: Was then that which is good made death unto me ? God forbid . But sin , that it might appear sin , working death in me by that which is good ; that sin by the commandment might become exceeding sinful .
text2: Nuikia ṡpénkera nu Jákatniunam Júrawak ? Atsá . Antsu Tunáa wakeruktin Jákatniunam jurukmiayi . Nuna tura asa Tunáa Imiá yajauchia nu nekaamniaiti . Tura Tunáa wakerutai pénker akupkamujai Jákatniunam jurukmiatai , nujai Yus " Tunáa wakerutai Imiá yajauchiiti " tusa paant awajsamiayi .

text: For we know that the law is spiritual : but I am carnal , sold under sin .
text2: Akupkamuka Yúsnaiti . Nu paant nékaji . Antsu wikia ayashna nuna wakerakun tunaan umireajai .

text: For that which I do I allow not : for what I would , that do I not ; but what I hate , that do I .
text2: Kame Túrajna nuna itiurchat Enentáimtajai . Pénker Túratniun wakeraj nuna Túratsjai . Antsu nakitiaj nuna nekaska Túriniaitjai .

text: If then I do that which I would not , I consent unto the law that it is good .
text2: Akupkamu pénkeran nekaan umirkatniun wakerajai . Túrayatnak umirchaitjai .

text: Now then it is no more I that do it , but sin that dwelleth in me .
text2: Tuma asamtai Wíchaitjai tunaan wakerakun Túrajna nuka . Antsu winia Enentáirui Tunáa wakerutai Pujá asa nu Túrumtikriniaiti .

text: For I know that in me ( that is , in my flesh , ) dwelleth no good thing : for to will is present with me ; but how to perform that which is good I find not .
text2: Yaunchu Enentáimtai winia Enentáirui pujana nu penké yajauchiiti . Nuna ti paant nékajai . Tuma asamtai pénker Túratniun wakerayatnak penké tujintiajai .

text: For the good that I would I do not : but the evil which I would not , that I do .
text2: Pénker Túratniun wakerayatnak Túratsjai . Antsu tunaan nakitiaj nuna Túrajai .

text: Now if I do that I would not , it is no more I that do it , but sin that dwelleth in me .
text2: Nu asamtai nakitiaj nuna Túrakun Wíchaitjai antsu winia Enentáirui Tunáa wakerutai pujana nu Túriniaiti .

text: I find then a law , that , when I would do good , evil is present with me .
text2: Júnisaiti . Pénker Túratniun wakerakun aya tunaan ínkiuajai .

text: For I delight in the law of God after the inward man :
text2: Nekas Enentáijiai Yusa akupkamurin wakerajai .

text: But I see another law in my members , warring against the law of my mind , and bringing me into captivity to the law of sin which is in my members .
text2: Tumai yaunchu Enentáimtai winia Enentáirui pujurtak nupettawai tura nekas wakeraj nuna akirturui .

text: O wretched man that I am ! who shall deliver me from the body of this death ?
text2: Maa , ti waitiajai . Jú ayash wakeramujai Jákatniunmaya ṡyaki uwemtikrurat ?

text: I thank God through Jesus Christ our Lord . So then with the mind I myself serve the law of God ; but with the flesh the law of sin .
text2: Yuska ii Uuntri Jesukrístujai Túrutmamniaitji . Tuma asamtai Yúsan ti yuminkiajai . Ayu . Winia Enentáirjai Yus akupkamun umirniuitjai . Antsu winia ayashrujai tunaan umireajai .

text: There is therefore now no condemnation to them which are in Christ Jesus , who walk not after the flesh , but after the Spirit .
text2: Jesukrístujai tsaninkiarun Yuska " tunaan Túrawar Jákatniunam wémin ainiawai " tatsui . Nu shuar ni ayashi wakerana nuna umirtsuk Yusa Wakaní wakerana nuna umirainiawai .

text: For the law of the Spirit of life in Christ Jesus hath made me free from the law of sin and death .
text2: Jesukrístujai tsaninkiu asakrin Yusa Wakaní nekas iwiaaku awajtamsaitji . Tuma asamtai Tunáa Túratniunmaya tura Jákatniunmayasha ankant ajasuitji .

text: For what the law could not do , in that it was weak through the flesh , God sending his own Son in the likeness of sinful flesh , and for sin , condemned sin in the flesh :
text2: Ayash wakerutainkia , wi akupkamun Enentáimtakui , nuna nankaamas tunaan wakerumtikrimiayi . Tuma asamtai akupkamuka Yáinkiachminiuyi . Antsu akupkamu tujinkiamia nuna Yus Túraiti . Ni Uchirín ayashtin awajas tunaan jarukat tusa akupkamiayi . Tura nujai ayash Tunáa wakeramun nupetkamiayi .

text: That the righteousness of the law might be fulfilled in us , who walk not after the flesh , but after the Spirit .
text2: Túramtai ii yamaikia ayash wakerana nu umirtsuk tura Yusa Wakaní wakeramu Túrar akupkamu tana nu umirniuitji .

text: For they that are after the flesh do mind the things of the flesh ; but they that are after the Spirit the things of the Spirit .
text2: Ayash wakeramun umirainia nu , ayashnia nunak Enentáimtuiniawai . Antsu Yusa Wakaní wakeramun Páchinia nuka Yúsnan Enentáimtuiniawai .

text: For to be carnally minded is death ; but to be spiritually minded is life and peace .
text2: Ayashnia nuna Enentáimtuinia Nú shuar Jákatniunam wénawai . Antsu Yúsnan Enentáimtuinia nuka Yusjai shiir nawamnaikiar tuke pujusartatui .

text: Because the carnal mind is enmity against God : for it is not subject to the law of God , neither indeed can be .
text2: Aya ayash wakeramun Enentáimtuinia Nú shuar Yusa nemasri ainiawai . Yus akupeamun nakitiainia ásar ni taman umirkatniun penké jeainiatsui .

text: So then they that are in the flesh cannot please God .
text2: Tuma asamtai shuar ni Ayashí wakeramuri warareakka Yúsan shiir awajsachminiaiti .

text: But ye are not in the flesh , but in the Spirit , if so be that the Spirit of God dwell in you . Now if any man have not the Spirit of Christ , he is none of his .
text2: Tura átumka ayash wakeramu umirtsuk tura Yusa Wakaní pujurtamkurmin ni wakeramu Enentáimtiniaitrume . Ashí shuar Krísturtin ainia nu ni Wakanin takaku ainiawai . Takakchaitkiunka nuikia Krístunuchuiti .

text: And if Christ be in you , the body is dead because of sin ; but the Spirit is life because of righteousness .
text2: Tura Kristu atumin pujurtamkurminkia Atumí ayashi tunaajai jakamnia ain Yus " pénkeraitme " Túramu asamtai Atumí Wakanínkia nekas tuke iwiaakuiti .

text: But if the Spirit of him that raised up Jesus from the dead dwell in you , he that raised up Christ from the dead shall also quicken your mortal bodies by his Spirit that dwelleth in you .
text2: Yus Jesukrístun jakan iniantkimiayi . Tuma asamtai ni Wakaní Atumí Enentáin pujurtamkurminkia Jesusan iniantkimia Núnisan nu Wakanjai yamaram iwiaakmajai iniantamkittiarme .

text: Therefore , brethren , we are debtors , not to the flesh , to live after the flesh .
text2: Tuma asamtai , yatsuru , ayash wakeramu penké umirkashtiniaitji .

text: For if ye live after the flesh , ye shall die : but if ye through the Spirit do mortify the deeds of the body , ye shall live .
text2: Ayash wakeramu umirniuitkiurmeka jakattarme . Antsu Yusa Wakaní pujurtamkurmin ayash wakeramu nupetkarmeka pénker wekasarum nekas iwiaaku átatrume .

text: For as many as are led by the Spirit of God , they are the sons of God .
text2: Ashí shuar Yusa Wakaní timiajai métek wekainia nu , nu shuar nekas Yusa Uchirínti .

text: For ye have not received the spirit of bondage again to fear ; but ye have received the Spirit of adoption , whereby we cry , Abba , Father .
text2: Yusa Wakaní iin pujurtamkurin Yusa Uchirí ajasar sapijmiatsuk Yusai weamkar " Aparú " Tímimniaitji .

text: The Spirit itself beareth witness with our spirit , that we are the children of God :
text2: Nu Wakan " nekas Yusa Uchirínme " ii Enentáin Túramji .

text: And if children , then heirs ; heirs of God , and joint - heirs with Christ ; if so be that we suffer with him , that we may be also glorified together .
text2: Tura ni Uchirí ajasu asakrin Yus Tímia Núnisan Ashí Níiniun suramsattaji . Krístun Ashí susattana Núnisan incha suramsattaji . Yamái Krístunu takaakur Wáitiakrikia ukunam Krístujai métek ti shiir awajnastatji .

text: For I reckon that the sufferings of this present time are not worthy to be compared with the glory which shall be revealed in us .
text2: Maa , Yamái ti Wáitiakrisha ukunmanka nayaimpiniam ti shiir pujakur nu Wáitsamu kajinmatkittiaji .

text: For the earnest expectation of the creature waiteth for the manifestation of the sons of God .
text2: Tsawant jeamtai Yus Ashí ni shuarin Niijiai métek ti shiir awajsartatui . Nuin nekas Yusa Uchirí ainia nu ti paant nekanattawai . Nu tsawantan Wáinkiatniun Ashí Yus najanamu írunna nu ti Nákainiawai .

text: For the creature was made subject to vanity , not willingly , but by reason of him who hath subjected the same in hope ,
text2: Ashí Yus najanamia nuna Yámankamtaik ti pénker najanamiayi . Túrasha yajauch ajasmiayi . Nusha Ní neaskeka Túrunachmiayi . Antsu Yus ukunam ataksha iwiarnartin Atí tusa Tunáa wayamunam yajauch ajasat tusa tsankatkamiayi . Tuma asamtai iwiarnartin tsawantan Nákawai .

text: Because the creature itself also shall be delivered from the bondage of corruption into the glorious liberty of the children of God .
text2: Nu tsawantai Ashí Yus najanamu emesnartinniumia uwemprartatui . Tura Ashí Yus najanamuka shuar Yusa Uchirí ajasarua nujai métek shiir awajnasar ankant ajasartatui .

text: For we know that the whole creation groaneth and travaileth in pain together until now .
text2: Yamaisha Ashí Yus najanamu ainia nu , nuwa jatema Wáitia nunis ti Wáitiainiawai .

text: And not only they , but ourselves also , which have the firstfruits of the Spirit , even we ourselves groan within ourselves , waiting for the adoption , to wit , the redemption of our body .
text2: Yus najanamuka Ashí Wáitiainiawai . Iisha Yusa Wakaní takakiatar ti Wáitiaji . Tura Yusa Wakaní takakkur Ashí Yus suramsattajnia nu nékaji achiktin . Tuma asar nekas Yusa Uchirí paant awajnastin tsawant Nákaji . Nuisha ii Ayashísha ankant awajnastatui .

text: For we are saved by hope : but hope that is seen is not hope : for what a man seeth , why doth he yet hope for ?
text2: Nu tuke Enentáimtuki wéakur takamtsuk uwemprattaji . Yamái nu Wáinchiatar tuke Nákaji . Warí , ṡWáinjinia nu Nákajik ?

text: But if we hope for that we see not , then do we with patience wait for it .
text2: Tuma asar tuke waincha asar katsuntrar Nákaji .

text: Likewise the Spirit also helpeth our infirmities : for we know not what we should pray for as we ought : but the Spirit itself maketh intercession for us with groanings which cannot be uttered .
text2: Nu arantcha ii kakarmachu nekapeakrin Yusa Wakaní Yáinmaji . Kame Yus áujsatniusha nékachkurin iin Yáinmaji . ṡWarí seattaj ~ i tura itiur seatjik ? Nu nékatsji . Tura itiurchat pujakur ti Wáitiakrincha Yusa Wakaní iin áujturmaji .

text: And he that searcheth the hearts knoweth what is the mind of the Spirit , because he maketh intercession for the saints according to the will of God .
text2: Tura Yus ii Enentáin Enentáimtaj nuna nékaiti . Tuma asa ni shuari asakrin ni Wakaní ni wakeramujai métek seatramkurin ántawai .

text: And we know that all things work together for good to them that love God , to them who are the called according to his purpose .
text2: Yus anea asakrin Ashí nankaatamjinia nujai Yus pujurtamji . Tura nujai pénker awajtamji . Nu paant nékaji . Tura Ni wakerimia Núnisan Ní shuar awajtamsaitji .

text: For whom he did foreknow , he also did predestinate to be conformed to the image of his Son , that he might be the firstborn among many brethren .
text2: Yámankamtaiknumia iin nekarmak ni Uchirí Jesukrístujai métek ajasat tusa achirmakmiaji . Nujai Yusa Uchirí Untsurí ajasji . Tura Kristu ii iwiairinti .

text: Moreover whom he did predestinate , them he also called : and whom he called , them he also justified : and whom he justified , them he also glorified .
text2: Tura Yus achikmia nuna Niiniu awajsamiayi . Tura nu shuaran " pénkeraitrume " Tímiayi . Tura ti shiir awajsamiayi .

text: What shall we then say to these things ? If God be for us , who can be against us ?
text2: Wats , nuikia Yus iin Yáinmakrin ṡyaki iin nupettamkattaj ~ i ?

text: He that spared not his own Son , but delivered him up for us all , how shall he not with him also freely give us all things ?
text2: Ni Uchiríncha suritramkachmiaji antsu iin jarutramkat tusa akupturmakmiaji . Tura asa ni Uchiríjiai métek ti shiira nuna Ashí suramsashtatjik .

text: Who shall lay any thing to the charge of God ' s elect ? It is God that justifieth .
text2: Yus achikmia Nú shuaran ṡyaki sumamtikiat ? Yus Apaka " pénkeraitrume " tiniu asa penké Túrashtatui .

text: Who is he that condemneth ? It is Christ that died , yea rather , that is risen again , who is even at the right hand of God , who also maketh intercession for us .
text2: Tura ṡyaki " jinium Apenáti " titi ? Warí , Kristu penké Túrashtatui . Antsu nu shuaran jarukmiayi . Tura nantaki Yusa untsuurini ekemas iin áujturmaji .

text: Who shall separate us from the love of Christ ? shall tribulation , or distress , or persecution , or famine , or nakedness , or peril , or sword ?
text2: Kristu ti anenma asakrin iin akantamkitin atsawai . Wáitiakrisha , itiurchat ínkiuakrisha , shuar aintramkurnisha , tsukamakrisha , entsatai atsakuisha , Tsúumainjaisha , tura mantamnakrisha , nujai " Kristu anentsui " Tíchamniaitji . Nuka Kristu anenkrattairiya akantamkitin jeatsui .

text: As it is written , For thy sake we are killed all the day long ; we are accounted as sheep for the slaughter .
text2: Yus - Papniumsha Júnis aarmaiti : " Amée - shuar asar tuke mantamnatin pujaji . Murik Máatniua aintsan Enentáimturmaji . " Tu aarmaiti .

text: Nay , in all these things we are more than conquerors through him that loved us .
text2: Tuma ain Kristu iin anenma asakrin Niijiai ti nupetmakuitji .

text: For I am persuaded , that neither death , nor life , nor angels , nor principalities , nor powers , nor things present , nor things to come ,
text2: Kristu anenkrattairiya akantamkitin penké atsawai . Nuna ti paant nékajai . Jákatniusha , iwiaakmasha , nayaimpinmaya suntarsha , Ashí nayaimpinmasha tura nunkanmasha akupin ainia nusha , Yamái írunna nusha , ukunam átatna nusha ,

text: Nor height , nor depth , nor any other creature , shall be able to separate us from the love of God , which is in Christ Jesus our Lord .
text2: Yakí írunna nusha , Nunká írunna nusha , kame Ashí Yus najanmu írunna nusha Yusa anenkrattairiya penké akantamkichminiaitji . Yusa anenkrattaisha ii Uuntri Jesukrístu Túrunamujai paant wainji .

text: I say the truth in Christ , I lie not , my conscience also bearing me witness in the Holy Ghost ,
text2: Yamái Tájana nu Kristu shuari asan Imiá nekasan Wáitrutsuk Tájai . Winia Enentáirsha tura Yusa Wakanísha " nekas tawai " turutainiawai .

text: That I have great heaviness and continual sorrow in my heart .
text2: Israer - shuaran waitnentakun ti kuntuts Enentáimjai .

text: For I could wish that myself were accursed from Christ for my brethren , my kinsmen according to the flesh :
text2: Wíishuar ainiakui Krístunmaya kanakin yuminnaraintjai nujai Wíishuaran Yáinminiaitkiunka .

text: Who are Israelites ; to whom pertaineth the adoption , and the glory , and the covenants , and the giving of the law , and the service of God , and the promises ;
text2: Israer Weeá shuar ainiawai . Tura ni Uchiría ainis Yus achikiaruiti . Yusa wincharisha niijiai pujumiayi . Yaunchu Chicham ni weatrijiai iwiaramuncha tura Muisais akupkamuncha susamiayi . Tura Yusa Jeen Niin shiir awajsatniun jintintiamiayi . Tura ukunam shiir tsankatkattana nunasha ujakmiayi .

text: Whose are the fathers , and of whom as concerning the flesh Christ came , who is over all , God blessed for ever . Amen .
text2: Ni Weatríin Yúsan ti pénker Enentáimtin irunmiayi . Krístusha aents ajas Nú shuarnum akiiniamiayi . Krístuka Uunt Yus asa tura Ashí akupin asa Ninki tuke shiir Awájnastí . Núnisan Atí .

text: Not as though the word of God hath taken none effect . For they are not all Israel , which are of Israel :
text2: Kame Yus Ashí Nii timia nuna Israer - shuaran Súsachmataisha nujai " Yus timia nu uminkiachuiti " Tíchamniaiti . Antsu junis Enentáimpratniuiti : Ashí Israer Weeá ainiayatan Yusjai iismaka Ashí nekas Israer - shuar ainiatsui .

text: Neither , because they are the seed of Abraham , are they all children : but , In Isaac shall thy seed be called .
text2: Núnisan Apraám Weeá shuarsha Ashí nekas ni shuar ainiatsui . Iis , Yus Apraáman Tímiayi " Aya Isak pampanma amee shuarum ártatui . "

text: That is , They which are the children of the flesh , these are not the children of God : but the children of the promise are counted for the seed .
text2: Nujai Páantaiti . Shuar aya Apraam Weeá akiinia asa Yus timian Wáinkiashtiniaiti . Antsu Yus timiajai métek akiinia nu nekas Apraám Weeá shuar ainiak Yus timian wainkiattawai .

text: For this is the word of promise , At this time will I come , and Sara shall have a son .
text2: Kame Yus Apraáman Tímia nu Júiti : " Tsawant jeamtai jeartiatjame , tura ame nuwem Sara uchin takustatui . " Tu Tímiayi .

text: And not only this ; but when Rebecca also had conceived by one , even by our father Isaac ;
text2: Nu arantcha , ii weatri Isaka nuwe Ripikia jimiampramiayi .

text: As it is written , Jacob have I loved , but Esau have I hated .
text2: Nu uchisha akiiniainiatsain pénkernasha tura yajauchincha Túruiniatsain Yus Ripikian Tímiayi : " Iwiairia nu ni patain umirkattawai . " Ataksha Núnisan Yus ni Papiriin chichak " Jakupan aneakun Esaun nakitramjai " Tímiayi . Nujainkia Páantaiti . Yus wakerak aya ni Enentáijiain shuaran achikminiaiti . Nu shuar Túrunamu Enentáimtutsuk Túramniaiti .

text: What shall we say then ? Is there unrighteousness with God ? God forbid .
text2: Túriniaitkiui " Yus pénkerchaiti " ṡtitiajiash ? Atsá .

text: For he saith to Moses , I will have mercy on whom I will have mercy , and I will have compassion on whom I will have compassion .
text2: Yus Muisaisan Júnis Tímiayi : " Wi wakerajna nunak waitnentrattajai . "

text: So then it is not of him that willeth , nor of him that runneth , but of God that sheweth mercy .
text2: Tuma asamtai shuar ti wakerakuisha tura kakaram takaakuisha aya nujai Yus waitnentatsui . Antsu aya Ní Enentáijiain wakerak waitnentawai .

text: For the scripture saith unto Pharaoh , Even for this same purpose have I raised thee up , that I might shew my power in thee , and that my name might be declared throughout all the earth .
text2: Ataksha Yus - Papininum tawai " Yus Ejiptu nunka akupniurin Tímiayi " Amijiai Ashí nunkanam winia kakarmarun nekaawarat tusan uunt akupniun awajsamjame " Tímiayi " tawai .

text: Therefore hath he mercy on whom he will have mercy , and whom he will he hardeneth .
text2: Tuma asamtai Yus Nii wakera nuna waitnentawai . Túrasha Ejiptu akupniurin Túramia Núnisan Nii wakera Nú shuaran Enentáin Kátsuram awajtawai .

text: Thou wilt say then unto me , Why doth he yet find fault ? For who hath resisted his will ?
text2: Tura " Núnisaitkiuinkia ṡurukamtai shuaran Yus Súmamtikia ? turutchatapash . Nii wakerakuinkia ṡitiurkattajik ? " turutchatapash .

text: Nay but , O man , who art thou that repliest against God ? Shall the thing formed say to him that formed it , Why hast thou made me thus ?
text2: Warí , aents asam Yusjai ṡtunaiminkiaitiam ? Nuwa pininkian Nájankui Núweka " ṡurukamtai Júnis najatam ? " Tíminkiait .

text: Hath not the potter power over the clay , of the same lump to make one vessel unto honour , and another unto dishonour ?
text2: Nuwa wakerakka nu nuwejai amamkuncha tura yukunnasha Nusháa takakmastinian mai najanachminkait .

text: What if God , willing to shew his wrath , and to make his power known , endured with much longsuffering the vessels of wrath fitted to destruction :
text2: Yajauch shuar ti Asutiátin ainiak emesnartinnium wétin ainiawai . Yus nu shuaran Asutiá ni kakarmarin iniaktustaj tayat ti katsuntramiayi .

text: And that he might make known the riches of his glory on the vessels of mercy , which he had afore prepared unto glory ,
text2: Tura katsunteak ni anenkrattairin iniakmasmiayi . Nú arant nuikia iin waitnentramak Shíir enentaijiai pénker awajtamkur ni anenkrattairi ti paantchakait . Nekas Shíir enentaijiai pénker ajasat tusa yaunchu iwiartampramiaji .

text: Even us , whom he hath called , not of the Jews only , but also of the Gentiles ?
text2: Tura incha , Israer - shuarnumiasha Israer - shuarchanumiasha , ni shuari ajasat tusa achirmakmiaji .

text: As he saith also in Osee , I will call them my people , which were not my people ; and her beloved , which was not beloved .
text2: Núnisan yaunchu Yúsnan etserin Useas Yus - Papinium tawai : " Wíishuarchan Wíishuar awajsattajai . Aneachmancha aneamu awajsattajai .

text: And it shall come to pass , that in the place where it was said unto them , Ye are not my people ; there shall they be called the children of the living God .
text2: Tura Yus " Wíishuarchaitrume " Tímia Nú shuaran " Nekas iwiaaku Yusa Uchiríniuitrume " ukunam Títiatui . " Tu aarmaiti .

text: Esaias also crieth concerning Israel , Though the number of the children of Israel be as the sand of the sea , a remnant shall be saved :
text2: Antsu Isayas Israer - shuaran Páchis Tímiayi : " Israer Weeá ti nankaamas Untsurí ainiayat penké ishichik uwemprartatui .

text: For he will finish the work , and cut it short in righteousness : because a short work will the Lord make upon the earth .
text2: Kame Yus yajauchin akupkataj timia nuna takamtsuk Wárik umiktatui . "

text: And as Esaias said before , Except the Lord of Sabaoth had left us a seed , we had been as Sodoma , and been made like unto Gomorrha .
text2: Núnisan Isayas ataksha tawai : " Ashí akupeana Nú Yus iin waitnentramachkurninkia Sutuma péprusha Kumura péprusha takamtsuk Jákarmia Núnisan Jákaaji . "

text: What shall we say then ? That the Gentiles , which followed not after righteousness , have attained to righteousness , even the righteousness which is of faith .
text2: Wátsek , Israer - shuarcha , Yus iisam ni Túramurijiai " pénkeraitji " tu Enentáimtumainiachunak , Yuska , Nii Enentáimtusam , " pénkeraitrume " Tímiayi .

text: But Israel , which followed after the law of righteousness , hath not attained to the law of righteousness .
text2: Antsu Israer - shuarka pénker akupkamun umiktinian wakeruiniayatan tujintiainiakui nujai pénker ajastinian tujinkiarmiayi .

text: Wherefore ? Because they sought it not by faith , but as it were by the works of the law . For they stumbled at that stumblingstone ;
text2: ṡUrukamtai tujinkiarma ? Yúsan Enentáimtutsuk aya ni pénker Túramujai pénker ajastinian Enentáimtuiniak tujinkiarmiayi . Krístun Enentáimtustinian nakitiainiak shuar kankapen awankemtuktinia Núnisan iniararmai .

text: As it is written , Behold , I lay in Sion a stumblingstone and rock of offence : and whosoever believeth on him shall not be ashamed .
text2: Tura kaya tukumkar iniarchamniakait . Nu asamtai Yus - Papinium Krístun pachis Tímiayi : " " Seun péprunam kayan ikiuajai , tawai Yus . Nu kayanam Israer - shuar tukumkar iniarartatui . Antsu Niin shiir Enentáimtuinia Nú shuar natsaarchartatui " tawai . " Tu aarmaiti .

text: Brethren , my heart ' s desire and prayer to God for Israel is , that they might be saved .
text2: Yatsuru , Israer - shuar uwemprarat tusan ti wakerakun Yúsan áujtajai .

text: For I bear them record that they have a zeal of God , but not according to knowledge .
text2: Maa , uwempratniun nékachiatan Yúsan shiir awajsatniun ti wakeruiniawai .

text: For they being ignorant of God ' s righteousness , and going about to establish their own righteousness , have not submitted themselves unto the righteousness of God .
text2: Túmaitiat Shuáran Yus pénker awajsatniun nékachu ásar aya ni pénker Túramujain pénker ajastinian wakeruiniawai . Tuma ásar Yus pénker Enentáimtamujai pénker ajastinian jeacharai .

text: For Christ is the end of the law for righteousness to every one that believeth .
text2: Aya Kristu Enentáimtamujai pénker ajastin asamtai akupkamu umirkatniujai pénker ajastin ántraiti .

text: For Moses describeth the righteousness which is of the law , That the man which doeth those things shall live by them .
text2: Akupkamujai pénker ajastinian pachis Muisais Tímiayi : " Nuna takamtsuk umirniuka nujai pénker pujustatui . " Tu aarmaiti .

text: But the righteousness which is of faith speaketh on this wise , Say not in thine heart , Who shall ascend into heaven ? ( that is , to bring Christ down from above : )
text2: Antsu Krístun Enentáimtus pénker pujustinian pachis shuar juna Tíminiaiti : " Ti itiurchata ainis " ṡYaki nayaimpiniam waka Krístun itiarat ~ i ? " tiirap , " tawai .

text: Or , Who shall descend into the deep ? ( that is , to bring up Christ again from the dead . )
text2: Tura ṡYaki jakamunam we Krístun iniantkit ? " tiirap " tawai .

text: But what saith it ? The word is nigh thee , even in thy mouth , and in thy heart : that is , the word of faith , which we preach ;
text2: Tura junasha tawai : " Yus - Chicham Yúpichuch umirkamniaiti . Aya Enentáimjai Enentáimtakum wenumjai ujaktiniaitme . " Nu Chicham " Yus Enentáimtustiniaiti " tawai . Nu Chicham tuke étsereaj Núiti .

text: That if thou shalt confess with thy mouth the Lord Jesus , and shalt believe in thine heart that God hath raised him from the dead , thou shalt be saved .
text2: Yus Jesusan jakan iniantkimia nu Enentáimtakum tura wenumjai " Jesus winia Uuntruiti " takum uwemprattame .

text: For with the heart man believeth unto righteousness ; and with the mouth confession is made unto salvation .
text2: Kame Kristu Enentáimtakmin Yus " pénkeraitme " turamtatui Nuyá wenumjai " Jesukrístun Enentáimtajai " Tákum uwemprattame .

text: For the scripture saith , Whosoever believeth on him shall not be ashamed .
text2: Ataksha Yus - Papinium tawai : " Niin shiir Enentáimtuinia Nú shuar natsaarchartatui . "

text: For there is no difference between the Jew and the Greek : for the same Lord over all is rich unto all that call upon him .
text2: Tuma asamtai Ashí shuar , Israertisha Israerchasha , mai metek Yúsan shiir Enentáimtuinia nuna Yus ti aneak Ashí pénkeran Súawai . Tura Ashí métek ni Uuntrinti .

text: For whosoever shall call upon the name of the Lord shall be saved .
text2: Nu arantcha " Ashí shuar Uuntan áujea nu uwemprattawai " Yáunchu Krístunun tu aatramuiti .

text: How then shall they call on him in whom they have not believed ? and how shall they believe in him of whom they have not heard ? and how shall they hear without a preacher ?
text2: Tura Krístun Enentáimtuiniachusha ṡitiurak Niin áujsarat ? Tura Krístun nékainiachusha ṡitiurak Niin Enentáimtusarat ? Tura Yus - Chicham ujaachmasha ṡitiurak nekaawarat ? Shuar Yus - Chichaman ujaktiniaiti .

text: And how shall they preach , except they be sent ? as it is written , How beautiful are the feet of them that preach the gospel of peace , and bring glad tidings of good things !
text2: Tura akupkachmasha ṡitiurak Yus - Chichaman ujakarat ? Tura shuar Yus - Chichaman etserkataj tusa wéana nuna Yus - Papinium tawai : " Shuar Yusa Shiir Chichamen etserki weana nu ti Shíirchakait . "

text: But they have not all obeyed the gospel . For Esaias saith , Lord , who hath believed our report ?
text2: Tura Ashí shuar uwempratin chichaman ántuiniayatan umirainiatsui . Isayassha yaunchu aak Tímiayi : " Uuntá , ṡyaki ii étserman antukaruit ? "

text: So then faith cometh by hearing , and hearing by the word of God .
text2: Paantchakáit . Kristu Túramu ujakam antuktiniaiti . Tura antukar Krístun shiir Enentáimtustiniaiti .

text: But I say , Have they not heard ? Yes verily , their sound went into all the earth , and their words unto the ends of the world .
text2: Tura ṡIsraer - shuar Yus - Chichaman antukcharu ásaran Yúsan Enentáimtuscharma ? Atsá . Warí , Yus - Papí tawai : " Ashí nunkanam ni chichame antunkaiti . "

text: But I say , Did not Israel know ? First Moses saith , I will provoke you to jealousy by them that are no people , and by a foolish nation I will anger you .
text2: Tura " Israer - shuar nu chichaman antukariat ṡpaant nekaawarmaashi ? " inintrusminiaiti . Tura nekas nekaawarmai . Tuma asamtai Muisais tawai : " Israer - shuarchan nékachu ainiana nuna shiir awajeakun akajkattajrume . "

text: But Esaias is very bold , and saith , I was found of them that sought me not ; I was made manifest unto them that asked not after me .
text2: Nuyá Isayas ashamtsuk aarmiayi : " Eatkacharua nu Wáitkiarmiayi . Inintruiniatsain wantintiukmiajai . "

text: But to Israel he saith , All day long I have stretched forth my hands unto a disobedient and gainsaying people .
text2: Tura Israer - shuaran áujmatuk Tímiayi : " Tuke iniaitsuk Winin winiarti tusan nu shuaran Untsúajai . Tura nakitrurar umirtuiniatsui . "

text: I say then , Hath God cast away his people ? God forbid . For I also am an Israelite , of the seed of Abraham , of the tribe of Benjamin .
text2: Tura Israer - shuar Yúsan umiiniachkui ṡYus niin iniaisaashit ? Pénkea . Warí , wi Israer - shuarchakaitiaj . Wi Apraámsha tura Pinjamin Weeá akiiniachukaitiaj .

text: God hath not cast away his people which he foreknew . Wot ye not what the scripture saith of Elias ? how he maketh intercession to God against Israel , saying ,
text2: Yámankamtaikniumia Yus Israer - shuaran ni shuar arti tusa achikiu asa yamaikia iniaisashtatui . Ti yaunchu Yúsnan etserin Erías Israer - shuaran pachis Yúsan áujtak Tímiayi :

text: Lord , they have killed thy prophets , and digged down thine altars ; and I am left alone , and they seek my life .
text2: " Uuntrú , naman awasar Yus Sútaincha mash saakiarai . Aminiun etserniuncha mash Máawarai . Tura wiki juakjai . Tura winiasha " mantuatai " turutainiawai . " Tu áujsamiayi .

text: But what saith the answer of God unto him ? I have reserved to myself seven thousand men , who have not bowed the knee to the image of Baal .
text2: Tura Yus ayak Tímiayi " Siati mir ( 7000 ) aishmankan Israer - shuarnumia apujtumsaruitjai . Nu shuar ántar - yus Páaran tikishmatrachu ainiawai " Tímiayi Yus .

text: Even so then at this present time also there is a remnant according to the election of grace .
text2: Núnisan yamaisha Yus ti waitnentainia asa Ashí Israer - shuarnumia ni shuarin achikiuiti .

text: And if by grace , then is it no more of works : otherwise grace is no more grace . But if it be of works , then is it no more grace : otherwise work is no more work .
text2: Yus ni Enentáijiain waitnentak Túraiti . Nú shuar pénker tura asamtai waitnentatsui . Yus aya pénkernak waitnentakka nuikia waitnenkratchainti .

text: What then ? Israel hath not obtained that which he seeketh for ; but the election hath obtained it , and the rest were blinded
text2: Ayu . Nuikia Ashí Israer - shuar pénkeran eakaru ain aya Yus achikmia Nú shuar wainkiarmiayi . Antsu ni achikchamuka nuna nankaamas nekaachmin ajasar kusurua Núnin awajnasarmiayi .

text: ( According as it is written , God hath given them the spirit of slumber , eyes that they should not see , and ears that they should not hear ; ) unto this day .
text2: Yus - Chichamsha Núnisan tawai : " Yus Enentáimchatai Enentáin Súsarmiayi . Wáinmashtai jiincha tura ántushtai Kuíshniasha Súsarmiayi . Yamaisha Núniskete . "

text: And David saith , Let their table be made a snare , and a trap , and a stumbling block , and a recompence unto them :
text2: Tawitcha yaunchu aak Tímiayi : " Tuke Tunáa Túrin ásar namperan najanainiaksha achinkiar ti Asutniáwarti .

text: Let their eyes be darkened , that they may not see , and bow down their back alway .
text2: Ni Enentáin kusurarti tura wainmakcharti . Itiurchat ana nusha , Káarak kijinia aintsan , tuke Aentskatá . " Tu aarmiayi .

text: I say then , Have they stumbled that they should fall ? God forbid : but rather through their fall salvation is come unto the Gentiles , for to provoke them to jealousy .
text2: Watsek , Israer - shuar Kayá tukumkar ṡtuke iniaararuk ainia ? Atsá . Antsu Israer - shuar umirkachmajai Israer - shuarcha yamaikia uwempratin jeainiawai . Nujai Israer - shuarsha nujai métek uwempratniun Enentáimsartatui .

text: Now if the fall of them be the riches of the world , and the diminishing of them the riches of the Gentiles ; how much more their fulness ?
text2: Israer - shuar umirkachmajai Ashí shuar , Israercha ainia nusha , uwempramnia ajasarmiayi . Nuna nankaamas Israer - shuar atak Yúsan Enentáimtuiniak uwemprarmatai nujai Ashí shuar ti penker ajasartatui .

text: For I speak to you Gentiles , inasmuch as I am the apostle of the Gentiles , I magnify mine office :
text2: Israer - shuarchatirmea , atumin uwempratin chichaman etserkatniun Yus akupkamu asan nu takatan ti takaajai .

text: If by any means I may provoke to emulation them which are my flesh , and might save some of them .
text2: Nuna Túrakun átum uwemprarmena Núnisan niisha , Wíishuar ainia nu , nuna iisar uwemprarat tusan wakerajai .

text: For if the casting away of them be the reconciling of the world , what shall the receiving of them be , but life from the dead ?
text2: Kame Israer - shuaran iniaisamujai Ashí shuar Yusjai shiir nawamnaikiarmatainkia nuikia atak niin achikmajai jakamunmaya nantaktinia aintsan ti shiir átatui .

text: For if the firstfruit be holy , the lump is also holy : and if the root be holy , so are the branches .
text2: Emka apatuk ana nu Yus Súakur yuminsamuitkiunka nuikia Ashí apatkunam Yus yuminsamuiti . Núnisan Numí kankapé pénkeraitkiunka numi takamtsuk pénkeraiti .

text: And if some of the branches be broken off , and thou , being a wild olive tree , wert graffed in among them , and with them partakest of the root and fatness of the olive tree ;
text2: Yuska Chíkich Chíkich Israer - shuaran , Numí kanawen tsupik ajapniua ainis , iniaisamiayi . Tura Nuyá atumin Niisháa numinmaya árumnin nu numiniam anujtamkamarme . Nujai pénker numijiai Tsanínkrum nu kakarmajai iwiaakrume .

text: Boast not against the branches . But if thou boast , thou bearest not the root , but the root thee .
text2: Tura kanawe tsupikmajai nankaamantu Enentáimtumasaip . Warí , ame kakarmarmijiai numi wajatsui antsu ni kakarmarijiai iwiaakme .

text: Thou wilt say then , The branches were broken off , that I might be graffed in .
text2: " Túrasha wi anujnaktinian kanawen tsupikchamka " Tíchainmeash .

text: Well ; because of unbelief they were broken off , and thou standest by faith . Be not highminded , but fear :
text2: Nekasaiti , Túmaitiat niisha Yúsan Enentáimtuiniachu ásar tsupinkiarmiayi . Atumsha aya Yus nekas Enentáimta asam anujnakuitme . Tuma asamtai nankaamantu Enentáimtumatsuk aya anearta .

text: For if God spared not the natural branches , take heed lest he also spare not thee .
text2: Yus nekas kanawe pénkercha Túrawarun tsupikkia Páchitsuk amincha tsupirmakchamniakait .

text: Behold therefore the goodness and severity of God : on them which fell , severity ; but toward thee , goodness , if thou continue in his goodness : otherwise thou also shalt be cut off .
text2: Iista , Yus atumjai ti Tsánkaiti tura Israer - shuar umichua nuna ti wari asutiaiti . Tura pénker Wáinmamkata . Yus tuke nekas Enentáimtachkurminkia atumniasha Páchitsuk tsupirmaktatrume .

text: And they also , if they abide not still in unbelief , shall be graffed in : for God is able to graff them in again .
text2: Núnisan Israer - shuar ataksha Yúsan Enentáimtuiniakui Páchitsuk ataksha anujkachminkait . Nekas Túrattawai .

text: For if thou wert cut out of the olive tree which is wild by nature , and wert graffed contrary to nature into a good olive tree : how much more shall these , which be the natural branches , be graffed into their own olive tree ?
text2: Túram Israer - shuarcha asam Niisháa numinmaya tsupikiar penké numiniam anujnakuitrume . Nuna tura asa nekas ni kanawe tsupikia ajapamun Páchitsuk atak anujkamniaiti .

text: For I would not , brethren , that ye should be ignorant of this mystery , lest ye should be wise in your own conceits ; that blindness in part is happened to Israel , until the fulness of the Gentiles be come in .
text2: Yatsurú , nankaamantu Enentáimtumarairum tusan yaunchu nekaachman ujaajrume . Júiti : Israer - shuarnumianka Chíkich Chíkich Yúsan nekas Enentáimtustinian nakitiainiawai . Tura aya Israer - shuarchasha Yus - shuar ajasarat tusa Túrunamiayi .

text: And so all Israel shall be saved : as it is written , There shall come out of Sion the Deliverer , and shall turn away ungodliness from Jacob :
text2: Tura Israer - shuarchasha ti Untsurí Yus - shuar ajasarmatai Nuyá Israer - shuarsha Ashí uwemprartatui . Tuma asamtai Yus - Papí tawai : " Seúnnumia Uwemtikkiartin Tátatui . Israernumia tunaan Asakátrattawai .

text: For this is my covenant unto them , when I shall take away their sins .
text2: Jú Chichamnasha niijiai najanattajai : ni tunaarin asakturtatjai . "

text: As concerning the gospel , they are enemies for your sakes : but as touching the election , they are beloved for the fathers ' sakes .
text2: Uwempratin chicham atumsha nekaatarum tusa Israer - shuaran Yus ni nemasri awajsaruiti . Tura yaunchu ni weatrin achikiu asa nincha tuke anenawai .

text: For the gifts and calling of God are without repentance .
text2: Kame Yus Amáa nuna ataksha ataatsui . Shuáran achiksha atak iniaiyatsui .

text: For as ye in times past have not believed God , yet have now obtained mercy through their unbelief :
text2: Atumka yaunchu Yus umirchauyarme . Tura yamaikia Israer - shuar umirainiachkui Yus atumin waitnentramarme .

text: Even so have these also now not believed , that through your mercy they also may obtain mercy .
text2: Núnisan nii yamaikia Yúsan umirainiatsui . Tura atumin waitnentrampramarum Núnisan nincha waitnentrattawai .

text: For God hath concluded them all in unbelief , that he might have mercy upon all .
text2: Nujai Ashí métek sumamtikiak métek waitnentrar uwemtikrattawai .

text: O the depth of the riches both of the wisdom and knowledge of God ! how unsearchable are his judgments , and his ways past finding out !
text2: Maa , Yus Imiá shiirchakait . Tí nekachukait . Ni Túramu penké nekaachminiaitji .

text: For who hath known the mind of the Lord ? or who hath been his counseller ?
text2: " Uunt Yus Enentáimmian ṡyaki neka ? Tura ṡya Niin unuiniaruit .

text: Or who hath first given to him , and it shall be recompensed unto him again ?
