text2: Yaki Niin pénkeran susa shiira nujai yapajniuit ? " Tu aarmaiti .

text: For of him , and through him , and to him , are all things : to whom be glory for ever . Amen .
text2: Ashí najanamu ainia nu Yus najanamu ainiak Niiniu ainiawai . Tura Niin shiir awajsatniun najanawarma ainiawai . Yus tuke iniaitsuk shiir Awájnástí . Núnisan Atí .

text: I beseech you therefore , brethren , by the mercies of God , that ye present your bodies a living sacrifice , holy , acceptable unto God , which is your reasonable service .
text2: Atumsha Yus - shuar árumna nu , atumek Yusai surumaktarum . Yus ti anenma asakrumin nuna seajrume . Yaunchu Israer - shuar ni waakarin maa Yúsan suu ármiayi . Atumsha Núnisrumek iwiaaku árumna nuin Nii Túrutataj taku Túrutati tusarum tuke Enentáijiai Yusai tsankamaktarum . Yusai iisam ti shiir Atí tusarum Túratarum . Nu Túrakrumka Pátatkechu antsu ti nekas Enentáimjai Yus shiir awajin átatrume .

text: And be not conformed to this world : but be ye transformed by the renewing of your mind , that ye may prove what is that good , and acceptable , and perfect , will of God .
text2: Chíkich shuar aya Jú nunkanmaya ana nuna Enentáimtusar wekainiawai . Tura átumka nu Túrawairap . Antsu Yus winia Enentáimmiarun yapajtiurat tusarum tsankatkatarum . Nu Túrakrumka Yus wakera nu nekaattarme . Ni wakeramusha yajauchichuiti antsu Imiá nekas pénkeraiti .

text: For I say , through the grace given unto me , to every man that is among you , not to think of himself more highly than he ought to think ; but to think soberly , according as God hath dealt to every man the measure of faith .
text2: Yus winia waitnentrak akatar akuptuku asamtai juna Tájarme . Atumek Wíkitiajtai tu Enentáimtumatsuk jeamna nujai métek Enentáimtumasta . Yus Enentáimta asakmin takastinian suramsana nujai apatkam nekaamata .

text: For as we have many members in one body , and all members have not the same office :
text2: Ii ayashi chikichkiitiat ii muchitmari Untsuríinti . Tura métekrak Muchitiáiniatsui .

text: So we , being many , are one body in Christ , and every one members one of another .
text2: Núnisrik iisha , Yus - shuarti , Ayashí muchitmariya aintsarik Untsuríitiatar chikichik ayashtinia aintsar takaaji . Nusha Krístujai tsaninkiu asar aitkiamuitji . Túramu asar nuamtak atsumnaiyaji .

text: Having then gifts differing according to the grace that is given to us , whether prophecy , let us prophesy according to the proportion of faith ;
text2: Ii Túratniun Yus Nusháa Nusháa Súramji Nii wakera nujai métek . Wats , Yus ámin suramsamna nu Túratniuitme . Yus ni chichamen etserkatniun suramsaitkiuinkia Yus Enentáimtakum unuimiarmam nujai métek etserkata .

text: Or ministry , let us wait on our ministering : or he that teacheth , on teaching ;
text2: Chíkich shuar Yáintinian Yus suramsaitkiuinkia nekas Enentáimjai Yáintá . Unuiniartiniaitkiumka yawetsuk unuiniarta .

text: Or he that exhorteth , on exhortation : he that giveth , let him do it with simplicity ; he that ruleth , with diligence ; he that sheweth mercy , with cheerfulness .
text2: Chíkich shuar Ikiakártiniaitkiumka nekas pénker Ikiakárta . Súsatniuitkiumka shiir Enentáijiai ementutsuk Súsarta . Shuaran Wáinin Atí tusa Yus apujtamsaitkiuinkia ti Enentáimsam Túratá . Tura shuar itiurchat pujuinia nu Yáintinian Yus suramsaitkiuinkia shiir Enentáimsam Túratá .

text: Let love be without dissimulation . Abhor that which is evil ; cleave to that which is good .
text2: Nekas Enentáijiai mai anenai ajatarum . Yajauch nakitrarum pénkera nu Túratarum .

text: Be kindly affectioned one to another with brotherly love ; in honour preferring one another ;
text2: Nuamtak yachi asarum Núnisrum mai anenai ajatarum . Chíkich wijiai nankaamas uuntaiti tu Enentáimtunaistarum .

text: Not slothful in business ; fervent in spirit ; serving the Lord ;
text2: Nakittsuk kakaram ajasrum Ashí Enentáimjai ii Uuntri wakera nu Túratarum .

text: Rejoicing in hope ; patient in tribulation ; continuing instant in prayer ;
text2: Ukunam Yus tsankatramkattajnia nu Enentáimtusrum warastarum . Wáitiakrumsha katsuntratarum . Tuke iniaitsuk Ashí Túrunamujai Yus áujsatarum .

text: Distributing to the necessity of saints ; given to hospitality .
text2: Yus - shuar atsumainia nujai Yáintarum . Irarsha pénker itiaatarum .

text: Bless them which persecute you : bless , and curse not .
text2: Yajauch awajtamainia nu shiir awajsatarum . Yus yajauch yumintsuk nu shuaran pénker Túrawarat tusarum seattiarum .

text: Rejoice with them that do rejoice , and weep with them that weep .
text2: Warainia nujai warastarum . Kúntuts pujuinia nujaisha uuttiarum .

text: Be of the same mind one toward another . Mind not high things , but condescend to men of low estate . Be not wise in your own conceits .
text2: Chikichik Enentáijiai métekrak shiir Enentáimtunaitiarum . Nankaamantu Enentáimtumasairap . Antsu péejchach ajastarum . " Ti nekajai " tu Enentáimtumasairap .

text: Recompense to no man evil for evil . Provide things honest in the sight of all men .
text2: Shuar ámin yajauch awajtamkuisha nincha yapajkiataj tu Enentáimsáip . Aents iisam pénker áminia nu amesha tuke Túratá .

text: If it be possible , as much as lieth in you , live peaceably with all men .
text2: Ame jeamna nujai Ashí shuarjai nawamnaikiam wekasata .

text: Dearly beloved , avenge not yourselves , but rather give place unto wrath : for it is written , Vengeance is mine ; I will repay , saith the Lord .
text2: Yuska ni Papiriin juna aamtikramiayi : " Wíitjai tunaan Asutiátniun . Wisha yapajkiattajai " tawai Uunt Yus . Tuma asamtai yatsuru , kajertamkuisha atumsha yapajkiairap . Antsu yajauch awajtamkana nuna Yus Iistí . Yus Asutiáti .

text: Therefore if thine enemy hunger , feed him ; if he thirst , give him drink : for in so doing thou shalt heap coals of fire on his head .
text2: Tura nu arantcha tawai : " Ame nemasrum tsukamakuisha ayurata . Kitiamakuisha umartin susata . Nu Túrakum pénker ajachua nu iniatsaartatme . "

text: Be not overcome of evil , but overcome evil with good .
text2: Yajauch nupettamkain . Antsu pénker Túrakum yajauchia nu nupetkata .

text: Let every soul be subject unto the higher powers . For there is no power but of God : the powers that be are ordained of God .
text2: Akupniunka Ashí shuar umirkatniuiti . Akupniuka Yus apujsamuiti . Yus apujsachma akupin atsawai .

text: Whosoever therefore resisteth the power , resisteth the ordinance of God : and they that resist shall receive to themselves damnation .
text2: Tuma asamtai shuar akupniun umirtsuna nu , Yus apujsamun umireachu asa nekas Asutniátniuiti .

text: For rulers are not a terror to good works , but to the evil . Wilt thou then not be afraid of the power ? do that which is good , and thou shalt have praise of the same :
text2: Kame akupniuka pénker shuar sapijmiakarat tusar apujsachma ainiawai . Antsu yajauch shuar ashamkarat tusar apujsamu ainiawai . Nii ashamtsuk pujustin wakerakmeka pénker Túratá . Túrakminkia akupin shiir Enentáimturmartatui .

text: For he is the minister of God to thee for good . But if thou do that which is evil , be afraid ; for he beareth not the sword in vain : for he is the minister of God , a revenger to execute wrath upon him that doeth evil .
text2: Yainmakat tusa Yus apujsamuiti . Antsu yajauch Túrakmeka akupin nekas ashamkatniuitme . Warí , Yus ántar apujsachmaiti . Tunáa shuaran Asutiátniun Yus apujsaiti .

text: Wherefore ye must needs be subject , not only for wrath , but also for conscience sake .
text2: Nu asamtai akupin tuke umirkatniuiti . Aya Asutiuáwain tusar umirkashtiniaitji . Antsu shiir Enentáijiai wekasatin umirkatniuiti .

text: For for this cause pay ye tribute also : for they are God ' s ministers , attending continually upon this very thing .
text2: Tuma asamtai Núnisan akupniun kuit Súsatniua nu Páchitsuk susatarum . Nu takatan pujursarat tusa Yus apujsaruiti .

text: Render therefore to all their dues : tribute to whom tribute is due ; custom to whom custom ; fear to whom fear ; honour to whom honour .
text2: Ashí Túratniua nu Túratarum . Akiktiniaitkiumka Páchitsuk akikta . Akupniusha uuntcha Ashí Núnisan írunna nusha shiir Enentáimtikratarum .

text: Owe no man any thing , but to love one another : for he that loveth another hath fulfilled the law .
text2: Kuitjai tumashrintin airap . Antsu mai anenai tuke ajatarum . Chíkich shuar aneakum niin pénker Túrattame . Túram Ashí akupkamu Páchitsuk umirkattame .

text: For this , Thou shalt not commit adultery , Thou shalt not kill , Thou shalt not steal , Thou shalt not bear false witness , Thou shalt not covet ; and if there be any other commandment , it is briefly comprehended in this saying , namely , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: Akupkamusha tawai : " Tsanirmawaip , mankartuawaip , kasamkaip , Chíkich shuar tsanumpruraip , chikichna wakerutkaip " tawai . Tura nusha Ashí chikichik chichamjain Tíminiaiti : " Ame ayashim aneam Núnismek Ashí shuar aneata . "

text: Love worketh no ill to his neighbour : therefore love is the fulfilling of the law .
text2: Shuar Chíkich shuaran aneakka yajauch awajsashtatui . Tuma asa akupkamun ti shiir umirkattawai .

text: And that , knowing the time , that now it is high time to awake out of sleep : for now is our salvation nearer than when we believed .
text2: Ii Yámankamtaik Yus nekas Enentáimtusmiaj nui " Ii ti shiir ajasar tuke uwempratin ukunam átatui " tu Enentáimprachmashiaj ~ i . Antsu yamaikia nu tsawant yuntumsamtai Ashí Túrajnia nujai shintiarar Enentáimpratniuitji .

text: The night is far spent , the day is at hand : let us therefore cast off the works of darkness , and let us put on the armour of light .
text2: Tuke Káshiitiat tsawaatemprai . Ii Uuntri Kristu Jú Tunáa nunkanam Tátin ishichik ajasai . Tuma asamtai ii Túrutairi kiritniua Núnisan yajauch Túrutai ana nuka Túrutsuk Tsáapninium pénker wekasatin kakaram ajastai .

text: Let us walk honestly , as in the day ; not in rioting and drunkenness , not in chambering and wantonness , not in strife and envying .
text2: Túratniua nujai métek wekasatai . Tsawai wekaakur kiritniunam uumkar Tunáa Túrutai Túrashtai . Nampetsuk , yajauch warartsuk , tsanirmatsuk , jianaitsuk , tura kajernaitsuk aya pénker Túratai .

text: But put ye on the Lord Jesus Christ , and make not provision for the flesh , to fulfil the lusts thereof .
text2: Ii Uuntri Jesukrístu Túramia Núnisrik Túratai . Tura ii Ayashí wakeramu umikiat tusar tsankatkashtiniaitji .

text: Him that is weak in the faith receive ye , but not to doubtful disputations .
text2: Shuar Yúsan ishichik Enentáimtana nu itiaatarum tura kakantrairap .

text: For one believeth that he may eat all things : another , who is weak , eateth herbs .
text2: Iis , Chíkichka Ashí yuamniaiti tuiniawai . Tura chikichcha , Yúsnan awajirar , naman Yúashtiniaiti tuiniawai .

text: Let not him that eateth despise him that eateth not ; and let not him which eateth not judge him that eateth : for God hath received him .
text2: Tura Ashí Yúa nuka namanken Yúatsna nuna wishikrashtiniaiti . Núnisan Ashí yucha nu Ashí yuun kakantrashtiniaiti . Warí , Núnaka Yus ni shuarin awajsachukait .

text: Who art thou that judgest another man ' s servant ? to his own master he standeth or falleth . Yea , he shall be holden up : for God is able to make him stand .
text2: ṡAmeka timiataash pénkeraitiam Chíkich shuar kakantinia ? Antsu ni uuntrin ni pénker Túramuncha tura yajauch Túramuncha iischatniukait . Enentáimpratá . Yus kakaram asa niin pénker awajsamniaiti .

text: One man esteemeth one day above another : another esteemeth every day alike . Let every man be fully persuaded in his own mind .
text2: Chikichcha Enentáimpratai . Chíkich shuar tsawantan achikiar " Jú tsawantai Yus nankaamas shiir awajsatniuiti " tuiniawai . Chikichcha Ashí tsawantan métek Enentáimtuiniawai . Ayu , tura ni Enentáimtamun nekas paant nekaatniuiti .

text: He that regardeth the day , regardeth it unto the Lord ; and he that regardeth not the day , to the Lord he doth not regard it . He that eateth , eateth to the Lord , for he giveth God thanks ; and he that eateth not , to the Lord he eateth not , and giveth God thanks .
text2: Chikichik tsawantan Enentáimtakka Yusan shiir awajsatniun Túrawai . Tura Ashí métekrak Enentáimtakka Yúsan shiir awajsataj tusa Túrawai . Yurumkajaisha Ashí Yúana nu Yúsan yuminkias shiir awajsataj tusa Túrawai . Núnisan Ashí Yúatsna nusha Yúsan yuminkias shiir awajsataj tusa Túrawai .

text: For none of us liveth to himself , and no man dieth to himself .
text2: Iikkia ii Enentáijiain iwiaaktsuji . Tura Jáakrisha ii Enentáijiain jaatsji .

text: For whether we live , we live unto the Lord ; and whether we die , we die unto the Lord : whether we live therefore , or die , we are the Lord ' s .
text2: Kame iwiaaku pujakrisha ii Uuntri Kristu shiir awajsatai tusar pujurji . Tura Jáakrisha tuke Níiniuitji . Nu asamtai iwiaaku pujakrisha tura jakarsha tuke Krístunuitji .

text: For to this end Christ both died , and rose , and revived , that he might be Lord both of the dead and living .
text2: Kame jakancha iwiaakuncha Ashí ni Uuntri ajastaj tusa Kristu jaka nantakmiayi .

text: But why dost thou judge thy brother ? or why dost thou set at nought thy brother ? for we shall all stand before the judgment seat of Christ .
text2: Tura ṡurukamtai ame yatsum " yajauchiiti " tame . Urukamtai nakitiam ? Warí , Ashí iikia ii Túramu paant awajnasat tusar Kristui naka wajastatji .

text: For it is written , As I live , saith the Lord , every knee shall bow to me , and every tongue shall confess to God .
text2: Nu asamtai Yus - Papinium tawai : " Wi nekas iwiaaku Pujá asan Ashí Winí tikishmatrurartatui . Tura Ashí " Yus asa tuke pénker Túriniaiti " Túrutiartatui " tawai . " Tu aarmaiti .

text: So then every one of us shall give account of himself to God .
text2: Tuma asamtai iisha chikichik chikichik Ashí ii Túramu Yus paant ujakartatji .

text: Let us not therefore judge one another any more : but judge this rather , that no man put a stumblingblock or an occasion to fall in his brother ' s way .
text2: Nu asamtai " yajauch Túriniaiti " tu áujmatnaisashtiniaitji . Antsu ii yachi tunaanum ajuarchatin ti Enentáimturtiniaitji .

text: I know , and am persuaded by the Lord Jesus , that there is nothing unclean of itself : but to him that esteemeth any thing to be unclean , to him it is unclean .
text2: Jesukrístu jintintiamu asan juna nékajai : Yus najanamuka pénkerchaka atsawai . Ashí Túramniaitjai . Túrasha shuar chichaak " Nu Túrushtainti " Táyat nuna Túrakka niijiai tunaiti .

text: But if thy brother be grieved with thy meat , now walkest thou not charitably . Destroy not him with thy meat , for whom Christ died .
text2: Tuma asamtai shuar chichartamuk " Nu Yúakminkia Yusjai pénkerchaiti " tai , ame Yúakminkia nu shuar itiurchat Enentáimsashtatuak . Tura niisha tunaanum iniaar menkakamniaiti . Nu shuar aneakum Túratsme . Enentáimpratá . Aya ame yuamna nujain ame yatsum Kristu jarukmia nu Emenkákaip .

text: Let not then your good be evil spoken of :
text2: Tura " yuamniaitjai " Táyatam wi Yúakui yajauch áujmatrusarain tusam iniaisata .

text: For the kingdom of God is not meat and drink ; but righteousness , and peace , and joy in the Holy Ghost .
text2: Kame Yus umirkatin Yurumátniujaisha umartinjaisha Enentáimtuschatniuiti . Antsu Yusa Wakaníjiai shiir wekasar Yusjai tura shuarjai nawamnaikiar ti pénker wekasatniuitji .

text: For he that in these things serveth Christ is acceptable to God , and approved of men .
text2: Ashí shuar Krístun Núnis umireakui Yussha tura Chíkich shuarsha pénker Enentáimtuiniawai .

text: Let us therefore follow after the things which make for peace , and things wherewith one may edify another .
text2: Nu asamtai tuke shiir pujusminia nu Túrakur Yusjai kakaram ajastin Yáiniaiktai .

text: For meat destroy not the work of God . All things indeed are pure ; but it is evil for that man who eateth with offence .
text2: Yus iisam Ashí yuamniaitji . Antsu ame yuamna nujai Chíkich shuar tunaanum ajuartin tunaiti . Tuma asamtai ame yuam nujai Yus nu shuara Enentáin takarsamu emesraip .

text: It is good neither to eat flesh , nor to drink wine , nor any thing whereby thy brother stumbleth , or is offended , or is made weak .
text2: Nu Túrashtin nuikia naman Yúashtincha Karía umarchatniusha pénkeraiti . Warí , Túrushtaijiai ame Yátsum itiurchat Enentáimtikram tunaanum ajuarchatapash . Tura nu shuar Yúsan nekas Enentáimtuschamnia ajastatui . Nuka Atsutí .

text: Hast thou faith ? have it to thyself before God . Happy is he that condemneth not himself in that thing which he alloweth .
text2: Ame Yus nekas Enentáimtakum Ashí Túramniaitkiumka Yúsak wararsata . Shuar Yus iimmianum shiir Enentáijiai mash Túramnia nu nekas Shíiraiti .

text: And he that doubteth is damned if he eat , because he eateth not of faith : for whatsoever is not of faith is sin .
text2: Tura araantushim yua nuka Yúsan shiir Enentáimtutsuk yua asa sumamattawai . Kame Ashí Yus shiir Enentáimtutsuk Túramu tunaiti .

text: We then that are strong ought to bear the infirmities of the weak , and not to please ourselves .
text2: Yusjai katsuaru ájinia nu iik Enentáimtumatsuk kakarmachu ainia nu Yáintiniaitji .

text: Let every one of us please his neighbour for his good to edification .
text2: Chíkich shuar wakeramu Enentáimtustiniaitji . Tura Yusjai nu nankaamas shiir wekasatniun Yáinminiaitkiui Túratniuitji .

text: For even Christ pleased not himself ; but , as it is written , The reproaches of them that reproached thee fell on me .
text2: Krístusha ni wakeramun Túrachmiayi . Antsu Yus - Chicham tana Núnisan chikichnan Enentáimtusmiayi . Nu asamtai Yúsan umirin asa Wáitiak timia nu aarmaiti : " Amin katsekramainiak Winiaja katsekrukarmiayi . "

text: For whatsoever things were written aforetime were written for our learning , that we through patience and comfort of the scriptures might have hope .
text2: Núnisan Ashí yaunchu Yus - Papinium aarma iin jintintramatniun aararmiayi . Nujai atsantamkurin shiir Wáinkiattajnia nuka katsuntrar Nákastatji .

text: Now the God of patience and consolation grant you to be likeminded one toward another according to Christ Jesus :
text2: Yus atsantamar katsuntratniun jintintramji . Tuma asa Jesukrístu Túramia aintsan atumniasha chikichik Enentáijiai Enentáimtunaisar pujustinian Yáinmakartí .

text: That ye may with one mind and one mouth glorify God , even the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Nujai Ashí métekrak Yus shiir awajsattarme . Niisha ii Uuntri Jesukrístuncha Aparínti .

text: Wherefore receive ye one another , as Christ also received us to the glory of God .
text2: Tuma asamtai Chíkich shuarjaisha shiir awajnaisatarum . Kristu Núnisan Yúsan shiir awajsat tusa incha shiir awajtamsamiaji .

text: Now I say that Jesus Christ was a minister of the circumcision for the truth of God , to confirm the promises made unto the fathers :
text2: Juna tajai . Kristu Israer - shuaran Yáintaj tusa Támiayi . Tura Yus ti yaunchu nuna weatrin " Túrataj " timia nu uminkiat tusa Támiayi . Nujai Yus timia nuna umikmia nu nekaamniaiti .

text: And that the Gentiles might glorify God for his mercy ; as it is written , For this cause I will confess to thee among the Gentiles , and sing unto thy name .
text2: Tura nu arantcha Israer - shuarchasha Yus waitnentrartin ásarmatai niin shiir awajsarat tusa Támiayi . Tura Yus - Papisha tawai : " Amin kantamprakun Ashí shuarnum shiir awajsattajme . "

text: And again he saith , Rejoice , ye Gentiles , with his people .
text2: Tura nu arantcha tawai : " Ashí nunkanmaya shuartiram Ashí Israer - shuar Yúsna ainia nujai warastarum . "

text: And again , Praise the Lord , all ye Gentiles ; and laud him , all ye people .
text2: Tura ataksha tawai : " Ashí aents ii Uuntrin shiir awajsarti . Tura Ashí shuarsha Niin " Ti uuntaiti " Tiartí " tawai .

text: And again , Esaias saith , There shall be a root of Jesse , and he that shall rise to reign over the Gentiles ; in him shall the Gentiles trust .
text2: Isayassha aarmiayi : " Tawitia Aparí Isai weatriya akupin akiinkiattawai . Niisha Ashí nunkan akupeakui Ashí shuar niiniak shiir Enentáimtusartatui . " Tu aarmaiti .

text: Now the God of hope fill you with all joy and peace in believing , that ye may abound in hope , through the power of the Holy Ghost .
text2: Yus Ashí Shíiran suramsattakrin nu shiir Nákaji . Tuma asamtai Nii nekas Enentáimtakrumin warasa shiir pujustinian Yamái suramsati . Nuyá Yusa Wakaní kakarmarijiai ti shiir Enentáijiai katsuntrarum , nu Nákastarum .

text: And I myself also am persuaded of you , my brethren , that ye also are full of goodness , filled with all knowledge , able also to admonish one another .
text2: Yatsurú , atumsha anenainiaitrume . Tura Ashí Yusna nekaarum nuamtak chicharnaikiatin nékarme .

text: Nevertheless , brethren , I have written the more boldly unto you in some sort , as putting you in mind , because of the grace that is given to me of God ,
text2: Tuma ain kajinmatkiirum tusan ataksha ti paant aakun Jú Enentáimtikeajrume . Yus winia waitnentrak ni Chichamen etserkat tusa akuptakui nuna aatjarme .

text: That I should be the minister of Jesus Christ to the Gentiles , ministering the gospel of God , that the offering up of the Gentiles might be acceptable , being sanctified by the Holy Ghost .
text2: Kame Jesukrístu Israer - shuarchanum Yusa shiir chichamen etserkat tusa akuptukuiti . Nuna Túrakun Israer - shuarchan Yusa Wakaníjiai shiir awajsamu ásarmatai Yusai juiniajai . Tura Yussha shiir Enentáijiai itiainiawai .

text: I have therefore whereof I may glory through Jesus Christ in those things which pertain to God .
text2: Jesukrístu yaintiu asamtai Yusna takarsamaj nuna wararsamniaitjai .

text: For I will not dare to speak of any of those things which Christ hath not wrought by me , to make the Gentiles obedient , by word and deed ,
text2: Tura Chíkich shuarjai Kristu Túramun pachischattajai . Aya wi chichasmajaisha tura wi Túramujaisha Israer - shuarchan Kristu umimtikiamia nunak áujmatsattajai .

text: Through mighty signs and wonders , by the power of the Spirit of God ; so that from Jerusalem , and round about unto Illyricum , I have fully preached the gospel of Christ .
text2: Yusa Shiir Wakaní kakarmarijiai aents tujintiamun Túran Ashí shuaran Jerusarén péprunam nankaman etserkin Iririkiu nunkanam ejekamjai . Kristu - chichaman Ashí nu nunkanam etserkaitjai .

text: Yea , so have I strived to preach the gospel , not where Christ was named , lest I should build upon another man ' s foundation :
text2: Nuna Túrakun Chíkich shuar etserkachmanum Krístunun ántichu ainiamunam Uwempratin Chichaman etserkaitjai . Nujai Chíkich takasmanum takarsachuitjai .

text: But as it is written , To whom he was not spoken of , they shall see : and they that have not heard shall understand .
text2: Yus - Papisha Núnisan tawai : " Chichaman penké antukcharuka nekaawartatui . Niin áujmatman anturkacharusha unuimiarartatui . "

text: For which cause also I have been much hindered from coming to you .
text2: Nuna pujuru asan iitjarum Táyatan iichmajrume .

text: But now having no more place in these parts , and having a great desire these many years to come unto you ;
text2: Tura yamaikia Juyá takatrun umikian tura Yáunchusha tuke iitjarum tiniu asan

text: Whensoever I take my journey into Spain , I will come to you : for I trust to see you in my journey , and to be brought on my way thitherward by you , if first I be somewhat filled with your company .
text2: Ispania nukanam wéakun iistatjarme . Tura Atumíin shiir irasan Ispanianam wéakui atumsha yaintkiarum shiir akuptukchattarpash .

text: But now I go unto Jerusalem to minister unto the saints .
text2: Tura yamaikia kuitjai Jerusarénnumia Yus - shuaran Yáintaj tusan wéajai .

text: For it hath pleased them of Macedonia and Achaia to make a certain contribution for the poor saints which are at Jerusalem .
text2: Masetúnianmaya shuarsha tura Akayanmaya shuarsha Kuítian irurar Jerusarénnumia Yus - shuaran atsumainia nuna akuptuktai tuiniawai .

text: It hath pleased them verily ; and their debtors they are . For if the Gentiles have been made partakers of their spiritual things , their duty is also to minister unto them in carnal things .
text2: Ti wakeruiniak Túrawarmiayi . Nu nekas Túrashtinkiait . Israer - shuarnumia Yus - Chichaman antukaru ásar yamaikia ni Kuítrijiai Páchitsuk Yáinchatniukait .

text: When therefore I have performed this , and have sealed to them this fruit , I will come by you into Spain .
text2: Tuma asamtai Jú kuitian Súsaran umiran nuikia Ispanianam wéakun iiktiatjarme .

text: And I am sure that , when I come unto you , I shall come in the fulness of the blessing of the gospel of Christ .
text2: Tura nui winiakun Kristu Shiir Chichamen nujai shiir Yáintajrum tusan ejeetittiajrume .

text: Now I beseech you , brethren , for the Lord Jesus Christ ' s sake , and for the love of the Spirit , that ye strive together with me in your prayers to God for me ;
text2: Yatsurú , ii Uuntri Jesukrístunu asarum tura ni Wakaní pujurtamkurmin anenia asarum Yus áujtursatarum . Núnisrum wijiai métek Yusna takastin yaintkiattarme .

text: That I may be delivered from them that do not believe in Judaea ; and that my service which I have for Jerusalem may be accepted of the saints ;
text2: Jutia nunkanmaya Israer - shuarnumia uwemtikrat tusarum Yus áujtursatarum . Tura Jú kuitian Júajna nunasha Jerusarénnumia Yus - shuar shiir Achikiartí tusarum Yus áujtursatarum .

text: That I may come unto you with joy by the will of God , and may with you be refreshed .
text2: Nujai , Yus wakerakuinkia , pénker Wampú Enentáimsan warasan iittiajrume .

text: Now the God of peace be with you all . Amen .
text2: Yus ti shiir pujustinian Súana nu atumjai tsanin pujurtamsati . Núnisan Atí .

text: I commend unto you Phebe our sister , which is a servant of the church which is at Cenchrea :
text2: Ii umai Jépeka Senkrea péprunmaya Yus - shuaran Yáiniaiti . Ti penker Yus - shuaraiti .

text: That ye receive her in the Lord , as becometh saints , and that ye assist her in whatsoever business she hath need of you : for she hath been a succourer of many , and of myself also .
text2: Kristu Náariin shiir Wáinkiatarum . Nuamtak Yachí Wáinkiatniua Núnisrum Wáinkiatarum . Niisha chikichnasha tura winiasha ti pénker Wáitin asamtai atumsha ni atsumamusha yaintarum .

text: Greet Priscilla and Aquila my helpers in Christ Jesus :
text2: Pirisirasha Akirasha wijiai métek Jesukrístunun takasaru ásar amikmaatainiajai .

text: Who have for my life laid down their own necks : unto whom not only I give thanks , but also all the churches of the Gentiles .
text2: Niisha winia uwemtikrurtai tusar Jáninkiarmiayi . Tuma asamtai yuminkiniajai . Tura aya Wíkichu antsu Ashí Israer - shuarchanumia Yus - shuar ainia nusha yuminkiniawai .

text: Likewise greet the church that is in their house . Salute my wellbeloved Epaenetus , who is the firstfruits of Achaia unto Christ .
text2: Núnisan Ashí Yus - shuar Pirisiran tura Akira jeen irunainia nusha amikmaatarum . Tura winia aneamu amikiur Epenetu amikmaatruatarum . Niisha Akaya nunkanam emka Krístun nekas Enentáimtusmiayi .

text: Greet Mary , who bestowed much labour on us .
text2: Marisha , atumjai ti takasua nu amikmaatruatarum .

text: Salute Andronicus and Junia , my kinsmen , and my fellowprisoners , who are of note among the apostles , who also were in Christ before me .
text2: Tura Wíi shuarsha Antrunikiusha Júniassha amikmaatruatarum . Niisha wijiai sepunam pujusarmai . Wijiai emka Krístun shiir Enentáimtusar Chíkich akatramujai nankaamas takasaru ainiawai .

text: Greet Amplias my beloved in the Lord .
text2: Ampriassha Krístunam winia aneamu amikiur asamtai amikmaatruatarum .

text: Salute Urbane , our helper in Christ , and Stachys my beloved .
text2: Urpanujaisha Jesukrístu Takatrí tsaninniuitji . Niisha tura aneamu Estakissha amikmaatruatarum .

text: Salute Apelles approved in Christ . Salute them which are of Aristobulus ' household .
text2: Apirissha amikmaatruatarum . Niisha Krístun ti shiir Enentáimtamu ti Páantaiti . Núnisan Aristúpuru shuarsha amikmaatruatarum .

text: Salute Herodion my kinsman . Greet them that be of the household of Narcissus , which are in the Lord .
text2: Wíishuar Erutiúnsha tura Narsisu shuarsha Kristu shuari ásarmatai amikmaatruawarta .

text: Salute Tryphena and Tryphosa , who labour in the Lord . Salute the beloved Persis , which laboured much in the Lord .
text2: Tripiniasha tura Tripiusasha Yúsnan takainia ásarmatai amikmaatruatarum . Núnisan ii umai Pírsitia Yúsnan ti takasu asamtai amikmaatruatarum .

text: Salute Rufus chosen in the Lord , and his mother and mine .
text2: Rúpusha , nusha ti penker Yus - shuar , tura Nukurísha amikmaatruatarum . Niisha wijiai nekas winia nukurua Núnisaiti .

text: Salute Asyncritus , Phlegon , Hermas , Patrobas , Hermes , and the brethren which are with them .
text2: Asinkritiusha , Pirikiuntisha , Ermassha , Patrupassha , Ermessha , tura Ashí niijiai Yús - shuar ainia nu amikmaatruatarum .

text: Salute Philologus , and Julia , Nereus , and his sister , and Olympas , and all the saints which are with them .
text2: Núnisan Jirurukusha , Júriasha , Néreusha , ni umaijiaisha , Urimpiassha , tura Ashí Yus - shuar niijiai pujuinia nu amikmaatruatarum .

text: Salute one another with an holy kiss . The churches of Christ salute you .
text2: Nuámtaksha shiir aujnaisatarum . Ashí Juyá Kristu shuari amikmaatmainiawai .

text: Now I beseech you , brethren , mark them which cause divisions and offences contrary to the doctrine which ye have learned ; and avoid them .
text2: Yatsurú , shuar Nusháa Enentáimtuiniak Yus - shuaran akanainiak itiurchat awajenawai . Nu shuar Wáinkiarum kanaktiarum . Ni yajauch Túramu átum pénker takastin unuimiarmena Núnischaiti .

text: For they that are such serve not our Lord Jesus Christ , but their own belly ; and by good words and fair speeches deceive the hearts of the simple .
text2: Nu shuar ii Uuntri Jesukrístunun takainiatsui . Antsu ni wakeramun uminiawai . Tura ti shiir chichasar nékachun anankenawai .

text: For your obedience is come abroad unto all men . I am glad therefore on your behalf : but yet I would have you wise unto that which is good , and simple concerning evil .
text2: Atum umirma Ashí shuar nékainiakur ti waraaji . Yajauch Túrutsuk aya pénker Túratin Enentáimsarum pujustarum .

text: And the God of peace shall bruise Satan under your feet shortly . The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you . Amen .
text2: Yus tuke shiir pujustinian amawa nu ti Wárik uunt iwianchin nupetturmaktatui . Tura ii Uuntri Jesukrístu shiir yainmakarti .

text: Timotheus my workfellow , and Lucius , and Jason , and Sosipater , my kinsmen , salute you .
text2: Timiutéusha , wijiai takau , amikmaatmarme . Núnisan Rúsiusha , Jasunsha , Susipatresha , mash Wíishuar ainia nu amikmaatmarme .

text: I Tertius , who wrote this epistle , salute you in the Lord .
text2: Wi , Tersiu asan , Papru chichamen ju papinium aateakun Kristu Náariin amikmaajrume .

text: Gaius mine host , and of the whole church , saluteth you . Erastus the chamberlain of the city saluteth you , and Quartus a brother .
text2: Káyusha amikmaatmarme . Ni jeen pujaji tura juisha Ashí Yus - shuar irunainiawai . Erastusha ju pepru Kuítrin Wáinniuiti . Niisha ii yachi Kuártujai amikmaatmarme .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all . Amen .
text2: Ii Uuntri Jesukrístu ti shiir yainmakarti . Núnisan Atí .

text: Now to him that is of power to stablish you according to my gospel , and the preaching of Jesus Christ , according to the revelation of the mystery , which was kept secret since the world began ,
text2: Watsek , Yus shiir awajsatai . Ninki nekas kakaram awajtamsamniaiti . Wi Uwempratin Chichamnum Jesukrístunun étsereaj nujai ikiantamprattawai . Nu chicham Yámankamtaiknumia nekaachmanak Yus yamaikia paant awajsaiti .

text: But now is made manifest , and by the scriptures of the prophets , according to the commandment of the everlasting God , made known to all nations for the obedience of faith :
text2: Yaunchu Yúsnan etserin ni aarmanum nu chichaman etserkarmiayi . Tura yamaikia Yus wakerak Ashí nunkanmaya shuar Nii Enentáimtusar umirkarat tusa nu Chichaman yamaikia paant awajsaiti . Yus amuutsuk tuke pujuwiti .

text: To God only wise , be glory through Jesus Christ for ever . Amen .
text2: Yúsak Ninki ti neka asa tura Jesukrístu ti penker tura asamtai Ninki tuke shiir Awájnástí . Nuke Atí .

text: Be ye followers of me , even as I also am of Christ .
text2: Wi Pápruitjai , Jesukrístu akatramu . Yus nuna wakerak , ni akatramuri Atí tusa anaitiukmai . Wi , ii yachi Sústinisjai , ju Papí akupeaji .

text: Now I praise you , brethren , that ye remember me in all things , and keep the ordinances , as I delivered them to you .
text2: Ashí Yus - shuar Kurintiu péprunam iruntrumna nu ju Papí akupeaji . Atumka Jesukrístujai tsaninkiu asarum yusna árume . Atumsha tura Ashí shuar Jesukrístun Enentáimtuiniana nunasha Yus ti pénker awajsatniun Wakerawai . nincha incha Jesukrístu mai metek Uuntrinti .

text: But I would have you know , that the head of every man is Christ ; and the head of the woman is the man ; and the head of Christ is God .
text2: Yus ii Aparí tura ii Uuntri Jesukrístusha waitnentramainia ásar yainmakarti imiatkinchanum tuke shiir pujustinian .

text: Every man praying or prophesying , having his head covered , dishonoureth his head .
text2: Yusan áujkun yuminsan atumin shiir Enentáimtajrume . Jesukrístujai tsaninkia pujakrumin Yus shiir Enentáimturmawai .

text: But every woman that prayeth or prophesieth with her head uncovered dishonoureth her head : for that is even all one as if she were shaven .
text2: Jesukrístujai tsaninkia pujakrumin Yus atumin ti Yáinmawai Ashí pénker ana nu Enentáimtakrum tuke shiir chichastinian .

text: For if the woman be not covered , let her also be shorn : but if it be a shame for a woman to be shorn or shaven , let her be covered .
text2: Kristu juna Túramniaiti Tíchamkaj ~ i . Ashí yamaikia uminkiayi .

text: For a man indeed ought not to cover his head , forasmuch as he is the image and glory of God : but the woman is the glory of the man .
text2: Tuma asamtai Ashí Yus Súramna nu atsumatsrume . Nu Túrakrum ii Uuntri Jesukrístu tatin tuke Nákarme .

text: For the man is not of the woman ; but the woman of the man .
text2: Tura iniaitsuk tuke emettamattawai ii Uuntri Jesukrístu Támatai atumi tunaarin pachischatin .

text: Neither was the man created for the woman ; but the woman for the man .
text2: Jesukrístu ii Uuntrinti . Niijiai tsaninkia Pujusúk tusa Yus achirmakmarme . Tura Nii tana nuna tuke umiktatui .

text: For this cause ought the woman to have power on her head because of the angels .
text2: Yatsuru , ii Uuntri Jesukrístu naari pachisan , seajrume métek Enentáimpratarum tusan . Níisháa Níisháa Enentáimprairap antsu chikichik Enentáijiai métek Enentáimsa pujustarum .

text: Nevertheless neither is the man without the woman , neither the woman without the man , in the Lord .
text2: Atum yajauch chicharnaisarum pujarme . Kruí shuari tu ujatkarmatai Tájarme .

text: For as the woman is of the man , even so is the man also by the woman ; but all things of god .
text2: Kame Júnis awai : Chíkich " Wi Páprunuitjai " tuiniawai . Chíkich " Apurusnaitjai " tuiniawai . Chikichcha " Wi Pítrunuitjai " tuiniawai . Chikichcha " Wi Kristu - shuaraitjai " tuiniawai .

text: Judge in yourselves : is it comely that a woman pray unto God uncovered ?
text2: ṡWarí , nuinkia , Kristu akantramukait . Páprusha Krúsnum jarutramkamaashi . Tura Papru naari pachisa imiaimiukaitrum ?

text: Doth not even nature itself teach you , that , if a man have long hair , it is a shame unto him ?
text2: Atumin Untsurí imiaichu asan shiir Enentáimjai . Aya Krispu Káyujai Jímiarchiniak imiaimjai .

text: But if a woman have long hair , it is a glory to her : for her hair is given her for a covering .
text2: Nújainkia shuar " Papru Náariin imiaimiuitjai " Tíchamniaiti .

text: But if any man seem to be contentious , we have no such custom , neither the churches of God .
text2: Maa , nekas , Estepanasa shuarincha imiaimjai tura Chíkich wi imiaimiun nékatsjai .

text: Now in this that I declare unto you I praise you not , that ye come together not for the better , but for the worse .
text2: Kristu imiakrattia tusa akuptukchamai antsu uwempratin chichaman etserkat tusa akuptukmai . Tura ti neka chichainia Núnisan chichaatsjai shuar wi shiir chichaamun Enentáimprarain tusan . Antsu Yúpichuch chichaajai Kristu Krúsnum jakamuk paant Atí tusan .

text: For first of all , when ye come together in the church , I hear that there be divisions among you ; and I partly believe it .
text2: Kristu Krúsnum jarutramkamu étsereaji . Antsu Yus - shuarchaka menkaakatniunam wéana nu , " ántraiti nu chicham " tu Enentáimainiawai . Antsu Yus - shuarti , uwempratniunam wéakur , " nu chichamjai Yusa kakarmari takusminiaiti " tu Enentáimji .

text: For there must be also heresies among you , that they which are approved may be made manifest among you .
text2: Núnisan tawai Yus - Chicham yaunchu aarma : " Ju nunkanmayan ti neka ainiana nuna chichamen emesrattajai ; ti unuimiararu ainianak ántar awajsattajai " tawai Yus ni chichamen .

text: When ye come together therefore into one place , this is not to eat the Lord ' s supper .
text2: Iis , ju nunkanam uwempratin chicham íruntsuk . Nu chichaman Ashí mash Yus ántar awajsaiti . Ti neka ainiana nusha , jintinkiartin ainiana nusha , Ashí ju nunkanmayan unuimiar ti chichastinian nékana nusha , nu shuar mash " wi Tájana nujai pénker pujusam uwemprattame " tu Enentáimiainiawai . Tura Núnaka mash Yus penké ántar najanaiti .

text: For in eating every one taketh before other his own supper : and one is hungry , and another is drunken .
text2: Aya ni nékamujai aents Yúsan nekaacharmiayi . Núnisan Atí tusa Yus Túramiayi , Timiá neka asa . Antsu Ashí aentsun Yus ni chichamejai uwemtikratniun wakerimiayi . Chíkich " ántraiti " tuiniana nu chichamjain ~ ki Yus Niin Enentáimtuinia Núnaka uwemtikratniun wakerak Túramiayi .

text: What ? have ye not houses to eat and to drink in ? or despise ye the church of God , and shame them that have not ? What shall I say to you ? shall I praise you in this ? I praise you not .
text2: Israer - shuar " aentsti Túrachminian iniakmasta , wi nekaataj " tuiniawai . Kriaku shuarsha " ti Enentáimsam , mash pénker Jíikim turuttia wisha métek Enentáimprataj " tuiniawai .

text: For I have received of the Lord that which also I delivered unto you , That the Lord Jesus the same night in which he was betrayed took bread :
text2: Iikia antsu Kristu Krúsnum jarutramkamuk étsereaji . Israer - shuarsha " ju chicham natsantaiti " tu Enentáimiainiawai . Israer - shuarchasha " ju chicham ántraiti " tu Enentáimiainiawai .

text: And when he had given thanks , he brake it , and said , Take , eat : this is my body , which is broken for you : this do in remembrance of me .
text2: Tura Yus achikiarma , Niiniu ajasarat tusa , Israer - shuarsha Israer - shuarchasha mai metek " Kristu Krúsnum jarutramak Yusa kakarmarincha ni nekatairincha paant iniakmasmiayi " tu Enentáimji .

text: After the same manner also he took the cup , when he had supped , saying , This cup is the new testament in my blood : this do ye , as oft as ye drink it , in remembrance of me .
text2: " Yusa nekatairi ántraiti " tuiniawai aents , Túrasha Imiá nekas pénkeraiti . " Yusa kakarmarisha jeatsui " tuiniawai aents , Túrasha Imiá nekas kakarmaiti .

text: For as often as ye eat this bread , and drink this cup , ye do shew the Lord ' s death till he come .
text2: Enentáimtumastarum yatsuru . Yus achirmakmarme Niiniu ajastinian , tura ju nunkanam ti neka ainia Núnisan Atumíin ti neka íruntsui . Ti akupniusha ti nankaamakusha Atumíin íruntsui .

text: Wherefore whosoever shall eat this bread , and drink this cup of the Lord , unworthily , shall be guilty of the body and blood of the Lord .
text2: Antsu ju nunkanam nékachua Núnis ana nuna Yus achikiuiti ti neka nuna Iniatsáartinian . Tura ju nunkanam kakarmachua Núnis ana nunasha Yus achikiuiti kakarma nuna Iniatsáartinian .

text: But let a man examine himself , and so let him eat of that bread , and drink of that cup .
text2: Péejchachincha , nakitsamuncha , ántrachincha , Yus achikiuiti Ashí nankaamantu írunna nuna amuktinian .

text: For he that eateth and drinketh unworthily , eateth and drinketh damnation to himself , not discerning the Lord ' s body .
text2: Nújainkia chikichkisha Yusjai waantu Enentáimprachminiaiti .

text: For this cause many are weak and sickly among you , and many sleep .
text2: Tura Yus atumin Krístujai tsanin apujtamsaiti . Tura Kristu Enentáimtusar Yus nekas nekatainkia nekaattaji . Kristu Enentáimtakrin Yus shiir Enentáimturmaji , pénker awajtamji , tura uwemtikramji .

text: For if we would judge ourselves , we should not be judged .
text2: Yus - Papinium yaunchu aarma Núniskete : " Shuar nankaamantu Enentáimprataj Tákunka ii Uuntri Yus Túramun wararsati . "

text: Now concerning spiritual gifts , brethren , I would not have you ignorant .
text2: Wisha , yatsuru , atumiin jeamaj nui Yus - chichaman ti neka chichainia aintsan tura íwiasanak ujakchamajrume .

text: Ye know that ye were Gentiles , carried away unto these dumb idols , even as ye were led .
text2: Tura atumjai pujakun aya chikichkiniak nekaatniun Enentáimpramjai . Júiti : Jesukrístu , tura Jesukrístu Krúsnum jakamu .

text: Wherefore I give you to understand , that no man speaking by the Spirit of God calleth Jesus accursed : and that no man can say that Jesus is the Lord , but by the Holy Ghost .
text2: Nékayatan kakarmachu Sapíjmiashím jearmiajrume .

text: Now there are diversities of gifts , but the same Spirit .
text2: Yus - Chichaman ujaakun ti neka chichainia aintsan nupetkataj tu Enentáimturchamajrume . Antsu Yusa kakarmarincha tura ni Wakanincha paant iniakmasan Yus - Chichaman ujakmajrume .

text: And there are differences of administrations , but the same Lord .
text2: Aentsu nekatairijiai Yus Enentáimtuschatniuiti antsu Yusa kakarmari paant nekaarum Yus Enentáimtustiniaitrume . Nuní asamtai Yus - Chichaman tu ujakmajrume .

text: And there are diversities of operations , but it is the same God which worketh all in all .
text2: Túmaitiat Yusa nekatairi átsuk . Yúsnan unuimiararujai Yusa nekatairin áujmatji . Tura Yusa nekatairinkia aentsu nekatairi aintsachuiti . Ju nunkanam akupin ainia nuna nekatairinchuiti Yúsnaka . Ju nunkanam akupniuka ishichik pujus amuukachartatuak .

text: But the manifestation of the Spirit is given to every man to profit withal .
text2: Yaunchu ju nunka atsain Yus iin uwemtikrampratniun Enentáimpramiayi ti shiir pujusarmi tusa . Ju Yusa Enentáimmiari yaunchu nekanachmiayi , tura yamaikia nu nekaar áujmatji .

text: For to one is given by the Spirit the word of wisdom ; to another the word of knowledge by the same Spirit ;
text2: Ju nunkanam akupniuka nuna penké nekaacharmiayi . Nékainiakka ii Uuntri Timiá shiira nuna , Krúsnum Máacharu aayi .

text: To another faith by the same Spirit ; to another the gifts of healing by the same Spirit ;
text2: Yaunchu Yus - Papinium aarchamukait : " Shuar Yúsan aneana nuna Yus ti Shíiran susattawai . Susattana nuka Timiá pénker asamtai shuar Wáinkiachman , antukchamuncha , Enentáimtachmancha Yus susattawai " tu aarmaiti .

text: To another the working of miracles ; to another prophecy ; to another discerning of spirits ; to another divers kinds of tongues ; to another the interpretation of tongues :
text2: Tura Yusa Wakaní ii Enentáin pujurtamuk Yus suramsattajnia nuna Yamái paant jintintramji . Nu Wakancha imia Yus Enentáimmiancha mash nékawai .

text: But all these worketh that one and the selfsame Spirit , dividing to every man severally as he will .
text2: Shuar Enentáimna nuna Chíkich shuar nekaamniakait . Antsu aya Ní Enentáijiain nékatsuk . Núnisan aya Yusa Wakaní Yúsnan paant nékawai .

text: For as the body is one , and hath many members , and all the members of that one body , being many , are one body : so also is Christ .
text2: Ju nunkanmaya aents Enentáimiainia nujai Yusna nekaachminiaiti . Antsu Yusa Wakanin iin Súramaj nujai Yus shiir tsankatramajnia nu nekaamniaitji .

text: For by one Spirit are we all baptized into one body , whether we be Jews or Gentiles , whether we be bond or free ; and have been all made to drink into one Spirit .
text2: Yusa Wakaní jintintramji Yúsnan chichastinian Nii wakera aintsan . Ni chichamen Súramji . Túramtai ii nékamujai Yúsna étsertsuji . Tuma asamtai imia Yusna nuka Yusjai pénker wekainia nu Jintíaji .

text: For the body is not one member , but many .
text2: Yus - shuarcha Yusa Wakaníniun ántatsui ántraiti tusa . Aya Yusa Wakaní jintintiamniaitkiui Yus - shuarcha nuna penké nekaachmin ainiawai .

text: If the foot shall say , Because I am not the hand , I am not of the body ; is it therefore not of the body ?
text2: Antsu Yusa Wakanin takaku Ashí mash iis , pénkera nuna nekaamniaiti . Nii Túrana nunasha Chíkich shuar Súmamtikiachminiaiti .

text: And if the ear shall say , Because I am not the eye , I am not of the body ; is it therefore not of the body ?
text2: Yus - Papinium yaunchu aarmaiti : " ṡYusa Enentáimmiari ya neka . Tura Yúsan ya jintintiamniait ? " tu aarmaiti . Tuma ain iikia Yus - shuar ájinia nu , Kristu Enentáimna Núnisrik Enentáimji .

text: Though I speak with the tongues of men and of angels , and have not charity , I am become as sounding brass , or a tinkling cymbal .
text2: Tura wikia , yatsuru , nuik ai atumjai pujakun Yusa Wakanín umirniun chichastinia aintsanak atumjai chichastinian tujinkiamjai . Antsu ayash wakeramu umirin asakrumin Krístunam katsuarcharujai chichastinia aintsanak atumjai chichasmajai .

text: And though I have the gift of prophecy , and understand all mysteries , and all knowledge ; and though I have all faith , so that I could remove mountains , and have not charity , I am nothing .
text2: Uchi Kuírach naman ayurachminiaiti antsu aya umuntsatniuiti . Núnisan aya Yúpichuchin ujakmajrume , itiurchat ana nu tujintiakrumin . Tura yamaisha itiurchat ana nu tuke tujintiarme .

text: And though I bestow all my goods to feed the poor , and though I give my body to be burned , and have not charity , it profiteth me nothing .
text2: Tuke ayash wakeramu umirniuitrume . Yajauch Enentáimtunaiyakrum tura katsumnaiyakrum akantramuitrume . Nujai Páantaiti átum ayash wakeramu umirniuitrume . Yúsnan Enentáimticharujai métek wekainiaitrume .

text: Charity suffereth long , and is kind ; charity envieth not ; charity vaunteth not itself , is not puffed up ,
text2: Atumíinkia shuar " wi Páprunuitjai " tuiniatsuk . Chikichcha " wi Apurusnaitjai " tuiniatsuk . Tu chichaakrum ayash wakeramu umirniuitrume .

text: Doth not behave itself unseemly , seeketh not her own , is not easily provoked , thinketh no evil ;
text2: Wátsek . Wi Papru ti pénkeraashitiaj . Apurussha ti pénkeraashit . Antsu iisha aya Yusa takarniurintji . Yus - Chicham étserkurin ii Uuntri Enentáimtuschamkuram . Ii Uuntri takatan Chíkich Chíkich suramsamajnia nuke takasmaji .

text: Rejoiceth not in iniquity , but rejoiceth in the truth ;
text2: Wi Yus - Chichaman étserkun arakan araktinia ainis takasmajai . Apurussha entsan ukatramai . Tura Yus nu arakan tsakatmarmai .

text: Beareth all things , believeth all things , hopeth all things , endureth all things .
text2: Arakan araana nusha , entsan ukatna nusha ántrachukait . Antsu Yusak arakan tsakatmaru asa Ashí Túrachukait .

text: Charity never faileth : but whether there be prophecies , they shall fail ; whether there be tongues , they shall cease ; whether there be knowledge , it shall vanish away .
text2: Arakan araana nusha , entsan ukatna nusha métek ainiawai . Túmaitkiuisha takasmajai métek Yus akiktatui . Pénker takasmatainkia pénker akiktatui .

text: For we know in part , and we prophesy in part .
text2: Wisha Apurussha Yusa takatri mai tsaninkiar takaaji . Tura Yus Atumí Enentáin takaakui atumsha Yusa Núnkea aintsaitrume . Jeasha Enentáimpramniaiti . Yus atumjai takaak Jeá jeamtinia aintsan takaawai .

text: When I was a child , I spake as a child , I understood as a child , I thought as a child : but when I became a man , I put away childish things .
text2: Jea jeamainiak , emka uunt kaya Nunká init ikiursar kaki awajsatin ainiawai . Tura nuyanka nu kayanam ekeniar Júkitniuiti jea wewe Atí tusa . Wikia Jeá jeammin ti unuiniamiarua aintsanak uunt kaya Nunká emka ikiustinian nekaan , Núnisnak Jesukrístunun emka ujakmajrume . Tura Jesukrístu uunt kaya kaki ikiusma ainis asa Nínkiti nui jea ekenkatin . Iis , Ashí Enentáimtustinia nankaamas Jesukrístu Enentáimtustiniaiti . Nu asamtai Jesukrístunun emka ujakmajrume . Yus nuna etserkatniun tsankatrukuiti . Wi emka , uunt kaya ikiursatniua aintsan , Jesukrístunun ujakmajrume . Tura nuyanka Chíkich shuar ekeniar jeammin ainiawai . Tura anearti pénker jeamtinian .

text: For now we see through a glass , darkly ; but then face to face : now I know in part ; but then shall I know even as also I am known .
text2: Tura jea jeamainiak nii wakerak pénker ana nujai jeamminiaiti . Nii pénker jeamtinian wakerak kurijiaisha , Kuítjaisha , Shíirmach kayajaisha jeamminiaiti . Chíkich jeamkuka numijiaisha , kenkujaisha , nukajaisha jeamminiaiti . Núnisan shuar Yúsnan takaak pénker takasminiaiti Túrasha Nánkamas takasminiaiti .

text: And now abideth faith , hope , charity , these three ; but the greatest of these is charity .
text2: Tura amuukatin tsawant jeakui Ashí ni takatri paant átatui . Nu tsawantaisha Yúsaiya ji átatui tura nu jisha ni takatri pénkera nunasha tura yajauchia nunasha nekapsattawai .

text: Follow after charity , and desire spiritual gifts , but rather that ye may prophesy .
text2: Júnisan Ashí shuar Enentáimturmastiniaitji . Iikia aya Kristu Yáintrintji . Kristu akatramurintji Yusna yaunchu nekaachma ana nu Yamái etserkatin .

text: For he that speaketh in an unknown tongue speaketh not unto men , but unto God : for no man understandeth him ; howbeit in the spirit he speaketh mysteries .
text2: Wátsek , akatramuka Tána nujai métek umiktiniaiti .

text: He that speaketh in an unknown tongue edifieth himself ; but he that prophesieth edifieth the church .
text2: Wi umikmancha umikchamuncha ii Uuntri Kristu nékawai . Atum Enentáimturarmena nusha tura Chíkich aents Enentáimturainia nusha Wíjiainkia ántraiti . Imia Wíkisha nekamatsjai . Kame winia tunaarun penké Wáintsujai tura aya nujai " pénkeraitjai " Tíchamniaitjai . Ninki Yus iirui .

text: I would that ye all spake with tongues , but rather that ye prophesied : for greater is he that prophesieth than he that speaketh with tongues , except he interpret , that the church may receive edifying .
text2: Tsawant jeamtai ii Uuntri Kristu atak Tátatui . Tura Ashí Yamái kiritniunam uukma nuna tura shuar Ashí Enentáimprarma nunasha paant awajsattawai . Nu tsawant jeatsain shuar umikiuashit tusarum Enentáimtusairap . Tura nu tsawantai Yus Ashí pénker umikiarun shiir awajsattawai . Pénker umikiuncha ishichik umikiuncha takasmajai métek Yus shiir awajsattawai .

text: Now , brethren , if I come unto you speaking with tongues , what shall I profit you , except I shall speak to you either by revelation , or by knowledge , or by prophesying , or by doctrine ?
text2: Atum " Ju shuar pénkeraiti tura Chíkich pénkerchaiti " tu Akannáirarum penké Tíchatniuitrume , yatsuru . Nuka paant Atí tusan " Atum " Wi Páprunuitjai " tura " Wi Apurusnaitjai " Tíirap " tajai . Antsu aya Yus - Papinium aarmajai métek Enentáimsatarum .

text: And even things without life giving sound , whether pipe or harp , except they give a distinction in the sounds , how shall it be known what is piped or harped ?
text2: Ameka Chíkich shuarjai méteketme . Tura Ashí takakmena nusha Yus amasmaiti . Tura Yus amasu asamtai ṡitiurak áminiukea aintsam nujai nankaamantu ajai tu Enentáimtumam ?

text: For if the trumpet give an uncertain sound , who shall prepare himself to the battle ?
text2: ṡTi Kuítrinniua aintsan tura Ashí takakua aintsan Enentáimtsurmek . Iin nankaakarum uunt Kapitián ajasua aintsan Enentáimtsurmek ? Nekas uunt Kapitián ajasrumka maak . Nuinkia iisha atumjai akupkaintji .

text: So likewise ye , except ye utter by the tongue words easy to be understood , how shall it be known what is spoken ? for ye shall speak into the air .
text2: Chíkich shuar mash nankaamantu ainis ainiakuisha Yus iin ni akatramurin Ashí Amúamunam apujtamsaitji . Tu Enentáimpramniaiti . " Yajauch ainiawai , Máatái " tu pujurtamji shuar . Tura Yusa suntarisha Ashí Juyá shuarsha iin iistai tusar Káutramkaitji .

text: There are , it may be , so many kinds of voices in the world , and none of them is without signification .
text2: Iikia atumjai jeatsji . Kristu shuari asakrin nékachua ainis Enentáimturmaji shuar . Atum antsu Krístunam Tí nékachuashitrum . Iikia kakarmachuitji . Atum Timiá kakarmaitrume . Atumka ti penkeraitrume . Antsu iikia Muíjtiaintji .

text: Therefore if I know not the meaning of the voice , I shall be unto him that speaketh a barbarian , and he that speaketh shall be a barbarian unto me .
text2: Tuke yamaisha tsukamaji , kitiamaji , entsartin atsumaji . Katsumpramji . Jeasha atsumaji .

text: Even so ye , forasmuch as ye are zealous of spiritual gifts , seek that ye may excel to the edifying of the church .
text2: Ii ewejéjai takaakur ti Pimpíaji . Shuar katsekramainiaji Túrasha iikia shiir chichamjai aiyaji . Itiurchat awajtamainiakuisha katsunteaji .

text: Wherefore let him that speaketh in an unknown tongue pray that he may interpret .
text2: Tsanumprutmakrincha tuke shiir chichaaji . Tsuata aintsarik tuke yamaisha Ashí yajauchia Núnisan ajapramatniun Enentáimturmainiaji .

text: For if I pray in an unknown tongue , my spirit prayeth , but my understanding is unfruitful .
text2: Atumin aya iniatsaartajtsan Juní aattsujrume . Antsu winia aneamu uchirua aintsan jintintjarme .

text: What is it then ? I will pray with the spirit , and I will pray with the understanding also : I will sing with the spirit , and I will sing with the understanding also .
text2: Atumin Yus - Chichaman ujaakun Yus - shuar ajastinian unuiniamjarme . Nujai Jesukrístu Enentáimtakrumin Atumí Aparía aintsan ajasmajai . Chíkich shuar Krístunun Jintintrámatin Timiá Untsurí ákuisha aya wiki Atumí Aparíntjai .

text: Else when thou shalt bless with the spirit , how shall he that occupieth the room of the unlearned say Amen at thy giving of thanks , seeing he understandeth not what thou sayest ?
text2: Tuma asamtai wi wekaajna aintsan wekasatarum atumsha .

text: For thou verily givest thanks well , but the other is not edified .
text2: Nu Túratarum tusan winia aneamu uchirun Timiutéun akuptukmajrume . Niisha ii Uuntri Krístun Enentáimtamunam winia uchiruiti tura Krístun Enentáimtak tuke shiir wekaawai . Túrasha wi Krístujai wekaamun ataksha Enentáimtikramprattawai . Núiti Ashí Yus - shuarnum wena Jintíajna nuka .

text: I thank my God , I speak with tongues more than ye all :
text2: Papru yamaikia iraishtatui Enentáimturainiak Chíkich Chíkich nankaamantuitjai tu Enentáimtumainiawai .

text: Yet in the church I had rather speak five words with my understanding , that by my voice I might teach others also , than ten thousand words in an unknown tongue .
text2: Antsu Yus wakerakuinkia Wárik iitjam tusan wakerajai . Nuinkia nankaamantu chichamen antukchattajai antsu Wátskea , ni Túramurisha Iistái .

text: Brethren , be not children in understanding : howbeit in malice be ye children , but in understanding be men .
text2: Yus akupeana Nú shuar aya Chíchainiatsui antsu Yusa kakarmarin iniaktuiniawai .

text: In the law it is written , With men of other tongues and other lips will I speak unto this people ; and yet for all that will they not hear me , saith the Lord .
text2: Wátsek , ṡWarí Enentáimprum ? Atum tuke Núnisan Enentáimkiurminkia wi winin Asutiátniuitjarme . Tura pénker Enentáimkiurminkia , aneakun shiir chichasminiaitjarme . ṡAtumsha Túa wakerarum ?

text: Moreover , brethren , I declare unto you the gospel which I preached unto you , which also ye have received , and wherein ye stand ;
text2: Atumíin shuar ti Tunáa tura awai . Ju Yamái Ashí nekanaiti . Nu shuar ni Aparí nuwé achikiuiti . Timia tunaaka nu tsanirmamu Yus - shuarchanumsha atsawai .

text: By which also ye are saved , if ye keep in memory what I preached unto you , unless ye have believed in vain .
text2: ṡNu tunaajaisha tuke nankaamantu Enentáimprumek ? Antsu uuttiniaitrume . Nu shuar Tunáa Túraka Atumíinia akankatniuiti .

text: For I delivered unto you first of all that which I also received , how that Christ died for our sins according to the scriptures ;
text2: Ayashur pujachkuisha wi nui Pujáa aintsan nuna tunaarin paant nekaamjai , tura Asutiátniuiti tajai .

text: And that he was buried , and that he rose again the third day according to the scriptures :
text2: Tuma asamtai átum Káunkakrumin ii Uuntri Jesukrístu kakarmarijiai tura wi nui Pujáa aintsanak , ii Uuntri Jesukrístu kakarmarijiai

text: And that he was seen of Cephas , then of the twelve :
text2: nu shuar uunt iwianchnum surunkatniuiti ni ayashi wakeramuri amukati tusa . Nujai ni wakani uwemprattawai ii Uuntri Jesukrístu Támatai .

text: After that , he was seen of above five hundred brethren at once ; of whom the greater part remain unto this present , but some are fallen asleep .
text2: " Iikia pénkeraitji " Tárumna nu ántraiti , Tunáa Atumíin tuke akui . Iis , " Karía ishichik yuminnium enketam mash karimtiktsuk " tiniu ainiawai . Núnis átatui ju tunaajai .

text: After that , he was seen of James ; then of all the apostles .
text2: Tuma asamtai nu Karía ukartarum yajauch awajturmasaij tusarum . Núnisrum ju tunaanumia kanakrum pénker átatrume . Yaunchu Enentái Karía Núnis amuukatniuiti . Ashí yamarmak yuminia aintsan ajasuitrume . Tanta wakapruachusha Enentáimpratai . Israer - shuar paskua nampernum aya wakapruachu tantan yuu ainiawai . Atumí tunaari atsakui atumsha nu Námper - tantaa aintsar pénker ajasuitrume . Paskua nampertincha Israer - shuar murikiun main ainiawai . Núnisan Kristu jaka ii murikria ainis ajasuiti .

text: And last of all he was seen of me also , as of one born out of due time .
text2: Tuma asamtai iisha paskua Námper Nájanku pujakur tuke Núnisan shiir wekasatniuitji . Tuma asamtai Ashí yajauch tunaasha írunna nuka Karía yaunchu nawamua aintsankete . Nuka atsutniuiti . Antsu nekas ana nuka shiir Enentáimsar wekasatniuitji . Nuka yuminia aintsankete .

text: For I am the least of the apostles , that am not meet to be called an apostle , because I persecuted the church of God .
text2: Nuik papin aatramajrumna nui " Tsanirma shuarjainkia iischatniuitrume " Tímiajrume .

text: But by the grace of God I am what I am : and his grace which was bestowed upon me was not in vain ; but I laboured more abundantly than they all : yet not I , but the grace of God which was with me .
text2: Ju nunkanam Yus - shuarchaka aya tsanirma , aya kuitniak ikiauwin , aya kasak , aya ántar - yusan tikishmatin ainiatsuk . Nú shuarjainkia penké iischatniuitkiurmeka ju nunkanmaya Jíinkintrume . Núnaka Tátsujai .

text: Therefore whether it were I or they , so we preach , and so ye believed .
text2: Antsu wi Tájana nu Júiti , Shuar " Yus - shuaraitjai " Tákunka tura Tunáa Túriniaitkuinkia niijiai iischatniuitrume . Tsanirmasha , Kuítian ikiauwincha , ántar - yusan tikishmatniusha , tsanumniusha , nampencha , kasasha " Yus - shuaraitjai " Tákuinkia iischatniuitrume . Penké niijiai Yurumáshtiniaitrume .

text: But if there be no resurrection of the dead , then is Christ not risen :
text2: Yus - shuarcha tunaari pachischatniuitjai . Yus Núnaka iistatui . Atumka antsu Atumíin Yus - shuar ainia nuna tunaari iistiniaitrume . Tuma asamtai nu shuar tunaarintin Atumíiya akankatarum .

text: Now concerning the collection for the saints , as I have given order to the churches of Galatia , even so do ye .
text2: Yus - shuarka Chíkich Yus - shuarjai itiurchat pujakka Kapitiánjai chichas iwiarashtiniaiti Yus - shuarcha asamtai . Antsu Yus - shuar írunna nujai iwiarati .

text: Upon the first day of the week let every one of you lay by him in store , as God hath prospered him , that there be no gatherings when I come .
text2: Enentáimpratarum . Amuukatin tsawantai Yus - shuarka Ashí ju nunkanmaya shuara tunaari mash nekaawartatui . Tura Ashí Tunáa nekaatniuitkiurmeka itiur Yúpichuchia nu nekaashtatrum .

text: And when I come , whomsoever ye shall approve by your letters , them will I send to bring your liberality unto Jerusalem .
text2: Nu arantcha Yusa suntari Túramurisha nekaattaji pénkerashit tusar ~ i . Nayaimpiniam Túrawarma nekaatniuitkiurkia itiura ju nunkanmaya nu tujinkiattaj ~ i .

text: And if it be meet that I go also , they shall go with me .
text2: Pai , itiurchat ákuinkia Yus - shuar penké tujintiainiana nujai iwiaratarum antsu .

text: Now I will come unto you , when I shall pass through Macedonia : for I do pass through Macedonia .
text2: Natsaruk tusan nuna Tájarme . Warí , ṡAtumíini chikichkisha atsawak ni yachi itiurchatri pénker iwiaramnia ?

text: And it may be that I will abide , yea , and winter with you , that ye may bring me on my journey whithersoever I go .
text2: ṡUrukamtai Yus - shuar ni yachijiai itiurchat pujakka Yus - shuarchanum wea iwiaratniun ?

text: For I will not see you now by the way ; but I trust to tarry a while with you , if the Lord permit .
text2: Atumí itiurchatri kapitiannium jukirmeka nujainkia átum tujinkiamu Páantaiti . Natsantchakait . Itiurchat ana nusha ṡurukamtai antsu katsuntram Asakáatsum ? Kasamkamusha ṡurukamtai katsuntram Asakáatsum ?

text: But I will tarry at Ephesus until Pentecost .
text2: Antsu átumka Nuámtak yachijiai itiurchat Awajnáiyarme tura Kasárnáiyarme .

text: For a great door and effectual is opened unto me , and there are many adversaries .
text2: Tunáa Túrinkia Yus akupeamunam pachiinkiachmin ainia nu nékatsrumek . Anannawairap . Ashí tsanirma nusha , ántar - yusan tikishmatniusha , nuamtak aishmanjai tsanirmasha ,

text: Now if Timotheus come , see that he may be with you without fear : for he worketh the work of the Lord , as I also do .
text2: kasasha , Ashí Kuítian ikiauwincha , nampencha , tsanumniusha , yajauch chichainia nusha , Chíkich shuaran anankawar atantin ainia nusha Yus akupeamunma Nuí penké wayashtin ainiawai .

text: Let no man therefore despise him : but conduct him forth in peace , that he may come unto me : for I look for him with the brethren .
text2: Atumíiyasha Chíkich Chíkich nuna Túrin armai . Tura yamaikia ii Uuntri Jesusa kakarmarijiaisha tura ii Yusri Wakani kakarmarijiai atumi Enentái shiir ajasuiti , atumsha Yusna ajasurme , tura tuke pénker ajasurme .

text: As touching our brother Apollos , I greatly desired him to come unto you with the brethren : but his will was not at all to come at this time ; but he will come when he shall have convenient time .
text2: " Ashí Túramniaitjai " tiniu ainiawai tura nekasaiti . Tuma ain mash Yáinkiashtatui pénker wekasatniun . Nekas Ashí Túramniaitjai tura Nánkamas Túratniujai nupetnakchattajai .

text: Watch ye , stand fast in the faith , quit you like men , be strong .
text2: Junasha tiniu ainiawai : " Apatuk wakejainchu tura wake apatkujainchu mai ántraiti . " Apatkujai wakesha nekas mai metek Enentáimpratin ainiawai tura Yus mai metek amuktatui . Núnisan ii ayashi ii Uuntri Krístunuiti tura Kristu ii ayashi nérenniuiti . Tuma asamtai ii Ayashíjiai tsanirmashtiniaiti .

text: Let all your things be done with charity .
text2: Tura Yus ii Uuntri Jesusan iniantkimia Núnisan ii Ayashíncha nu kakarmarijiai iniantkittiawai .

text: I beseech you , brethren , ( ye know the house of Stephanas , that it is the firstfruits of Achaia , and that they have addicted themselves to the ministry of the saints , )
text2: Ashí ii ayashiin Kristu Ayashímkiaiti . ṡNu átumka nékatsrumek ? Winia ayashrusha Kristu Ayashíiya asamtai ṡitiurak nuna Tsanirí Ayashín najanattaj ? Penké Túrachminiaitjai .

text: That ye submit yourselves unto such , and to every one that helpeth with us , and laboureth .
text2: Kame ṡjusha nékatsrumek ? Aishman tsanirijiai tsaninkiar chikichik ayashtinia ainis ajainiawai . Núnisan Yus - Papinium aarmaiti : Mai chikichik ayashtinia ainis ajasartatui .

text: I am glad of the coming of Stephanas and Fortunatus and Achaicus : for that which was lacking on your part they have supplied .
text2: Tura shuar ii Uuntri Krístujai tsaninkia mai Chikichík wakantin ajainiawai .

text: For they have refreshed my spirit and yours : therefore acknowledge ye them that are such .
text2: Tuma asamtai tsanirmatniunmaya Yajáyan wainkiarum tsékentiarum . Chíkich Tunáa írunna nu ii Ayashínkia ti yajauch awajeatsui . Túrasha shuar tsanirmakka Ní ayashiniak yajauch awajeawai .

text: The churches of Asia salute you . Aquila and Priscilla salute you much in the Lord , with the church that is in their house .
text2: Yusa Wakaní ame Enentáimin pujurtamu asamtai , ame ayashim ni jeente . Nu Wakanínkia Yus amasuiti . ṡNuka nékatsrumek ? Tuma asamtai ame ayashmi nérenchaitme .

text: All the brethren greet you . Greet ye one another with an holy kiss .
text2: Kristu numpejai sumakma asamtai , ayashmisha wakanmisha Yusna ainiawai . Yusna asamtai ayashmijiai pénker Túratniuitme , Yus shiir Awájnástí tusam .

text: Paul , an apostle , ( not of men , neither by man , but by Jesus Christ , and God the Father , who raised him from the dead ; )
text2: Wi Pápruitjai , Yus akatramu . Yúsak winia akatturuiti . Shuarka akatturchamai . Yussha Chíkich Shuáran akupturak akatturchamai , antsu Ninki , Yus Apa , Jesusan jakamunmaya iniantkimia nu , tura Jesussha winia akatturarmai Yusa shiir chichamen etserkatniun .

text: And all the brethren which are with me , unto the churches of Galatia :
text2: Wisha , Ashí Yus - shuar wijiai pujuinia nusha , ju Papí akupeaji . Ashí yus - shuar Karasea nunkanam pujarmena nu áujsatarum tusan ju papin akuptajrume .

text: Grace be to you and peace from God the Father , and from our Lord Jesus Christ ,
text2: Yus Apa tura ii Uuntri Jesukrístusha waitnentramainia ásar yainmakarti imiatkinchanum tuke shiir pujustinian .

text: Who gave himself for our sins , that he might deliver us from this present evil world , according to the will of God and our Father :
text2: Yus ii Aparí nuna wakera asamtai , Jesus ni ayashin surumak Wáitsamiayi ii tunaari Asakártinian . Nuna tura Ashí Tunáa ju nunkanam ana Nuyá ankant awajtamsatai tusa iin Yáinmaji .

text: To whom be glory for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: Tuma asamtai tuke Yus shiir Atí . Ayu .

text: I marvel that ye are so soon removed from him that called you into the grace of Christ unto another gospel :
text2: Maa , Nekasaash Timiá Wárik Yus ikiukmiarum . Kristu iin ti anenma asamtai Yus ni shuari ajastinian iin anaitiamkamji . Urukamtaitsuk nuikia Imiá Wárik ni chichame inaisamarum Nusháa chicham umikrum uwemprataj tusarum .

text: Which is not another ; but there be some that trouble you , and would pervert the gospel of Christ .
text2: Wátsek , nekas Chíkich chicham penké atsawai shuar umikiar uwempratin . Antsu yajaya shuar Atumíin taar pénkercha awajtamainiawai . Tura Nusháa chichaman etserkar Yusa shiir chichamen Yapajiátniun wakeruiniawai .

text: But though we , or an angel from heaven , preach any other gospel unto you than that which we have preached unto you , let him be accursed .
text2: Tuma asamtai Yus niin yajauchiniam yuminkrattawai . Wisha Yus - chicham Yapajiámun etserkamtainkia yus winia yuminkrurtatui . Nayaimpinmaya suntarsha Nusháa chichaman wi etserkachmaj nuna étserkuinkia nunasha yuminkrattawai .

text: As we said before , so say I now again , If any man preach any other gospel unto you than that ye have received , let him be accursed .
text2: Paant ujakjarme Túmaitiatnak ataksha ujaajrume : Nánkamas shuar Niisháa uwempratin chichaman , wi etserkachmaj nuna étserkuinkia Yus yuminkrattawai .

text: For do I now persuade men , or God ? or do I seek to please men ? for if I yet pleased men , I should not be the servant of Christ .
text2: Ti kakaram Chichaatsjak . nuna chichaakun shuar shiir Enentáimtursarti tusan chichaatsjai . Antsu Yus shiir Enentáimtursati tusan nuna tajai . ṡShuar wakeruinia nuna Enentáimsan chichaajak ? Nuna Enentáimkiunka Kristu wakera nuna umirkachaintjai .

text: But I certify you , brethren , that the gospel which was preached of me is not after man .
text2: Antsu nekaatarum , yatsuru . Uwempratin chichaman wi étserjana nuka aentsnumianchuiti .

text: For I neither received it of man , neither was I taught it , but by the revelation of Jesus Christ .
text2: Aentska ujatkachmai . Unuitiutnasha unuitiurchamai . Antsu Jesukrístuk winia paant jintintruamai .

text: For ye have heard of my conversation in time past in the Jews ' religion , how that beyond measure I persecuted the church of God , and wasted it :
text2: Tura wi Yáunchu ti yajauchin Túramiaj nuka antukchakaitrum . Israer - shuar Yúsnan takainia Nútiksanak wisha takasmajai . Tuma asan Yus - shuaran ti kajerkan tuke pataatukmajai amuktaj tusan . Nusha nékarme .

text: And profited in the Jews ' religion above many my equals in mine own nation , being more exceedingly zealous of the traditions of my fathers .
text2: Tura kakaram ajasan , ii uuntri yaunchu tiarmia nuna yawetsuk umiktinian ti Enentáimpramjai . Tura Untsurí shuaran wijiai métek uunt armia nuna nankaamas Yúsnan takasmajai . Túmaitiatan aya winia uuntrun chichamen ti umirniuyajai .

text: But when it pleased God , who separated me from my mother ' s womb , and called me by his grace ,
text2: Túrasha wikia akiintsain Yus winia achirkamiayi , tura ti anenkratmarijiai winia anaitiukmiayi .

text: To reveal his Son in me , that I might preach him among the heathen ; immediately I conferred not with flesh and blood :
text2: Nuikia shiir Enentáimiuk ni Uchirín paant nekamtikruamai . Tura Israer - shuarchanum ni shiir chichamen etserkat tusa akuptukmiayi . Tuma asamtai Chíkich shuaran aniaschamjai .

text: Neither went I up to Jerusalem to them which were apostles before me ; but I went into Arabia , and returned again unto Damascus .
text2: Uunt péprunmasha , Jerusarénnumka , wéchamjai Winí emkaru Yus akatramujai chichastinian . Antsu Wárik Arapia nunkanam wémajai . Tura nui Yúsan Enentáimtasuan atak Tamasku péprunam waketkimjai .

text: Then after three years I went up to Jerusalem to see Peter , and abode with him fifteen days .
text2: Tura Menaintiú Uwí nankaamasmatai , Nuyá Pítrujai áujmattsataj tusan Jerusarénnum jeamjai . Tura Jimiará semanachik pujusmajai Pítrujai .

text: But other of the apostles saw I none , save James the Lord ' s brother .
text2: Tura Jakupuncha , ii Uuntri Jesusa yachia nuna , Wáinkiamjai . Nú arantka chikichnaka Yus akatramunka Wáinkiachmajai .

text: Now the things which I write unto you , behold , before God , I lie not .
text2: Yus iirui . Wi Tájana nu nekasaiti , Wáitchaiti .

text: Afterwards I came into the regions of Syria and Cilicia ;
text2: Nú ukunmasha Siria nunkanmasha , Sirisia nunkanmasha wémajai .

text: And was unknown by face unto the churches of Judaea which were in Christ :
text2: Tuma asamtai Ashí Yus - shuar Jutía nunkanam pujuarmia nu winia nekaracharmai .

text: But they had heard only , That he which persecuted us in times past now preacheth the faith which once he destroyed .
text2: Aya antukarmai . " Yaunchu iin ti aintrammiaj nu yamaikia Yus - Chichaman étseruk wekaawai . Yáunchuka iin amutmaktinian wakeriniaitiat yamaikia iniaisaiti " tiarmai .

text: And they glorified God in me .
text2: Túrawar winia Enentáimtursar Yúsan shiir yuminsarmai .

text: Then fourteen years after I went up again to Jerusalem with Barnabas , and took Titus with me also .
text2: Tura katurse Uwí nankaamasmatai wisha Pírnapíjiai Jerusarénnum wémaji . Titiuncha jukimjai wijiai .

text: And I went up by revelation , and communicated unto them that gospel which I preach among the Gentiles , but privately to them which were of reputation , lest by any means I should run , or had run , in vain .
text2: Yus akupta asamtai Jerusarénnum wémajai . Tura nui jean aya Yus - shuara uuntrijiain áujmattsamjai . " Júnisnak Ashí Israer - shuarchan Yus - Chichaman ujainiajai " Tímiajai . Takasmajna nusha tura tuke takastin Enentáimjiana nusha ántar ain tusan tu áujmattsamjai .

text: But neither Titus , who was with me , being a Greek , was compelled to be circumcised :
text2: Niisha Yus - shuara uuntrintiat itiurchat Enentáimpracharmai . Antsu Chíkich shuarka Titiu Israer - shuarchaitiat wijiai pujakui niisha Israer - shuar Ajastí tusa tsupimiamtikiatniun wakeriarmai . Túrasha tujinkiarmai .

text: And that because of false brethren unawares brought in , who came in privily to spy out our liberty which we have in Christ Jesus , that they might bring us into bondage :
text2: Tura nu shuar ántar yachi ainiak antuktai tusar wayawarmai . Tura ii chichamen antukar itiurchat Awájtámsatai tusar wakeriarmai . Iis , Kristu Jesus iin uwemtikrampra asamtai ti shiir iisha Yus Yúpichuch Umíaji . Tura nuna nekaawar , atakka , aya Yáunchu akupkamu itiurchat ana nujai uwemtikrampratniun wakerutmakarmaji .

text: To whom we gave place by subjection , no , not for an hour ; that the truth of the gospel might continue with you .
text2: Túrasha penké ishichkisha umikchamji . Antsu Atumíin Yus - Chicham Yapajniátsuk métek jeartamat tusar ni chichame penké anturkachmaji .

text: But of these who seemed to be somewhat , ( whatsoever they were , it maketh no matter to me : God accepteth no man ' s person : ) for they who seemed to be somewhat in conference added nothing to me :
text2: Nu arantcha Yus akatramu uuntrinkia yamaram Túratniunka suruscharmai . Nincha Ashí aents ti neka ainiawai tu Enentáimtuiniawai . Kame nu shuar ti nékainiakuisha ti Enentáimtatsjai . Yus Ashí shuaran mash métek iyatsuk .

text: But contrariwise , when they saw that the gospel of the uncircumcision was committed unto me , as the gospel of the circumcision was unto Peter ;
text2: Yus akatramu uuntrisha Yus winia Israer - shuarchan Yus - chicham ujaktinian akuptukma nuna nekarawarmai . Tura Pítruncha akupkamai Israer - shuaran Yus - Chicham ujaktinian .

text: ( For he that wrought effectually in Peter to the apostleship of the circumcision , the same was mighty in me toward the Gentiles : )
text2: Pítrun Israer - shuarnum akupkama Nú Yusak winiasha akuptukmai Israer - shuarchanum .

text: And when James , Cephas , and John , who seemed to be pillars , perceived the grace that was given unto me , they gave to me and Barnabas the right hands of fellowship ; that we should go unto the heathen , and they unto the circumcision .
text2: Tuma asamtai Jakupusha , Pítrusha , Juansha , Yus akatramu uuntri ásar , Yus winia ti paant akuptan nekaawar , winiasha Pirnapínsha , " Ayu , átum , Israer - shuarchanum Yus - Chicham etserkatarum , tiarmai . Iisha Israer - shuarnum Yus - Chicham etserkattaji " tiarmai . Túrawarmatai shiir áujnaisar ii uwejejai achirnaikiamji métek Enentáimji tusar ~ i .

text: Only they would that we should remember the poor ; the same which I also was forward to do .
text2: Ayatik " Kuítrincha Enentáimtusrum tuke Yáintarum " tiarmai . Wisha Núnaka ti wakerakun tuke Túriniaitjai .

text: But when Peter was come to Antioch , I withstood him to the face , because he was to be blamed .
text2: Tura Nú ukunam wi Antiukía péprunam pujain Pítiur tamai . Tura nui yajauch Túramtai , Yus - shuara uuntriniak chicharkamjai .

text: For before that certain came from James , he did eat with the Gentiles : but when they were come , he withdrew and separated himself , fearing them which were of the circumcision .
text2: Iis , Israer - shuar tuiniawai , " Israer - shuarcha Muisais timia Núnisan tsupirnakcha asamtai , nu shuarjai Yurumáshtiniaiti " tuiniawai . Túmaitiat Pítiur Yurumámnian nékak ~ u , emka Sántiak shuar Táatsain Israer - shuarchajai Yurumámai . Tura Nuyá Sántiak shuar Jerusarénnumia Antiukíanam jeawarmatai Pítiur ashamak tsupirnakcha shuarnumia kanakin Yurumáchmai . " Tsupirnaktiniaitme " tiniu ainia nuna ashamak Túramai .

text: And the other Jews dissembled likewise with him ; insomuch that Barnabas also was carried away with their dissimulation .
text2: Tuma asamtai Chíkich Yus - shuar , Israer - shuar armia nu , Pítrujai métek emka Yurumáwaru ainiayat Jimiará enentai takusar ukunam iniaisarmai . Pirnapísha neka áyat Nútiksan nupetnakmai .

text: But when I saw that they walked not uprightly according to the truth of the gospel , I said unto Peter before them all , If thou , being a Jew , livest after the manner of Gentiles , and not as do the Jews , why compellest thou the Gentiles to live as do the Jews ?
text2: Tura nuna iisan Ashí iimiainiain Pítrun chicharkamjai . Yus Shiir Chicham tana nujai métek wekasachu ásarmatai Tímiajai " Ame Israer - shuaraitiatam Israer - shuarti ikiukim tsupirnakchajai Yurumám Israer - shuarcha aintsamek Túrame , Tímiajai . Nuikia " Israer - shuarcha Israer - shuartijiai métek wekasatin ainiawai " tiip " Tímiajai .

text: We who are Jews by nature , and not sinners of the Gentiles ,
text2: Iikia nekas Israer - shuaraitji . Israer - shuarcha , Tunáa ainia aaniuchuitji .

text: Knowing that a man is not justified by the works of the law , but by the faith of Jesus Christ , even we have believed in Jesus Christ , that we might be justified by the faith of Christ , and not by the works of the law : for by the works of the law shall no flesh be justified .
text2: Túmaitiatar ju nékaji . Akupkamu Umíamujai uwemprachminiaitji antsu Jesukrístu nekas Enentáimtakum uwemprattame . Nu nekaar iisha Jesukrístu nekas Enentáimtusmaji tunaajainchu atai tusar . Aya Kristu nekas Enentáimtusar pénker átatji . Akupkamu takasar umirkarsha tuke nujai pénker ajaschattaji . Akupkamunka shuar umiktaj Táyat , Chikichkí shuarkesha nujai pénker ajaschamniaiti . Nu nekaar antsu Jesukrístu nekas Enentáimtusmaji pénker ajastai tusar .

text: But if , while we seek to be justified by Christ , we ourselves also are found sinners , is therefore Christ the minister of sin ? God forbid .
text2: Tura Israer - shuar Enentáimprashtimpiash , " Wátsek , Núnisaitkiuinkia wisha Krístun Enentáimtustaj Tákunka , emka Tunáa shuaraitjai tu Enentáimtumastiniaitjai " Tíchanpiash . Nuka nekasaiti tura Nuyá " Nu asamtai Kristu winia Tunáa shuaran najataiti " penké tu Enentáimprashtiniaiti .

text: For if I build again the things which I destroyed , I make myself a transgressor .
text2: Antsu yaunchu , wi Túrashtiniaitjai Tímiaj nuna awainkin Túratniuitjai Tákunka nuikia nekas tunaitjai .

text: For I through the law am dead to the law , that I might live unto God .
text2: Iista , akupeamun umiktaj tukaman penké tujinkiamjai . Umiktinian tujinkian jaka aintsanak ajasmajai akupeamunam . Antsu Yusjai iwiaaku pujajai ni wakera nuna umiktinian .

text: I am crucified with Christ : nevertheless I live ; yet not I , but Christ liveth in me : and the life which I now live in the flesh I live by the faith of the Son of God , who loved me , and gave himself for me .
text2: Wisha Krístujai Krúsnum Jákaitjai . Tuma asamtai yamaikia wikia iwiaaktsujai wi wakeraj nuna Túratniun antsu Kristu Winí iwiaakui ni wakera nuna Túratniun . Tura ju ayashnium pujayatan aya Kristu Enentáimtakun iwiaakjai . Krístusha Yusa Uchiríntiat winia ti anentuk jarutkamiayi .

text: I do not frustrate the grace of God : for if righteousness come by the law , then Christ is dead in vain .
