text2: Yus ti pénker asamtai itiurak " Kristu ántar jakamiayi " Títiaj . Iis , aya akupkamun umirkan pénker ajasminiaitkiuinkia , nuikia Kristu ántar Jákaayi .

text: O foolish Galatians , who hath bewitched you , that ye should not obey the truth , before whose eyes Jesus Christ hath been evidently set forth , crucified among you ?
text2: ṡWarin aa Karaseanmayatirmea . Waweamukaitrum netse Enentáimprarum Yus tama umirkashtin . Kristu Krúsnum Máamun ti paant étserkun atumin iniaktuschamkajrum ?

text: This only would I learn of you , Received ye the Spirit by the works of the law , or by the hearing of faith ?
text2: Wátsek , aniastatjarme , Enentáimpratarum . ṡWarijiain Yusa Wakaní Atumí Enentáin achikmarum . Akupkamu umirkarmek Enentáimin achikmarum , antsu Yus Enentáimtusrum ni Wakaní achikchamkuram ?

text: Are ye so foolish ? having begun in the Spirit , are ye now made perfect by the flesh ?
text2: ṡTuke nétsekaitrum . Yusa Wakaní emka Atumí Enentáin Wayá takasmatai atumek yamaikia nu takat aya Ayashí kakarmarijiai umiktin Enentáimprarmek .

text: Have ye suffered so many things in vain ? if it be yet in vain .
text2: Penké ántrarmek Wáitsamarum tura antsu ishichkisha unuimiarchamkarum ?

text: He therefore that ministereth to you the Spirit , and worketh miracles among you , doeth he it by the works of the law , or by the hearing of faith ?
text2: Naka Enentáimpratarum . Yus ni Wakanín Súramtsuk tura aents Túrachminian Atumíin ti takaatsuk . Atum aya akupkamun umirkurmin Yus nuna Túrachuiti . Antsu ni chichame antukrum Yus Enentáimtakrumin Yus nuna Túraiti .

text: Even as Abraham believed God , and it was accounted to him for righteousness .
text2: Yaunchu ii uuntri Apraám Enentáimpratai . Yus - Chicham niin tawai : " Apraám Yúsan Enentáimtusmatai Yus " Ayu , pénkeraitme " Tímiayi " tawai .

text: Know ye therefore that they which are of faith , the same are the children of Abraham .
text2: Iis , nujai Páantchakait . Ashí shuar Yúsan Enentáimtuinia nuka Apraámjai métek Enentáimpraru ásar , ni Uchiría aintsan ajasaru ainiawai .

text: And the scripture , foreseeing that God would justify the heathen through faith , preached before the gospel unto Abraham , saying , In thee shall all nations be blessed .
text2: Yamái Páantaiti . Yus Ashí Israer - shuarchancha tawai " Aya winia Enentáimtursarum pénker átatrume " . Israer - shuarchasha nujai pénker ajastinia nuna ti yaunchu neka asa , Apraáman ujakmiayi , " Amijiai Ashí aents ti shiir ajasartatui . " Tu ujakmiayi .

text: So then they which be of faith are blessed with faithful Abraham .
text2: Tuma asamtai Ashí shuar Yúsan Enentáimtuinia nuke Apraámjai métek pénker ajasar shiir warasartatui .

text: For as many as are of the works of the law are under the curse : for it is written , Cursed is every one that continueth not in all things which are written in the book of the law to do them .
text2: Antsu Ashí shuar " akupkamun umirkan uwemprattajai " tuinia nuka yajauchiniam yuminkramu ainiawai . Yus - Papinium aarchamukait " Ashí shuar Yus akupkamun Ashí aarma nuna takamtsuk umirkachka yajauchiniam yuminkramu ainiawai . " Tu aarmaiti .

text: But that no man is justified by the law in the sight of God , it is evident : for , The just shall live by faith .
text2: Nújainkia Páantaiti . Akupkamu umirkatniujai pénker ajaschamniaiti Yusjai , antsu aya Yus Enentáimtusam pénker ajasam uwemprattame .

text: And the law is not of faith : but , The man that doeth them shall live in them .
text2: Shuar akupkamu umirkatniun Enentáimna nuka aya nujai pénker ajastinian Enentáimiui ; Yúsan Enentáimtak pénker ajastinian Enentáimtsui .

text: Christ hath redeemed us from the curse of the law , being made a curse for us : for it is written , Cursed is every one that hangeth on a tree :
text2: Tura Kristu yamaikia uwemtikrampramji . Akupkamun umirkachu yuminkramuiti tana nuka iin Túramtsuji . Antsu Kristu iin yainmaktin Krúsnum jaka yuminkramu ajasmiayi . Kame aarmaiti : Shuar jakati tusa numiniam nenasma yuminkramuiti .

text: That the blessing of Abraham might come on the Gentiles through Jesus Christ ; that we might receive the promise of the Spirit through faith .
text2: Tuma asamtai Jesukrístu jakamujai Ashí Israer - shuarchasha Apraámjai métek pénker shiir warasartatui . Iisha Núnisrik nu shuarjai Yusa Wakaní , Yus akupkataj timia nusha , achiktatji Yus Enentáimtusar .

text: Now to Abraham and his seed were the promises made . He saith not , And to seeds , as of many ; but as of one , And to thy seed , which is Christ .
text2: Iis , yatsuru , Yus Apraáman Chichaman najana anajmatuk , " Amijiai tura amée Weeá akiinkiattana nujaisha Ashí aents ti shiir ajasartatui " Tímiayi . Kame ` amée Weeá akiinkiartatna nujai " Tíchamiayi , antsu ` akiintiatta nujai ' Tímiayi . Nuna taku chikichik átinia nuna Enentáimpramiayi . Nusha Krístuiti . Aentstisha Enentáimpratai . Shuar chichaman najana tura papinium aar Nuyá ni naari apujas nuikia nekas Yapajítsuk umiktiniaiti . Umitsuk iniaisachminiaiti . Patattasha patattsachminiaiti .

text: And this I say , that the covenant , that was confirmed before of God in Christ , the law , which was four hundred and thirty years after , cannot disannul , that it should make the promise of none effect .
text2: Wátsek , Yus Núnisan Chichaman Apraámjai najana , ukunam umitsuk iniaisachminiaiti . Tura Chichaman najanamia Nú ukunam , kuatru siantu Nuyá trainta ( 430 ) Uwí nankaamasmatai , Yus ni akupkamurin Muisaisan susamiayi . Túramaitiat nujai Yusa yaunchu Chichamen Yapajiáchmiayi iniaisatniun .

text: For if the inheritance be of the law , it is no more of promise : but God gave it to Abraham by promise .
text2: Tuma asamtai Yus timia nuka tuke uminkiattawai , Yus yaunchu Apraámjai Chichaman najana asamtai . Nújainkia Páantaiti , pénker ajastajtsar akupkamu umikrikia shiir pujuschartatji antsu Yus timia nujai iikia takatsuk shiir pujustatji . Nuna tsankatkamiayi Yus Apraámjai Chichaman najaneak ~ u .

text: Wherefore then serveth the law ? It was added because of transgressions , till the seed should come to whom the promise was made ; and it was ordained by angels in the hand of a mediator .
text2: " ṡNuikia Yus urukamtai akupkamun susamia ? " Tíchaintmeash . Ayu , Apraám weean , Kristu Táatsain Yus Tímía nu uminkiachminiuyayi . Tuma asamtai nii Táatsain Ashí tunaan Túrawarmia nu Timiá yajauchiiti tusa Yus akupkamun susamiayi . Tura Yusa suntari ju akupkamun Ashí iwiarar Muisaisan susar akatrarmiayi Israer - shuaran Susártí tusar .

text: Now a mediator is not a mediator of one , but God is one .
text2: Antsu chikichik shuar ninki takastinian Enentáimkiunka chikichan atsumatsui . Tura Yus aya chikichkiiti . Ninki chikichan akattsuk Ashí aentsun Apraámjai pénker awajsatniun Apraáma anajmatar niijiai Chichaman najanamiayi .

text: Is the law then against the promises of God ? God forbid : for if there had been a law given which could have given life , verily righteousness should have been by the law .
text2: " ṡTura Yus Jimiará chichamjai chichaawak , Tíchaintmeash . Emka Apraáman " Jujai uwemprattame " Tíchamkia , Nuyá Muisaisan ni akupkamurin Súsachmakia ? " Tíchaintmeash . Tura aintsachuiti . Nekaata , akupkamu umirkatniujai Yusjai tuke pénker pujusminiaitkiumka Nuyá aya akupkamujai uwempram tunaajainchu ajasaintme .

text: But the scripture hath concluded all under sin , that the promise by faith of Jesus Christ might be given to them that believe .
text2: Tura Yus - Chicham paant " Ashí Tunáa ainiawai " tawai . Nu asamtai yamaikia Ashí Jesukrístu Enentáimtuinia Nú shuar , aya Yus Timiá asamtai , uwemprartatui .

text: But before faith came , we were kept under the law , shut up unto the faith which should afterwards be revealed .
text2: Tura Kristu Táatsain Niin Enentáimtuschamniauyayi . Tuma asamtai Nii Táatsain akupkamuka iin emettama pujurtamji aya akupkamu tana nu umirkatin . Tura ukunam ju nekanayi : Kristu Enentáimtusar uwempratniuitji .

text: Wherefore the law was our schoolmaster to bring us unto Christ , that we might be justified by faith .
text2: Akupkamu , nuika , iin waitmakmaji uchin Kuírchin wainnia aintsan . Kristu Tatí tusa waitmakmaji . Tura Kristu Támatai Ashí nekas Niin Enentáimtuinia nuka Yúsjai pénker ainiawai .

text: But after that faith is come , we are no longer under a schoolmaster .
text2: Yamái Kristu nekas Enentáimtustiniaiti tuma asamtai yamaikia akupkamu kuirchia aintsan Wáitmatsji .

text: For ye are all the children of God by faith in Christ Jesus .
text2: Antsu Jesukrístu Enentáimtusar , nujai Yusa Uchirí uuntmaru ajasuitji .

text: For as many of you as have been baptized into Christ have put on Christ .
text2: Ashí Kristu Náariin imiaimiutirmeka Kristu aintsan ajasuitrume .

text: There is neither Jew nor Greek , there is neither bond nor free , there is neither male nor female : for ye are all one in Christ Jesus .
text2: Jesukrístujai tsaninkiu asar ~ i Imiá métek aji . Israer - shuar , Israer - shuarcha , ankant ainia nu , ankantcha ainia nu , aishman , nuwa , Ashí mash Jesukrístunuitkiuinkia yamaikia " niishaaiti " tu Enentáimprashtiniaiti . Ni shuari mash chikichik ainiaji .

text: And if ye be Christ ' s , then are ye Abraham ' s seed , and heirs according to the promise .
text2: Tura Krístunuitkiurmeka Apraám Weeá aintsan ajasurme atumsha . Tuma asarum , Yus Apraáman anajmatramia nu atumsha jurumkitniuitrume .

text: Now I say , That the heir , as long as he is a child , differeth nothing from a servant , though he be lord of all ;
text2: Kuítrinniu Uchirí Ashí ni apari takakna nuna niiniu áchattawak ukunam . Tura uchichitkiunka ni Aparí takarniuriya Núkete .

text: But is under tutors and governors until the time appointed of the father .
text2: Tuke uunt ajatsuk ni Wáinnia nuna umirkatniuiti . Tura uunt ajasmatai tura ni Aparí " Ayu " takui Nuyá nii antsu ni Aparíniu Ashí Wáinkiatniuiti .

text: Even so we , when we were children , were in bondage under the elements of the world :
text2: Núnisrik iisha úchichik asarkia Ashí aentsu akupkamuri umirkatniuji .

text: But when the fulness of the time was come , God sent forth his Son , made of a woman , made under the law ,
text2: Tura tsawant jeamtai , Yus ni Uchirin akupkamiayi ju nunkanam . Niisha Yúsaitiat nuwanam akiiniamiayi . Tura aents ajasmiayi . Tura aents ajas yaunchu akupkamuncha umirkatniuyayi .

text: To redeem them that were under the law , that we might receive the adoption of sons .
text2: Nujai Ashí aents akupkamun umirkatin armia nuna uwemtikrataj tusa Támiayi . Tura iisha yamaikia nujai ni Uchirí uunt ajasminiaitji .

text: And because ye are sons , God hath sent forth the Spirit of his Son into your hearts , crying , Abba , Father .
text2: Atumsha nekas ni Uchirí ajasakrumin Yus ni Uchirí Wakanin atumi Enentáin akupturmakuiti . Tura nu Wakan Atumí Enentáiya Yúsan " Aparú " tawai .

text: Wherefore thou art no more a servant , but a son ; and if a son , then an heir of God through Christ .
text2: Tuma asamtai yamaikia aya takarniuchuitme antsu Yus ni uchirin najatmaiti ámin . Tura ni uchiri asakmin Ashí Yus takakna nuna amastatui Krístuiyan .

text: Howbeit then , when ye knew not God , ye did service unto them which by nature are no gods .
text2: Yaunchu átum nekas Yus nékachkuram , ántar - yus írunna nu umirkamarme nekascha Yúsak .

text: But now , after that ye have known God , or rather are known of God , how turn ye again to the weak and beggarly elements , whereunto ye desire again to be in bondage ?
text2: Tura yamaikia nekas Yus nékarme , kame Yus atumin nekarmarme . Núnis asamtai itiurtsuk atak aentsu akupkamuri umirkatin Enentáimprum . Nujai kakaram ajaschamniaitme tura umikmesha yainmakchattawai uwempratin .

text: Ye observe days , and months , and times , and years .
text2: Atumka Jísat ti najanearme . Yaunchu jisat najanatin amia Nú tsawantcha , nantusha , uwisha , Jísat tuke najanearme Yus shiir Enentáimtursati tusarum .

text: I am afraid of you , lest I have bestowed upon you labour in vain .
text2: Ashamajai , Atumíin ántrankeash takasmaj tusan .

text: Brethren , I beseech you , be as I am ; for I am as ye are : ye have not injured me at all .
text2: Yatsuru , wi atumea aintsanak ajaschamkaj ; atumsha yamaikia wi wekaajna aintsarmek wekasatarum . Wi nui pujakui ishichkisha yajauch awajtuschamarme .

text: Ye know how through infirmity of the flesh I preached the gospel unto you at the first .
text2: Antsu nekamarme ayashrui itiurchat pujayatan Yusa shiir chichamen emka ujakmajrume .

text: And my temptation which was in my flesh ye despised not , nor rejected ; but received me as an angel of God , even as Christ Jesus .
text2: Tura winia sunkur ti yajauch awajtain atum winia nakitrurum Muíjrukchamarme , antsu Yusa Suntaría aintsarmek itiaramarme . Jesukrístu anturkatniua aintsarum anturtukmarme .

text: Where is then the blessedness ye spake of ? for I bear you record , that , if it had been possible , ye would have plucked out your own eyes , and have given them to me .
text2: Maa , wi nékajai , nuik Atumí jiimi ukuinkiarum surusaarme , Túramniaitkiurmeka . Tura shiir Enentáimpramarmena nusha itiurtsukait yamaisha .

text: Am I therefore become your enemy , because I tell you the truth ?
text2: Yamaikia nekas chichaman étserkun ṡAtumí nemasri ajasjak ?

text: They zealously affect you , but not well ; yea , they would exclude you , that ye might affect them .
text2: Chíkich yajaya taaru ti shiir awajtamainiawai tura atumin yainmaktasa aitkiarmainiatsui . Aya Winíya akantamkitiai tusa wakerutmainiawai , winia antsu shiir Enentáimtursat tusar .

text: But it is good to be zealously affected always in a good thing , and not only when I am present with you .
text2: Niisha nekas yainmaktinian wakerutmainiakka atumin shiir awajtamsatin tuke pénker ainti , wi atumjai pujainsha tura pujatsainsha .

text: My little children , of whom I travail in birth again until Christ be formed in you ,
text2: Uchirú , nuwa jurertaj tana Núnisnak ataksha Wáitiajai Kristu Atumíin paant Atí tusan .

text: I desire to be present with you now , and to change my voice ; for I stand in doubt of you .
text2: Atumjai pujaknaka maak aintjai . Yamái pujaknaka nekas Nusháa chichasaintjarme . Itiurkatjarmetsuk nékatsjai .

text: Tell me , ye that desire to be under the law , do ye not hear the law ?
text2: Ayu , " akupkamu umirkatniuiti " Támena nu nekaata ; akupkamuka Júnisaiti .

text: But he who was of the bondwoman was born after the flesh ; but he of the freewoman was by promise .
text2: Aarma awai : Apraám Jimiará uchirtiniuyayi . Emka ni takarniuri jurermiayi Ismaeran . Nuyá Apraáma nuwe jurermiayi Isakan . Ismaera nukuri Apraáma takarniuriyayi . Tura Apraám Yusan Enentáimtutsuk niijiai kanarmatai , ni takarniuri jurermiayi . Tura antsu Isaka nukurinkia takarniurinchuyayi , antsu nekas ni nuwe áuyayi . Niisha ti uuntchiniak , Yus " jurertatme " Tímiayi . Tuma asamtai Yus timiajai Isakan jurermiayi .

text: Which things are an allegory : for these are the two covenants ; the one from the mount Sinai , which gendereth to bondage , which is Agar .
text2: Ayu . Yamái Tájana nuka Yusa Chichamen Jímiaran nakumui . Ismaera nukuri Akar chikichik Chichaman nakumui . Yaunchu Senái muranam Yus ni akupkamurin aarmiayi Israer - shuar , takarniua aintsan , umirkarti tusa .

text: For this Agar is mount Sinai in Arabia , and answereth to Jerusalem which now is , and is in bondage with her children .
text2: Senái murasha Akara nunke Arapianam wajaawai . Akarsha Senái muran nakumak , Ashí Israer - shuaran " Akupkamujai uwempramniaiti " tuinia nuna nakumui . Yamaisha Israer - shuara uuntri Jerusarénnum pujuinia nuka tu chichainiawai . Tuma asamtai Akarsha , Ashí nu shuarsha Núnisar , akupkamu umirkatin ásar , ti takarniu aintsan Wáitsar takainiawai .

text: But Jerusalem which is above is free , which is the mother of us all .
text2: Antsu Ashí Yus - shuarti uwempra asar imiankas ankant pujaji . Nayaimpinmaya Jerusarénnumia aentsuitji . Nuyá aentsti tuke ankant pujuiniaji . Nuyá aents asakrin , nu yakiya Jerusarénka ii Nukuría aintsan Enentáimpramniaiti .

text: For it is written , Rejoice , thou barren that bearest not ; break forth and cry , thou that travailest not : for the desolate hath many more children than she which hath an husband .
text2: Junis aarmaiti : Warasta , misurma , uchi takakchiatmek ; Ti shiir warasta , Uchí najawe nékachiatmek . Nuwa ajapamu uchin jurertatui ; Nuwa aishrinniua Núnaka nankaamas uchirtin átatui .

text: Now we , brethren , as Isaac was , are the children of promise .
text2: Iisha , yatsuru , Isaka aintsar ~ i , Yus timiajai akiiniaitji .

text: But as then he that was born after the flesh persecuted him that was born after the Spirit , even so it is now .
text2: Yaunchu Ismaer Isakan kajerak itiurchat awajsamiayi . Núnisan yamaisha Ismaera aintsan aya ayashnumia ainia Nú aents Yusa Wakaníya akiinia nuna yajauch awajenawai .

text: Nevertheless what saith the scripture ? Cast out the bondwoman and her son : for the son of the bondwoman shall not be heir with the son of the freewoman .
text2: Tura Yus - Papinium aarmaiti : " Takarniusha , ni Uchiríjiai , ajapam awemata . Nekas pénker nuwa uchirijiai tsanin pujuschamniaiti . Apari Kuítrincha achikchamniaiti , " tawai Yus - Papí .

text: So then , brethren , we are not children of the bondwoman , but of the free .
text2: Ayu , yatsuru , nekaatarum . Takarniu Uchirínchuitji antsu ankant pujaji nekas pénker nuwa uchiri asar ~ i .

text: Stand fast therefore in the liberty wherewith Christ hath made us free , and be not entangled again with the yoke of bondage .
text2: Kristu uwemtikrampramiaji tuke ankant átinian . Tuma asamtai kakaram ajasam tuke ankant Pujustá . Ataksha nu itiurchatnum waketkip .

text: Behold , I Paul say unto you , that if ye be circumcised , Christ shall profit you nothing .
text2: Wi Papru asan ujaajrume . Atum Muisais timia Núnisrumek tsupirnakrumninkia ṡKristu nuikia Warí itiurtamkamniait ?

text: For I testify again to every man that is circumcised , that he is a debtor to do the whole law .
text2: Ataksha Tájarme , Ashí tsupirnakua nu shuar Ashí Muisais timia nuna takamtsuk umirkatniuiti .

text: Christ is become of no effect unto you , whosoever of you are justified by the law ; ye are fallen from grace .
text2: Atum " Akupkamu Umíakmin Yus shiir Enentáimturmastatui " Tárumna nu , nu shuartiram Krístuiya tupanniuitrume . Yusa anenkrattairiya kanakniurme .

text: For we through the Spirit wait for the hope of righteousness by faith .
text2: Iikia , antsu , Yusa Wakaníjiai tura Yus Enentáimtakrin Yus shiir Enentáimturmastatji , tu Enentáimji .

text: For in Jesus Christ neither circumcision availeth anything , nor uncircumcision ; but faith which worketh by love .
text2: Nekas Krístunuitkiurkia tsupirnaktin atsumatsji . Antsu aya Yus nekas Enentáimtakur Ashí anenaitniuitji .

text: Ye did run well ; who did hinder you that ye should not obey the truth ?
text2: Atumsha Krístujai pénker wekaimiarme . ṡUrukamtai nekas Yus timia nu iniaisatin Enentáimprum ataksha akupkamunam waketkitin ?

text: This persuasion cometh not of him that calleth you .
text2: Nú enentai Yúsaiyanchuiti . Niijiai wekasatniunka Yus achirmakuitrume .

text: A little leaven leaveneth the whole lump .
text2: Ju Enentáimpratarum : Karía ishichik yuminnium enketam mash ~ i karimtiktsuk . Aneartarum atumsha .

text: I have confidence in you through the Lord , that ye will be none otherwise minded : but he that troubleth you shall bear his judgment , whosoever he be .
text2: Ayu , Yus Yáinmakrumin wi Tájana nu Nusháa Enentáimprashtatrume , nékajai . Tura atumin yajauch áujmatramainia nuna Yus Asutiáttawai Páchitsuk .

text: And I , brethren , if I yet preach circumcision , why do I yet suffer persecution ? then is the offence of the cross ceased .
text2: Wíkia , yatsuru , yamaisha " tsupirnaktiniaiti " tuke Tákuinkia Israer - shuar yajauch awajtuscharainti . Antsu Kristu jakamun étsereatnak " tsupirnaktiniaiti " Tákuinkia kajertukcharainti .

text: I would they were even cut off which trouble you .
text2: Atumin yajauch awajtamsatin wakeruiniana Nú shuar antsu ninki tsupimiakar yajauch awajmamsarti .

text: For , brethren , ye have been called unto liberty ; only use not liberty for an occasion to the flesh , but by love serve one another .
text2: Atumniasha , yatsuru , Kristu tuke ankant awajtamsarme . Tura ankant ajasrum , " Aya wi wakerajna nuna Túramniaitjai " tu Enentáimprairap . Antsu Nuámtak aneniakrum pénker Yáiniáiktarum .

text: For all the law is fulfilled in one word , even in this ; Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: Ju chichamjai Ashí akupkamu mash uminkiattawai : Ame ayashim aneamna aintsamek Chíkich shuarsha aneata .

text: But if ye bite and devour one another , take heed that ye be not consumed one of another .
text2: Tura aneartarum . Aneniachkurmeka , antsu esanairum mai yunai ajakrumka Nuámtak amunaiktatrume .

text: This I say then , Walk in the Spirit , and ye shall not fulful the lust of the flesh .
text2: Juna Tájarme : Atumí ayashi wakerana nu umikiaij tusarum Yusa Wakaní kakarmarijiai wekasatarum .

text: For the flesh lusteth against the Spirit , and the Spirit against the flesh : and these are contrary the one to the other : so that ye cannot do the things that ye would .
text2: Yusa Wakani wakera nuna ame ayashim nakitiawai . Tura ame ayashim wakerana Núnaka Yusa Wakaní nakitiawai . Mai maanai ajainiawai . Túmaitkui pénker wekasataj tukamam tujintiame . Páantchakait .

text: But if ye be led of the Spirit , ye are not under the law .
text2: Tura Yusa Wakaní jintintramkuinkia , aentsu akupkamurijiai itit áchattame .

text: Now the works of the flesh are manifest , which are these ; Adultery , fornication , uncleanness , lasciviousness ,
text2: Wats , ayash Túramu ti paant ainiawai . Ju ainiawai : tsanirmatin , wapik Túratin , yajauch Túratin ,

text: Idolatry , witchcraft , hatred , variance , emulations , wrath , strife , seditions , heresies ,
text2: ántar - yus ainia nu tikishmatratin , wawekratatin , nemasnaikiatin , katsumnaikiatin , akasmaktin , wari kajektin , nankaamantu Enentáimtumastin , aya Niisháa Niisháa Enentáimsartin , Níiniunak iistin ,

text: Envyings , murders , drunkenness , revellings , and such like : of the which I tell you before , as I have also told you in time past , that they which do such things shall not inherit the kingdom of God .
text2: yajauch Enentáimtunaistin , mankartuatin , nampektin , nampernum aya ti yurumin , tura ti nampen átin . Chíkich nujai métek ainiawai . Nuik ujakmajrumna Núnisnak ataksha Tájarme : Shuar nuna Túrakka Yusai pujustinian penké tujinkiattawai .

text: But the fruit of the Spirit is love , joy , peace , longsuffering , gentleness , goodness , faith ,
text2: Ayu , yamaikia Yusa Wakaní kakarmarijiai Túratin Enentáimsatai . Yusa Wakaní ii Enentáin pujak , pénker Túratniun nerektinia aintsan neremtikramji . Ju ainiawai : aneatin , shiir Enentáimsatin , Yusjai tura shuarjai nawamnaikiar wekasatin , shiir Enentáijiai katsuntratin , Chíkich shuar shiir awajsatin , tsanka átin , tana nuna Tímiatrusan umiktin ,

text: Meekness , temperance : against such there is no law .
text2: péejchach ajastin , iik iimiasar Tunáa Túrashtin . ṡJu Túratniuncha yaki surimia ?

text: And they that are Christ ' s have crucified the flesh with the affections and lusts .
text2: Shuar Jesukrístunu ainia nu , ni Ayashí wakeramurincha tura nunisan ni Túramurincha surimiak wekaawai . Ni ayashi Krúsnum maatniua aintsan Túraiti .

text: If we live in the Spirit , let us also walk in the Spirit .
text2: Yusa Wakaní kakarmarijiai Yus - shuar ajasu asar , Núnisrik Yusa Wakaní kakarmarijiain wekasatai .

text: Let us not be desirous of vain glory , provoking one another , envying one another .
text2: " Wats , nekapnaisatai . Wi Imiá pénkeraitjai " Nuámtak Túnaitsuk , yajauch Enentáimtunáischatniuiti .

text: Brethren , if a man be overtaken in a fault , ye which are spiritual , restore such an one in the spirit of meekness ; considering thyself , lest thou also be tempted .
text2: Túrasha , yatsuru , Yus - shuar Tunáa Túrashtimpiash . Atumsha nekas Yusjai wekaarumna nu , nu Wáinkiurmeka , Yátsum Yusjai iwiarat tusarum Yáintárum . Tura nankaamantu Enentáimtumatsuk Túratarum . Tura amesha nekamata . Tunaanum iniaraij tusam anearam wekasata .

text: Bear ye one another ' s burdens , and so fulfil the law of Christ .
text2: Káarak kijin akui Nuámtak Yáiniaiktin átsuk . Núnisrumek atumsha , itiurchatri akui Nuámtak Yáiniáiktarum . Túrakrumka Kristu akupeamuri Umíarme .

text: For if a man think himself to be something , when he is nothing , he deceiveth himself .
text2: Shuar tujintiayat " nankaamantuitjai " Tákunka ananmamui .

text: But let every man prove his own work , and then shall he have rejoicing in himself alone , and not in another .
text2: Shuar Ní Túramuriniak Enentáimtumastiniaiti . Níiniunak Enentáimtumakuinkia tura pénkeraitkiuinkia chikicha Túramuri iirtsuk , antsu Níiniun pénker iis wararsattawai .

text: For every man shall bear his own burden .
text2: Iis , Ashí Ní Káarkariniak Júkishtinkiait .

text: Let him that is taught in the word communicate unto him that teacheth in all good things .
text2: Shuar Yus - Chichaman unuimiatna nu , nu shuar niin Jintíana nuna Ashí takakna nujai Yáintí .

text: Be not deceived ; God is not mocked : for whatsoever a man soweth , that shall he also reap .
text2: Ananmamawairap . Shuar Yúsan anankatniun tujintiawai . Ame araamna nuna neren Júuktatme . Chíkich nere áchattawai . Atumi Enentáincha Núniskete .

text: For he that soweth to his flesh shall of the flesh reap corruption ; but he that soweth to the Spirit shall of the Spirit reap life everlasting .
text2: Iista . Shuar ni ayashi wakeramunak tuke Enentáimtakka , jatai nerea aintsan araaiti . Nerekmatai Jákatniun Júuktatui . Tura Yusa Wakaní wakera nuna tuke Enentáimtakka Yusjai tuke shiir pujustinian Júuktatui .

text: And let us not be weary in well doing : for in due season we shall reap , if we faint not .
text2: Nu asamtai pénker Túratin yawetkishtiniaiti . Tura pimpitsuk takasar Júuktin tsawant jeamtai , Páchitsuk Júuktatji .

text: As we have therefore opportunity , let us do good unto all men , especially unto them who are of the household of faith .
text2: Tuma asamtai Yáinmin ákuinkia ii jeajnia nu Túratniuitji nekaska ii yachi Yáinkiartin , Yus - shuar ainia nu . Tura Ashí shuarsha Yáintinaiti .

text: Ye see how large a letter I have written unto you with mine own hand .
text2: Iimsakua , winia uwejrujai Urutá uuntna aatjarum .

text: As many as desire to make a fair shew in the flesh , they constrain you to be circumcised ; only lest they should suffer persecution for the cross of Christ .
text2: " Nekas tuke tsupirnaktiniaitme " tuinia nuka áyatik shuar shiir Enentáimtursartí tusa tuiniawai . Kristu Krúsnum jakamun étsereakuinkia itiurchat awajtusarain tusar " tsupirnaktiniaitme " tuiniawai . Shuar " Ashí akupkamun umiktajai " tusa , Muisais timia Núnisan tsupirnaktiniaiti .

text: For neither they themselves who are circumcised keep the law ; but desire to have you circumcised , that they may glory in your flesh .
text2: Pai . Tura Nú shuar tsupirnaku ainiayat Ashí akupkamun umiiniatsui . Muisais timia nuna ajapén ikiuiniawai . Túmaitiat tsupirnakuk tusa wakerutmainiawai . Ayatik atumin " Pai , niisha tsupimiatkiakji " titiai tusar wakerutmainiawai .

text: But God forbid that I should glory , save in the cross of our Lord Jesus Christ , by whom the world is crucified unto me , and I unto the world .
text2: Wikia , antsu , aya ii uuntri Jesukrístu Krúsnum jakamunak wararsatniun Enentáimjai . Tu Enentáimkiun Kristu Krúsnum jakamia aintsanak ju nunkanmaya ana nuna jaka aintsan Páchiatsjai ; tunaanum winia útsutkatin atsawai .

text: For in Christ Jesus neither circumcision availeth anything , nor uncircumcision , but a new creature .
text2: Krístunu ajasrikia tsupirnaktincha tsupirnakchaitkiursha mai ántraiti antsu yamaram akiiniatin nekas pénkeraiti .

text: And as many as walk according to this rule , peace be on them , and mercy , and upon the Israel of God .
text2: Ashí nekas Yus - shuaran , wi Tájana nujai métek wekainia nuna , Yus shiir Enentáimias Yáinti tuke shiir pujustinian .

text: From henceforth let no man trouble me : for I bear in my body the marks of the Lord Jesus .
text2: Yamaikia itiurchat najatawarain . Jesusa takatri takaakui asutiuawarma paant ayashrui chimikma írunui .

text: Brethren , the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit . Amen .
text2: Yatsuru , ii uuntri Jesukrístu atumin shiir yainmakarti . Nuke Atí .

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God , to the saints which are at Ephesus , and to the faithful in Christ Jesus :
text2: Yus nuna wakerakui Jesukrístu akatramuitjai . Jesukrístu nekas Enentáimtusrum Yus - shuar ajasrum Ipisiunam pujarmena nuna ju papin aatjarme .

text: Grace be to you , and peace , from God our Father , and from the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Yus ii Aparísha tura ii Uuntri Jesukrístusha waitnentramainia ásar imiatkinchanum shiir pujustinian yainmakarti .

text: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , who hath blessed us with all spiritual blessings in heavenly places in Christ :
text2: Ii Uuntri Jesukrístu Apari Yus nekas shiir awajtustiniaiti . Iisha Krístujai tsaninkiu asar ii Enentáin Ashí nayaimpinmaya ana nujai warasminiaitji . Túmaitkiui Yus nu waratain Ashí suramsaitji .

text: According as he hath chosen us in him before the foundation of the world , that we should be holy and without blame before him in love :
text2: Krístujai uwemprar ti shiir tunaajainchu Niijiai pujusarat tusa Yus , ju nunka atsaisha , anaitiamkamiaji .

text: Having predestinated us unto the adoption of children by Jesus Christ to himself , according to the good pleasure of his will ,
text2: Yámankamtaiksha incha ti anenmak Jesukrístu Túrunamujai ni uchiri ajasat tusa wakerutmakmiaji .

text: To the praise of the glory of his grace , wherein he hath made us accepted in the beloved .
text2: Ni aneamu Uchirijiai tsaninkiu asakrin nekas ti anenmaji . Nu Enentáimsar ti shiir awajsatniuitji .

text: In whom we have redemption through his blood , the forgiveness of sins , according to the riches of his grace ;
text2: Yus ti anenmakrin ni aneamu Uchirí numpé puarmatai , nu jakamujai ii tunaarin akikmatramak uwemtikrampraitji .

text: Wherein he hath abounded toward us in all wisdom and prudence ;
text2: Tura ti anenmak ni Enentáimtairin tura nekatairincha suramsamiaji .

text: Having made known unto us the mystery of his will , according to his good pleasure which he hath purposed in himself :
text2: Nujai shiir Enentáimturmak iin uwemtikrampratniun wakerutmakmiaj nuna , yaunchu nekaachman , Yamái paant awajturmaji .

text: That in the dispensation of the fulness of times he might gather together in one all things in Christ , both which are in heaven , and which are on earth ; even in him :
text2: Ashí Jú nunkanam írunna nunasha tura nayaimpiniam írunna nunasha Kristu Ashí akupin ati tusa Yus tsankatkattawai . Nunasha Yus yaunchu Enentáimturu asamtai tsawant jeamtai Ashí Uminkiáttawai .

text: In whom also we have obtained an inheritance , being predestinated according to the purpose of him who worketh all things after the counsel of his own will :
text2: Iisha Krístujai tsaninkiu asakrin Yus yaunchu achirmakmiaji Ashí Niiniu ana nuna tsankatramkatniun . Nunasha , Ashí Nii Túrana Núnisan , aya Nii wakera asa Túramiayi .

text: That we should be to the praise of his glory , who first trusted in Christ .
text2: Iikia Israer - shuar asar Kristu emka umirkakrin iin Imiá pénker Túrutmamun nekaawar Ashí shuar Yúsan ti shiir awajsamin ainiawai .

text: In whom ye also trusted , after that ye heard the word of truth , the gospel of your salvation : in whom also after that ye believed , ye were sealed with that holy Spirit of promise ,
text2: Núnisan atumsha nekas uwempratin chicham antukrum Kristu nekas Enentáimtusurme . Túrarum Kristu - shuar ajasakrumin Yus ni shiir Wakanín akuptuktaj timia nuna akupturmakmai . Nuna tura " nekas Wíi shuaraitrume " tawai .

text: Which is the earnest of our inheritance until the redemption of the purchased possession , unto the praise of his glory .
text2: Yamái Yusa Wakani ii Enentáin pujuruk tuke uwemtikramji . Tura takas umik nu tsawantai Ashí tsankatramkattaji . Tura ii Enentáin Pujá asamtai Yus ukunam Niijiaisha ashi tsankatramkattaj nu paant nékaji . Maa , Yus ti penker asamtai Niin Ashí ti shiir awajsarti .

text: Wherefore I also , after I heard of your faith in the Lord Jesus , and love unto all the saints ,
text2: Atum ii Uuntri Jesukrístu nekas Enentáimtamuncha tura Ashí Yus - shuarjai shiir awajnaiyamuncha antukjai .

text: Cease not to give thanks for you , making mention of you in my prayers ;
text2: Túran shiir Enentáimkiun Yúsan áujkun tuke Yúminkiajai .

text: That the God of our Lord Jesus Christ , the Father of glory , may give unto you the spirit of wisdom and revelation in the knowledge of him :
text2: Ii Uuntri Jesukrístu Apari Yus ti shiir asamtai Niin áujeakun ni Wakani ni nekatairin suramas Ashí jintintramawarti tusan seajai . Nujai nuna nankaamas Yus nekaattarme .

text: The eyes of your understanding being enlightened ; that ye may know what is the hope of his calling , and what the riches of the glory of his inheritance in the saints ,
text2: Tura Enentáimincha paant Enentáimtikramprarti tusan seajai . Nujai shiir Túrutmataj tusa achirmakuitrum nu nekaattarme . Nu arantcha Imiá Shíira nu , Yus ni shuarin Ashí tsankatkattana nusha nekaattarme .

text: And what is the exceeding greatness of his power to usward who believe , according to the working of his mighty power ,
text2: Nu arantcha Yus umirkurin ti kakaram tujincha asa iin Yáinmaj nu nekaattarme . Tura nu kakaram ti kakaram asamtai

text: Which he wrought in Christ , when he raised him from the dead , and set him at his own right hand in the heavenly places ,
text2: nujai Krístun jakamunmaya iniantkimiayi . Tura nayaimpiniam Jukí ni untsuurini akupin pujutainium apujsamiayi .

text: Far above all principality , and power , and might , and dominion , and every name that is named , not only in this world , but also in that which is to come :
text2: Tura Ashí ju nunkanam akupin ainia Nújaisha tura ukunam nunka átatna nui akupin áminia Nújaisha tura Ashí akupin ainia Nújaisha tura Ashí naari nékamu ainia nujaisha Yus Krístun Ashí nankaamas akupin najanamiayi .

text: And hath put all things under his feet , and gave him to be the head over all things to the church ,
text2: Tura Ashí írunna nu , Krístun umirkartin ainiawai . Tura Yuska Krístunak Ashí Yus - shuara Akupniuri awajsamiayi . Túramtai Kristu ni shuari muuké aintsankete .

text: Which is his body , the fulness of him that filleth all in all .
text2: Tura Ashí nunkanam Yus - shuar ainia nu Kristu Ayashí najanainiawai . Tura Kristu Ashí ni ayashin pimiutkaiti tura nu arantcha Ashí írunna nunasha pimiutkaiti .

text: And you hath he quickened , who were dead in trespasses and sins ;
text2: Atum yajauch Túrakrum tunaanum tuke wekaakrum Yúsnumia kanakin asarum Jákauyarme .

text: Wherein in time past ye walked according to the course of this world , according to the prince of the power of the air , the spirit that now worketh in the children of disobedience :
text2: Nu tunaanum Jú nunkanam pujuinia nujai métek tuke wekainiuyarme . Túrarum uunt iwianchi wakeramuri umirniuyarme . Uunt iwianch Ashí Yúsan umirainiatsna nuna akatenawai .

text: Among whom also we all had our conversation in times past in the lusts of our flesh , fulfilling the desires of the flesh and of the mind ; and were by nature the children of wrath , even as others .
text2: Ashí iisha Núnisrik yaunchu nu shuarjai métek ii Ayashí wakerakmu umirniuyaji . Tura ii Enentái wakeramusha umirniuyaji . Tuma asar tura tunaajai akiinia asar Chíkich shuarjai métek ti kajernakmiaji .

text: But God , who is rich in mercy , for his great love wherewith he loved us ,
text2: Antsu Yus ti waitnenkartin asa iin ti anenmamiaji .

text: Even when we were dead in sins , hath quickened us together with Christ , ( by grace ye are saved ; )
text2: Tuma asa ii tunaanum tuke jaka pujarnin Krístujai métek iwiaaku awajtamsamiaji . Aya ti anenkartin asa uwemtikrampramiaji .

text: And hath raised us up together , and made us sit together in heavenly places in Christ Jesus :
text2: Tura Krístujai métek iniantamkimiaji . Nuyá Jesukrístujai métek , akupin pujutainium yamaisha apujtamas tuke nupetkatniun tsankatramkaitji .

text: That in the ages to come he might shew the exceeding riches of his grace in his kindness toward us through Christ Jesus .
text2: Nujai ni ti anenkratmarincha tura Kristu Túrunamujai waitnentrampramuncha tuke iniaktusmin átatui .

text: For by grace are ye saved through faith ; and that not of yourselves : it is the gift of God :
text2: Jesukrístu nekas Enentáimta asakrumin Yus waitnentramar uwemtikrampraiti . Juka átumkeka Túrunachuitrume . Antsu Yuska Ninki Kuítchajai suramsaitrume .

text: Not of works , lest any man should boast .
text2: Shuar ni Takatríjiai uwempratniuitkiunka nankaamantu Enentáimsainti winia kakarmarjai uwemprajai tusa . Nu Enentáimsatniuka Atsutí tusa Yuska átumka takaatsrumnin uwempratniun suramsamiarme .

text: For we are his workmanship , created in Christ Jesus unto good works , which God hath before ordained that we should walk in them .
text2: Yus najanamuitji . Kame Jesukrístujai Tsaníakrin yamaram iwiaakman suramas tuke pénker Túratniun najatmamji . Yáunchuk nuna Enentáimturmasmiaji .

text: Wherefore remember , that ye being in time past Gentiles in the flesh , who are called Uncircumcision by that which is called the Circumcision in the flesh made by hands ;
text2: Nuik ámarum nu Enentáimpratarum . Ashí Israer - shuar ni Ayashín tsupirnaku ásar Ashí Israer - shuarchan , tsupirnakcha ainiakui , penké Yúsnachua Núnis Enentáimtuiniawai . Tura atumsha Israer - shuarcha asakrumin " tsupirnakcha " turamniuyarme .

text: That at that time ye were without Christ , being aliens from the commonwealth of Israel , and strangers from the covenants of promise , having no hope , and without God in the world :
text2: Nuik Krísturtinchauyarme . Israer - shuarcha asarum Ashí ni Túrutairisha tura Ashí Yus niin tsankatkarmasha nekaachuyarme . Tura Jú nunkanmaya asarum nekas Yusa nu Enentáimtichuyarme tura shiir pujustin Nánkamsarum Enentáimpramarme .

text: But now in Christ Jesus ye who sometimes were far off are made nigh by the blood of Christ .
text2: Antsu yamaikia Krístujai tsaninkiu asarum , yaunchu Yusaíya Yajá pujuwitiatrum , yamaikia Kristu numpé Puármatai ni jarutramkamujai Tántaitrume .

text: For he is our peace , who hath made both one , and hath broken down the middle wall of partition between us ;
text2: Israer - shuarjai Israer - shuarchajai nemasmanaikiar ajapén péenkramu ámiaji . Tura Kristu nuna Sáaki nawamnaimtikramkamiaji . Tura chikichik shuar najatmamiaji .

text: Having abolished in his flesh the enmity , even the law of commandments contained in ordinances ; for to make in himself of twain one new man , so making peace ;
text2: Nuik aya Israer - shuar Muisais akupkamu Untsurí armia nuna umirkatin ainiak nujai Chíkich shuarjai nemasmanainiarmiayi . Tura Kristu jaka nu akupkamun ántar awajas chikichik shuar yamaram awajtamsamiaji .

text: And that he might reconcile both unto God in one body by the cross , having slain the enmity thereby :
text2: Núnisan ámiayi . Kristu Krúsnum jaka nemasjai mai apattamak chikichik awajtamas Yusjaisha nawamnaimtikramkamiaji .

text: And came and preached peace to you which were afar off , and to them that were nigh .
text2: Kristu taa nawamnaikiatniun chichaman Israer - shuaran ujakmiayi . Tura nu chichamnak atumin Yus nékachuyarmena nunasha ujaktinian akupkamiayi .

text: For through him we both have access by one Spirit unto the Father .
text2: Yamaikia Israer - shuartisha tura Israer - shuarchasha mai metek Kristu Túrunamujai tura Yusa Wakani takaku asar Yusai jeatniuitji .

text: Now therefore ye are no more strangers and foreigners , but fellowcitizens with the saints , and of the household of God ;
text2: Tuma asamtai yamaikia Chíkich shuarchaitrume , antsu Ashí Yus - shuarjai métek ajasuitrume . Nekas Yusa shuarintrume .

text: And are built upon the foundation of the apostles and prophets , Jesus Christ himself being the chief corner stone ;
text2: Atum uunt jea jeamma Núnisaitrume . Uunt jea jeamtin , emka kaya apujtuktiniaiti jea ti wewe Atí tusa . Núnisan yaunchu Yúsnan etserniusha tura Kristu akatramurisha Yus - Chichaman etserainiak Imiá nekas Enentáimtustinia nuna apujtukarmiayi . Tura Ashí nujai nankaamas Jesukrístu Enentáimtustiniaiti .

text: In whom all the building fitly framed together groweth unto an holy temple in the Lord :
text2: Jea apujtukmari Kristu asamtai Nii ti penker ekeniar jea jeamnaki wéawai . Tura ii Uuntri Krístujai Yusa Jee ti shiir átatui .

text: In whom ye also are builded together for an habitation of God through the Spirit .
text2: Núnisrumek atumsha Krístujai tsaninkiu asarum átum Ashí Yus - shuarjai Yusa Jeeya aintsan ajasuitrume . Tura Yusa Wakani Ashí Yus - shuara Enentáin Pujú asamtai nekas Yusa Jeente .

text: For this cause I Paul , the prisoner of Jesus Christ for you Gentiles ,
text2: Nu asamtai atumin Israer - shuarchatirmin Yáintaj tusan Jesukrístunu étserkun sepunam pujajai .

text: If ye have heard of the dispensation of the grace of God which is given me to youward :
text2: Yus anentak Yus - Chichaman atumin etserkatniun akatar akuptukuiti . Nu nékatsrumek .

text: How that by revelation he made known unto me the mystery ; ( as I wrote afore in few words ,
text2: Yus nuna Túrutak yaunchu nekaachmancha paant awajtursamiayi . Núnaka ishichik aatraitjarme .

text: Whereby , when ye read , ye may understand my knowledge in the mystery of Christ )
text2: Nu áujsarum Krístunu yaunchu nekaachman yamaikia paant nékajna nu nekaattarme .

text: Which in other ages was not made known unto the sons of men , as it is now revealed unto his holy apostles and prophets by the Spirit ;
text2: Nú chichaman Yáunchusha chikichkinkesha ujankachmiayi . Túrasha yamaikia Yusa Wakani Kristu akatramurincha etserniurincha nu chichaman paant awajtusarai .

text: That the Gentiles should be fellowheirs , and of the same body , and partakers of his promise in Christ by the gospel :
text2: Nu chicham juiti : Uwempratin chichaman umirkar Israer - shuarcha Israer - shuarjai métek Krístujai tsaninkiaru ásar chikichik shuar ajasartatui . Tura nu arantcha Yus ni shuarin Ashí Shíiran tsankatkatniun anajmatrama nui métek pachiinkiartatui .

text: Whereof I was made a minister , according to the gift of the grace of God given unto me by the effectual working of his power .
text2: Yus ni kakarmarijiai winia Yáintiuk tura ti anentu asa nu uwempratin chichaman etserkat tusa akatturmiayi .

text: Unto me , who am less than the least of all saints , is this grace given , that I should preach among the Gentiles the unsearchable riches of Christ ;
text2: Ashí Yus - shuarjai nankaamas wi pénkercha ain Israer - shuarchanum shiir chichaman etserkat tusa Yus tsankatrukmiayi . Krístujainkia kuitjai nankaamas pénker , Enentáimtustin jeatsjinia nu , takakji . Nusha ti shiir chichamaiti .

text: And to make all men see what is the fellowship of the mystery , which from the beginning of the world hath been hid in God , who created all things by Jesus Christ :
text2: Yuska , Ashí najana nu , nu Enentáimmian Yáunchusha etsertsuk yamaikia Ashí shuar nu chichaman nekaawarat tusa winia akatturmiayi .

text: To the intent that now unto the principalities and powers in heavenly places might be known by the church the manifold wisdom of God ,
text2: Yamaikia Ashí nayaimpiniam pujuinia nuka Yus ni shuariin Túrunamun iisar Yuska Imiá neka asa Ashí Enentáimniua nuna paant nékainiawai .

text: According to the eternal purpose which he purposed in Christ Jesus our Lord :
text2: Yus Júnis Túratniun Yáunchuk Enentáimpramiayi . Tura ii Uuntri Jesukrístujai mash uminkiamiayi .

text: In whom we have boldness and access with confidence by the faith of him .
text2: Tura Krístujai Yusai Yúpichuch jeaji . Tura Niin nekas Enentáimtusar sapijmiatsuk Niin tantamniaitji .

text: Wherefore I desire that ye faint not at my tribulations for you , which is your glory .
text2: Tuma asamtai Tájarme , atumin Yáintaj tusan sepunam pujakui Kúntuts Enentáimprairap . Antsu nujai Yus atumin ti shiir awajtamkurmin átum warasuk tusan wakerajrume .

text: For this cause I bow my knees unto the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ ,
text2: Nu asamtai ii Uuntri Jesukrístu Aparín tikishmatran áujtajrume .

text: Of whom the whole family in heaven and earth is named ,
text2: Ashí nayaimpinmasha tura nunkasha Yus - shuar ájinia nu nekas ni shuari ainiaji .

text: That he would grant you , according to the riches of his glory , to be strengthened with might by his Spirit in the inner man ;
text2: Yus ti kakaram asa ni Wakaníjiai Atumí Enentáin pujureak Ashí ni kakarmariyan atumin suramsarat tusan áujtajrume .

text: That Christ may dwell in your hearts by faith ; that ye , being rooted and grounded in love ,
text2: Yus nekas Enentáimtakrumin Kristu Atumí Enentáin pujusat tusan áujtajrume . Tuke Yapajítsuk anenkratin átarum tusan áujtajrume .

text: May be able to comprehend with all saints what is the breadth , and length , and depth , and height ;
text2: Túrakrum Ashí Yus - shuarjai Kristu anenkrattairi nekaattarme . Imiá uunt asa nankantsuk tuke amuukachminiaiti .

text: And to know the love of Christ , which passeth knowledge , that ye might be filled with all the fulness of God .
text2: Nu anenkrattai Ashí takamtsuk nekaachmin ain nekaatarum tusan áujtajrume . Nujai Yus takamtsuk pimiutramkattarme .

text: Now unto him that is able to do exceeding abundantly above all that we ask or think , according to the power that worketh in us ,
text2: Nekas Yus shiir awajnasti . Ni ti kakaram asa ii seajnia nuna nankaamas tura Enentáimprachminia nunasha nankaamas iin pujurtamuk Ashí Túramniaiti .

text: Unto him be glory in the church by Christ Jesus throughout all ages , world without end . Amen .
text2: Ashí Yus - shuarjaisha tura Krístujaisha Yusa pénkeri tuke paant wantinin Atí . Yus tuke iniaitsuk shiir awajnasti . Núnisan Atí .

text: I therefore , the prisoner of the Lord , beseech you that ye walk worthy of the vocation wherewith ye are called ,
text2: Atumsha ni shuari ajastin Yus achikma asarum pénker wekasatarum Tájarme . Ii Uuntriniun étserkun sepunam pujakun seajrume .

text: With all lowliness and meekness , with longsuffering , forbearing one another in love ;
text2: Nekasmiancha ajasrum aneniakrum katsunnairatarum .

text: Endeavouring to keep the unity of the Spirit in the bond of peace .
text2: Yusa Wakani chikichik shuar awajtamkurmin shiir awajnaisarum pujustarum .

text: There is one body , and one Spirit , even as ye are called in one hope of your calling ;
text2: Yusa Wakaninkia chikichkiiti . Tura Ashí métek Yus achikma asar métek Niijiai shiir pujustin Enentáimji . Iisha Kristu Ayashí Ayashímkia asar chikichik ayashkiitji .

text: One Lord , one faith , one baptism ,
text2: Ii Uuntri chikichkiiti . Ninki nekas Enentáimtusar métek imiantiniaitji .

text: One God and Father of all , who is above all , and through all , and in you all .
text2: Chikichkiiti Yus , Ashí Yus - shuarti ii Aparínti . Ashí akuptamniuitji . Ashí ni shuariin pujak ii Enentáin pujurtamji . Ti nekas Ashí mash , Israer - shuartisha Israer - shuarchasha , Imiá chikichik ajasuitji .

text: But unto every one of us is given grace according to the measure of the gift of Christ .
text2: Tura chikichik chikichik Niisháa shiir takastinian suramsaitji . Tura Kristu wakerimia Núnisan suramsaji .

text: Wherefore he saith , When he ascended up on high , he led captivity captive , and gave gifts unto men .
text2: Nu asamtai Yus - Papiniumsha tawai : " Achikman Jukí nayaimpiniam wakamiayi . Tura Shuáran Shíiran susamiayi . " Tu aarmaiti .

text: ( Now that he ascended , what is it but that he also descended first into the lower parts of the earth ?
text2: Tura " wakamiayi " tana nu ṡwarintiua ? Kristu nayaimpiniam Pujá asa Yakí Wákanka emka Tárashtinkiait . Nekas Nunká taramiayi .

text: He that descended is the same also that ascended up far above all heavens , that he might fill all things . )
text2: Ninki ataksha nekas nayaimpiniam wakamiayi . Nuna tura asa Ashí ni shuarin pimiutkarmiayi .

text: And he gave some , apostles ; and some , prophets ; and some , evangelists ; and some , pastors and teachers ;
text2: Tura nujai chikichan akatramun awajsamiayi . Chikichnasha Yúsnan etserniun awajsamiayi . Chikichnasha uwempratin chichaman etserniun awajsamiayi . Chikichnasha Yus - shuara Wáinniun awajsamiayi . Tura chikichnasha unuikiartinian awajsamiayi .

text: For the perfecting of the saints , for the work of the ministry , for the edifying of the body of Christ :
text2: Túramtai Ashí Yus - shuar ni takatrijiai Yáiniaikiar ti penker shuar ajainiakui Kristu ayashi takamtsuk katsuarartatui .

text: Till we all come in the unity of the faith , and of the knowledge of the Son of God , unto a perfect man , unto the measure of the stature of the fulness of Christ :
text2: Nujai Yus nekas Enentáimtamunam Yusa Uchirí Ashí métekrak pénker nekaattaji . Nu Túrakur katsukir Krístujai métek pénker ajastatji .

text: That we henceforth be no more children , tossed to and fro , and carried about with every wind of doctrine , by the sleight of men , and cunning craftiness , whereby they lie in wait to deceive ;
text2: Tura Uchía aintsar áchattaji . Uchikia Ashí yamaram chichaman antukar wari Yapajíiniawai . Tura anankartinia chichamen antukar waaku ainiawai . Kame nu anankartin shuar ti paant chichayatan ni shiir chichamejai anankatniun pujurenawai .

text: But speaking the truth in love , may grow up into him in all things , which is the head , even Christ :
text2: Antsu nekas aneniakur nekas chicham ujanaiktiniaitji . Túrar Krístujai tsaninkiar tuke tsakakir Ashí pénker Túratniujai Niijiai métek ajastatji . Krístuka Ashí ni shuari muuké aintsankete .

text: From whom the whole body fitly joined together and compacted by that which every joint supplieth , according to the effectual working in the measure of every part , maketh increase of the body unto the edifying of itself in love .
text2: Tuma asa ni ayashin Wáinkiui Ashí nuna muchitmari pénker Yáiniaikiar Ashí ni Túratniurin shiir takasartatui . Nujai nu ayashnium muchitmari Chíkich Chíkich pénker takainiak métekrak shiir tsakartatui . Tura anenainiakui nu ayashsha pénker uuntmartatui .

text: This I say therefore , and testify in the Lord , that ye henceforth walk not as other Gentiles walk , in the vanity of their mind ,
text2: Ii Uuntri Kristu iimmianum juna akatjarme : Chíkich aents Yúsan nékachu ásar ántar ni Enentáimmiajain wekainia Núnisrum wekasairap .

text: Having the understanding darkened , being alienated from the life of God through the ignorance that is in them , because of the blindness of their heart :
text2: Ni Enentáin kusuru ainiak Yusna nuna nekaatniun wakeruiniatsui . Tuma ásar shiir wekasatniun , Yus amaana nuna , nékainiatsui .

text: Who being past feeling have given themselves over unto lasciviousness , to work all uncleanness with greediness .
text2: Nu arantcha , ni Túramurijiai natsamtichu ásar ti yajauchiniam surumakar Ashí tunaan wararainiak Túrin ainiawai .

text: But ye have not so learned Christ ;
text2: Antsu átumka Núnisrum Enentáimtustin unuimiarchamarme .

text: If so be that ye have heard him , and have been taught by him , as the truth is in Jesus :
text2: Nekas Nii anturkaitkiurmeka tura Jesus nekas tama Kristu unuiniarmaitkiurmeka Niin shiir Enentáimtustin unuimiarmarme .

text: That ye put off concerning the former conversation the old man , which is corrupt according to the deceitful lusts ;
text2: Yaunchu Enentáimtairmeka ayash wakeramu anankramin ainia nujai piaku asa Imiá yajauchiiti . Nu Enentáimtairmesha yaunchu Túrutairmesha ajapa iniaisatarum .

text: And be renewed in the spirit of your mind ;
text2: Túrarum pénker Enentáimsarum wakannium Yapajiátarum .

text: And that ye put on the new man , which after God is created in righteousness and true holiness .
text2: Tura yamaram Enentáimtairam emetatarum . Nuka Yusjai métek najanamu asa nekas pénker tura shiira nuna tuke Túriniaiti .

text: Wherefore putting away lying , speak every man truth with his neighbour : for we are members one of another .
text2: Nu asamtai chikichik ayashi muchitmari asarum Wáitrutsuk nekas chicham chicharnaisatarum .

text: Be ye angry , and sin not : let not the sun go down upon your wrath :
text2: Kajeakrum Tunáa Túrawairap . Tura nu kajekmasha tsawant takamtsuk áchatniuiti .

text: Neither give place to the devil .
text2: Uunt iwianch yajauch awajtamsatin tsankatkaip .

text: Let him that stole steal no more : but rather let him labour , working with his hands the thing which is good , that he may have to give to him that needeth .
text2: Kasasha kasamtsuk kakaram takakmasti . Tura ni uwejéjai pénker takaak atsumainia Nú shuarnasha susati .

text: Let no corrupt communication proceed out of your mouth , but that which is good to the use of edifying , that it may minister grace unto the hearers .
text2: Muijmiai chicham chichasairap . Antsu chichastin akui pénker chicham , Chíkich shuar pénker awajsamnia nu chichastarum . Anturtuinia nuna Yáintaj tusarum nu chicham ujaktarum .

text: And grieve not the holy Spirit of God , whereby ye are sealed unto the day of redemption .
text2: Yusa Shiir Wakaní Kúntuts awajsairap . Warí , Yúsnaiti tusa pujurtamji . Tura pujurtamuk takamtsuk uwemtikramprattaji .

text: Let all bitterness , and wrath , and anger , and clamour , and evil speaking , be put away from you , with all malice :
text2: Ashí yajauch ana Nuyá kanaktiarum . Nakitratniusha , kajernaikiatniusha , tura kakantrar Charáa Charáa ajatniusha , katsekmaktincha , tsanumpratniusha mash Atsutí .

text: And be ye kind one to another , tenderhearted , forgiving one another , even as God for Christ ' s sake hath forgiven you .
text2: Antsu shiir awajkartin ajasrum waitnennairarum , Kristu jakamujai Yus Atumí tunaarin tsankurtampra Nútiksarmek tsankurnairatarum .

text: Be ye therefore followers of God , as dear children ;
text2: Nekas Yusa Uchirí aneamu asarum Nii tura Núnis Túratin wakeruktarum .

text: And walk in love , as Christ also hath loved us , and hath given himself for us an offering and a sacrifice to God for a sweetsmelling savour .
text2: Kristu iin anenmaj Núnisrum anenaitiarum . Kame ii tunaarin akikmaktaj tusa Jákatniunam surumakmiayi . Túramtai Yus shiir Enentáimtusmiayi .

text: But fornication , and all uncleanness , or covetousness , let it not be once named among you , as becometh saints ;
text2: Yusna asarum tsanirmatniusha yajauch Túratniusha tura Jú nunkanmayan ikiaunkatniusha ishichkisha Enentáimtuschatniuitrume .

text: Neither filthiness , nor foolish talking , nor jesting , which are not convenient : but rather giving of thanks .
text2: Natsanmaincha , ántar chichamsha yainmakchamnia asamtai chichaschatniuitrume . Antsu Yus shiir yuminsatniuiti .

text: For this ye know , that no whoremonger , nor unclean person , nor covetous man , who is an idolater , hath any inheritance in the kingdom of Christ and of God .
text2: Shuar Chíkich nuwajai tsanirmakka tura Ashí yajauchin wakerakka tura Jú nunkanmayan ikiaunkatniun wakerakka Yusai Kristu akupea nui penké pachiinkiachminiaiti . Kame ju nunkanmayan ikiaunkatin ántar - yus tikishmatratniua nujai métekete .

text: Let no man deceive you with vain words : for because of these things cometh the wrath of God upon the children of disobedience .
text2: Nu Túramniaiti tusar ántar chichamjai anankramacharti . Warí , nuna Túruiniakui Yúsan umirainiachun Yus ti Asutiáwartatui .

text: Be not ye therefore partakers with them .
text2: Tuma asamtai nu shuar penké pachischatniuitrume .

text: For ye were sometimes darkness , but now are ye light in the Lord : walk as children of light :
text2: Yáunchuka atumsha kiritniunam wekainiuyarme . Tura yamaikia Krístujai tsaninkiu asarum pénker Tsáapninium wekaarme . Shuar Tsáapninium wekainia nujai métek wekasatarum .

text: ( For the fruit of the Spirit is in all goodness and righteousness and truth ; )
text2: Tsáapninium wekainiaka shiir awajkartincha tura nekas chichamtincha tura pénker Túrin ainiawai .

text: Proving what is acceptable unto the Lord .
text2: Ii Uuntri Kristu wakeramu nekaatin wakeruktarum .

text: And have no fellowship with the unfruitful works of darkness , but rather reprove them .
text2: Kiritniunam wekainia nu Túramu pachisairap . Antsu nu shuar Tsáapninium enkeatarum .

text: For it is a shame even to speak of those things which are done of them in secret .
text2: Ni uuk Túruinia nu áujmatsatin natsanmainiaiti .

text: But all things that are reproved are made manifest by the light : for whatsoever doth make manifest is light .
text2: Tura Ashí Tsáapninium itiamu Ashí paant ajawai . Tsáapnikia Ashí paant awajeatsuk .

text: Wherefore he saith , Awake thou that sleepest , and arise from the dead , and Christ shall give thee light .
text2: Nu asamtai Yus - Papinium tawai : " Kanaruitme nu Shintiártá . Jakamunmaya Nantáktiá . Tura Kristu Tsáapin awajturmastatui . " Tu aarmaiti .

text: See then that ye walk circumspectly , not as fools , but as wise ,
text2: Nu asamtai átum Túramu iimiastarum . Nékachu aintsarum pujusairap . Antsu pénker Enentáimprarum wekasatarum .

text: Redeeming the time , because the days are evil .
text2: Pénker Túratin tsawant Wasúrkáip . Tunáa ti pampaatsuk .

text: Wherefore be ye not unwise , but understanding what the will of the Lord is .
text2: Enentáincha airap . Ii Uuntri Kristu warinia wakera nu Enentáimtustarum .

text: And be not drunk with wine , wherein is excess ; but be filled with the Spirit ;
text2: Nampekairap . Nampeakmeka aya yajauch ajame . Antsu Yusa Wakani winia Enentáirui takamtsuk pujurtusti , tu Enentáimsatarum .

text: Speaking to yourselves in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs , singing and making melody in your heart to the Lord ;
text2: Túrarum Yus shiir Enentáimtakrum Yus - kanta kantamkirum shiir áujnaisatarum .

text: Giving thanks always for all things unto God and the Father in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ ;
text2: Ii Uuntri Jesukrístu Náarijiai Ashí irunna nu Yus Apa tuke yuminsatarum .

text: Submitting yourselves one to another in the fear of God .
text2: Yus - shuar asarum Nuámtak umirnaikiatarum . Túrakrum Kristu shiir awajsattarme .

text: Wives , submit yourselves unto your own husbands , as unto the Lord .
text2: Núwaka Krístun umirna Núnisan ni aishrincha umirkatniuiti .

text: For the husband is the head of the wife , even as Christ is the head of the church : and he is the saviour of the body .
text2: Kristu ni shuarin akupeana Núnisan aishmansha ni nuwen akupkatniuiti . Kristu ni shuarin ayashimiak ni muuké aintsankete . Tura niin uwemtikiartiniaiti .

text: Therefore as the church is subject unto Christ , so let the wives be to their own husbands in every thing .
text2: Nu asamtai Yus - shuar Krístun umirin ainiawai . Núnisan Ashí ana nujai nuwa ni aishrin umirkatniuiti .

text: Husbands , love your wives , even as Christ also loved the church , and gave himself for it ;
text2: Kristu ni shuarin ti aneak niin Yáintaj tusa Jákatniun surumakmiayi . Núnisrumek aishmantirmesha atumi nuwé aneatniuitrume .

text: That he might sanctify and cleanse it with the washing of water by the word ,
text2: Kristu Ashí ni shuarin ni Chichamejai tura entsajai nijiar Ní shuar pénker árat tusa jakamiayi .

text: That he might present it to himself a glorious church , not having spot , or wrinkle , or any such thing ; but that it should be holy and without blemish .
text2: Nujai Ashí ni shuarin tunaarinniuchu tura yajauch Máatrachu antsu ti penker shiir awajas Niiní ejetaj tusa Túramiayi .

text: So ought men to love their wives as their own bodies . He that loveth his wife loveth himself .
text2: Núnisan aishman ni Ayashín anea Núnisan ni nuwen aneatniuiti . Shuar ni nuwen aneak nujai ni Ayashíncha aneawai .

text: For no man ever yet hated his own flesh ; but nourisheth and cherisheth it , even as the Lord the church :
text2: ṡYaki ni Ayashín nakitniuit ? Antsu pénker Wáiniuk áyureatsuk . Kristu Núnisan ni shuarin wainiui

text: For we are members of his body , of his flesh , and of his bones .
text2: ni Ayashí asamtai . Kame ni Ayashí muchitmarintji .

text: For this cause shall a man leave his father and mother , and shall be joined unto his wife , and they two shall be one flesh .
text2: " Tuma asamtai aishman ni Aparíncha Nukuríncha ikiukin ni nuwejai tsaninkiar chikichik ayashtin ajainiawai . " Tu aarmaiti .

text: This is a great mystery : but I speak concerning Christ and the church .
text2: Nusha Kristu ni shuarijiai Tsaninmán tawai . Nuka yaunchu nekaachma yamaikia nekanaiti , tura ti Enentáimturtiniaiti .

text: Nevertheless let every one of you in particular so love his wife even as himself ; and the wife see that she reverence her husband .
text2: Tura Núnisan Ashí aishmantiram Atumí nuwé Atumí Ayashía Nútiksarmek aneatniuitrume . Nuwasha ni Aishrín umirkatniuiti .

text: Children , obey your parents in the Lord : for this is right .
text2: Uchitirmesha , Yus - shuar asarum apasha nukusha umirkatarum . Nuka ti pénkeraiti .

text: Honour thy father and mother ; ( which is the first commandment with promise ; )
text2: Emka akupkamu " umirkam nekas shiir átatme " tana nu Júiti : " Apasha nukusha umirkata .

text: That it may be well with thee , and thou mayest live long on the earth .
text2: Túrakmeka shiir átatme tura Jú nunkanam Untsurí tsawant pujustatme " tawai .

text: And , ye fathers , provoke not your children to wrath : but bring them up in the nurture and admonition of the Lord .
text2: Atumsha , uchirtintirmesha , Atumí uchiri ántrarum akajkairap . Antsu Yúsan shiir Enentáimtusarat tusarum ti pénker jintinkirum tsakatmartarum .

text: Servants , be obedient to them that are your masters according to the flesh , with fear and trembling , in singleness of your heart , as unto Christ ;
text2: Takakmautirmesha , Atumí uuntri ju nunkanam pujuinia nu ti penker umirkatarum . Kristu umirkatniua aintsarum wishiktsuk ashamakrum tuke Enentáijiai takarsatarum .

text: Not with eyeservice , as menpleasers ; but as the servants of Christ , doing the will of God from the heart ;
text2: Aya Wáitmakui shiir Enentáimtursat tusarum pénker takarsairap . Antsu Kristu takarniuria Núnisrum Ashí ame Enentáimjai Yus wakera nu Túratarum .

text: With good will doing service , as to the Lord , and not to men :
text2: Aya Shuárnak Yayá Nútiksarum takasairap . Antsu ii Uuntri Kristu takarsatniua Nútiksarmek ásump Enentáijiai takastarum .

text: Knowing that whatsoever good thing any man doeth , the same shall he receive of the Lord , whether he be bond or free .
text2: Kame Chíkich Chíkich ni takasmajai métek akinkiartatui . Ii Uuntri Kristu nu shuar pénker Túramujai métek akiktatui .

text: And , ye masters , do the same things unto them , forbearing threatening : knowing that your Master also is in heaven ; neither is there respect of persons with him .
text2: Tura atumsha , iniamniutirmesha , Atumí takartamu Wakaní Mántutsuk shiir Enentáijiai iniartarum . Nekas Enentáimpratarum . Ii Uuntri nayaimpiniam pujana nuna niisha atumjai métek umirainiawai . Tura Yuska Ashí shuaran akantsuk métek iyawai .

text: Finally , my brethren , be strong in the Lord , and in the power of his might .
text2: Wátsek , yatsuru , ii Uuntri Yusjai tsaninkiu asarum ni ti kakarmarijiai iwianchjai Máanaiktin kakaram ajastarum .

text: Put on the whole armour of God , that ye may be able to stand against the wiles of the devil .
text2: Apach Máanainiak jiru entsarua Núnisrum Yus susamujai entsartarum . Nujai íwianch nupettamkui tariartatme .

text: For we wrestle not against flesh and blood , but against principalities , against powers , against the rulers of the darkness of this world , against spiritual wickedness in high places .
text2: Kame Yusna Takáa asar penké aentsjai Máaniatsji antsu yajauch wakan kakaram írunna nujai Máaniaji . Niisha ju nunkanam , kiritniunma aintsan , tunaanum wekainia nuna akupin ainiawai .

text: Wherefore take unto you the whole armour of God , that ye may be able to withstand in the evil day , and having done all , to stand .
text2: Jiru entsartinia aintsarum Yus Súramna nu entsartarum . Nu entsarmajai itiurchat tsawant taritra nupetkarum tuke tariarum wajastatrume .

text: Stand therefore , having your loins girt about with truth , and having on the breastplate of righteousness ;
text2: Wats , nekas tariartin nekas chicham emenmamatarum . Tura pénker Túratniujai jatairum ajaktarum .

text: And your feet shod with the preparation of the gospel of peace ;
text2: Suntar iwiarnak sapatan Aweá aintsarum Yusa shiir chichame etserkatin iwiarnartarum .

text: Above all , taking the shield of faith , wherewith ye shall be able to quench all the fiery darts of the wicked .
text2: Nuyasha Ashí nankaamas , tantar takustinia aintsan , Yus tuke nekas Enentáimtustarum . Nujai íwianch Eketrámkamusha uwemturtatme .

text: And take the helmet of salvation , and the sword of the Spirit , which is the word of God :
text2: Múukem ajaktincha Kristu uwemtikrampramu Múukmiin etsenkruktarum . Tura Yus - Chicham Puniáa aintsan achiktarum . Nuka nekas Yusa Wakaní puniarinti .

text: Praying always with all prayer and supplication in the Spirit , and watching thereunto with all perseverance and supplication for all saints ;
text2: Yusa Wakaníjiai Yus áujeakrum tuke seatniuitrume . Tura tuke aneara pujustarum wake mesetsuk , tura Ashí Yus - shuar ainia nusha Yus áujtustarum .

text: And for me , that utterance may be given unto me , that I may open my mouth boldly , to make known the mystery of the gospel ,
text2: Núnisan winiasha áujtursatarum . Wi sepunam pujayatan Yus winia chichastinian surusat tusarum seatritiarum . Tura wi chichaakun sapijmiatsuk Shiir - chichaman yaunchu nekaachma paant awajsat tusarum áujtursatarum .

text: For which I am an ambassador in bonds : that therein I may speak boldly , as I ought to speak .
text2: Yus nu chichaman etserkatniun akuptukuiti . Nuna Túrakun sepunam pujajai . Sapijmiatsuk etserkat tusarum Yus áujtursatarum .

text: But that ye also may know my affairs , and how I do , Tychicus , a beloved brother and faithful minister in the Lord , shall make known to you all things :
text2: Ii aneamu yachi , Tíkikiu , Ashí wi Túramun ujatmaktatui . Niisha Ii Uuntri Krístunu etserkatniun ti penker Yáinniuiti .

text: Whom I have sent unto you for the same purpose , that ye might know our affairs , and that he might comfort your hearts .
text2: Tuma asamtai ii jui pujamun ujatmak ikiantamprarat tusan akuptajrume .

text: Peace be to the brethren , and love with faith , from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Yus Apasha tura ii Uuntri Jesukrístusha Ashí Yus - shuartirmin anenmak shiir imiatkinchanum pujustinian suramsarti . Tura Niin tuke nekas Enentáimtustinian suramsarti .

text: Grace be with all them that love our Lord Jesus Christ in sincerity . Amen .
text2: Ashí ii Uuntri Jesukrístun tuke Enentáijiai aneana nuna Yus shiir Yáintí . Nuke Atí .

text: Paul and Timotheus , the servants of Jesus Christ , to all the saints in Christ Jesus which are at Philippi , with the bishops and deacons :
text2: Wi Papru Timiutéujai Jesuskrístu takarin asar Ashí Yus - shuar Jiripius péprunam pujarmena nu ju Papí akuptaji . Yus - shuaran wainin árumna nusha tura Yus - shuaran yain árumna nusha Ashí Yus - shuarsha nunisan Yusna asarum tura Jesukrístujai tsaninkiu asakrumin ju Papí aateajrume .

text: Grace be unto you , and peace , from God our Father , and from the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Yus ii Aparísha Jesukrístu ii Uuntrisha atumin waitnentramainia ásar imiatkinchanum tuke shiir pujustinian yainmakarti .

text: I thank my God upon every remembrance of you ,
text2: Ashí tsawant atumin Enentáimtakun Yúsan tuke shiir Yúminkiajai .

text: Always in every prayer of mine for you all making request with joy ,
text2: Yúsan áujeaknasha ti warasan seatjarme .

text: For your fellowship in the gospel from the first day until now ;
text2: Kame iikia Yámankamtaiknumia Yus - Chicham métek Yáiniáikiar iniaitsuk takasuitji .

text: Being confident of this very thing , that he which hath begun a good work in you will perform it until the day of Jesus Christ :
text2: Yus Atumíin ti pénker awajsatniun nankama asa Núnisan Jesuskrístu Táatsain tuke shiir Awájtámki nekas pénker najatmattarme . Nuka ti nekasaiti .

text: Even as it is meet for me to think this of you all , because I have you in my heart ; inasmuch as both in my bonds , and in the defence and confirmation of the gospel , ye all are partakers of my grace .
text2: Atumin Ashí ti aneajrume . Kame wi sepunam pujakun Yus - Chichaman akasmatkun tura Yus - shuar kakararti tusan takaakui átum Yáintiarme . Yus ti anenkartin asa nu Túratniun mai metek Tsankatrámkaitji . Tuma asamtai atumin Júnisan Enentáimtustin ti penkeraiti .

text: For God is my record , how greatly I long after you all in the bowels of Jesus Christ .
text2: Jesukrístu anenkrattairijiai wi atumin aneamun Yussha paant nékarui .

text: And this I pray , that your love may abound yet more and more in knowledge and in all judgment ;
text2: Yúsan áujeakun anearmena Nú nankaamas aneak tusan seatjarme . Tura Nújaisha ti neka ajasrum

text: That ye may approve things that are excellent ; that ye may be sincere and without offence till the day of Christ ;
text2: Ashí pénkera nu achikiuk tusan Yúsan áujtajrume . Atumin nu Túrunamtainkia yamaisha Tunáajainchu pujustatrume tura Kristu Támatai sumamashtatrume .

text: Being filled with the fruits of righteousness , which are by Jesus Christ , unto the glory and praise of God .
text2: Núnisan Jesukrístu kakarmarijiai Ashí pénker Túrin átatrume . Tura Nújai Ashí shuar Yúsan ti shiir Enentáimturartatui .

text: But I would ye should understand , brethren , that the things which happened unto me have fallen out rather unto the furtherance of the gospel ;
text2: Winin Túrunamu itiurchat ain nujai uwempratin chicham nekas pampaawai . Nu nekaatarum tusan wakerajrume , yatsuru .

text: So that my bonds in Christ are manifest in all the palace , and in all other places ;
text2: Iis , uunt akupniu suntarisha tura Ashí shuarsha wi Krístunun etseru asan sepunam pujamun paant nékainiawai .

text: And many of the brethren in the Lord , waxing confident by my bonds , are much more bold to speak the word without fear .
text2: Ti Untsurí Yus - shuar wi sepunam enketman nekaawar ii Uuntri Jesusan nekas Enentáimtusar sapijmiatsuk Yus - Chichaman etserainiawai .

text: Some indeed preach Christ even of envy and strife ; and some also of good will :
text2: Kame shuar awai winia kajertuiniak tura nankaamantu Enentáimtumainiak Krístun Páchiniawai . Antsu Chíkich shuarka nekas Enentáijiai Krístun etserainiawai .

text: The one preach Christ of contention , not sincerely , supposing to add affliction to my bonds :
text2: Yajauch shuarka Krístun shiir Enentáimtutsuk antsu Ashí shuar Ní chichamenak anturkar Wíi shuar ajasarat tusar etserainiawai . Túruiniak wisha sepunam pujakui nu arant itit awajtustinian wakerutainiawai .

text: But the other of love , knowing that I am set for the defence of the gospel .
text2: Antsu pénker shuar Krístun nekas aneenak etserainiawai . Nu uwempratin chicham Imiá penkeraiti wi titin asamtai winiasha anentainiak shiir etserainiawai .

text: What then ? notwithstanding , every way , whether in pretence , or in truth , Christ is preached ; and I therein do rejoice , yea , and will rejoice .
text2: Wats , mai metek Chíkich yajauch Enentáijiai tura Chíkich shiir Enentáijiai Krístun etserainiakui shiir Enentáimjai . Tura nuna nankaamas shiir Enentáimprattajai .

text: For I know that this shall turn to my salvation through your prayer , and the supply of the Spirit of Jesus Christ ,
text2: Kame Yus áujtursa asakrumin tura Jesukrístu Wakanísha yaintiu asamtai ti pénker uwempran jiinkittiajai .

text: According to my earnest expectation and my hope , that in nothing I shall be ashamed , but that with all boldness , as always , so now also Christ shall be magnified in my body , whether it be by life , or by death .
text2: Nekas juna wakerajai : Natsamtsuk uunt akupniun Jesukrístun paant ujakartinian wakerajai . Nujai Winí Kristu kakarmari pujamu ti paant nekanattawai . Mántuiniakuisha tura Mántuiniachkuisha ashamatsjai . Aya Kristu kakarmarin Winí nankaamas nekaawarat tusan wakerajai .

text: For to me to live is Christ , and to die is gain .
text2: Wíjiainkia ju nunkanam iwiaaku pujakun aya Krístunak Enentáimtakun pujajai . Tura Jákatniusha jui pujajnia nuna nankaamas pénkeraiti .

text: But if I live in the flesh , this is the fruit of my labour : yet what I shall choose I wot not .
text2: Ju nunkanam pujakun Uunt Jesusnan takasminiaitjai . Nu asamtai tunatsuk achiktaj nékatsjai .

text: For I am in a strait betwixt two , having a desire to depart , and to be with Christ ; which is far better :
text2: Wíjiainkia itiurchataiti mai achiktin . Jákatniuncha wakerajai Krístujai tsaninkian pujustaj tusan . Wíjiainkia nu Imiá pénkeraiti .

text: Nevertheless to abide in the flesh is more needful for you .
text2: Túrasha atumin Yáintaj tusan tuke ju nunkanam iwiaaku pujusminiaitjai .

text: And having this confidence , I know that I shall abide and continue with you all for your furtherance and joy of faith ;
text2: Kame tuke pujustatjai nékajai . Núnisnak atumjai pujakun Yus nekas Enentáimtakrum nankaamas waraakrum tuke katsuaruk tusan Yáintatjarme .

text: That your rejoicing may be more abundant in Jesus Christ for me by my coming to you again .
text2: Nu asamtai wi atumjai pujakui Jesukrístu yuminsarum shiir warastatrume .

text: Only let your conversation be as it becometh the gospel of Christ : that whether I come and see you , or else be absent , I may hear of your affairs , that ye stand fast in one spirit , with one mind striving together for the faith of the gospel ;
text2: Kristu chichame ti penker asamtai atumsha aya pénkera nuke Túratarum . Wi atumjai pujaknasha tura Yajá pujaknasha átum ti shiir Túrarmena nuna antuktinian wakerajai . Ashí shuar uwempratin chichaman nekaawar umirkarat tusarum chikichik Enentáijiai kakaram ajastarum .

text: And in nothing terrified by your adversaries : which is to them an evident token of perdition , but to you of salvation , and that of God .
text2: Atumí nemasrisha ishichkisha sapijmiamtikramkarain . Nu Túrakrumin nu shuar emesratniunam weena nusha tura átum uwempratniusha paant nekanattawai . Núnisan Atí tusa Yus Túraiti .

text: For unto you it is given in the behalf of Christ , not only to believe on him , but also to suffer for his sake ;
text2: Krístunu asarum Nii nekas Enentáimtustinniasha tura Niiniu asarum Wáitsatniusha Yus anenma asa tsankatramkaitrume .

text: Having the same conflict which ye saw in me , and now hear to be in me .
text2: Yus - Chicham pamparat tusar maimetek ti Takáa asar Wáitiaji . Wi nuik ti takasmaj nu nekamarme . Tura Yamái tuke takaaj nusha ántarme .

text: If there be therefore any consolation in Christ , if any comfort of love , if any fellowship of the Spirit , if any bowels and mercies ,
text2: Kristu ikiantamkuisha , ni anenkrattairi atsantamkuisha , ni Wakani atumjai pujakuisha , anenkratniuitkiurmesha , waitnenkratniuitkiurmesha

text: Fulfil ye my joy , that ye be likeminded , having the same love , being of one accord , of one mind .
text2: waramtikrustarum . Métekrak takastarum . Mai metek anenaitiarum . Yusa Wakani Atumí Enentáin Pujá asamtai chikichik Enentáik Enentáimsatarum .

text: Let nothing be done through strife or vainglory ; but in lowliness of mind let each esteem other better than themselves .
text2: Atum wakeramuk Túrawairap . Nankaamantu ajastaj Tíirap . Antsu péejchach ajasrum Chíkich shuar atumjai nankaamas pénker Enentáimtusta .

text: Look not every man on his own things , but every man also on the things of others .
text2: Aya Níiniak pénker átatna nunak shuar Túrashti . Antsu Chíkich shuar Yáinminia nuna Túrati .

text: Let this mind be in you , which was also in Christ Jesus :
text2: Kristu Jesus Enentáimpramia Núnisrum Enentáimpratarum .

text: Who , being in the form of God , thought it not robbery to be equal with God :
text2: Niisha Yúsaitiat ju nunkanam winiak tuke Yusjai métek átinian emettsuk

text: And being found in fashion as a man , he humbled himself , and became obedient unto death , even the death of the cross .
text2: antsu nuna ikiuak aents ajas péejchach asa Ashí aentsu takarin ajasmiayi . Tura aentsu ayashin ayashimiak tura Yúsan umireak Jákatniuncha surimiakchamiayi . Maa , Imiá tunaarinniua aintsan Krúsnum natsanmainium jakamiayi .

text: Wherefore God also hath highly exalted him , and given him a name which is above every name :
text2: Túramtai Yus nekas nankaamantu awajsamiayi . Ni Náarincha Ashí paant awajsamiayi .

text: That at the name of Jesus every knee should bow , of things in heaven , and things in earth , and things under the earth ;
text2: Tuma asamtai Ashí nayaimpiniam írunna nusha , Nunká írunna nusha , tura iwiarsamusha Jesusa Náarin antukar tikishmatrartatui .

text: And that every tongue should confess that Jesus Christ is Lord , to the glory of God the Father .
text2: Tura Ashí shuar Jesukrístu Ashí akupin ajasman paant nekaawartatui . Nújainkia Yus Apá kakarmarisha paant nekanattawai .

text: For it is God which worketh in you both to will and to do of his good pleasure .
text2: Nu asamtai , aneamu yatsuru , wi atumjai pujakui umirtukmarmena nuna nankaamas yamaikia arant pujakuisha umirtuktarum . Iis , Yus Atumí Enentáin takaak ni shiir wakeramu wakeruktinniasha tura umiktinniasha pujurtamprume . Nu asamtai atumsha kakaram ajastarum Yus ti penker awajtamsatniun wakera nu Túrunati tusarum . Tura péejchach Enentáimprarum awajirminiaitjai tusarum aneara wekasatarum .

text: Do all things without murmurings and disputings :
text2: Ashí yajauch tunaitsuk tura jianaitsuk wekasatarum .

text: That ye may be blameless and harmless , the sons of God , without rebuke , in the midst of a crooked and perverse nation , among whom ye shine as lights in the world ;
text2: Túrakrum makuumatsuk tunaajainchu átatrume . Antsu Yusa Uchirí átatrume . Ju nunkanmasha shuar Imiá tunaan Túrinjaisha Máatrachu asarum kiritniunam ji Keeá aintsanketrume

text: Holding forth the word of life ; that I may rejoice in the day of Christ , that I have not run in vain , neither laboured in vain .
text2: iwiaaku pujustin chicham paant awajeakrum . Nújai Kristu Támatai Atumíin ántran takascha asan ti shiir wararsattajrume .

text: Yea , and if I be offered upon the sacrifice and service of your faith , I joy , and rejoice with you all .
text2: Winia takatrujai Yus - shuar ajasakrumin wi Jákatniuitkiuncha Nújaisha warasaintjai . Atumsha wi waraajna jui Núnisrumek warastarum tusan wakerajrume .

text: For the same cause also do ye joy , and rejoice with me .
text2: Atumsha waraakrumin métek wararnaisatai .

text: But I trust in the Lord Jesus to send Timotheus shortly unto you , that I also may be of good comfort , when I know your state .
text2: Ii Uuntri Jesus wakerakuinkia Timiutéun iirmainiarat tusan ti warik akuptuktatjarme . Tura átum shiir pujamu ujateakui warastatjai .
