text: For I have no man likeminded , who will naturally care for your state .
text2: Kame Timiutéu wijiai métek Enentáimna ainis Chíkich shuar atsawai . Niisha átum shiir pujusuk tusa ti nekas Enentáimturmarme .

text: For all seek their own , not the things which are Jesus Christ ' s .
text2: Chíkichka Kristu wakeramun iniaisar Ní wakeramunak Páchiniawai .

text: But ye know the proof of him , that , as a son with the father , he hath served with me in the gospel .
text2: Túrasha átumka Timiutéu tuke pénker Túramu nékarme . Uchi ni Aparíjiai takaana ainis Yusa shiir chichame etserkatniun Yáintkiaiti .

text: Him therefore I hope to send presently , so soon as I shall see how it will go with me .
text2: Winia itiurtukartin nuna nekaan Timiutéu iirmainiarat tusan akuptuktatjarme .

text: But I trust in the Lord that I also myself shall come shortly .
text2: Kame Kristu Yáintkiui Wíkisha Wárik iimniaitjarme .

text: Yet I supposed it necessary to send to you Epaphroditus , my brother , and companion in labour , and fellowsoldier , but your messenger , and he that ministered to my wants .
text2: Wi atsumaj nuna iirsati tusarum Epaprutítiu akupturkamarme . Wijiai métek tsanin takasuiti . Tura métek Wáitsaitji . Aunkesha akupkamnia Enentáimjai .

text: For he longed after you all , and was full of heaviness , because that ye had heard that he had been sick .
text2: Nii jaawai taman átum antukman Nekáa , iirmaitniun ti wakerutmarme .

text: For indeed he was sick nigh unto death : but God had mercy on him ; and not on him only , but on me also , lest I should have sorrow upon sorrow .
text2: Maa , nekas ti janinkiamai . Túrasha Yus niin waitnentramai . Kame winiasha wi jui Wáitiakun nii jakamtai nu arant ti kuntuts pujuschatniun waitnentrurmai .

text: I sent him therefore the more carefully , that , when ye see him again , ye may rejoice , and that I may be the less sorrowful .
text2: Tuma asamtai akuptuktinian wakerajrume . Tura atumsha ataksha Wáinkiarum waraakrumin wisha ti kuntuts Enentáimchakun akuptuktatjarme .

text: Receive him therefore in the Lord with all gladness ; and hold such in reputation :
text2: Kristu yuminsarum ti shiir warasrum Wáinkiatarum . Chíkich shuar niijiai métek pénker Yus - shuar ainia nusha shiir Enentáimtustarum .

text: Because for the work of Christ he was nigh unto death , not regarding his life , to supply your lack of service toward me .
text2: Kristu takatrin takaak ti janinkiamai . Atum Yáintkiachminia nuna winia Yáintkiataj tusa pujus Jáninkiamai .

text: Finally , my brethren , rejoice in the Lord . To write the same things to you , to me indeed is not grievous , but for you it is safe .
text2: Ayu . Warastarum , yatsurtiram , ii Uuntri Kristu ti penker asamtai nuik aatramajrum nuna ataksha Títiatjarme . Ataksha ujam yainmakminiaitkiuinkia Wíjiainkia itiurchatchaiti atak Enentáimtikratin .

text: Beware of dogs , beware of evil workers , beware of the concision .
text2: Yajauch shuarjai aneartarum . Nu shuar Muisais timia Núnis tuke yamaisha tsupirnaktiniaitrume tuiniawai .

text: For we are the circumcision , which worship God in the spirit , and rejoice in Christ Jesus , and have no confidence in the flesh .
text2: Antsu iikia ayash tsupirnakmajai pénker átiniaitji tu Enentáimtatsji . Iikia antsu ii Wakaníjiai Yus shiir awajeaji tura Jesukrístunu asar Ninki shiir wararji . Nu Túrakur Muisais timia nu umintikia iitji .

text: Though I might also have confidence in the flesh . If any other man thinketh that he hath whereof he might trust in the flesh , I more :
text2: Ju nunkanam írunna nujai waantu Enentáimpramniaitkiuinkia Ashí shuarjai nankaamas wikia waantu Enentáimtumaraintjai .

text: Concerning zeal , persecuting the church ; touching the righteousness which is in the law , blameless .
text2: Israer - shuar asan Muisais timia Núnisan wi akiiniamtai uchu ( 8 ) tsawant nankaamasmatai tsupirtukarmiayi . Israer - shuarnum Pinjamín weeaitjai . Winia aparsha nukursha mai Israer - shuar ainiakui wi Imiá Israer - shuaraitjai . Wisha Pariséu tuinia Núnisan Muisais akupkamun ti umirin asamtai Chíkichka winia sumamtikiatniun tujintrin ármiayi . Tura Pariséu asan Kristu - shuarin ti kajerkan aintramjai .

text: But what things were gain to me , those I counted loss for Christ .
text2: Ashí nujainkia waantu Enentáimtumauyajai . Antsu yamaikia Krístujainkia penké ántar ainiawai tajai .

text: Yea doubtless , and I count all things but loss for the excellency of the knowledge of Christ Jesus my Lord : for whom I have suffered the loss of all things , and do count them but dung , that I may win Christ ,
text2: Ashí Enentáimpramnia ákuisha winia Uuntur Jesukrístu shiir Enentáimtustin nekas pénkeraiti . Nu asamtai Krístunu ajakun wi takusmaj nu muijmiai ajasmatai Núnaka iniaisamjai .

text: And be found in him , not having mine own righteousness , which is of the law , but that which is through the faith of Christ , the righteousness which is of God by faith :
text2: Nuna Túran Niijiai tsaninkian pujajai . Tura akupkamu umirkatniujai pénker ajaschaitjai antsu Krístun Enentáimtakui Yus " pénkeraitme " Túrutui .

text: That I may know him , and the power of his resurrection , and the fellowship of his sufferings , being made conformable unto his death ;
text2: Tuma asamtai Ashí nankaamas wakeraj nu Júiti : Krístun pénker nekaan nekas Enentáimtustinniasha tura ni iniantkimiu kakarman takustinniasha wakerajai . Tura Niijiai métek ajastinian wakerakun ni Wáitkiamunam tsanintinniasha tura Nii jakamia Núnisan Jákatniuncha wakerajai .

text: If by any means I might attain unto the resurrection of the dead .
text2: Túraknaka Krístujai métek jakamunmaya nantaktiaj tusan wakerajai .

text: Not as though I had already attained , either were already perfect : but I follow after , if that I may apprehend that for which also I am apprehended of Christ Jesus .
text2: Kame wakerukuitjia nuna mash umirkachuitjai . Krístujai métek nekas pénker shuar ajaschaitjai . Túrasha Kristu Jesus " nui ejetajam " emka Túrutkui , wisha nui jeataj tusan kakaram ajasan pimpitsuk takaajai .

text: Brethren , I count not myself to have apprehended : but this one thing I do , forgetting those things which are behind , and reaching forth unto those things which are before ,
text2: Yatsuru , wisha nui jeajai Tátsujai . Antsu yaunchu Túrutain kajinmatkin kakaram ajasan Kristu wakeramunam jeatniun takaajai .

text: I press toward the mark for the prize of the high calling of God in Christ Jesus .
text2: Tura nuna umikmatai nayaimpiniam Jesukrístujai tsaninkian shiir pujustinian Yus surustatui .

text: Let us therefore , as many as be perfect , be thus minded : and if in any thing ye be otherwise minded , God shall reveal even this unto you .
text2: Ashí shuar Yusjai katsuaru ájinia nu wi Tájana Núnis " jeachuitjai " tu Enentáimpratniuitji . Tura " jeaitjai " Enentáimkiurminkia Yus nunasha atak Enentáimtikramprattarme .

text: Nevertheless , whereto we have already attained , let us walk by the same rule , let us mind the same thing .
text2: Tura aneartarum . Naki pujutsuk jeajnia nujai métek umirkatin pimpitsuk takastiniaitji .

text: Brethren , be followers together of me , and mark them which walk so as ye have us for an ensample .
text2: Yatsuru , wisha tura chikichcha wijiai métek pénker Túrajnia nu Wáinkiuram atumsha Núnisrumek Túratarum .

text: ( For many walk , of whom I have told you often , and now tell you even weeping , that they are the enemies of the cross of Christ :
text2: Tura yajauch shuarsha írunui . Wi nuiksha ti ujakmajrume tura ataksha uutkun ujaajrume , nu shuar Kristu Krúsnum jakamun Muíjiainiawai .

text: Whose end is destruction , whose God is their belly , and whose glory is in their shame , who mind earthly things . )
text2: Tuma ásar emesratniunam akupnakartatui . Ni Ayashí wakeramun , ni yusria aintsan , tuke umirainiawai . Natsanmainian Túruiniayat wararainiawai . Tura ju nunkanmayanak Enentáimtuiniawai .

text: For our conversation is in heaven ; from whence also we look for the Saviour , the Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: Antsu iikia nayaimpinmaya shuar asar ii Uuntri Jesukrístu iin uwemtikrampra asamtai nayaimpinmaya Tatí tusar Nákaji .

text: Who shall change our vile body , that it may be fashioned like unto his glorious body , according to the working whereby he is able even to subdue all things unto himself .
text2: Nii taa , ii yajauch ayashin Yapajiá ni Ayashíjiai métek ti shiir awajsattawai . Ashí uunt akupin ajas nu kakarmajai Túrutmattaji .

text: Therefore , my brethren dearly beloved and longed for , my joy and crown , so stand fast in the Lord , my dearly beloved .
text2: Nu asamtai , aneamu yatsuru , ii Uuntri Krístujai tsaninkiu asarum kakaram ajastarum . Maa , ti aneakun atumin Enentáimtakun ti waraajai tura iistajrum tusan wakerajrume . Tawasap achikiar shiir enentaimsatniua Núnisnak shiir Enentáimtajrume .

text: I beseech Euodias , and beseech Syntyche , that they be of the same mind in the Lord .
text2: Ewautiancha tura Séntikincha , ii Uuntri Kristu shuari ásar , mai metek Enentáimsarat tusan seajai .

text: And I intreat thee also , true yokefellow , help those women which laboured with me in the gospel , with Clement also , and with other my fellowlabourers , whose names are in the book of life .
text2: Amincha , winia Airú , nu nuwa Yáinkta tusan seajme . Niisha wi iwiaaku chichaman étsereakui wijiai métek takasarmai . Tura Krimintisha tura chikichcha wijiai métek takasarmai . Nuna Náarin iwaaku átinnium Yus aatraiti .

text: Rejoice in the Lord alway : and again I say , Rejoice .
text2: Nu asamtai Uunt Jesusjai tsaninkia Pujá asarum warastarum . Ataksha " warastarum " Tájarme .

text: Let your moderation be known unto all men . The Lord is at hand .
text2: Uunt Jesus Tátin ishichik ajasai . Tuma asamtai tsanka Enentái takakrum nu paant nekanati .

text: Be careful for nothing ; but in every thing by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known unto God .
text2: Itiurchat Enentáimsatin atumjai penké Atsutí . Antsu tuke Yus áujkum Ashí itiurchatrum ujakta . Atsumamuram Yus seata . Túram Yus yuminsata .

text: And the peace of God , which passeth all understanding , shall keep your hearts and minds through Christ Jesus .
text2: Nuinkia Atumí Enentái ankant átinian , aentstikia penké nekaachminia nuna , Yus amastatui . Yus atumin ankant awajtamsa asa Atumí Enentáin tura Atumí Enentáimsamurincha yajauch wayawain tusa shiir waitmaktatrume Jesukrístujai tsaninkiu asakrumin .

text: Finally , brethren , whatsoever things are true , whatsoever things are honest , whatsoever things are just , whatsoever things are pure , whatsoever things are lovely , whatsoever things are of good report ; if there be any virtue , and if there be any praise , think on these things .
text2: Yamaisha yatsuru , Júchiniak Títiatjai . Yus - shuarti Enentáimsatniun chichastatjai yamaikia . Ashí nekas ana nu Enentáimsatarum . Tura Ashí anturkamnia ana nusha , naka chicham ana nusha Enentáimsatarum . Tura yajauch chichamsha Enentáimsairap . Tura antsu Ashí shiir ana nusha , Chíkich shuarnasha pénker Enentáimtusminia nusha , kame Ashí pénker ana nu Enentáimsatarum . Nuyásha Chíkich shiir anturkamnia ana nusha Enentáimsatarum .

text: Those things , which ye have both learned , and received , and heard , and seen in me , do : and the God of peace shall be with you .
text2: Wi unuiniarmajrumna nu umiktarum . Tura wi Túramur iisurmena nu tura antukurmena nusha umiktarum . Túrakrumninkia Yuska ankant átinian amastaj tusa pujurtamsattarme .

text: But I rejoiced in the Lord greatly , that now at the last your care of me hath flourished again ; wherein ye were also careful , but ye lacked opportunity .
text2: Ii Uuntri Kristu anea asarum winiasha ataksha Enentáimturu asakrumin ti waraajai . Kame kajinmatrukmiarme Tátsujai antsu Kuítrum atsakui Yáintkiatin tujinkiamarme .

text: Not that I speak in respect of want : for I have learned , in whatsoever state I am , therewith to be content .
text2: Tura Kuítian atsumakun Tátsujai . Antsu wi takakjana nujain warastinian Unuimiáruitjai .

text: I know both how to be abased , and I know how to abound : every where and in all things I am instructed both to be full and to be hungry , both to abound and to suffer need .
text2: Kuítrinchati pujustinia nuna nékajai tura ti nukap takustinia nunasha nékajai . Tsukamaknasha jéemarnasha , itiarar takustinniasha tura penké takutsuk pujustinniasha Unuimiáruitjai .

text: I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me .
text2: Kristu ni kakarmarin surakui Ashí Túramniaitjai .

text: Notwithstanding ye have well done , that ye did communicate with my affliction .
text2: Tuma ain atumsha wi atsumamu akupturkarum ti pénker Túramarme .

text: Now ye Philippians know also , that in the beginning of the gospel , when I departed from Macedonia , no church communicated with me as concerning giving and receiving , but ye only .
text2: Jiripiusnumia shuartiram , ju ti penker nékarme . Masetunia nunkanam Yus - Chichaman etserumtai aya atumek kuit akupturkamiarme . Wi etserkamujai Atumí Wakanín Yáinma asamtai yuminsarum akupturkamiarme .

text: For even in Thessalonica ye sent once and again unto my necessity .
text2: Atumek wi Tisarúnikia nunkanam atsumakun pujaisha kuit akupturkamiarme .

text: Not because I desire a gift : but I desire fruit that may abound to your account .
text2: Aya kuit akupturkakrumin tu Enentáimtsujai . Antsu nu kuit Yusai kawentramkaku tusan wakerajrume .

text: But I have all , and abound : I am full , having received of Epaphroditus the things which were sent from you , an odour of a sweet smell , a sacrifice acceptable , wellpleasing to God .
text2: Epaprutítiujai akupturkamarum nujaisha atsumamaj nuna nankaamas tiaruncha Wáinkiajai . Akupturkamarum nusha ti kunkuin Yus susamua ainis ti shiir auyi .

text: But my God shall supply all your need according to his riches in glory by Christ Jesus .
text2: Winia Yúsrusha ti pénkeran Núkap takakui . Atumsha Jesukrístunu ajasu asarum Yus seamniaitrume . Tura Yuska ti takakna nujai Ashí atsumarmena nuna suramsattarme .

text: Now unto God and our Father be glory for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: Ii Aparí Yus tuke shiir Atí . Nuke Atí .

text: Salute every saint in Christ Jesus . The brethren which are with me greet you .
text2: Winia Náaruisha tura Jesukrístu Náarincha Ashí Yus - shuar ainia nu Chícham ujatruktarum . Niisha shiir pujusarti . Wi írutramusha Núnisan shiir pujusarti tusa akupturmainiawai .

text: All the saints salute you , chiefly they that are of Caesar ' s household .
text2: Tura Ashí akupin Sésarai pujuinia Nuyá Yusna ajasaruka tura Chíkich Yus - shuarsha shiir pujusarti tusa chichaman akupturmainiawai .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all . Amen .
text2: Ii Uuntri Jesukrístu atumniasha ti shiir yainmakarti . Nuke Atí .

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God , and Timotheus our brother ,
text2: Wi Pápruitjai . Yus wakerutak Jesukrístunun etserkat tusa akatra akupkamuitjai . Wisha ii yachi Timiutéujai

text: To the saints and faithful brethren in Christ which are at Colosse : Grace be unto you , and peace , from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: ju Papí aarar nui Kuruse péprunam Kristu pénker umirkarum Yusna ajasuitrumna nu akuptaji . Yus ii Apari atumin Wáitnentaimturma asa yainmakarti imiatkinchanum tuke shiir pujustinian .

text: We give thanks to God and the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , praying always for you ,
text2: Iisha atumin Yus áujtakur ii Uuntri Jesukrístu Apari Yus Ashí tsawant Yúminkiaji .

text: Since we heard of your faith in Christ Jesus , and of the love which ye have to all the saints ,
text2: Atumsha Jesukrístu ti shiir Enentáimtamusha tura Ashí Yus - shuar aneamusha antukji .

text: For the hope which is laid up for you in heaven , whereof ye heard before in the word of the truth of the gospel ;
text2: Uwempratin chicham nekasa nu antukrum atumsha nayaimpiniam atumnian Yus ti shiir ikiusman Wáinkiatai tusarum Nákarme .

text: Which is come unto you , as it is in all the world ; and bringeth forth fruit , as it doth also in you , since the day ye heard of it , and knew the grace of God in truth :
text2: Nu chicham Ashí nunkanam pampaakui shuara Enentáin Nereá ainis Nusháa ajasar yamaikia pénker Túrin ainiawai . Núnisan Atumíincha Túrunaiti . Yus ti nekas anenkartiniaiti tu etserkamu ántakrumin nu chicham Atumí Enentáincha nerekmiayi .

text: As ye also learned of Epaphras our dear fellowservant , who is for you a faithful minister of Christ ;
text2: Nu chichaman Epapras ujatmakmarme . Niisha iijiai métek takasu asamtai ti aneamuiti . Atumniasha Kristu takatrin ti shiir takartamsaiti .

text: Who also declared unto us your love in the Spirit .
text2: Niisha átum Yus - shuar asarum mai anenai ajamun ujatmakmaji .

text: For this cause we also , since the day we heard it , do not cease to pray for you , and to desire that ye might be filled with the knowledge of his will in all wisdom and spiritual understanding ;
text2: Iisha nu antukar Yus Ashí tsawant áujtajrume . Yus ni wakeramun ti paant nekaprutmawarat tusar seaji . Ashí Yúsnan ni Enentáimtairijiai Ashí Níiniun paant nekaatniun Yus jintintramat tusar seaji .

text: That ye might walk worthy of the Lord unto all pleasing , being fruitful in every good work , and increasing in the knowledge of God ;
text2: Atumsha Krístunu ainia Núnisrum pénker Túrutak tusar seaji . Tura Ashí ni wakerana nu Umíakrum Ashí pénker ana nu , nerektinia aintsarmek , Túrattarme . Núnis Túrarum Yus unuimiatki wéakrum Niin ti penker nekaak tusar seaji .

text: Strengthened with all might , according to his glorious power , unto all patience and longsuffering with joyfulness ;
text2: Yus ti kakaram asa ikiantamprat tusar seaji . Nujai Ashí itiurchat ákuisha Páchitsuk ti shiir warasrum katsuntrattarme .

text: Giving thanks unto the Father , which hath made us meet to be partakers of the inheritance of the saints in light :
text2: Yus ni shuarin Tsáapninia nui Ashí pénkeran susattawai . Tura incha nui pachiinkiatniun tsankatramka asakrin Yus Apa yuminsamniaitrume .

text: Who hath delivered us from the power of darkness , and hath translated us into the kingdom of his dear Son :
text2: Yus iwianchin nupetak íwianch akupeana Nú kiritniunmaya uwemtikramar ni aneamu Uchiri akupeana nui wearmakmiaji .

text: In whom we have redemption through his blood , even the forgiveness of sins :
text2: Ni Uchiri Krúsnum jaka ii Tunaarín nijiar tsankurtamar uwemtikrampramiaji .

text: Who is the image of the invisible God , the firstborn of every creature :
text2: Yus Wáinkiachminiaitiat ni Uchiri akiiniamai tura ayashimkiamiayi . Túmaitiat Ashí najanamua nuna yaunchu Pujú asa Ashí akupniuiti .

text: For by him were all things created , that are in heaven , and that are in earth , visible and invisible , whether they be thrones , or dominions , or principalities , or powers : all things were created by him , and for him :
text2: Niijiai Yus Ashí nayaimpiniam írunna nunasha Nunká írunna nunasha , Ashí Wáiniaj nunasha Núnisan Wáintsuj nunasha mashi najanamiayi . Nu arantcha Ashí akupin ju nunkanam írunna nusha , nayaimpiniam írunna nusha , iwianchnium írunna nusha , Ashí Niijiai najanamu ainiak Niin umirkarti tusa najanamu ainiawai .

text: And he is before all things , and by him all things consist .
text2: Ashí najanamua nuna yaunchu , Krístuka tuke pujuwiti . Ashí najanamu írunna nuna emestsuk Wáinniuiti .

text: And he is the head of the body , the church : who is the beginning , the firstborn from the dead ; that in all things he might have the preeminence .
text2: Ashí Yus - shuar métekrak chikichik ayashtinia ainis Enentáimkiumka nuna muuke Krístuiti . Tura nu Ayashín ni iwiaakmarijiai iwiaaku átinian Súsaiti . Niisha Ashí jakamunmaya nantakniujai Imiá nankaamantuiti . Nújainkia Ashí Enentáimpramnia írunna nunasha akupniuiti .

text: For it pleased the Father that in him should all fulness dwell ;
text2: Yus Ashí takamtsuk Kristui shiir pujumiayi .

text: And , having made peace through the blood of his cross , by him to reconcile all things unto himself ; by him , I say , whether they be things in earth , or things in heaven .
text2: Núnisan Yus Kristu Krúsnum jakamujai Ashí nayaimpinmasha tura ju nunkanmasha írunna nuna Niijiai nawamnaikiar shiir pujusarat tusa wakerukmiayi .

text: In the body of his flesh through death , to present you holy and unblameable and unreproveable in his sight :
text2: Atumsha nuik Tunáa Túrin asarum Atumí Enentáin Yusa nemasri ámarme . Tuma asarum Yajá wekaimiarme . Antsu Kristu , aentsu Ayashín ayashimiak , Krúsnum Wáitias jakamujai ii tunaari Asakármatai yamaikia Yusjai nawamnaikiar shiir pujaji . Nujai Kristu iin pénker ajasuncha tunaan Máatrachmancha tura sumamachuncha Yúsai ejetamtatji .

text: If ye continue in the faith grounded and settled , and be not moved away from the hope of the gospel , which ye have heard , and which was preached to every creature which is under heaven ; whereof I Paul am made a minister ;
text2: Tuma asamtai Jesukrístu shiir Enentáimtusrum kakaram ajasrum katsuartiniaitrume . Tura uwempratin chicham antukuitrum Nuyá kanakchatniuitrume . Ju uwempratin chichaman Ashí nunkanam etsernakuiti . Wisha , Papru asan , etserkatniun yaimjai .

text: Who now rejoice in my sufferings for you , and fill up that which is behind of the afflictions of Christ in my flesh for his body ' s sake , which is the church :
text2: Atumin Wáitiaknasha ti shiir waraajai . Kristu ni shuarin nekas pénker awajsat tusa Wáitiana nui pachiinkia asan waraajai . Ashí Yus - shuar Kristu Ayashí aintsan ainiakui Yus - shuaran Yáintajtsan ayashrujai Wáitiakun shiir Enentáimjai .

text: Whereof I am made a minister , according to the dispensation of God which is given to me for you , to fulfil the word of God ;
text2: Atumin Yáinkiai tusa Yus akattur Yus - Chichaman takamtsuk ujakai tusa akuptukmai . Nuna takaakun Ashí Yus - shuara Yáintrintjai .

text: Even the mystery which hath been hid from ages and from generations , but now is made manifest to his saints :
text2: Yámankamtaiknumia nekaachman Yus yamaikia ni shuarin paant awajsaiti . Nu chichamnasha ujakarai tusa winia akatar akuptukuiti .

text: To whom God would make known what is the riches of the glory of this mystery among the Gentiles ; which is Christ in you , the hope of glory :
text2: Nu chichamsha Júiti : Kristu Atumí Enentáin pujak Niijiai métek ti Shíiram awajtamsattawai . Nu Imiá shiir chichamnum Israer - shuarchasha pachiiniainian Yus Ashí ni shuari nekawaarat tusa wakerimiayi .

text: Whom we preach , warning every man , and teaching every man in all wisdom ; that we may present every man perfect in Christ Jesus :
text2: Iisha Kristu étsereaji . Túrar Ashí Enentáimtikrar pénker nekaawarat tusar jintintiainiaji . Nujai Krístujai tsaninkiar Ashí pénker tsakarartatui .

text: Whereunto I also labour , striving according to his working , which worketh in me mightily .
text2: Tuma asamtai Kristu ni kakarmarin Tí surakui nekas kakaram takaajai .

text: For I would that ye knew what great conflict I have for you , and for them at Laodicea , and for as many as have not seen my face in the flesh ;
text2: Nekaatarum , yatsuru . Yus - shuaran Yáintaj tusan ti takaajai . Tura Atumíncha , Rautiséanmaya shuarnasha , tura Ashí winia waitcha ainia nunasha Yáintaj tusan ti takaitjai .

text: That their hearts might be comforted , being knit together in love , and unto all riches of the full assurance of understanding , to the acknowledgement of the mystery of God , and of the Father , and of Christ ;
text2: Ashí shiir Enentáimtikratniun ti takaajai . Núnisan aneniarum chikichik Enentáijiai métekrak wekasatarum tusan wakerajrume . Nu arantcha , Ashí Yusna ti penker nekaarum tuke katsuaruk tusan takaajai . Nujai Kristu ti penker nekaattarme . Tura yaunchu nekaachman Yus Yamái paant awajsaiti . Nuka Krístuiti . Tura Nii nekaatin nekas Shíiraiti .

text: In whom are hid all the treasures of wisdom and knowledge .
text2: Tura kakaram ajasam Kristu pénker nekaam Ashí shiir Enentáimpramnia nusha tura Ashí Yusna nekaamnia nusha nekaattarme .

text: And this I say , lest any man should beguile you with enticing words .
text2: Atumin Chíkich shuar Niisháa chichamjai shiir chichartamas anankramawarain tusan nuna Tájarme .

text: For though I be absent in the flesh , yet am I with you in the spirit , joying and beholding your order , and the stedfastness of your faith in Christ .
text2: Wi nui atumjai pujachkuncha nui pujajna aintsanak Enentáimtajrume . Tuma asan átum métek Enentáimprarum tura kakaram ajasrum Kristu nekas Enentáimtururmena nuna iisnaka shiir Enentáimjai .

text: Rooted and built up in him , and stablished in the faith , as ye have been taught , abounding therein with thanksgiving .
text2: Nu asamtai átum ii Uuntri Jesukrístu nekas Enentáimtusrum Yus - shuar ajasmarmena Núnisrum yamaisha Nii nekas Enentáimtusrum Niijiai tsaninkrum Ashí Túratarum . Nu Túrakrum Nii Enentáimtakrum tuke tsakaki wétatrume . Tura te tariara wajasrum Yusjai kanakchattarme . Yus - Chicham Núnisan etsernakmatai nekamarme . Tuma asarum Yus tuke yuminsarum , Núnisan pénker wekasatarum .

text: Beware lest any man spoil you through philosophy and vain deceit , after the tradition of men , after the rudiments of the world , and not after Christ .
text2: Aneartarum atumsha . Shuar aentsti Enentáimmiajain Ashí ju nunkanmayan Enentáimprar tura Krístun Enentáimtutsuk Niisháa chichaman áujtamainiak nekaschajai anankramataj tusa wakerutmainiawai .

text: For in him dwelleth all the fulness of the Godhead bodily .
text2: Krístunam Yus Ashí takamtsuk pujuwiti .

text: And ye are complete in him , which is the head of all principality and power :
text2: Túmakui atumsha Krístujai tsaninkiu asarum ni iwiaakmari takamtsuk takakuitrume . Krístusha Ashí akupniun akupniuiti . Aentsnumsha iwianchniumsha tura nayaimpinmasha Ashí akupin írunna nuna akupniuiti .

text: In whom also ye are circumcised with the circumcision made without hands , in putting off the body of the sins of the flesh by the circumcision of Christ :
text2: Nu arant átum ayashnium tsupirnatskesha Kristu shuari ajasakrumin Ashí ayash wakeramun , tsupirkatniua aintsan , Kristu ajapamiayi .

text: Buried with him in baptism , wherein also ye are risen with him through the faith of the operation of God , who hath raised him from the dead .
text2: Tura atumsha Yus ni kakarmarijiai Kristu jakan iniantkimia nu Enentáimtusrum imianmiarme . Túrarum Krístujai métek iwiarnasmarme . Tura Núnisrumek Krístujai métek nantakmiarme .

text: And you , being dead in your sins and the uncircumcision of your flesh , hath he quickened together with him , having forgiven you all trespasses ;
text2: Nuikkia átumsha tsupirnatsuk Atumí tunaari tuke akui Atumí Wakaníin Jákauyarme . Tura yamaikia Jesukrístujai tsaninkiu asakrumin Yuska Atumí tunaari tsankur yamaram iwiaakman suramsaitrume .

text: Blotting out the handwriting of ordinances that was against us , which was contrary to us , and took it out of the way , nailing it to his cross ;
text2: Tura Ashí ii tumashrin sumamtikramatin amia nuna japiruiti . Kristu Krúsnum jakamtai Ashí akupkamujai sumamtikramamun tsankurtampramiaji .

text: And having spoiled principalities and powers , he made a shew of them openly , triumphing over them in it .
text2: Núnisan Kristu Krúsnum jaka , iwianchnium Ashí akupin ainia nuna nupetak Ashí iimiainain iniatsararmiayi .

text: Let no man therefore judge you in meat , or in drink , or in respect of an holyday , or of the new moon , or of the sabbath days :
text2: Akupkamunmaya Yus ankant awajtamsamtai Chíkich shuar ame Túramujai yajauch Enentáimturmarain . Yúamna nujai , úmamna nujai , uwitincha , nantutincha , tura tsawantincha nampermam nujai Chíkich shuar yajauch áujmatramkuisha ṡWarí urukatin ?

text: Which are a shadow of things to come ; but the body is of Christ .
text2: Nu nampernum Israer - shuar Kristu Túrattana nuna nakumainiak Túrin ármiayi . Tura Kristu taa imia Ninki Pujá asamtai nakumkamuka ántraiti .

text: Let no man beguile you of your reward in a voluntary humility and worshipping of angels , intruding into those things which he hath not seen , vainly puffed up by his fleshly mind ,
text2: Tura shuar " Péejchach ajasam Yus áujtsuk aya Yusa suntari shiir awajsatniuiti " Túramkuinkia anturkairap . Nu shuar mesekranam Wáinkiamun áujmatenak ántar nankaamantu Enentáimtumainiawai . Aya aentsti Enentáimian chichainiawai .

text: And not holding the Head , from which all the body by joints and bands having nourishment ministered , and knit together , increaseth with the increase of God .
text2: Tuma ásar Krístujai tsaninkiar wekainiatsui . Kristu Ashí akupin asa ni shuarin Yúsnan Jintintiá shiir tsakarat tusa pénker Wáiniui . Nu arantcha Ashí ápateak Yus wakerana aintsan chikichik awajeawai .

text: Wherefore if ye be dead with Christ from the rudiments of the world , why , as though living in the world , are ye subject to ordinances ,
text2: Atumsha Krístujai jaka asarum aya aentsti Enentáimtai ikiukniuitrume . Nuikia ṡurukamtai ju nunkanmaya ana nu tuke Páchiarum ? Nii tuinia nu umirkashtiniaiti .

text: ( Touch not ; taste not ; handle not ;
text2: " Ju antinchatniuiti , tuiniawai . Ju Yúashtiniaiti . Tura ju achikchatniuiti " tuiniawai .

text: Which all are to perish with the using ; ) after the commandments and doctrines of men ?
text2: Nusha ṡWarí , takasam amuukashtatuak ? Kame áyatik aents akupkamu ainiawai .

text: Which things have indeed a shew of wisdom in will worship , and humility , and neglecting of the body ; not in any honour to the satisfying of the flesh .
text2: Shuar nu akupkamu umiiniak Yúsnan ti nékaitjai tura Yus shiir Enentáimturui tu Enentáimtumainiawai . Nu arantcha péejchach ajasan winia ayashrun ti Asutiájai tu Enentáimtumainiawai . Túrasha ayash wakeramunka nupeteatsui .

text: If ye then be risen with Christ , seek those things which are above , where Christ sitteth on the right hand of God .
text2: Nuikia Krístujai nantakin asarum nayaimpinmaya írunna nu wakeruktarum . Nui Kristu pujawai Yusa Untsuuríni .

text: Set your affection on things above , not on things on the earth .
text2: Ju nunkanam ana nu Enentáimtsuk aya nayaimpinmaya ana nu Enentáimtustarum .

text: For ye are dead , and your life is hid with Christ in God .
text2: Atumsha Krístujai tsaninkrum jakamarme . Tuma asarum Krístujai tsaninkrum Yusjai iwiaaku pujarme .

text: When Christ , who is our life , shall appear , then shall ye also appear with him in glory .
text2: Krístukete ii iwiaakmari . Nii nayaimpinmaya wantinkiuisha atumsha Niijiai métek wantinkiattarme . Tura Niijiai métek ti penker átatrume .

text: Mortify therefore your members which are upon the earth ; fornication , uncleanness , inordinate affection , evil concupiscence , and covetousness , which is idolatry :
text2: Tuma asamtai ju nunkanmaya ana nu ajakratniua aintsarum iniaisatarum . Tsanirmatniusha , Tunáa wakeruktincha , tura takakna nujai nankaamas wakeruktincha ántar - yus tikishmatratniua aintsan asamtai iniaisatarum .

text: For which things ' sake the wrath of God cometh on the children of disobedience :
text2: Shuar Yúsan umirtsuk aya nuna Túrin ásarmatai Yus niin kajerak ti Asutiáttawai .

text: In the which ye also walked some time , when ye lived in them .
text2: Atumsha Núnisrumek Túriniuyarme .

text: But now ye also put off all these ; anger , wrath , malice , blasphemy , filthy communication out of your mouth .
text2: Tura yamaikia jusha iniaisatarum : kajektincha , yajauch wakeruktincha , yajauch Túratniusha , katsekmaktincha , yajauch chicham chichastincha , mash iniaisatarum .

text: Lie not one to another , seeing that ye have put off the old man with his deeds ;
text2: Yus - shuar ajasrum yaunchu Enentáimtairam iniaisamarme . Tura yaunchu Túrutairmesha iniaisaitrume . Tuma asarum nuamtak tsanumprunairairap tura Wáitruawairap .

text: And have put on the new man , which is renewed in knowledge after the image of him that created him :
text2: Yaunchu enentai , Pushí mamuru aiktinia aintsarum , iniaisaitrume . Núnisrum yamaram Enentái , shiir Pushí entsartinia aintsarmek , wekasaitrume . Tura Yus nu yamaram Enentáin najana asa Ashí tsawant pujurtawai nuna nankaamas Niijiai métek shiir Atí tusa . Túramtai Yus ti penker nekaki wéaji .

text: Where there is neither Greek nor Jew , circumcision nor uncircumcision , Barbarian , Scythian , bond nor free : but Christ is all , and in all .
text2: Krístuka Ashí írunna nujai nankaamas ashiyaiti . Niiniun pujurui . Tuma asamtai Ashí ni shuari Enentáin Pujá asamtai Nusháa Enentáimtunairchatin ainiawai . Kriaku - shuarsha tura Israer - shuarsha , tsupirnakusha tura tsupirnakchasha , apachcha tura yajaya shuarsha , takarin ainia nusha tura ankant ainia nusha , Kristu Ashí ni Enentáin pujakui Nusháa Enentáimtunairchatniuiti .

text: Put on therefore , as the elect of God , holy and beloved , bowels of mercies , kindness , humbleness of mind , meekness , longsuffering ;
text2: Yus atumin anenmak Niiniu arti tusa achirmakmarme . Túrutma asamtai jujai shiir iwiarmampratniua aintsarum tuke Túrin atarum : waitnenkartin , shiir awajkartin , péejchach átin , émtin áchatin , tura katsuntin átin .

text: Forbearing one another , and forgiving one another , if any man have a quarrel against any : even as Christ forgave you , so also do ye .
text2: Kristu Atumí tunaarin tsankuramia Núnisrumek nuamtak Tsankúrnáiratarum . Chíkich yajauch awajtamkuisha shiir katsuntram yapajniaitsuk Tsankúrnáiratarum .

text: And above all these things put on charity , which is the bond of perfectness .
text2: Tura Ashí nankaamas anenaitiarum . Túrakrumka chikichik ajasrum mash pénker Túrattarme .

text: And let the peace of God rule in your hearts , to the which also ye are called in one body ; and be ye thankful .
text2: Kame chikichik ayashtinia aintsarum ajastarum tusa Yus ni shuari ajasat tusa achirmakmarme . Tuma asamtai Yusa shiiri Atumí Enentáin pujurtamsati . Nujai Yus yuminsatarum .

text: Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly in all wisdom ; teaching and admonishing one another in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs , singing with grace in your hearts to the Lord .
text2: Kristu shiir chichame Atumí Enentáin piakti . Nekas naka Enentáimprarum jintinniaiyarum mai Ikiakánai ajatarum . Yus kanta Kantamárum tuke Enentáijiai Yus yuminsarum shiir awajsatarum .

text: And whatsoever ye do in word or deed , do all in the name of the Lord Jesus , giving thanks to God and the Father by him .
text2: Tura takaakmesha , chichaakmesha , kame Ashí Túramna nuka Jesukrístu shiir awajsataj tusam ni kakarmarijiain Túrata . Túrakum Krístujai Yus Apa yuminsata .

text: Wives , submit yourselves unto your own husbands , as it is fit in the Lord .
text2: Nuwatiram , Atumí aishri umirkatarum Uunt Yus nuna wakerakui .

text: Husbands , love your wives , and be not bitter against them .
text2: Aishmantiram , Atumí nuwé aneatarum . Atumí nuwejai kajernaikiairap .

text: Children , obey your parents in all things : for this is well pleasing unto the Lord .
text2: Uchitiram , ame apa nukusha tuke umirkatarum . Nu Túrakrum Yus shiir Enentáimtiksattarme .

text: Fathers , provoke not your children to anger , lest they be discouraged .
text2: Uchirtintiram , Atumí uchiri ti kakantrairap . Ti kakanteamka uchisha ti kuntuts pujus pénker wekasatniun nakitchanpiash . Nu Túrunawain tusarum ántrarum Atumí uchiri kakantrairap .

text: Servants , obey in all things your masters according to the flesh ; not with eyeservice , as menpleasers ; but in singleness of heart , fearing God :
text2: Takarniutiram , Atumí uuntri shiir umirkatarum . Ju nunkanmaya uuntri ain aya nii iimkiui shiir Enentáimturati tusarum takaschatniuitrume . Antsu Yus Enentáimtakrum tuke pénker takastiniaitrume .

text: And whatsoever ye do , do it heartily , as to the Lord , and not unto men ;
text2: Ashí Túramna nu asump Enentáijiai takakmasta . Aya aentsuk Yáintinia aintsachu antsu nayaimpinmaya Uuntrum Yayá aitkiasrum takastarum .

text: Knowing that of the Lord ye shall receive the reward of the inheritance : for ye serve the Lord Christ .
text2: Ame Uuntrum Kristu asa nayaimpiniam Ashí shiir takustinian tsankatramkattawai .

text: But he that doeth wrong shall receive for the wrong which he hath done : and there is no respect of persons .
text2: Antsu Tunáa Túrin ni yajauch Túramujai métek Akinkiáttawai . Yus Ashí aentsun métek iyawai .

text: Masters , give unto your servants that which is just and equal ; knowing that ye also have a Master in heaven .
text2: Uunttirmesha , Atumí Uuntri atumin Wáiniuk nayaimpiniam pujatsuk . Tuma asamtai Atumí Yáinma jiatsuk pénker iniartiniaitrume .

text: Continue in prayer , and watch in the same with thanksgiving ;
text2: Yus áujkuram Nii yuminsarum asummiarum iniaitsuk áujsatarum .

text: Withal praying also for us , that God would open unto us a door of utterance , to speak the mystery of Christ , for which I am also in bonds :
text2: Incha Yus áujtustarum . Kristu - chicham yaunchu nekaachman Yamái étserkun sepunam pujajai . Tuma asamtai nuna shiir ankant etserkat tusarum áujtursatarum .

text: That I may make it manifest , as I ought to speak .
text2: Tura wi paant etserkatniuitiaj Núnisan etserkat tusarum áujtursatarum .

text: Walk in wisdom toward them that are without , redeeming the time .
text2: Yus - shuarchajai shiir Túratarum Yus - Chichaman yajauch Enentáimturarain . Kakaram ajasrum tsawant ántrarum iniankasairap .

text: Let your speech be alway with grace , seasoned with salt , that ye may know how ye ought to answer every man .
text2: Ti shiir chichamtin átiniaitrume tura Anturújamin átiniaitrume . Núnisrum Chíkich Chíkich Yus - chicham paant ujaktin nekaattarme .

text: All my state shall Tychicus declare unto you , who is a beloved brother , and a faithful minister and fellowservant in the Lord :
text2: Ii aneamu yachi Tíkikiu Ashí Wínian ujatmaktatrume . Niisha wijiai métek Yúsnan pimpitsuk ti penker takasuiti .

text: Whom I have sent unto you for the same purpose , that he might know your estate , and comfort your hearts ;
text2: Nu asamtai ii jui pujajnia nuna ujatmak ikiantamprarat tusan akuptajrume .

text: With Onesimus , a faithful and beloved brother , who is one of you . They shall make known unto you all things which are done here .
text2: Núnisan ii aneamu yachi Unisemu niijiai winiawai . Niisha atum wéeaiti , tura Yusjai shiir wekaawai . Nu shuar Ashí jui Túrunamun ujatmaktatrume .

text: Aristarchus my fellowprisoner saluteth you , and Marcus , sister ' s son to Barnabas , ( touching whom ye received commandments : if he come unto you , receive him ; )
text2: Aristarku wi sepunam tsaninkia pujamur amikmaatmarme . Núnisan Markus , Pirnapí Kaná yachia nu , amikmaatmawai . Niisha nui jeamtai antukmarum Núnisrum pénker Wáinkiatarum .

text: And Jesus , which is called Justus , who are of the circumcision . These only are my fellowworkers unto the kingdom of God , which have been a comfort unto me .
text2: Justu Jesus Náartin amikmaatmarme . Júchik ainiawai Rúmanmaya Israer - shuar winia Yúsnan etserkatin atutkaru ainia nu . Túmainiak ti shiir ayamtikruiniawai .

text: Epaphras , who is one of you , a servant of Christ , saluteth you , always labouring fervently for you in prayers , that ye may stand perfect and complete in all the will of God .
text2: Epaprassha , atum Weeá , Krístunun etserin asa atumin amikmaatmarme . Niisha Ashí tsawant Yúsan áujeak Yusjai kakaarum tuke shiir Yus wakera nu Túrak tusa seatramprume .

text: For I bear him record , that he hath a great zeal for you , and them that are in Laodicea , and them in Hierapolis .
text2: Wisha Epapras atumin ti Enentáimturman nékajai . Núnisan Rautiséanmaya shuarnasha tura Iarapurisnumia shuarnasha ti Páchiniawai .

text: Luke , the beloved physician , and Demas , greet you .
text2: Rukas , aneamu Tsuákratin , Núnisan Témassha amikmaatmarme .

text: Salute the brethren which are in Laodicea , and Nymphas , and the church which is in his house .
text2: Tura Rautiséanam pujuinia Nú Yus - shuarsha amikmaatruatarum . Núnisan Nímpiassha tura ni jeen irunainia Nú Yus - shuarsha amikmaatruatarum .

text: And when this epistle is read among you , cause that it be read also in the church of the Laodiceans ; and that ye likewise read the epistle from Laodicea .
text2: Atum ju Papí áujsarum umikrum Rautiséanmasha Nuyá Yus - shuar áujsarti tusarum akupkatarum . Tura atumsha Núnisan Rautiséanmaya Papí Támatai atumsha áujsatarum .

text: And say to Archippus , Take heed to the ministry which thou hast received in the Lord , that thou fulfil it .
text2: Tura ju Arkipiu titiarum : " Ii Uuntri Jesus ni takatrin suramsa nu pénker umikta " tawai , titiarum .

text: The salutation by the hand of me Paul . Remember my bonds . Grace be with you . Amen .
text2: Wi , Papru , winia uwejrujai Júchiniak aatkun amikmaajrume . Sepunam pujajna ju Enentáimturatarum . Yus shiir yainmakarti . Nuke Atí .

text: Paul , a servant of God , and an apostle of Jesus Christ , according to the faith of God ' s elect , and the acknowledging of the truth which is after godliness ;
text2: Wikia Pápruitjai Yusa takarniuri . Tura Jesukrístu akatramurintjai . Yus achikma ainia Nú shuar niisha antukar Yúsan umirkarat tusan akatramuitjai . Shuar nuna nekaawar pénker wekasartatui .

text: In hope of eternal life , which God , that cannot lie , promised before the world began ;
text2: Tura Nú arant , Nú shuarsha tuke iwiaaku pujusarat tusan étsereajai . Nú shuarnasha , nunkan najantsuk , " uwemtikrattajai " Yus Tímiayi . Tura Niisha Wáitruatniun tujintiawai .

text: But hath in due times manifested his word through preaching , which is committed unto me according to the commandment of God our Saviour ;
text2: Tura yamaikia , tsawant jeamtai , nuna nekaawarat tusa ii Yusri uwemtikkiartinia nu , winia chichamur ujakarta tusa , winia akatturmiayi .

text: To Titus , mine own son after the common faith : Grace , mercy , and peace , from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ our Saviour .
text2: Titiu , wi Yusna étserma umikiu asakmin winia uchirua aitkiasnak papin aateajme . Iis , iijiai métek Yus nekas Enentáimtatsjik . Yus waitnentrama asa shiir awajtamsati tusan wakerajme . Tura ii Apari Yussha , ii Uuntri Jesukrístusha , Uwemtikkiartin ana nu , Enentáimin imiatkincha awajtamsati , tajai .

text: For this cause left I thee in Crete , that thou shouldest set in order the things that are wanting , and ordain elders in every city , as I had appointed thee :
text2: Wats , wi iwiarachmajna nu ame iwiarata tusan Kreta nunkanam ikiukchamkajam . Tura " Ashí péprunam Yus - shuar írunmanum , Yus - shuaran Wáinkiarat tusam shuar anaikiarta " Tíchamkajam .

text: If any be blameless , the husband of one wife , having faithful children not accused of riot or unruly .
text2: Yus - shuaran Wáinin Júnis Atí . Niisha makuuchmin ti pénker Wekasatí . Tura Chikichík nuwentin átiniaiti . Tura ni uchirisha Yusna ártiniaiti . Tura shuar yajauch chicharsachmin niisha tutupnisan wekain ártiniaiti .

text: For a bishop must be blameless , as the steward of God ; not selfwilled , not soon angry , not given to wine , no striker , not given to filthy lucre ;
text2: Enentáimprata . Yus - shuaran Wáinin Yusna ana nuna Wáinkiat tusa anaikiamuiti . Tuma asamtai nekas makuuchmin wekasatniuiti . Waantu Enentáimtumatsuk , kajetsuk , tura nampechu átiniaiti . Chikichan waitkiau áchatniuiti . Tura ananma Kuítrintin ajastaj tusa wakerukchatniuiti .

text: But a lover of hospitality , a lover of good men , sober , just , holy , temperate ;
text2: Antsu shuar ni jeen írar winiana nuna itiaatniuiti . Tura Ashí pénker ana nuna wakerin , esetas Enentáimin átiniaiti . Tura ju nunkanmaya akupeamuncha , Núnisan Yús akupeamuncha umirkatniuiti . Tura ninki iimiastiniaiti .

text: Holding fast the faithful word as he hath been taught , that he may be able by sound doctrine both to exhort and to convince the gainsayers .
text2: Tura Nú arantcha , Chíkich Shuáran pénker jintintrataj tusa tura Yus - Chichaman nakitin ainia nuna nupetkataj tusa , Yúsnumia nekas chichaman , nii Unuimiátramiania Nuyá kanakchatniuiti .

text: For there are many unruly and vain talkers and deceivers , specially they of the circumcision :
text2: Nekaata . Umichu ti irunui . Niisha ántar chichau ásar ananmau ainiawai . Israer - shuar weeanam ti irunui Nú shuar .

text: Whose mouths must be stopped , who subvert whole houses , teaching things which they ought not , for filthy lucre ' s sake .
text2: Niisha Kuítian achiktaj tusar wakeruiniak , yajauch unuiniarchatniua nuna unuiniainiawai . Nuna Túruiniak Untsurí Shuáran , ni írutkamurijiai yajauch Enentáimtikiainiawai . Tuma asamtai auka , ni wene epetkatniuiti , ántar chichainiakui .

text: One of themselves , even a prophet of their own , said , The Cretians are alway liars , evil beasts , slow bellies .
text2: Warí , imia Krétanmaya chichaman etserin juna Tíchamka : " Krétanmaya aentska tuke Wáitrin ainiawai . Tura Nákitiat ti yurumin ainiawai . Yajasma Núnisan ainiawai . " Nuna Tíchamka .

text: Not giving heed to Jewish fables , and commandments of men , that turn from the truth .
text2: Maa , niisha nékasan Tímiayi . Nu tuma asamtai , Titiu , Israer - shuar ántar tuinia nuna , Yus - shuar Anturkachartí tusam , tura nekas chichaman nakitiana nuna akupeamurin Umirkachartí tusam , antsu Yúsan nekas umirkarat tusam , umichu shuar kakaram chicharkarta .

text: Unto the pure all things are pure : but unto them that are defiled and unbelieving is nothing pure ; but even their mind and conscience is defiled .
text2: Enentáimprata . Yus - shuarka , ni Enentái chamir ajasu ana nuka , Ashí ni wainnia nuna pénkernak Enentáimtawai . Tura Chíkich shuar , Yúsan umirkachu asa , ni Enentái wapik asa , pénker ana nuna Enentáimtustinian tujintiawai . Achapai Enentáimiuk , pénkercha ana nuna " pénkeraiti " tawai .

text: They profess that they know God ; but in works they deny him , being abominable , and disobedient , and unto every good work reprobate .
text2: Tura niisha " Yus - shuaraitjai " Tuíniayatan , Yúsan umirtsuk Niisháa Túruiniawai . Tuma ásar muijmiai ainiawai niisha . Umichu ásar pénkeran Túratniun penké tujintiainiawai .

text: But speak thou the things which become sound doctrine :
text2: Tura amesha , Titiu , pénker chicham etserkata . Yus - Chicham Tátsuna nu etserkaip .

text: That the aged men be sober , grave , temperate , sound in faith , in charity , in patience .
text2: Antsu aishman katsunt Yusna ainia nu , ju jintintrata . Nampechu , Nánkamas Enentáimcha , esetas Enentáimin arti . Yus tana nuna umirin tura anenain arti . Ni Itiurchatríin Yúsan Enentáimtusar katsuntin arti .

text: The aged women likewise , that they be in behaviour as becometh holiness , not false accusers , not given to much wine , teachers of good things ;
text2: Tura Núnismek nuwa katsunt Yusna ainia nusha ju jintintrata . Niisha Núnisaran Yus - shuarti Túramnia nuna pénker Túrawartí . Tsanumin tura nampen áchartí . Antsu pénker wekasatniun unuinin arti .

text: That they may teach the young women to be sober , to love their husbands , to love their children ,
text2: Niisha yama nuatnakua nuna ni aishrin ni Uchiríncha nekas aneetniun Unuiniarartí .

text: To be discreet , chaste , keepers at home , good , obedient to their own husbands , that the word of God be not blasphemed .
text2: Junasha Jintintrartí . Esetas Enentáimin , pénker wekain ártiniaiti . Ni takatrin pénker takastin ainiawai . Ni aishrin umirin ártiniaiti . Tura waitnentin ártiniaiti . Yus - shuarcha Yus - Chichaman yajauch chicharkarain tusar Túrawartiniaiti . " Tu jintintrarta " Titiá .

text: Young men likewise exhort to be sober minded .
text2: Nuyá , Titiu , natsa ainia nu " Nánkamsar Enentáimsarum wekasairap " Titiá .

text: Sound speech , that cannot be condemned ; that he that is of the contrary part may be ashamed , having no evil thing to say of you .
text2: Tura amesha , Titiu , Ashí tsawant pénker Wekasatá . Nu natsa wi Túramun Júkiar nunak Túrawarmi tusam , nu Túrata . Tura anturtamna nu " nekaschapitia " tiin tusam , esetsam Enentáimsam , Yus - Chicham tana nu ímiatrusmek jintintiata . Nú Túrakminkia , Yus - Chichaman nakitiana nu shuar " Titiu Nánkamas chichaawai " Títiaj Tukamá , natsaamak tujintramkattawai .

text: Exhort servants to be obedient unto their own masters , and to please them well in all things ; not answering again ;
text2: Takarin ainia nu , ni takartairin umirkarat tusam jintintrarta . " Shiir Enentáimsarum , yajauch aimtsuk shiir umirkatarum " Titiá .

text: Not purloining , but shewing all good fidelity ; that they may adorn the doctrine of God our Saviour in all things .
text2: " Kasamkairap , tura anankawairap . Iis , pénker Túrakrumka , takarniuitiatrum , shiir tura asarum ii Uwemtikramin Yusri chichamen Shíiraiti , tu Enentáimtikrattarme " Titiá .

text: For the grace of God that bringeth salvation hath appeared to all men ,
text2: Yus iin waitnentrama asa Ashí aentstin uwemtikramprataj tusa wakerutmaji .

text: Teaching us that , denying ungodliness and worldly lusts , we should live soberly , righteously , and godly , in this present world ;
text2: Kame Yus waitnentrama asamtai , Tunáa ana nu iniaisatniuitji , nu nékaji . Tura ju nunkanmaya yajauch ana nu wakerukchatniuitji . Tura antsu ju nunkanam pujayatrik esetsar Enentáimsar ananma wekatsuk tuke tsawant Yus anear wekasatniuitji .

text: Looking for that blessed hope , and the glorious appearing of the great God and our Saviour Jesus Christ ;
text2: Túrar ii Yusri Jesukrístu , uwemtikramajnia nu , Imiá shiir iwiarnar Tatí tusar Nákastiniaitji .

text: Who gave himself for us , that he might redeem us from all iniquity , and purify unto himself a peculiar people , zealous of good works .
text2: Jesukrístuka iin jarutramkamiaji , ii tunaarinia uwemtikrampratajtsa . Tura , Winia ajasar tuke Enentáijiai pénker Túrawarat tusa , ii tunaarin japirtampramiaji .

text: These things speak , and exhort , and rebuke with all authority . Let no man despise thee .
text2: Titiu , anaikiamu asam arantutsuk nu jintintrata . Yajauch ana nuna Túrawarain tusam chicharkarta . Pénkeran Túruinia nu Ikiakárta . Tura yajauch chichartukarain tusam tuke pénker wekasata .

text: Put them in mind to be subject to principalities and powers , to obey magistrates , to be ready to every good work ,
text2: Titiu , shuar Enentáimtikrarta . " Ashí akupin ainia nusha tura chikich uunt akupena nusha antukrum umirkatarum " Titiá . " " Pénkeran Túratin ana nuna Páchitsuk Túrattajai " Títiniaitrume " Titiá .

text: To speak evil of no man , to be no brawlers , but gentle , shewing all meekness unto all men .
text2: " Tsanumprairap , kajernaikiairap , antsu shiir Enentáimtunaistarum " Titiá . Nankaamantu Enentáimtumatsuk Ashí shuar pénker awajsatarum tusam tu jintintrarta .

text: For we ourselves also were sometimes foolish , disobedient , deceived , serving divers lusts and pleasures , living in malice and envy , hateful , and hating one another .
text2: Warí , iisha Núnisrik Yus - shuar ajatsuk Nánkamsar wekaimji , Yuska umirtsuk . Tura íwianch emetamu pempée wekaimji . Tura ii ayashi wakeramu tuke Túriniuyaji . Tunaasha Túriniuyaji . Chíkich atankittsar wakeriniuyaji . Chíkich shuar kajerkar tura nuamtaksha kajernainiuyaji .

text: But after that the kindness and love of God our Saviour toward man appeared ,
text2: Túrasha Yus iin uwemtikkiartin ana nu , anenkratin asa , ni anenkrattairin Ashí aentsun iniaktus iin uwemtikrampramiaji .

text: Not by works of righteousness which we have done , but according to his mercy he saved us , by the washing of regeneration , and renewing of the Holy Ghost ;
text2: Yus iin waitnentrama asa , iikia Júkesha pénker Túrachma ain uwemtikrampramiaji . ṡItiurak uwemtikrampramiaj ~ i ? Ii tunaarin Asakátrampramiaji , nijiaktinia aintsan . Tura Yusa Wakani pujurtamkurin , ii iwiaakmarin yamarman amasmaji .

text: Which he shed on us abundantly through Jesus Christ our Saviour ;
text2: Jesukrístu jakamujai Yus iin emeenturmatsuk ni Wakanin suramsamiaji .

text: That being justified by his grace , we should be made heirs according to the hope of eternal life .
text2: Iin anenma asa nuna Túramiayi . Nuinkia iisha yamaram awajsamu asar tuke iwiaaku átin , ti wakerimiaj nu iiniuiti .

text: This is a faithful saying , and these things I will that thou affirm constantly , that they which have believed in God might be careful to maintain good works . These things are good and profitable unto men .
text2: Nuka ti nekasaiti . Tuma asamtai Yúsan umirkarmia nu , pénker Túratniun tuke wakerukarat tusam tuke jintinki Wetá . Wi Tímiajna nu , pénker asamtai , Ashí aents nuna nekaatniun atsumainiawai .

text: But avoid foolish questions , and genealogies , and contentions , and strivings about the law ; for they are unprofitable and vain .
text2: Shuar netse áujmatainiakui ameja pachisaip . Tura " aya winia uuntruk pénker ainiawai " tu chichasaip . Tura Israer - shuara akupkamuri itiurkit tusa shuar ti áujmatainiakui nusha pachisaip . Antraiti nuka . Pénker wekasatniun yayatsui .

text: A man that is an heretick after the first and second admonition reject ;
text2: Shuar tsanumprur yajauch Enentáimtunaimtikiana nu chicharkata . Antachkuinkia ataksha chicharkata . Tura penké tujinkiamka jiiki akupkata .

text: Knowing that he that is such is subverted , and sinneth , being condemned of himself .
text2: Nujai juna nekaamniaitme : nuna tura asa awajiruiti . Tura ni tunaarinin jakattui .

text: When I shall send Artemas unto thee , or Tychicus , be diligent to come unto me to Nicopolis : for I have determined there to winter .
text2: Wisha Artemasan akatran akuptukchatjameash . Niin akupeachkunka Tíkikiun akuptuktatjame . Nii jeamtai amesha wari winitritia Nekapuris péprunam . Jui Nekapurisnum Yumí nantu asamtai seturan pujuttajai .

text: Bring Zenas the lawyer and Apollos on their journey diligently , that nothing be wanting unto them .
text2: Senas , chichaman ti unuimiaru pujana nu , amikiur Apurusjai jeamtai , nii atsumtsuk shiir Weartí tusam , ame Túratin jeamna nu yainta .

text: And let ours also learn to maintain good works for necessary uses , that they be not unfruitful .
text2: Iiní Yus - shuar ainia nusha pénker Túratniun tura atsumainia nunasha Yáintinian Nekaawartí . Antar pujusarain tusan nuna tajai .

text: All that are with me salute thee . Greet them that love us in the faith . Grace be with you all . Amen .
text2: Ashí wijiai pujuinia nu amikmaatmainiawai . Tura ii amikri Yus - shuar ainia nu amikmaatruata . Atumniasha Yus shiir yainmakat tusan wakerajrume . Nuke Atí .

text: Paul , a prisoner of Jesus Christ , and Timothy our brother , unto Philemon our dearly beloved , and fellowlabourer ,
text2: Wi Papru ju papin aaran akuptajme ámin , Jirimiunká . Ii yachi Timiutéusha juna akupturmawai . Wi Jesukrístu takaru asan sepunam pujajai . Ame iijiai tsaninkia Takáa asakmin ju papin akuptajme .

text: And to our beloved Apphia , and Archippus our fellowsoldier , and to the church in thy house :
text2: Núnisan ame jeemiin Yus - shuar irunainia nunasha tura ii umai Apiancha tura Arkipiuncha iijiai ti kakaram takasu asamtai ju papin akuptajrume .

text: Grace to you , and peace , from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Yus ii Apari tura ii Uuntri Jesukrístu shiir Enentáimturma ásar yainmakarti imiatkinchanum tuke shiir pujustinian .

text: Hearing of thy love and faith , which thou hast toward the Lord Jesus , and toward all saints ;
text2: Ame Uunt Jesus shiir Enentáimtakum Ashí Yus - shuar ainia nusha aneamun antukjai . Nuna antukan ámin ti shiir Enentáimtakun Yúsan áujeakun Yúminkiajai .

text: That the communication of thy faith may become effectual by the acknowledging of every good thing which is in you in Christ Jesus .
text2: Aujeakun Chíkich shuarsha ámijiai métek Yúsan nekas Enentáimtuiniak Ashí pénker ana nuna ti paant nekaawarat tusan seajai . Ashí pénker ana nuka Jesukrístu shiir awajsamujai takakji .

text: For we have great joy and consolation in thy love , because the bowels of the saints are refreshed by thee , brother .
text2: Wisha ame anenkratmajai ti shiir Enentáimtakun waraajai . Yatsurú , ámijiai Ashí Yus - shuarsha shiir Enentáimiainiawai .

text: Wherefore , though I might be much bold in Christ to enjoin thee that which is convenient ,
text2: Nu asamtai kakaram Tátsujme . Kame wakeraknaka Kristu akatramu asan " Ju Túrata " Tíminiaitjiame .

text: Yet for love ' s sake I rather beseech thee , being such an one as Paul the aged , and now also a prisoner of Jesus Christ .
text2: Antsu aneakun aya Júnisan Tájame . Wi Papru uuntach asan tura Krístun takarkun sepunam pujakun

text: I beseech thee for my son Onesimus , whom I have begotten in my bonds :
text2: Unisemu waitnentrai tusan seajme . Niisha wi ujakmajai Yus - shuar ajasu asa winia uchirua aintsankete . Sepunam pujayatan ni Aparíya aintsanak ajasjai .

text: Which in time past was to thee unprofitable , but now profitable to thee and to me :
text2: Nuikkia Unisemu ántrauyi antsu yamaikia aminiisha winiisha Yáimniuiti .

text: Whom I have sent again : thou therefore receive him , that is , mine own bowels :
text2: Ataksha awantajme . Wi ti penker aneamu asamtai pénker itiaata .

text: Whom I would have retained with me , that in thy stead he might have ministered unto me in the bonds of the gospel :
text2: Wi Yus - Chichaman étserkun sepunam pujajai . Túmakun ame Yajá pujakum Yáintkiatin tujintiakmin nii antsu wijiai pujus Yáintkiat tusan wakerimjai .

text: But without thy mind would I do nothing ; that thy benefit should not be as it were of necessity , but willingly .
text2: Túrasha ámin ujatsuk Túrachmin Enentáimpramjai . Kame ame wakerakum útsukchamujai " Pujustí " Tákumninkia maak .

text: For perhaps he therefore departed for a season , that thou shouldest receive him for ever ;
text2: Júnissha Enentáimpramniaiti . Unisemu ishichik tsawant menkakamai tura yamaikia waketki ámijiai tuke pujustatui .

text: Not now as a servant , but above a servant , a brother beloved , specially to me , but how much more unto thee , both in the flesh , and in the Lord ?
text2: Kame yamaikia emetachma antsu ame aneamu Yátsumea ainis átatui . Nuka ti pénkerchakait . Wisha niin ti aneajai . Tura yainmakmin asamtai tura Krístunam ame yatsum ajasu asamtai winia iniankattsam aneashtapash .

text: If thou count me therefore a partner , receive him as myself .
text2: Wisha ti penker amikrumchakaitiaj . Tuma asam winia itiaarua Nútiksam shiir Awayáta .

text: If he hath wronged thee , or oweth thee ought , put that on mine account ;
text2: Yajauch awajtamkaitkiuinkia tura ámijiai tumashitkiuisha wi akiktatjai .

text: I Paul have written it with mine own hand , I will repay it : albeit I do not say to thee how thou owest unto me even thine own self besides .
text2: Wi Papru nekas winia uwejrujai juna aaran ti nekas akiktatjame Tájame . Túrasha winia tumashitmena nuna Páchittsujme . Kame wi ujakam Yus - shuar ajaschamkum .

text: Yea , brother , let me have joy of thee in the Lord : refresh my bowels in the Lord .
text2: Wátsek , Yatsurú , amesha Yus - shuar asam wi seajme Jú Túrutata . Kristu Enentáimtakum shiir Enentáimtikrurta .

text: Having confidence in thy obedience I wrote unto thee , knowing that thou wilt also do more than I say .
text2: Ti penker uminiaitme nuna nékakun Júnisan aatjame . Tura wi seajmena nuna nankaamas Túrattamna nuna nékajai .

text: But withal prepare me also a lodging : for I trust that through your prayers I shall be given unto you .
text2: Ayu . Atum Yus áujturkurmin Yus winia tsankatruktatui atumiin iiraitniun . Tuma asamtai wi nui jean pujustin iwiarturata .

text: There salute thee Epaphras , my fellowprisoner in Christ Jesus ;
text2: Epaprassha niisha Jesukrístunu étseruk sepunam wijiai pujus amikmaatmarme .

text: Marcus , Aristarchus , Demas , Lucas , my fellowlabourers .
text2: Núnisan Márkussha Aristárkusha Témassha tura Rúkassha Yus - Chichaman etserkatniun Yáintiainia nusha amikmaatmainiawai .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit . Amen .
text2: Ii Uuntri Jesukrístu atumniasha ti shiir yainmakarti . Nuke Atí .

text: God , who at sundry times and in divers manners spake in time past unto the fathers by the prophets ,
text2: Yáunchuka Yúsnan etserniujai chichas Yus ni Enentáimmian ii uuntrin ujakmiayi . Tura Untsurí nunkanmasha tura Untsurí uwitincha Niisháa Niisháa chichas ujakmiayi .

text: Hath in these last days spoken unto us by his Son , whom he hath appointed heir of all things , by whom also he made the worlds ;
text2: Antsu ju Amúamu tsawantaikia ni Uchirí Jesukrístujain Ashí Niiniu ana nuna ujatmakji . Yus Niijiai Ashí írunna nuna najana asa mash Niin Súsaiti .

text: Who being the brightness of his glory , and the express image of his person , and upholding all things by the word of his power , when he had by himself purged our sins , sat down on the right hand of the Majesty on high ;
text2: Níyaiti Yúsan Imiá métek nakumeana nu . Tura Níyaiti Yus nankaamas shiira nuna paant awajeana nu . Niisha aya ni chichamejai kakarma nujai Ashí írunna nuna Wáiniuk emeta pujurui . Tura ii tunaarin nijiatramak akupin pujutainium , Yusa untsuurini , pujusmiayi .

text: Being made so much better than the angels , as he hath by inheritance obtained a more excellent name than they .
text2: Yusa Uchiri nayaimpinmaya suntarjai Imiá nankaamantu awajnasuiti . Tura ti nankaamantu asamtai Yus nayaimpinmaya suntar nankaamas Niin ti shiir awajtawai .

text: For unto which of the angels said he at any time , Thou art my Son , this day have I begotten thee ? And again , I will be to him a Father , and he shall be to me a Son ?
text2: Wátsek , nayaimpinmaya suntaran chikichkinkesha juna Tútsuk Krístun Tímiayi : " Ame winia Uchiruitme . Túmaitkiui Yamáikia winia kakarmarun átakeajme . " Tura Núnisan Tímiayi : " Wi ni apari átatjai , tura Nii winia uchir átatui . "

text: And again , when he bringeth in the firstbegotten into the world , he saith , And let all the angels of God worship him .
text2: Tura Jú nunkanam ni Iwiairin akupeak Tímiayi : " Ashí Yusa suntari tikishmatrarti . "

text: And of the angels he saith , Who maketh his angels spirits , and his ministers a flame of fire .
text2: Nayaimpinmaya suntarnan Júnis chicharui : " Nayaimpinmaya suntarin takartursarat tusa nasea aintsan awajsaiti . Ni suntarin Chárpia ainis akupeawai . "

text: But unto the Son he saith , Thy throne , O God , is for ever and ever : a sceptre of righteousness is the sceptre of thy kingdom .
text2: Antsu ni Uchiríniun Tímiayi : " Ame , Yusá , tuke akupniuitme . Ame akuptairmesha aya pénkeraiti .

text: Thou hast loved righteousness , and hated iniquity ; therefore God , even thy God , hath anointed thee with the oil of gladness above thy fellows .
text2: Pénkera nu anenaitme , tura yajauchia nu Muíjniuitme . Tuma asamtai Ashí shuar shiir warartamu asamtai Yus , ame Yúsrum , Ashí akupniujai nankaamas uunt awajtamsaiti . "

text: And , Thou , Lord , in the beginning hast laid the foundation of the earth ; and the heavens are the works of thine hands :
text2: Nu arantcha tawai : " Uuntá , Yámankamtaik Ame ju nunka najanamiame . Túram ame uwejmijiai nayaimpisha najanaitme .

text: They shall perish ; but thou remainest ; and they all shall wax old as doth a garment ;
text2: Nusha mai amuukarmataisha Ame tuke pujuttame . Tarachjai métek mamurartatui .

text: And as a vesture shalt thou fold them up , and they shall be changed : but thou art the same , and thy years shall not fail .
text2: Tura ipijram ikiustatme . Pushiya aintsam Yapajiáttame . Túrasha Ameka Núnismek átatme . Játsuk tuke pujuttame . "

text: But to which of the angels said he at any time , Sit on my right hand , until I make thine enemies thy footstool ?
text2: Ataksha Tímiayi : " Akupin pujutainium , winia untsuuruini , pujusam Nákarsatá . Ame nemasrumin nupetkan Amin umirtamkarti tusan amastatjai . " Núnisan nayaimpinmaya suntaran penké Tíchamiayi .

text: Are they not all ministering spirits , sent forth to minister for them who shall be heirs of salvation ?
text2: Antsu Yusa Suntarí wakan ainiak Ashí shuar uwemprartatna nuna Yáinkiarat tusar Yus akupkamu ainiawai .

text: Therefore we ought to give the more earnest heed to the things which we have heard , lest at any time we should let them slip .
text2: Nuikia Kristu ti uunt asamtai Ashí Niiniu antukajnia nujai kanakchatin ti Enentáimtustiniaitji .

text: For if the word spoken by angels was stedfast , and every transgression and disobedience received a just recompence of reward ;
text2: Yaunchu nayaimpinmaya suntar Muisaisan Súsarmia Nú akupkamu nekas uminkiatniuyayi . Shuar umitsuk tunaan Túramtai ti kakaram Asutniáwarmiayi .

text: How shall we escape , if we neglect so great salvation ; which at the first began to be spoken by the Lord , and was confirmed unto us by them that heard him ;
text2: Antsu ii Uuntri Krístuka Uwempratin Chichaman emka itiamiayi . Tura Imiá nekas Tuíniak Niin anturkaru iin ujatmakarmaji . Tuma asamtai Uwempratin Chicham nakitiakrikia nuna nankaamas uwemtsuk Asutniáttaji .

text: God also bearing them witness , both with signs and wonders , and with divers miracles , and gifts of the Holy Ghost , according to his own will ?
text2: Kame nu arantcha , Uwempratin Chicham ujatmainiakrin Imiá nekas Tuíniawai tusa aents Túrachminian kakarman Yus iniakmasmiayi . Núnisan ni Shiir Wakani ni wakerana Núnisan Niisháa Niisháa kakermajai takamtikeawai . Nujai Yus - Chichama nu paant nekanamniaiti .

text: For unto the angels hath he not put in subjection the world to come , whereof we speak .
text2: Ayu . Nuik áujmatkur " Jú nunka amuukattawai " taji . Tura yamaram nunkanam nayaimpinmaya suntar akupkachartatui .

text: But one in a certain place testified , saying , What is man , that thou art mindful of him ? or the son of man , that thou visitest him ?
text2: Antsu ii akupkattajnia nu , Yus - Papinium aarmaiti : " ṡShuarti warimpiaitiaj ame Imiá Enentáimtitniusha ? Kame , ṡshuar Warí asamtai pujursataj tamea ?

text: Thou madest him a little lower than the angels ; thou crownedst him with glory and honour , and didst set him over the works of thy hands :
text2: Ishichik tsawant nayaimpinmaya suntarjai péejchach awajsamiame . Túram ti shiir nankaamas uunt awajsattame . Ame najanamun Ashí akupkati tusam tsankatkattame .

text: Thou hast put all things in subjection under his feet . For in that he put all in subjection under him , he left nothing that is not put under him . But now we see not yet all things put under him .
text2: Ashí niin umirkarti tusam susattame . " Tu aarmaiti . Yus " Ashí niin umirkarti " takui niin umirkashtinkia atsawai . Túrasha yamaikia Ashí umirainiaka Wáintsuji .

text: But we see Jesus , who was made a little lower than the angels for the suffering of death , crowned with glory and honour ; that he by the grace of God should taste death for every man .
text2: Tura Wáinjinia nu Krístuiti . Niisha aents ajas ishichik tsawant nayaimpinmaya suntarjai péejchach ajasmiayi . Yus ni shuarin ti aneak jarukarti tusa wakerimiayi . Tura ni Wáitias jakamujai yamaikia ti shiir nankaamas Uunt awajsamuiti .

text: For it became him , for whom are all things , and by whom are all things , in bringing many sons unto glory , to make the captain of their salvation perfect through sufferings .
text2: Ashí írunna nu Yus najanamu ásar ni wakeramun umiktin ainiawai . Tura Ashí ni uchirisha ni Shíirmarin pachiinkiarat tusa wakerawai . Tuma asa Yuska Jesukrístun , nu shuaran Uwemtiknia nuna , ni waitsmujai nekas Uwemtikkiartin awajsamiayi .

text: For both he that sanctifieth and they who are sanctified are all of one : for which cause he is not ashamed to call them brethren ,
text2: Yusna Atí tusa shiir awajsamuncha tura Kristu niin shiir awajea nunasha Yuska mai metek ni Aparínti . Nu asamtai Yusa Uchiri nu shuaran " yatsur " Títinian natsantatsui .

text: Saying , I will declare thy name unto my brethren , in the midst of the church will I sing praise unto thee .
text2: Yus - Papinium Núnisan tawai : " Ame Náarmin winia yatsurun ujakartatjai . Ashí iruntramunam kantampruattajme . "

text: And again , I will put my trust in him . And again , Behold I and the children which God hath given me .
text2: Ataksha ni shuarijiai métek Enentáimtamun tawai : " Yúsan ti shiir Enentáimtustatjai . " Tura ataksha : " Yus surusmia Nú uchirjai Yúsan umirkun pujajai " tawai .

text: Forasmuch then as the children are partakers of flesh and blood , he also himself likewise took part of the same ; that through death he might destroy him that had the power of death , that is , the devil ;
text2: Tura nu uchi aents ásarmatai Núnisan Jesussha aents ajasmiayi . Tura aents ajas jaka , iwianchin , jatai nérenniurin , Ashí emesramiayi .

text: And deliver them who through fear of death were all their lifetime subject to bondage .
text2: Tura ti Untsurí shuaran uwemtikrarmiayi . Nu shuar yaunchu Jákatniun ashamainiak tuke Wáitin ármiayi . Antsu ni jakamujai Yamái ankant ainiawai .

text: For verily he took not on him the nature of angels ; but he took on him the seed of Abraham .
text2: Maa , Imiá nekasaiti , nayaimpinmaya suntaran Yáintaj tusa Táchamiayi . Antsu Ashí Apraám weean , Ashí Yus - shuar ainia nuna Yáintajtsa Támiayi .

text: Wherefore in all things it behoved him to be made like unto his brethren , that he might be a merciful and faithful high priest in things pertaining to God , to make reconciliation for the sins of the people .
text2: Túratin asa penké métek ni Yachía ainis ajasmiayi . Nujai iin tuke waitnentrampramniaitji . Tuma asa Yúsnan pujurniu uuntri ajas Yúsan tuke pénker chichartamsamniaitji . Núnisan murikiun maa Yus Súsatniua aintsan ni jakamujai Ashí shuara tunaarin tsankurniuiti .

text: For in that he himself hath suffered being tempted , he is able to succour them that are tempted .
text2: Tura imia ninki waitsa asa tura íwianch nekapsamu asa yamaikia iisha Wáitiakrincha tura íwianch nekapramkurnisha yainmakminiaitji .

text: Wherefore , holy brethren , partakers of the heavenly calling , consider the Apostle and High Priest of our profession , Christ Jesus ;
text2: Tuma asamtai , pénker yatsuru , atumniasha Niiniu Atí tusa Yus achirmakuitrume . Tuma asarum Kristu Jesus pénker Enentáimtustarum . Niisha Yus nekas Akatramuyayi . Tura Ashí Yus - shuar ajasarua nujai Yúsnan pujurniu uuntria Núnisaiti .

text: Who was faithful to him that appointed him , as also Moses was faithful in all his house .
text2: Nu Atí tusa Yus anaikiamiayi . Túramtai Kristu nuna ti penker takasuiti . Núnisan Muisais Ashí Yusa aentsrin , Israer - shuar armia nuna ti shiir wainkiamiayi .

text: For this man was counted worthy of more glory than Moses , inasmuch as he who hath builded the house hath more honour than the house .
text2: Túrasha Muisaisjai nankaamas Kristu ti shiir awajnasuiti . Jeajai nankaamas jea jeamniuka nekas pénkerchakait . Núnisan Kristu Muisaisjai nankaamas pénkeraiti .

text: For every house is builded by some man ; but he that built all things is God .
text2: Kame Ashí jean shuar jeamtsuk . Tura Yus Ashí írunna nuna najanaiti .

text: And Moses verily was faithful in all his house , as a servant , for a testimony of those things which were to be spoken after ;
text2: Wats . Muisais Israer - shuaran Wáiniuk Yusa Jeen takastinia aintsan pénker takarniuyayi . Tura ni takaak ukunam Yus Títiatna nuna etserkatniuyayi .

text: But Christ as a son over his own house ; whose house are we , if we hold fast the confidence and the rejoicing of the hope firm unto the end .
text2: Túrasha Kristu Yusa Jeen takarniuchu asa antsu Yusa Uchiri asa nui Ashí akupeawai . Nu jeasha iitji . Tura tuke iniaitsuk kakaram ajasar Yus suramsattaj nu wararsar Nákastiniaitji .

text: Wherefore ( as the Holy Ghost saith , To day if ye will hear his voice ,
text2: Nu asamtai , Yusa Shiir Wakani Yus - Papinium tawai : " Yamaikia , Yus tana nu ántakrumka

text: Harden not your hearts , as in the provocation , in the day of temptation in the wilderness :
text2: nakittsuk shiir anturkatarum . Israer - shuar yaunchu aents atsamunam wekainiak Yus taman nakitrar Yúsan nekapsar akajkarmiayi .

text: When your fathers tempted me , proved me , and saw my works forty years .
text2: Túramtai Yus Tímiayi " Nui Atumí uuntri nekaprusar akajtukarmiayi . Kuarenta ( 40 ) uwitin wi kakaram Túramun iisarsha nakitrurarmiayi .

text: Wherefore I was grieved with that generation , and said , They do alway err in their heart ; and they have not known my ways .
text2: Tuma ásarmatai nu shuaran kajerkan tiarmajai " Nu shuar ni Enentáin tuke awajiniawai . Tura Wi taman umirkatniun nakitiainiawai " Tímiajai .

text: So I sware in my wrath , They shall not enter into my rest . )
text2: Tura kajerkaran nekas Tákun " Wijiai shiir pujustinian penké tsankatkachartatjai " Tímiajai " Tímiayi Yús . " Tu aarmaiti .

text: Take heed , brethren , lest there be in any of you an evil heart of unbelief , in departing from the living God .
text2: Anearta , yatsuru . Yajauch Enentáimsarum tuke iwiaaku Yus Enentáimtutsuk kanakiirap .

text: But exhort one another daily , while it is called To day ; lest any of you be hardened through the deceitfulness of sin .
text2: Kame kashinkia tunaajai anannam Enentáimin Yúsna nakitrashtapash . Tuma asamtai yamaik tura Ashí tsawant Ikiakánairatarum .

text: For we are made partakers of Christ , if we hold the beginning of our confidence stedfast unto the end ;
text2: Yámankamtaik Kristu shiir Enentáimtusmaj Núnisrik tuke iniaitsuk émeteakrikia Krístujai shiir tsaninkiar pujustatji .

text: While it is said , To day if ye will hear his voice , harden not your hearts , as in the provocation .
text2: Nu asamtai Yus - Papí tawai : " Yamaikia , Yus tana nu ántakrumka nakittsuk shiir anturkatarum . Israer - shuar yaunchu Yus taman nakitrarua Núnisrum ajasairap . "

text: For some , when they had heard , did provoke : howbeit not all that came out of Egypt by Moses .
text2: Muisais Ejiptu nunkanmaya jiikmia Nú shuar Yusa chichamen anturkariat nakitrarmiayi .

text: But with whom was he grieved forty years ? was it not with them that had sinned , whose carcases fell in the wilderness ?
text2: Tura umiiniachkui kuarenta Uwí kajerkarmiayi . Tunaan Túrawaru ásar Untsurí shuar aents atsamunam kajinkiarmiayi .

text: And to whom sware he that they should not enter into his rest , but to them that believed not ?
text2: Kame umirkacharunka Yus " Wijiai shiir pujustinian penké tsankatkachartatjai " Tímiayi .

text: So we see that they could not enter in because of unbelief .
text2: Iis , Yúsan Enentáimtachu ásar Niijiai shiir pujustinnium wayatniun tujinkiarmiayi .

text: Let us therefore fear , lest , a promise being left us of entering into his rest , any of you should seem to come short of it .
text2: Nu asamtai , ii wayatin tsankatkamu áyatar Yusjai shiir pujustinnium Páchitkiachu aij tusar aneartiniaitji .

text: For unto us was the gospel preached , as well as unto them : but the word preached did not profit them , not being mixed with faith in them that heard it .
text2: Yaunchu nu shuaran ujakarmia Núnisan incha Uwempratin Chichaman ujatmakuitji . Nu shuar Yúsan Enentáimtutsuk antukaru ásarmatai nu chicham Yáincharmiayi .

text: For we which have believed do enter into rest , as he said , As I have sworn in my wrath , if they shall enter into my rest : although the works were finished from the foundation of the world .
text2: Antsu iikia ni chichame Enentáimta asar Yusjai shiir pujustinnium nekas wayaji . Tura chikichan Yus Tímiayi : " Nu asamtai kajerkan nekas takun " Wijiai shiir pujustinian penké tsankatkachartatjai " Tímiajai " Tímiayi . Kame Yus Jú nunkan najana umik Nuyá shiir pujus ayampramiayi .

text: For he spake in a certain place of the seventh day on this wise , And God did rest the seventh day from all his works .
text2: Yus - Chichamnum ayampramun Júnis tawai . " Yus sais tsawant takakmas Nuyá tsawantai ayampramiayi . "

text: And in this place again , If they shall enter into my rest .
text2: Tura ataksha tawai : " Wijiai shiir pujustinnium Wayá ayamprashtatui . "

text: Seeing therefore it remaineth that some must enter therein , and they to whom it was first preached entered not in because of unbelief :
text2: Shuar nui wayawar ayampratin tuke awai . Tura emka Uwempratin Chichaman antukarmia nuka umichu ásar wayacharmiayi .

text: Again , he limiteth a certain day , saying in David , To day , after so long a time ; as it is said , To day if ye will hear his voice , harden not your hearts .
text2: Nu asamtai ataksha Yus wayatin tsawantan aanturmaitji . Nusha Yamái tsawantaiti . Wats , Israer - shuar ni nunké Yus susamunam Wayáwarmiayi . Tura nuna ukunam Uunt Tawit timiajai Yus ni chichamen ujatmaji : " Yamaikia , Yus tana nu ántakrumka nakittsuk shiir anturkatarum . Israer - shuar yaunchu Yus taman nakitrarua Núnisrum ajasairap " Tímiayi .

text: For if Jesus had given them rest , then would he not afterward have spoken of another day .
text2: Kame ni Kapitiántri Jusué Israer - shuaran ni nunkeen Awayá ayamtikraitkiuinkia Yus ukunam ataksha tsawantan aanturmachaaji .

text: There remaineth therefore a rest to the people of God .
text2: Nujai Páantaiti , Ashí Yus - shuar Yusjai shiir pujusar ayampratin tuke awai .

text: For he that is entered into his rest , he also hath ceased from his own works , as God did from his .
text2: Yusjai ayampra nu , ni kakarmarijiai takastinian ayampraiti Yus ni Takatríjiai ayampramia Núnisan .

text: Let us labour therefore to enter into that rest , lest any man fall after the same example of unbelief .
text2: Nu asamtai iisha Yusjai shiir pujustinnium pachiinkiachaij tusar Yus shiir Enentáimtusar kakaram ajastiniaitji . Israer - shuar yaunchu Yus taman nakitrarua Núnis ajaschatniuitji .

text: For the word of God is quick , and powerful , and sharper than any twoedged sword , piercing even to the dividing asunder of soul and spirit , and of the joints and marrow , and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart .
text2: Yusa chichame iwiaaku chichamaiti , Imiá kakarmaiti . Puniá mai érea Núniniaiti . Tuma asa shuara Enentáin init Wayá Ashí ni Enentáimmian tura wakeramurin ti paant awajtawai .

text: Neither is there any creature that is not manifest in his sight : but all things are naked and opened unto the eyes of him with whom we have to do .
text2: Yus najanamuka penké Niin umprukchamniaiti . Ashí írunna nu Yus iimmianum Misúa aintsan paant ainiawai . Tura ii Túramu Ashí paant ujakartatji .

text: Seeing then that we have a great high priest , that is passed into the heavens , Jesus the Son of God , let us hold fast our profession .
text2: Jesus Yusa Uchiri nekas Yúsnan pujurniu uuntri ajas Yusai Wayá iiniun chichartamji . Nu asamtai iniaitsuk tuke nekas Enentáimtustiniaitji .

text: For we have not an high priest which cannot be touched with the feeling of our infirmities ; but was in all points tempted like as we are , yet without sin .
text2: Niisha iijiai métek Ashí tunaanum nekapsamuiti . Túrasha tunaan Túrachmiayi . Tuma asa ii tujintiaj nuna paant nékak ii itiurchatrin waitnentramniuitji . Tura Yúsnan pujurniu uuntri asamtai

text: Let us therefore come boldly unto the throne of grace , that we may obtain mercy , and find grace to help in time of need .
text2: Yús - akuptainium shiir Enentáijiai sapijmiatsuk jeamniaitji . Tura Yus iin anenma asa waitnentramak itiurchat pujajnia nui yainmaktatji .
